Title: tuu ne o rangiile kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa
Lyrics: tuu ne o rangiile kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa 2 piiyaa piiyaa bole matavaalaa jiiaa  baahon men chhupaa ke ye kyaa kiyaa o re piyaa o threedots tuu ne o rangiile kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa piiyaa piiyaa bole matavaalaa jiiaa  paas bulaa ke gale se lagaa ke tuu ne to badal daalii duniyaa nae hain nazaare nae hain ishaare rahii no vo kal vaalii duniyaa sapane dikhaake tuu ne ye kyaa kiyaa o re piyaa o threedots tuu ne o rangiile kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa piiyaa piiyaa bole matavaalaa jiiaa  o mere saajan kaisii ye dhadakan  shor machaane lagii man men  jaise laharaae nadiyaa kaa paanii  lahar uthe re mere tan men   2 mujh men samaa ke ye kyaa kiyaa o re piyaa o threedots tuu ne o rangiile kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa piiyaa piiyaa bole matavaalaa jiiaa  baahon men chhupaa ke ye kyaa kiyaa o re piyaa o threedots

Title: dil ko lagaakar hamane
Lyrics: dil ko lagaake hamane kuchh bhii naa paayaa  chain gavaayaa2  gam kaa fasaanaa kyaa sunaayen  kah naa paayen  haan haan gam kaathreedots paayen  ye bhii naa sochaa haay bhuul ke2 jis bevafaa ko apanaa banaayaa hai vo paraayaa dil ko lagaake threedots gavaayaa  aankhon se dil khaaye dhokhe chup roke2 o duniyaa basii naa haay pyaar kii2 kaise bitaaye rog lagaayaa jii ko jalaayaa dil kothreedots gavaayaa  de ke sahaaraa mujhako jhuutaa tumane luutaa2 bhuulii kahaanii hai chhed dii2 teraaa fasaanaa yaad naa aayaa hansake rulaayaa dil ko threedots gavaayaa

Title: unhen tuu bhuul jaa ai dil
Lyrics: unhen tuu bhuul jaa ai dil tadapane se bhii kyaa haasil   nazaare kar gay jaaduu nigaahen de gayiin dhokhaa uthe tuufaan kuchh aise ki duube pyaar ke saahil   hazaaron aarazuuon se basaayaa jisako pahaluu men jise samajhe the ham dilabar vah nikalaa sang dil qaatil   na jaane kaisii raahon par chalii hai zindagii merii ki jiinaa hii nahiin ab to meraa maranaa bhii hai mushkil   unhen tuu bhuul jaa ae dil

Title: hai yahaan koii mard  das
Singer: saumyam anupama chorus shankar mahadevan dominic hema sardesai
Lyrics: hai yahaan koii mard hindustaanii jo mujhe chhuu sake ho ho saansen merii tuufaanii bekaabuu ye javaanii kaabuu koii mujhape paa naa sakaa har ang men tan men chingaarii ye badan kii koii bujhaae bujhaa naa sakaa aa bujhaa de bas hosh udaa de das ho ho ho ho  jaaduu huun javaan huun khushbuu huun main havaa huun main hii mahakataa huaa huun samaan rangiilii main diivaanii nashiilii main mastaanii main jaam huun jaam kaa main nashaa aajamaa le bas hosh udaa de das  main huun havaa kaa jhonkaa havaa ko kisane rokaa tokaa hai laharon ko kisane yahaan suuraj kii kiranon jaise jangal men hiranon jaise baadal bhii aavaaraa ghuumen jahaan dil churaa le bas hosh udaa de das ho ho ho ho saansen merii tuufaanii threedots vande maataram vande maataram hai yahaan koii mard jo mujhe chhuu sake aankhon se paradaa hataa de nazaron se nazaren ladaa le he jalaakar javaanii chingaariyon ko havaa de mardon men tuu hii to ik mard hai apanii mardaanagii aa dikhaa de dikhaa de udaa de mere hosh bas das haan tuu chaahie mujhako bas das merii raahon men nigaahon men aa phans aa le le mujhe panaahon men aur kas das das das das  jay hind kaho jay he jay he is vatan kii jay is chaman kii jay  qaatil javaanii jaalim samaan hone lagii hai fizaa badagumaan har jism pyaasaa hai har ruuh pyaasii hai aise men jaanejaan duurii hai kyon darmiyaan mujhase jo nazar milaataa hai merii lau men vo ho jaataa hai fanaa merii aag se khelaa hai tuune ho jaaegaa tuu jal jal ye dhuaan barason kii tarasii ye nazar hai barason ke pyaase ye adhar hain naa tarasaa mujhe naa taras das das das das

Title: pariishaan ho ke merii kaak aakir dil na ban jaae
Lyrics: pariishaan ho ke merii kaak aakir dil na ban jaae jo mushkil ab hai yaarab phir wohii mushkil na ban jaae  kabhii chhodii huii manzil bhii yaad aatii hai raahii ko khatak sii hai jo siine men gamemanzil na ban jaae  banaayaa ishq ne dariyaaenaapaigaagaraan mujhako ye merii kud nigahadaarii meraa saahil na ban jaae  aruuzeaadamekaakii se anjum sahame jaate hain ke ye tuutaa huaa taaraa mahekaamil na ban jaae

Title: tere binaa zindagii se koii shikavaa to nahiin shikavaa nahiin
Lyrics: lataa tere binaa zindagii se koi shikavaa to nahiin shikavaa nahiin shikavaa nahiin shikavaa nahiin tere binaa zindagii bhii lekin  zindagii to nahiin zindagii nahiin zindagii nahiin zindagii nahiin  kaash aisaa ho tere kadamon se  chun ke manzil chale  aur kahiin duur kahiin    2 tum gar saath ho  manzilon kii kamii to nahiin tere binaa zindagii se koi shikavaa to nahiin shikavaa nahiin  jii men aataa hai  tere daaman men  sar chhupaa ke ham  rote rahen rote rahen      2 terii bhii aankhon men  aansuon kii namii to nahiin kishor tere binaa zindagii se koi shikavaa to nahiin shikavaa nahiin tere binaa zindagii bhii lekin  zindagii  to nahiin zindagii nahiin  tum jo kah do to aajakii raat chaand duubegaa nahiin raat ko rok lo raat ki baat hai  aur zindagii baakii to nahiin tere binaa zindagii se koi shikavaa to nahiin shikavaa nahiin tere binaa zindagii bhii lekin  zindagii  to nahiin zindagii nahiin

Title: takliidemohammad bhuul naa jaa
Lyrics: takliidemohammad bhuul naa jaa tauhiid kaa dankaa aaj bajaa  tuu muslim hai ye yaad rahe aazaad huaa  aazaad  rahe terii duniyaa aabaad rahe duniyaa ik apanii naii banaa  nabiyon ne dii ye gawaahii hai tuu raahekudaa kaa raahii hai ahmad kii gulaamii shaahii hai ye saabit kar de aaj  zaraa  islaam sukuun kaa hai saayaa insaan ne yahaan sukh hai paayaa faiyaz ye diin jab se aayaa muhtaajoganii kaa farq mitaa

Title: avadhuutaa yugan yugan ham yogii
Lyrics: avadhuutaa yugan yugan ham yogii aavainaa jaay mitainaa kabahuun sabad anaahat bhogii  sabhii thaur jamaat hamarii sab hii thaur par melaa ham sab men sab hain hamamaan ham hai bahurii akelaa  ham hii siddha samaadhi ham hii ham maunii ham bole ruup saruup aruup dikhaake ham hii men ham to khelen  kahe kabiiraa jo suno bhaaii saadho naahiinakoii ichchhaa apanii madhii men aap main doluun sahaj swaichchhaa

Title: jummaa chummaa de de jummaa chummaa de de chummaa
Lyrics: jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa jummaa  are o jummaa merii jaaneman baahar nikal aaj jummaa hai aaj kaa vaadaa hai dekh main aa gayaa tuu bhii jaldii aa mujhe mat aur tadapaa  are tuu bolii thii pichhale jumme ko chummaa duungii agale jumme ko aaj jummaa hai to aajaa aajaa  jummaa chummaa de de  jummaa chummaa de de chummaa jumme ke din kiyaa chumme kaa vaadaa jumme ko tod diyaa chumme kaa vaadaa le aa gayaa re phir jummaachummaa threedots  jumme ke badale men kyaa doge bolo to lenaa kyaa denaa kyaa lenaa kyaa denaa kyaa lenaa kyaa lenaa kyaa chummaa do threedots  main kuchh na duungaa isase zyaadaa chummaa chummaa de de  jummaa chummaa de de chummaa	threedots kar to na chumme javar jummaa chummaa na de  jummaa chummaa na de chummaa jummaa chummaa de de  jummaa chummaa de de chummaa  main teraa jii bhar duun sochaa thaa haan kar duun phir kaahe phir kaahe naa kar dii  naa kar dii phir kaahe naa kar dii main sad ke jaan kar duun main ne badal diyaa iraadaa jummaa chummaa na de  jummaa chummaa naa de chummaa threedots

Title: zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah
Lyrics: zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah hamen bhii apanaa diivaanaa banaa do yaa rasuulallaah zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah  muhabbat gair se merii chudaa do yaa rasuulallaah meri soyi hui qisamat jagaa do ya rasuulallah zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah  badii qisamat hamaarii hai ke ummat men tumhaarii hai bharosaa diinoduniyaa men tumhaaraa yaa rasuulallaah zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah  andherii qabr men mujh ko akelaa chod jaayenge vahaan ho fazl se tere ujaalaa yaa rasuulallaah zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah  kudaa mujh ko madiine men jo pahunchaaye to behatar hai ke roze par hii de duun jaan jaa kar yaa rasuulallaah zaraa chehare se kamalii hataa do yaa rasuulallaah

Title: likhane vaale ne
Lyrics: dil tere aane se pahale bhii yuunhii barabaad thaa aur yuun hii barabaad hai tere chale jaane ke baad  o likhane vaale ne likhane vaale ne likh dii merii taqadiir men barabaadii  dil ko jab terii muhabbat kaa sahaaraa mil gayaa main ne samajhaa merii kashtii ko kinaaraa mil gayaa haay qismat ko magar kuchh aur hii manzuur thaa aankh jab kholii to kashtii se kinaaraa duur thaa likhane vaale ne   threedots  chhod kar duniyaan terii tujhako bhulaane ke liye ham chale aaye yahaan aansuu bahaane ke liye dil abhii bhuulaa na thaa tujhako ki qismat merii khiinch kar laayii tujhe mujhako rulaane ke liye likhane vaale ne   threedots

Title: kaa karuun sajanii aaye na baalam
Lyrics: kaa karuun sajanii aae na baalam khoj rahii hain piyaa paradesii ankhiyaan  2 aae na baalam  jab bhii koii aahat hoe manavaa moraa bhaage dekho kahiin tuute nahiin prem ke ye dhaage ye matavaarii priit hamaarii chhupe na chhupaae  2 saavan ho tum main huun torii badariyaa aaye na baalam kaa karuunthreedots  bhor bhaii aur saanjh dhalii re samay ne lii angadaaii ye jag saaraa niind se haaraa mohe niind na aaii main ghabaraauun dar dar jaauun aae vo na aae  2 raadhaa bulaae kahaan khoe ho kanhaiyyaa aae na baalam kaa karuunthreedots

Title: koii banaa aaj apanaa
Lyrics: koii banaa aaj apanaa 4  sukh men aankhen band ho rahii khule hriday ke dvaar do man milakar ek hue hain do do nainaa chaar 2 chaar nain dekhen hil mil kar ek madhur sapanaa  banaa aaj apanaa threedots  chaar charan par paanch ek hai chaar agar do baat ek giit men bandhatii jaatii chaar chaandanii raat 2 madhur priit kii phulmaalaa par praan naam japanaa  banaa aaj apanaa threedots  prem hindolaa jhuulen hil mil ek qadam  naache rut chham chham ke bhare bahan men bahan 2 baar baar nainon kaa milanaa palakon kaa jhapanaa  banaa aaj apanaa threedots

Title: kab meraa nasheman ahalechaman
Lyrics: kab meraa nasheman ahalechaman gulashan men ganvaaraa karate hain gunche apanii aavaazon men bijalii ko pukaaraa karate hain  ponchho na araq ruksaaron se rangiiniiehusn ko badhane do sunate hain ki shabanam ke qatare phuulon ko nikhaaraa karate hain  jaatii huii maiyyat dekh ke bhii allah tum uth kar aa na sake do chaar qadam to dushaman bhii taqaliif ganvaaraa karate hain  ab nazaa kaa aalam hai mujh par tum apanii muhabbat vaapas lo jab kashtii duubane lagatii hai to bojh utaaraa karate hain

Title: mujh se yuun ruuth kar kyon duur jaa rahii ho mukesh gazal
Lyrics: mujh se yuun ruuth kar kyon duur jaa rahii ho dil to meraa diyaa hai kyon ise bujhaa rahii ho  aavaaz de rahe hain aankhon kaa hai ishaaraa tere binaa o saajan meraa kahaan guzaaraa barabaad mujhako karake duniyaa basaa rahe ho  koi mujhe bataade kab aayegaa saveraa ujadaa meraa chaman hai koi nahiin baseraa yun lut kar kisiike dil ko rulaa rahe ho

Title: main ghii kaa diyaa jalaauun re ghar aao ghar aao
Lyrics: chain na din bhar rain na nindiyaa bikhar gaii maathe kii bindiyaa nainan niir bahaauun re ghar aao ghar aao  badii der se khadii suhaagan raah takat hai tihaarii aao man ke miit ab aao puujaa karuun tihaarii main ghii kaa diyaa jalaauun re ghar aao ghar aao

Title: arzeniyaazeishq ke qaabil nahiin rahaa
Lyrics: arzeniyaazeishq ke qaabil nahiin rahaa jis dil pe naaz thaa mujhe wo dil nahiin rahaa  jaataa huun daagehasaratehastii liye hue huun shammaa kushtaadar kuremahafil nahiin rahaa  waan kar diye hain shauq ne bandenaqaabehusn gair az nigaah ab koii haayil nahiin rahaa  bedaadeishq se nahiin darataa magar asad jis dil pe naaz thaa mujhe wo dil nahiin rahaa

Title: aa hamasafar pyaar kii sej par kuchh kahen kuchh sunen
Lyrics: la aa aa aa ki aa hamasafar pyaar kii sej par     kuchh kahen kuchh sunen     jaag ke raat bhar hamasafar la aa hamasafar pyaar kii sej par     kuchh kahen kuchh sunen     jaag ke raat bhar aa hamasafar  la itanaa pyaar tuu sanam laayaa hai kahaan se ki itanaa ruup tuu sanam laaii hai jahaan se la main jo bhii huun vo hai tere pyaar kaa asar ki kahiin lag na jaae tujh ko merii nazar     aa hamasafar pyaar kii sej par la kuchh kahen kuchh sunen     jaag ke raat bhar aa aa aa donon aa hamasafar  la aao aaj milen kuchh to kho ke paa len ki aao aaj lut ke kuchh to ham churaa len la kahuun kyaa main dil men uth rahii hai kyaa lahar ki gale mujh se milake ho jaa tuu bekhabar la aa hamasafar pyaar kii sej par ki kuchh kahen kuchh sunen     jaag ke raat bhar haa aa la aa hamasafar ki pyaar kii sej par la kuchh kahen ki kuchh sunen donon jaag ke raat bhar     aa hamasafar

Title: ishq mujhako nahiin vahashat hii sahii
Lyrics: haan haan ishq mujhako nahiin vahashat hii sahii 2 merii vahashat terii shoharat hii sahii 2 hii merii vahashat terii shoharat hii sahii  qataa kiije naa taaalluq hamase 2 kuchh nahiin hai to adaavat hii sahii haan kuchh nahiin hai to adaavat hii sahii  ham bhii dushaman to nahiin hain apane 2 gair ko tujhase mohabbat hii sahii haan gair ko tujhase mohabbat hii sahii  ham koii tarqewafaa karate hain 2 naa sahii ishq musiibat hii sahii haan naa sahii ishq musiibat hii sahii haan naa sahii ishq musiibat hii sahii  kuchh to de ai falaqenaainsaaf 2 aahofariyaad kii ruubat hii sahii haan aahofariyaad kii ruubat hii sahii  ham bhii taqaliim kii hii hii ham bhii taqaliim kii kuun daalenge 2 beniyaazii terii aadat hii sahii haan beniyaazii terii aadat hii sahii  yaar ke chhed chalii jaaye asad haan e yaar ke chhed chalii jaaye asad gar nahiin vasl to hasarat hii sahii 2  ishq mujhako nahiin vahashat hii sahii

Title: bas merii jaan bas maan le merii baat
Lyrics: ki bas merii jaan bas maan le merii baat     aaj terii dor hai hamaare saath 2 la  ho matavaale dar hai yahii     tujh se kahiin dorii chhuut na jaae ki are aisaa bhii kyaa teraa meraa     hai zindagii ke saath la  bas merii jaan bas maan le merii baat     dekh aise na chal hamaare saath  la  bas merii jaan bas maan le merii baat     dekh aise na chal hamaare saath ki diivaanaa main bhii huun aisaa     sang teraa na chhoduun chaahe jiyaa jaae la  ab laut jaa o re piyaa     joduun main tere haath ki bas merii jaan bas kaahe jode haath     dar tujhe kis kaa main huun tere saath  ki bas merii jaan bas kaahe jode haath     dar tujhe kis kaa main huun tere saath la  ho maan bhii jaa o mere sanyaa     dhadake jiyaa koii aa hii na jaae ki are aae koii main to yuun hii     chaahuun tujhe din raath  ki hans merii jaan hans ye huii na baat     dar tujhe kis kaa main huun tere saath     ho main huun tere saath     main huun tere

Title: tum agar mujhako na chaaho to koii baat nahiin
Lyrics: tum agar mujhako na chaaho to koii baat nahiin tum kisii aur ko chaahogii to mushkil hogii  ab agar mel nahiin hai to judaaii bhii nahiin baat todii bhii nahiin tumane nibhaaii bhii nahiin ye sahaaraa bhii bahut hai mere jiine ke liye tum agar merii nahiin ho to paraaii bhii nahiin mere dil ko na saraaho to koii baat nahiin gair ke dil ko saraahogii to mushkilthreedots  tum hasiin ho tumhen sab pyaar hii karate honge main to marataa huun to kyaa aur bhii marate honge sab kii aankhon men isii shauq kaa tuufaan hogaa sab ke siine men yahii dard ubharate honge mere gam men na karaaho to koii baat nahiin aur ke gam men karaahogii to mushkilthreedots  phuul kii tarah hanso sab kii nigaahon men raho apanii maasuum javaanii kii panaahon men raho mujhako vo din na dikhaanaa tumhen apanii hii qasam main tarasataa rahuun tum gair kii baahon men raho tum agar mujhase na nibhaao to koii baat nahiin kisii dushman se nibhaaogii to mushkilthreedots

Title: piipal kii chhaanv tale sapanon ke diip jale
Lyrics: piipal kii chhaanv tale sapanon ke diip jale aise men aao ke suhaanaa hai samaan nainon men rang lie man men umang lie milake basaaenge ham pyaar ka jahaan piipal kii chhaanv tale threedots  chaand sitaaron kaa kaaravaan rut hai hasiin kaisaa pyaaraa hai samaan 2 thandii hawaaen ye mahakii fazaaen 2 hamen yaad dilaaen terii tuu hai kahaan piipal kii chhaanv tale threedots  tere kayaalon men khoii huii chaandanii raat hai soii huii 2 priit lagaae ye rut mastaanii 2 aajaa pyaar kii umangen abhii hain jawaan piipal kii chhaanv tale threedots

Title: beniyaazesahar ho gaii
Lyrics: beniyaazesahar ho gaii 	shaamegam ho gaii  ek nazar kyaa idhar ho gaii 	ajanabii har nazar ho gaii  zindagii kyaa hai aur maut kyaa 	shab huii aur sahar ho gaii  unakii aankhon men ashq aa gae 	daastaan muktasar ho gaii  chaar tinake hi rak paae the 	bijaliyon ko kabar ho gaii  chidh gaii kisake daaman kii baat 	kudbkud aankh tar ho gaii  unakii mahfil se uthakar chale 	roshnii hamasafar ho gaii  tarz jab se chhuutaa kaaravaan 	ziisth garesafar ho gaii

Title: tum kahaan chhupe bhagawaan  dukh haro dwaarakaa naath
Lyrics: tum kahaan chhupe bhagawaan karo mat derii dukh haro dwaarakaa naath  dwaarakaa naath sharan main terii  dukh haro dwaarakaa naath  sharan main terii 2  yahii sunaa hai diinabandhu tum sabakaa duhkh har lete jo niraash hain  unakii jholii aashaa se bhar dete agar sudaamaa hotaa main to daud dwaarakaa aataa paanv aansuuon se dhokar main man kii aag bujhaataa tum bano nahiin anjaan suno bhagawaan karo mat derii dukh haro dwaarakaa naath threedots  jo bhii sharan tumhaarii aataa usako dhiir bandhaate nahiin duubane dete daataa naiyaa paar lagaate tum na sunoge to kisako main apanii vyaathaa sunaauun dwaar tumhaaraa chhodake bhagawaan aur kahaan main jaauun prabhuu kab se rahaa pukaar main tere dwaar karo mat derii dukh haro dwaarakaa naath threedots

Title: kaisii chalii ab ke havaa tere shahar men
Lyrics: kaisii chalii hai ab ke havaa tere shahar men bande bhii ho gaye hain kudaa tere shahar men  kyaa jaane kyaa huaa ki pareshaan ho gayii ek lahazaa ruk gayii thii sabaa tere shahar men    kuchh dushmanii kaa dhab hai na ab dostii ke taur donon kaa ek rang huaa tere shahar men   shaayad unhen pataa thaa ki kaatir hai ajanabii logon ne usako luut liyaa tere shahar men

Title: bigade hue nasiib kaa afsaanaa hii to huun
Lyrics: bigade hue nasiib kaa afasaanaa hii to huun hai chaak garebaan meraa diiwaanaa hii to huun  ai shammaa mere haal pe rotii hai kis lie jal jaanaa meraa kaam hai parawaanaa hii to huun  gulashan kahaan kaa gul kaa bhii ab to nahiin nishaan ujadii huii bahaar huun viiraanaa hii to huun  kyonkar main paauun manzilemaqasuud kaa pataa duniyaa kii rasmoraah se begaanaa hii to huun

Title: chup chaap akele chhup chhup ke
Lyrics: chup chaap akele chhup chhup ke main giit khushii ke gaataa huun dil ke zakhmon ko chiil chiil main apanaa jii bahalaataa huun  naa bhuulaa huun na bhuuluungaa vo din jo sapane aaj bane jo aaj ruuth kar bhuul gaye kal tak vo saathii the apane apane begaane banate kyon  jag se ye bhed chhupaataa huun apanaa jii bahalaataa huun threedots  zakhmii dil kaa ye daavaa hai badanaam na hogaa pyaar teraa ek aah na nikalegii muunh se ab jalane do sansaar meraa betaab huun aag bujhaane ko to nayanan niir bahaataa huun apanaa jii bahalaataa huun threedots

Title: todo na dil beqaraar kaa
Lyrics: ki araaraaraaraaraa todo na dil beqaraar kaa     maan jaao jii chhodo yah dillagii	2     le bhii lo pahalaa tohfaa yah pyaar kaa     araaraaraaraaraa todo na dil beqaraar kaa  aa kaahe ko ham 		ki haan haan     lete phiren		ki aaiin     tohfe tumhaare     jhukate mere qadamon pe hain chaand sitaare  ki yah to bataa		aa kyaa     kab tak teraa     dard sahaa re biite yuun hii     ab ke binaa merii bahaaren aa biit jaane do mausam bahaar kaa  ki araaraaraaraaraa todo na dil beqaraar kaa     maan jaao jii chhodo yah dillagii     maan jaao jii		aa hato jii     chhodo yah dillagii     le bhii lo pahalaa tohfaa     yah pyaar kaa		aa ai hato  aa mainne kabhii		ki huun     dekhaa nahiin		ki huun huun     pyaar se tumako     is pyaar kaa aae yakiin kabhii na hamako  ki ham tum mile		aa kyaa     chandaa tale		aa ahaa haa     yaad hai tumako us raat ka	aa na na na     intazaar hai tabhi se tumako aa phir to jii kaato din intazaar kaa ki urrthreedots aithreedots     aaiko poron italaabitalaa maitaaporonko      maan jaao jii chhodo yah dillagii	2     le bhii lo pahalaa tohfaa yah pyaar kaa     araaraaraaraaraa todo na dil beqaraar kaa aa jaathreedots  aa jaa jaa abhii o jaaduugar aur kabhii mil     daalo na jii aisii nazar dhadak uthaa dil  ki aisaa na ho chal duun kahiin     khulake zaraa mil le le ise     bas men nahiin sanam meraa dil aa kyaa karuun main aise beqaraar kaa ki urrthreedots urrthreedots     maan jaao jii chhodo yah dillagii 2     le bhii lo pahalaa tohfaa yah pyaar kaa aa na na na threedots

Title: rahaa gardishon men haradam mere ishq kaa sitaaraa
Lyrics: rahaa gardishon men haradam mere ishq kaa sitaaraa kabhii dagamagaayii kashtii kabhii lut gayaa kinaaraa  koii dil kaa khel dekhe ki muhabbaton kii baazii vo qadam qadam pe jiite main qadam qadam pe haaraa  ye hamaarii badanasiibii jo nahiin to aur kyaa hai ki usii ke ho gaye ham jo na ho sakaa hamaaraa  pade jab gamon ke paale rahe mitake mitanevaale jise maut bhii na puuchhaa use zindagii ne maaraa

Title: thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan miiraa bhajan
Lyrics: thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan mhaaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii  puurab janam rii priit puraanii 2 jaavanaa giradhaarii mhaaraa saanvaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan  sundar badan jonvataa saajan  thaarii chabii balihaarii 	2 mhaare aangan maa syaam padhaaro 2 mangal ganvaa anaarii ho mangal ganvaa anaarii mhaaraa saanvaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan  motii chokh puranvan nenaa  tan man daaraa baarii		2 charan saran rii daasii miiraa rii 2 janam janam rii kvaarii ho janam janam rii kvaarii mhaaraa saanvaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan  thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan mhaaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii  puurab janam rii priit puraanii 2 jaavanaa giradhaarii mhaaraa saanvaraa saanvaraa giradhaarii thaanii kaanyii kaanyii bol sunanvaan

Lyrics: dam ganiimat shumaar karataa huun shukareparwardigaar karataa huun  haae ummiidevaadaaefardaa aaj tak intezaar karataa huun  pyaar kii kuchh naa puuchhiye taahir pyaar aataa hai pyaar karataa huun

Title: ishq men khoye jaaoge to baat kii tah ko paaoge
Lyrics: na udhaa yuun thokaron se merii kaakeqabr zaalim yahii ek rah gayii hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii  ishq men khoye jaaoge to baat kii tah ko paaoge kadr hamaarii kuchh jaanoge dil ko kahiin jo lagaaoge  sabr kahaan betaabiiedil se chain kahaan bekwaabii hai sau sau baar galii men bhatake ghar se baahar jaaoge  ashq to paanii ke hain lekin jalate jalate aavenge dil kii lagii hairaan hai saahab kis dhab mil ke bujhaaoge  chaahat miir sabhii karate hain ranjotalab men rahate hain tum jo abhii taab ho jaise jii se haath uthaaoge

Title: aaj mujhe kuchh kahanaa hai aaj mujhe kuchh kahanaa hai
Lyrics: ki kashti ka khaamosh safar hai shaam bhi hai tanahaai bhi     dur kinare par bajati hai laharon ki shahanai bhi     aaj mujhe kuchh kahana hai aaj mujhe kuchh kahana hai     lekin ye sharmili nigaahen mujhako ijaazat den to kahun     ye meri betaab umangen thodi fursat den to kahun  su jo kuchh tumako kahana hai vo mere hi dil ki baat na ho     jo mere kvaabon ki manzil us manzil ki baat na ho ki kahate hue dar sa lagata hai kahakar baat na kho baithun     ye jo zara sa saath mila hai ye bhi saath na kho baithun  su kabase tumhaare raste pe main phul bichhaaye baithi hun     kah bhi chuko jo kahana hai main aas lagaaye baithi hun ki dil ne dil ki baat samajh li ab munh se kya kahana hai     aaj nahin to kal kah lenge ab to saath hi rahana hai  su kah bhi chuko kah bhi chuko jo kahana hai  ki chhodo ab kya kahana hai

Title: zindagii ke safar men guzar jaate hain jo makaam
Lyrics: zindagii ke safar men guzar jaate hain jo makaam vo phir nahin aate vo phir nahin aate  phul khilate hain log milate hain phul khilate hain log milate hain magar patajhad men jo phul murajhaa jaate hain vo baharon ke aane se khilate nahin kuchh log jo safar men bichhad jaate hain vo hazaron ke aane se milate nahin umr bhar chahe koi pukaara kare unaka naam vo phir nahin aate vo phir nahin aate zindagii ke safar men threedots  aankh dhokha hai kya bharosa hai aankh dhokha hai kya bharosa hai suno doston shaq dosti ka dushman hai apane dil men ise ghar banane na do kal tadapana pade yaad men jinaki rok lo ruth kar unako jaane na do baad men pyar ke chahe bhejo hazaron salaam vo phir nahin aate vo phir nahin aate zindagii ke safar men threedots  subah aati hai shaam jaati hai  subah aati hai shaam jaati hai yunhi vaqt chalataa hi rahataa hai rukataa nahin ek pal men ye aage nikal jaataa hai aadami thik se dekh paataa nahin aur parade pe manzar badal jaataa hai ek baar chale jaate hain jo dinraat subahoshaam vo phir nahin aate vo phir nahin aate zindagii ke safar men threedots

Title: zindagii zindagii mere ghar aanaa aanaa zindagii
Lyrics: bhuu  zindagii zindagii mere ghar aanaa  aanaa zindagii zindagii mere ghar aanaa  aanaa zindagii a  zindagii o zindagii mere ghar aanaa  aanaa mere ghar aanaa abhuu zindagii zindagii mere ghar aanaa  aanaa zindagii  bhuu  mere ghar kaa siidhaa saa itanaa pataa hai ye ghar jo hai chaaron taraf se khulaa hai na dastak zaruurii naa aavaaz denaa mere ghar kaa daravaazaa koii nahiin hai hain diivaaren gum aur chhat bhii nahiin hai badii dhuup hai dost khadii dhuup hai dost tere aanchal kaa saayaa churaa ke jiinaa hai jiinaa  jiinaa zindagii zindagii a  o zindagii mere ghar aanaa abhuu aanaa zindagii  zindagii mere ghar aanaa  a  mere ghar kaa siidhaa saa itanaa pataa hai mere ghar ke aage muhabbat likhaa hai na dastak zaruurii na aavaaz denaa main saanson kii raftaar se jaan luungii havaaon kii khushabuu se pahachaan luungii teraa phuul huun dost terii bhuul huun dost tere haathon men cheharaa chhupaa ke jiinaa hai jiinaa  jiinaa zindagii zindagii bhuu  o zindagii mere ghar aanaa abhuu aanaa zindagii  zindagii mere ghar aanaa  bhuu magar ab jo aanaa to diire se aanaa zamaane kii shahazaadii soii huii hai ye pariyon ke sapanon men khoii huii hai bahut kuub hai ye teraa ruup hai ye tere aanchal men tere daaman men tere aankhon men terii palkon men tere kadamon isako bithaake jiinaa hai jiinaa hai jiinaa zindagii zindagii a  o zindagii mere ghar aanaa abhuu aanaa zindagii  zindagii mere ghar aanaa

Title: andhe kii laathii tuu hii hai
Lyrics: dil ke phaphole jal uthe siine ke daag se is ghar ko aag lag gai ghar ke chiraag se  andhe kii laathii tuu hii hai tuu hii jiivan ujiyaaraa hai 2 tuu hii aakar sambhaal prabhuu teraa hii ek sahaaraa hai 2 andhe kii laathii tuu hii hai tuu hii jiivan ujiyaaraa hai 2  duhkh dard kii gathadii sar par hai pagpag par girane kaa dar hai 2 parameshvar ab path raakh tuu hii 2 tuu hii path raakhanahaaraa hai 2 andhe kii laathii tuu hii hai tuu hii jiivan ujiyaaraa  jin par aashaa thii chhod gaye baaluu ke gharonde phod gaye  munh mod gaye man tod gaye 2 ab jag men kaun hamaaraa hai 3 andhe kii laathii tuu hii hai tuu hii jiivan ujiyaaraa

Title: har ek ranj men raahat hai aadamii ke liye
Lyrics: har ek ranj men raahat hai aadamii ke liye payaamemaut bhii mujadaa hai zindagii ke liye  chaman men phuul bhii har ek ko nahiin milate bahaar aatii hai lekin kisii kisii ke liye  hamaarii kaak ko daaman se jhaadane waale sab is maqaam se guzarenge zindagii ke liye  unhiin ke shiishaaedil chuur chuur ho ke rahen taras rahe the jo duniyaa men dostii ke liye  ye sochataa huun zamaane ko kyaa huaa yaa rab kisii ke dil men muhabbat nahiin kisii ke liye  hamaare baad andheraa rahegaa mahafil men bahut charaag jalaaoge roshanii ke liye

Title: o merii jaan o merii jaan ab nahiin rahanaa tere binaa
Lyrics: asha o merii jaan o merii jaan ab nahiin rahanaa tere binaa  haarii main tujhase munh pher ke aankhen khulii par zaraa der se koii meraa tujhasaa kahaan ab nahiin rahanaa tere binaa  tuu hai to thokar khaa lungii main kaanton men jiivan bitaa luungii main le chal mujhe chaahe jahaan ab nahiin rahanaa tere binaa  shailendra jis din se dekhaa yaaraa tujhe manzil manzil pukaaraa tujhe tere sivaa jaanaa kahaan ab nahiin rahanaa tere binaa

Title: o main royaa parades men bhiigaa maan kaa pyaar
Lyrics: o main royaa parades men bhiigaa maan kaa pyaar dukh ne dukh se baat kii bin chiththii bin taar chhotaa karake dekhiye jiivan kaa vistaar aankhon bhar aakaash hai baahon bhar sansaar  e leke tan ke naap ko ghuume bastii gaanv har chaadar ke gher se baahar nikale paanv sabakii puujaa ek sii alagvalag har riit masjid jaae maulvii koyal gaae giit  puujaa ghar men muurtii miira ke sang shyaam jisakii jitanii chaakarii utane usake daam  saaton din bhagavaan ke kyaa mangal kyaa piir jis din soe der tak bhuukaa rahe fakiir achchhii sangat baithakar sangii badale ruup jaise milakar aam se miithii ho gaii dhuup  sapanaa jharnaa niind kaa jaagii aankhen pyaas paanaa khonaa khojanaa saanson kaa itihaas chaahe giitaa vaachie yaa padhie quraan meraa teraa pyaar hii har pustak kaa gyaan

Title: aankh se aankh milaataa hai koii
Lyrics: aankh se aankh milaataa hai koii dil ko khiinche liye jaataa hai koii  hai ye hairat ki bharii mahafil men mujhako tanhaa nazar aataa hai koii  chaahiye kud pe yaqiineqaamil hausalaa kisakaa badhaataa hai koii  sab karishmaatetasavvur hai shaqiil vanraa aataa hai na jaataa hai koii

Title: vaaqif huun khuub ishq ke tarzebayaan se main
Lyrics: arazeshauq aankhon men hai arazevafaa aankhon men hai tere aage baat kahane kaa mazaa aankhon men hai  vaaqif huun khuub ishq ke tarzebayaan se main kah duungaa dil kii baat nazar kii zubaan se main 2  merii vafaa kaa shauq se tuu imtahaan le guzaruunga tere ishq men har imtahaan se main vaaqif huun khuub ishqthreedots  ai husneaashanaa tere jalavon kii khair ho begaana ho gayaa huun gamedo jahaan se main   ab jaanblab huun shiddatedardenihaan se main aise men tujh ko dhuundh kar laauun kahaan se main  zamiin hamdard hai merii na hamadam aasamaan meraa teraa dar chhuut gayaa to phir thikaanaa hai kahaan meraa qasam hai tujh ko tujh ko qasam hai jazbaaedil na jaaye raigaan meraa yahii hai imtahaan teraa yahii hai imtahaan meraa ek simt muhabbat hai ek simt zamaanaa ab aise men tujh ko dhuundh kar laauun kahaan se main  teraa kayaal terii tamannaa liye hue dil bujh rahaa hai aas kaa sholaa liye hue hairaan khadii huii hai doraahe pe zindagii naakaam hasaraton kaa janaazaa liye hue ab aise men tujh ko dhuundh kar laauun kahaan se main  aavaaz de rahaa hai dilekaanamaan karaab siine men iztaraab hai saanson men pechotaab ai ruuheishq ai jaanevafaa kuch to de javaab ab jaanblab huun shiddatedardenihaan se main aise men tujh ko dhuundh kar laauun kahaan se main

Title: ai zindagii gale lagaa le hamane bhii tere har ik gam ko
Lyrics: ai zindagii gale lagaa le  2 hamane bhii tere har ik gam ko gale se lagaayaa hai  hai naa ai zindagii threedots  hamane bahaane se chhupake zamaane se  palakon ke parade men ghar kar liyaa      2 teraa sahaaraa mil gayaa hai zindagii la threedots la threedots teraa sahaaraa mil gayaa hai zindagii ai zindagii threedots  chhotaa saa saayaa thaa  aankhon men aayaa thaa  hamane do buundo se man bhar liyaa         2 hamako kinaaraa mil gayaa hai zindagii la threedots la threedots hamako kinaaraa mil gayaa hai zindagii ai zindagii threedots

Title: karegaa zamaanaa kyaa sach ko chhupaanaa kyaa
Lyrics: ki ho karegaa zamaanaa kyaa sach ko chhupaanaa kyaa     duniyaa ko aao batalaa den aa karegaa zamaanaa kyaa sach ko chhupaanaa kyaa     duniyaa ko aao batalaa den ki tum ho mere ham hain tere     daarling hai na bolo hai nathreedots  ki meraa sab kuchh tere lie teraa sab kuchh mere lie     bolo bolothreedots aa meraa sab kuchh tere lie teraa sab kuchh mere lie     aakhir ko haithreedots ki haan aakhir ko hain biivii miiyaan     daarling hai na bolo hai nathreedots  ki aae hue badii duur se hain ham to yahaan maiijuun se hain aa aae hue badii duur se hain ham to yahaan maiijuun se hain     aur aaj hiithreedots ki aur aaj hii hai vaapasii     daarling hai na bolo hai nathreedots

Title: is rang badalatii duniyaa men inasaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin
Lyrics: is rang badalatii duniyaa men inasaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin nikalaa na karo tum sajdhajakar iimaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin isthreedots  ye dil hai badaa hii diivaanaa chhedaa na karo is paagal ko tum se na sharaarat kar baithe naadaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin isthreedots  kaandhe se hataa lo sar apanaa ye pyaar muhabbat rahane do kashtii ko sambhaalo maujon men tuufaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin isthreedots  main kaise khudaa haafiz kah duun mujhako to kisii kaa yakiin nahiin chhup jaao hamaarii aankhon men bhagavaan kii niiyat thiik nahiin isthreedots

Title: aanand mangal karuun
Lyrics: mukesh aanand mangal karuun aaratii jay gaayatrii maataa  koras aanand mangal karuun aaratii jay gaayatrii maataa  mukesh chaaron vedon kii jananii tuu mahaamantra kii daataa  koras chaaron vedon kii jananii tuu mahaamantra kii daataa  aanand mangala threedots  mukesh terii mahimaa hai niraalii tuu sabakii kare rakhawaalii  koras terii mahimaa hai niraalii tuu sabakii kare rakhawaalii  mukesh bhuule bhatake logon ko tuu sanmaarg dikhaane waalii gyaan kii devii tuu hai maataaaaa  koras gyaan kii devii tuu hai maataa  mukesh sabakii bhaagya vidhaataa  aanand mangal threedots  mukesh hai terii anupam maayaa jisakaa koii paar na paayaa  koras hai terii anupam maayaa jisakaa koii paar na paayaa  mukesh hai kotikoti suuryon kaa tujhamen adbhut tej samaayaa  tere tej kii ek kiran seaaa  koras tere tej kii ek kiran se  mukesh man ujjwal ho jaataa  aanand mangal threedots

Title: breathless  koii jo milaa to mujhe
Lyrics: koii jo milaa to mujhe aisa lagataa thaa jaise merii saarii duniyaa men giiton kii rut aur rangon kii barakhaa hai kushabuu kii aandhii hai mahakii huii sii ab saarii fizaaen hain bahakii huii sii ab saarii hawaaen hain khoii huii sii ab saarii dishaaen hain badalii huii sii ab saarii adaaen hain jaagii umangen hain dhadak rahaa hai dil saanson men tuufaan hai honthon pe nagamen hain aankhon men sapane hain sapanon men biite hue saare wo lamhe hain jab koii aayaa thaa dil men samaayaa thaa kaise main bataauun tumhe kaisaa use paayaa thaa pyaar se chehare pe bikharii jo zulfen to aisa lagataa thaa jaise kohare ke piichhe ik os men dhulaa huaa phuul khilaa hai jaise baadal men ek chaand chhupaa hai aur jhaank rahaa hai jaise raat ke parde men ek saveraa hai roshan roshan aankhon men sapanon kaa saagar jisamen prem sitaaron kii chaadar jaise jhalak rahii hai laharon laharon baat karen to jaise motii barase jaise kahiin chaandii kii paayal guunje jaise kahiin shiishe ke jaam giren aur chhan se tuuten jaise koii chhupake sitaar bajaae jaise koii chaandanii raat men gaae jaise koii haule se paas bulaae kaisii miithii baaten thiin wo kaisii mulaakaaten thiin wo jab mainne jaanaa thaa nazaron se kaise pighalate hain dil aur aarazuu paatii hai kaise manzil aur kaise utarataa hai chaand zamiin par kaise kabhii lagataa hai swarg agar hai to bas hai yahiin par usane bataayaa mujhe aur samajhaayaa mujhe ham jo mile hain hamen aise hii milanaa thaa gul jo khile hain unhen aise hii khilanaa thaa janmon ke bandhan janmon ke rishte hain jab bhii ham janme to ham yahiin milate hain kaanon men jaise mere shahad se ghulane lage kwaabon ke dar jaise aankhon men khulane lage kwaabon kii duniyaa bhii kitanii hasiin aur kaisii rangiin thii kwaabon kii duniyaa jo kahane ko thii par kahiin bhii nahiin thii kwaab jo tuute mere aankhen jo khuliin merii hosh jo aayaa mujhe mainne dekhaa mainne jaanaa wo jo kabhii aayaa thaa nazaron pe chhaayaa thaa dil men samaayaa thaa jaa bhii chukaa hai aur dil meraa ab hai tanhaa tanhaa na to koii aramaan hai na koii tamannaa hai aur na koii sapanaa hai ab jo mere din aur ab jo merii raaten hain unamen sirf aansuu hain unamen sirf dard kii ranj kii baaten hain aur fariyaaden hain meraa ab koii nahiin main huun aur khoe hue pyaar kii yaaden hain 3

Title: jaa jaa jaa mere bachapan kahiin jaa ke chhup naadaan
Lyrics: jaa jaa jaa mere bachapan kahiin jaa ke chhup naadaan  2  ye safar hai ab mushkil aane ko hai tuufaan  jaa jaa jaa mere bachapanthreedots  zindagii ko naye rang milane lage ek kiran chhuu gayi phuul khilane lage   2 jaa jaa jaa mere bachapanthreedots  ek kasak har ghadii dil men rahane lagi  jo ke tadapaa gayi phir bhi achchhii lagi    2 jaa jaa jaa mere bachapanthreedots

Title: chalii pii ko milan ban than ke dulhan
Lyrics: chalii pii ko milan ban than ke dulhan jhan jhananan paayal gaavat hai ab kaahe ko der karo rii sakhii moraa maike men jiyaa ghabaraavat hai  main to baabul se mukh mod chalii viiran sang naataa tod chalii us chhor kabhii jaa ke rii sakhii koii laut ke phir nahiin aavat hai  kab diip jale bin baatii ke kab raah kate bin saathii ke ji saagar se bichhade nadiyaa us saagar men mil jaavat hai

Title: giidhraaj kii kathaa
Lyrics: de hisaar raa kaa  sumiran kaike au ganapati ke charan manaay giidh jataayu kii karanii kii miithi baaten deu sunaay  raam lakhan bin suunii kutiyaa dhari ke kapat jati kaa bhes mahaaraanii siitaa kaa hari ke raavan lihe jaat hai bides  aarat baani mahaaraanii ke pari gaye geedhraaj ke kaan krodhwant hoike khag dhaawaa jaise chale dhanus se baan  rath par dekhis jab raavan kaa tab khag dihis garu lalakaar are thaadh raho dusht kahuun kaa mere jiivat na paihe paar  niare jaaye bahut samjhaayasi raavan dihis na taniko dhyaan tab duut padaa raavan par jaise giri par vajr mahaan  sir ke kesh pakari ke khinchis rath ke niiche dihis giraay lochan ghaav anekan kiinhisi muurchhaa rahii ghadii bhar chhaay  bahut bachaav kihis dasakandhar jab naa yaa tau chalaa upaay tab talawaar myaan se kaadhi ke au panchhii pe dihis chalaay  pankh pakheru ke kaate se jab dhar se giraa giidh laachaar raam raam kai der  lagaaii mujhikaa daras deuu karataar  diinaanaath sadaa bhagatan ke raakhai ek raam bhagawaan puuran bhaye abhilaas giidh ke aaye chalike krripaanidhaan  suni sab haal giidh ke dehi pherin haath apan raghubiir bhaagi piir mitii bhav bhiiraa paavat panchhii dibya shariir  jetanadhaarii par upakaarii te hain dhanya jagat ke biir jinape haath raam ji phere jag maa kabahu na dekhain niir

Title: vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je piid paraayii jaane re
Lyrics: vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je piid paraayii jaane re pardukhkhe upakaar kare toye man abhimaan naa aane re vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je threedots  sakal lok maan sahune vande niindaa na kare kenii re vaach kaachh man nishchal raakhe dhandhan jananii tenii re vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je threedots  samdrishhtii ne trishhnaa tyaagii parstrii jene maat re jihvaa thakii asatya naa bole pardhan nav jhaalii haath re vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je threedots  mohmaayaa vyaape nahii jene dridh vairaagya jenaa man maan re raam naam sun taalii laagii sakal tirath tenaa tan maan re vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je threedots  vanlobhii ne kapatrahit chhe kaamkrodh nivaaryaa re bhane narasaiyyo tenun darshan kartaa kul ekoter taarayaa re vaishnav jan to tene kahiye je threedots

Title: talkiiemay men zaraa talkiiedil bhii gholen
Lyrics: talkiiemay men zaraa talkiiemay men zaraa talkiiedil bhii gholen aur kuchh der yahaan baith len pii len ro len talkiiemay men zaraa  har taraf ek puraasaraar sii kaamoshii hai2 apane saaye se koii baat karen kuchh bolen talkiiemay men zaraa  koii to shaks ho jii jaan se chaahen jisako koii to jaanetasavvur ho ke jisake ho len talkiiemay men zaraa  aah ye dil kii kasak haaye ye aankhon kii jalan2 niind aa jaaye agar aaj to ham bhii so len talkiiemay men zaraa threedots

Title: duniyaa banii to hamdosunaa ban gaii gazal
Lyrics: duniyaa banii to hamdosunaa ban gaii gazal utaraa jo nuur nuurekudaa ban gaii gazal  guunjaa jo naad brahm banii raqsemaharomaan zarre jo thartharraae sadaa ban gaii gazal  chamakii kahiin jo barq to aihasaas ban gaii chhaaii kahiin ghataa to adaa ban gaii gazal  aandhii chalii to kahar ke saanche men dhal gaii baadesabaa chalii to nashaa ban gaii gazal  haivaan banaa to bhuukh banii bebasii banii inasaan bane to jazbevafaa ban gaii gazal  uthaa jo dardeishq to ashqon men dhal gaii bechainiyaan badhiin to duaa ban gaii gazal  zaahid ne pii to jaamepannaa ban ke rah gaii rindon ne pii to jaamebaaqaa ban gaii gazal  arzedakkan men jaan to dehlii men dil banii aur shahar lakanauu men hinnaa ban gaii gazal  dohe rubaaii nazmen sab tarz the magar asanaafeshaayarii kaa kudaa ban gaii gazal

Title: ab ke tajadiidewafaa kaa nahiin imkaan jaanaan
Lyrics: ab ke tajadiidewafaa kaa nahiin imkaan jaanaan yaad kyaa tujhako dilaayen teraa paimaan jaanaan  zindagii terii ataa thii so tere naam kii hai hamane jaise bhii basar kii teraa ahasaan jaanaan  ab walawwal kii mohabbat ke nashe yaad to kar be piye bhii teraa cheharaa thaa gulistaan jaanaan  muddaton se yahii aalam na tawaqqo na ummiid dil pukaare hii chalaa jaataa hai jaanaan jaanaan  ham ke ruuthii huii rut ko bhii manaa lete the hamane dekhaa hii na thaa mausamehijraan jaanaan  yuunhii mausam kii adaa dekh ke yaad aayaa hai kis kadar jald badal jaate hain insaan jaanaan

Title: vo jo ham men tum men qaraar thaa
Lyrics: vo jo ham men tum men qaraar thaa tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho vahii vaadaa yaani nibaah kaa tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho  vo naye gile voh shiqaayaten vo maze maze kii hiqaayaten vo har ek baat pe ruuthana tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho  kabhii hum men tum men bhii chaah thii kabhii hum men tum men bhi raah thii kabhii hum bhii tum bhii the aashanaa tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho  vo jo lutf mujh se the peshatar vo qaram kii thaa mere haal par mujhe sab hai yaad zarraazarraa tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho  koii baat aisii agar huii jo tumhaarii jii ko burii lagii to bayaan se pahale hii bolanaa  tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho  jise aap ginate the aashanaa jise aap kahate the baafaa main vahii huun mominemubtalaa tumhen yaad ho ke na yaad ho

Title: lab pe tere iqaraaremohabbat sher gazal kaa lagataa hai
Lyrics: lab pe tere iqaraaremohabbat  sher gazal ka lagataa hai sharm se cheharaa laal gulaabii  phuul kamal ka lagataa hai lab pe tere threedots  dil ko najar se takaraaye bhii  ek zamaanaa bit gayaa  chot magar hai itani tazaa  haadasaa kal ka lagataa hai lab pe tere threedots  bekhud hokar mast havaaen  aise kab laharaatii thii  ye jaadu to halke halke  us aanchal ka lagataa hai  lab pe tere threedots  ham samajhe the bhuul gaye hain  vo chaahat ka afasaanaa aaj magar phir dard saa  dil men halkaa halkaa lagataa hai  lab pe tere iqaraaremohabbat  sher gazal ka lagataa hai sharm se cheharaa laal gulaabii  phuul kamal ka lagataa hai lab pe tere threedots

Title: meraa dil tere liye dhadakataa hai
Lyrics: meraa dil tere liye dhadakataa hai dhadakataa hai dekhuun jo tujhe to ye dil bahakataa hai bahakataa hai  zaraa paas aa tere lab chuum luun main kyaa chaahatii huun main kaise kahuun sameto na baahon men ye goraa badan bujhegii bhalaa kaise dil kii agan koii sholaa siine men bhadakataa hai bhadakataa hai meraa dil tere liye   threedots  nayaa dard hai ye to nayii pyaas hai javaanii kaa pahalaa ehasaas hai muhabbat kaa dil pe nashaa chhaa gayaa kuchh bhii ho jaanam mazaa aa gayaa ke ab dil sambhaale na sambhalataa hai sambhalataa hai meraa dil tere liye   threedots

Title: kab koii tujhasaa aaiinaa aur yaan hai duusaraa
Lyrics: kab koii tujhasaa aaiinaa aur yaan hai duusaraa hai to teraa hii aks numaayaa hai duusaraa  ruk isakaa dekhiyo shabemahataab men koii goyaa zamiin pe maahetaabaan hai duusaraa  tere kharaamenaaz ke sadake ki kab koii aisaa chaman men sarvekharaamaa hai duusaraa  shaql unakii ye hai jo ki hai mahavejamaaleyaar shashadar khadaa hai ek to hairaan hai duusaraa

Title: shaam dhale khidakii tale tum siitii bajaanaa chhod do
Lyrics: la shaam dhale khidakii tale     tum siitii bajaanaa chhod do  chi ghadiighadii khidakii men khadii     tum tiir chalaanaa chhod do  la rozroz tum merii galii men     chakkar kyon ho kaatate     ajii chakkar kyon ho kaatate chi sachchiisachchii baat kahuun main 2     ajii tumhaare vaaste tumhaare vaaste la jaao jaao hosh men aao     yuun aanaajaanaa chhod do 2  la mujhase tumhen kyaa matalab hai     ye baat zaraa batalaao 2 chi baat fakat itanii sii hai     ki tum merii ho jaao     aao aao tum merii ho jaao la aisii baaten apane dil men     ai saahib tum laanaa chhod do 2  chi chaar mahiine mehanat kii hai     ajii rang kabhii to laaegii 2 la jaaojaao jii yahaan tumhaarii     daal kabhii galane na paaegii     ajii daal kabhii galane na paaegii chi dilavaalon matavaalon par tum      raub jamaanaa chhod do      ajii raub jamaanaa chhod do  shaam dhale threedots

Lyrics: merii tamannaaon kii taqadiir tum sanvaar do pyaasii hai zindagii aur mujhe pyaar do  saaraa gagan mandap hai saaraa jag baraatii man ke phere sachche sachche hain ham saathii laaj kaa ye ghuunghat pat aaj to utaar do pyaasii hai zindagii   threedots  dharatii karavat badale badale har mausam priit ke pujaarii hain badalenge nahiin ham patajhad saa jiivan hai pyaar kii bahaar do pyaasii hai zindagii   threedots

Lyrics: sar jo teraa chakaraaye yaa dil duubaa jaaye aajaa pyaare paas hamaare kaahe ghabaraay kaahe ghabaraay  tel meraa hai muskii ganj rahe na khuskii  jis ke sar par haath phiraa duun chamake kismat usakii   2 sun sun sun are betaa sun is champii men bade bade gun laakh dukhon kii ek davaa hai kyun naa aazamaaye kahe ghabaraaye kahe ghabaraaye sar jo teraa threedots  pyaar kaa hove jhagadaa yaa bizines kaa ho ragadaa sab lafadon kaa bojh hate jab pade haath ik tagadaa   2 sun sun sun are baabu sun is champii men bade bade gun laakh dukhon kii ek davaa hai kyun naa aazamaaye kahe ghabaraaye kahe ghabaraaye sar jo teraa threedots  naukar ho yaa maalik liidar ho yaa pabalik apane aage sabhii jhuken hain kyaa raajaa kyaa sainik   2 sun sun sun are betaa sun is champii men bade bade gun laakh dukhon kii ek davaa hai kyun naa aazamaaye kahe ghabaraaye kahe ghabaraaye sar jo teraa threedots

Lyrics: paigaam de rahi hai ye shaam dhalate dhalate  banati hai zindagii main har baat banate banate 2   hamasafar ke binaa to mazaa aaye na  zindagii main akelaa rahaa jaye naa  koi hamen mil gayaa aise hii chalate chalate  banati hai zindagii men har baat banate banate   saje dil chadhe muskuraakar koii  dekhale hamako nazaren uthaakar koii  ham khaak ho na jaaen yuun aah bharate bharate  banati hai zindagii men har baat banate banate

Title: jahaan bhii dekhaa unhen sar jhukaa diyaa main ne mukesh gazal
Lyrics: jahaan bhii dekhaa unhe sar jhukaa diyaa main ne ye kyaa kiyaa ki khud hii ko mitaa diyaa main ne  chaman se duur bhii rahakar are chaman vaalon kalii ko phul ko hansanaa sikhaa diyaa main ne  tadap ke laakh gire bijaliyaan to kyaa gam hai khud apane haathon nasheman jalaa diyaa main ne  giraa bhii rahane do isharat safiinaa tufaan men har ek mauj ko saahil banaa diyaa main ne

Title: saarii duniyaa kaa bojh ham uthaate hai
Lyrics: saarii duniyaa kaa bojh ham uthaate hain uthate hain bojh uthate hain saarii duniyaa threedots log aate hain log jaate hain ham yahaan pe khade rah jaate hain saarii threedots  chaar kaa kaam ek kaa daam hai kuun mat piijiye aur kuchh diijiye ek rupayaa hai kam hamen kudaa kii qasam badii mehanat se rotii kamaate hain saarii threedots  thodaa paanii piyaa yaad rab ko kiyaa bhuukh bhii mit gaii pyaas bhii bujh gaii kaam har haal men naam ko saal men iid kii ek chhuttii manaate hain saarii threedots  jiinaa mushkil to hai apanaa bhii dil to hai dil men aramaan hain ham bhii insaan hain jab sataate hai gap aish karte hain ham biidii piite hain aur paan khaate hain saarii duniyaa kaa bojh ham uthaate hain

Title: ardh satya
Lyrics: chakravyuuh men ghusane se pahale main kaun thaa aur kaisaa thaa ye mujhe yaad hii na rahegaa chakravyuuh men ghusane ke baad mere aur chakravyuuh ke biich sirf ek jaanlevaa nikatataa thii isakaa mujhe pataa hii na chalegaa  chakravyuuh se baahar nikalane par main mukt ho jaauun bhale hii phir bhii chakravyuuh kii rachanaa men farq hii na padegaa  maruun yaa maaruun maaraa jaauun yaa jaan se maar duun is kaa faisalaa kabhii na ho paayegaa  soyaa huaa aadamii jab niind se uth kar chalanaa shuruu karataa hai tab sapanon kaa sansaar use dubaaraa dikh hii na paayaegaa  us roshanii men jo nirnay kii roshanii hai sab kuchh samaan hogaa kyaa  ek palade men napunsakataa ek palade men paurushh aur thiik taraazuu ke kaante par ardhsatya   kriti ke pahale aayaa huaa vichaar aur vichaar ke baad vaalii krti in ke darmiyaan aahuti jo main ne dii  jin jin kshhanon men main bhuul gayaa thaa deh bhaan jin jin kshhanon men ulajh gayaa thaa kriti men unhiin kshhanon men mujhe dikhaaii dii tumhaarii sampuurn aakriti  ho chukii hai ab merii kriti purii aur tumhaarii aakriti bujh gaii

Lyrics: jale naa kyon  2 jale naa kyon paravaanaa 2  2 shamaa dikhaakar husn ke jalave  2 banaa ke jab diivaanaa jale naa kyon paravaanaa  dil kii lagii kaa naam hai ulfat  dil kii lagii kaa naam ulfat hai  2 aur ulfat kaa hai ye matalab  2 chupake chupake dhiire dhiire hans hans ke jal jaanaa  2 jale naa kyon paravaanaa  jale naa kyon threedots  jalanaa hai to phir jal jaaye ho jalanaa hai to phir jal jaaye  husn ke saanche men dhal jaaye  2 ishq men donon ek hai ab to jiinaa yaa mar jaanaa  2 jale na kyon paravaanaa shamaa threedots diivaanaa jale na kyon paravaanaa

Lyrics: saanson men dard dard men saansen basii huii   2 ham men koii kisii men samaae hue hain ham hokar bhii apane aap ko paae hue hain ham ham men koii kisii men samaae hue hain ham saanson men dard dard men saansen basii huii  lete hain ab saans bhii ilzaam ki tarahaa  2 ghar aise bastiyon men basaae hue hain ham ham men koii  threedots  basii huii  chhodaa hai ham ko laake mohabbat ne ye kahaan 2 apane lie bhii jaise paraae hue hain ham ham men koii  threedots  basii huii  aayaa hai pesh ham se zamaanaa kuchh is tarahaa  2 apane gale se khud ko lagaae hue hain ham ham men koii  threedots  basii huii

Lyrics: raamaa raamaa darshan denaa raamaa 2 taras rahe hain ham darshan denaa raamaa   taashar  the tumare charankanval ke jaanakiinaathaa dayaa karo  2 raamaa maano hamaaraa bhad jan  darshan denaa raamaa  saare jag ke paalanahaare  saare jag ke paalanahaare maataapitaaannadaataa tum ho  2 ham hain tumhaare hamako bachaao 2 naiyaa hamaarii paar lagaao 2 duur karo sankat ko hamaare bhadr giriishaa siitaa raamaa  ko 	raamraam siitaaraam jaanakiinandan siitaaraam 	jayjay raam siitaaraam

Title: zaahid na kah burii ke ye mastaane aadamii hain
Lyrics: zaahid na kah burii ke ye mastaane aadamii hain tujhako lipat padenge diiwaane aadamii hain  gairon kii dostii par kyuun aitabaar kiije ye dushmanii karenge begaane aadamii hain  tumane hamaare dil men ghar kar liyaa to kyaa hai aabaad karate aakir viiraane aadamii hain  kyaa chor hai jo hamako darabaan tumhaaraa toke kah do ke ye to jaanepahachaane aadamii hain

Title: ai dil mujhe bataa de tuu kisa pe aa gayaa hai
Lyrics: ai dila mujhe bataa de tuu kisa pe aa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khvaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai 	 mastii bharaa taraanaa kyon raata gaa rahii hai aankhon men niinda aakara kyon duura jaa rahii hai dila men koi sitamagara aramaan jagaa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khavaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai ai dila mujhe bataa de tuu kisa pe aa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khvaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai  betaaba ho rahaa hai ye dila machala machala ke shayada ye raata biite karavata badala badala ke lala laa lala laathreedots betaaba ho rahaa hai ye dila machala machala ke shaayada ye raata biite karavata badala badala ke ai dila zaraa sambhala jaa shaayada vo aa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khvaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai ai dila mujhe bataa de threedots  bhiigii huii havaen mausama bhii hai gulaabii kyaa chaanda kyaa sitaare hara chiiz hai sharaabii dhiire se ek nagamaa koii sunaa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khvaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai  ai dila mujhe bataa de tuu kisa pe aa gayaa hai vo kauna hai jo aakara khvaabon pe chhaa gayaa hai

Title: hogaa tumase pyaaraa kaun hamako to tumase hai hai kanchan
Lyrics: are hogaa tumase pyaaraa kaun  hamako to tumase hai hai kanchan  hai kanchan pyaar 2   uunche gharavaalii ho ya galiyon kii raanii  koii bhii ho tum rahatii ho kahiin  2  tumase badhake yaaraa kaun hamako to tumase hai he kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  hai kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  ho pyaar   ho dekho in aankhon men ye surat hai kisakii  ho dekho ik nazar to kam se kam  2  aakhir hai hamaaraa kaun hamako to tumase hai hai hai kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  hai kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  ho pyaar   kahate ho ki jaao lekin batalaao  ho jaaen bhii to jaaen ham kahaan  2  aisaa dil kaa maaraa kaun hamako to tumase hai hai kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  hai kaanchhii  ko hai kaanchhii  ho pyaar   are hogaa tumase threedots

Title: chhod kar tere pyaar kaa daaman
Lyrics: chhod kar tere pyaar kaa daaman ye bataa de ki ham kidhar jaayen ham ko dar hai ki terii baahon men ham khushii se na aaj mar jaayen  mil gaye aaj qaafile dil ke ham khade hain kariib manzil ke muskuraa kar jo tum ne dekh liye mit gaye hans ke sab gile dil ke kitanii pyaarii hain ye hasiin ghadiyaan in se kah do yahiin thahar jaayen ham ko dar hai threedots  tere kadamon pe zindagii rakh duun apanii aankhon kii roshanii rakh duun tuu agar khush ho main tere dil men apane dil kii har ik khushii rakh duun mere hamadam merii khushii ye hai tuu nazar aaye ham jidhar jaayen chhod kar tere threedots

Title: dhadakane lage dil ke taaron kii duniyaa jo tum muskuraa do
Lyrics: a dhadakane lage dil ke taaron kii duniyaa m jo tum muskuraa do a jo tum muskuraa do m sanvar jaae ham bekaraaron kii duniyaa    jo tum muskuraa do a jo tum muskuraa do  m jo tum muskuraa do bahaaren hansen    sitaaron kii ujalii kataaren hansen a jo tum muskuraa do nazaare hansen    javaan dhadakanon ke ishaare hansen	 2    dhadakane lagethreedots  m havaa men ke kushabuu kii angadaaiyaan    ye aankhon pe zulfon kii parachhaaiyaan a ye mastii ke dhaare ubalate hue    ye siinon men tuufaan machalate hue	 2    dhadakane lage threedots  m ye bojhal ghataaen barasatii huii    ye bechain ruuhen tarasatii huii a ye saanson se shole nikalate hue    badan aanch khaakar pighalate hue		 2    dhadakane lagethreedots

Title: aa jaa rii aa nindiyaa tuu aa jhilamil sitaaron se utar aankhon
Lyrics: aa jaa re aa nindiyaa tuu aa jhilamil sitaaron se utar aankhon men aa sapane sajaa  1 soi kali soyaa chaman pipal tale soi havaa sab rangaa ik rang men tuune ye kyaa jaaduu kiyaa aa jaa threedots  2 sansaar kii raani hai tuu raa jaa hai meraa laadalaa duniyaa hai merii god men soyaa huaa sapanaa meraa  aa jaa threedots

Title: kyaa karate the saajanaa tum hamase duur rahake
Lyrics: kyaa karate the saajanaa tum hamase duur rahake ham to judaaii men akele chhupchhup ke royaa karate the  kyaa batalaaen jaanejaan ham tumase duur rahake aqsar duaaon men kudaa se tumako hii maangaa karate the  jo puuchhatii thii sakhiyaan bechaarii ye rog kaisaa tujhako hai pyaarii chup chup unakaa munh dekhatii thii karatii bhii kyaa main birahaa kii maarii  vo din bhi kyaa din the sanam majabuur tum laachaar ham bas aahen bharaa karate the tumako hii maangaa karate the   threedots  maanaa judaaii kaa mausam buraa thaa usakaa bhii lekin apanaa mazaa thaa thodaa tadapanaa thodaa sisakanaa sach puuchhiye to achchhaa lagaa thaa  kyaa chiiz hai ye pyaar bhii sukh men hasiin duhkh men hasiin na puuchho ki kyaa karate the tumako hii maangaa karate the   threedots

Title: dekho dekho dekho mujhe pyaar ho gayaa
Lyrics: zubaan khaamosh hotii hai nazar se kaam hotaa hai	2 isii pal kaa zamaane men mohabbat naam hotaa hai dekho dekho dekho mujhe pyaar ho gayaa jaane kab kaise ikaraar ho gayaa  ye vo ahasaas hai jisako na lafzon kii zaruurat hai jise paakar lage saaraa zamaanaa khuubasuurat hai zamaanaa khuubasuurat hai mohabbat naam hai jisakaa adaaon men dikhaaii de terii dhadakan kii har sargam men ye mujhako sunaaii de ye mujhako sunaaii de mere honthon pe jab tere labon kaa jaam hotaa hai isii pal kaa zamaane men mohabbat naam hotaa hai dekho dekho dekho threedots  badal jaate hain sab aasaar jab ye pyaar hotaa hai binaa bole hii chaahat kaa hasiin izhaar hotaa hai hasiin izhaar hotaa hai khayaalon kii hasiin vaadii men jab tum gunagunaatii ho merii saanson kii dariyaa men kaii tuufaan laatii ho kaii tuufaan laatii ho bahut bechainiyon men bhii badaa aaraam hotaa hai isii pal kaa zamaane men mohabbat naam hotaa hai dekho dekho dekho threedots

Title: kis tarah bhuulegaa dil
Lyrics: kis tarah bhuulegaa dil unakaa kayaal aayaa huaa jaa nahiin sakataa abhii shiishe men daag aayaa huaa  o ghataa kaalii ghataa ab ke baras tuu naa baras2 mere priitam ko abhii parades hai bhaayaa huaa2 kis tarah bhuulegaa dil  aa chaman se aa chaman se duur bulbul jaake roye roye saath saath teraa dil bhii chot hai merii tarah khaayaa  huaa 2 kis tarah bhoolegaa dil  kush rahe duniyaa men vo jisane hai todaa dil meraa2 de rahaa hai ye duaa  aankhon men ashk aayaa huaa2 kis tarah bhoolegaa dil unakaa kayaal aayaa huaa

Title: zaraa nazaron se kah do jii nishaanaa chuuk na jaaye
Lyrics: zaraa nazaron se kah do jii nishaanaa chuuk na jaae zaraa nazaron se kah do jii mazaa jab hai tumhaarii har adaa qaatil hii kahalaae zaraa nazaron sethreedots  qaatil tumhe pukaaruun ke jaanevafaa kahuun hairat men pad gayaa huun ke main tum ko kyaa kahuun  zamaanaa hai tumhaaraa zamaanaa hai tumhaaraa chaahe jisakii zindagii le lo agar meraa kahaa maano to aise khel na khelo tumhaarii is sharaarat se na jaane kis kii maut aae zaraa nazaron sethreedots  haay kitanii maasuum lag rahii ho tum tumako zaalim kahe vo jhuuthaa hai  ye bholaapan tumhaaraa ye bholaapan tumhaaraa ye sharaarat aur ye shokhii zaruurat kyaa tumhen talavaar kii tiiron kii khanjar kii   2 nazar bhar ke jise tum dekh lo vo khud hii mar jaae zaraa nazaron sethreedots  ham pe kyon is qadar bigadatii ho chhedane vaale tumako aur bhii hain  bahaaron par karo gussaa ulajhatii hain jo aankhon se havaaon par karo gussaa jo takaraatii hain zulfon se kahiin aisaa na ho koii tumhaaraa dil bhii le jaae zaraa nazaron sethreedots

Title: praan chaahen nain na chaahe are tuu kyuun yuun sharamaaye
Lyrics: praan chaahen nain na chaahe are tuu kyuun yuun sharamaaye  2 bhuu yaa yaa  shiish lajaaaye phir kisaliye saaj sajaaye praan chaahen nain na chaahe are tuu kyuun yuun sharamaaye   mukh se nahiin bol nikalate man men aramaan machalate  2 honthon par ruuthii hansii siine men sote ubalate  dikhatii phuulon kii maalaa terii sej sajii kaanton se kahiin duur khadaa teraa premii terii yaad men aansuu bahaaye   praan chaahen nain na chaahe are tuu kyuun yuun sharamaaye  2

Title: bahut shukriyaa badii meharabaanii
Lyrics: ra bahut shukriyaa badii meharabaanii merii zindagii men huzuur aap aae kadam chuum luun yaa ye aankhen bichhaa duun karuun kyaa ye merii samajh men na aae bahut shukriyaathreedots  karuun pesh tumako nazaraanaa dil kaa nazaraanaa dil kaa  ke ban jaae koii afasaanaa dil kaa khudaa jaane aisii suhaanii ghadii phir  2 merii zindagii men palat ke na aae bahut shukriyaathreedots  khushii to bahut hai magar ye bhii gam hai ke ye saath apanaa kadam do kadam hai magar ye musaafir duaa maangataa hai  2 khudaa aapase kisii din milaae bahut shukriyaathreedots  aa mujhe dar hai mujhamen guruur aa na jaae laguun jhuumane main suruur aa na jaae kahiin dil ye meraa ye taariif sunakar  2 tumhaaraa bane aur mujhe bhuul jaae bahut shukriyaathreedots

Title: koii ye kah de gulashangulashan
Lyrics: koii ye kah de gulashangulashan laakh balaayen ek nasheman  phuul khile hain gulashangulashan lekin apanaaapanaa daaman  aaj na jaane raaz ye kyaa hai hijr kii raat aur itanii raushan  rahamat hogii taalibeisiyaan rashk karegii paakiiedaaman  kaanton kaa bhii haq hai kuchh aakir kaun chhudaaye apanaa daaman

Lyrics: baqadreshauq iqaraarevafaa kyaa hamaare shauq kii hai intahaa kyaa   dileaafatazadaa kaa muddaa kyaa shikastaa saaz kyaa usakii sadaa kyaa   muhabbat kaa yahii jab shagun thaharaa to phir aahen rafaa kyaa na rafaa kyaa   dua dil se jo nikale kaaragar ho yahaan dil hii nahiin dil se huaa kyaa   salaamat daamaneummiidesiimaab muhabbat men kisii kaa aasaraa kyaa

Title: laharaa ke jhuumjhuum ke laa muskuraa ke laa
Film: the one and only malika pukraj nonfilm
Lyrics: laharaa ke jhuumjhuum ke laa muskuraa ke laa phuulon ke ras men chaand kii kirane milaa ke laa  mahasuus ho rahaa hai sitaare ajiil hain sitaare ajiil hain unako bhii ek ghuunt kahiin se pilaa ke laa  kahate hain umreraftaa kabhii lautatii nahiin 2 jaa mayakade se merii jawaanii uthaa ke laa jaa mayakade se

Title: ye hansataa huaa kaaravaan zindagii kaa na puuchho chalaa hai kidhar
Lyrics: he ye hansataa huaa kaaravaan zindagii kaa na puuchho chalaa hai kidhar     tamannaa hai ye saath chalate rahen ham na biite kabhii ye safar     ye hansataa huaa kaaravaan zindagii kaa na puuchho chalaa hai kidhar aa haan he tamannaa hai ye saath chalate rahen ham na biite kabhii ye safar aa vaah vaah he hmmm hmm hmm hmmhmmmhmm  he zamiin se sitaaron kii duniyaa men jaayen aa haan haan he vahaan bhii yahii giit ulfat ke gaayen aa achchhaa he zamiin se sitaaron kii duniyaa men jaayen     vahaan bhii yahii giit ulfat ke gaayen     muhabbat kii duniyaa ho gam se begaanaa     rahe na kisii kaa bhii dar aa ajii dar kaisaa he ye hansataa huaa kaaravaan zindagii kaa na puuchho chalaa hai kidhar     tamannaa hai ye saath chalate rahen ham na biite kabhii ye safar aa chaliye  hemant hmmhmmhmmhmm hmmm asha aha ha haaa  he bahaaron ke din ho javaan ho nazaare aa aha ha ha  he hasiin chaandanii ho nadii ke kinare aa kyaa baat hai he bahaaron ke din ho javaan ho nazaare     hasiin chaandanii ho nadii ke kinare     na aaye jahaan bhuul kar badnasiibii     banaaye vahiin apanaa ghar aa na  na  na he ye hansataa huaa kaaravaan zindagii kaa na puuchho chalaa hai kidhar     tamannaa hai ye saath chalate rahen ham na biite kabhii ye safar

Title: mere chaaron taraf  main tanahaa thaa
Lyrics: mere chaaron taraf zamazamen qahaqahe sarakushii hai mere chaaron taraf zindagaii zindagaii zindagaii hai par ai dil bataa ke main kab talak isase munh mod kar apane maazii kii yaadon se lipataa rahuungaa main tanahaa thaa tanahaa huun tanahaa rahuungaa kab talak  yuun lagataa hai jaise merii soch ke saaye naach rahe hain aaj pahan kar jism paraaye tuu bhii jhuum le jhuum le jhuum le tuu bhii jhuum le har saayaa ye kahataa hai are pagale kaun alag kushiyon se rahataa hai par ai dil bataa ai dil bataa ke main kab talak har kushii se alag apanii tanahaaiiyon men bhatakataa rahuungaa main tanahaa thaa tanahaa huun tanahaa rahuungaa kab talak 2  aaj ye kaise sundar sapane dekh rahaa huun gairon kii mahafil men apane dekh rahaa huun narm reshamii baazuu baazuu baazuu narm reshamii baazuu mujhe bulaate hain haay aane waale kal ke kaab dikhaate hain par ai dil bataa ai dil bataa ke main kab talak apanii ujade huye kal ke maatam men aansuu bahaataa rahuungaa main tanahaa thaa tanahaa huun tanahaa rahuungaa kab talak 3

Title: chuudii bajii hai
Lyrics: u chuudii chorii chorii kuch kahe   kanganaa kyon hansaa kyaa pataa kyaa huaa     chuudii bajii hai kahiin duur chhan chhan chhan chhan     kanganaa bajaa hai kahiin duur khan khan khan khan     ye teraa kajaraa ye teraa gajaraa    lutaa duun aaj isape tan man dhan    ho ho chuudii bajii hai   threedots     gin gin taare raat guzaaruun    din din bhar main tujhe pukaaruun a saanvare  e e e e e e u gin gin taare raat guzaaruun    din din bhar main tujhe pukaaruun    guunjatii hai pavan jaise san san san san san     ho ho chuudii bajii hai   threedots  a khilate khilate gul khilate hain    milate milate dil milate hain u goriyaa e e e e e e  a khilate khilate gul khilate hain    milate milate dil milate hain    dil mile to baje saaz jhan jhan jhan jhan jhan     haa chuudii bajii hai   threedots

Title: yaad aa rahii hai terii yaad aa rahii hai
Lyrics: yaad aa rahii hai terii yaad aa rahii hai yaad aane se tere jaane se jaan jaa rahii hai  pahale ye na jaanaa tere baad ye jaanaa pyaar men jiinaa mushkil kar degaa ye dil divaanaa pyaar men jaane kaise saans ye aise aa jaa rahii hai yaad aa rahii hai  threedots  ye rut kii rangaraliyaan ye phuulon kii galiyaan ro padiin meraa haal sunaa to mere saath ye kaliyaan ro padiin ek nahiin tuu duniyaa aansu barasaa rahii hai yaad aa rahii hai  threedots  banate banate dulhan priit hamaarii ulajhan ban gai mere dil kii dhadakan merii jaan kii dushman ban gai kuchh kah kahake mujhe rah rahake tadapaa rahii hai yaad aa rahii hai  threedots
