Title: madhushaalaa
Lyrics: harivansh raaya bachchan      madiraalaya jaane ko ghar se chalataa hai piine vaalaa 2 kis path se jaauun asamanjas men hai vo bholaa bhaalaa   alag alag path batalaate sab alag alag path batalaate sab par main ye batalaataa huun raah pakad tuu ek chalaa chal paa jaayegaa madhushaalaa paa jaayegaa madhushaalaa     mannaa de    sun kal kal chhal chhal madhughat se giratii pyaalon men haalaa sun kal kal chhal chhal kal kal chhal chhal madhughat se giratii pyaalon men haalaa sun runajhun runajhun jal vitaran karatii madhu saaqii baalaa bas aa pahunche duur nahiin bas aa pahunche duur nahiin kuchh chaar kadam ab chalanaa hai chahak rahe sun piinevaale mahak rahii le madhushaalaa chahak rahe sun piinevaale mahak rahii le madhushaalaa   laal suraa kii dhaar lapat sii kah na ise denaa jvaalaa kah na ise denaa jvaalaa phenil madiraa hai mat isako kah denaa ura kaa haalaa dard nashaa hai is madiraa kaa dard nashaa hai is madiraa kaa vigat smritiyaan saaqii hai piidaa men aanand jise ho aaye merii madhushaalaa piidaa men aanand jise ho aaye merii madhushaalaa   dharmagranth sab jalaa chukii hai dharmagranth sab jalaa chukii hai jisake antar kii jvaalaa mandir masajid girije sab ko tod chukaa jo matavaalaa pandit momin paadariyon ke phandon ko jo kaat chukaa kar sakatii hai aaj usii kaa svaagat merii madhushaalaa kar sakatii hai aaj usii kaa svaagat merii madhushaalaa   laalaait adharon se jisane haay nahiin chuumii haalaa harsh vikanpit karase jisane haay na chhuaa madhu kaa pyaalaa haath pakad lajjit saaqii kaa haath pakad lajjit saaqii kaa paas nahiin jisane khiinchaa paas nahiin jisane khiinchaa vyarth sukhaa daalii jiivan kii usane madhumay madhushaalaa vyarth sukhaa daalii jiivan kii usane madhumay madhushaalaa   bane pujaarii premii saaqii gangaajal paavan haaraa rahe pherataa avirat gati se madhu ke pyaalon kii maalaa aur liye jaa aur piye jaa aur liye jaa aur piye jaa isii mantra kaa jaap kare main shiv kii pratimaa ban baithuun mandir ho ye madhushaalaa main shiv kii pratimaa ban baithuun mandir ho ye madhushaalaa   ek baras men ek baar hii jagatii holii kii jvaalaa ek baar hii lagatii baazii jalatii diipon kii maalaa duniyaa vaalon kintu kisii din aa madiraalaya men dekho aa madiraalaya men dekho din ko holii raat divaalii roz manaatii madhushaalaa din ko holii raat divaalii roz manaatii madhushaalaa   adharon par ho koii bhii ras jiivhaa par lagatii haalaa bhaajan ho koii haathon men lagataa rakhkhaa hai pyaalaa har suurat saaqii kii suurat har suurat saaqii kii suurat main parivartit ho jaatii aankhon ke aage ho kuchh bhii aankhon men hai madhushaalaa aankhon ke aage ho kuchh bhii aankhon men hai madhushaalaa   sumukhii tumhaaraa sundar mukh hii mujhako kanchan kaa pyaalaa chhalak rahii hai chhalak rahii hai chhalak rahii hai jisame maanik ruup madhur maadak haalaa main hii saaqii banataa main hii piine vaaalaa banataa huun piine vaaalaa banataa huun jahaan kahiin mil baithe ham tum vahiin gayii ho madhushaalaa jahaan kahiin mil baithe ham tum vahiin gayii ho madhushaalaa   do din hii madhu mujhe pilaa kar kuub uthii saaqii baalaa do din hii madhu mujhe pilaa kar kuub uthii saaqii baalaa bhar kar ab khisakaa detii hai vah mere aage pyaalaa naaz adaa andaazon se ab haay pilaanaa duur huaa ab to kar detii hai keval farzaadaaii madhushaalaa ab to kar detii hai keval farzaadaaii madhushaalaa ab to kar detii hai keval farzaadaaii madhushaalaa farzaadaaii madhushaalaa   chhote se jiivan men kitanaa pyaar karuun pii luun haalaa chhote se jiivan men kitanaa pyaar karuun pii luun haalaa aane ke hii saath jagat men aane ke hii aane ke hii saath jagat men kahalaayaa jaanevaalaa svaagat ke hii saath vidaa kii svaagat ke hii saath vidaa kii hotii dekho taiyaarii band lagii hone khulate hii band lagii hone khulate hii merii jiivan madhushaalaa merii jiivan madhushaalaa   shaant sakii ho ab tak saaqii shaant sakii ho ab tak saaqii pii kar kis ura kii jvaalaa aur aur kii ratan lagaataa aur aur kii ratan lagaataa jaataa har piine vaalaa kitanii ichchhaayen harjaane vaalaa chhod yahaan jaataa kitane aramaanon kii ban kar kabr khadii hai madhushaalaa kitne armaanon ki ban kar kabr khadi hai madhushala     yam aayegaa saaqii ban kar saath liye kaalii haalaa yam aayegaa saaqii ban kar saath liye kaalii haalaa pii na hosh men phir aayegaa suraavisudh yah matavaalaa yah antim behoshii antim saaqii antim pyaalaa hai pathik pyaar se piinaa isako pathik pyaar se piinaa isako phir na milegii madhushaalaa phir na milegii madhushaalaa   giratii jaatii hai din pratidin pranayanii praanon kii haalaa bhagn huaa jaataa din pratidin subhage meraa tan pyaalaa ruuth rahaa hai mujhase ruupasi din din yauvan kaa saaqii suukh rahii hai din din sundarii suukh rahii hai din din sundarii merii jiivan madhushaalaa merii jiivan madhushaalaa   dhalak rahii ho tan ke ghat se sanaginii jab jiivan haalaa paatra garal kaa le jab antim saaqii ho aanevaalaa haathparas bhuule pyaale kaa 2 haathparas bhuule pyaale kaa svaadsuraa jiivhaa bhuule kaano men tum kahatii rahanaa kaano men tum kahatii rahanaa madhukan pyaalaa madhushaalaa 2   mere adharon par ho antim vastu na tulasidal pyaalaa merii jiivhaa par ho antim vastu na gangaajal haalaa mere shav ke piichhe chalane vaalon yaad ise rakhanaa raam naam hai satya na kahanaa 2 kahanaa sachchii madhushaalaa 2   mere shav par vah roye ho jisake aansuun men haalaa aah bhare vah jo ho surbhit madiraa pii kar matavaalaa de mujhako ve kandhaa jinake pag mad dagamag hote hon aur jaluun us thor jahaan par kabhii rahii ho madhushaalaa aur jaluun us thor jahaan par kabhii rahii ho madhushaalaa   aur chitaa par jaaye undelaa paatr na ghrit kaa par pyaalaa khaant bandhe anguur lataa men madhya na jal ho par haalaa praan priiye yadi shraardha karo tum meraa to aise karanaa piine vaalon ko bulavaa kar khulavaa denaa madhushaalaa piine vaalon ko bulavaa kar khulavaa denaa madhushaalaa   naam agar koii puuchhe to kahanaa bas piinevaalaa kaam dhaalaanaa aur dhaalaanaa sabko madiraa ka pyaalaa jaati priiye jaati priiye puuchhe yadi koii kah denaa diivaanon kii dharm bataanaa pyaalon kii le maalaa japanaa madhushaalaa dharm bataanaa pyaalon kii le maalaa japanaa madhushaalaa   pitri paksh men  putra uthaanaa ardhya na kar men par pyaalaa baith kahiin par jaanaa gangaa saagar men haalaa kisii jagah kii mittii bhiige triptii mujhe mil jaaegii tarpan arpan karanaa mujhako padh padh kar ke madhushaalaa   tarpan arpan karanaa mujhako padh padh kar ke madhushaalaa

Title: ibtidaaeishq men ham saarii raat jaage
Lyrics: ibtidaaeishq men ham saarii raat jaage allaa jaane kyaa hogaa aage maulaa jaane kyaa hogaa aage dil men terii ulafat ke bandhane lage dhaage    allaahthreedots  kyaa kahuun kuchh kahaanahiin jaae bin kahe bhii rahaa nahiin jaae raatraat bhar karavat main badaluun dard dil kaa sahaa nahiin jaae niind merii aankhon se duurduur bhaage    allaahthreedots  dil men jaagii priit kii jvaalaa jabase mainne hosh sambhaalaa main huun tere pyaar kii siimaa tuu meraa raahii matavaalaa mere man kii biinaa men tere raag jaage    allaahthreedots  tuune jab se aankh milaaii dil se ik aavaaz ye aaii chal ke ab taaron men rahenge pyaar ke ham to hain saudaaii mujhako terii suurat bhii chaand raat laage    allaahthreedots

Title: ik mahal ho sapanon kaa
Lyrics: ik mahal ho sapanon kaa phuulon bharaa aangan ho aur saath ho apanon kaa  udate baadal farsh bane aur dhundh kii hon diivaaren chhat ke jhilamil taare teraa meraa naam pukaare ik mahal ho sapanon kaa threedots  sapanon ke is mahal men bikhare muskaanon ke moti mere pyaar kii khushabuu phaile tere ruup kii jyoti ik mahal ho sapanon kaa threedots  main tere nayanon par kar duun apanaa sab kuchh vaarii main terii baahon men chup kar bhuuluun duniyaa saarii ik mahal ho sapanon kaa threedots

Title: idhar phir bhii aanaa udhar jaane vaale
Lyrics: idhar phir bhii aanaa udhar jaane vaale are jii ko bechain kar jaane vaale  chhurii pher denaa to achchhaa thaa is se lagaavat se munh pher kar jaane vaale  galaa kaatanaa pahale phir haath malanaa bade dhiith nikale mukar jaane vaale  ye hai priit kii riit badalo na isako gale pahale milate hain ghar jaane vaale  kahiin aarazuu kyon dikhaa de na ik din ki yuun dekho marate hain mar jaane vaale

Title: har ik suurat har ik tasviir mubaham hotii jaatii hai
Lyrics: har ik suurat har ik tasviir mubaham hotii jaatii hai ilaahii kyaa merii diivaanagii kam hotii jaatii hai  jahaan tak dil kaa shiiraazaa faraaham karataa jaataa huun ye mahafil aur baraham aur baraham hotii jaatii hai har ik suurat har ik tasviir threedots  vo rahrahakar gale milmilake rukasat hote jaate hain merii aankhon se yaarab roshanii kam hotii jaatii hai har ik suurat har ik tasviir threedots  jidhar se main guzarataa huun nigaahen uthatii jaatii hain merii hastii bhii kyaa teraa hii aalam hotii jaatii hai har ik suurat har ik tasviir mubaham hotii jaatii hai

Title: aap ko dekh kar hamako aisaa lagaa jaise mujhako naii zindagii
Lyrics: bhaag 1  he eh he he ho oh ho ho aap ko dekh kar aap ko dekh kar hamako aisaa lagaa   jaise mujhako naii zindagii mil gayii o merii dilarubaa rab se maangun main kyaa            hamako saare jahaan kii khushii mil gayii aap ko dekh kar   2  aisaa cheharaa hasin hamane dekhaa nahiin aap jaisaa koii naa zamaane men hain vohii vo adaa hain vohii vo vafaa hamako sadiyon lagii jisako paane men jaaneadaa jaanevafaa duur na jaanaa aap ko dekh kar aap ko dekh kar threedots  he eh he he ho oh ho ho  karen kaise adaa rab kaa ham shukriyaa ham use ab kabhii na bhulaayenge ab naa todenge ham pyaar kii ye qasam vaadaa kar ke sanam ham nibhaayenge hamane to sikhaa hai sadaa saath nibhaanaa aap ko dekh kar aap ko dekh karthreedots  he eh he he ho oh ho ho oh oh oh oh ah ah ah ah  bhaag 2  he eh he he ho oh oh oh  karen kaise adaa rab kaa ham shukriyaa ham use ab kabhii na bhulaayenge ab naa todenge ham pyaar kii ye kasam vaadaa kar ke sanam ham nibhaayenge   2 hamane to sikhaa hai sadaa saath nibhaanaa hoke tumase judaa  hoke tumase judaa hamako aisaa lagaa jaise mujhase merii zindagii chhin gayii aansuon kii kasam tujhape aaye naa gam mujhase to merii har ek khushii chhin gayii hoke tumase judaa hoke tumase judaa

Title: khoke mahafil men  chand lamhe terii mahafil men guzaar aayaa huun
Lyrics: khoke mahafil men terii sabroqaraar aayaa huun chand lamhe terii mahafil men guzaar aayaa huun  jazb hai gunchaaemaasuum kii nakahat mujhamen gum hai rangiiniiegulazaaremuhabbat mujhamen banake shaadaabiieunawaanebahaar aayaa huun chand lamhe terii threedots  vahii phuulon kii masarrat vahii gunchon kii umang vahii kushabuu vahii aalam vahii mastii vahii rang banake sartaabaqadam faslebahaar aayaa huun  merii aankhon se tapakatii hai musalasal maienaab merii makmuur nigaahon se umandatii hai sharaab dil men lekar asarekaifokumaar aayaa huun chand lamhe terii threedots

Title: matavaalepane se jo kataa jhuum padii hai
Lyrics: matavaalepane se jo kataa jhuum padii hai chhaatii se dhuaan uthaa hai jo buund padii hai  haan aur sunaa kuchh vo buraa ho ki bhalaa ho are jo baat tere munh kii hai motii kii ladii hai  rahanaa nahiin is desh men jaauun to kidhar jaauun rastaa hai kathin os kade dhuup kadii hai  vo bhii koii jiinaa hai duhkhon se jo bharaa ho hai saans ki ik phaans kaleje men gadii hai  haan bedhadak ai aarazuu ab kah do karii baat rassii bhii yahiin rakhii hai suulii bhii khadii hai

Title: ik shammaa jalatii hii rahii parawaanaa aayaa hii nahiin
Lyrics: ik shammaa jalatii hii rahii parawaanaa aayaa hii nahiin us bewafaa ke pyaar men wo raat bhar rotii rahii ik shamaa jalatii hii rahii parawaanaa aayaahii nahiin  kahaa usane ro ke o bewafaa terii baahen thiin meraa haar haar re teraa pyaar thaa merii zindagii kahaan kho gayaa teraa pyaar pyaar re tere saath aisii bahaar thii ke jo raat thii wo singaar thii ke jo raat thii wo singaar thii meraa har singaar mitaa diyaa mujhe tuune kaisaa silaa diyaa ke kushii bhii gum men badal gaii merii sej sholon men dhal gaii ik shammaa jalatii hii rahii parwaanaa aayaa hii nahiin  jise samajhaa shamma ne bewafaa wo chalaa ke baat naa jaaye re jaaye re magar ek aandhii ne raah men use zakhamii kar diyaa haaye re haay re wo huzoorehusn to aa gayaa parajhal kaa saayaa bhii chhaa gayaa parajhal kaa saayaa bhii chhaa gayaa na kabar thii shammaa ko ye magar ke jo paas tuute pade hain par hain nishaanii usake hii pyaar kii jo nissaar kar gayaa zindagii par shamaa kahatii hii rahii parwaanaa aayaa hii nahiin parwaanaa aayaa hii nahiin parwaanaa aayaa hii nahiin

Title: niil gagan par udate baadal aa aa aa
Lyrics: niil gagan par udate baadal aa aa aa dhuup men jalataa khet hamaaraa kar de tuu chhaayaa chhupe hue o chanchal panchhii jaa jaa jaa dekh abhii hai kachchaa daanaa pak jaae to khaa  bahataabahataa kyaariyon men thandaathandaa paanii chuum na le kahiin paanv tere o kheton kii raanii chuum ke mere paanv maile vo hogaa mailaa main huun kheton kii daasii tuu kheton kaa raajaa  hariibharii in khetiyon kii raam kare rakhavaalii vo chaahe to sausau daane degii ekek daalii mehanatvaalon kii sunataa hai vo uuparvaalaa khol ke rakhiyo apanii jholii bhar degaa daataa

Title: ham bhii tum bhii chor hain saathii yaad rakhanaa haradam
Lyrics: ham bhii tum bhii chor hain saathii yaad rakhanaa haradam   sach kabhii tum bol na denaa man men rakhanaa haradam   tumane mujhako chor banaayaa tuu hii sachchaa hamadam   choron kaa hai pakkaa rishataa yaad rakhanaa haradam haradam    bhaagambhaagii aankhmicholii khel hain ye kyaa kam   uupar vaalaa saath hamaare phir hamen hai kyaa gam   chorii ke dhandhe men saathii jaan phansii hai haradam haradam   zindagii kii qasam bahut majabuur ho gaye ham   ban gaye chor jab dukh hamaare ho gaye kam   bewafaa jab dil ko churaatii kyaa karenge phir ham   duniyaa men sab golmaal hai yaad rakhanaa haradam haradam   khol den koii bhii tijorii mil gaye jab hamtum   lut bhii jaayen pit bhii jaayen kush rahenge haradam   kabhii hon andar kabhii hon baahar kyaa hai is men antar   maal mile to mauj udaayen yaad rakhanaa haradam haradam   ham bhii tum bhii chor hain saathii yaad rakhanaa haradam   saath ho chor kaa phir kisii se kyon daren ham   chor do mil gaye do nadi kaa huaa sangam   jo kazaanaa ham ko milegaa baant lenge hamtum   yaar mere tum dagaa na denaa dost rahanaa haradam haradam   ham bhii tum bhii chor hain saathii yaad rakhanaa haradam  sach kabhii tum bol naa denaa man men rakhanaa haradam  tumane mujhako chor banaayaa tuu hii sachchaa hamadam  choron kaa hai pakkaa rishtaa yaad rakhanaa haradam haradam  bhaagambhaagii aankhmicholii khel hain ye kyaa kam  uupar vaalaa saath hamaare phir hamen hai kyaa gam  chorii ke dhandhe men saathii jaan phansii hai haradam haradam

Title: duniyaa ke dukh hare hain tumane
Lyrics: duniyaa ke dukh hare hain tumane 2 hamaare bhii dukh haro gopaal 2 he giradhaarii he banawaarii 2 natnaagarnandalaal 2  maatpitaa tum bandhusakhaa tum 2 tum hiin sab kuchh swaamii hamare dukh koii kyaa jaane  jaano antaryaamii 2 charankamal men tumare hamane 2 jiiwanphuul diyaa hai daal 2 hamaare bhii dukh haro gopaal   tum anaath ke naath prabhuu ho 2 sabake sangiisaathii 2 tumarii jot men hamane milaa dii apanii jiivanbaatii 2 raakho laaj hamaarii tum hiin he jag ke rakhawaal 2 hamaare bhii dukh haro gopaal  duniyaa ke dukh hare hain tumane hamaare bhii dukh haro gopaal haro gopaal gopaal

Title: husn ishq kii ye kahaanii har dil kii  javaanii zindaabaad
Lyrics: husn ishq kii ye kahaanii har dil kii jaanii pahachaanii milaa jahaan par aag aur paanii duniyaa kahatii use javaanii kahiin shiirii kahiin farahaad kahiin setii kahiin muraad har dil ko kare aabaad javaanii zindaabaad javaanii zindaabaad  har gam se aazaad javaanii zindaabaad threedots  jisape javaanii jab jab aaii kaanon men baajii shahanaaii saal solahavaan jis din laage tan piichhe man aage bhaage binaa baat ke khoii khoii aadhii jaagii aadhii soii honth gulaabii jab jab khole hans hans ke koii baat bhii bole har baat pe milatii daad javaanii zindaabaad threedots  ye chanchal madamast javaanii jaise chadhatii nadii kaa paanii jahaan bhii uth gaiin gorii baahen ruk gae raste tham gaiin raahen lekin jab ye aankh milaae dil ke tukade karatii jaae jahaan bhii chhanake isakii paayal tiin mare aur terah ghaayal hue aashiq kaii barbaad javaanii zindaabaad threedots

Title: saagar kinaare dil ye pukaare
Lyrics: saagar kinaare dil ye pukaare tuu jo nahiin to meraa koii nahiin hai saagar kinaare   threedots  jaage nazaare jaagii havaaen jab pyaar jaagaa jaagii fizaaen ho pal bhar ko dil kii duniyaa soyii nahiin hai saagar kinaare   threedots  laharon pe naachen kiranon kii pariyaan main khoii jaise saagar men nadiyaa ho tuu hii akelii to khoii nahiin hai saagar kinaare   threedots

Title: bhaabho kaindii e piyaaraa singhaa
Lyrics: bhaabho kaindiie piyaaraa singhaa velanaa lai aa    bhaabho kaindiie piyaaraa singhaa velanaa lai aa velane dii khattii dii main natha banawaaniian velane dii khattii dii main natha banawaaniian paana de wele       o kedii jedii taane bharadii    o kedii jedii saunkana merii   o kedii pichhawaade miladii   o kedii jedii dhuka dhuka baindii  o kedii o kaindiie piyaaraa singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie piyaaraa singhaa velanaa lai aa  bhaabho kaindiie naraina singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie naraina singhaa velanaa lai aa velane dii khattii dii main vangaan banawaaniian velane dii khattii dii main vangaan banawaaniian paana de wele       o kedii jedii kalla vii aaii saii     o kedii jedii saunkana merii   o kedii pichhawaade miladii   o kedii jedii dhuka dhuka baindii  o kedii o kaindiie naraina singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie naraina singhaa velanaa lai aa  bhaabho kaindiie ve mindara singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve mindara singhaa velanaa lai aa velane dii khattii dii main tikkaa banawaaniian velane dii khattii dii main tikkaa banawaaniian paana de wele       o kedii jedii taane bharadii    o kedii jedii saunkana merii   o kedii pichhawaade miladii   o kedii jedii dhuka dhuka baindii  o kedii o kaindiie ve mindara singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve mindara singhaa velanaa lai aa  bhaabho kaindiie ve kesara singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve kesara singhaa velanaa lai aa velane dii khattii dii main haara banawaaniian velane dii khattii dii main haara banawaaniian paana de wele       o kedii jedii saunkana merii   o kedii jedii kalla vii aaii saii    o kedii pichhawaade miladii   o kedii jedii dhuka dhuka baindii  o kedii o kaindiie ve kesara singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve kesara singhaa velanaa lai aa  bhaabho kaindiie ve darshana singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve darshana singhaa velanaa lai aa velane dii khattii dii main haara banawaaniian velane dii khattii dii main haara banawaaniian paana de wele       o kedii jedii saunkana merii   o kedii jedii kalla vii aaii saii    o kedii pichhawaade miladii   o kedii jedii dhuka dhuka baindii  o kedii o kaindiie ve darshana singhaa velanaa lai aa bhaabho kaindiie ve darshana singhaa velanaa lai aa

Title: mere bas men yaa to yaarab wo sitamshaaar hotaa
Lyrics: mere bas men yaa to yaarab wo sitamshaaar hotaa ye na thaa to kaash dil par mujhe aktiyaar hotaa  jo nigaah kii thii jaanib to phir aankh kyuun churaaii wo hii tiir kyuun na maaraa jo jigar ke paar hotaa  teraa mayakadaa salaamat tere kuun kii kair taasiir meraa nashaa kyuun utarataa mujhe kyuun khumaar hotaa  nahiin puuchhataa hai mujhako koii phuul is chaman men diledaagadaar hotaa to gale kaa haar hotaa  merii kaak bhii chaman men na rahii amiir baakii unhen marane hii kaa ab tak nahiin aitabaar hotaa

Title: taal se taal milaa
Lyrics: dil ye bechain ve raste pe nain ve dil ye bechain ve raste pe nain ve jindarii behaal hai sur hai na taal hai aajaa saanvariyaa aa aa aa taal se taal milaa ho taal se taal milaa  saavan ne aaj to mujh ko bhigo diyaa haay merii laaj ne mujh ko dubo diyaa saavan ne aaj to mujh ko bhigo diyaa haay merii laaj ne mujh ko dubo diyaa aisii lagii chadhii sochuun main ye khadii kuchh main ne kho diyaa kyaa main ne kho diyaa chup kyon hai bol tuu sang mere dol tuu merii chaal se chaal milaa taal se taal milaa o taal se taal milaa threedots  maanaa anjaan hai tuu mere vaaste maanaa anjaan huun main tere vaaste maanaa anjaan hai tuu mere vaaste maanaa anjaan huun main tere vaaste main tujh ko jaan luun tuu mujh ko jaan le aa dil ke paas aa is dil ke raaste jo teraa haal hai vo meraa haal hai is haal se haal milaa o taal se taal milaa o taal se taal milaa  dil ye bechain ve raste pe nain ve jindarii behaal hai sur hai na taal hai aajaa saanvariyaa aa aa aa taal se taal milaa ho taal se taal milaa taal se taal milaa ho taal se taal milaa taal se taal milaa ho taal se taal milaa

Title: saawan men pade jhuule
Lyrics: saawan men pade jhuule tum bhuul gaye hamako ham tumako nahiin bhuule  saawan kaa mahiinaa hai saajan se judaa ho kar jiinaa bhii kyaa jiinaa hai  ab aur na tadapaao yaa hamako bulaa bhejo yaa aap chale aao  ye raqs sitaaron kaa sun le kabhii afasaanaa taqadiir ke maaron kaa  raavii kaa kinaaraa hai har mauj ke honthon pe afasaanaa hamaaraa hai

Title: muddaten ho gaii hain chup rahate
Lyrics: wo karen bhii to kis alfaaz men shiqawaa teraa jinako terii nigaahelutf ne barabaad kiyaa isakaa ronaa nahiin kyuun tumane kiyaa dil barabaad isakaa dukh hai ki badii der men barabaad kiyaa  muddaten ho gaii hain chup rahate koii sunataa to ham bhii kuchh kahate  jal gayaa kushq ho ke daamanedil ashq aankhon se aur kyaa bahate

Title: teraa khayaal dil se mitaayaa nahiin abhii
Lyrics: teraa khayaal dil se mitayaa nahiin abhii bedadr main ne tujh ko bhulaayaa nahiin abhii  kal tuune muskuraa ke jalaayaa thaa khud jise siine kaa vo charaag bujhaayaa nahiin abhii  garadan ko aaj bhii terii baahon kii yaad hai chaukhat se terii sar ko uthaayaa nahiin abhii  behosh hoke jald tujhe hosh aa gayaa main badnasiib hosh men aayaa nahiin abhii

Title: le chalaa jaan merii ruuth ke jaanaa teraa
Lyrics: le chalaa jaan merii ruuth ke jaanaa teraa aisaa aane se to behatar hai na aanaa teraa  apane dil ko bhii bataauun na thikaanaa teraa sab ne jaanaa jo pataa ek ne jaanaa teraa  tu jo ai zulf pareshaan rahaa karatii hai kisake ujade hue dil men hai thikaanaa teraa  yah samajh kar tujhe ai maut lagaa rakhaa hai kaam aataa hai bure waqt men aanaa teraa  apanii aankhon men bhii kaundh gaii bijalii sii ham na samajhe ki ye aanaa hai ki jaanaa teraa  daag ko yuun wo mitaate hain ye farmaate hain to badal daal huaa naam puraanaa teraa

Title: muralii madhur kahiin baajii
Lyrics: muralii madhur kahiin baajii muraliyaa re muraliyaa re muralii madhur kahiin baajii nuupur saath  e nidhaban kunj nishiith dekho morii aaye  niind nahiin aawe mohe o saarii rain jaagii  muralii madhur kahiin baajii nuupur naachat baansuri baajat muralii madhur kahiin baajii threedots  nuupur dhun sun man moh liyo hai vyaakul bhaii dhun sunake braj naarii laakhon jatan son muralii bajaawe priyaa  miiraa kahat prabhuu tope haarii re  muralii madhur kahiin baajii threedots

Title: pareshaan thaa pareshaan hai ye dil kambakt dil meraa
Lyrics: pareshaan thaa pareshaan hai ye dil kambakt dil meraa haae dil meraa pareshaan thaa pareshaan hai  mere gulshan ke gul saare khile ik pal na bechaare kabhii in par bahaar aae ye aramaan thaa ye armaan hai  jo marham kaam kar jaataa to koii zakm bhar jaataa mere zakmon pe marham kaa na ehsaan thaa na ehsaan hai

Title: mastaanaa piye jaa yuun hii
Lyrics: mastaanaa piye jaa yuun hii mastaanaa piye jaa paimaanaa to kyaa chiiz hai mayakhaanaa piye jaa  kar garqemayojaam gamegardishoayyaam ai dilenaakaam mayakhaanaa piye jaa  mayanoshii ke aadaab se aagaah nahiin tuu jis tarah kahe saaqiiemayakhaanaa piye jaa  is maqr kii bastii men hai mastii hii se hastii diiwaanaa ban aur baatilediiwaanaa piye jaa  mayakhaane ke hangaame hain kuchh der ke mehamaan hai subah qariib aktar diiwaanaa piye jaa

Title: samaa ye suhaanaa akele tum ho akele ham hain
Lyrics: samaa ye suhaanaa akele tum ho akele ham hain koii kisii kaa diivaanaa diivaane tum ho diivaane ham hain  sajaayii hai hamane kvaabon kii mahafil hamen mil gayii hai muhabbat kii manzil koii   threedots  ye chaahat kaa mausam mahakataa mahakataa ye mastii kaa aalam bahakataa bahakataa koii   threedots

Title: na hanso ham pe zamaane ke hain thukaraae hue
Lyrics: na hanso ham pe zamaane ke hain thukaraae hue darbadar phirate hain taqadiir ke bahakaae hue na hanso ham pe threedots  kyaa bataaen tumhen kal ham bhii chaman vaale the ye na puuchho ki hai viiraane men kyon aae hue na hanso ham pe threedots  baat kal kii hai ki phuulon komasal dete the aaj kaanton ko bhii siine se hain lipataae hue na hanso ham pe threedots  aisii gardish men na daale kabhii qismat tum ko aap ke saamane jis haal men hain aae hue na hanso ham pe threedots  ek din phir vahii pahalii sii bahaaren hongii is ummiid pe ham dil ko hain bahalaae hue na hanso ham pe threedots

Title: o dard se meraa daaman bhar de yaa allaah latajagjit gazal
Lyrics: o dadr se meraa daaman bhar de ya allaah  phir chaahe divaanaa kar de ya allaah   mainne tujhase chaand sitaare kab maange  roshani de bezaar nazar de ya allaah   suuraj sii ik chiiz to ham sab dekh chuke  sachamuch ki ab koi sahar de ya allaah   ya dharatii ke zakhmon pe maraham rakh de  ya meraa dil patthar kar de ya allaah

Title: shrii raamachandra krupaaluu bhaj man
Lyrics: sri ramachandra kripalu baja mana haranna bhavabhaya darunnama navakanja lochana kanja mukha kara kanja pada kanjarunnama  kandarpa agannita amita chhavi navaniil niraja sundaram pata pita manahun tarit ruchi shuchi naumi janakasuta varama  bhaja deenabandhu dinesh danava daityavansha nikandanama raghunanda anandakanda kaushalachanda dasharathanandanama  sira kriita kundala tilaka charu udara anga vibhushannama ajanubhuja sharachapa dhara snagrama jita kharadushannama  iti vadita tulasidasa shakara shesha munimana ranjanama mama hridayakanja nivasa karu kamadi khaladala ganjanama  mana jahi rachyo milahi so vara seheja sundara sanvaro karunnanidhana sujana shiila sneha janata ravaro  yahi bhanti asisa suna siya sahita hiya harashita alii tulasi bhavanihi puji punipuni mudita mana mandir chalii

Title: o manachalii kahaan chalii
Lyrics: o manachalii kahaan chalii  2 dekh dekh dekh dekh mujh se na sharamaa ek ek ek main huun bhanvaraa aur tuu kalii o manachalii threedots  hothon pe leke teraa naam aai hai rang bharii shaam phuulon se chhalake hain jaam bhanvaron ne dil liye thaam aise men he he ho e he ho aise men tod ke prem kii dorii o gorii  chakorii  tuu kahaan chalii threedots  duniyaa se nahiin darenge ham tum mulaaqaate karenge aajaa do baate karenge rangiin barasaaten karenge ye sach hai e he o o e he o o ye sach hai main huun ek diivaanaa na jaanaa  na maanaa  tuu kahaan chalii threedots  rut aisii aai hui hai badalii sii chhaai hui hai tuu kyon sharamaai hui hai mujhase ghabaraai hui hai pyaar men e he o o e he o o pyaar men yaar se aankh churaake chhupaake  bachaake  tuu kahaan chalii threedots

Title: rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat
Lyrics: giitaa rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat rafii	yaad aaye kisii se vo pahalii mulaaqaat   2 	 giitaa bhiige tan man pade ras kii phuhaar rafii	pyaar kaa sandesaa laayii barakhaa bahaar   2 giitaa	main naa boluun main naa boluun aankhen karen ankhiyon se baat rafii	rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat 	 rafii	sunake matavaale kaale baadalon kaa shor giitaa	ruum jhuum ghuum ghuum naache man kaa mor   2 rafii	sapanon kaa saathii chal rahaa mere saath giitaa	rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat rafii	yaad aaye kisii se vo pahalii mulaqaat dono	rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat  giitaa jab milate ho tum to chhuten dil ke taar rafii	milane ko tum se main kyon thaa beqaraar   2 giitaa	raha jaatii hai raha jaatii hai kyon hothon tak aake dil kii baat rafii rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat giitaa yaad aaye kisii se vo pahalii mulaqaat dono rim jhim ke taraane leke aayii barasaat

Title: jaatii huun main jaldii hai kyaa
Lyrics: a jaatii huun main k jaldii hai kyaa a dhadake jiyaa k vo kyon bhalaa a khud se hii darane lagii huun main    pyaar karane lagii huun k khud se itanaa darogii tum    pyaar kaise karogii  a jaaduu tere jism kaa    terii or khiinche mujhe    kaabuu na khud pe rahe    jabjab main dekhuun tujhe k kadam bahak jaaenge    ye kyon tum ne sochaa    kyaa merii chaahat pe tumako nahiin bharosaa a tum par mujhako yakiin hai    khud par yakiin nahiin    jaatii huun threedots  k leke tere lab kii laalii    jiivan ko rangiin karenge    kvaabon men tumako bharenge    kal tak tabhii jii sakenge a khud ko sambhaale rakhiye    mujh ko sambhalane diijiye    hosh main apanii kho jaauun    itanaa pyaar na diijiye k pyaar hai diivanaapan hosh kaa kaam nahiin a jaatii huun threedots

Title: aankhen band kar luun  ab na jaa
Lyrics: aankhen band kar luun jo main dekhuun bas tumhen kwaabon men hii kah sakataa huun apanaa tumhen rahane de meraa ye vaham pe hii yakiin na jaa abhii  pyaar kii ye raat hai ab na jaa chhotii sii ek baat hai ab na jaa  tumhiin se hai merii niinden na bhii hon to kyaa tumhiin se hai merii baaten na bhii hon to kyaa kahane de taaron ko kahaanii anakahii na jaa abhii pyaar kii ye raat hai ab na jaa chhotii sii ek baat hai ab na jaa pal do pal kaa saath hai ab na jaa jaaduu sii ye raat hai ab na jaa ab na jaa  maathe pe pyaar kii buunden bikhare se kaii sawaal aankhon men kitane mausam pal men biite kitane saal bahane de jahaan bhii le jaae zindagii na jaa abhii pyaar kii ye raat hai ab na jaa chhotii sii ek baat hai ab na jaa pal do pal kaa saath hai ab na jaa jaaduu sii ye raat hai ab na jaa  ab na jaa 17

Title: ishq kud maayalehijaabohayaa
Lyrics: ishq kud maayalehijaabohayaa husn majabuureiztaraabohayaa   naalaaedil ko dil se laad nahiin nagmaa aazurdaaerubaabohayaa   maiqadaa gamazadaa hai tere bagair sar na ku shiishaaosharaabohayaa   zindagii jis men saans letii thii vo zamaanaa khayaalokhvaabohayaa   mit gaye dil ke valavale siimaab khatm afsaanaaeshabaabohayaa

Title: are o shaharii baabuu  tuu nikalaa chhupaa rustam
Lyrics: are o shaharii baabuu hamen maafii de de tuu hamane na tujhe pahachaanaa baabaa re baabaa dhokhaa khaa gae ham tuu nikalaa chhupaa rustam  are o shaharii baabuu threedots  jo chaahe khidamat le le jo chaahe rishvat le le jo chaahe kiimat le le kar de hamako jurmaanaa baabaa re baabaa dhokhaa khaa gae ham tuu nikalaa chhupaa rustam threedots  kar gussaa yaar zaraa saa gusse men pyaar zaraa saa hans de ik baar zaraa saa tuu hamase ruuth na jaanaa baabaa re baabaa dhokhaa khaa gae ham tuu nikalaa chhupaa rustam threedots

Title: aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain
Lyrics: ek hai apanii zamiin ek hai apanaa gagan ek hai apanaa jahaan ek hai apanaa vatan apane sabhii sukh ek hain apane sabhii gam ek hain aavaaz do aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain  koras aavaaz do aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain  ye vaqt khone kaa nahiin ye vaqt sone kaa nahiin jaago vatan katare men hai saaraa chaman khatare men hai phuulon ke chahare zard hain zulfen fizaa kii gard hain umdaa huaa tuufaan hai narave narage men hindustaan hai dushman se nafarat farz hai ghar kii hifaazat farz hai bedaar  ho bedaar ho aamaadaaepaigaar ho paikaar  koras aavaaz do aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain   ye hai himaalaa kii zamiin taajoajantaa kii zamiin sangam hamaarii aan hai chittaud apanii shaan hai gulmarg kaa mahakaa chaman jamunaa kaa tat gokul kaa ban gangaa ke dhaare apane hain ye sab hamaare apane hain kaha do koii dushman nazar uthe na bhuule se idhar kah do ke ham bedaar hain kah do ke ham tayyaar hain  koras aavaaz do aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain   utho javaanaanevatan baandhe hue sar se kafan utho dakan kii or se gangojaman kii or se panjaab kii dil se utho sataluj kii saahil se utho mahaaraashhtra kii khaak se dillii kii arzepaak se bangaal se gujaraat se kashmiir ke baagaat se nefaa se raajasthaan se purkaan ke hindustaan se  koras aavaaz do aavaaz do ham ek hain ham ek hain        ham ek hain ham ek hain ham ek hain

Title: hiranyagarbas  aise kis devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar
Lyrics: hiranyagarbassamavartataagre bhuutasya jaatah patireka aasiit sa daadhaaraprithiviidyaamutemaam kasmai devaaya havishaa vidhema   srishti se pahale sat nahiin thaa asat bhii nahiin antariksh bhii nahiin aakaash bhii nahiin thaa chhipaa thaa kyaa kahaan kisane dekhaa thaa us pal to agam atal jal bhii kahaan thaa  srishti kaa kaun hai kartaa kartaa hai vaa akartaa uunche aakaash men rahataa sadaaa adhyaksh banaa rahataa wahii to sachmuch men jaanataa yaa nahiin bhii jaanataa hai kisii ko nahiin pataa nahiin pataa  vah thaa hiranyagarbh srishti se pahale vidyamaan vahii to saare bhuutjaat kaa swaamii mahaan jo hai astitvamaan dharatiiaasamaan dhaaran kar aise kis devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar   jis ke bal par tejomay hai ambar prithvii hariibharii sthaapit sthir swarg aur suuraj bhii sthir aise kis devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar  garbh men apane agni dhaaran kar paidaa kar vyaapaa thaa jal idharudhar niicheuupar jagaa chuke wo kaii ekamev praan banakar aise kis devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar  om srishtinirmaataa swargrachayitaa puurvaj rakshaa kar satyadharmapaalak atul jal niyaamak rakshaa kar phailii hain dishaayen baahu jaisii usakii sab men sab par aise hii devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar aise hii devataa kii upaasanaa karen ham havi dekar

Title: zakm dil ke agar siye hote
Lyrics: zakm dil ke agar siye hote ahaledil kis tarah jiye hote  wo mile bhii to ik jhijhak sii rahii kaash thodii sii ham piye hote  aarazuu mutamain to ho jaatii aur bhii kuchh sitam kiye hote  lazzategam to baksh dii usane hausale bhii adam diye hote

Title: chup zamiin aasamaan kah sake na ye zubaan
Lyrics: chup zamiin aasamaan kah sake na ye zubaan  dil hilaanevaalii do doston kii daastaan   ruup donon kaa samaan do sharir ek jaan  ye dukhii to vo dukhii vo dukhii to ye dukhii  ek rang pyaar thaa sang kaarovaar thaa  do dilon ko ek dusare pe aitabaar thaa  rahate vo kariib the par bade garib the  videsh men ho laakhon unake aise kuchh nasiib the  dil ko dil se jod ke ghar se mukhadaa mod ke  dhan kamaane ke liye chale vatan ko chhod ke  chup zamiin aasamaan threedots  log chhal kapat nihaaye  sukh men dukhade bhar diye  chaandii ke chaand tukadon ne dilon ke tukade kar diye  sach ko jhuuth ne thagaa  kaa agan jagaa  pith piichhe var kar dost ne diyaa dagaa  dost ne diyaa dagaa dost ne diyaa dagaa  diyaa dagaa diyaa dagaa  chup zamiin aasamaan threedots  pashchataap kii aag lagi to vahii dharam phir jaagaa  anyaai insaan ke dil kaa paap nikal ke bhaaga  jhuuth ka bharam khulaa satya kaa diyaa jalaa  josh jaan kii jagii buraa bhi ban gayaa bhalaa  dono dost mil gaye dil ke phuul khil gaye  pyaar ke jo taar band the vo phir se hil gaye  kat gayii vo dushmanii dostii ke vaar se  pichhale paap mit gaye aansuon ke dhaar se   chup zamiin aasamaan kah sake na ye zubaan  dil hilaanevaalii do doston ki daastaan

Title: diivaanaa leke aayaa hai dil kaa taraanaa
Lyrics: diivaanaa leke aayaa hai dil kaa taraanaa 2  dekho kahiin yaaron thukaraa na denaa meraa nazaraanaa  diivaanaa leke threedots   aaj kaa din hai kitanaa suhaanaa jhuum rahaa pyaar meraa  puurii hon dil kii saarii muraaden khush rahe yaar meraa  ho ho chaand saa jiivan saathii mubaarak  jiivan men ana diivaanaa leke threedots   apane bhii hain kuchh khvaab adhuure kaun ab gine kitane  sach to ye hai ke mere dost ke sapane bhii hain mere apane  ho ho usakii khushii ab merii khushii hai ai diledivaanaa   diivaanaa leke threedots

Title: rainaa soyii soyii nainaa jaagii jaagii
Singer: lata s d burman r d burman
Lyrics: ko  mahalaa mahalaa mahaa lambolaa 2 la  rainaa soyii soyii nainaa jaagii jaagii       jaane kyaa ho aage dam dam damru bolaa2      mahalaa mahalaa mahaa lambolaa 2  raa rastaa ghere raat khadii hai      rastaa ghere raat khadii hai      paayal bedii ban gaii hai      rastaa ghere raat khadii hai      paayal bedii ban gaii hai      ho tan dolaa man dolaa dambolaa       rainaa soyii soyii threedots       tushimaa aise chal rahii hai       tushimaa aise chal rahii hai       nadiyaa jaise jal rahii hai       tushimaa aise chal rahii hai       nadiyaa jaise jal rahii hai      o taaj banii re sholaa dambolaa      rainaa soyii soyii threedots      mahalaa mahalaa mahaa lambolaa 2  sa  royegaa jiivan maut hansegii       royegaa jiivan maut hansegii       kisii ko naagan aaj dasegii raa royegaa jiivan maut hansegii       kisii ko naagan aaj dasegii      o bairan ne muunh kholaa dambolaa

Title: chal akelaa chal akelaa chal akelaa
Lyrics: chal akelaa chal akelaa chal akelaa teraa melaa piichhe chhuutaa raahii chal akelaa  hazaaron miil lambe raaste tujhako bulaate yahaan dukhade sahane ke vaaste tujhako bulaate hai kaun saa vo insaan yahaan pe jis ne dukh naa jhelaa chal akelaa threedots  teraa koi saath na de to tuu khud se priit jod le bichhaunaa dharatii ko karake are aakaash odh le puuraa khel abhii jiivan kaa tuune kahaan hai khelaa  chal akelaa threedots

Title: tere labon ke mukaabil gulaab kyaa hogaa  mukesh gazal
Lyrics: tere labon ke mukaabil gulaab kyaa hogaa tuu laajavaab hai teraa javaab kyaa hogaa  terii adaa pe fidaa ham to kyaa zamaanaa hai nisaar tujhape mere dil kaa ye khazaanaa hai tere shabaab se badh kar shabaab kyaa hogaa tere labon ke mukaabilthreedots  tuu muskuraae to jaatii bahaar aa jaaye dilebiimaar ko phir se qaraar aa jaaye tere karam kaa kisiise hisaab kyaa hogaa tere labon ke mukaabilthreedots

Title: chaandii jaisaa rang hai teraa sone jaise baal
Lyrics: chaandii jaisaa rang hai teraa sone jaise baal ik tuu hii dhanavaan hai gorii baakii sab kangaal  jis raste se tuu gujare vo phuulon se bhar jaaye 2 tere pair kii komal aahat sote bhaag jagaaye jo patthar to chhuu le gorii vo hiiraa ban jaaye tuu jisako mil jaaye vo tuu jisako mil jaaye vo ho jaaye maalaamaal ik tuu hii dhanavaan hai gorii baakii sab kangaal  jo berang hain usape kyaa kyaa rang jamaate log 2 tuu naadaan na jaane kaise ruup churaate log nazaren jii jii bhar ke dekhen aate jaate log chhail chhabiilii raanii thodaa chhail chhabiilii raanii thodaa ghuunghat aur nikaal ik tuu hii dhanavaan hai gorii baakii sab kangaal  ghanak ghataa kaliyaan aur taare sab hain teraa ruup 2 gazalen hon yaa giit hon mere sab men teraa ruup yuun hii chamakatii rahe hameshaa tere husn kii dhuup tujhe nazar naa lage kisii kii tujhe nazar naa lage kisii kii jiye hazaaron saal ik tuu hii dhanavaan hai gorii baakii sab kangaal  chaandii jaisaa rang hai teraa sone jaise baal ik tuu hii dhanavaan hai gorii baakii sab kangaal

Title: ranjish hii sahii dil hii dukhaane ke liyegazal jagjitlata
Lyrics: ranjish hii sahii dil hii dukhaane ke liye aa  2 aa phir se mujhe chhod ke jane ke liye aa  ranjish hii sahii threedots  kis kis ko bataayenge judaaii ka sabab ham  2 rasmon rahe duniya hii nibhaane ke liye aa aa aa  ranjish hii sahii threedots  pahale threedots pahale se marasim na sahii phir bhi kabhi to  2 tuu bhi to kabhi mujhako manaane ke liye aa  ranjish hii sahii threedots  tujhako threedots tujhako bahut aate hain na aane ke bahaane  2 vaise hii kisii roz na jaane ke liye aa aa aa   ranjish hii sahii dil hii dukhaane ke liye aa  aa phir se mujhe chhod ke jaane ke liye aa

Title: meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa
Lyrics: meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa rom rom se phuutaa dukhdaa jo dil men naa samaayaa meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa threedots  paanv mere hardam kaanton par haathon men angaare chuutaa karate in nainon se lahuu ke favvaare itanii garm aah bharataa huun jise chhuuii murjhaayaa meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa  ro kar karii raat banaa dii hans kar din ujiyaalaa jo pii letaa mere aansuu ban jaataa matawaalaa merii aashaa aur niraashaa banii dhuup aur chhaayaa meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa  chaand aur suraj ambar ke baadal rangon waale angintii jo dekh rahe ho jugnuu aur sitaare aansuu kaa bun taanaa baanaa main ne jii bahalaayaa meraa dukh ambar men chhaayaa threedots

Title: o tiir chalaane vaale zaraa aa saamane aa kar tiir chalaa
Lyrics: tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tiir chalaa  o tiir chalaane vaale zaraa aa saamane aa kar tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tuune mujhe chhup kar luut liyaa aa saamane aa kar tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tiir chalaa tiir chalaa  dil todane vaale khauf na khaa suurat to dikhaa nazaren to milaa ham bhii hain tere dil bhii hai teraa aa saamane aa kar tiir chalaa threedots  main aur kahiin tuu aur kahiin ulfat kaa to ye dastuur nahiin phir bhii tujhe dil detaa hai duaa aa saamane aa kar tiir chalaa threedots

Title: ai dil na mujhase chhupaa sacha bataa kyaa huaa
Lyrics: la ai dil na mujhase chhupaa     sach bataa kyaa huaa mu jaane bhii do dilarubaa     jo huaa so huaa  la taare gine raat bhar     jaane kab yaad men so gaii     vo kaab thaa madabharaa     jis men behosh main kho gaii     koii niind men hamase ruuth ke     hamako luut ke chal diyaa mu jaane bhii do dilarubaa     jo huaa so huaa  mu khidakii na chhodo khulii     pyaar ke chor hain taak men     kitanon kii chorii huii     madabharii chaandanii raat men     aise marz kii dil ke dard kii     dil kaa dard hii hai davaa la ai dil na mujhase chhupaa     sach bataa kyaa huaa  la baaten banaao na jii     raaz to aapake khul gae mu aankhen churaao na jii     nain se nain to mila gae la kyaa buraa huaa dil machal gayaa     ghar badal gayaa aapakaa mu jaane bhii do dilarubaa     jo huaa so huaa

Title: tere baajre dii raakhii
Lyrics: tere baajre dii raakhii maahiyaa main naa bahndii ve adiyaa main naa bahndii ve dholaa main naa bahndii ve  raakhiipahredaarii chowkidaarii hifaazat raakhii bethnaapahredaarii karnaa mahiyaa dholaaloveraashnaa adiyaageneral pronoun to address a male he need not be a lover adiye for female  taakaan laaiyaan kaalyaan kaanvaan hun main kidhir kidhir jaavaan je main siitii maar udaavaan merii surkii lahndii ve  taakaanplural of taak laaiyaanplural of laaiifrom lagaanaa kaalyaan kaanvaan black crows lahndiiutartii  panchhi aaunde ban qataaraan aa ke bahnde kaii hazaaraan je main addii maar udaavaan chaanjar digdig paindii ve  aaunde aate hain ban qataaraan qataaren baandh karqataarwaar addiiaidii chaanjarjhaanjar  baajraa teraa panchii khaande mainuun kallii vekh daraunde je main taalii maar udaavaan merii mahndii lahndii ve  kalliiakelii

Title: hamiin se muhabbat hamiin se ladaaii
Lyrics: hamiin se muhabbat hamiin se ladaaii are maar daalaa duhaaii duhaaii abhii naasamajh ho uthaao na khanjar  2 kahiin mud na jaaye tumhaarii kalaaii   sitam aaj mujh par jo tum dhaa rahii ho ho badii khuubasuurat nazar aa rahii ho ye jii chaahataa hai ke khud jaan de duun 2 muhabbat men aaye na tum par buraaii   hamen husn kii har adaa hai gavaaraa hasiinon kaa gussaa bhii lagataa hai pyaaraa udhar tum ne tiirenazar dil pe maaraa  2 idhar hamane bhii jaan par chot khaaii   i may be wrong about this last line     karo khuun tum yuun na mere jigar kaa bas ik vaar kaafii hai tirchhii nazar kaa yahii pyaar ko aazamaane ke din hain  2 kiye jaao ham se yuun hii bevafaaii

Title: aap jinake qariib hote hain
Lyrics: aap jinake qariib hote hain  aap jinake qariib hote hain wo bade kushanasiib hote hain  jab tabiiyat kisii pe aatii hai maut ke din qariib hote hain  mujhase milanaa phir aapakaa milanaa aap kisako nasiib hote hain  zulm sahakar jo uf nahiin karate unake dil bhii ajiib hote hain

Title: sakhii morii niind nasaanii ho
Lyrics: sakhii morii niind nasaanii ho piy ko panth nihaarat sagarii rainabihaanii ho  sab sakhiyan mil sikh daii man ek na maanii ho bin dekhyaan kal naahii padat jiy aisi ghanii ho  ang chhiin vyaakul bhaii mukh piy piy baanii ho antar bedan birah kii wah piid na jaanii ho  jyu chaatak ghanaku ratai machharii jimi paanii ho miiraa vyaakul birahanii sudh budh visaraanii ho

Title: sansaar ke sab sukh tere
Lyrics: sansaar ke sab sukh tere aa pyaar kii baahon men palakon se main chun chun luungii kaante hain jo raahon men  jab gam tujhe gherenge  jab dard sataayegaa tab tab terii duniyaa men  aauungii davaa banake koii tere kvaabon ko jis vaqt jalaayegaa  maasuum vafaa merii  barasegii ghataa banake le luungii tere dil ko main is dil kii panaahon men   apanaa tujhe samajhaa hai siine se lagaa lenaa  takaliifon se ghabaraake daaman na chhudaa lenaa   samajhegaa hunar teraa naadaan zamaanaa kyaa har mod pe jiivan ke ek shamaa jalaa dii hai ab dard ka shikavaa kyuun  ab ashk bahaanaa kyaa hansane kii adaa tuune zakmon ko sikhaa dii hai ummiid jagaa dii hai maayuus nigaahon men

Title: gamezindagii kaa yaa rab na milaa koii kinaaraa
Lyrics: gamezindagii kaa yaa rab na milaa koii kinaaraa merii fikrebekaraan ne do jahaan ko chhaan maaraa  merii aarazuu ko bakshii terii har nazar ne rafat use bekaraan kare gaa mere shauq kaa sharaaraa  main kabhii ravaan davaan thaa kisii dashtebekudii men kisii  duur  kii  sadaa  ne  mujhe  payaar se pukaaraa  meraa zarf ye ki lekar gamebekaraan main chup huun na sukan se raaz paidaa na jabiin se aashakaaraa

Title: kyaa kah gaii kisii kii nazar kuchh na puuchhiye
Lyrics: kyaa kah gaii kisii kii nazar kuchh na puuchhiye kyaa kuchh huaa hai dil pe asar kuchh na puuchhiye  jhukatii huii nazar se wo uthataa huaa saa ishq wo nazar wo ishq magar kuchh na puuchhiye  wo dekhanaa kisii kaa kanakhiyon se baarbaar wo baarbaar usakaa asar kuchh na puuchhiye  roro ke kis tarah se katii raat kyaa kahen marmar ke kaise kii hai sahar kuchh na puuchhiye

Title: gariib jaan ke ham ko na tum dagaa denaa
Lyrics: gariba jana ke hama ko na tuma daga dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke  lagi hai chota kaleje pe umra bhara ke liye tadapa rahe hain muhabbata men ika nazara ke liye nazara milake muhabbata se muskara dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke  jahan men aur hamara kahan thikana hai tumhare dara se kahan utha ke hamako jana hai jo ho sake to muqaddara mera jaga dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke  mila qarara na dila ko kisi bahane se tumhari asa lagaye hain ik zamane se kabhi to apani mohabbata ka asara dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke  gita nazara tumhari mere dila ki bata kahati hai tumhari yada to dina rata satha rahati hai tumhari yada ko mushkila hai aba bhula dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke  milega kya jo ye duniya hamen satayegi tumhare bina to hamen mauta bhi na ayegi kisi ke pyara ko asan nahin mita dena tumhin ne dard diya hai tumhin dava dena gariba jana ke

Title: qissaaeshauq kahuun dard kaa afasaanaa kahuun
Lyrics: qissaaeshauq kahuun dard kaa afasaanaa kahuun dil ho qaabuu men to us shok se kyaakyaa na kahuun  kuchh hai ikaraar unhen apanii sitamagaarii kaa phir bhii isaraar hai mujhase ke main aisaa na kahuun   aap baithen to sahii aa ke mere paas kabhii ke main furaqat men hadiisedilediiwaanaa kahuun

Title: halke halke chalo saanvare
Lyrics: la halke halke chalo saanvare     pyaar kii mast havaaon men     dil ko ye dar hai pahalaa safar hai     in alabelii raahon me  he halke halke chalaa naa jaaye     pyaar kii mast havaaon men     jab tak hai dam chalo chalen ham     daal ke baahen baahon men threedots  la badhane lagii dil kii dhadakan     dol rahaa kyon meraa tan man haay meraa tan man he tuu hii bataa chain kahaan jab laagii lagan     dil bhii hai teraa jaan bhii hai terii     jab se basii ho nigaahon men threedots  he tuu manzil main raahii teraa     tere binaa kyaa jiinaa meraa kyaa jiinaa meraa la tuute kabhii naa chhute kabhii ye saath piyaa     pyaar kii qasam sang rahenge ham     niil gagan kii chhaanv men threedots

Title: ye aankhen uf yummaa ye surat uf yummaa
Film: jab pyar kisi se hota hai
Lyrics: rafii ye aankhen uf yummaa ye suurat uf yummaa pyaar kyuun naa hogaa ye adaayen  uf yummaa lataa ye mausam uf yummaa ye dhadakan uf yummaa kaise dil ko rokuun  koi thaamen uf yummaa rafii ye aankhen uf yummaa  tum dil ho dilarubaa ho  tum par jahaan fidaa ho     2 ham to hain kyaa kuchh bhii nahiin tum saa hasiin koi nahiin  tum to chaand kaa tukadaa ho  ye shokhii uf yummaa ye sharaarat uf yummaa pyaar kyuun naa hogaa  ye adaayen  uf yummaa ye aankhen uf yummaa lataa kab tak rahuun chhupaaye  siine men aag haay     2 jalane lagaa ye saaraa badan samajho zaraa ye dil kii agan tum jo milo chain aa jaaye  ye umangen uf yummaa ye tarangen uf yummaa kaise dil ko rokuun  koi thaamen uf yummaa

Title: bhaarat hamako jaan se pyaaraa hai
Lyrics: bhaarat hamako jaan se pyaaraa hai sabase nyaaraa gulistaan hamaaraa hai sadiyon se bhaarat bhuumi duniyaa kii shaan hai bhaarat maan kii rakshaa men jiivan qurbaan hai bhaarat hamako jaan se threedots  ujade nahiin apanaa chaman tute nahiin apanaa vatan duniyaa dhar dharatii kori barabaad naa karade koii mandir yahaan masjid vahaan hinduu yahaan muslim vahaan milate rahe ham pyaar se  jaago threedots  hindustaanii naam hamaaraa hai sabase pyaaraa desh hamaaraa hai janmabhuumi hai hamaarii shaan se kahenge ham sabhii to bhaaibhaai pyaar se rahenge ham hindustaanii naam hamaaraa hai  aasaam se gujaraat tak bangaal se mahaaraashhtr tak jhanakii sahii gun ek hai bhaashhaa alag sur ek hai kashmiir se madraas tak kah do sabhii ham ek hain aavaaz do ham ek hain  jago threedots

Title: tum aaye jo aaj mujhe yaad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa
Lyrics: tum aaye jo aaj mujhe yaad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa jaane kitane dinon ke baad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa  ye nainaa bin kaajal tarase barah mahiine baadal barase sunii rab ne merii fariyaad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa   threedots  aaj kii raat jo main so jatii khulatii aankh subah ho jaatii main to ho jaatii bas barbaad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa   threedots  main ne tumako aate dekhaa apanii jaan ko jaate dekhaa jaane phir kyaa huaa nahiin yaad galii men aaj chaand nikalaa   threedots

Title: maaerii yaad vo yaad vo aaerii
Lyrics: teriyaan meriyaan pull gayaa pull gayaa haar te jiit he e e maae kii karanaa main jiit nuun hove naa je miit hove naa je miit  bindiyaa lagaatii to kaanpatii thiin palaken maae rii chunniyaan sajaa ke wo detii vaade kal ke maae rii mere haathon men thaa usakaa haath thii chaashanii sii har usakii baat maae rii aap hii hansadee maae rii aap hii rondii maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii gallaan wo karadii maae rii akkhaan naal ladadii maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii  he maae rii  baarishon men lipat maan aatii thii vo chalake maae rii deriyaan ho jaaen to rotii halke halke maae rii phir se main rouun phir vo gaae thandi havaaen ban ke chhaae  maae rii heeraa wo  gaandii maae rii gidde wo paundii maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii  jannataan langadi maae rii mannataan mangadii maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii  ab kyaa kariun kaase kahuun e maae rii ab kyaa kariun kaase kahuun e maae rii  ho duniyaa paraaii chhod ke aajaa  jhuuthe saare naate tod ke aajaa saun rab dii  tujhe ik vaarii aajaa ab ke milen to honge naa judaa naa judaa naa judaa ho  hun te wo aaye koi te le aae maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii gallaan wo karadii maae rii akkhaan naal ladadii maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii  pull gaii meraa pyaar maae bas lage mahiine chaar maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii yaad vo aaye maae rii yaad vo aaye maae rii yaad vo yaad vo aae rii  ab kyaa karuun kaase kahuun e maae rii ab kyaa karuun kaase kahuun e maae rii

Title: o raat ke musaafir chandaa zaraa bataa de
Lyrics: o raat ke musaafir chandaa zaraa bataa de meraa qusuur kyaa hai tuu faisalaa sunaa de  hai bhuul koii dil kii aankhon kii yaa kataa hai kuchh bhii nahiin to phir kyon mujhase koii khafaa hai manzuur hai vo mujhako jo kuchh bhii tuu sazaa de meraa qusuur kyaa hai   threedots  dil pe kisii ko apane qaabuu nahiin rahaa hai ye raaz mere dil se aankhon ne hii kahaa hai aankhon ne jo hai dekhaa dil kis tarah bhulaa de meraa qusuur kyaa hai   threedots  o chaand aasamaan ke dam bhar zamiin pe aajaa bhuulaa huaa hai raahii tuu raastaa dikhaa jaa bhatakii huii hai naiyaa saahil ise dikhaa de meraa qusuur kyaa hai   threedots

Title: bemuravvat bevafaa
Lyrics: dardedil dardevafaa dardetamannaa kyaa hai aap kyaa jaanen mohabbat kaa takaazaa kyaa hai  bemuravvat bevafaa begaanaaedil aap hain 2 aap maane yaa na maane mere qaatil aap hain bemuravvat bevafaa  aap se shikavaa hai mujh ko gair se shikavaa nahiin 2 jaanatii huun dil men rakh lene ke qaabil aap hain bemuravvat bevafaa  saans letii huun to yuun mahasuus hotaa hai mujhe 2 jaise mere dil kii har dhadakan men shaamil aap hain bemuravvat bevafaa  gam nahiin jo laakh tuufaanon se takaraanaa pade 2 main vo kashtii huun ki jis kashtii kaa saahil aap hain  bemuravvat bevafaa begaanaaedil aap hain aap maane yaa na maane mere qaatil aap hain bemuravvat bevafaa

Title: tum gagan ke chandramaa ho main dharaa kii dhuul huun
Lyrics: tum gagan ke chandramaa ho main dharaa kii dhuul huun tum praanon ke devataa ho main samarpit phuul huun tum ho puujaa main pujaarii tum sudhaa main pyaas huun  tum mahaasaagar kii siimaa main kinaare kii lahar tum mahaasangiit ke svar main adhuurii saans huun tum ho kaayaa main huun chhaayaa tum kasam main bhuul huun  tum ushhaa kii laalimaa ho bhor kaa sinduur ho mere praanon kaa ho gunjan mere man kaa mayuur ho tum ho puujaa main pujaarii tum sudhaa main pyaas huun

Title: kuchh to ho chaaraaegam baat ko yaksuu ho jaao
Lyrics: kuchh to ho chaaraaegam baat ko yaksuu ho jaao tum kafaa ho to azal hii ko raazii kar luun  aur phir kisako pasand aayegaa viiraanaaedil gam se maanaa bhii ki is ghar ko main khaalii kar luun  phenk dene kii koii chiiz nahiin fazalokamaal warnaa haasid terii kaatir main ye bhii kar luun  dil hii milataa nahiin sifalon se vagaranaa shiblii kuub guzare falaqbos se jo yaarii kar luun

Title: bharii duniyaa men aakhir dil ko samajhaane kahaan jaaen
Lyrics: bharii duniyaa men aakir dil ko samajhaane kahaan jaaen muhabbat ho gaii jinako vo diivaane kahaan jaaen  lage hain shammaa par pahare zamaane kii nigaahon ke jinhen jalane kii hasarat hai vo paravaane kahaan jaaen  sunaanaa bhii jinhen mushkil chhupaanaa bhii jinhen mushkil zaraa tuu hii bataa ai dil vo afasaane kahaan jaaen

Title: biite hue lamhon kii kasak saath to hogii
Lyrics: abhii alavidaa mat kaho doston na jaane phir kahaan mulaaqaat ho kyonki  biite hue lamhon kii kasak saath to hogii kvaabon men hii ho chaahe mulaaqaat to hogii  ye pyaar ye duubii huii rangiin fizaaen ye chahare ye nazaare ye javaan rut ye havaaen ham jaaen kahiin inakii mahak saath to hogii biite hue lamhon kii threedots  phuulon kii tarah dil men basaae hue rakhanaa yaadon ke chiraagon ko jalaae hue rakhanaa lambaa hai safar is men kahiin raat to hogii biite hue lamhon kii threedots  ye saath guzaare hue lamhaat kii daulat jazbaat kii daulat ye kayaalaat kii daulat kuchh paas na ho paas ye saugaat to hogii biite hue lamhon kii threedots

Title: chandan kaa palanaa resham kii dorii
Lyrics: sangiit hai shakti iishvar kii har sur men base hain raam raagii ko sunaaye raag madhur rogii ko mile aaraam  ho chandan kaa palanaa resham kii dorii jhuulaa jhulaauun nindiyaa ko torii chandan kaa palanaa   threedots  so jaa tuu aise morii sajaniyaa so jaa tuu aise morii sajaniyaa sajiyaa pe soye jaise dulhaniyaa chandaa kaa tiikaa maathe lagaauun taaron kii maalaa tujhako pahanaauun taaron kii maalaa tujhako pahanaauun tohe sulaauun gaa gaa ke lorii jhuulaa jhuulaauun nindiyaa ko torii chandan kaa palanaa   threedots   uunche gagan se koii bulaaye laayiin hain pariyaan dolaa sajaaye sajan se milane duur chalii jaa udake tuu nindiyaa phurr chalii jaa udake tuu nindiyaa phurr chalii jaa chandaa pukaare aajaa chakorii jhuulaa jhuulaauun nindiyaa ko torii chandan kaa palanaa   threedots

Title: morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo
Lyrics: morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo2 main raakhuun pal kan kor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo jaako dekhuun wo ban jaae natakhat nand kishor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo  paatpaat men bansii baaje sur laharii par juganu naache shyaam ke rang men rain rangii hai2 sapane bhae chakor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo  chhal na sakoge mohe muraarii main sab jaanuun tehuu tihaarii jii bhar khelo aankh micholii2 gopiyan ke chitachor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo  jaae kahuungaa main raadhaa se morii bane na ab kaanhaa se apane man kii wo manawaae2 baandh priit kii dor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo main raakhuun pal kan kor morii bhagati men shyaam samaayo2

Title: do nainon men aansuu bhare hain
Lyrics: do nainon men aansuu bhare hain nindiyaa kaise samaae  duubiiduubii aankhon men sapanon ke saae raat bhar apane hain din men paraae kaise nainon men nindiyaa samaae  do nainon men aansuu bhare hain nindiyaa kaise samaae  jhuuthe tere vaadon pe baras bitaae zindagii to kaatii ye raat kat jaae  kaise nainon men nindiyaa samaaethreedots do aansuu men tthreedots aansuu bhare hain nindiyaa kaise samaae

Title: ye kyaa huaa kaise huaa kaba huaa kyon huaa jaba huaa taba huaa
Lyrics: ye kyaa huaa kaise huaa kaba huaa  ab kyaa sunaaen  ye kyaa hua kaise hua kaba hua  kyuun hua jaba hua taba hua   2 o chhodo ye naa socho ye kyaa huathreedots  hama kyuun shikavaa karen jhuuthaa kyaa hua jo dila tuutaa  2 shiishe kaa khilaunaa thaa kuchha naa kuchha to honaa thaa hua ye kyaa huathreedots  ai dila chala piikara jhuumen inhiin galiyon men ghuumen  2 yahaan tujhe khonaa thaa badanaama honaa thaa hua ye kyaa huathreedots  hamane jo dekhaa thaa sunaa thaa kyaa bataaain vo kyaa thaa  2 sapanaa salonaa thaa khatma to honaa thaa huaa ye kyaa huathreedots

Lyrics: yaad kiyaa dil ne kahaan ho tum jhuumatii bahaar hai kahaan ho tum pyaar se pukaar lo jahaan ho tum   2  o kho gaye ho aaj kis khayaal men  o dil fansaa hai bebasii ke jaal men      2 matalabii jahaan meharabaan ho tum yaad kiyaa dil ne kahaan ho tum pyaar se pukaar lo jahaan ho tum   2  o raat dhal chukii hai subah ho gayii o mai tumhaarii yaad leke kho gayii          2 ab to merii daastaan ho tum yaad kiyaa dil ne kahaan ho tum pyaar se pukaar lo jahaan ho tum   2  o tum to mere zindagii ke baag ho o tum to merii raah ke chiraag ho     2 mere liye aasamaan ho tum yaad kiyaa dil ne kahaan ho tum pyaar se pukaar lo jahaan ho tum   2

Title: but bane baithe hain kuchh baat banaate bhii nahiin
Lyrics: but bane baithe hain kuchh baat banaate bhii nahiin aur ye gussaa ke main ruuthuun to manaate bhii nahiin  aage aaiine ke baithe hain jhukaaye nazaren chot khaate bhii nahiin chot lagaate bhii nahiin  kuchh wafaa kuchh hai hayaa jaan hai kis mushqil men dil se jaate bhii nahiin aankhon men aate bhii nahiin  lutf marane kaa dikhaayen kise furaqat men amiir wo nahiin aate to ham jaan se jaate bhii nahiin   kuub pardaa hai ke chilaman se lage baithe hain saaf chhupate bhii nahiin saamane aate bhii nahiin

Title: ye jiivan hai is jiivan kaa yahii hai yahii hai yahii hai rang ruup
Lyrics: ye jiivan hai  is jiivan kaa yahii hai yahii hai yahii hai rang ruup 2 thode gam hain thodii khushiyaan yahii hai yahii hai yahii hai chhaanv dhuup ye jiivan hai threedots  ye naa socho isamen apanii haar hai ki jiit hai   2 use apanaa lo jo bhii jiivan kii riit hai ye zid chhodo yun naa todo har pal ek darpan hai ye jiivan hai threedots  dhan se naa duniyaa se ghar se na dvaar se saanson kii dor bandhii hai priitam ke pyaar se duniyaa chhuute par naa tuute ye kaisaa bandhan hai ye jiivan hai is jiivan kaa yahii hai yahii hai yahii hai rang ruup thode gam hain  thodii khushiyan yahii hai yahii hai yahii hai chhaanv dhuup ye jiivan hai

Title: main diip jalaaye baithaa huun
Lyrics: main diip jalaaye baithaa huun main diip jalaaye baithaa huun dam tod gaii lau taaron kii dam tod gaii lau taaron kii main nain bichhaaye baithaa huun  in niind se bojhal aankhon men tasaviir terii laharaatii hai maazii ke hasiin lamhon kii kasak rahrah ke mujhe tadapaatii hai2 main pyaar bharii un yaadon ko2 siine se lagaaye baithaa huun main diip jalaaye threedots  siine me liye ik gam kaa jahaan ye raat abhii so jaayegii berang samaan chhaa jaayegaa dhuundhalii sii fizaa ho jaayegii2 maayus huii jaatii hai nazar2 main aas lagaaye baithaa huun main diip jalaaye threedots

Title: tuu chandaa main chaandanii ho terii merii priit hai
Lyrics: la tuu chandaa main chaandanii     ho terii merii priit hai           3 ra tuu jiivan kii raaginii     ho terii merii priit hai           3  la aaj hamaaraa piyaa milan madhur hai     ek hai taaraa ek chandar hai     taaraa chandar rahen saath re     ho terii merii priit hai           3  ra bhanvare kalii kii tarah sang sang rahanaa     man kii kathaa sajanii nainon se kahanaa     bhanvaraa kalii rahen saath re     ho terii merii priit hai           3  la sapanon kii sej par tumako sulaauungii     charanon pe tere raajaa ankhiyaan bichhaauungii     ankhiyaan charan rahen saath re     ho terii merii priit hai           3  la    tuu chandaa main chaandanii lara ho terii merii priit hai        3

Title: gum hai kisii ke pyaar men dil subah shaam
Lyrics: kishor  gum hai kisii ke pyaar men dil subah shaam par tumhen likh nahiin paauun main usakaa naam haay raam haay raam randhiir  kuchh likhaa rekhaa  haan randhiir  kyaa likhaa  lataa   gum hai kisii ke pyaar men dil subah shaam par tumhen likh nahiin paauun main usakaa naam haay raam haay raam rekhaa   achchhaa aage kyaa likhuun randhiir  aage   kishor  sochaa hai ek din main usase milake kaha daaluun apane sab haal dil ke aur kar duun jiivan usake havaale phir chhod de chaahe apanaa banaa le ab to jaise bhii meraa ho anjaam  gum hai kisii ke pyaar men dil subah shaam par tumhen likh nahiin paauun main usakaa naam  haay raam haay raam randhiir  likh liyaa rekha  haan randhiir  zaraa padhake to sunaao  lataa chaahaa hai tumane jis baavarii ko vo bhii sajanavaa chaahe tumhiin ko nainaa uthaae to pyaar samajho palaken jhukaa de to iqaraar samajho rakhatii hai kab se chhupaa chhupaa ke randhiir  kyaa lataa  apane honthon men piyaa teraa naam  gum hai kisii ke pyaar men dil subah shaam par tumhen likh nahiin paauun main usakaa naam haay raam haay raam

Title: ghar se nikalate hii kuchh duur chalate hii
Lyrics: ghar se nikalate hii kuchh duur chalate hii   raste men hai usakaa ghar  kal subah dekhaa to bal banatii vo  khidakii men aayii nazar		2  maasuum chaharaa niichii nigaahen bholii sii ladakii bholii adaayen na apsaraa hai na vo parii hai lekin yah usakii jaaduugarii hai diivaanaa kar ke vo ek rang bhar ke vo sharmaa ke dekhe jidhar ghar se nikalate hii kuchh duur chalate hii  raste men hai usakaa ghar threedots  karataa huun usake ghar ke main phere hansane lage hain ab dost mere sach kah rahaa huun usakii kasam hai main phir bhii khush huun bas ek gam hai jise pyaar karataa huun main jisape marataa huun usako nahiin hai khabar ghar se nikalate hii kuchh duur chalate hii  raste men hai usakaa ghar threedots  ladakii hai jaise koii pahelii kal jo milii mujhako usakii sahelii mainne kahaa usako jaake yah kahanaa achchhaa nahiin hai yuun duur rahanaa kal shaam nikale vo ghar se tahalane ko milanaa jo chaahe agar ghar se nikalate hii kuchh duur chalate hii  raste men hai usakaa ghar threedots

Title: usako jaane na do  dil abhii bharaa nahiin
Lyrics: usako jaane na do jaake usase kaho jaae naa ruuth ke chain yuun luut ke roko usako gher ke jaae na munh pher ke dil abhii bharaa nahiin  roko naa tum mujhe hai kasam ye tujhe jaane do tum abhii aauungii phir kabhii samajhoge naa bebasii bologe tum to yahii dil abhii bharaa nahiin  baaton se diivaanaa diivaanaa karatii hai aankhon se mastaanaa mastaanaa karatii hai jaagii hai soii hai mastii men khoii hai dekho kyaa lagatii hai vo dilarubaa dilarubaa usako jaane na do threedots  chaahat men kyuun aise tum aahen bharate ho chhodo jii chhodo jii paagalapan karate ho tum jo diivaane ho bilkul anjaane ho chhedo na aise mujhe merii jaan roko naa tum na na na na usako jaane na do threedots

Title: soye hue hain chaand aur taare
Lyrics: soe hue hain chaand aur taare  aaj kii raat andhiyaarii 2 tum baithii ho paas hamaare soii hai phulawaarii 2  jin aankhon men laaj bharii thii vo bhii hain matawaarii 2 ab to itanaa kah do pyaarii main huun tumhaarii main huun tumhaarii  ikduuje ko paake hamtum bahut mile sharamaake hamtum 2 yuun hii rahen to rah jaaengii man kii baaten man men saarii ab to itanaa kah do pyaarii main huun tumhaarii main huun tumhaarii  ye chup tumako tadapaaegii phir ye raat nahiin aaegii 2 premmilan kii in ghadiyon par laakh bahaaren vaarii 2 ab to itanaa kah do pyaarii main huun tumhaarii main huun tumhaarii  soe hue hain threedots

Title: jiyenge magar muskuraa na sakenge mukesh gazal
Lyrics: jiyenge magar muskuraa na sakenge  ke ab zindagii men mohabbat nahiin hai  labon pe taraane ab aa na sakenge  ke ab zindagii men mohabbat nahiin hai   bahaaren chaman men jab aya karengii  nazaaron kii mahafil sajaaya karengii  nazaaren bhi hamako hansaa na sakenge  ke ab zindagii men mohabbat nahiin hai   javani jo laayegii savan ki raaten  zamaanaa karegaa mohabbat kii baaten  magar ham ye savan manaa na sakenge  ke ab zindagii men mohabbat nahiin hai

Title: tumane rakh to lii tasviir hamaarii  rang badalate hue
Lyrics: tumane rakh to lii tasviir hamaarii par ye na ho ki jis tarah mausam badalataa hai vaise hii tumako bhii dekhuun rang badalate hue tumane rakh to lii threedots  hamane rakh to lii tasviir tumhaarii par yuun bhii hai ki jis tarah mausam badalataa hai tasviiron ko bhii dekhaa hai rang badalate hue  aaj to milakar yaad rahii kaash ye kal bhii yaad rahe baat to jab hai jaanejahaan dhyaan meraa mere baad rahe ban to baithe hain taqadiir hamaarii hamane rakh to lii threedots  tum jaise in raahon men kitane chale aur chhuut gae kitane hasiinon ke vaade dil kii tarah tuut gae kaash na tuute zanjiir hamaarii tumane rakh to lii threedots

Title: meraa shaayar hai tuu meraa nagmaa  dil men tujhe rakh liyaa ajii shukriyaa
Lyrics: meraa shaayar hai tuu meraa nagmaa hai tuu merii jannat hai tuu merii duniyaa hai tuu dil men tujhe rakh liyaa ajii shukriyaa  merii dhadakan hai tuu merii chaahat hai tuu merii manzil hai tuu merii kismat hai tuu pyaar mujhe de diyaa teraa shukriyaa  janmon se pyaaraa tuu hai sanam tuu meraa jiivan meraa janam vaadon kaa kyaa hai kasamon kaa kyaa tuu meraa vaadaa merii kasam tuu meraa dil hai tuu jaan hai jiivan pe teraa ehasaan hai saanson kaa jiivan se khushbuu kaa phuulon se dilabara jo rishtaa hai apanaa hai rishtaa vahii meraa shaayar hai tuu threedots  rishtaa hamaaraa janmon kaa hai pyaaraa milan do ruuhon kaa hai lagataa hai aisaa paa ke tujhe ye pyaar apanaa sadiyon kaa hai jitane janam bhii hamane lie ik duusare ke ban ke jie saagar ne maujon ne chandaa ne taaron ne dharatii ne ambar ne dekhaa hai apanaa milan meraa shaayar hai tuu threedots

Title: chullhe agg na ghade vichch paanii
Lyrics: chullhe agg na ghade de vichch paanii o chhadeyaan dii juun burii oye rabbaa oye rabbaa rabbaa saadii vii banaa de zindagaanii ve chhadeyaan dii juun burii  laaraa lappaa laaraa lappaa laayii rakhadaa addii tappaa addii tappaa laayii rakhadaa  kam kaar karake jaddon vii ghar aaiidaa maar maar phuunkaan chullhe vichch thak jaaiidaa rotii paindiie kachchii gillii khaanii rotii paindiie kachchii gillii khaanii oye rabbaa oye rabbaa rabbaa saadii vii banaa de koii raanii ke chhadeyaan dii juun burii ke chhadeyaan dii juun burii chullhethreedots laaraa lappaathreedots  dassiye kahaanii kiinve chhadeyaan de dil dii ke saanuun taan ganwaadanaan ton agg vii na miladii dassiye kahaanii kiinve chhadeyaan de dil dii saanuun taan ganwaadanaan ton agg vii na miladii je chhade dii maan mar jaave o kallaa baithaa sog manaave koii janaanii daradii ode ghar pittan vii na aave dassiye kahaanii kiinve chhadeyaan de dil dii ke saanuun taan ganwaadanaan ton agg vii na miladii saade laad dii lavaa de kanjii kaanii o chhadeyaan dii juun burii oye rabbaa oye rabbaa rabbaa saadii vii banaa de koii raaniithreedots laaraa lappaathreedots  ikko ikk votii rabbaa chhadeyaan nuun  mangadaa saanuun  na kayaal rabbaa gore kaale rang daa ikko ikk ikko ikk ikko ikk ikko ikk ikko ikk saareyaan vaaste ikko chaahe nanvii hove chaahe koii puraanii o chhadeyaan dii juun burii  rabbaa saadii vii banaa de koii raaniithreedots laaraa lappaathreedots

Title: pyaar diivaanaa hotaa hai mastaanaa hotaa hai
Lyrics: pyaar divaanaa hotaa hai mastaanaa hotaa hai har khushii se har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai pyaar divaanaathreedots  shamaa kahe paravaane se pare chalaa jaa  merii tarah jal jaayegaa yahaan nahiin aa   2 vo nahiin sunataa usako jal jaanaa hotaa hai har khushii se har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai  rahe koii sau paradon men dare sharam se  nazar ajii laakh churaaye koii sanam se     2  aa hii jaataa hai jisape dil aanaa hotaa hai har khushii se har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai  suno kisii shaayar ne ye kahaa bahut khuub manaa kare duniyaa lekin mere mahabuub    2 vo chhalak jaataa hai jo paimaanaa hotaa hai har khushii se har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai  pyaar divaanaa hotaa hai mastaanaa hotaa hai har khushii se har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai

Title: taariif us kudaa kii
Lyrics: taariif us kudaa kii jis ne jahaan banaayaa kaisii zamiin banaayii kyaa aasamaan banaayaa  mittii se bel buute kyaa khushnumaa ugaaye pahanaa ke sabz khillat unako javaan banaayaa  suuraj se ham ne payii garmii bhii raushanii bhii kyaa khuub chashmaa tuu ne ae maharabaan banaayaa  har chiiz se hai us kii kaariigarii tapakatii ye kaarkhaanaa tuu ne kab raigaan banaayaa

Title: mhaarii surataa suhaagan naar
Lyrics: mhaarii surataa suhaagan naar suurat mhaaraa shyaam so lagii suurat diinaanaath so lagii lagii rii mhaarii surataa suhaagan naar   aisaa varane kaay varuure  janamii aur mar jaaye var varuungii ek saanvaro jii mhaaro juudo mar man ho jaaye suurat mhaaraa shyaam so lagii threedots  raam naam ko chuud lo beruu prem ko sir mo saar swaar nakave sar hari naam kiije utar chalo bele paar suurat mhaaraa shyaam so lagii threedots   surataa chalii jahaan le chalii rii krishna naam aadhaar avinaashii rii sobate jii miiraa kare chhe pukaar

Title: kah rahiin hain dhadakanen pukaar kar
Lyrics: g kah rahiin hain dhadakanen pukaar kar chupake chupake dhiire dhiire pyaar kar t tum ko paayaa apane dil ko haar kar chhup na jaanaa zindagii sanvaar kar  g hasiin raat jag uthii machal rahii hai chaandanii 2 chaman chaman bahaar hai mere sanam  nigaahon men kumaar hai mere sanam sadqe tere dil ke mere aisi niind se na hoshiyaar kar chupake chupake dhiire dhiire pyaar kar kah rahiin hain dhadakanen pukaar kar chupake chupake dhiire dhiire pyaar kar  t bhulaa bhii de kataaon ko hansaa bhii de fizaaon ko  2 nahiin hai bas men dil meraa o naazaniin kareeb aa nazar mila o naazaniin tu jo kahe laa duun abhii aasamaan se chaand ko utaar kar chhup na jaanaa zindagii sanvaar kar  g kah rahiin hain dhadakanen pukaar kar chupake chupake dhiire dhiire pyaar kar

Title: suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par
Lyrics: suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par bhiige bhiige aansuon kii taar par ek giit sun rahii hai zindagii ek giit gaa rahii hai zindagii suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par threedots  pyaar jise kahate hain khel hai khilonaa hai aaj ise paanaa hai kal ise khonaa hai suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par bhiige bhiige aansuon kii taar par ek sur milaa rahii hai zindagii ek sur vbhulaa rahii hai zindagii suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par threedots  koii kalii gaatii hai koii kalii rotii hai koii aansuu paanii hai koii aansuu motii hai suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par bhiige bhiige aansuon kii taar par kisii ko hansaa rahii hai zindagii kisii ko rulaa rahii hai zindagii suunii suunii saans kii sitaar par threedots

Title: pitu maatu sahaayak svaaamii sakhaa
Lyrics: filmnonfilm  pitu maatu sahaayak svaamii sakhaa  tum hii ek naath hamaare ho jin ke kachhu ur aadhaar nahiin un ke tum hii rakhavaare ho pitu maatu sahaayak svaamii sakhaa threedots  sab bhaanti sadaa sukh dayak ho duhkh durdam naashan haare ho pratipaal karo sagare jag ko atishay karunaa gun dhaare ho pitu maatu sahaayak svaamii sakhaa threedots  shubh shaanti niketan prem niket man mandir ke ujiyaare ho is jiivan ke tum jiivan ho in praanan ke tum pyaare ho  tum to prabhu paaye pratap hari kahiye ke ab aur sahaare ho pitu maatu sahaayak svaamii sakhaa threedots

Title: puuchhataa jaa mere marakaz se guzarane waale
Lyrics: puuchhataa jaa mere marakaz se guzarane waale kyaa guzaratii hai terii jaan pe marane waale  yahii iqaraar yahii kaul yahii waadaa thaa o dagaabaaz har ek baar muqarane waale  aap mahashar men bane kaul ke sachche kyaa kuub ungaliyaan utthengii wo haay muqarane waale  daag kahate hain jinhen dekhiye wo baithe hain aapakii jaan pe har raat ke marane waale

Title: terii aankhon kii chaahat men to main sab kuchh lutaa duungaa
Lyrics: terii aankhon kii chaahat men to main sab kuchh lutaa duungaa muhabbat kaise kii jaatii muhabbat kaise kii jaatii haan duniyaa ko dikhaa duungaa terii aankhon kii chaahat men threedots  tere naazuq hasiin qadamon ke niiche hamasafar mere	2 are o hamasafar mere jahaan hogaa koii kaantaa jahaan hogaa koii kaantaa vahaan main dil bichhaa duungaa terii aankhon kii chaahat men threedots  tamannaa hai ke roshan ho terii duniyaa terii mahafil 2 terii duniyaa terii mahafil ujaalaa mil sake tujhako ujaalaa mil sake tujhako to main ghar bhii jalaa duungaa terii aankhon kii chaahat men threedots  bahaaron chiiz kyaa hai phuul kaliyaan kisako kahate hain	2 ke kaliyaan kisako kahate hain lo meraa salaam to main lo meraa salaam to main teraa jiivan sajaa duungaa  terii aankhon kii chaahat men to main sab kuchh lutaa duungaa muhabbat kaise kii jaatii muhabbat kaise kii jaatii haan duniyaa ko dikhaa duungaa terii aankhon kii chaahat men threedots

Title: roshan jamaaleyaar terii anjuman tamaam
Lyrics: roshan jamaaleyaar terii anjuman tamaam dahakaa huaa hai aatishegul se chaman tamaam  hairat guruurehusn pe shokii se iztaraab dil ne bhii tere siikh liye hain chalam tamaam  allaa re jismeyaar kii kuubii ke kudbakud rangiiniyon men duub gayaa pairahan tamaam  dekho to husneyaar kii jaaduunigaariyaan behosh ik nazar men huii anjuman tamaam

Title: dil hai chhotaa saa chhotii sii aashaa mastii bhare mana kii
Lyrics: dila hai chhotaa saa chhotii sii aashaa mastii bhare mana kii bholii sii aashaa chaanda taaron ko chhuune kii aashaa aasamaanon men udane kii ashaa   2 dila hai chhotaa saa chotii sii aasha 	 mahaka jaauun main aaja to aise phuula bagiyaa men mahake hai jaise baadalon kii main odhuun chunariyaa jhuuma jaauun main banake bavariyaa apanii chotii men baandha luun duniyaa 	 erero ere ereyo threedots erero ere ereyo threedots 	 svarga sii dharatii khila rahe jaise meraa mana bhii to khila rahaa aise koyala kii tarahaa gaane ko aramaan machhalii kii tarahaa machale ye aramaan javaanii hai laayii rangiina sapanaa dila hai chhotaa saa threedots 	 dila hai chhotaa saa chhotii sii aashaa mastii bhare mana kii bholii sii aashaa chaanda taaron ko chhuune kii aashaa aasamaanon men udane kii aashaa dila hai chhotaa saa threedots

Title: itanaa to yaad hai mujhe ki unase mulaaqaat huii
Lyrics: itanaa to yaad hai mujhe o itanaa to yaad hai mujhe haay itanaa to yaad hai mujhe ke unase mulaaqaat huii baad men jaane kyaa huaa naa jaane kyaa baat huii  saare vafaa ke karz apane chukaake kisii se dil lagaake chalaa aayaa nazaren milaake niind apanii ganvaake kasak dil men basaake chalaa aayaa din to guzar jaayegaa kyaa hogaa jab raat huii itanaa to yaad hai mujhe   threedots  maare hayaa ke main to aankhen jhukaake zaraa daaman bachaake chalii aayii pardaa hataake unakii baaton men aake unhen suurat dikhaake chalii aayii kis se shiqaayat karuun sharaarat mere saath huii itanaa to yaad hai mujhe   threedots  thii ik kahaanii pahale ye zindagaanii tumhen dekhaa to jiinaa mujhe aayaa dilbarojaanii sharm se paanii paanii huii main bas pasiinaa mujhe aayaa aise main bhiig gayii jaise ke barasaat huii itanaa to yaad hai mujhe   threedots

Title: dil kho gayaa kyaa ho gayaa
Lyrics: o o dil kho gayaa kyaa ho gayaa meraa dil kahiin se laa do sanam laa do dil kho gayaa threedots  o kyuun pyaar kiyaa kyuun dil diyaa ab dil kahaan se laa duun sanam laa duun o dil kho gayaa threedots  pyaar kiyaa nahiin maine soch samajhake  ho gayaa jaane kaise tumase mil ke meraa chain gayaa kyaa ho gayaa meraa chain kahiin se laa do sanam laa do o kyuun pyaar kiyaa threedots  vaise to tere jaisaa meraa bhii haal hai pyaar bhii kaise kaise karataa kamaal hai meraa hosh gayaa kyaa ho gayaa meraa hosh kahiin se laa do sanam laa do dil kho gayaa threedots

Title: yuun rah rah kar hamen tarasaaye
Lyrics: yuun na rah rah kar hamen tarasaaye aaye aa jaaye aa jaaye  phir vahii daanistaa thokar khaaye phir merii aagosh men gir jaaye  merii duniyaa muntazir hai aapakii apanii duniyaa chod kar aa jaaye  ye havaa saagar ye halkii chaandanii jii men aataa hai yahiin mar jaaye

Title: aaj hamaare dil men ajab ye ulajhan hai
Lyrics: aaj hamaare dil men ajab ye ulajhan hai gaane baithe gaanaa saamane samadhan hai ham kuchh aaj sunaayen ye unakaa bhii man hai gaane baithe gaanaa saamane samadhan hai  kaano kii baaliyaan chaand suuraj lage ye banaaras kii saadii khuub saje raaz kii baat bataayen samadhiijii ghaayal hain aaj bhii jab samadhan kii khanakatii paayal hai  honthon kii ye hansii aankhon kii ye hayaa itanii maasuum to hotii hai bas duaa raaz kii baat bataayen samadhii khush qisamat haib laxmii hai samadhan jii jinase ghar jannat hai  aaj hamaare dil men ajab ye ulajhan hai saamane samadhiijii gaa rahii samadhan hai hamako jo hai nibhaanaa vo naazuk bandhan hai saamane samadhiijii gaa rahii samadhan hai  merii chhaayaa hai jo aapake ghar chalii sapanaa ban ke merii palakon men hai palii raaz kii baat bataayen ye puunjii jiivan kii shobhaa aaj se hai ye aapake aangan kii

Title: mhaaro pranaama baanke bihaarii jii
Lyrics: mhaaro pranaama baanke bihaarii jii   mora mukuta maathyaan tilaka biraajyaan  kundala alakaan kaarii jii 1  adhara madhura dhara bansii bajaavaan  riijha rijhaavaan brajanaarii jii   yaan chhaba dekhyaan mohyaan miiraan  mohana girivaradhaarii jii 2

Title: unake ik jaan nisaar ham bhii hain
Lyrics: unake ik jaan nisaar ham bhii hain hain jahaan sau hazaar ham bhii hain  tum bhii bechain ham bhii hain bechain tum bhii ho beqaraar ham bhii hain  sharm samajhe tere tagaaful ko waah kyaa hoshiyaar ham bhii hain  kaun saa dil hai jisamen daag nahiin ishq kii yaadagaar ham bhii hain   ai falaq kah to kyaa iraadaa hai aish ke khwaastagaar ham bhii hain  shahar khaalii kiye dukaan kaisii ek hii baadaakwaar ham bhii hain  tum agar apanii guun ke ho maashuuq apane matalab ke yaar ham bhii hain  jisane chaahaa phansaa liyaa hamako dilabaron ke shikaar ham bhii hain  aaii mayakaane se ye kis kii sadaa laao yaaron ke yaar ham bhii hain  le hii to legii dil nigaah terii har tarah hoshiyaar ham bhii hain  gair kaa puuchhiye na haal hamase unake jalase ke yaar ham bhii hain

Title: jhukii jhukii sii nazar beqaraar hai ki nahiin
Lyrics: jhukii jhukii sii nazar beqaraar hai ki nahiin  dabaa dabaa saa sahii dil men pyaar hai ki nahiin threedots   tuu apane dil kii javaan dhadakanon ko gin ke bataa threedots merii tarah teraa dil beqaraar hai ki nahiin threedots  dabaa dabaa saa sahii dil men pyaar hai ki nahiin  jhukii jhukii si nazar   vo pal ke jis men mohabbat javaan hotii hai us ek pal kaa tujhe intazaar hai ki nahiin threedots dabaa dabaa saa sahii dil men pyaar hai ki nahiin  jhukii jhukii si nazar   terii ummiid pe thukaraa rahaa huun duniyaa ko threedots tujhe bhii apane pe ye aitabaar hai ki nahiin threedots dabaa dabaa saa sahii dil men pyaar hai ki nahiin  jhukii jhukii sii nazar

Title: dhaaii dina na javaanii punjabi song
