Lyrics: dhaaii dina na javaanii naala chaladii kuratii malamala dii atharii terii javaanii kudie tere basa naa rahendii saade dila te laannuu laave tere hathaa dii mehendii nii tuun sulphe dii laata vaanga hiladi kuratii malamaladii  dhaaii dina na javaanii naala chaladii 2 kuratii malamala dii  tere kolon turanaa sikhe panja dariyaa de paanii yaa tuu koii hiira sassiiyaa kooii phuulaa raanii  nii tuu kudiyaan  bicha nahii  raladii kuratii malamala dii  dhaaii dina na javaanii naala chaladii kuratii malamala dii  patalii kuratii de vichon vii ruupa jhaatiyaan maare anga anga tiisadaa rahendaa luun  luun kare ishaare o jutii khala dii marodaa nahiin sehadii kuratii malamala dii  dhaaii dina na javaanii naala chaladii 2 kuratii malamala dii

Title: kaahe ko raad machaayii
Lyrics: kaahe ko raad machaaii 2 chhodo bhii yah nithuraaii kaahe ko raad machaaii 2  man ke bair ko moh se badalo duhkh bhii sukh ban jaayii 2 isii moh men apanaa paraayaa donon kii hai bhalaaii 2 kaahe ko raad machaaii 2  har pal nai bahaar dekho jagat shringaar 2 khilii kalii murajhaa ke bikatii bandhii kalii muskaaii 2 priit kii riit 4 priit kii riit nibhaanaa siikho bigadaa kaam banaanaa siikho 2 jaake daar lipat kar jhuumii karake prem sagaaii 2 kaahe ko raad machaaii 2

Title: jalate hain jis ke liye terii aankhon ke diye
Lyrics: jalate hain jisake liye terii aankhon ke diye dhuundh laayaa huun vahii giit main tere liye jalate hain jisake liye  dard banake jo mere dil men rahaa dhal naa sakaa jaaduu banake terii aankhon men rukaa chal naa sakaa aaj laayaa huun vahii giit main tere liye jalate hain jisake liye  dil men rakh lenaa ise haathon se ye chhuute na kahiin giit naazuk hai meraa shiishe se bhii tuute na kahiin gunagunaauungaa yahii giit main tere liye jalate hain jisake liye  jab talak naa ye tere ras ke bhare honthon se mile yuun hii aavaaraa phiregaa ye terii zulfon ke tale gaaye jaauungaa yahii giit main tere liye jalate hain jisake liye

Title: saavan kaa mahiinaa pavan kare sor
Lyrics: mu saavan kaa mahiinaa pavan kare sor la pavan kare shor mu pavan kare sor la pavan kare shor mu are baba shor nahin sor sor sor la pavan kare sor  han jiyaraa re jhuume aise jaise banamaa naache mor ho saavan kaa mahiinaa threedots  maujavaa kare kyaa jaane hamako ishaaraa jaanaa kahaan hai puuchhe nadiyaa kii dhaaraa marazii hai tumhaarii le jaao jis or jiyaraa re jhuume aise threedots  raamaa gajab dhaae ye puravaiyaa naiyaa sambhaalo kit khoe ho khivaiyaa puravaiyaa ke aage chale naa koii zor jiyaraa re jhuume aise threedots  jinake balam bairii gae hain bidesavaa laaii hai jaise unake pyaar kaa sandesavaa kaalii andhiyaarii ghataaen ghanaghor jiyaraa re jhuume aise threedots

Title: kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to hotaa hai zindagii men
Lyrics: ra kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to hotaa hai zindagii men     raah men chalatechalate raahii kho gae bekudii men la kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to hotaa hai zindagii men     raah men chalatechalate raahii kho gae bekudii men ra kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to threedots  la kis ko pataa thaa chaandanii jaaegii ra haay kaalii ghataa chhaaegii la thandii puhaar hamen paaspaas laaegii ra hm baat ban jaaegii la dil kii dhadakan sur badalegii ghadii do ghadii men     kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to hotaa hai zindagii men     raah men chalatechalate raahii kho gae bekudii men     kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to threedots  ra nindiyaa ke baadal ghirghir aae hain la o o aankhon pe chhaae hain ra o rang bhare sapanon ko sangsang laae hain la aa jaal bichhaae hain ra pyaar kii khushabuu mahak rahii hai saanson kii raaginii men la dil kii dhadakan sur badalegii ghadii do ghadii men     kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to hotaa hai zindagii men     raah men chalatechalate raahii kho gae bekudii men     kabhii kabhii aisaa bhii to threedots

Title: kho ke mahafil men terii sabroqaraar aayaa huun
Lyrics: kho ke mahafil men terii sabroqaraar aayaa huun chand lamhe terii mahafil men guzaar aayaa huun  jazb hai gunchemaasuum kii nakahat mujh men gum hai rangiiniiegulazaaremuhabbat mujh men ban ke shaadaabiieunwaanebahaar aayaa huun  wahii phuulon kii masarrat wahii gunchon kii umang wahii kushbuu wahii aalam wahii mastii wahii rang ban ke sarataabaa qadam faslebahaar aayaa huun  merii aankhon se tapakatii hai musalasal mayanaab merii makamuur nigaahon se umadatii hai sharaab dil men le kar asarekaifokumaar aayaa huun

Title: jaanam jaane jaa jaanam jaane jahaan  jaanejigar jaaneman
Lyrics: jaanam jaanejaan jaanam jaanejahaan jaanejigar jaaneman mujhako hai terii qasam tuu jo mujhe na milaa mar jaauungii main sanam  o rokegaa ham ko ab kyaa zamaanaa mar ke hamen hai vaadaa nibhaanaa jaanejigar jaaneman threedots  main phuulon se kalion se taaron se terii maang bhar duungaa main saanso kii mahakii nigaaho ko tere naam kar duungaa  main pyaar tujhase karatii huun din raat aanhe bharatii huun aanhe bharatii huun  aanhe bharatii huun jaanejigar jaaneman threedots  bin tere guzarate hain kaise mere din raat na puchho  2 jo dil men chhupe hain mere hamanashiin vo baat na puuchho   do dil jab dhadakate hain aise hii tadapate hain tadapate hain tadapate hain jaanejigar jaaneman threedots  o rokegaa ham ko ab kyaa zamaanaa mar ke hame hai vaadaa nibhaanaa jaanejigar jaaneman threedots jaanam jaanejaan  jaanam jaanejahan

Title: dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai
Lyrics: dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai dekhe binaa raam kaise jaayen 2 dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai  aankh bhii dii hai akl bhii dii hain ab ham kaise andhe ban jaayen o dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai dekhe binaa raam kaise jaayen 2 dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai  hinduu muslim sikh isaaii sab hii musaafir sab hii raahii aa rastaa sabakaa alagalag hai manzil lekin ek hai baabaa o dil ko hamaare chain nahiin hai  raam rahegaa saath hamaare ham jaayen jis jaa bhii baabaa

Title: raaten guzaar dii hain taaron kii roshanii men
Lyrics: raaten guzaar dii hain taaron kii roshanii men afasaane sun chukaa huun apanii hii kaamoshii men  larazish sii ho rahii hai aalam kii kulfizaa men rotaa hai koii bekas shaayad ke bekasii men  main mahavebandagii huun wo maayaletagaaful kuchh lutf aa rahaa hai is tarzedilabarii men  ukataa gayaa hai aalam afasaanaa sunatesunate aankhen jhapak rahe hain taare bhii kaamoshii men

Title: tum ho diin dayaal
Lyrics: tum ho diin dayaal prabhujii apane saathii kii bhii puuchh lo puuraa karo sawaal  jagat pati hai naam tumhaaraa duhkh haranaa hai kaam tumhaaraa tore dvaare aayii bhikhaarin khaalii haath na taal  paapan jii bhar duur khadii hai jiivan naiyaa dol rahii hai dayaa ke saagar dayaa karo tum abalaa mujhe sanbhaal  badii duur se aayii huun main abalaa saa ye laaii huun main miiraa ko darshan se maangii ab to karo nihaal

Title: lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa
Lyrics: lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa o o o  lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa main naa haath lagaaungii saarii umar bitaaungii lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa  2 o o o   darapan ke aage bindiyaa jo chamakii chhuudii jo bolii ho daiyaa chhuudii bolii  2 pyaase badan ko dansane lagii hai bedard cholii haay is bairan ko samajhaa de more baalamaa  lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa main naa haath lagaaungii saarii umar bitaaungii lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa o o o   tere binaa ye suunii padii hai sej suhaanii o sainyaan sej suhaanii  2 sautaniyaa ban ke rokaa hai jisane tujhako o jaanii wo naukariyaa thukaraa de more baalamaa  lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa main naa haath lagaaungii saarii umar bitaaungii lat ulajhii hai sulajhaa de more baalamaa o o o uun uun uun 2

Title: kvaab ho tum yaa koii haqiikat kaun ho tum batalaao
Lyrics: kvaab ho tum yaa koii haqiiqat kaun ho tum batalaao der se kitanii duur khadii ho aur kariib aa jaao  subah pe jis tarah shaam kaa ho gumaar  2 zulfon men ek cheharaa kuchh zaahir kuchh nihaar  dhadakanon ne sunii ek sadaa paaon kii  2 aur dil pe laharaaii aanchal kii chhaaon sii  mil hii jaatii ho tum mujhako har mod pe  2 chal detii ho kitane afasaane chhod ke  phir pukaaro mujhe phir meraa naam lo  2 girataa huun phir apanii baahon men thaam lo

Title: khud ko kyaa samajhatii hai kitanaa akadatii hai
Singer: abhijit udit narayan kavita krishnamurthy sapana mukherjee
Lyrics: jahaan vo jaayegii vahiin ham jaayenge 2   khud ko kya samajhatii hai kitanaa akadatii hai kaulej men nayii nayii aayii ek ladakii hai  ho yaaron ye hamen lagatii hai sirafirii aao chakhaa den mazaa  taubaa taubaa ye ada diivaanii hai kya pataa puuchho ye kis baat pe itanaa itaraatii hai jaane kis kii bhuul hai ye gobhii ka phuul hai billii jaise lagatii hai mekap jab karatii hai gaalon pe jo laalii hai hothon pe gaalii hai ye jo nakhare vaalii hai ladaki hai ya hai bala  khud ko kya samajhataa hai kitanaa akadataa hai  kaulej ka nayaa nayaa majanuu ye lagataa hai  hamase ho gayaa ab isakaa saamanaa  aao chakhaa den mazaa   khud threedots  hamako detaa hai gulaab niiyat isakii hai kharaab  saavan ke andhe ko to hariyaalii dikhatii hai  kya isako ye hosh hai ye dharatii par bojh hai  mard hai ye sirf naam ka aakhir kis kaam ka  cheharaa ab kyon laal hai  badalii kyon chaal hai  are itana ab kyon behaal hai  ham bhi to dekhen zaraa  khud ko kyaa   hamase aankhen chaar karo chhodo gussaa pyaar karo  yaaron ke ham yaar hain ladanaa bekaar hai   ulajhan men ye pad gaye shaayad ham se dar gaye  denge bhar ke pyaar ke dekho ye haar ke  pyaar ki ye riit hai haar bhi jiit hai   sabase badh kar priit hai   lagajaa gale dilarubaa

Title: rulaa kar chal diye ik din hansii ban kar jo aaye the
Lyrics: rulaa kar chal diye ik din hansii ban kar jo aaye the chaman roro ke kahataa hai kabhii gul muskuraaye the  agar dil ke zubaan hotii to gam kuchh kam to ho jaataa udhar vo chup idhar siine men ham tuufaan chhupaaye the chaman roro ke kahataa hai   threedots  ye achchhaa thaa na ham kahate kisii se daasataan apanii samajh paaye na jab apane paraaye to paraaye the rulaa kar chal diye   threedots

Title: haay jiyaa roe roe piyaa naahi aae aae
Lyrics: haay jiyaa roe roe 2 piyaa naahi aae aae haay jiyaa roe roe 2 ik main hii jaaguun 2 saaraa jag soe haay jiyaa roe roe 2  tumane to dekhaa hogaa ai chaand taaron 2 kit gae more sainyaa tum hii pukaaro o tum hii pukaaro jaao unako itanaa bataao haay jiyaa roe roe threedots  kab tak jiye koii birahaa kii maarii 2 chandaa terii chaandanii mohe laagii andhiyaare aao sainyaa ab to aa jaao

Title: aaj sharaabii aankhon se piine kii ham ne thaanii
Lyrics: aaj sharaabii aankhon se  piine kii ham ne thaanii ab saaqii se kaam nahiin hain  pyaaraa ham ko jaam nahiin hain ab to saaqii aur saaqar hain do aankhen mastaanii  rishtaa todaa maikaane se naataa todaa paimaane se pyaasii nazar ne jab se dekhii ek sarshaar javaanii  kahaan vo mastii hain saagar men jo terii madamaatii nazar men in aankhon men amrit hain pyaale men laal paanii aaj sharaabii aankhon se threedots

Title: ponchh kar ashq apanii aankhon se
Lyrics: ponchh kar ashq apanii aankhon se muskuraao to koii baat bane sar jhukaane se kuchh nahiin hoga sar uthaao to koii baat bane   zindagii bhiikh men nahiin milatii zindagii badh ke chhiinii jatii hai apanaa haq sangadil zamaane se chiin paao to koii baat bane ponchh kar ashqthreedots   rang aur bhed jaat aur mazahab jo bhii ho aadamii se kamatar hai is haqiiqat ko tum bhii merii tarah maan jaao to koii baat bane ponchh kar ashqthreedots   nafaraton ke jahaan men hamako pyaar kii bastiyaan basaanii hai duur rahanaa koii kamaal nahiin paas aao to koii baat bane ponchh kar ashqthreedots

Title: oh re taal mile nadii ke jal men
Lyrics: oh re taal mile nadii ke jal men nadii mile saagar men saagar mile kaun se jal men koi jaane naa  oh re taal mile nadii ke jal men threedots  anjaane honthon par ye pahachaane giit hain  2 kal tak jo begaane the janamon ke miit hain o mitavaa re e e e   kal tak threedots kyaa hogaa kaun se pal men koi jaane naa oh re taal mile nadii ke jal men threedots  suuraj ko dharatii tarase dharatii ko chandramaa  2 paanii men siip jaise pyaasii har aatamaa o mitavaa re e e e e   paanii men threedots buund chhupii kis baadal men koi jaane naa oh re taal mile nadii ke jal men threedots

Title: hansataa huaa nuuraanii cheharaa kaalii zulfen rang sunaharaa
Lyrics: hansataa huaa nuuraanii cheharaa  kaalii zulfen rang sunaharaa terii javaanii taubaa re taubaa re  dilarubaa dilarubaa dilarubaa dilarubaa hansataa huaa threedots  pahale terii aankhon ne luut liyaa duur se pahale terii  pahale terii aankhon ne luut liyaa duur se phir ye sitam hamape ki dekhanaa garuur se o diivaane  2 tuu kyaa jaane  2 dil ki beqaraariyaan hain kyaa hansataa huaa threedots  jii bhar ke tadapaale jii bhar ke pyaar kar jii bhar ke  jii bhar ke tadapaale jii bhar ke pyaar kar sab kuchh ganvaaraa hai thodaa saa pyaar kar tuu hii dil men  2 dil mushkil men  2 ab na dil ki mushkilen badhaa hansataa huaa threedots

Title: tuu chandaa main chaandanii tuu taruvar main shaakh re
Lyrics: tuu chandaa main chaandanii tuu taruvar main shaakh re tuu baadal main bijurii tuu panchhii main paat re  naa sarovar naa baavadii naa koi thandii chhaanv naa koyal naa papiiharaa aisaa meraa gaanv re kahaan bujhe tan kii tapan o saiyaan siramol chandrakiran to chhod kar jaae kahaan chakor jaag uthii hai saanvare merii kuaanrii pyaas re piyaa angaare bhii lagane lage aaj mujhe madhumaas re  tujhe aanchal main rakhuungii o saanvare kaalii alakon se baandhuungii ye paanv re chal baiyaan vo daaluun kii chhuute nahiin meraa sapanaa saajan ab tuute nahiin menhadii rachii hatheliyaan mere kaajarvaale nain re piyaa pal pal tujhe pukaarate ho ho kar bechain re  o mere saavan saajan o mere sinduur saajan sang sajanii banii mausam sang mayuur chaar pahar kii chaandanii mere sang bithaa apane haathon se piyaa mujhe laal chunar udhaa kesariyaa dharatii lage ambar laalamlaal re ang lagaa kar saahib re kar de mujhe nihaal re

Title: dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai
Lyrics: dilenaadaan tujhe huaa kyaa hai aakhir is dard kii davaa kyaa hai  ham hain mushtaaq aur vo bezaar yaa ilaahii ye maajaraa kyaa hai  main bhii muh men zubaan rakhataa huun kaash puuchho kii mudda kyaa hai  jabaki tujh bin nahiin koi maujuud phir ye hangaamaa ai khudaa kyaa hai  ye pariicheharaa log kaise hain gamazaaoushvaaoadaa kyaa hai  shikanezulafeamabarii kyaa hai nigaahechashmesurama saa kyaa hai  sabzogul kahaan se aaye hain abr kyaa chiiz hai havaa kyaa hai  hamako unase vafaa ki hai ummiid jo nahiin jaanate vafaa kyaa hai  haan bhalaa kar teraa bhalaa hogaa aur daravesh kii sadaa kyaa hai  jaan tum par nisaar karataa huun main nahiin jaanataa duaa kyaa hai  maine maanaa ki kuchh nahiin gaalib muft haath aaye to buraa kyaa hai

Title: dil men tujhe bithaake kar luungii main band aankhen
Lyrics: dil men tujhe bithaake  kar luungii main band aankhen puujaa karuungii terii  ho ke rahuungii terii  main hii main dekhuun tujhe piyaa aur na dekhe koi ek pal bhii ye soch rahe naa kis vidhi milanaa hoi sabase tumhen bachaake kar luungii main band aankhen puujaa karuungii terii threedots  naa koi bandhan jagat kaa koii paharaa naa diivaar koi na jaane do diivaane jii bhar kar le pyaar kadamon men tere aake kar luungii main band aankhen puujaa karuungii terii threedots  teraa hii mukh dekh ke piyaa raat ko main so jaauun bhor bhaii jab aankh khule to  tere hii darashan paauun tujhako gale lagaake  kar luungii main band aankhen puujaa karuungii terii threedots

Title: main ne dekhii jag kii riit miit sab jhuuthe pad gaye
Lyrics: main ne dekhii jag kii riit miit sab jhuuthe pad gaye o mere baalaam itanaa dosh ki tum sang nainaa lad gaye miit sab jhuuthe pad gaye   threedots  rasiyaa sataaye hamen jab jaanjaan ke badaa duhkh paayaa main ne dil kaa kahaa maan ke torii morii priit puraanii re baalam kaahe ko bigad gaye miit sab jhuuthe pad gaye   threedots  ek dil duhkh hain zamaane bhar ke haay re zamaane bhar ke ham to bharose re rasiyaa bas hain tumhaare kar ke mere bhole dil pe sajan kyaa jaaduu kar gaye miit sab jhuuthe pad gaye   threedots

Title: ab kyaa bataauun main tere milane se kyaa milaa
Lyrics: ab kyaa bataauun main tere milane se kyaa milaa irfaanegam huaa mujhe dil kaa pataa milaa  jab duur tak na koii fakiir aashanaa milaa teraa niyaazamand tere dar se jaa milaa  manzil milii muraad milii muddaa milaa sab kuchh mujhe milaa jo teraa naqshepaa milaa  yaa zakmedil ko chiir ke siine se phenk de yaa aitaraaf kar ki nishaanevafaa milaa  siimaab ko shaguftaa na dekhaa tamaam umr kambakt jab milaa hamen gam aashanaa milaa

Title: ye raat khushanasiib hai jo apane chaand ko kaleje se lagaae so rahii hai
Lyrics: ye raat khushanasib hai jo apane chaand ko  kaleje se lagaae so rahii hai yahaan to gam kii sej pe hamaarii aarazuu akelii muunh chhupaaye ro rahii hai ye raat khushanasiib hai threedots  saathii main paake tujhe khoyaa kaisaa hai ye apanaa nasiib ho tujhase bichhad gayii main yaaden terii hain mere kariib ho tuu merii vafaaon men tuu merii sadaaon men tuu merii duaaon men  ye raat khushanasiib hai threedots  katatii nahiin hain merii raaten katate nahiin hain mere din mere saare sapane adhuure zindagii adhuurii tere bin ho khvaabon men nigaahon men pyaar ke panaahon men  aa chhupaale baahon men ye raat khushanasib hai threedots  ye raat khushanasib hai jo apane chaand ko  kaleje se lagaae so rahii hai yahaan to gam kii sej pe hamaarii aarazuu akelii muunh chhupaaye ro rahii hai

Title: ye mahalon ye takton ye taajon kii duniyaa
Lyrics: ye mahalon ye takton ye taajon kii duniyaa ye inasaan ke dushman samaajon kii duniyaa  2 ye daulat ke bhuukhe rivaazon kii duniyaa ye duniyaa agar mil bhii jaaye to kyaa hai  2  har ek jism ghaayal har ek ruh pyaasii nigaaho men ulajhan dilon me udaasii ye duniyaa hai yaa aalamebadahavaasii ye duniyaa threedots  jahaan ek khilaunaa hai inasaan kii hastii ye bastii hai murdaaparaston kii bastii jahaan aur jiivan se hai maut sastii ye duniyaa threedots  javaanii bhatakatii hai bezaar banakar javaan jism sajate hai baazaar banakar jahaan pyaar hotaa hai vyaapaar banakar ye duniyaa threedots  ye duniyaa jahaan aadamii kuchh nahiin hai vafaa kuchh nahiin dostii kuchh nahiin hai  2 jahaan pyaar ki kadr hii kuchh nahiin hai ye duniyaa threedots  jalaa do jalaa do ise phuunk daalo ye duniyaa mere saamane se hataa lo ye duniyaa tumhaarii hai tum hii sambhalo ye duniyaa ye duniyaa threedots

Title: yuun zindagii kii raah men takaraa gayaa koii
Lyrics: yuun zindagii kii raah men takaraa gayaa koii ik roshanii andheron men bikharaa gayaa koii  wo haadasaa wo pahalii mulaakaar kyaa kahen kitanii ajab thii suuratehaalaat kyaa kahuun wo qahar wo gazab wo jafaa mujhako yaad hai wo usakii berukii kii adaa mujhako yaad hai mitataa nahiin hai zahan se yuun chhaa gayaa koii  pahale wo mujhako dekh kar baraham sii ho gaii phir apane hii hasiin kayaalon men kho gaii bechaaragii pe merii use raham aa gayaa shaayad mere tadapane kaa andaaz bhaa gayaa saanson se bhii qariib mere aa gayaa koii  ab us diletabaah kii haalat na puuchhiye benaam aarazuuon kii lazzat na puuchhiye ik ajanabii thaa ruuh kaa aramaan ban gayaa ik haadasaa thaa pyaar kaa unawaan ban gayaa manzil kaa raastaa mujhe dikhalaa gayaa koii

Title: badan pe sitaare lapete hue o jaanetamannaa kidhar jaa rahii ho
Lyrics: badan pe sitaare lapete hue o jaanetamannaa kidhar jaa rahii ho zaraa paas aao to chain aa jaae zaraa paas aao to chain aa jaae  hamiin jab naa honge to ai dilarubaa kise dekhakar haay sharamaaogii naa dekhogii phir tum kabhii aainaa hamaare binaa roz ghabaraaogii badan pe sitaare lapete hue threedots  hai banane sanvarane kaa jab hii mazaa koi dekhane vaalaa aashiq to ho nahiin to ye jalave hain bujhate diye koi mitane vaalaa ek aashiq to ho badan pe sitaare lapete hue threedots  muhabbat ki ye intahaa ho gai ki mastii men tumako khudaa kah gayaa zamaanaa ye insaaf karataa rahe buraa kah gayaa yaa bhalaa kah gayaa badan pe sitaare lapete hue threedots

Title: tum ko dekhaa to ye khayaal aayaa zindagii dhuup tum ghanaa saayaa
Lyrics: tum ko dekhaa to ye kayaal aayaa zindagii dhuup tum ghanaa saayaa tum kothreedots  aaj phir dilane ek tamannaa kii  2 aaj phir dilako hamane samajhaayaa zindagii dhuup tum ghanaa saayaathreedots  tum chale jaaoge to sochenge  2 hamane kyaa khoyaa hamane kyaa paayaa zindagii dhuup tum ghanaa saayaathreedots  ham jise gunagunaa nahiin sakate  2 vaqt ne aisaa giit kyuun gaayaa zindagii dhuup tum ghanaa saayaathreedots

Title: ye kis kalish ne phir is dil men aashiyaanaa kiyaa
Lyrics: ye kis kalish ne phir is dil men aashiyaanaa kiyaa phir aaj kisane sukhan hamase gaaibaanaa kiyaa  gamejahaan ho rukeyaar ho ki dasteuduu suluuk jisase kiyaa hamane aashiqaanaa kiyaa  the kaakeraah bhii ham log bahar tuufaan bhii sahaa to kyaa na sahaa aur kiyaa to kyaa na kiyaa  wo raaz aaj har ek muddii ke lab par hai wo raaz jisane hamen raandaaezamaanaa kiyaa  wo hiilaagar jo naaseh hai aur jafaakuun bhii kiyaa bhii faiz tuune kis but se dostaanaa kiyaa

Title: shaharon shaharon aaj hai tanhaa
Lyrics: tartsong  shaharon shaharon aaj hai tanhaa dil par gaharaa daag liye galiyon galiyon ho gaye rusavaa dil par gaharaa daag liye  aaj gulistaan men failii hai khushaboo terii yaadon kii mausamegul hai ham hain tanhaa dil par gaharaa daag liye  rotedhote jii ko jalaate manzileshab tak aa pahunche chehare par hai gadretamannaa dil par gaharaa daag liye  dhuundhane unako shaharebutaan men aaj gaye the ham bhii adiib aankh men lekar gam kaa dariyaa dil par gaharaa daag liye

Title: chhod aae ham vo galiyaan
Singer: hariharan suresh wadkar vinod sehgal k kay
Lyrics: chhod aae ham vo galiyaan	 4  jahaan tere pairon ke kanval giraa karate the hanse to do gaalon men bhanvar padaa karate the  he terii kamar ke bal pe nadii mudaa karatii thii hansii terii sun sun ke fasal pakaa karatii thii chhod aae ham threedots  ho jahaan terii edii se dhuup udaa karatii thii  sunaa hai us chaukhat pe ab shaam rahaa karatii hai	 2 laton se ulajhiilipatii ik raat huaa karatii thii  kabhii kabhii takhiye pe vo bhii milaa karatii thii   2 chhod aae ham threedots  dil dard kaa tukadaa hai patthar kii daalii sii hai in andhaa kuaan hai yaa ik band galii sii hai ik chhotaa saa lamhaa hai jo khatm nahiin hotaa main laakh jalaataa huun yah bhasm nahiin hotaa yah bhasm nahiin hotaa threedots chhod aae ham threedots

Title: suhaanaa safar aur ye mausam hasiin
Lyrics: suhaanaa safar aur ye mausam hansiin 2 hamen dar hai ham kho na jaaen kahiin suhaanaa safar threedots  ye kaun hansataa hai phuulon men chhuup kar  bahaar bechain hai kisakii dhun par   2 kahiin gumagum kahiin rumajhum ke jaise naache zamiin suhaanaa safar threedots  ye gorii nadiyon kaa chalanaa uchhalakar  ke jaise alhad chale pii se milakar   2 pyaare pyaare ye nazaare nikhare hain har kahiin suhaanaa safar threedots  ho ho ho threedots vo aasamaan jhuk rahaa hai zamiin par  ye milan hamane dekhaa yahiin par   2 merii duniyaa mere sapane milenge shaayad yahiin suhaanaa safar threedots

Title: ai dil tuu kahiin le chal le chal
Lyrics: ai dil ai dil tuu kahiin le chal le chal  ai dil tuu kahiin le chal le chal le chal us desh jahaan dharatii aakaash se milatii ho ek kvaab kii duniyaa ho ek ruup kii bastii ho vo bastii jo shaayar ne sapanon men banaaii ho ai dil tuu vahiin le chal 2  maasuum kalii jin ke khilane ko tarasatii hai uthatii hai ghataa dil se aankhon se barasatii hai ye duhkh bharii duniyaa hai ye dard kii bastii hai is dard kii bastii se haan aur kahiin le chal le chal le chal threedots  kyaa jii karen koii kyaa mauj hai jiine men kyaa dil kii tamannaayen ghut jaatii hain siine men rote hain yahaan aramaan saavan kii mahiine men savaan kii ghataaon se   3 haan aur kahiin le chal le chal le chal

Title: ashkon ne jo paayaa hai
Lyrics: ashkon ne jo paayaa hai vo giiton men diyaa hai is par bhii sunaa hai ki zamaane ko gilaa hai  jo taar se nikalii hai vo dhun sab ne sunii hai jo saaz pe guzarii hai vo kis dil ko pataa hai ashkon ne jo paayaa hai threedots  ham phuul hain auron ke liye laaye hain khushabuu apane liye le de ke bas ik daag milaa hai ashkon ne jo paayaa hai threedots

Title: maut maanguun to rahe aarazuuekaab muhe
Lyrics: maut maanguun to rahe aarazuuekaab muhe duubane jaauun to dariyaa mile paayaab mujhe  ai falaq rahane de uriyaan hii pasajmarg bhii to saunpataa kyaa hai qafanoqabr kaa asabaab mujhe  josh se ahqon ke phir jaayegaa sar par paanii khiinch le jaayegaa dariyaa men ye sailaab mujhe  furqateyaar men karatii hai qayaamat barapaa rozemahashar se nahiin kam shabemahataab mujhe

Title: donon jahaan terii muhabbat men haar ke
Lyrics: donon jahaan terii muhabbat men haar ke  wo jaa rahaa hai koii shabegam guzaar ke   viiraan hai maikadaa kumosaagar udaas hai  tum kyaa gae ke ruuth gae din bahaar ke   ik fursategunaah milii wo bhii chaar din  dekhe hain hamane hausale parvaradigaar ke   duniyaa ne terii yaad se begaanaa kar diyaa  tujhase bhii dilafareb hain gam rozagaar ke  niiche likhaa sher jo ki talat mahamuud ne gaayaa nahiin is gazal kaa maqtaa hai bhuule se muskuraa to diye the wo aaj faiz mat puuchh walawale dilenaakaradaakaar ke

Title: roz roz aankhon tale ek hii sapanaa chale
Lyrics: roz roz aankhon tale ek hii sapanaa chale raat bhar kaajal jale aankh men jis tarah kvaab kaa diyaa jale  jabase tumhaarii naam kii misarii honth se lagaayii hai 2 miithaa saa gam hai aur miithii sii tanhaaii hai 2 roz roz aankhon tale   threedots  chhotii sii dil kii ulajhan hai ye sulajhaa do tum 2 jiinaa to siikhaa hai marake maranaa sikhaa do tum 2 roz roz aankhon tale   threedots  aankhon par kuchh aise tumane zulf giraa dii hai  2 bechaare se kuchh kvaabon kii niind udaa dii hai  2 roz roz aankhon tale threedots

Title: tuune kyaa kiyaa mujhe bataa to sahii
Lyrics: tuune kyaa kiyaa mujhe bataa to sahii meraa chain gayaa merii niind gayii  hosh gayaa meraa merii aankh khul gayii meraa chain gayaa merii niind gayii threedots  jo milanaa hai aakar jald milo nahiin baharhudaa mujhe qatl karo chhute ranjobalaa se ye jaan merii meraa chain gayaa merii niind gayii threedots  dhuundhane tujhe jaauun kahaan nahiin milataa hai teraa naamonishaan merii umr talaash me saarii gayii meraa chain gayaa merii niind gayii threedots

Title: raham kar aasamaan raham kar aasamaan
Lyrics: yah kaisaa tuufaan uthaa hai mere ghar men aaj tuut tuut kar bikhar rahaa hai mere pyaar kaa taaj raham kar aasamaan raham kar aasamaan  raham kar aasamaan raham kar aasamaan aaj mitane lagii pyaar kii dasataan  merii duniyaa ke jalate diye na bujhaa rok le rok bhii le yah zaharii havaa yuun na barbaad kar yuun na barbaad kar do dilon kaa jahaan raham kar aasamaan   threedots  aaj kii raat kaa jo saveraa huaa duur nazaron se jo chaand meraa huaa badduaa duungii main tuu pighal jaayegaa aah merii lagegii tuu jal jaayegaa saath mere mitegaa teraa bhii nishaan beraham aasamaan beraham aasamaan beraham aasamaan

Title: yashomatii maiyaa se bole nandalaalaa
Lyrics: yashomatii maiyaa se bole nandalaalaa raadhaa kyon gorii main kyon kaalaa bolii muskaatii maiyaa lalan ko bataayaa kaalii andhiyarii aadhii raat men tuu aayaa laadalaa kanhaiyaa meraa kaalii kamalii vaalaa isii lie kaalaa  bolii muskaatii maiyaa sun mere pyaare gorii gorii raadhikaa ke nain kajaraare kaale nainon vaalii ne aisaa jaaduu daalaa isii lie kaalaa  itane men raadhaa pyaarii aaii ithalaatii main ne na jaaduu daalaa bolii balakhaatii maiyaa kanhaiyaa teraa jag se niraalaa isii lie kaalaa

Title: reshamii ujaalaa hai makhamalii andheraa
Lyrics: reshami ujala hai makhamali andhera  aaj ki raat aisa kuchh karo   2 ho nahin ho nahin ho nahin savera threedots  aisi to raat roz nahin aaye aankhon se koi roz na pilaye aaj to jaam se hamare pi le pi le pi le zaraa threedots   2 reshami ujala hai threedots  aisa re shabaab aur hai kahaan meri zulfon ka aashiq hai jahaan dekhi na hogi kahin tune aisi aisi aisi adaa threedots   2 reshami ujala hai threedots  a mere paas sochata hai kya aaj hai muaaf teri har khata  divana tere liye kab se dil hai dil hai dil hai mera mera mera mera threedots   2 reshami ujala hai threedots

Title: jaane kyaa tuune kahii jaane kyaa maine sunii
Lyrics: jaane kyaa tuune kahii jaane kyaa maine sunii baat kuchh ban hii gayii jaane kyaa tune kahii threedots  sanasanaahat sii huii tharatharaahat sii huii jaag uthe khvaab kai baat kuchh ban hii gayii jaane kyaa tune kahii threedots  nain jhuk jhuk ke uthe paanv ruk ruk ke uthe aa gayii jaan naii baat kuchh ban hii gayii jaane kyaa tune kahii threedots  zulf shaane pe mude ek khushabuu sii ude khul gaye raaz kaii baat kuchh ban hii gayii jaane kyaa tune kahii threedots

Title: o meraa baabuu chhailchhabiilaa main to naachuungii
Lyrics: o meraa baabuu chhail chhabiilaa main to naachhuungii  o meraa balmaa rang rangilla main to naachuungii	2 kajaraa lagaake gajaraa sajaake main sharmaauun re o meraa baabuu chhail chhabiilaa threedots  aankhon men pyaar basaake karataa hai miithiimiithii batiyaan 2 honthon pe phuul khushii ke hans de to bikharen pattiyaan nain lade main kit jaauun re haay main kit jaauun re o meraa baabuu chhail chhabiilaa threedots  aaj hansegii dekhake mujhako saarii sakhiyaan	2 paas bulaake chupake se puuchhengii sajanaa ki batiyaan kuchh na bataauun sab se chhupaauun main ghabaraauun re o meraa baabuu chhail chhabiilaa threedots  o meraa baabuu chhail chhabiilaa main to naachhuungii  o meraa balmaa rang rangilla main to naachuungii	3

Title: unhen paa liyaa hai
Lyrics: vidaaii kii ghadiyon ke sapane sajaa kar unhen paa liyaa hai unhen paa liyaa hai judaaii ke nagamon se diipak jalaa kar unhen paa liyaa hai unhen paa liyaa hai  ashkon ke tuute sitaaron se aage nazaaron se aage muhabbat kii chhotii sii duniyaa basaa kar unhen paa liyaa hai unhen paa liyaa hai  farebii bahaaron se aankhen churaakar khushiiyaan bhulaa kar aahon ke sholon se daaman jalaa kar unhen paa liyaa hai unhen paa liyaa hai

Title: jin baandho janjiiraa ke paar najar kahiin lag jaihe
Lyrics: jin baandho janjiiraa ke paar najar kahiin lag jaihe 2 are najar kahiin lag jaihe najar kahiin lag jaihe 2 jin baandho janjiiraa ke paar najar kahiin lag jaihe  jin baandho jin baandho kaalaa janjiiraa kaalii ghataa tore nain kaalii ghataa tore nain najar kahiin lag jaihe jin baandho janjiiraa ke paar najar kahiin lag jaihe  tore gale men daaruun galabaiyaan 2 pahano na sone kaa haar e pahano na sone kaa haar re najar kahiin lag jaihe 2 jin baandho janjiiraa ke paar najar kahiin lag jaihe

Title: na udaa yuun thokaron se
Lyrics: na udaa yuun thokaron se  meri khaakekabr zaalim  yahii ek rah gai hai  meri pyaar kii nishaanii   faasale aise bhi honge  ye kabhi sochaa na tha  saamane baithaa tha mere  aur vo meraa na tha   vo ke khushabuu kii tarah  failaa tha mere chaarasuu  main use mahasuus kar sakataa tha  chhuu sakataa na tha   raat bhar pichhalii hii aahat  kaan men ati rahii  jhanak kar dekhaa galii men  koi bhi aya na tha   yaad karake aur bhi  takaliif hoti thi adiim  bhuul jaane ke sivaa  ab koi bhi chaaraa na tha

Title: kab thaharegaa dardedil kab raat basar hogii
Lyrics: kab thaharegaa dardedil kab raat basar hogii sunate the wo aayenge sunate the sahar hogii  kab jaan lahuun hogii kab ashq gohar hogaa kis din terii sunawaaii ai diidaaetar hogii  kab tak abhii raaze ke ai kaamatejanaanaa kab hashr muayyan hai tujhako to kabar hogii

Title: sapanaa ban aa jaataa hai koii
Lyrics: sapanaa ban aa jaataa hai koii 2 mujhe roz roz sataataa hai koii 2 sapanaa ban aa jaataa hai koii 2  apane hii ho gae begaane man basiyaa mohe lage sataane 2 jaaduu bharii dhun men gaataa hai koii raat raat jagaataa hai koii 2 sapanaa ban aa jaataa hai koii 2  bhuulanaa chaahuun bhuul sakuun naa ho gaii kuchh aisii baat re chhod diyaa unakaa aasaraa par yaad naa chhode saath re 2 apanii nazar se huii naadaanii dil ne mujhase kii beimaanii 2 jiivan dhan jo ganwaa chukaa use dobaaraa kyon jalaataa hai koii 2 sapanaa ban aa jaataa hai koii 2

Title: shaayad main zindagii kii sahar leke aa gayaa
Lyrics: shaayad main zindagii kii sahar leke aa gayaa kaatil ko aaj apane hii ghar leke aa gayaa  taaumr dhuundhataa rahaa manzil main ishq kii anjaam ye ki gardesafar leke aa gayaa  nashtar hai mere haath men kandhon pe mayaqadaa lo main ilaajedardejigar leke aa gayaa  faakir sanamakade men na aataa main lautakar ik zakm bhar gayaa thaa idhar leke aa gayaa

Title: ek hai apanii zamiin  aawaaz do ham ek hain
Lyrics: ra 	ek hai apanii zamiin 	ek hai apanaa gagan 	ek hai apanaa jahaan 	ek hai apanaa watan 	 	apane sabhii sukh ek hain 	apane sabhii gam ek hain 	aawaaz do 	aawaaz do ham ek hain 	ham ek hain  ko 	aawaaz do 	aawaaz do ham ek hain 	ham ek hain  ra 	ye waqt khone kaa nahiin 	ye waqt sone kaa nahiin 	jaago watan katare men hai 	saaraa chaman katare men hai  	phuulon ke chehare zard hain 	zulfen fizaa kii gard hain 	umadaa huaa tuufaan hai 	narage men hindostaan hai  	dushman se nafarat farz hai 	ghar kii hifaazat farz hai 	bedaar ho bedaar ho 	aamaadaaepaikaar ho  ko 	aawaaz do 	aawaaz do ham ek hain 	ham ek hain 	 ra 	ye hai himaalaa kii zamiin 	taajoajantaa kii zamiin 	sangam hamaarii aan hai 	chittaud apanii shaan hai  	gulamarg kaa mahakaa chaman 	jamanaa kaa tat gokul kaa ban 	gangaa ke dhaare apane hain 	ye sab hamaare apane hain  	kah do koii dushman nazar 	utthe na bhuule se idhar 	kah do ke ham bedaar hain 	kah do ke ham taiyaar hain  ko 	aawaaz do 	aawaaz do ham ek hain 	ham ek hain  ra 	utho jawaanaanewatan 	baandhe huye sar se qafan 	utho dakkan kii or se 	gangojaman kii or se  	panjaab ke dil se utho 	sataluj se saahil se utho 	maharaashtr kii kaaq se 	dillii kii arzepaak se  	bangaal se gujaraat se 	kashmiir ke baagaat se 	nefaa se raajasthaan se 	gulakhaa ke hindustaan se  ko 	aawaaz do 	aawaaz do ham ek hain 	ham ek hain 5

Title: o niind na mujhako aaye
Lyrics: he o niind na mujh ko aae     dil mera ghabaraae     chup ke chup ke koii aa ke     soyaa pyaar jagaae la o niind threedots  he soyaa huaa sansaar hai     soyaa huaa sansaar     main jaaguun yahaan     tuu jaage vahaan     ek dil men dard dabaae  do o niind threedots  la ek biich men diivaar hai     ek biich men diivaar     main tadapuun yahaan     tuu tadape vahaan     haay chain jiyaa ko nahiin aae  do o niind threedots  he main huun yahaan beqaraar     tuu hai vahaan beqaraar     main gaauun yahaan     tuu gaaye vahaan     dil ko dil bahalaae  do o niind threedots

Title: tum chalii jaaogii parchhaaiyaan rah jaaengii
Lyrics: tum chalii jaaogii parchhaaiyaan rah jaaengii kuchh na kuchh husn kii raanaaiyaan rah jaaengii  sun ke is jhiil ke saahil pe milii ho mujhase jab bhii dekhuungaa yahiin mujhako nazar aaogii yaad mitatii hai na manzar koii mit sakataa hai duur jaakar bhii tum apane ko yahiin paaogii tum chalii jaaogii threedots  ghul ke rah jaaegii jhonkon men badan kii khushabuu zulf kaa aks ghataaon men rahegaa sadiyon phuul chupake se churaa lenge labon kii surkhii ye javaan husn fizaaon men rahegaa sadiyon tum chalii jaaogii threedots  is dhadakatii huii shadaabohasiin vaadii men yah na samajho ki zaraa der kaa kissaa ho tum ab hameshaa ke liye mere muqaddar kii tarah in nazaaron ke muqaddar kaa bhii hissaa ho tum tum chalii jaaogii threedots

Title: siilii havaa chhuu gaii siilaa badan chhil gayaa
Lyrics: year siili havaa chhu gai siilaa badan chhil gayaa nili nadii ke pare gilaa saa chaand khil gayaa  tum se mili jo zindagii hamane abhii boi nahiin tere sivaa koi na thaa tere sivaa koi nahiin sili havaa chhu gai threedots  jaane kahaan kaise shahar leke chalaa ye dil mujhe tere bagair din naa jalaa tere bagair shab naa bujhe sili havaa chhu gai threedots  jitane bhii tay karate gaye badhate gaye ye faasale milon se din chhod aaye saalon se raat leke chale sili havaa chhu gai

Title: bhaii battuur bhaii battuur ab jaaenge kitanii duur
Lyrics: bhaii battuur bhaii battuur ab jaaenge kitanii duur naazuk naazuk merii javaanii chalane se majabuur  bhaii battuur threedots   dar laage kyaa hogaa piichhe koii chor lagaa hogaa  chhotii umariyaa safar badaa main thak kar ho gai chuur  bhaii battuur threedots   chaal chaluun ithalaake bin soche balakhaake  chhaaii javaanii aise jaise nadiyaa ho bharapuur  bhaii battuur threedots

Title: koii jo milaa to mujhe aisaa lagataa thaa jaise  breathless
Lyrics: koii jo milaa to mujhe aisaa lagataa thaa jaise merii saarii duniyaa men giiton kii rut aur rangon kii barakhaa hai khushabuu kii aandhii hai mahakii huii sii ab saarii fazaayen hain bahakii huii sii ab saarii havaayen hain khoii huii sii ab saarii dishaayen hain badalii huii sii ab saarii adaayen hain jaagii umangen hain dhadakar rahaa hai dil saanson men tuufaan hai honthon pe nagamen hain aankhon men sapane hain sapanon men biite hue saare vo lamhen hain jab koii aayaa thaa nazaron pe chhaayaa thaa dil men samaayaa thaa kaise main bataauun tumhen kaise use paayaa thaa pyaare se chehare pe bikharii jo zulfen to aise lagataa thaa jaise kohare ke piichhe ek os men dhulaa huaa phuul khilaa jaise baadal men ek chaand chhupaa hai aur jhaank rahaa hai jaise rat ke parde men ek saveraa hai roshan roshan aankhon men sapanon kaa saagar jis men prem sitaaron kii chaadar jaise jhalak rahii hai laharon laharon baat karen to jaise motii barase jaise kahiin chaandii kii paayal guunje jaise kahiin shiishaaejaam gire aur chhan se tuute jaise koii chupake se sitaar bajaaye jaise koii chaandanii raat men gaaye jaise koii haulese paas bulaaye kaisii miithii baaten thiin vo kaisii mulaaqaaten thiin vo jab main ne jaanaa thaa nazaron se kaise pighalate hain dil aur aarazuu paatii hai kaise manzil  aur kaise utarataa hai chaand zamiin par kaise kabhii lagataa hai svarg agar hai to bas yahiin par usane bataayaa mujhe aur samajhaayaa mujhe ham jo mile hain hamen aise hii milanaa tha gul jo khile hain inhen aise hii khilanaa thaa janamon ke bandhan janamon ke rishte hain jab bhii ham janamen to ham yahiin milate hain kaanon men mere jaise shahadsii ghulane lage kvaabon kii duniyaa bhii kitanii hasiin aur kaisii rangiin thii kvaabon kii duniyaa jo kahane ko thii par kahiin bhii nahiin thii kvaab jo tuute mere aankhen jo khulii merii hosh jo aayaa mujhe main ne dekhaa main ne jaanaa vo jo kabhii aayaa thaa nazaron pe chhaayaa thaa dil men samaayaa thaa jaa bhii chukaa hai aur dil meraa ab tanhaatanhaa na to koii aramaan hai na koii tamannaa hai aur na koii sapanaa hai ab jo mere din aur ab jo merii raaten hain un men sirf aansuu hain un men sirf ranj kii baaten hain aur fariyaaden hain meraa ab koii nahiin main huun aur khoye hue pyaar kii yaaden hain main huun aur khoye hue pyaar kii yaaden hain main huun aur khoye hue pyaar kii yaaden hain

Title: mujh se judaa ho kar tujhe duur jaanaa hai
Lyrics: mujh se judaa ho kar tumhen duur jaanaa hai pal bhar kii judaaii phir laut aanaa hai saathiyaa sang rahegaa teraa pyaar saathiyaa rang layegaa intazaar  tumase judaa hokar mujhe duur jaanaa hai pal bhar kii judaaii phir laut aanaa hai saathiyaa sang rahegaa teraa pyaar saathiyaa rang layegaa intazaar  main huun terii sajanii saajan hai tuu meraa tuu baandh ke aayaa mere pyaar kaa seharaa chehare se ab tere hatatii nahiin akhiyaan teraa naam le lekar chhede mujhe sakhiyaan sakhiyon se ab mujhako piichhaa chhudaanaa hai pal bhar kii judaaii phir laut aanaa hai   threedots  mere tasavvur men tum roz aatii ho chupake se tum aakar meraa ghar sajaatii ho sajanii badaa pyaaraa ye ruup hai tera gjare kii khushabuu se mahakaa hai ghar meraa aankhon se ab terii kaajal churaanaa hai pal bhar kii judaaii phir laut aanaa hai   threedots

Title: aate jaate hansate gaate
Lyrics: aate jaate hansate gaate sochaa thaa main ne man men kaii baar vo pahalii nazar halakaa saa asar karataa hai kyon dil ko beqaraar ruk ke chalanaa chal ke rukanaa naa jaane tumhen hai kis kaa intazaar  teraa vo yakiin kahiin main to nahiin lagataa hai yahii kyon mujhako baar baar yahii sach hai shaayad main ne pyaar kiyaa  aate jaate hansate gaate sochaa thaa main ne man men kaii baar honthon kii kalii kuchh aur khilii ye dil pe huaa hai kisakaa iktiyaar tum kaun ho batalaa to do kyon karane lagii main tumape aitabaar  khaamosh rahuun ya main kah duun yaa kar luun main chupake se ye sviikaar yahii sach hai shaayad main ne pyaar kiyaa  haan haan tumase main ne pyaar kiyaa

Title: der lagii aane men tumako
Lyrics: der lagii aane men tumako shukr hai phir bhii aaye to aas ne dil kaa saath na chhodaa thodaa ham ghabaraaye to  shafaq dhanak mahataab ghataaen taare nagme bijalii phuul us daaman men kyaa kyaa kuchh hai wo daaman haath men aaye to  chaahat ke badale men ham to bech den apanii marzii tak koii mile to dil kaa gaahar koii hamen apanaae to  jhuuth hai sab taariikh hameshaa apane ko doharaatii hai achchhaa meraa kaabejawaanii thodaa saa doharaae to

Title: baalam mohe chhod ke na jaa
Lyrics: baalam mohe chhod ke na jaa main tose binatii karat huun  tum bin saajan kachhu naahin bhaaye bin dekhe tohe chain na aaye suunaapan mohe det daraave

Title: ye aankhen dekh kar ham saarii duniyaa bhuul jaate hain
Lyrics: ye aankhen dekh kar ham saarii duniyaa bhuul jaate hain  inhen paane kii dhun men har tamannaa bhuul jaate hain ye aankhen threedots  tum apanii mahakii mahakii zulf ke pechon ko kam kar do musaafir inamen girakar apanaa rastaa bhuul jaate hain ye aankhen threedots  ye aankhen jab hamen apanii panaaho men bulaatii hain hame apanii qasam ham har saharaa bhuul jaate hain  tumhaare narmonaazuk honth jis dam muskaraate hain bahaaren jhenpatiin phuul khilanaa bhuul jaate hain ye aankhen threedots  bahut kuchh tum se kahane kii tamannaa dil men rakhate hain magar jab saamane aate ho to kahanaa bhuul jaate hain  muhabbat men zubaan chup ho to aankhen baat karatiin hain ye kah detii hain vo baaten jo kahanaa bhuul jaate hain ye aankhen threedots

Title: baabul jo tumane sikhaayaa
Lyrics: baabul jo tumane sikhaayaa jo tumase paayaa sajan ghar le chalii sajan ghar main chalii  yaadon ke lekar saaye chalii ghar paraaye tumhaarii laadalii kaise bhuul paauungii main baabaa sunii jo tumase kahaaniyaan chhod chalii aangan main maiyyaa bachapan kii nishaaniyaan sun merii pyaarii bahanaa sajaaye rahanaa ye baabul kii galii sajan ghar main chalii   threedots  ban gayaa parades ghar janam kaa milii hai duniyaa mujhe nayii naam jo piyaa se main ne jodaa naye rishton se bandh gayii mere sasur jii pitaa hain pati devataa hain devar chhavi krishhn kii sajan ghar main chalii   threedots

Title: bade hain dil ke kaale
Lyrics: bade hain dil ke kaale haan yahii  niilii sii aankhon vaale suurat burii ho buraa nahiin dil meraa naa ho yaqiin aazamaa le  merii jaan vaah vaah vaah threedots merii jaan vaah vaah vaah vaah bade hai threedots  jaise bhale ho sab hai khabar sherosharaarat kii ye nazar aankhon men aankhen daalake ham ho gaye ab to jaane jigar haan hamako bade bade dhuundh ke haare dhuundh hii laaenge dil ke sahaare aap kisiike bhii hain vaah jii vaah khul jaayegaa haal tum pe dilebeqaraar kaa naino se naina milaake dekho to zaraa  rok bhii lo ab apanii zubaan varanaa qayaamat hogii yahaan ham bhii qayaamat se nahiin kam jaaoge bachake duur kahaan haan yahiin to the abhii aap kidhar gaye samajho hamen ham jaan se guzar gaye jiitejii mar gaye  vaah jii vaah maranaa merii zindagii hai diivaanaa huun pyaar kaa tum bhii ek din aazamaan ke dekho to zaraa

Title: raam kare babuaa hamaar phulavaa ko
Lyrics: raam kare babuaa ho raam kare babuaa hamaar phulavaa ko hamarii umar lagi jaaye ho patajhar aaye basant rut jaaye ho jaaye champaa chamelii muskaaye raam kare babuaa ho  pyaare munne tuu bhii ik dilkhus gulaab hai toharii khusabuu kaa kahiin koii javaab hai tohe na kisii kii najar lagi jaaye raam kare babuaa ho threedots  bol siyaabar ramachandra ki jay pavan put hanumaan kii jay  raam jii ne duniyaa men duhkh sukh baante phulavaa ke sang sang bagiyaa men kaante tore pag men na koii kaantaa lagi jaaye raam kare babuaa threedots  kaas aisaa hovai jab banai tuu dulhaa raajaa galiyon men baaje jab saadii kaa baajaa yahii gangaa raam hau yahii gangaa raam toharaa seharaa banaavai raam kare babuaa threedots

Title: ashyaar mere yuun to zamaane ke liye hain  mukesh gazal
Lyrics: ashayaar mere yun to zamaane ke liye hain kuchh sher fakat unako sunaane ke liye hain  ab ye bhii nahiin thiik ki har dard mitaa den kuchh dard kaleje se lagaane ke liye hain  aankhon men jo bhar loge to kaanton se chubhengen ye khvaab to palakon pe sajaane ke liye hain  dekhun tere haathon ko to lagataa hai tere haath mandir men fakat dip jalaane ke liye hain  socho to badii chiiz hai tahajiib badan kii varanaa to badan aag bujhaane ke liye hai

Title: dhiire se aajaa rii ankhiyan men
Lyrics: dhiire se aajaa rii ankhiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa chhote se nainan kii bagiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa  o threedots lekar suhaane sapanon kii kaliyaan sapanon kii kaliyaan aake basaa de palakon kii galiyaan palakon kii galiyaan palakon kii chhotii sii galiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa dhiire se threedots  o threedots taaron se chhup kar taaron se chorii taaron se chorii detii hai rajanii chandaa ko lorii chandaa ko lorii hansataa hai chandaa bhii nindiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa dhiire se threedots  dhiire se aajaa rii ankhiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa chhote se nainan kii bagiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa  o threedots aankhen to sab kii hain ik jaisii jaisii amiiron kii gariibon kii vaisii palakon kii suunii sii galiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa dhiire se threedots  o threedots jagatii hai ankhiyaan sotii hai qismat sotii hai qismat dushman gariibon kii hotii hai qismat hotii hai qismat dam bhar gariibon kii kutiyan men nindiyaa aajaa rii aajaa dhiire se aajaa dhiire se threedots

Title: ye saaye hain ye duniyaa hai parachhaaiyon kii
Lyrics: ye saaye hain ye duniyaa hai parachhaaiyon kii ye saaye hain ye duniyaa hai bhari bhid men khali tanhaiyon ki ye saye hain  ye duniya hai   yahan koi sahil sahara nahin hai  kahin dubane ko kinara nahin hai  yahan koi sahil sahara nahin hai  yahan sari raunak ye rusavaiyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai parachhaiyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai threedots  kai chand uthakar jalae bujhae  bahut hamane chaha zara nind ae  kai chand uthakar jalae bujhae  yahan raat hoti hai bezariyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai parachhaiyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai threedots  yahan sare chehare hai mange hue se  nigahon men ansu bhi take hue se  yahan sare chehare hai mange hue se  badi nichi rahen hai unchaiyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai parachhaiyon ki  ye saye hai ye duniya hai bhari bhid men khali tanhaiyon ki  ye saye hain ye duniya hai threedots

Title: diip jalaao diip jalaao aaj diivaalii re
Lyrics: diip jalaao diip jalaao aaj divaalii re  khushiikhushii sab hansate aao aaj divaalii re   main to luungaa khelkhilaune tum bhii lenaa bhaaii naacho gaao khushii manaao aaj divaalii aaii   aaj pataakhe khuub chalaao aaj divaalii re  diip jalaao diip jalaao aaj divaalii re   naenae main kapade pahanuun khaauun khuub mithaaii  haath jodakar puujaa kar luun aaj divaalii aaii   khaao mitron khuub mithaaii aaj divaalii re  diip jalaao diip jalaao aaj divaalii re   aaj dukaanen khuub sajii hain ghar bhii jagamag karate  jhilamiljhilamil diip jale hain kitane achchhe lagate   aao naacho khushii manaao aaj divaalii re  diip jalaao diip jalaao aaj divaalii re

Title: dekho dil kare  tuu hai queen main huun teraa king
Lyrics: ding daang ding daang ding daang dekho dil kare ding daang ding tuu hai queen main huun teraa king dil kaa taaz pahane pyaar kaa raaj karen prem mahal men rah ke pyaar kii baat karen prem kahaanii aajaa shuruu karen dekho dil kare threedots  tuu hai queen to ye teraa king chaand saa teraa hai cheharaa rakhe kyuun baaton kaa paharaa zulf kaa paradaa hataao naa sharabatii aankhon ko aise gusse se kyon laal rakhe sharm se palaken jhukaao naa raanii tuu hai merii naa inkaar karo raajaa huun main teraa ye ikaraar karo raajaa raanii aaj mil ke kahen dekho dil kare threedots  tuu kahe to tere lie taajamahal se bhii ek badhiyaa raajamahal main aisaa banavaauun sone kii ho saarii zamiin hiire motii kii naa ho kamii chaandii kii diivaaren main chunavaauun raanii tuu jo kahe karake main dikhaa duun tere lie jaanaan marake main dikhaa duun raanii bin raajaa ye hii kare dekho dil kare threedots

Title: maanaa ki tere pyaar men rusavaaiyaan to hain
Lyrics: maanaa ki tere pyaar men rusavaaiyaan to hain rusavaaiyon se pyaar ho hamako to kyaa karen maanaa ki tere pyaar threedots  aramaan bujhebujhe se hain saansen dhuaandhuaan ham to bharii bahaar men tanahaa rahe yahaan tanahaaiyon se pyaar ho hamako to kyaa karen maanaa ki tere pyaar threedots  hamako milii nasiib se kyaa kuub ye kushii parachhaaiyon kii chhaanv men bhatake ye zindagii parachhaaiyon se pyaar ho hamako to kyaa karen maanaa ki tere pyaar threedots

Title: dil le ke bhulaa denaa
Lyrics: dil le ke bhulaa denaa ik khel tumhaaraa hai tum ko to nahiin kuchh bhii nuqsaan hamaaraa hai  ye jhuutii tasallii jo biimaar ko dete ho ik duubane vaale ko tinake kaa sahaaraa hai  main aur tujhe dekhuun ye taab kahaan mujh men zaalim terii suurat ne aankhon ko ubhaaraa hai  faiyyaaz bas ab unako ham unase hii maangenge yuun daamanedil unake qadamon pe pasaaraa hai

Title: aaj use phir dekhaa hai
Lyrics: aaj use phir dekhaa hai dekhaa hai  roz kiyaa karataa thaa yaad lekin aaj buhat din baad gaanv ke chhote panghat men chaand saa chaharaa ghuunghat men main ne chamakate dekhaa hai  shaam kaa baadal chhaane ko thaa suuraj bhii chhup jaane ko thaa us ke ruup ke suuraj ko jab men ne uthate dekhaa hai  naam mujhe maaluum nahiin hai sharmiilii hai kamasin hai vo dil kii raanii banaa chukaa banaa chukaa huun kahane ko panahaaran hai vo ek nazar men dil kii duniyaa main ne badalate dekha hai

Title: ai dileaavaaraa chal
Lyrics: o o o o   ai dileaavaaraa chal  2 phir vahiin dubaaraa chal  yaar ne didaar ka vaadaa kiyaa hai  o o o ai dileavaaraa chal  phir vahiin dubaaraa chal  yaar ne didaar ka vaada kiyaa hai  o o o ai dileavaaraa chal   vo unakii betaabii vo unakaa chalanaa chhamase  anchal thaamaa to hansake kahaa phir milaneko hamase  unase hamase sun ai dil pyaar ka ikaraar aankhon men hua hai  o o ai dileavaaraa chal   khattii ho ya miithii ab un aankhon se piinaa  jiite hain chaahat vaale binaa chaahat ke kya jiinaa  chalate phirate sun ai dil chaah men ab aah bharanekaa mazaa hai  o o o ai dileavaaraa chal   chamakaa hai ik mukhadaa kuchh zulphen hai laharaayiin  din phir gaye apane din ke gai raton kii tanhaaii   2 jahaan vo vahaan ham sun ai dil chain se bechain tu kyuun ho rahaa hai  o o o ai dileavaaraa chal  phir vahiin dubaaraa chal  yaar ne didaar ka vaada kiyaa hai  o o ai dileavaaraa chal

Title: na munh chhupaa ke jiyo
Lyrics: na munh chhupaa ke jiyo aur na sar jhukaa ke jiyo gamon kaa daur bhii aaye to muskuraa ke jiyo na munh chhupaa ke jiyo aur na sar jhukaa ke jiyo  ghataa men chhupake sitaare fanaa nahiin hote andherii raat men diye jalaa ke chalo na munh chhupaa ke jiyo aur na sar jhukaa ke jiyo  ye zindagii kisii manzil pe ruk nahiin sakatii har ik maqaam pe qadam badhaa ke chalo na munh chhupaa ke jiyo aur na sar jhukaa ke jiyo

Title: kahiin diip jale kahiin dil
Lyrics: kahiin diip jale kahiin dil zaraa dekh le aa kar paravaane terii kaun sii hai manzil kahiin diip jale kahiin dil  meraa giit tere dil kii pukaar hai jahaan main huun vahiin teraa pyaar hai  meraa dil hai terii mahafil zaraa dekh le aa kar paravaane terii kaun sii hai manzil kahiin diip jale kahiin dil  naa main sapanaa huun naa koii raaz huun ek dard bharii aavaaz huun piyaa der na kar aa mil zaraa dekh le aa kar paravaane terii kaun sii hai manzil kahiin diip jale kahiin dil  dushman hain hazaaron yahaan jaan ke zaraa milanaa nazar pahachaan ke kaii ruup men hain qaatil zaraa dekh le aa kar paravaane terii kaun sii hai manzil  kahiin diip jale kahiin dil

Title: sohanii lagadii o main nuun sohanii lagadii
Lyrics: pyaar nasiibaan naal mildaa huzuur ai rab kolon diljaanii manganaa zuruur ai haal naa jaane meraa duniyaa namaanii o merii jind mere dil daa suruur ai tere pichhe main nuun ai saarii hayaatii vii thodii lagadii sohanii lagadii o main nuun sohanii lagadii  tuun meraa kuj vii naiin o main nuun kah gaii jedhii meraa sur merii le merii taal ai lokaan dii akh ch kaure kis she daa baal ai vakhovakh kiitaa saanuun dushaman dii chaal ai mannataan muraadaan naal banadii te tich saadii jodii lagadii tere pichhe main nuun ai saarii hayaatii vii thodii lagadii sohanii lagadii o main nuun sohanii lagadii  o main loko belii ishq daa main nuun koii naiin paravaah hun kar le jo kuchh ho sakadaa main phad laii terii banh tuun methon hilanaa koii naa teraa dukhdaa sunanaa koii naa o kudiye mere haan diye meraa vargaa milanaa koii naa tere pichhe main nuun ai saarii hayaatii vii thodii lagadii sohanii lagadii o main nuun sohanii lagadii

Title: ye korii karaarii kanvaarii nazar
Lyrics: ye korii karaarii kanvaarii nazar maar daalegii zaalim tumhaarii nazar  are husn vaale tuu daaman bachaa le jhukaa le nigaahen ye aankhen churaa le kabhii to milegii hamaarii nazar maar daalegii zaalim tumhaarii nazar threedots  abhii jo jhukii hai abhii jo uthii hai isii pe hamaarii javaanii lutii hai yahii hai muhabbat kii maarii nazar maar daalegii zaalim tumhaarii nazar threedots  bade shauq se tum koii khel khelo mujhe qatl kar do merii jaan le lo ye dil ek panchhii shikaarii nazar maar daalegii zaalim tumhaarii nazar threedots

Title: kah rahii hai zindagii jii sake to jii
Lyrics: he threedots kah rahii hai zindagii jii sake to jii kah rahii hai zindagii jii sake to jii ek jaam pyaar kaa pii sake to pii kah rahii hai zindagii jii sake to jii  jaam ye usii kaa hai jaam ye usii kaa hai jo aage bade ke thaam le intazaar kisaliye jaam uthaa jaam le jaam uthaa jaam le aasmaan ke haath se chhiin le khushii kah rahii hai zindagii   threedots                        husn hai khaamosh kyon husn hai khaamosh electrifying pause kyon ishq beqaraar hai saamne  bithaa ke tujhako teraa intazaar hai  teraa intazaar hai ho  shokhiyon kii phuljhadii small pause kuchh to idhar bhi kah rahii hai zindagii   threedots

Title: moraa goraa ang lai le
Lyrics: moraa goraa ang lai le mohe shaam rang dai de chhup jaauungii raat hii men mohe pii kaa sang dai de  ek laaj roke paiyaan ek moh khiinche baiyaan haay ek laaj roke paiyaan ek moh khiinche baiyaan jaauun kidhar na jaanuun ham kaa koii bataaii de ho o moraa goraa ang lai le mohe shaam rang dai de chhup jaauungii raat hii men mohe pii kaa sang dai de  badarii hataa ke chandaa chup ke se jhaanke chandaa aa a badarii hataa ke chandaa chup ke se jhaanke chandaa tohe raahuu laage bairii muskaaye jii jalaai ke ho o moraa goraa ang lai le mohe shaam rang dai de chhup jaauungii raat hii men mohe pii kaa sang dai de  kuchh kho diyaa hai paai ke kuchh paa liyaa gavaai ke kuchh kho diyaa hai paai ke kuchh paa liyaa gavaai ke kahaan le chalaa hai manavaa mohe baanvarii banaai ke ho o moraa goraa ang lai le mohe shaam rang dai de chhup jaauungii raat hii men mohe pii kaa sang dai de

Title: pyaar hamen kis mod pe le aayaa
Lyrics: ham ne vo kyaa dekhaa jo kahaa diivaanaa ham ko nahiin kuchh samajh zaraa samajhaanaa pyaar men jab bhii aankh kahiin lad jaaye tab dhadakan aur bechainii badh jaaye ginataa hai jab koii raaton ko taare tab samajho use pyaar ho gayaa  pyaare  pyaar hamen kis mod pe le aayaa ki dil kare haay   haay koii to bataaye kyaa hogaa  battiyaan bujhaa do   are koii battii to bujhaa de yaar battiyaan bujhaa do ki niind nahiin aatii hai battiyaan bujhaane se bhii niind nahiin aayegii battiyaan bujhaane vaalii jaane kab aayegii   sh sh sh shor na machaao varanaa bhaabhii jaag jaayegii  pyaar tumhen kis mod pe le aayaa ki dil kare haay   haay koii ye bataaye kyaa hogaa  pyaar threedots    honaa kyaa hai jaa ke unhen le aayenge   aakhir kyaa thii aisii bhii majabuurii mil gae dil ab bhii kyon hai ye duurii are dam hai to un ko chhiin ke le aayenge dii na gar ghar vaalon ne manzuurii   pyaar hamen kis mod pe le aayaa ki dil kare haay   haay koii ye bataaye kyaa hogaa

Title: raat ko din banaa diyaa
Lyrics: mere andhere ghar me aa kar chaadar apane sar se giraakaar duniyaa ko haan haan duniyaa ko jagamagaa diyaa 2 raat ko din banaa diyaa 2  aaaaaa dil me jaag uthaa ujiyaaraa mukhadaa thaa kuchh aisaa pyaaraa chaand ko bhii haan haan chaand ko bhii sharmaa diyaa 2 raat ko din banaa diyaa 2  maujon men tarangen soii thii aur dil me umangen soii thii shaakon men soii thii kaliyaan chupchap thii hirhday kii duniyaa tum ne sab ko haan haan tum ne sab ko jagaa diyaa 2 raat ko din banaa diyaa 2

Title: bevafaa yuun teraa muskuraanaa
Lyrics: bevafaa yuun teraa muskuraanaa yaad aane ke qaabil nahiin hai is tarah zulm uthaaen hain tuune sar uthaane ke qaabil nahiin hai       main ne khat likh ke unako bulaayaa aake qaasid ne dukhadaa sunaayaa unake pairon men mehandii lagii hai aane jaane ke qaabil nahiin hai       main ne phone karake unako bulaayaa unakii mummy ne aakar uthaayaa unake haathon men mehandii lagii hai       main ne puuchhaa ke kal shab kahaan the pahale sharamaaye phir hans ke bole aap vo baat kyon puuchhate ho jo bataane ke qaabil nahiin hai

Title: kisii ko chaahuun tumhaare sivaa kudaa na kare
Lyrics: kisii ko chaahuun tumhaare sivaa kudaa na kare ho aur bhii koii dil kaa kudaa kudaa na kare  jo zindagii ban ke tum mile to aisaa mujhe lagaa tumhiin to dil men dhadakate ho dhadakanon kii jagah tumhaaraa pyaar ho dil se judaa kudaa na kare kisii ko chaahuun threedots  tumhaare dil men vafaa kii jannat dil kii sadaa sanam tumhaarii aankhon men apanii suurat dil kii sadaa kasam main dekhuun koii aur aaiinaa kudaa na kare kisii ko chaahuun threedots

Title: dil abhii tak javaan hai pyaare
Lyrics: dil abhii tak javaan hai pyaare kis musiibat men jaan hai pyaare  tuu mere haal kaa kayaal na kar is men bhii ek shaan hai pyaare  raat kam hai na chhed hijr kii baat ye badii daasataan hai pyaare  jang chhid jaae ham agar kah den ye hamaarii zabaan hai pyaare  talk kar dii hai zindagii jis ne kitanii miithii zabaan hai pyaare  jaane kyaa kah diyaa thaa rozeazal aaj tak imtihaan hai pyaare  ham hain banden magar faqat tere ye hamaarii hii shaan hai pyaare  kab kiyaa mainne ishq kaa daawah teraa apanaa gumaan hai pyaare  main tujhe bevafaa nahiin kahataa dushmanon kaa bayaan hai pyaare  tere kuuche men hai suquun waranaa har zamiin aasamaan hai pyaare  saarii duniyaa ko hai galatafahamii mujh pe tuu meharabaan hai pyaare  bazm hai ahatiraaj hii kyaa hai paradah saa darmiyaan hai pyaare  arzematalab samajh ke ho naa khafaa ye to ik daastaan hai pyaare

Title: dil aisaa kisii ne meraa todaa
Lyrics: dil aisaa kisiine meraa todaa  barbaadii kii taraf aisaa modaa 	2 ek bhale maanush ko amaanush banaake chhodaa dil aisaa kisiine meraa todaa barbaadii kii taraf aisaa modaa  saagar kitanaa mere paas hai  mere jiivan men phir bhii pyaas hai 	2 hai pyaas badii jiivan thodaa amaanush banaake chhodaathreedots  kahate hain ye duniyaa ke raaste  koii manzil nahiin tere vaaste	2 naakaamiyon se naataa meraa jodaa amaanush banaake chhodaathreedots  duubaa suuraj phir se nikale rahataa nahiin hai andheraa meraa suuraj aisaa ruuthaa dekhaa na mainne saveraa ujaalon ne saath meraa chhodaa amaanush banaake chhodaa  dil aisaa kisiine meraa todaathreedots

Title: aage bhii jaane na tuu
Lyrics: aage bhii jaane na tuu piichhe bhii jaane na tuu jo bhii hai bas yahii ek pal hai   anjaane saayon kaa raahon men deraa hai andekhii baahon ne ham sabako gheraa hai ye pal ujaalaa hai baaqii andheraa hai ye pal ganvaanaa na ye pal hii teraa hai jiinevaale soch le yahii vaqt hai kar le puurii aarazuu aage bhii threedots   is pal kii jalavon ne mahafil sanvaarii hai is pal kii garmii ne dhadakan ubhaarii hai is pal ke hone se duniyaa hamaarii hai ye pal jo dekho to sadiyon pe vaari hai jiinevaale soch le yahii vaqt hai kar le puurii aarazuu aage bhii threedots   is pal ke saae men apanaa thikaanaa hai is pal kii aage kii har shay fasaanaa hai kal kisane dekhaa hai kal kisane jaanaa hai is pal se paaegaa jo tujhako paanaa hai jiinevaale soch le yahii vaqt hai kar le puurii aarazuu aage bhii threedots

Title: ishq kaa zikr aasamaanon par
Lyrics: ishq kaa zikr aasamaanon par ishq kaa naam sab zubaanon par khel dil kaa hai ye magar is men khel jaate hain log jaanon par  main jisakii talaash men nikalaa usako to main ne dhuundh liyaa use dhuundh ke main khud kho gayaa mujhe ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq   threedots  qaafir kaho to kah lo kah lo qaafir kaho to kah lo mazahab hai ishq meraa kuchh bhii kahuun zubaan se matalab hai ishq meraa na samajho dillagii hai ki ye dil kii lagii hai ye merii jaan legii ye sab kuchh phuunk degii dhuaan uthane lagaa hai ye dam ghutane lagaa hai ki dil men haule haule bhadak uthe hain shole  dekh rahii hai saarii duniyaa duur khadii hairaanii se saat samandar haar gaye ye aag bujhii na paanii se mere dil kii naaben chalii gayii barasaat baras kar chalii gayii saavan bhii aakar ro gayaa mujhe ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq   threedots  janaazaa uthegaa yaa baaraat hogii magar aaj unase mulaaqaat hogii bade zor kii pyaas jagii hai dil men bade zor kii aaj barasaat hogii  nisa sa nisa sa nisa sa nipa mapa ga ga gama re sa sa gama ga ga nipa  kahaan se aa rahaa huun kahaan main jaa rahaa huun mujhe is kii kabar kyaa  idhar kyaa hai udhar kyaa mere chit chor se main bandhaa huun dor se main jahaan bhii jaayegaa vo mujhe le jaayegaa vo bhuul bhulaiyyaa nanin sajan ke mujhako isakii kabar nahiin jaane kii to hai vaapas aane kii koii dagar nahiin na suurat usakii aayii nazar na usakii koii aayii kabar us prem galii ko jo gayaa mujhe ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq   threedots  ishq khudaa hai ishq hii rab hai ishq hii to duniyaa kaa sabab hai ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq  ishq hii jaaduu ishq hii khushabuu ishq nahiin to kyaa main kyaa tuu ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq  naam hazaaron ishq akelaa ishq binaa hai kaun saa melaa ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq  ishq sayaanaa ishq diivaanaa ishq ko samajhe kyaa ye zamaanaa mujhe ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq  ishq kii baaten hain har dil men mandir masjid ek hii dil men ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq  mujhe ishq ho gayaa ishq ishq

Title: tujhe pyaar karate karate yuun hii umr biit jaae
Lyrics: tujhe pyaar karate karate yuun hii umr biit jaae karuun jo main bevafaaii mujhe maut bhii na aae tujhe pyaar karate karate threedots  jo aitabaar ho to tumase yahii kahenge tere dil men ghar banaa kar terii baahon men rahenge tumhen is kadar main chaahuun jitanaa koii na chaahe tujhe pyaar karate karate threedots  tumase shuruu huii hai mere pyaar kii kahaanii tum par nisaar kar duun main apanii zindagaanii meraa hamasafar banenge terii chaahaton ke saae tujhe pyaar karate karate threedots

Title: muntazir kab se gair hai terii taqariir kaa
Lyrics: muntazir kab se gair hai terii taqariir kaa baat kar tujh pe gumaan hone lagaa tasaviir kaa  raat kyaa soye ki baakii umr kii niind ud gayii kwaab kyaa dekhaa ki dhadakaa lag gayaa taabiir kaa  kaise paayaa thaa tujhe phir kis tarah khoyaa tujhe mujh saa munkir bhii to qaayal ho gayaa taqadiir kaa  jaane kis aalam men tuu bichhadaa ki hai tere bagair aaj tak har naqsh fariyaadii merii tahariir kaa  jisako bhii chaahaa badii shiddat se chaahaa hai faraaz silasilaa tuutaa nahiin hai dard kii zanjiir kaa

Title: aabaad raho mere dil ko jalaane vaale
Lyrics: aabaad raho mere dil ko jalaane vaale tum shaad raho merii hastii mitaane vaale  aanaa kabhii gurbat pe do aansuu bahaane ko tiireenazar se jhuuthe dariyaa bahaane vaale  shammaa bhii jalaa denaa mere mazaar pe tum har dam hii aashiqon ke diip jalaane vaale

Title: haay mehamaan kahaan ye gamejaanaan hogaa
Composer: taj ahmed khan khaiyyam or murli manohar swarup
Lyrics: haay mehamaan kahaan ye gamejaanaan hogaa kaanaaedil to koii roz men viraan hogaa  kosataa huun jo nasiibon ko to kahataa hai wo shok phir mohabbat na karegaa agar insaan hogaa  zindagii ishq men mushkil hai to mar jaayenge ab se wo kaam karenge ke jo aasaan hogaa  ab kahaan laktejigar siine men ai diidaaetar aur hogaa to sare goshaaedaamaan hogaa    dam merii aankhon men atakaa hai ke dekhuun to sahii kyaa masiihaa se mere dard kaa darmaan hogaa

Title: bol de miithe bol soniye

Lyrics: bindiyaa chamakegii chuudii khanakegii 2 terii niind ude te ud jaae kajaraa bahakegaa gajaraa mahakegaa 2 mohe rusadiiye te rus jaae 2 bindiyaa chamakegii threedots  mainne maanaa huaa tuu diivaanaa  zulam tere saath huaa 2 main kahaan le jaauun apane laung kaa lashkaaraa is lashkaare se aake dvaare se 2 chal mudadiiye te mud jaae bindiyaa chamakegii threedots  bole kanganaa kisiikaa o sajanaa  javaanii pe zor nahiin 2 laakh manaa karale duniyaa kahate hain mere ghungaruu paayal baajegii gorii naachegii 2 chhat tutadiiye te tut jaae bindiyaa chamakegii threedots  mainne tujhase mohabbat kii hai  gulaamii nahiin kii balamaa 2 dil kisii kaa tuute chaahe koii mujhase ruuthe main to kheluungii main to chheduungii 2 yaarii tutadiiye te tut jaae bindiyaa chamakegii threedots  mere aangan baaraat leke saajan  tuu jis raat aaegaa 2 main na baithuungii dolii men kah duungii baabul se main na jaauungii main na jaauungii 2 gaddii turadiiye te tur jaae bindiyaa chamakegii threedots

Lyrics: ki    bhaliibhalii sii ek suurat bhalaa saa ek naam        dhadakan hai mere dil ki subah ho yaa shaam aa    kaun hai vo dilarubaa are kaho naa hamase zaraa ki    threedots tum ho vo dilarubaa aa    bhaliibhalii sii ek suurat bhalaa saa ek naam        dhadakan hai mere dil ki subah ho yaa shaam  aa    huii mere bhii jiyaa kii chorii ki    achchhaa aa    are haan us chor kii shakal hai gorii ki    to kyaa huaa aa    ho gayaa milanaa bahut zaruurii ki     alarmed  chal pagalii aa    phir suno to aage hamaarii dil kii majabuurii tu tu tu        vo jo mere kariib aayaa ki    o ho aa    mere tan pe padaa jo saayaa ki    phat gayii phir kyaa huaa aa    yuun samajho na gale lagaayaa ki     disgusted  chhii chhii chhii aa    tab se sotii huun jaagatii huun leke usakaa naam ki    kaun hain vo dilarubaa kaho na hamase zaraa aa    threedots tum ho vo dilarubaa ki    bhaliibhalii threedots  ki    haay mushqil hain meraa bhii jiinaa aa    hathreedots ma threedots ki    sochuun to aataa hain pasinaa aa    baapre ki     pure fantasy  kal maine dekhii ajab hasinaa aa    hathreedots ma threedots ki    pyaar me usake dhadake meraa dil jalataa hai siinaa        dhak dhak dhak        paas vo aai badii adaa se aa    haa ki    bolii kyuun ho khafaakhafaa se aa    haay mar jaauun ki    ham bhii the ek nazar ke pyaase aa    kyuun nahiin ki     hallucinating now         dil pe usane jo haath rakhaa aa gayaa aaraam aa    kaun hain vo dilarubaa kaho na hamase zaraa ki    threedots tum ho vo dilarubaa aa    bhaliibhalii threedots

Lyrics: ek to aisii ladakii ho jo mere naam se sajatii ho shaam savere aankh bichhaae meraa rastaa takatii ho o re o o re o huun aa  ek to aisaa ladakaa ho jo mere naam se sajataa ho shaam savere aankh bichhaae meraa rastaa takataa ho o re o o re o huun aa  dil men naii dhadakan lie aae mere saamane bahake hue jazbaat ko aagosh men thaam le sach meraa sapanaa ho aisaa koii apanaa ho chaahe mujhe jo din raat o ek to aisii ladakii threedots  bhuuluun na main saarii umar itanaa mujhe pyaar de ho tanhaa mere aramaan ko chaahat kaa sansaar de usape main marataa huun ishq usii se karataa huun kaise rahuun main usake binaa o ek to aisaa ladakaa threedots

Title: jinhe naaz hai hind par vo kahaan hain
Lyrics: ye kuuche yethreedots han aaa  ghar dilakashii ke ye kuuche ye niilaam ghar dilakashii ke ye lutate hue kaaravaan zindagii ke kahaan hain kahaan hain muhafiz khudii ke jinhen naaz hai hind par vo kahaan hain kahaan hain kahaan hain kahaan hain  ye purapench galiyaan ye badanaam baazaar ye gumanaam raahii ye sikkon ki jhanakaar ye isamat ke saude ye saudon pe takaraar jinhe naaz threedots  ye sadiyon se bekhauf sahamii si galiyaan ye masalii hui adhakhili zard kaliyaan ye bikatii hui khokhalii rangaraliyaan jinhe naaz threedots  vo ujale darichon men paayal kii chhan chhan thakii haarii saanson pe tabale ki dhan dhan 2 ye beruh kamaron me khaansii ki than than jinhe naaz threedots  ye phuulon ke gajare ye piikon ke chhiinte ye bebaak nazare ye gustaakh fiqare ye dhalake badan aur ye biimaar chehare jinhe naaz threedots  yahaan piir bhii aa chuke hain javaan bhii tanomand bete bhi abbaa miyaan bhii ye biivii hai 2 aur bahan hai maan hai jinhe naaz threedots  madad chaahatii hai ye havaa ki beti yashodaa ki hamjins raadhaa ki beti 2 payambar ki ummat zulekhaa ki beti jinhe naaz threedots  zaraa is mulk ke rahabaron ko bulaao ye kuuche ye galiyaan ye manzar dikhaao jinhen naaz hai hind par unako laao jinhe naaz hai hind par vo kahaan hain kahaan hain kahaan hain kahaan hain

Title: ai pyaar terii duniyaa se ham

Lyrics: chalaa jaataa huun kisii kii dhun men dhadakate dil ke taraane liye milan kii mastii bharii aankhon men hazaaron sapane suhaane liye chalaa jaataa huunthreedots   ye mastii ke nazaaren hain to aise men sambhalanaa kaisaa merii qasam tuu laharaatii dagariyaa ho to phir kyuun naa chaluun main bahakaa bahakaa re mere jiivan men ye shaam aaii hai muhabbat vaale zamaane liye chalaa jaataa huunthreedots  vo aalam bhii ajab hogaa vo jab mere kariib aaegii merii qasam kabhii baiyaan chhudaa legii kabhii hansake gale se lag jaaegii haay merii baahon men machal jaaegii vo sachche jhuuthe bahaane liye chalaa jaataa huunthreedots  bahaaron men nazaaron men nazar daaluun to aisaa laage merii qasam vo nainon men bhare kaajal ghuunghat khole khadii hain mere aage re sharam se bojhal jhukii palakon men javaan raaton ke fasaane liye chalaa jaataa huunthreedots
