Lyrics: dil ne kahaa chupake se ye kyaa huaa chupake se  aa aa   kyon naye lag rahen hai ye dharatii gagan  mainne puuchhaa to bolii ye pagalii pavan  pyaar hua chupake se ye kya hua chupake se   2  titaliyon se sunaa aa titaliyon se sunaa  mainne kissaa baag ka baag men thi ek kalii  sharmilii anachhuii ek din manachalaa ho bhanvaraa aa gayaa  khil uthii vo kalii paayaa ruup nayaa  puuchhatii thi kalii ke mujhe kya hua  phuul hansa chupake se pyaar hua chupake se   mainne badal se kabhii o mainne badal se kabhii  ye kahani thi sunii parvaton kii ek nadii milane saagar se chalii  jhumatii ghumatii ho nachatii dolatii  kho gayii apane saagar men jaake nadii  dekhane pyaar kii aisii jaadugarii  chaand khilaa chupake se pyaar hua chupake se   kyon naye lag rahen hai ye dharatii gagan  mainne puuchhaa to bolii ye pagalii pavan  pyaar hua chupake se ye kya hua chupake se  kyon naye lag rahen hai ye dharatii gagan  mainne puuchhaa to bolii ye pagalii pavan   durunaa durunaa durunaa durunaa durunaa durunaa threedots

Title: tuu kahaan ye bataa is nashiilii raat men jaane naa meraa dil diivaanaa
Lyrics: tuu kahaan  ye bataa  is nashiilii raat men maane naa meraa dil diivaanaa haay re threedots maane naa meraa dil diivaanaa  he threedots badaa natakhat hai samaa    2 har nazaaraa hai javaan chhaa gayaa chaaron taraf  merii aahon kaa dhuaan dil meraa merii jaan naa jaanaa threedots tuu kahaan threedots  o o threedots aaii jab thandii havaa    2 maine puuchhaa jo pataa vo bhii kataraake gai aur bechain kiyaa pyaar se tuu mujhe de sadaa threedots tuu kahaan threedots  he threedots chaand taaron ne sunaa    2 in bahaaron ne sunaa dard kaa raag meraa  rahaguzaaron ne sunaa tuu bhii sun jaaneman aa bhii jaa  threedots tuu kahaan threedots  o o threedots pyaar kaa dekho asar    2 aae tum thaame jigar mil gai aaj mujhe  merii manachaahii dagar kyuun chhupaa ek jhalak phir dikhaa  threedots tuu kahaan threedots

Title: koii mil gayaa
Singer: udit narayan alka yagnik kavita krishnamurthy
Lyrics: koii mil gayaa koii mil gayaa mujhako kyaa huaa hai kyon main kho gayaa huun paagal thaa main pahale yaa ab ho gayaa huun bahakii hain nigaahen aur bikhare hain baal tuune banaayaa hai kyaa apanaa ye haal koii mil gayaa meraa dil gayaa kyaa bataauun yaaron main to hil gayaa koii mil gayaa mil hii gayaa mil gayaa  jaane kyaa ho gayaa hai mujhe diivaanaa log kahane lage ye diivanagii hai kyaa hamen bhii to ho pataa tumako kyaa ho gayaa are kal tak mujhako sab hosh thaa dil men khushiyon kaa josh thaa phir ye bechainii hai kyon phir ye betaabii hai kyon kyaa koii kho gayaa koii mil gayaa   threedots  baadal banakar kaun aa gayaa kaun hai jo dil pe yuun chhaa gayaa chaahuun ki bataauun men phir bhii kah na paauun man naam usakaa hai kyaa o naam na lo par kuchh to kaho halkaa saa koii ishaaraa to do merii aankhon men hai vo merii saanson men hai vo aur kahuun tumase kyaa koii mil gayaa   threedots

Title: tumhiin ne dil ko dil samajhaa nahiin hai
Lyrics: tumhiin ne dil ko dil samajhaa nahiin hai 2 koii aramaan na ho aisaa nahiin hai  dhuaan dekhaa kisii ne aur na sholaa 2 kabhii aise koii jalataa nahiin hai  hasiin aanchal men hain kitane sitaare hain kitane sitaare koii meraa hai in men yaa nahiin hai  mere siine men apanaa dard bhar do tum apanaa dard bhar do akele bojh ye uthataa nahiin hai  merii baahon se aage jaa rahii ho tum aage jaa rahii ho  magar aage koii duniyaa nahiin hai

Title: ghungharuu kii tarah bajataa hii rahaa huun
Lyrics: ghungharuu kii tarah bajataa hii rahaa huun main kabhii is pag men kabhii us pag men bandhataa hii rahaa huun main ghungharuu kii tarah threedots  kabhii tuut gayaa kabhii todaa gayaa sau baar mujhe phir jodaa gayaa yuun hii tuuttuut ke phir jutjut ke bajataa hii rahaa huun main ghungharuu kii tarah threedots  main karataa rahaa auron kii kahii mere man kii ye baat man hii men rahii hai ye kaisaa gilaa jisane jo kahaa karataa hii rahaa huun main ghungharuu kii tarah threedots  apanon men rahe yaa gairon men ghungharuu kii jagah to hai pairon men kabhii mandir men kabhii mahafil men sajataa hii rahaa huun main ghungharuu kii tarah threedots

Title: wo ke har ahademuhabbat se mukarataa jaaye
Lyrics: wo ke har ahademuhabbat se mukarataa jaaye dil wo zaalim ke usii shakhs pe marataa jaaye  mere pahaluu men wo aayaa bhii to kushbuu kii tarah main use jitanaa sametuun wo bikharataa jaaye  ishq kii narmnigaahii se binaa wo rukasaar kuub wo husn jo dekhe se nikharataa jaaye  khulate jaayen jo tere bandekabaa zulf ke saath rangepairaahanejaan aur nikharataa jaaye  kyuun na ham usako dilojaan se chaahen dushnaam wo jo ik dushmanejaan pyaar bhii karataa jaaye

Title: piyaa main to huii baavarii
Lyrics: piyaa main to huii baavarii ankhiyaan torii hain jaaduu bharii main to huii baavarii piyaa main to huii re baavarii huii re  more naram kalejavaa men chubh gaii suii re bhaaii man ko suurat terii saanvarii re saanvarii main to huii baavarii baavarii threedots  dil kii lagii morii jaanii na tumane tadape re moraa jiyaa laaj kii maarii main kuchh naa bolii aankhon ne sab kah diyaa terii bholii adaa pe piyaa main marii re marii main to huii baavarii baavarii threedots  rut aaii re pyaar kii aaii re chahun or javaanii chhaaii re mere man men baje hai miithii baansurii re baansurii main to huii baavarii baavarii threedots

Title: tum jo mil gae ho to ye lagataa hai ke jahaan mil gayaa
Lyrics: tum jo mil gae ho to ye lagataa hai ke jahaan mil gayaa ek bhuule hue raahii ko kaaravaan mil gayaa  baitho na duur hamase dekho khafaa na ho qismat se mil gae ho milake judaa na ho merii kyaa kataa hai hotaa hai ye bhii kii zamiin se aasamaan mil gayaa tum threedots  tum kyaa jaano tum kyaa ho ek suriilaa nagmaa ho bhiigii raaton men mastii tapate dil men saayaa ho ab jo aa gae ho jaane na duungaa kii mujhe ik hasiin meharabaan mil gayaa tum threedots  tum bhii the khoe khoe main bhii bujhaabujhaa thaa ajanabii zamaanaa apanaa koii na thaa dil ko jo mil gayaa hai teraa sahaaraa ik naii zindagii kaa nishaan mil gayaa tum threedots

Title: ultii ho gaiin sab tadabiiren
Lyrics: ultii ho gaiin sab tadabiiren kuchh na dawaa ne kaam kiyaa dekhaa is biimaariiedil ne aakir kaam tamaam kiyaa  ahadejawaanii ro ro kaataa piirii men liin aankhen muund yaanii raat bahut the jaage subah huii aaraam kiyaa  naahak ham majabuuron par ye tohamat hai muktaarii kii chaahate hain so aap kare hain hamako abas badanaam kiyaa  miir ke diinomazahab ko kyaa puuchhate ho duniyaa waalo  kashqaa khiinchaa kabakaa tark islaam kiyaa

Title: dil men samaa jaa
Lyrics: dil men samaa jaa dil men samaa jaa dil men samaa jaa  2  kaamosh hai jahaan madahosh hai fizaan   2 dil men samaa jaa dil men samaa jaa dil men samaa jaa  2   aa dil men samaa jaa aa dil men samaa jaa  2  hmmmmmmmmmmm  ai jaanejahaan jaanejigar jaanetamannaa sadqe tere dharatii meraa samaanetamannaa samaanetamannaa ai naazesaraapaa aa dil men samaa jaa threedots   mmmmhmmmmmm  sun mast adaa mast nazar mast javaanii  2 ai jaamemuhabbat hamen ye raktrjavaanii pii aur pilaa jaa aa dil men samaa jaa threedots  aa dil men samaa jaa threedots

Title: tum pukaar lo tumhaaraa intazaar hai
Lyrics: tum pukaar lo tumhaaraa intazaar hai tum pukaar lo kvaab chun rahii hai raat beqaraar hai tumhaaraa intazaar hai tum pukaar lo  honth pe liye hue dil kii baat ham jaagate rahenge aur kitanii raat ham muqtasar sii baat hai tum se pyaar hai tumhaaraa intazaar hai tum pukaar lo  dil bahal to jaayegaa is kayaal se haal mil gayaa tumhaaraa apane haal se raat ye qaraar kii beqaraar hai tumhaaraa intazaar hai tum pukaar lo

Title: aaj ham raushan karenge prem ke laakhon diye
Lyrics: laharaayaa tirangaa man ke himaalay se utarii hai naye ujaale kii gangaa laharaayaa tirangaa  aaj ham raushan karenge prem ke laakhon diye aaj se ham sab rahenge pyaar kaa amrit piye  aaj se ham sab jiyenge ek duuje ke liye qasam khaate hain ye ham hameshaa hii rahegaa jo hogaa aaj sangam qasam khaate hain ye ham aaj ham raushan karenge   threedots  aaj se har daal par kaliyaan khilengii pyaar kii aaj se hogii dilon men baat is iqaraar kii aaj se diivaar nafarat kii na uthane paayegii aaj se bas aavaaz yahii aayegii aaj ham raushan karenge   threedots  aaj se aane na denge ham dilon men duuriyaan aaj se hamako mitaane hain gam aur majabuuriyaan aaj se laayenge har jiivan men ik musakaan ham aaj se aisaa banaayenge ye hindustaan ham aaj ham raushan karenge   threedots

Title: gam nahiin jo tan se nikal dil gayaa
Lyrics: gam nahiin jo tan se nikal dil gayaa mil gaye tum mujhako sab kuchh mil gayaa  daagegam rozeazal hii mil gayaa tan men jaan aane se pahale dil gayaa  ai nigaaheyaas teraa ho buraa ghar talak rotaa huaa qaatil gayaa  marahale tay kunjeuzlat men kiye baithe baithe saikadon manzil gayaa  aaii jab saharaa men kushchashmon kii yaad saamane naragis kaa taktaa khil gayaa  vaaeqismat gaafil aayaa main amiir umr bhar gaafil rahaa gaafil gayaa

Title: o saanvalii o saanvalii o saanvalii matawaalii
Lyrics: o saanvalii o saanvalii o saanvalii matawaalii tuune hai kyuun churaa lii mujhako mujh se bachaa lii  dil men basii thii kal tak fariyaad aur aahen mehamaan ho gayii thiin is ghar men sau balaayen in sab se kah diyaa hai dil kyuun na kar de khaalii  hai aaj mere ghar men ek husn kaa kazaanaa bikharii huii hain zulfen chhedaa jo muskuraanaa kuchh bijaliyaan girii hon jaise ki ghataa kaalii  aane se yahaan tere ye saanvalii khilii hai mausam palat gayaa hai duniyaa badal gayii hai aankhon me jaag uthii hai mastii kii sau diwaalii

Title: tum to do din ke liye aa ke chalii jaatii ho
Lyrics: tum to do din ke liye aa ke chalii jaatii ho ghar meraa tumako bahut yaad kiyaa karataa hai  tum jo aatii ho to ek chaand utar aataa hai nuur hii nuur mere ghar men bikhar jaataa hai har taraf udatii hai shaadaab jawaanii kii mahak jaise tum hiin se har ek phuul mahak paataa hai aur phir jaate hii fariyaad kiyaa karataa hai  tum jo hotii ho to ithalaa ke hawaa chalatii hai chhed karatii huii balakhaa ke hawaa chalatii hai sarasaraate huye aanchal pe jo padatii hai nazar dekhataa kyaa huun ke sharamaa ke nazar chalatii hai tumase baaten dilenaashaad kiyaa karataa hai

Title: dil kii umangen hain javaan
Lyrics: he   dil kii umangen hain javaan       rang men duubaa hai samaa       main ne tumhen jiit liyaa       haar ke donon jahaan    gii  aap bhii gaaie naa       kyaa mushkil hai saragam bataauun          pa ma pa dha pa ga sa pa       dil kii umangen hain javaan       gaaie    praa dil kii umangen hain javaan gii  bahut achchhe praa rang men duubaa hai samaa gii  vaah vaah vaah  he   dil kii umangen hain javaan       aa haa haa haa haa haa haa gii  gaaie gaaie gaaie praa o ho ho ho ho ho ho gii  kyaa kahane  he   o o o o o       sadiyon puraanii ye zamiin       hai aaj kitanii hasiin       aataa nahiin hai yakiin       hotaa nahiin hai bayaan    gii  aap bhii gaaie praa dil kii umangen hain javaan       rang men duubaa hai samaa gii  jiyo jiyo praa main ne tumhen jiit liyaa he   uun huun main ne tumhen jiit liyaa       haar ke donon jahaan       dil kii umangen hain javaan          bhiige nazaaron se kaho       gaatii havaaon se kaho o o       jaatii bahaaron se kaho       ruk jaaye aaj yahaan          dil kii umangen hain javaan    gii  gaaie naa       kyaa mazaa aa rahaa hai       huun huun huun praa dil kii umangen hain javaan       rang men duubaa hai samaa he   main ne tumhen jiit liyaa       haar ke donon jahaan       dil kii umangen hain javaan    he   o o o o o gii  huun huun huun       bechain tanhaaiyaan       letii hain angadaaiyaan       halkii sii shahanaaiyaan       bajatii hain jaane kahaan          gaaie na ek baar aur    praa dil kii umangen hain javaan       rang men duubaa hai samaa   he   mainne tumhen jiit liyaa       haar ke donon jahaan    gii  aaie na aap bhii naachiye    he gii dil kii umangen hain javaan          rang men duubaa hai samaa he      main ne tumhen jiit liyaa gii     uun huun main ne tumhen jiit liyaa he gii haar ke donon jahaan

Title: ik din jaanaa ik din jaanaa hai
Lyrics: ik din jaanaa ik din jaanaa hai pii kii nagariyaa jaanaa  miiraa kahatii is jag se tuu rokegaa kyaa mujhako loklaaj kul kii maryaadaa sab chhoduungii tujhako ik din aanaa ik din aanaa hai jab tuu hogaa begaanaa  miiraa kahatii man se kaahe maayaa jaal bichhaae prem kii aisii aag lagegii main merii jal jaae prabhuu ik din paanaa ik din paanaa hai charan piyaa ke paanaa  miiraa kahatii maadhav se tuu kyaa chhipegaa mujhase duurii kaa main bhed mitaa ke aan miluungii tujhase ik din gaanaa ik din gaanaa hai giit milan kii gaanaa

Title: hausalaa aashiq ko chaahiye dil lagaane ke liye
Lyrics: hausalaa aashiq ko chaahiye dil lagaane ke liye kyuunki ye maashuuq hote hain sataane ke liye  raham kar dil men zaraa insaaf laane ke liye 2 ham faqat te ham faqat tere liye aur tuu zamaane ke liye  koshishen karate ho kyuun mere mitaane ke liye 2 phir milenge phir milenge kab tumhen ye naaz uthaane ke liye  wo udhar kanjarbakaf hain aazamaane ke liye 2 ham idhar hain ham idhar hain shauq men garadan kataane ke liye kataane ke liye hausalaa aashiq

Title: milii havaaon men udane kii vo sazaa yaaronjagjitlata gazal
Lyrics: j milii havaaon men udane kii vo sazaa yaaron  ke main zamiin ke rishton se kat gayaa yaaron   l vo bekhayaal musaafir main raastaa yaaron  kahaan tha bas men mere usako rokanaa yaaron   j mere kalam pe zamaane kii gard aisii thi  ke apane baare main na kuchh bhii likh sakaa yaaron   l tamaam shahar hii jisakii talaash men gam tha  main usake ghar ka pataa kis se puchhataa yaaron

Title: chaudhavii manzil pe zaalim aa gaayaa
Lyrics: chaudhavii manzil pe zaalim aa gaayaa chaand mere chaand se sharamaa gayaa  ho gaye dore gulaabii gaal ke rang to dekho sharaabii aankh ke jisane dekhaa be piye laharaa gayaa  zulf men rangat hai kaalii raat kii raat bhii kaisii kisii barasaat kii zulf laharaaii to baadal chhaa gayaa  do kanwal ke phuul hain yaa gaal hain kuchh sunaharii hai jhalak kuchh laal hain dekh kar faiyaaz main ghabaraa gayaa

Title: saavan ke jhuule pade tum chale aao
Lyrics: savan ke jhuule pade tum chale aao  4   anchal na chhode meraa pagal huii hai pavan  ab kya karuun main jatan dhadake jiyaa jaise panchhii ude   dil ne pukaaraa unhe yaadon ke parades se  ati hai jo dekh ke ham us dagar pe hain kabase khade   jab ham mile piyaa tum kitane naadaan the  ham kitane anjaan the baalii umariyaa men nainaa lade

Title: kabhii dil dil se takaraataa to hogaa
Lyrics: kabhii dil dil se takaraataa to hogaa2 unhe meraa khayaal aataa to hogaa2  naa rukate honge jab aankhon me aansuu2 aankhon me aansuu to paimaanaa to paimaanaa chhalak jaataa to hogaa unhe threedots  vo paa lete to honge dil pe kaabu dil pe kaabu2 unhe ye bhii2 kamaal aataa to hogaa kabhii dil threedots

Title: kaabe se butaqade se kabhii bazmeyaar se
Lyrics: kaabe se butaqade se kabhii bazmeyaar se aavaaz de rahaa huun tujhe har mukaam se  na aashanaa hai aaj vahii mere naam se duniyaa pukaaratii thii jinhe mere naam se  uf ye shabefiraaq ke maaron kii bekudii kud hi bujhaa diyaa hai charaagon ko shaam se  dil men fareb lab pe tabassum nazar men pyaar lute gae shamiim bade aihhtamaam se

Title: jhukatii ghataa gaatii havaa sapane jagaae
Lyrics: jhukatii ghataa gaatii havaa sapane jagaae nanhaa saa dil meraa machalmachal jaae  1 mahake hue dahake hue mast nazaare nikhare hue bikhare hue rang ke dhaare aaj pavan ho ke magan hamako bulaae jhukatii threedots  ravaana hai chhotii sii kashtii havaaon ke rukh par nadii ke saaz pe mallaah giit gaataa hai tumhaaraa jism har ik lahar ke jhakole se o merii shariir nigaahon men jhuul jaataa hai  2 jism meraa jaan bhii merii tere liye hai pyaar bharii duniyaa sajii tere liye hai aankhon men chhaae tere jalavon ke saae jhukatii threedots

Title: baadal kaalaa koyal kaalii us se kaalii raat hai
Lyrics: baadal kaalaa koyal kaalii us se kaalii raat hai us se kaalii zulf terii jo saavan kii hamaraaz hai baadal kaalaa   threedots  belaa goraa juhii gorii us se gorii chaandanii us se goraa mukhadaa teraa jis pe mujhako naaz hai baadal kaalaa   threedots  ambar niilaa saagar niilii us se niilaa niil kamal us se niilii aankhen terii jin men gaharaa raaz hai baadal kaalaa   threedots  sur hai miithaa lay hai miithii us se miithii raaginii us se miithe honth hain tere aur terii aavaaz hai baadal kaalaa   threedots

Title: jhilmil sitaaron ke tale aa meraa daaman thaam le
Lyrics: jhilmil sitaaron ke tale aa meraa daaman thaam le rangiin bahaaron ke tale aa meraa daaman thaam le  main tere dill kii baat huun thaharii huii barasaat huun kadamon pe jisake chaandanii main vo suhaanii raat huun ye husn kaa paigaam le aa meraa daaman thaam le   threedots  pyaasii nigaahon kii qasam khaamosh aahon kii qasam main huun saraapaa intazaar in kvaabgaahon kii qasam dil kii nazar se kaam le aa meraa daaman thaam le   threedots

Title: kaii sadiyon se kaii janamon se
Lyrics: kaii sadiyon se kaii janamon se	2 tere pyaar ko tarase meraa man aa jaa aa jaa ke adhuuraa hai apanaa milan kaii sadiyon se  raahon men kahiin nazar aayaa  apane hii khayaalon kaa saayaa	2 kuchh der meraa man laharaayaa o o o phir duub gaii aashaa kii kiran aa jaa aa jaa ke adhuuraa hai apanaa milan kaii sadiyon se  sapanon se mujhe na yuun bahalaa  paayal ke khoye giit jagaa		2 sunasaan hai jiivan kii bagiyaa o o o suunaa hai bahaaron kaa aangan aa jaa ke adhuuraa hai apanaa milan kaii sadiyon se

Title: main gaauun pad gaauun
Lyrics: main gaauun pad gaauun gun gaauun man bhaav taal sur gaauun  hai sabad banyo yo gyaanasaar kabiiraa ke piy dhyaan dharii miiraa baurii jaagii sat suur kahat sab dhaayo   suur  surdas  raadhaa gopii kubajaa priy sakhaa udho prabhu gaauun

Lyrics: ra 	ban ke saathii pyaar kii raahon men 	hamase kabhii tum naa judaa honaa 2 la 	ruuth jaae jahaan hamase tum naa kabhii kafaa honaa do 	ban ke saathii threedots  ra 	ye hamaarii zindagaanii pyaar kii hai ik kahaanii la 	is jahaan kaa har nazaaraa pyaar kaa hai ik ishaaraa do 	bhuul naa jaanaa o sanam ra 	ban ke saathii threedots  	ye tamannaa hai hamaarii saath guzare umr saarii la 	pyaar kaa daaman ham na chhoden tum na bhuulo ham naa toden do 	koii vaadaa yaa qasam ra 	ban ke saathii threedots do 	ban ke saathii threedots

Title: dil ke bahalaane kii tadabiir to hai
Lyrics: dil ke bahalaane kii tadabiir to hai tuu nahiin hai terii tasaviir to hai  hamasafar chod gae mujhako to kyaa saath mere merii taqadiir to hai  purasishehaal ko wo aa hii gae kuch bhii ho ishq men taasiir to hai  gam ki duniyaa rahe aabaad shakiil muflisii men koii jaagiir to hai

Title: dekh lo aaj hamako jii bharake
Lyrics: ishq men hamane ye kamaaii kii dil diyaa gam se aashanaaii kii  dekh lo aaj hamako jii bharake koii aataa nahiin hai phir marake  go thikaane nahiin hai hoshohawaas itanaa kahane ko hai bulaayaa paas dekh lo threedots  baageaalam se naamuraad chale dil men lekar tumhaarii yaad chale dekh lo threedots  phir ham uthane lage bithaa lo tum phir bigad jaayen ham manaa lo tum dekha lo threedots  hashr tak hogii phir ye baat kahaan tum kahaan ham kahaan ye raat kahaan dekh lo aaj hamako jii bharake koii aataa nahiin hai phir marake

Title: tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam
Lyrics: ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam     tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam koras aathreedots  ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam 2     ab yahaan se kahaan jaaen ham     terii baahon men mar jaaen ham la tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam     ab yahaan se kahaan jaaen ham     terii baahon men mar jaaen ham ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam koras aathreedots  la aankhen merii sapane tere     dil meraa yaaden terii ku meraa hai kyaa sab kuchh teraa     jaan terii saansen terii la merii aankhon men aansuu tere aa gae     muskuraane lage saare gam ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam la ab yahaan se kahaan jaaen ham     terii baahon men mar jaaen ham ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     la ye dil kahiin lagataa nahiin     kyaa kahuun main kyaa karuun ku haan tuu saamane baithii rahe     main tujhe dekhaa karuun la tuu ne aavaaz dii dekh main aa gaii     pyaar se hai badii kyaa kasam  ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam la tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam     pyaar hotaa hai diivaanaa sanam ku ab yahaan se kahaan jaaen ham     terii baahon men mar jaaen ham koras aathreedots  ku tujhe dekhaa to ye jaanaa sanam    koras aathreedots

Title: brindaavan kaa krishhn kanhaiyaa

Title: tere bachapan ko javaanii kii duaa detii huun
Lyrics: tere bachapan ko javaanii kii duaa detii huun aur duaa deke pareshaan sii ho jaatii huun  mere munne mere gulazaar ke nanhe paudhe tujhako haalat kii aandhii se bachaane ke liye aaj main pyaar ke aanchal men chhupaa letii huun kal ye kamazor sahaaraa bhii na haasil hogaa kal tujhe kaanton bharii raahon pe chalanaa hogaa zindagaanii kii kadii dhuup men jalanaa hogaa tere bachapan ko javaanii threedots  tere maathe pe sharaafat kii koi mohar nahiin chand hote hain muhabbat ke sukuun hii kyaa hain jaise maaon kii muhabbat kaa koi mol nahiin mere maasuum farishte tuu abhii kyaa jaane tujhako kiskisakii gunaahon kii sazaa milanii hai diin aur dharm ke maare hue insaanon kii jo nazar milanii hai tujhako vo khafaa milanii hai tere bachapan ko javaanii threedots  bediyaan leke lapakataa huaa kaanuun kaa haath tere maanbaap se jab tujhako milii ye saugaat kaun laaegaa tere vaaste khushiyon kii baaraat mere bachche tere anjaam se jii darataa hai terii dushman hii na saabit ho javaanii terii khaak jaatii hai jise sochake mamataa merii usii anjaam ko pahunche na kahaanii terii tere bachapan ko javaanii threedots

Title: sur mile hain gul khile hain  ham kahaan aa gae
Lyrics: sur mile hain gul khile hain mastii men jhuume meraa dil kyaa nazaare hain kyaa ishaare hain aankhon ke aage hai manzil sur mile hain threedots  ham kahaan aa gae ham kahaan aa gae  ho sur mile hain threedots  bhanvare ne kaliyon se kahaa mausam zaraa hai badagumaan ho o dulhan banii hai ye zamiin kitanaa suhaanaa hai samaan o saanson kaa gaanaa chhedo koii fasaanaa chhedo koii taraanaa chhedo haan ham kahaan aa gae threedots  haan saathii jo koii sang ho chalane kaa aataa hai mazaa o tanahaa guzaare jo koii ye zindagaanii hai sazaa o yaadon ke rele honge he vaadon ke mele honge ham naa akele honge haan ham kahaan aa gae threedots  sinduurii shaam ho gaii panchhii gharon ko chal pade haan dariyaa kii mauje hain thamiin panaghat pe khaalii hain ghade o shabanam kii pyaalii pyaalii pedon kii daalii daalii gaae koyaliyaa kaalii haan ham kahaan aa gae threedots

Lyrics: na puuchho pyaar kii hamane vo haqiiqat dekhii vafaa ke naam pe bikatii huii ulfat dekhii kisii ne luut liyaa aur hamen kabar na huii khulii jo aankh to barbaad muhabbat dekhii  sab kuchh lutaa ke hosh men aae to kyaa kiyaa din men agar charaag jalaae to kyaa kiyaa  main vo kalii huun jo na bahaaron men khil sakii 2 vo dil huun jisako pyaar kii manzil na mil sakii manzil na mil sakii patthar pe hamane phuul chadhaae to kyaa kiyaa  jo mil na sakaa pyaar gam kii shaam to mile2 ik bevafaa se pyaar kaa anjaam to mile ai maut jald aa 2 zaraa aaraam to mile do din kushii ke dekh na paae to kyaa kiyaa   karate rahe kizaan se ham saudaa bahaar kaa badalaa diyaa to kyaa ye diyaa unake pyaar kaa  sab kuchh lutaa ke hosh men aaye to kyaa kiyaa 2 din men agar charaag jalaaye to kyaa kiyaa sab kuchh lutaa ke hosh men aaye to kyaa kiyaa 2  ham badanasiib pyaar kii rusavaaii ban gaye 2 kud hii lagaa ke aag tamaashaaii ban gaye tamaashaaii ban gaye daaman se ab ye shole bujhaaye to kyaa kiyaa din men agar charaag jalaaye to kyaa kiyaa sab kuchh lutaa ke hosh men aaye to kyaa kiyaa 2  lele ke haar phuulon ke aaii to thii bahaar 2 nazaren uthaake hamane hii dekhaa na ek baar dekhaa na ek baar aankhon se ab ye parade hataaye to kyaa kiyaa din men agar charaag jalaaye to kyaa kiyaa sab kuchh lutaa ke hosh men aaye to kyaa kiyaa 2

Title: jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye
Lyrics: kalii kab tak chhupegii ek bhanvare kii nigaah se chamak jaatii hai bijalii khud hii in gaharii ghataaon men baras padatii hai shabanam aap hii thandii fizaaon se are jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye kitane paanii men ho pahachaan gaye tum kitane paanii men ho pahachaan gaye jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye  aa kinaare aa ke laharon kaa ishaaraa dekhane vaale tujhe apanii khabar bhii hai nazaaraa dekhane vaale tamashaa khud na ban jaanaa tamashaa dekhane vaale jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye  aa badal kar bhes paravaane kaa shamaa jhilamilaatii hai nashiilii shaam ke parde men subah muskuraatii hai vo sholaa ho ki chingarii machal kar naach jaatii hai to dhadakate dil se mere madabharii aavaaz aatii hai jaa jaa are jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye  aa shamaa se bach ke rahanaa saarii tan man ko jalaa degii vo sholaa ho ki chingarii lagii men aur lagaa degii subaha jab muskuraayegii to vo tuufaan uthaa degii khulegaa shaam ka pardaa vo tujh ko bhii mitaa degii jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye  aa ye kaalii reshamii zulfen sharaabii nain ke pyaale ye dil kaa haal kah dete hain donon ye hii matavaale nahiin darate kisii se jiit kar bhii haarane vaale qayaamat kii nazar rakhate hain lekin taadane vaale jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye  aa ye zulfen to nahiin dasane vaale naag hain kaale ye do aankhen nahiin zahar se bharpuur hain pyaale tuu aankhen rakh ke bhii behosh hai are taadane vaale qayaamat saamane hai jaan ke pad jaayenge laale jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa re tujhe ham jaan gaye

Title: karam kii gati nyaarii
Lyrics: raam kahie govind kahie3  karam kii gati nyaarii santon  bade bade nayan diye miragan ko ban ban phirat ughaarii santon   ujjawal varan diinhii bagalan ko koyal kar diinhii kaarii santon   auran diipan jal nirmal kiinhii saundar karatii nikhaarii santon   muurakh ko tum raaj diyat ho pandit phirat bhikhaarii santon  miiraa ke prabhu giridhar naagun raajaajii ko kaun bichaarii santon

Title: andhe jahaan ke andhe raaste jaayen to jaayen kahaan
Lyrics: andhe jahaan ke andhe raaste  jaaen to jaaen kahaan duniyaa to duniyaa  tuu bhii paraayaa  ham yahaan naa vahaan  jiine kii chaahat nahiin  mar ke bhii raahat nahiin is paar aansuu  us paar aahen  dil meraa bezubaan andhe jahaan ke threedots  ham ko na koi bulaae  naa koi palaken bichhaae ai gam ke maaron manzil vahiin hai dam ye tuute jahaan andhe jahaan ke threedots  aagaaz ke din teraa anjaam tay ho chukaa jalate rahen hain  jalate rahenge ye zamiin aasamaan andhe jahaan ke threedots

Title: aa jaa ke intazaar men jaane ko hai bahaar bhii
Lyrics: aa jaa ke intazaar men jaane ko hai bahaar bhii tere bagair zindagii dard ban ke rah gai  aramaan liye baithe hain ham siine men hai teraa hii gam tere dil se pyaar kii vo tadap kidhar gai  aa jaa ke intazaar threedots  dil kii sadaa pe ai sanam badhate gae mere kadam ab to chaahe jo bhii ho dil tujhe main de chukii aa jaa ke intazaar threedots

Title: jiyaa jale jaan jale
Lyrics: jiyaa jale jaan jale nainon tale dhuaan chale dhuaan chale raat bhar dhuaan chale jaanuun na jaanuun na jaanuun na sakhi rii jiyaa jale jaan jale   threedots  dekhate hain tan meraa man men chibhatii hai nazar honth sil jaate unake narm honthon pe magar ginatii rahatii huun main apanii karavaton ke silasile kyaa karuun kaise kahuun raat kab kaise dhale jiyaa jale jaan jale   threedots  ang ang men jalatii hain dard kii chingaariyaan masale phuulon kii mahak men titaliyon kii kyaariyaan raat bhar bechaari mehandii pisatii rahii pairon tale kyaa karuun kaise kahuun raat kab kaise dhale jiyaa jale jaan jale   threedots

Title: zindagii zulm sahii zabr sahii gam hii sahii
Lyrics: zindagii zulm sahii zabr sahii gam hii sahii dil kii fariyaad sahii ruuh kaa maatam hii sahii zindagii zulm sahii threedots  hamane har haal men jiine kii kasam khaaii hai ab yahii haal muqaddar hai to shiqavaa kyon ho ham saliike se nibhaa denge jo din baakii hain chaah rusavaa na huii dard bhii rusavaa kyon ho zindagii zulm sahii threedots  hamako taqadiir se bevajah shikaayat kyon ho isii taqadiir ne chaahat kii khushii bhii dii thii aaj agar kaanpatii palakon ko diye hain aansuu kal thirakate hue honthon ko hansii bhii dii thii zindagii zulm sahii threedots  ham hain maayuus magar itane bhii maayuus nahiin ek na ek din to yah ashkon kii ladii tuutegii ek na ek din to chhatenge yah gamon ke baadal ek na ek din ujaale kii kiran phuutegii zindagii zulm sahii threedots

Title: dilabar kahuun yaa dilarubaa tujhe
Lyrics: ho ho laa laa dilabar kahuun yaa dilarubaa tujhe dar hai kudaa kaa varanaa main to kahataa kudaa tujhe main jaan kahuun zindagii yaa jaanejahaan tujhe merii vafaa ne maan liyaa apanaa kudaa tujhe  kyuun dhuum shaayaron men na ho tere naam kii gaalib kii tuu gazal hai rubaaii kayyaam kii kyaa kuub shaayaraanaa milii hai adaa tujhe merii vafaa ne maan liyaa threedots  terii nazar hasiin thii jo main hasiin lagii chaahat to aasamaan tujhe ve zamiin dii maine dikhaa diyaa hai aaiinaa tujhe dar hai kudaa kaa varanaa threedots  sab kuchh main bhuul baithaa lagaakar gale tujhe duniyaa kii har kushii thii tere dard men mujhe ab mujhase kar sakegii na duniyaa judaa tujhe dar hai kudaa kaa varanaa threedots

Title: kaisaa teraa pyaar kaisaa gussaa hai teraa
Lyrics: kaisaa teraa pyaar kaisaa gussaa hai teraa taubaa sanam taubaa sanam  ik dillagii main ne kii thii tuu ne kyon dil se lagaa lii tuu bhii muskuraa de mujhe bhii hansaa de o mere achchhe balam taubaa sanam taubaa sanam  main ik teraa diivaanaa dekhe tujhe kyon zamaanaa dekhe mere nainaa dil men chhupe rahanaa rakahanaa na baahar kadam merii qasam merii qasam  aisaa meraa pyaar aisaa gusaa hai meraa terii qasam terii qasam  apanii kataa main ne maanii ab chhod bhii ye kahaanii

Title: aaj puraanii raahon se koii mujhe aavaaz na de
Lyrics: aaj puraanii raahon se koi mujhe aavaaz na de dard men duube giit na de gam kaa sisakataa saaz na de  biite dinon kii yaad thii jinamen main vo taraane bhuul chukaa aaj naii manzil hai merii kal ke thikaane bhuul chukaa na vo dil na sanam na vo diindharam ab duur huun saare gunaahon se  jiivan badalaa duniyaa badalii man ko anokhaa gyaan milaa aaj mujhe apane hii dil men ek nayaa inasaan milaa pahunchaa huun vahaan nahiin duur jahaan bhagavaan kii nek nigaahon se  tuut chuke sab pyaar ke bandhan aaj koii zanjiir nahiin shiishaaedil men aramaanon kii aaj koii tasviir nahiin ab shaad huun main aazaad huun main kuchh kaam nahiin hai aahon se

Title: shauq se aayen gam zamaane ke
Lyrics: shauq se aayen gam zamaane ke dar khule hain gariibakaane ke  ye muhabbat ye dostii ye wafaa sab wasiile hain dil dukhaane ke  kyaa sune koii daastaanehayaat laakh unawaan hain ik fasaane ke  ik kazaanaa hai zindagii faaqir ashq motii hain is kazaane ke

Title: raushan huii raat
Lyrics: raushan huii raat vo aasamaan se utarake zamiin pe aayaa raushan huii raat mariyam kaa betaa muhabbat ka sandesh laayaa  duniyaa men vo maharabaan saath laayaa sachchaaii ke ujaale duniyaa men banake masiihaa vo aayaa ki hamako duhkhon se bachaa le raushn huii raat   threedots  vo aayaa siine se unako lagaane ko hain yahaam besahaare vo aayaa baahon men unako chhupaane jo hain yahaam gam ke maare  raushan huii raat jab jagamagaayaa puurab gagan kaa sitaaraa rushan huii raat huqmekudaa se mariyam ne yesuu pukaaraa raushan huii raat   threedots

Title: janam maran ke saathii
Lyrics: saathii4 chirasaathii  janam maran ke saathii hamaare janam maran ke saathii prabhu dhani bisaruun nahiin din raatii  pal pal tero ruup nihaaruun nirakh nirakh sukh paatii miiraa ke prabhu param manohar hari charan chit raakhii janam maran ke saathii hamaare threedots

Title: akelaa chal re ho fakiiraa chal re
Lyrics: ho akelaa chal re ho fakiiraa chal re o sunake terii pukaar sang chalane ko tere koii ho na ho taiyaar himmat na haar chal chalaa chal akelaa chal chalaa chal threedots fakiira chal chalaa chal  bachapan men huaa ghar se beghar aaj talak naa bas paayaa ghar men lagii jo aag vo bujh gaii  jalatii rahii terii kaayaa biitii baaten bisaar  aisaa koii nahiin jo na ho gam se bezaar himmat na haar threedots  jisane liyaa sankalp sabhii ke dukh aur dard mitaane kaa usape hansaa jag usane kabhii naa  paayaa saath zamaane kaa le le auron kaa bhaar  koi jinakaa nahiin hai unakaa jiivan sanvaar himmat na haar threedots  suuraj chandaa taare juganuu sabakii apanii hastii hai jisamen jitanaa niir ho badalii  utanii der barasatii hai terii shaktii apaar  tuu to laayaa re akelaa gangaa dharatii pe utaar himmat na haar threedots  vo kyaa samajhe dard kisii kaa jisane dukh naa jhelaa ho do ab aur do haath ho jisake  vo kaahe ko akelaa ho aae sankat hazaar  terii kaatir koii na khole kabhii na apanaa dvaar himmat na haar threedots

Title: karate hain ishaare falak se chaand taare
Lyrics: tri o o o karate hain ishaare falak se chaand taare      o dilarubaa tuu gaaye jaa l   o o o pyaar kaa ye ishaaraa badaa hai pyaaraa pyaaraa      nazar se dil men aaye jaa  tri nazar se dil men kaise aayen      aap hii dil men aake bataaen l   chhodo ye bahaanaa aisii baaten na banaanaa      main huun shamaa tuu hai paravaanaa      pyaar kaa ye taraanaaa rubaab se sunaae jaa tri karate hain ishaare   threedots   l   lab par aaye mast taraane      chhalake taaron ke paimaane tri raat nashiilii dekho chaand hai nashiilaaa      mere saathii qadam hain dagamagaae      hain mastiyon men aae      ye ruup tuu dikhaae jaa do  o pyaar kaa ye taraanaa   threedots

Title: vo aankh se pilaa gaye
Lyrics: vo aankh se pilaa gaye pilaa gaye pilaa gaye mastiyaan lutaa gaye vo aankh se threedots  aaye aaye aa ke saaraa gam bhulaa gaye mastiyaan lutaa gaye vo aankh se threedots  bahaar hamaarii ghar men aaii prem kii ghataa jhuumake chhaaii   2 soii praan men jaage umangen jaaduon chalaa gaye aake saaraa gam bhuulaa gaye mastiyaan lutaa gaye vo aankh se threedots  pyaar kaa miithaa giit sunaayaa shokhiyon ke matalab ko bataayaa  2 dil ke baag men aa ke ek baar  phuul sab khilaa gaye aa ke saaraa gam bhuulaa gaye mastiyaan lutaa gaye vo aankh se threedots

Title: aise na mujhe tum dekho siine se lagaa luungaa
Lyrics: aise na mujhe tum dekho siine se lagaa luungaa tum ko main churaa luungaa tumase dil men basaa chhupaa luungaa  tere dil se ai dilabar dil meraa kahataa hai pyaar ke dushman log mujhe dar lagataa rahataa hai thaam lo tum merii baahon main tumhen sambhaaluungaa tumako main churaa luungaa tumase dil men basaa luungaa  dhiimiidhiimii aag se sholaa bhadakaayaa hai duur se tumane is dil ko kitanaa tadapaayaa hai main ab is dil ke saare armaan nikaaluungaa tum ko main churaa luungaa tumase dil men basaa luungaa  pyaar ke daaman men chun kar ham phuul bhar lenge raaste ke saare kaante duur kar denge jaaneman tumako apanii main jaan banaa luungaa tum ko main churaa luungaa tumase dil men basaa luungaa

Title: o maanjhii re apanaa kinaaraa nadiyaa kii dhaaraa hai
Lyrics: o maanjhii re  apanaa kinaaraa  nadiyaa kii dhaaraa hai o maanjhii re threedots  saahilon pe bahane vaale  kabhii sunaa to hogaa kahiin o threedots ho  kaagazon kii kashtiyon kaa kahiin kinaaraa hotaa nahiin ho maanjhii re threedots maanjhii re  koi kinaaraa jo kinaare se mile vo apanaa kinaaraa hai threedots o maanjhii re threedots  paaniyon men bah rahe hain kai kinaare tuute hue o threedots ho raaston men mil gae hain     sabhii sahaare chhuute hue threedots koi sahaaraa majhadhaare men mile vo apanaa sahaaraa hai threedots  o maanjhii re  apanaa kinaaraa  nadiyaa kii dhaaraa hai o maanjhii re threedots

Title: chorii chorii merii galii aanaa hai buraa
Lyrics: chorii chorii merii galii aanaa hai buraa  aig aa ke binaa baat kiye jaanaa hai buraa  aig  achchhe nahiin ye ishaare pedon tale chhupchhupaake aao na do baaten kar len nazaron se nazare milaa ke din hain pyaar ke mauj bahaar ke dekho bhole bhaale dil ko tadapaanaa hai buraa chorii chorii merii galii aanaa hai buraa threedots  dil aa gayaa hai to pyaare badanaam hone kaa dar kyaa ishqovafaa kii galii men duniyaa ke gam kaa guzar kyaa din hain pyaar ke mauj bahaar ke dekho bhole bhaale dil ko tadapaanaa hai buraa chorii chorii merii galii aanaa hai buraa threedots

Title: hazaar raahen mudake dekhiin
Lyrics: ki hazaar raahen mudake dekhiin  kahiin se koi sadaa na aaii  l badi vafaa se nibhaaii tumane  hamaarii thodii si bevafaaii threedots  ki jahaan se tum mod mud gaye the  2 vo mod ab bhi vahii khade hain  l ham apane pairon men jaane kitane  2 bhanvar lapete hue khade hain  badi vafaa se nibhaii tumane  hamaarii thodii si bevafaai threedots  ki kahiin kisii roz yuun bhi hota  hamaarii haalat tumhaarii hoti  l jo raaten hamane guzaarii marake  vo raat tumane guzaarii hotiin  badi vafaa se nibhaaii tumane  hamaarii thodii si bevafaaiithreedots   ki unhen ye zid thi ke ham bulaate  hamen ye ummiid vo pukaaren  l hai naam honthon men ab bhi lekin aavaaz men pad gai daraaren   ki hazaar rahen mudake dekhiin  kahiin se koi sadaa na aaii  l badi vafaa se nibhaaii tumane  hamaarii thodii si bevafaaiithreedots

Title: honthon se chhuulo tum meraa giit amar kar do
Lyrics: honthon se chhuulo tum meraa giit amar kar do ban jaao miit mere merii priit amar kar do  na umar kii siimaa ho na janam kaa ho bandhan jab pyaar kare koii to dekhe keval man naii riit chalaakar tum ye riit amar kara do honthon se chhuulo tum  threedots  jag ne chhiinaa mujhase mujhe jo bhii lagaa pyaaraa sab jiitaa kiye mujhase main har dam hii haaraa tum haar ke dil apanaa merii jiit amar kar do honthon se chhuulo tum  threedots  aakaash kaa suunaapan mere tanahaa man men paayal chhanakaatii tum aajaao jiivan men saansen dekar apanii sangiit amar kar do honthon se chhuulo tum  threedots

Title: khudaa hamako aisii khudaaii naa de  jagjit gazal
Lyrics: khudaa hamako aisi khudaai naa de ki apane sivaa kuchh dikhaaii naa de  hanso aaj itanaa ki is shor men salaah ke sivaa kuchh sunaaii naa de  abhii to badan men lahuu hai bahut kalam chhiil le roshanaaii naa de  khudaa aise ehasaas kaa naam hai rahe saamane par dikhaaii naa de

Title: ai gamedil kyaa karuun
Lyrics: shahar kii raat aur main naashaadonaakaaraa firuun jagamagaatii jaagatii sadakon pe aavaaraa firuun  ai gamedil kyaa karuun ai vahashatedil kyaa karuun kyaa karuun kyaa karuun ai gamedil kyaa karuun  ye ruupahalii chhaanv ye aakaash par taaron kaa jaal jaise suufii kaa tasavvur jaise aashiq kaa khayaal aah lekin kaun samajhe kaun jaane dil kaa haal ai gamedil kyaa karuun threedots  raaste men ruk ke dam luun ye merii aadat nahiin laut kar vaapas chalaa jaaun merii fitarat nahiin aur koi hamanavaa mil jaae ye qismat nahiin ai gamedil kyaa karuun threedots  ai gamedil kyaa karuun ai vahashatedil kyaa karuun kyaa karuun kyaa karuun ai gamedil kyaa karuun  mujhako qismat ne banaya gandale pani ka kanval kak men mil mil gae sab arazu ke ye mahal kya khabar thi yun meri taqadir jaegi badal ai gamedil threedots  ruthane vale kisi majabur se ruthega kya jis tarah qismat ne luta yun koi lutega kya ye mere tute hue dil aur tu tutega kya ai gamedil threedots

Title: are raftaa raftaa dekho aankh merii ladii hai
Lyrics: ki are suno suno o bhaaiyon bahanon are magan bhaaii o chhagan bhaaii o saamaalo re daamaalo o suno suno o raaghobaa o dhondiibaa o karnal sinh o jarnail sinh o tussii bhii suno paappe ki  are raftaa raftaa dekho aankh merii ladii hai 2 aankh jisase ladii hai vo paas mere khadii hai mujhe jaanatii hai jabase ye maratii hai tabase main bhii isase chorii chhupe chaahataa huun tabase dil men ye mere bas gaii  ai kudii fans gai   re  ye tum kyaa kah rahe ho  maine aisaa to nahiin kahaa thaa  ki  he he  are raftaa raftaa dekho aankh merii ladii hai aankh jisase ladii hai vo paas mere khadii hai ki  mujhe pyaar sikhaayaa kisane isane 2 mujhe pyaar sikhaake diivaanaa banaayaa kisane isane ye pyaar kaa kamaal hai sharaab kaa suruur nahiin honaa thaa so ho gayaa kisiikaa bhii qusuur nahiin haathon men mere ras gai  e kudii fans gai  re  ohfo ye tum kyaa kah rahe ho maine aisaa to nahiin kahaa thaa  ki   hmm hmmmm  are raftaa threedots  ki  are pahalii sharaarat kisane kii isane kii  2 are pahalii sharaarat karake mohabbat kisane kii isane kii isako pasand main mujhe ye pasand hai dil mil jaate  baaten yahaan band hain baat hai ye asalii   o paandobaa poragii fasalii re fasalii re  paagal ho gae ho kyaa maine aisaa to nahiin kahaa thaa ki  aagaye zavaal ye laajo nako 4  raaghobaa dhondiibaa paandobaa   marathi names  aagaye zavaal ye laajo nako   dont be shy come close  porgii fasalii re fasalii   marathi for ladki pat gaii

Title: apane honthon kii bansii banaale mujhe
Lyrics: la apane honthon kii bansii banaale mujhe  meri saanson men teri saans ghul jaae   ki aarazuu to hamaarii bhi hai ye magar  dar hai mausam kahiin na badal jaae   la dekhaa tujhe chadhaa ye kaisaa nashaa  chalii ye kaisii havaa bhule ham ghar ka pataa ho ho  ab to nahiin hamase honaa judaa  apanii baahon ka ghuunghat udhaa de mujhe  pyaar kii ye na dolii nikal jaae  ki aarazuu   ho ho ho   ye to bataa kahaan rakhuun ye kamal  zindagaanii hai meri ret ka ek mahal ho ho  yaad jaise ho koi ati gazal  apanii raton ka dipak banaale mujhe  ye sulagatii huii shaam jal jaae   dono paas to aa ye din mar jaane ka hai  ho ye din kuchh khone ka hai  ye din kuchh paane ka hai  mausam ye ruuthane manaane ka hai   apane daaman kii khushabuu banaale mujhe  dil ke suune men koi phuul khil jaae  aarazuu

Title: barasen buundiyaan saavan kii
Lyrics: barasen buundiyaan saavan kii saavan kii man bhaavan kii  saavan men umagyo mero man bhanak sunii hari aavan kii umadghumad chahuu dishaa se aayo daaminii damake jhar laavan kii  nanhiinanhii buundan mehaa barasen shiital pavan suhaavan kii miiraa ke prabhu giridhar naagar aanand mangal gaavan kii  barase buundiyaan saavan kii saavan kii man bhaavan kii

Title: yuun niind se vo jaanechaman jaag uthii hai
Lyrics: yuun niind se vo jaanechaman jaag uthii hai parades main phir yaadevatan jaag uthii hai yuun niinda se vo jaanaechamanathreedots  phira yaada hamen aaye hain saavana ke vo jhuule vo bhuula gaye hamako unhen ham nahiin bhuule unhe hama nahiin bhuule isa darda ke kaanton kii chubhana jaaga uthii hai paradesa men phira yaadaevatana jaaga uthii hai  hama loga sayaane sahii diivane hain lekina begaane bahuta achchhe hain begaane hain lekina begaane hain lekina begaano men apanon kii lagana jaaga uthii hai paradesa men phira yaadaevatana jaaga uthii hai  is shahar se thaa achchhaa bahut apanaa vo gaanv panaghat hai yahaan koii naa piipal kii vo chhaanv pashchim men vo puurab kii pavan jaag uthii hai parades men phir yaadevatan jaag uthii hai  yuun niinda se vo jaanaechamanathreedots

Title: sapt suran tiin graam
Lyrics: sapt suran tiin graam gaavo sab guniijan ikkiis muurchhanaa taanbaan ko milaavo 2 audhava sankiiran svar sampuuran raag bhed 2 alankaar bhuushan ban 2 raag ko sajaavo sapt suran   saa sur saadho man re apane rab ko chain 2 gaandhaar tajo gumaan 2 madhyam moksha paavo pancham parameshvar dhaivat dharo dhyaan 2 nii nit din prabhuu charan shiital aavo  sapt suran tiin gram gaavo sab guniijan  ikkis muurchhanaa taanbaan ko milaavo sapt

Title: merii qisamat men tuu nahiin shaayad
Lyrics: merii qisamat men tuu nahiin shaayad kyon teraa intazaar karataa huun main tujhe kal bhii pyaar karataa thaa main tujhe ab bhii pyaar karataa huun merii qisamat men tuu nahiin shaayad   threedots  sochataa huun ki merii aankhon ne kyon sajaaye the pyaar ke sapane tujhase maangii thii ik khushii main ne tuune gam bhii nahiin diye apane zindagii bojh ban gayii ab to ab to jiitaa huun aur na marataa huun main tujhe kal bhii pyaar karataa thaa main tujhe ab bhii pyaar karataa huun   threedots  aaj samajhii huun pyaar ko shaayad aaj main tujhase pyaar karatii huun kal meraa intazaar thaa tujhako aaj main intazaar karatii huun aaj samajhii huun pyaar ko shaayad   threedots  ab na tuute ye pyaar ke rishte ab ye rishte sambhaalane honge merii raahon se tujhe kal kii tarah jhuk ke kaante nikaalane honge mil na jaaye jhushii ke raste men gam kii parachhaaiyon se daratii huun kal meraa intazaar thaa tujhako aaj main intazaar karatii huun   threedots

Title: shaam dekho dhal rahii hai
Lyrics: l shaam dekho dhal rahii hai  panchhii dekho jaa rahe hai  tu bhi chal mere sang o jivan saathii   threedots   rafii shaam dekho dhal rahii hai  panchhii dekho jaa rahe hai  tu bhi chal mere sang o jivan saathii threedots  dono shaam dekho dhal rahii hai   l hai shaam ke anchal main mastii hai bhiigii bhiigii  aur de rahii hai dhadakan aavaaz dhiimii dhiimii  aavaaz dhiimii dhiimii  tu bhi chal mere sang o jivan saathii threedots  shaam dekho dhal threedots   rafii ye niil kamal si aankhen hai kaajal bin kajarari  hai ras sambhalake  ye sundar pyaarii pyaarii  ye sundar pyaarii pyaarii  tu bhi chal mere sang o jivan saathii threedots  shaam dekho dhal threedots

Title: meraa dil jo meraa hotaa
Lyrics: meraa dil jo meraa hotaa palakon pe pakad letii honthon pe uthaa letii haathon me khudaa hotaa meraa dil   threedots  suuraj ko masal ke main chandan ke tarah malatii sone kaa badan le kar kundan kii tarah jalatii is gore se chehare par aainaa fidaa hotaa meraa dil   threedots  barasaa hai kahiin par to aakaash samundar men ik buund hai chandaa kii utare na samundar men do haathon ke okh men ye gir padataa to kyaa hotaa haathon men khudaa hotaa meraa dil   threedots

Title: kab tak dil kii kair manaayen
Lyrics: kab tak dil kii kair manaayen kab tak rah dikhalaaoge kab tak chain kii mohalat doge kab tak yaad na aaoge  biitaa dard ummiid kaa mausam kaaq udaatii aankhon men kab bhejoge dard kaa baadal kab barakhaa barasaaoge  ahadewafaa aur tarqemuhabbat jo chaaho so aap karo apane bas kii baat hii kyaa hai hamase kyaa manawaaoge  kisane wasl kaa suuraj dekhaa kis par hijr kii raat dhalii gesuon waale kaun the kyaa the unako kyaa jatalaaoge  faiz dilon ke bhaag men hai ghar basanaa bhii lut jaanaa bhii tum us husn ke lutfokaram par kitane din itaraaoge

Title: labekhaamosh se afshaa hogaa
Lyrics: ye maukaa hai apane khaaseyaar ko khush karane kaa threedots   ise suniye to aashik gaa rahe hain lekin mahabuubaa bhi gaa sakatii hai  kuchh editingke baad kyunke agar ladakiyaan khaasokhaas ho sakatii hain  to ladake bhi koi khaaseaam nahiin  thiik kah rahi huun na ham aapake liye khaas aap hamaare liye khaas ye baat aur hai ke aap bayaan kar dete hain aur ham nahii   hrule labekhaamosh se afshaa hogaa  raaz har rang men rusavaa hogaa   2 kis tavvaako pe kisii ko dekhen  2 koi tumasa bhi hasiin kya hogaa  3  jis bhi fanakaar ka shahakaar ho tum  2 usane sadiyon tumhen sochaa hogaa  2 raaz har rang men rusavaa hogaa     labekhamosh se afshaa hogaa      ziinateghalakaaye aagosh bano  2 dur baithoge to charchaa hogaa  labekhamosh se afshaa hogaa    raaz har rang men rusavaa hogaa     sari duniya hamen pahachaanatii hai   2 koi hamasaa bhi na tanhaa hogaa   2  labekhamosh se afshaa hogaa    raaz har rang men rusavaa hogaa    2

Title: ham tum se muhabbat kar ke sanam duniyaa kaa fasaanaa bhuul gaye
Lyrics: ham tum se muhabbat kar ke sanam duniyaa kaa fasaanaa bhuul gaye aankhon se terii ek jaam piyaa phir hosh men aanaa bhuul gaye  jab dekh lii terii mast nazar maikhaane kaa rastaa chhod diyaa zulfon pe terii jab aankh padii saavan kaa zamaanaa bhuul gaye aankhon se terii   threedots  ai husn terii ulfat ne hamen pahunchaa diyaa aisii manzil pe kadamon pe tere ek sajadaa kiyaa phir sar ko uthaanaa bhuul gaye aankhon se terii   threedots

Title: aadhii raat ko ye duniyaa waale
Lyrics: aadhii raat ko ye duniyaa waale jab kaabon men kho jaate hain aise men muhabbat ke rogii yaadon ke charaag jalaate hain  karate hain muhabbat sab hii magar har dil ko silaa kab milataa hai aatiin hain bahaaren gulashan men har phuul magar kab khilataa hai  main raanjhaa na thaa tuu hiir na thii ham apanaa pyaar nibhaa na sake yuun pyaar ke kwaab bahut dekhe taabiir magar ham paa na sake  mainne to bahut chaahaa lekin tuu rakh naa sakii waadon kaa bharam ab rah rah kar yaad aataa hai jo tuune kiyaa is dil pe sitam  pardaa jo hataa duun chehare se tujhe log kahenge harajaaii majabuur huun main dil ke haathon manzuur nahiin terii ruswaaii  sochaa hai ke apane honthon par main chup kii mohar lagaa luungaa main terii sulagatii yaadon se ab is dil ko bahalaa luungaa

Title: wo kahate hain ranjish kii baaten bhulaa den
Lyrics: wo kahate hain ranjish kii baaten bhulaa den muhabbat karen kush rahen muskuraa den  jawaanii ho gar jaavidaanii to yaarab terii sadaa duniyaa ko jannat banaa den  shabewasl kii bekudii chhaa rahii hai kaho to sitaaron kii shammen bhujhaa den  tum afasaanaekais kyaa puuchhate ho idhar aao ham tumako lailaa banaa den

Title: us bazm men mujhe nahiin banatii hayaa kiye
Lyrics: us bazm men mujhe nahiin banatii hayaa kiye baithaa rahaa agarache ishaare huaa kiyaa  kis roz tohamaten na taraashaa kiye huzuur kis din hamaare sar pe na aare chalaa kiye  zid kii hai aur baat magar kuubarii nahiin bhuule se usane saikadon waadewafaa kiye  gaalib tumhiin kaho ke milegaa jawaab kyaa maanaa ke tum kahaa kiye aur wo sunaa kiye

Title: kabhii ai haqiiqatemuntazar nazar aa libaasemajaaz men
Lyrics: kabhii ai haqiiqatemuntazar nazar aa libaasemajaaz men ke hazaaron sajade tadap rahe hain merii jabiineniyaaz men  na bachaabachaa ke tuu rakh ise teraa aaiinaa hai vo aaiinaa ke shikastaa ho to aziizatar hai nigaaheaaiinaasaaz men  na vo ishq men rahiin garmiyaan na vo husn men rahiin shokiyaan na vo gazanavii men tadap rahii na vo kham hai zulfeaayaaz men  main jo sarbasajadaa kabhii huaa to zamiin se aane lagii sadaa teraa dil to hai sanam aashanaa tujhe kyaa milegaa namaaz men  kabhii ai haqiiqatemuntazar nazar aa libaasemajaaz men ke hazaaron sajade tadap rahe hain merii jabiineniyaaz men

Title: saanjh dhale gagan tale
Lyrics: saanjh dhale gagan tale ham kitane ekaakii  saanjh dhale gagan tale ham kitane ekaakii chhod chale naino ko kiranon ke paakhii  path kii jaalii se jhaank rahii thiin kaliyaan  2 gandh bharii gunagun men magan hui thiin kaliyaan itane men timir dasa sapane le nayano men kaliyon ke aansuon kaa koi nahiin saathii chhod chale nayano ko kiranon ke paakhii saanjh dhale gagan tale threedots  juganuu kaa pat odhe aayegii raat abhii  2 nishigandhaa ke sur men kah degii baat sabhii kapata hai man jaise daalii ambavaa kii chhod chale nayano ko kiranon ke paakhii saanjh dhale gagan tale threedots

Title: janam janam kaa dukhiyaa praanii
Lyrics: janamjanam kaa dukhiyaa praanii 2 aayaa sharan tihaarii 2 bhagavan aayaa main aayaa  kadamkadam par ghor musiibat 2 sar pe bipadaa bhaarii janamjanam kaa dukhiyaa praanii aayaa sharan tihaarii 2 bhagavan aayaa main aayaa  bichhii hai chaaron or se aansuu 2 bujhe na diipak meraa meraa jiivan ik diyaa men 2 chhaa na jaaye andheraa 2 tej havaa se ise bachaa ke karanaa ab rakhavaarii janamjanam kaa dukhiyaa praanii aayaa sharan tihaare 2 bhagavan aayaa main aayaa  soi huii 2 jvaalaa ko jagaa do baakii jag ko aag lagaa do jale hue mere man kii aashaa bhagavan aas tihaarii aayaa sharan tihaarii bhagavan aayaa main aayaa janamjanam kaa dukhiyaa praanii aayaa sharan tihaare 2 bhagavan aayaa main aayaa

Title: phuulon se merii sej sajaa lo
Lyrics: phuulon se merii sej sajaao aaj main luungii janam dubaaraa  chandaa kii bindiyaa taaron ke kangan sapanon ke laao haar saanson men merii kesar mahake angon men jhuume bahaar  aisaa karo singaar sakhii rii sudh budh bhuule shyaam hamaaraa

Title: saare jahaan se achchhaa hindosataan hamaaraa
Lyrics: saare jahaan se achchhaa hindostaan hamaaraa ham bulabule hain isakii vo gulasitaan hamaaraa  gurabat men hon agar ham rahataa hai dil vatan men samajho vahiin hamen bhii dil ho jahaan hamaaraa saare threedots  parvat ho sabase uunchaa hamasaayaa aasamaan kaa vo santarii hamaaraa vo paasavaan hamaaraa saare threedots  godii men khelatii hain jisakii hazaaron nadiyaan gulashan hai jisake dam se rashkejinaan hamaaraa saare threedots  ai aaberaundegangaa  vo din hai yaad tujhako utaraa tere kinaare jab kaaravaan hamaaraa saare threedots  majahab nahiin sikhaataa aapas men bair rakhanaa hindii hain ham vatan hain hindostaan hamaaraa saare threedots  yuunaan misr romaan sab mit gae jahaan se ab tak magar hai baakii naamonishaan hamaaraa saare threedots  kuchh baat hai kii hastii mitatii nahiin hamaarii sadiyon rahaa hai dushman daurejahaan hamaaraa saare threedots  iqabaal koi marahuum apanaa nahiin jahaan men maaluum kyaa kisii ko dardenihaan hamaaraa saare threedots

Title: kabhii tanahaaiyon men hamaarii yaada aaegii
Lyrics: kabhii tanahaaiyon men  hamaarii yaada aaegii andhere chhaa rahe honge ke bijali kaundh jaaegii kabhii tanahaaiyon men yuunthreedots  ye bijali raakha kara jaegii tere pyaar kii duniyaa  2 naa phira tuu jii sakegaa aura naa tujhako mauta aaegii kabhii tanahaaiyon men yuunthreedots

Title: raahii mil gaye raahon men baaten huii nigaahon men
Lyrics: raahii mil gaye raahon men baaten hui nigaahon men dil samajhaa ham samajhe iqaraar ho gayaa vallaah pyaar ho gayaa pyaar ho gayaa ab to pyaar ho gayaa pyaar ho gayaa  koi chalaa jaaegaa  phir koi pachhataaegaa jaagenge soe soe raaton ko khoe khoe koi thaa unape nisaar ho gayaa vallaah pyaar ho gayaa threedots  jo huaa so huaa dard mile yaa davaa ulfat men kaahekaa gam jo hogaa dekhenge ham honaa thaa dil ko qaraar ho gayaa ab to pyaar ho gayaa threedots

Title: mujhe maaf kar ai dilarubaa main shikaar huun haalaat kaa
Lyrics: mujhe maaf kar ai dilarubaa main shikaar huun haalaat kaa tuu hai subah kii raushanii main huun andheraa raat kaa  par kat chuke hon jis ke vo panchii kabhii udataa nahiin  2 tuut jaataa hai jo dil vo dil kabhii judataa nahiin hai kabar mujhe tere pyaar kii hai pataa tere jazabaat kaa mujhe maaf kar threedots  naakaam sii ye zindagii bas naam kii hai zindagii  2 jo tere kaam na aa sakii kis kaam kii hai zindagii mujhase na dekhaa jaaye hai jalanaa teraa din raat kaa mujhe maaf kar threedots  tujhase judaa hone kaa gam sah na sakuungaa terii qasam  2 aate hii vo zaalim ghadii meraa nikal jaayegaa dam bas aakirii hogaa vo din merii naamuraad hayaat kaa mujhe maaf kar threedots

Title: terii kushabuu men  jinako duniyaa kii
Lyrics: jinako duniyaa kii nigaahon se chhupaaye rakhaa jinako ik umr kaleje se lagaaye rakhaa diin jinako jinhen iimaan banaaye rakhaa  jinakaa har lafz mujhe yaad thaa paanii kii tarah yaad the mujhako jo paigaamezubaanii kii tarah mujh ko pyaare the jo anamol nishaanii kii tarah  tuune duniyaa kii nigaahon se jo bachakar likhe saalahaa saal mere naam baraabar likhe kabhii din men to kabhii raat ko uthakar likhe  terii kushabuu men base kat main jalaataa kaise pyaar men duube hue kat main jalaataa kaise tere haathon ke likhe kat main jalaataa kaise  tere kat aaj main gangaa men bahaa aayaa huun aag bahate hue paanii men lagaa aayaa huun

Title: ham pyaar men jalanevaalon ko chain kahaan haay aaraam kahaan
Lyrics: ham pyaar men jalanevaalon ko chain kahaan haay aaraam kahaan ham pyaar men jalanevaalon ko threedots  priit kii andhiyaarii manzil men chaaron or siyaahii aadhii raah men hii ruk jaaye is manzil kaa raahii kaanton par chalanevaalon ko chain kahaan haay aaraam kahaan ham pyaar men jalanevaalon ko threedots  bahalaaye jab dil naa bahale to aise bahalaayen gam hii to hai pyaar kii daulat ye kahakar samajhaayen apanaa man chhalanevaalon ko chain kahaan haay aaraam kahaan ham pyaar men jalanevaalon ko threedots

Title: unake aage gamedil chhupaa padaa
Lyrics: unake aage gamedil chhupaa padaa ro rahaa thaa magar muskuraanaa padaa  aankhonaankhon men aa jaise saagar chale mere saathon ko bhii ladakhadaanaa padaa  aaj phuulon kii begaanagii dekhakar mujhako kaanton se daaman sajaanaa padaa  ham bhii zid par shamiim apanii aa hii gaye bijaliyon men nasheman banaanaa padaa

Title: ham ko dushman kii nigaahon se na dekhaa kiijiye
Lyrics: ham ko dushman kii nigaahon se na dekhaa kiijiye pyaar hii pyaar hain ham ham pe bharosaa kiijiye  chand yaadon ke sivaa haath na kuchh aayegaa is tarah umreguzaraa kaa na piichhaa kiijiye  roshnii auron ke aangan men gavaaraa na sahii kam se kam apane hii ghar men to ujaalaa kiijiye  kyaa kabar kab vo chale aayenge milane ke liye roz palkon pe naii shammen jalaayaa kiijiye

Title: ye ham jo hijr men diiwaarodar ko dekhate hain
Lyrics: ye ham jo hijr men diiwaarodar ko dekhate hain kabhii sabaa ko kabhii naamaavar ko dekhate hain  wo aaye ghar men hamaare kudaa kii qudarat hai kabhii ham unako kabhii apane ghar ko dekhate hain  nazar lage na kahiin unake dastobaazuu ko ye log kyuun mere zakmejigar ko dekhate hain

Title: aaii zanjiir kii jhanakaar kudaa kair kare
Lyrics: aaii zanjiir kii jhanakaar kudaa kair kare dil huaa kisakaa giraftaar kudaa kair kare  jaane yah kaun merii ruuh ko chhuukar guzaraa ek qayaamat huii bedaar kudaa kair kare  lamhaa merii aankhon men khiinchaa jaatii hai ek chamakatii huii talvaar kudaa kair kare  kuun dil kaa na chhalak jaae kahiin aankhon se ho na jaae kahiin izahaar kudaa na kare

Title: aaj kii kaalii ghataa mastmatavaalii ghataa
Lyrics: aaj ki kaalii ghataa mastmatavaalii ghataa  mujhase kahatii hai ki pyaasaa hai koi  kaun pyaasaa hai mujhe kyaa maaluum  aaj kii kaalii ghataa threedots  pyaas ke naam se jii darataa hai  is ilzaam se jii darataa hai  shaukebadanaam se jii darataa hai  miithii nazaron men samaayaa hai koi  kyon samaayaa hai mujhe kya maaluum  aaj kii kaalii ghataa threedots  pyaasii aankhon men muhabbat leke  ladakhadaa jaane kii ijaazat leke  mujhase bevajah shikaayat leke  dil kii dahaliiz tak aayaa hai koi  kaun aya hai mujhe kya maaluum  aaj kii kaalii ghataa threedots  kuchh mazaa aane lagaa jiine men  jaag uthaa dard koi siine men  mere ehasaas ke aaine men  ik saayaa nazar aataa hai koi kisakaa saayaa hai mujhe kyaa maaluum  aaj kii kaalii ghataa threedots  zindagii pahale na thii itani hasiin  aur agar thii to mujhe yaad nahiin  yahii afasaanaa na ban jaaye kahiin  kuchh nigaahon se sunaataa hai koi  kyaa sunaataa hai mujhe kya maaluum  aaj kii kaalii ghataa threedots

Title: tuu pareshaan na ho ek pal men bikhar jaauungaa
Lyrics: tuu pareshaan na ho ek pal men bhikhar jaauungaa main huun jhonkaa tere kuuche se guzaar jaauungaa  yuun to main huun kisii bahate hue dariyaa kii tarah tuu agar mujhako pukaaregaa thahar jaauungaa  main vo mittii huun jo hai chack ke gadrish men aasir tuu agar haath lagaa de to sanvar jaauungaa  jab se vo bichhade hain ye soch rahaa huun raashid is bhare shahar men tanhaa main kidhar jaauungaa

Title: taaii din naa javaanii naal chaladii
Lyrics: taaii din naa javaanii naal chaladii  2 kuratii malamal dii  atharii terii javaanii kudiye tere vaasa naa renhandii  2 saade dil nuu laa bulaave tere hatthaan dii menhandii nit sulade dii laat vaanguun baladii  2 kuratii malamal dii taaii din naa threedots  tere kolon turanaa sikkhe panj dariyaa de paanii  2 jaa tuu koii hiir saletii jaa koii phuulaan raanii nit kudiyaan de vich nahiiyon raladii  2 kuratii malamal dii  patalii kuratii de vichchon hii ruup jhaatiyaan maare ang ang teraa tapadaa renhandaa luun luun kare ishaare jhuttii khaladii marodaa nahiiyon jhaladii  2 kuratii malamal dii

Title: muggham baat pahelii jaisii bas wohii buujhe jisako bujaaye
Lyrics: muggham baat pahelii jaisii bas wohii buujhe jisako bujaaye bhed na paaye to ghabaraaye bhed jo paaye to ghabaraaye   jisako akele men aa aa kar dhyaan teraa rah rah ke sataaye chupake chupake baithaa roye aansuu ponchhe aur rah jaaye  saarii kahaanii bechainii kii maathe par likh detii hai aisii baat ki ghutate ghutate munh tak aaye aur rah jaaye

Title: teraa hijr meraa nasiib hai teraa gam hii merii hayaat hai
Lyrics: teraa hijr meraa nasiib hai teraa gam hii merii hayaat hai mujhe terii duurii kaa gam ho kyon tuu kahiin bhii ho mere saath hai  mere vaaste tere naam par koii harf aae nahiin nahiin mujhe kauf duniyaa nahiin magar mere ruubaruu terii zaat hai  teraa vasl ai merii dilarubaa nahiin merii kismat to kyaa huaa merii mahajuubii yahii kam hai kyaa terii hasaraton kaa to saath hai  teraa ishq mujh pe hai maharbaan mere dil ko haasil hai do jahaan merii jaanejaan isii baat par merii jaan jaae to baat hai

Title: aap kii mahakii huii zulf ko kahate hain ghataa
Lyrics: shashi kapoor hema malini geeta kak poonam dhillon sachin prem chopra shetty  y aap kii mahakii huii zulf ko kahate hain ghataa y aap kii madabharii aankhon ko kanval kahate hain l main to kuchh bhii nahiin tum ko hasiin lagatii huun l is ko chaahat bharii nazaron kaa amal kahate hain  y ek ham hii nahiin sab dekhane vaale tum ko y sangemarmar pe likhii shokh gazal kahate hain l aisii baaten na karo jin kaa yaqiin mushkil ho l aisii taariif ko niyaat kaa khalal kahate hain  y merii taqadiir ki tum ne mujhe apanaa samajhaa l merii taqadiir ki tum ne mujhe apanaa samajhaa y l is ko sadiyon kii tamannaaon kaa phal kahate hain  2

Title: ye jo mohabbat hai ye unakaa hai kaam
Lyrics: ye jo mohabbat hai ye unakaa hai kaam mahabuub kaa jo bas lete hue naam  mar jaaen  mit jaaen  ho jaaen badanaam rahane do chhodo bhii jaane do yaar ham naa karenge pyaar rahane do chhodo bhii jaane do yaar ham naa karenge pyaar  tuute agar saagar nayaa saagar koi le le mere khudaa dil se koi kisii ke na khele 2 dil tuut jaae to kyaa ho anjaam ye jo threedots  aankhen kisii se na ulajh jaaen main darataa huun yaaro hasiinon kii galii se main guzarataa huun 2 bas duur hii se kar ke salaam ye jo threedots

Title: churaa liyaa hai tum ne jo dil ko nazar nahiin churaanaa sanam
Lyrics: churaa liyaa hai tum ne jo dil ko nazar nahiin churaanaa sanam badal ke merii tum zindagaanii kahiin badal na jaanaa sanam  le liyaa dil haay meraa dil haay dil lekar mujhako naa bahalaanaa churaa liyaathreedots churaa liyaa  hai threedots  bahaar ban ke aauun kabhii tumhaarii duniyaa men guzar na jaaen ye din kahiin isii tamannaa men     tum mere ho haan tum mere ho aaj tum itanaa vaadaa karate jaanaa  churaa liyaa threedots churaa liyaa hai threedots  sajaauungaa lut kar bhii tere badan kii dolii ko lahuu jigar kaa duungaa hansiin labon kii laalii ko hai vafaa kyaa  is jahaan ko ek din dikhalaa duungaa main diivaanaa churaa liyaathreedots  churaa liyaa hai threedots  le liyaa dil haay meraa dil haay dil lekar mujhako naa bahalaanaa churaa liyaathreedots churaa liyaa hai threedots

Title: yahaan badalaa vafaa kaa bevafaaii ke sivaa kyaa hai
Lyrics: ra yahaan badalaa vafaa kaa bevafaaii ke sivaa kyaa hai     mohabbat karake bhii dekhaa mohabbat men bhii dhokaa hai  nu kabhii sukh hai kabhii dukh hai abhii kyaa thaa abhii kyaa hai     yuun hii duniyaa badalatii hai isii kaa naam duniyaa hai     kabhii sukh hai kabhii dukh hai abhii kyaa thaa abhii kyaa hai     tadapane bhii nahiin detii hamen majabuuriyaan apanii  ra mohabbat karane vaalon kaa tadapanaa kisane dekhaa hai     yahaan badalaa vafaa kaa bevafaaii ke sivaa kyaa hai  nu yuun hii duniyaa badalatii hai isii kaa naam duniyaa hai     kabhii sukh hai kabhii dukh hai abhi kyaa thaa abhii kyaa hai ra mohabbat karake bhii dekhaa mohabbat men bhii dhokaa hai nu bhulaa do vo zamaanaa jab mujhe apanaa banaayaa thaa ra bhulaa do munh men ulfat jab tumhaare lab pe aayaa thaa nu bhulaa do vo kasam jo dilaaii thii kabhii tumane ra bhulaa do vo kasam jo ki khaaii thii kabhii tumane nu bhulaa do dil se tum guzare hue rangiin zamaane ko ra bhulaa do haan bhulaa do ishq ke sazaa fasaane ko nu tamannaaon kii bastii men andheraa hii andheraa hai ra kise apanaa kahuun koii jo apanaa thaa paraayaa hai nu yuun hii duniyaa badalatii hai isii kaa naam duniyaa hai     kabhii sukh hai kabhii dukh hai abhii kyaa thaa abhii kyaa hai ra mohabbat karane vaalon kaa tadapanaa kisane dekhaa hai     yahaan badalaa vafaa kaa bevafaaii ke sivaa kyaa hai     yahaan badalaa threedots

Title: darpan ko dekhaa tuune jab jab kiyaa shrringaar
Lyrics: dapran ko dekhaa tuune jab jab kiyaa shrringaar phuulon ko dekhaa tuune jab jab aai bahaar ek badanasiib huun main 3 mujhe nahin dekhaa ek baar  suuraj ki pahali kiranon ko dekhaa tuune alasaate hue raaton men taaron ko dekhaa sapanon men kho jaate hue yuun kisi na kisi bahaane 2 tuune dekhaa sab sansaar 2  dapran ko dekhaa tuune jab jab kiyaa shrringaar  kaajal ki qismat kyaa kahiye nainon men tuune basaayaa hai aanchal ki qismat kyaa kahiye tuune ang lagaayaa hai hasarat hi rahi mere dil men 2 banuun tere gale kaa haar 2  dapran ko dekhaa tuune jab jab kiyaa shrringaar

Title: barabaademohabbat kii duaa saath lie jaa
Lyrics: barabaademohabbat kii duaa saath lie jaa tuutaa huaa ikaraarevafaa saath lie jaa  ik dil thaa jo pahale hii tujhe saump diyaa thaa ye jaan bhii ai jaaneadaa saath lie jaa  tapatii huii raahon men tujhe aanch na pahunche diivaane ke ashqon kii ghataa saath lie jaa  shaamil hai meraa khuunejigar terii hinaa men ye kam ho to ab khuunevafaa saath lie jaa  ham jurmemuhabbat kii sazaa paaenge tanhaa jo tujhase huii ho vo kataa saath lie jaa

Title: kuchh to duniyaa kii inaayaat ne dil tod diyaa
Lyrics: kuchh to duniyaa kii inaayaat ne dil tod diyaa aur kuchh talkiiehaalaat ne dil tod diyaa  ham to samajhe the ke barasaat men barasegii sharaab aaii barasaat to barasaat ne dil tod diyaa  dil to rotaa rahe aur aankh se aansuu na bahen ishq kii aisii ravaayaat ne dil tod diyaa  wo mere hain mujhe mil jaayenge aa jaayenge aise bekaar kayaalaat ne dil tod diyaa  aapako pyaar hai mujhase ke nahiin hai mujhase jaane kyuun aise sawaalaat ne dil tod diyaa

Title: yaaro mujhe maaf karo main nashe men huun
Lyrics: yaaro mujhe maaf karo main nashe men huun  2 ab do to jaam kaalii hii do main nashe men huun yaaro mujhe maaf karo  maazuur ho jo paanv meraa betarah pade 2 betarah pade tum saragaraan to mujhase na ho main nashe men huun yaaro mujhe maaf karo  yaa haathohaath lo mujhe jaise ke jaamemay 2 jaise ke jaamemay yaa thodii duur saath chalo main nashe men huun yaaro mujhe maaf karo main nashe men huun yaaro mujhe maaf karo

Title: bahut us galii ke kiye hain re phere
Lyrics: bahut us galii ke kiye hain re phere yah jinake liye thaa hue vah na mere  pahunchanaa unhen dekhane kii lalak men kabhii din dhalaa kar kisii din savere  phir us desh men kaahe  phir us desh men ho to kaahe ko aanaa  jahaan chaar din ko lagaaye hain dere  sahaaraa nahiin rut kaa hai kyaa suhaanaa is ik daal par hain sabhii ke basere  lagii jab se aankh aarazuu kii yah gat hai na sonaa savere na uthanaa savere

Title: kuchh aur puuchhiye ye haqiiqat na puuchhiye
Lyrics: kuchh aur puuchhiye ye haqiiqat na puuchhiye kyuun aapase hai hamako muhabbat na puuchhiye  sajadon se tay muqaamemuhabbat na ho sakaa kyaakyaa huii hai sar ko nadaamat na puuchhiye nadaamat  repentance  donon hii bhuul jaane ke qaabil hain ishq men afasaanaaemajaazohaqiiqat na puuchhiye  taskiin ye jaanodil the hamen bhii kabhii aziiz ab zindagii hai kisakii badaulat na puuchhiye

Title: kahiin ishq kaa taqaazaa
Lyrics: kahiin ishq kaa taqaazaa kahiin husn ke ishaare na bachaa sakenge daaman gamezindagii ke maare  shabegam ki tiiragii men merii aah ke sharaare kabhii ban gaye hain aansuu kabhii ban gaye hain taare   jinhen ho sakaa na haasil kabhii kaifekurbomanzil wahii do qadam hain mujhako terii justajuu se pyaare  main shakeel unakaa ho kar bhii na paa sakaa huun unako merii tarah zindagii men koii jiitakar na haare

Title: nigaahen ho gaiin purnam zaraa aawaaz de denaa
Lyrics: nigaahen ho gaiin purnam zaraa aawaaz de denaa nigaahen ho gaiin purnam gamon men ghir gaye hain ham zaraa aawaaz de denaa nigaahen ho gaiin purnam aa  kahaan ho tum badii wiiraan hain ummiid kii raahen 2 chale aao merii aankhen tumhen bas dekhanaa chaahen mere aramaan mere hamadam zaraa aawaaz de denaa nigaahen ho gaiin purnam  bade majabuur hain taqadiir par kab zor chalataa hai 2 diye par wo ai se jalate hain jigar siine men jalataa hai meraa ghutane lagaa hai dam zaraa aawaaz de denaa nigaahen ho gaiin purnam gamon men ghir gaye hain ham zaraa aawaaz de denaa nigaahen ho gaiin purnam

Title: ibnemariyam huaa kare koii
Lyrics: ibnemariyum huaa kare koi mere duhkh kii davaa kare koi  mere duhkh kii davaa kare   baat par vaan zubaan katatii hai 2 vah kahen aur sunaa kare koi vah kahen aur sunaa kare   bak rahaa huun junuun men kyaakyaa kuchh haay bak rahaa huun junuun men kyaakyaa kuchh kuchh na samajhe khudaa kare koi kuchh na samajhe khudaa kare  na suno gar buraa kahe koi na kaho gar buraa kare koi roklo gar galat kare koi baksh do gar khataa kare koi 2  kaun hai jo nahiin hai haajatamand 2 are kaun hai jo nahiin hai haajatamand  kisakii haajat ravaa kare koi 2  jab tavaqquu hii uth gai gaalib 2 kyon kisii kaa gilaa kare koi 2

Title: aur kyaa ehadevafaa hote hain
Lyrics: aur kyaa ehadevafaa hote hain log milate hain judaa hote hain  kab bichhad jaaye hamasafar hii to hai kab badal jaaye ik nazar hii to hai jaanodil jisape fidaa hote hain aur kyaa ehadevafaa hote hain   threedots  baat nikalii thii is zamaane kii jisako aadat hai bhuul jaane kii aap kyon hamase khafaa hote hain aur kyaa ehadevafaa hote hain   threedots  jab rulaa lete hain jii bhar ke hamen jab sataa lete hain jii bhar ke hamen tab kahiin khush vo zaraa hote hain aur kyaa ehadevafaa hote hain   threedots

Title: ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain
Lyrics: ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain 2 main rouun to ro den aansuu main hans duun to hans den aansuu ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain 2  aankh se tapakii jo chingaarii har aansuu men chhabii tumhaarii chiir ke mere dil ko dekho bahate lahuu men priit tumhaarii ye jiivan jaise sulagaa tuufaan hai ye aansuu mere dil ki zubaan hain 2 main rouun to ro den aansuu main hans duun to hans den aansuu ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain 2  jiivanpath par jiivan saathii saath chale ho munh na modo dardogam ke doraahe par mujhako tadapataa yuun na chhodo ye nagamaa mere gam kaa bayaan hai ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain 2 main rouun to ro den aansuu main hans duun to hans den aansuu ye aansuu mere dil kii zubaan hain 2

Title: bagair tere koii din raat na jaane mere
Lyrics: bagair tere koii din raat na jaane mere tuu kahaan hai magar ai dost puraane mere  shamaa kii lau thii ki wo thaa magar hijr kii raat der tak rotaa rahaa koii sirahaane mere  tuu bhii kushbuu hai magar meraa tajassus bekaar bargeaawaaraa kii maanind thikaane mere  kalq kii bekabarii hai ki merii ruswaaii log mujhako hii sunaate hain fasaane mere  aaj ik aur baras biit gayaa unake bagair jisake hote huye hote the zamaane mere  chaaraagar yuun to bahut hain magar ai jaanefaraaz bagair tere koii haalaat na jaane mere

Title: aap ke anurodh pe main ye giit sunaataa huun
Lyrics: aap ke anurodh par main ye giit sunaataa huun apane dil kii baaton se aap kaa dil bahalaataa huun aap ke anurodh pe   threedots  mat puuchho auron ke duhkh men ye prem kavi kyon rotaa hai bas chot kisii ko lagatii hai aur dard kisii ko hotaa hai duur kahiin koi darpan tuute tadap ke main rah jaataa huun aap ke anurodh pe   threedots  taariif main jisakii karataa huun kyaa ruup hai vo kyaa khushabuu hai kuchh baat nahiin aisii koii ye ek suron kaa jaaduu hai koal kii ek kuuk se sabake dil men huuq uthaataa huun aap ke anurodh pe   threedots  main pahane phirataa huun jo vo zanjiiren kaise banatii hain ye bhed bataa duun giiton men tasaviiren kaise banatii hain sundar honthon kii laalii se main rang ruup churaataa huun aap ke anurodh pe main ye giit sunaataa huun   threedots

Title: siine men jalan aankhon men tuufaan saa kyon hai
Lyrics: siine men jalan aankhon men tuufaan saa kyon hai is shahar men har shaks pareshaan saa kyon hai  dil hai to dhadakane kaa bahaanaa koi dhuundhe patthar kii tarah behisobejaan saa kyon hai  tanahaai kii ye kaun sii manzil hai rafiiqon taahaddenazar ek bayaabaan saa kyon hai  kyaa koi nai baat nazar aatii hai ham men aainaa hamen dekh ke hairaan saa kyon hai

Title: bas ki dushwaar hai har kaam ka aasaan honaa
Lyrics: bas ki dushwaar hai har kaam ka aasaan honaa  aadamii ko bhii mayassar nahiin insaan honaa  girayaa chaahe hai karaabii mere kaashaane kii  darodiivaar se tapake hai biyaabaan honaa  kii mere qatl ke baad usane jafaa se taubaa  haaye us zuudpashemaan kaa pashemaan honaa  haif us chaar girah kapade kii qismat gaalib  jisakii qismat men ho aashiq kaa girebaan honaa

Title: shamaa kaa jalanaa hai
Lyrics: shamaa kaa jalanaa hai yaa sozisheparavaanaa hai chand lafzon men yahii ishq kaa afasaanaa hai  ye junuun hai ki yahaan tak meraa badh jaaye junuun hansake siimaab na ye kah de ki ye diivaanaa hai  dil shikastaa liye baithaa hai umangon kaa hujuum ek tuute hue paimaane men maikaanaa hai  haan balaa dil kaa tasallii ke liye hai hasarat yahii saagar yahii shiishaa yahii paimaanaa hai

Title: bahut aasaan hai chilaman se lagakar muskuraanaa
Lyrics: r bahut aasaan hai chilaman se lagakar muskuraanaa 2 l bahut mushkil hai haaye    bahut mushkil hai aakar saamane nazaren    ajii nazaren milaanaa  r zamaane men muhabbat sab ko ho jaatii hai zaalim 2 l muhabbat jisako ho haaye    muhabbat jisako ho dushman huaa usakaa    ajii usakaa zamaanaa     bahut aasaan hai threedots  l udii chehare kii rangat dhadakanon ne dil tatolaa 2    tasavvur men teraa haaye    tasavvur men teraa baithe bithaaye chhed jaanaa     bahut aasaan hai threedots  r palat kar dekh kar hans kar jhijhak kar sar jhukaa kar 2    kisiikaa yuun mere haaye    kisiikaa yuun mere soye hue aramaan    ajii aramaan jagaanaa     bahut aasaan hai threedots

Title: kurbaton men bhii judaaii ke zamaane maange
Lyrics: kurbaton men bhii judaaii ke zamaane maange dil wo bemehar ki rone ke bahaane maange  apanaa ye haal ki jii haar chuke lut bhii chuke aur muhabbat vahii andaaz puraane maange  ham na hote to kisii aur ke charche hote kalqateshahar to kahane ko fasaane maange  yahii dil thaa ki tarasataa thaa maraasim ke liye ab yahii tarketaalluq ke bahaane maange  dil kisii haal pe thaame hii nahiin jaamekaraar mil gaye tum bhii to kyaa aur na jaane maange

Title: o maariyaa o maariyaa
Lyrics: o maariyaa o maariyaa o maariyaa o ho o o maariyaa o maariyaa o maariyaa ho ho ho ho jaacnii jab bolaa thaa tujhase shaadii karegii mujhase kaise kahaa thaa ye bataa o maariyaa o maariyaa   threedots  kyaa bolii thii tuu jab vo paas aayaa thaa mammii se puuchhuungii kyaa aisaa bolii thii  sardii ke din the ya garmii kii raaten khoii thii jab tuu jaacnii kii baaton men thaamaa haath bhii thaa kyaa apane haathon men

Title: ruup ye teraa jisane banaayaa vo
Lyrics: ruup ye teraa jisane banaayaa vo kahiin mil jaaye to haath chum luun  2 rang ye teraa jisane sajaayaa vo kahiin mil jaaye to haath chum luun  ruup ye teraa  kaarii kaarii ratiyaa se kaajal churaayaa terii pyaarii pyaarii ankhiyon men lagaayaa aa ha ha haa haa a ha haa haa e he he mukh pe saveraa jisane sajayaa vo kahiin mil jaaye to haath chum luun  ruup ye teraa  sundar aisii koii kavitaa nahiin hai chanchal aisii koii saritaa nahiin hai aa ha ha haa haa a ha haa haa aa haa haa ang ang teraa jisane banaayaa vo kahiin mil jaaye to haath chum luun  ruup ye teraa  goraa badan jaise shishe kaa pyaalaa ban gayaa mai to bin piye matavaalaa e he he he he uhn huun huun uhuun e he he haal ye meraa jisane banaayaa vo kahiin mil jaaye to haath chum luun  ruup ye teraa threedots

Title: mujhe kuchh kabar bhii naa ho sakii
Lyrics: mujhe kuchh kabar bhii naa ho sakii merii zindagii pe vo chhaa gae kabhii ashk banake rulaa gae kabhii dard banake samaa gae  vo jahaaneaishonishaat men hamen jab panaah naa mil sakii badii tez dhuup thii zindagii tere gam kii chhaanv men aa gae  vo nigaah tumane jo pher lii mujhe maut aa gaii jiite jii vo jahaan men phir naa sanbhal sakaa jise tum nazar se giraa gae

Title: jhuumatii chalii havaa yaad aa gayaa koii
Lyrics: jhumatii chalii havaa yaad aa gayaa koi  bujhatii bujhatii aag ko phir jalaa gayaa koi  jhumatii chalii havaa threedots  kho gaii hain manzilen mit gaye hain raaste  gardishen hii gardishen ab hain mere vaaste  ab hain mere vaaste  aur aise men mujhe phir bulaa gayaa koi  jhumatii chalii havaa threedots  chup hain chaand chaandanii chup ye aasamaan hai  miithii miithii niind men so rahaa jahaan hai  so rahaa jahaan hai  aaj aadhii raat ko kyon jagaa gayaa koi  jhumatii chalii havaa threedots  ek huuk sii uthii main sihar ke rah gayaa dil ko apanaa thaam ke aah bhar ke rah gayaa chaandanii kii ot se muskuraa gayaa koii jhuumatii chalii havaa threedots

Lyrics: jiivan biin madhur na baaje jhuuthe padh gaye taar bigade kaath se kaam bane kyaa megh baje na malhaar 2 pancham chhedo madhyam bole kharaj bane gandhaar 2 biin ke jhuuthe padh gaye taar jiivan biin madhur na baaje jhuuthe padh gaye taar biin ke jhuuthe padh gaye taar  in taaro ko kholo in tarabho ko phenko phenko uttam taar nayii tarabhe ho tab ho nayaa shringaar is tarabhe se jo sur bole guunj uthe sansaar biin ke jhuuthe padh gaye taar jiivan biin madhur na baaje jhuuthe padh gaye taar biin ke jhuuthe padh gaye taar  bajane ko hai guunj nagaadaa honaa hai sabase chhutakaaraa 2 apanaa jo hai use samajh lo vah bhii nahiin hamaaraa 2

Title: ham giit ye tumhen bhii pilaayen tamaam raat
Lyrics: ham giit  ye tumhen bhii pilaayen tamaam raat jaagen tamaam raat jagaayen tamaam raat  unakii jafaayen yaad dilaayen tamaam raat wo din ho ke unako sataayen tamaam raat  shab bar rahe kisii se hamaagoshiyon ke lutf hotii rahiin qubuul duaayen tamaam raat  daabe rahe paron se nasheman ko raat bhar un gesuon kii lii hain balaayen tamaam raat

Title: jal ke dil khaaq huaa
Lyrics: dil ke phaphole jal uthe siine ke daag se lag gaii is ghar ko aag ghar ke chiraag se  jal ke dil khaaq huaa aankhon se royaa na gayaa zakhm ye aise jale phuulon pe soyaa na gayaa  ham khataavar hain yaa hamako banaanevaalaa chaand ke mukhade pe bhii daag hai kaalaa kaalaa itanii barasaaten huii phir bhii vo dhoyaa na gayaa  hansate dekhaa na gayaa baag ke maalii se hamen dhuul men phenk diyaa todake daalii se hamen dilenadaan ko maalaa men piroyaa na gayaa  aasaraa deke hamen aas kaa dil tod diyaa laake saahil pe akelaa hamen kyon chhod diyaa biich manjhdhaar men kyon hamako duboyaa na gayaa

Title: birahan ke singaar anuuthe
Lyrics: birahan ke singaar anuuthe 2 laal rang ke aansuu hain ye cholii ke gulabuute birahan ke singaar anuuthe  phate puraane kapade pahane kaante ban gaye tan ke gahane 2 aankhon men chingaarii hansatii honth hain ruutheruuthe 2 birahan ke singaar anuuthe  sej bichhaaii ujaliiujalii par dharatii pe sotii pagalii 2 raaten lambii niind adhuurii raaten lambii niind adhuurii sapane tuutetuute haan sapane tuutetuute birahan ke singaar anuuthe  hans kar ronaa ro kar gaanaa aansuu pii kar gam ko khaanaa 2 jitane the saamaan priit ke sab priitam ne luute 2 birahan ke singaar anuuthe 2

Title: ai dil mujhe aisii jagah le chal jahaan koii na ho
Lyrics: ai dil mujhe aisii jagah le chal jahaan koi na ho apanaa paraayaa meharabaan naameharabaan koi na ho ai dil mujhe aisii jagah le chal   jaa kar kahiin kho jaauun main niind aae aur so jaauun main niind aae aur so jaauun main duniyaa mujhe dhuundhe magar meraa nishaan koi na ho ai dil mujhe aisii jagah le chal   ulfat kaa badalaa mil gayaa vo gam lutaa vo dil gayaa vo gam lutaa vo dil gayaa chalanaa hai sab se duur duur ab kaaravaan koi na ho apanaa paraayaa meharabaan naameharabaan koi na ho ai dil mujhe aisii jagah le chal jahaan koi na ho
