Title: hamen tum se mohabbat hai bataanaa bhii nahiin aataa
Lyrics: chhupaana bhii nahiin aataa jataana bhii nahiin aataa hamen tum se mohabbat hai   2         bataana bhii nahiin aataa chhupaana bhi threedots  hathelii par tumhaaraa naam likhate hain mitaate hain   2  tumhii se pyaar karate hain tumhi se hii kyuun chhupaate hain   2 zubaan pe baat hai lekin sunaanaa hii nahiin aataa hamen tum se mohabbat hai threedots  mohabbat kaise karate hain koi to hamako samajhaae     2 kahiin aisaa na ho ki pyaar bin umr kat jaae  2 tum se milane kaa koi bahaanaa bhii nahiin aataa hamen tum se mohabbat hai threedots  chorii chorii chupake chupake  tumako dekhaa karate hain    2   haaledil sunaane se na jaane kyuun darate hain  2 kitana paagal dil hai meraa manaanaa bhii nahiin aataa hamen tum se mohabbat hai threedots

Title: ham hain raahii pyaar ke hamase kuchh na boliye
Lyrics: ham hain rahi pyar ke hamase kuchh na boliye  3 	 jo bhi pyar se mila ham usi ke ho liye  2 	 ham usi ke ho liye 	 jo bhi pyar se mila ham usi ke ho liye 	 	 dard bhi hamen qubul chaina bhi hamen qubul  2 	 hamanen har tarah ke phul haar men piro liye  2 	 jo bhi pyar se mila threedots 	 	 dhup thi nasiba men to dhup men liya hai dam  2 	 chandani mili to ham chandani men so liye  2 	 jo bhi pyar se mila threedots 	 	 dil pe asara kiye ham to bas yunhin jiye  2 	 ek kadam pe hans liye ek kadam pe ro liye  2 	 jo bhi pyar se mila threedots  	 rah men paden hain ham kabase aap ki qasam	 2 	 dekhiye to kam se kam boliye naa boliye  2 	 jo bhi pyar se mila threedots  	 ham hain rahi pyar ke hamase kuchh na boliye 	 jo bhi pyar se mila ham usi ke ho liye

Title: tuu bevafaa nahiin jaanejaan hai intazaar
Lyrics: tuu bevafaa nahiin jaanejaan hai intazaar tuu aaii naa har saans pe teraa naam hai jaanejaan kyon aaii naa dil men terii yaad hai lab pe ye fariyaad hai dil ye paagal hai meraa naa tod samajh ke aaiinaa tuu bevafaa nahiin threedots  nazaren bichhaae kab se main khadaa huun tere dar pe ulfat men saath teraa maanguun main apane hii rab se itanaa sataao naa bechain dil ko   raaton ko chain hai naa aaraam din ko hamaarii tadap kaa naa andaaz unako kaise kahuun haal meraa jaanejaanaan o diivaane main huun majabuur kitanii jaane naa tuu o diivaane aansuu kii barasaat hai tuute ye jazbaat hain dil men dil kii baat hai tuu ye samajh kyuun paaii naa tuu bevafaa nahiin threedots  chaahat men jaanam terii aaj main khud ko mitaa duun khushiyaan zamaane bhar kii aaj main tujh pe lutaa duun tuu hii merii aarazuu hai tuu hii merii zindagii maine puujaa hai tumhiin ko hai tuu hii merii bandagii mohabbat kii raahon men tuu hii merii dillagii chiirakar dekho meraa dil naam usamen hai tumhaaraa tumase milane ke lie ab dil tadapataa hai hamaaraa tuu hii meraa pyaar hai tum pe jaan nisaar hai phir bhii huun majabuur itanii tumase milane aaii naa main bevafaa nahiin jaanejaan mat soch main kyuun aaii naa har saans pe teraa naam hai tuu mere pyaar kaa aaiinaa tuu bevafaa nahiin threedots

Title: dil men kisii ke pyaar kaa jalataa huaa diyaa
Lyrics: dil men kisii ke pyaar kaa jalataa huaa diyaa duniyaa kii aandhiyon se bhalaa ye bujhegaa kyaa  saanson kii aanch paa ke bhadakataa rahegaa ye siine men dil ke saath dhadakataa rahegaa ye dhadakataa rahegaa ye vo naqsh kyaa huaa jo mitaaye se mit gayaa vo dard kyaa huaa jo dabaaye se dab gayaa dil men kisii ke pyaar kaa threedots  ye zindagii bhii kyaa hai amaanat unhiin kii hai ye shaayarii bhii kyaa hai inaayat unhiin kii hai inaayat unhiin kii hai ab vo karam karen ki sitam un kaa faisalaa ham ne to dil men pyaar kaa sholaa jalaa liyaa dil men kisii ke pyaar kaa threedots

Title: diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii
Lyrics: aashaa  aaaa aa aa threedots pa ma ga ma re ga pa ma ga ma aaaa aa threedots saa nii dha pa ma ga re saa nii nii nii threedots diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii  tan ko chhue chhue ghata kaali chhede lahar lahar matavaali tan ko chhue threedots o ho tan ko chhue chue ghata kaali chhede lahar lahar matavaali baat koi anjaanaaa diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii  o ho ho kuchh anakahii kahe merii chitavan bole jiyaa likhe merii dhadakan kuchh anakahii threedots o ho ho kuchh anakahii kahe mere chitavan bole jiyaa likhe merii dhadakan ek nayaa afasaanaa threedots rafii  diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii o o oo jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii rafii  o ho o saavan lagaa machal gae baadal aashaa dekhuun jise huaa vahii paagal rafii  saavan lagaa machal gae baadal aashaa dekhuun jise huaa vahii paagal rafii  kaun huaa diivaanaa threedots aashaa  diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil rafii  diivaanaa mastaanaa huaa dil aashaa  jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii aa aa aa threedots rafii  jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii ho oo jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii aashaa  aa aa aa jaane kahaan hoke bahaar aaii

Title: ye zamiin gaa rahii hai aasamaan gaa rahaa hai
Lyrics: ye zamiin gaa rahii hai aasamaan gaa rahaa hai saath mere ye saaraa jahaan gaa rahaa hai  shokh kaliyon ke ghuunghat sarakane lage hain mast phuulon ke dil bhii dhadakane lage hain ye bahaaron kaa dilakash samaa gaa rahaa hai saath mere ye saaraa jahaan gaa rahaa hai  jhuumakar parbaton pe ghataa chhaa rahii hai pyaar kii umr shaayad kariib aa rahii hai meraa dil pyaar kii ye daastaan gaa rahaa hai saath mere ye saaraa jahaan gaa rahaa hai  bhuul kar raah koii hasiin aa na jaae is jagah koii paradaanashiin aa na jaae is jagah aaj ek naujavaan gaa rahaa hai saath mere ye saaraa jahaan gaa rahaa hai  ye zamiin gaa rahii haithreedots

Title: badii mushkil hai khoyaa meraa dil hai
Lyrics: badii mushkil hai khoyaa meraa dil hai  koii use dhuundh ke laae na	2  jaake kahaa main rapat likhaauun koii batalaae na  main rouun yaa hansuun karuun main kyaa karuun 2	2  diivaanagii kii had se aage guzar na jaauun  aankhon main usakaa chaharaa kaise use dikhalaauun	2  vo hai sab se hasiin vaisaa koii bhii nahiin mere khudaa usakii adaa hai badii kaatil mujhe nahiin pataa chhaayaa hai kyaa nashaa main rouun yaa hansuun karuun main kyaa karuun  sapanon men aane vaalii baahon men kab aaegii  itane dinon tak mujhako aise vo tadapaaegii	2  dekhuun mudake jidhar paae vahii nazar merii dagar meraa safar vo merii manzil diivaanaa hai samaa jaage hain armaan main rouun yaa hansuun karuun main kyaa karuun  badii mushkil hai khoyaa meraa dil hai threedots

Title: gam jahaan itane sahe  ek sitam aur sahii
Lyrics: gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii 2 aaj apanon ke liye dil ke tukadon ke liye ek sitam aur sahii  gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii aaj apanon ke liye dil ke tukadon ke liye ek sitam aur sahii  gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii  aaj phir ruup sajaayaa ke kariidaar milen 2 phir naye kuunche milen phir naye baazaar milen kal talak naache the ham saare zamaane ke liye aaj ham gaayenge taqadiir banaane ke liye dil jahaan zakmii huaa aankh nam aur sahii  aaj apanon ke liye dil ke tukadon ke liye ek sitam aur sahii gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii  aa kyuun na ham bechen adaayen ke tawaaef hain ham 2 kyuun na baazaar sajaayen ke tawaaef hain ham mil nahiin sakataa hamen koii shariifon men maqaam kisaliye phir na karen apane badan kaa niilaam behayaaii kii taraf ek qadam aur sahii  aaj apanon ke liye dil ke tukadon ke liye ek qadam aur sahii gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii aaj apanon ke liye dil ke tukadon ke liye ek sitam aur sahii gam jahaan itane sahe ek gam aur sahii

Title: ye jo hai huqm mere paas na aaye koii
Lyrics: ye jo hai huqm mere paas na aaye koii isaliye ruuth rahe hain ke manaaye koii  taak men hai nigaheshauq kudaa kair kare saamane se mere bachataa huaa jaaye koii  haal afalaakozabiin kaa jo bataayaa bhii to kyaa baat wo hai jo tere dil kii bataaye koii  aapane daag ko munh bhii na lagaayaa afasos usako rakhataa thaa kaleje se lagaaye koii   ho chukaa aish kaa jalasaa to mujhe kat bhejaa aap kii tarah se mehamaan bulaaye koii

Title: tumhaaraa chaahane vaalaa khudaa kii duniyaa men
Lyrics: tumhara chahane vala khuda ki duniyaa men mere siva bhi koi aur ho khuda na kare   2 tumhara chahane vala threedots  ye bat kaise gavara karega dil mera tumhara zikr kisi aur ki zuban pe ho tumhare husn ki tarif aina bhi kare to main tumhari qasam hai ke tod dun usako tumhare pyar tumhari ada ka divana mere siva bhi koi aur ho khuda na kare tumhara chahane vala threedots  vo din na aye ke mujhase kabhi juda hokar kisi ka pyar dobara kahin talash karo jhuka ke sar ko kisi ajanabi ke shanon par tum apane gam ka sahara kahin talash karo karib dil ke tumhare kisi bhi halat men mere siva bhi koi aur ho khuda na kare tumhara chahane vala threedots  asha tumhare dil ko kahin mujhase kabhi thes lage mujhe yakin hai aisa kabhi nahin hoga mujhe vafaon pe apani bada bharosa hai tumhara pyar hi de jaye na kahin dhokha dua ye hai ke tumhara khuda ki duniya men mere siva bhi koi aur ho khuda na kare tumhara chahane vala threedots

Title: baag lagaa duun sajanii
Lyrics: baag lagaa duun sajanii 2 tore nainan maanii geharii 2 sundar sudhar salonii  baag lagaa duun sajanii 2  tum basant ho tum bahaar ho 2 tum hii giit ho tum pukaar ho 2 tum koyal tum kuuk hamaarii 2 giit sunaa madhubayanii baag lagaa duun sajanii 2  rang birange phuul khilenge 2 ban ke panchhii gale milenge 2 dulhan banakar kaliyaan hansatii 2 dekh dekh mriganayanii baag lagaa duun sajanii 2

Title: jaane kyaa haal ho kal shiishe kaa paimaane kaa
Lyrics: jaane kyaa haal ho kal shiishe kaa paimaane kaa aaj dar chod chalaa hai koii maikhaane kaa jaane kyaa haal hothreedots  haath tharraane lage jaam giraa tuut gayaa ye koii vaqt na thaa aap ke yaad aane kaa jaane kyaa haal hothreedots  phir na sharamaaoge tum apanii kahaanii sun ke dard thodaa saa milaa lo mere afasaane kaa jaane kyaa haal hothreedots  bevafaaii kaa gilaa sun ke hansi aatii hai dhuundhiye aur bahaanaa koii tadapaane kaa  jaane kyaa haal ho kal shiishe kaa paimaane kaa aaj dar chod chalaa hai koii maikhaane kaa

Title: ye lo main haarii piyaa huii terii jiit re
Lyrics: ye lo main ye lo main  ye lo main haarii piyaa  huii terii jiit re kaahe kaa jhagadaa baalam  naii naii priit re ye lo mainthreedots  naye naye do nain mile hain  2 naii mulaakaat hai milate hii tum ruuth gaye jii ye bhii koii baat hai  2 jaao jii maaf kiyaa tuu hii meraa miit re kaahe kaa jhagadaa threedots  huii tihaarii sang chalojii 2 baiyaan merii thaamake baandh balam kismat kii dorii sang tere naamake  2 ladate hii ladate mausam jaaye nahiin biit re kaahe kaa jhagadaa threedots  chale kidhar ko bolo baabuu  2 sapanon ko luut ke haay raam jii rah nahiin paaye dil meraa tuutake  2   kaahe kaa jhagadaa threedots  ye lo main haarii piyaa threedots

Title: ye pyaar kii baaten ye safar bhul na jaanaa
Lyrics: ye pyaar kii baaten ye pyaar kii baaten ye safar bhul na jaanaa dil chhin ke jaate ho kidhar bhul na jaanaa bhul na jaanaa dil chhin ke jaate ho kidhar bhul na jaanaa ye pyaar kii baaten  jab hamane kiyaa dil ko muhabbat ke havale  2 sharmilii nigaahon se hamen dekhane vaale jo tiir chalaayaa hai idhar bhul na jaanaa bhul na jaanaa jo tir chalaayaa hai idhar bhul na jaanaa ye pyaar kii baaten  hamane kisii ummid se dil tumako diyaa hai dil tumako diyaa hai aramaan bhare dil se tumhen pyaar kiyaa hai pyaar kiyaa hai dekho ye muhabbat kaa safar bhul na jaanaa bhul na jaanaa dekho ye muhabbat ka safar bhul na jaanaa ye pyaar kii baaten  ho jaaye naa duniyaa kahiin barabaad hamaarii  2 hai tujhako kasam rakhanaa zaraa yaad hamaarii jo dil ko churaayaa hai idhar bhul na jaanaa bhul na jaanaa jo dil ko churaayaa hai idhar bhul na jaanaa ye pyaar kii baaten ye pyaar kii baaten ye safar bhul na jaanaa dil chhin ke jaate ho kidhar bhul na jaanaa ye pyaar kii baaten

Title: chhupanevaale saamane aa chhupchhupke meraa jii na jalaa
Lyrics: chhupanevaale saamane aa chhupchhupke meraa jii na jalaa suuraj se kiran baadal se pavan kab talak chhupegii ye to bataa chhupanevaale saamane aa   aakhir tere naaz kii ye haar nahiin to aur hai kyaa daudke aanaa paas mere pyaar nahiin to aur hai kyaa duur khadii hairaan hai kyaa daant men yuun ungalii na dabaa chhupanevaale saamane aa   uuparniiche saans huii komal tan bal khaa hii gayaa sunkar merii baat sanam tujhako pasiinaa aa hii gayaa ab dil kii dhadakan na chhupaa sar na jhatak aankhen na dikhaa chhupanevaale saamane aa   aa lipatii hai dil se mere zulf terii bal khaaii huii dekh rahaa huun terii nazar apanii nazar tak aaii huii gaalon par zulfen na giraa tuu hai qayaamat main huun balaa chhupanevaale saamane aa

Title: ham jaagen jag soye rii aali
Lyrics: ham jaagen jag soye rii aalii ham jaagen jag soye  diip bujhe do ankhiyaan morii phir bhi baat nihaaruun torii 2 o man basiyaa kabhuun miloge 2 tum milyaa sukh hoye o o o tum milyaa sukh hoye rii aalii ham jaagen jag threedots  ek dulhan pii ko lipataae sharamaaye koii haath chhudaaye 2 ek bechaarii baith jharokhe 2 asuvan haar piroye o o o asuvan haar piroye rii aalii ham jaagen jag threedots  ye birahaa kii raat sahelii ye apanii barasaat sahelii 2 jab chhalake birahan kii akhiyaan 2 ye birahan sang roye oh oh oh ye birahan sang roye rii aalii ham jaagen jag threedots

Title: giit kitane gaa chukii huun
Lyrics: giit kitane gaa chukii huun is sukhii jag ke liye aaj rone do mujhe pal ek apane hii liye            ro rahii thii biin aur sun kar sukhii sansaar thaa naachatii thii ungaliyaan aur kaanpataa har taar thaa  aaj tuutaa taar mere biin kaa aaghaat se aaj kumhalaayaa kusum meraa adhik barasaat se                   saaz dhone do nayan kii ashru khone do mujhe kal sunaauungii madhur kuchh aaj rone do mujhe

Title: maiyaa mohi daauu bahut khijaayau
Lyrics: maiyaa mohi daauu bahut khijaayau  moson kahat mol kau linhaun tuu jasumati kab jaayau   kahaa kahaun ihi ris ke maare khelat haun nahii jaat  puni puni kahat kaun hai maataa ko hai tero taat   gore nand jasodaa gorii tuu kat syaam sariir  chutakii dai dai hansat gwaal sab sikhai det balabiir   tuu mohiin kon maaran siikhii daauhi kabahun na khiijhai  mohanmukh ris kii ye baaten jasumati sunisuni riijhai   sunahu kaanh balbhadra chabaai janamat hii kau dhuut  suur shyaam mohin gaudhan kii saun haun maataa tuu puut

Title: pyaar men dil to sab dete hain  o jaanam
Lyrics: pyaar men dil to sab dete hain jaan tujhe de denge ham tikii tikii dam dam tikii tikii dam pyaar men dil to threedots o jaanam o jaanam  jii bhar ke ham pyaar karen pyaar kii baaten yaar karen mere dil kaa haal suno apane dil kaa haal kaho jitane din jitanii raaten main tujhase duur rahii yaad bahut aatii thii terii niind bahut aatii thii kam o jaanam o jaanam  terii zulfon se kheluun aa tujhe baahon men le luun jitane vaade hamane kiye aaj karen vo sab phir se pyaar to khud vaadaa hai pyaar men vaadaa kyaa karanaa likhane vaale ne likh daalaa hai teraa meraa sangam o jaanam o jaanam haan pyaar men dil to threedots

Title: ab se pahale to ye dil kii haalat na thii
Lyrics: ab se pahale to ye dil kii haalat na thii aaj kyaa ho gayaa aaj kyaa ho gayaa zindagii duusaron kii amaanat na thii aaj kyaa ho gayaa aaj kyaa ho gayaa  koii dekhe hamen koii chaahe hamen aur saraahe hamen ye tamannaa ye kvaahish ye hasarat na thii aaj kyaa ho gayaa  apane andaaz par naaz karate the ham hamako apanii qasam gair se baat karane kii furasat na thii  aaj kyaa ho gayaa  ek but aaj kyon kar khudaa ban gayaa muddaaa ban gayaa ham ko to sar jhukaane kii aadat na thii aaj kyaa ho gayaa

Title: mose chhal kiye jaaye  sainyaan beimaan
Lyrics: mose chal kiye jaaye haay re haay haay dekho sainyaa beimaan sainyaa beimaan mose chal mose chal mose chal kiye jaaye haay re haay haay dekho haan sainyaa beimaan  samajhaake main to haarii dhamakaaya  nii nii nii re re ga ga ma ma pa pa dha nii saa saa saa samajhaake main to haarii haan dhamakaaya   aur karuun bhii kyaa dekho moraa jiyaraa haan jiyaraa tadapaaye jiyaraa tadapaaye mohe haay haay dekho sainyaa beimaan mose chal mose chal mose chal kiye jaaye haay re haay haay dekho sainyaa beimaan  man kaa hai bairii baala dil jise de daalaa nii nii nii re re ga ga ma ma pa pa dha nii saa saa saa man kaa hai bairii baala dil jise de daalaa haan dil jise de daalaa priit morii pal pal roye tadapaaye tadapaaye tarasaaye tadapaaye tarasaaye mohe haay haay dekho sainyaa beimaan mose chal haan mose chal mose chal kiye jaaye haay re haay haay dekho haan sainyaa beimaan dekho sainyaa beimaan2 mose chal kiye jaaye dekho sainyaa beimaan haan beimaan haan beimaan

Title: aaj jaane kii zidd na karo
Lyrics: aaj jaane kii zidd na karo yuunhii pahaluu men baithe raho haay mar jaayenge ham to lut jaayenge aisii baaten kiyaa na karo  tum hii socho zaraa kyon na roken tumhen jaan jaatii hai jab uth ke jaate ho tum tumako apanii qasam jaanejaan baat itanii merii maan lo aaj jaane kii   threedots  vaqt kii qaid men zindagii hai magar chand ghadiyaan yahii hain jo aazaad hain inako khokar kahiin jaanejaan umr bhar na tarasate raho aaj jaane kii   threedots  kitanaa maasuum rangiin hai ye samaa husn aur ishq kii aaj men raaj hai kal kii kisako khabar jaanejaan rok lo aaj kii raat ko aaj jaane kii   threedots

Title: vo saath hamaaraa de na sake
Lyrics: vo saath hamaaraa de na sake ham naam pe unake jiite hain do din ko kushii ko paaye the kyaa kahiye kaise biite hain vo saath hamaaraa threedots  tanhaaii bahaaron se milakar jab unakii yaad dilaatii hai ummiid ke kachche dhaage se zakamon ko apane siite hain vo saath hamaaraa threedots  jaa aur kahiin ab ai saavan kyon thandii aag lagaataa hai ham laaen kahaan se ab aansuu aankhon ke sarovar riite hain vo saath hamaaraa threedots  vo jitane ham se duur hue is dil kii tadap utanii hii badhii le jaam uthaa ab ai saaqii ham khuunetamannaa piite hain vo saath hamaaraa threedots

Title: muskuraatii huii chaandanii
Lyrics: la muskuraatii huii chaandanii     jagamagaataa huaa aasamaan     le chale ho mujhe tum kahaan he do muhabbat bhare dil jahaan     kah sake pyaar kii daasataan     le chale ham tumhen hain vahaan  he kah rahe hain nazaare pukaar ke     biit jaae naa din ye bahaar ke la sanasanaatii havaaon ke giit ne     taaren chhede hain dil ke sitaar ke do ye suhaanaa samaa hai umangen javaan     phir khule kyon naa dil kii zubaan threedots  la aaj kaisii suhaanii ye raat hai     zindagii men nayii ek baat hai he in sitaaron kii rangiin chhaanv me     do dilo kaa anokhaa ye saath hai do ham tumhaare hue tum hamaare hue     pyaar kaa muskuraayaa jahaan threedots

Title: o mere dil ke chain chain aaye mere dil ko duaa kiijiye
Lyrics: o mere dil ke chain  chain aae mere dil ko duaa kiijiye  apanaa hii saayaa dekh ke tum jaane jahaan sharamaa gae abhii to ye pahalii manzil hai tum to abhii se ghabaraa gae meraa kyaa hogaa socho to jaraa haay aise naa aanhen bharaa kiijiye o mere dil ke chain threedots  aapakaa aramaan aapakaa naam meraa taraanaa aur nahiin in jhukatii palako ke sivaa dil kaa thikaanaa aur nahiin janchataa hii nahiin aankho men koi dil tumako hii chaahe to kyaa kiijiye o mere dil ke chain threedots  yuun to akelaa hii aqasar gir ke sambhal sakataa huun main tum jo pakad lo haath meraa duniyaa badal sakataa huun main maangaa hai tumhen duniyaa ke liye ab kud hii sanam faisalaa kiijiye o mere dil ke chain threedots

Title: main mast kudii tuu bhii mast mast mundaa hai
Lyrics: mast mast mast main mast kudii tuu bhii mast mast mundaa hai main bhii hasiin tuu bhii jabaradast mundaa hai main mast kudii threedots  tujhase nazar ladii khushbuu sii udii tuune chhuaa to ruup kii mastii chhalak padii ai merii phulajhadii ruk jaa tuu ik ghadii ye dil phisal gayaa meraa chikanii hai tuu badii baaten banaa rahaa hai badaa chikanaa chust mundaa hai main bhii hasiin threedots  ye husn kaa dariyaa chhalakaa huaa nashaa main tujhape fida ho gayaa honthon se tuu pilaa kyaa khuub jamegii donon kii ye jodii chaahat ke faisale men abhii der hai thodii dil chhiin liyaa tuune badaa sakht mundaa hai main bhii hasiin threedots

Title: jaane vaale se mulaaqaat naa hone paaii
Lyrics: jaane vaale se mulaaqaat naa hone paai  2 dil kii dil men hii rahii baat naa hone paai jaane vaale se threedots  chaandanii khil na sakii chaand ne munh mod liyaa   2 jisakaa aramaan thaa vo baat naa hone paai jaane vaale se threedots  dil men tuufaan uthe dil kii jubaan khul na sakii  2 badaliyaan chhaa gain barasaat naa hone paai jaane vaale se threedots

Title: bhalaa thaa kitnaa apanaa bachapan
Lyrics: bhala thaa kitnaa apnaa bachapan bhalaa thaa kitnaa  din bhar tuu pedon ke tale rahatii thii pasaare aanchal aur main daalon se phainkaa karataa thaa tod ke phal maalii thaa bas hamaraa dushaman apnaa bachapan bhalaa thaa kitnaa  yaad bhii hai voh khel kii baat jab ham nikaalate the baraat ladake  mujh ko dulhaa banaate sakhiyaan tujhako banaatiin dulhan apanaa bachapan bhalaa thaa kitnaa  din ko khel me aur raaton ko baaton men kho jaate the raajaa raanii ke kisse sunate sunate so jaate the aankh me niind kaa naam nahiin thaa dil me koson duur kii dhadakan apanaa bachapan bhalaa thaa kitanaa bhalaa thaa kitnaa apnaa bachapan bhalaa thaa kitanaa

Title: chamakate chaand ko tuutaa huaa taaraa banaa daalaa
Lyrics: chamakate chaand ko tuutaa huaa taaraa banaa daalaa merii aaavaaragii ne mujhako aavaaraa banaa daalaa  yahii aagaaz thaa meraa yahii anjaam honaa thaa mujhe barabaad honaa thaa mujhe naakaam honaa thaa merii taqadiir ne mujhako taqadiir kaa maaraa banaa daalaa chamakate chaand ko threedots  badaa dilkash badaa rangiin hai yah shahar kahate hain yahaan par hain hazaaron ghar gharon men log rahate hain mujhe is shahar kii galiyon kaa banjaaraa banaa daalaa chamakate chaand ko threedots

Title: ho chukaa vaadaa ki kal aaiyegaa
Lyrics: ho chukaa vaadaa ki kal aaiyegaa dekhiye ab naa badal jaaiyegaa  laakh pardon men hain vo hazratedil dekhiye dhokaa naa koii khaaiyedaa  kahate hain kah to diyaa aaenge ab ye kyaa chid hai ki kab aaiyegaa

Title: thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain
Lyrics: thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain barbaad ho chuke the barbaad ho rahe hain 2  sahamii huiin hain dekho is baag kii bahaaren 2 phuulon ko raund kar 2 ham kaanto ko bo rahe hain thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain 2 barbaad ho chuke the barbaad ho rahe hain thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain  yah vaqt hai kii mil kar bigadii huii banaalen 2 yah vaqt kiimatii ham 2 jhagadon me kho rahe hain  thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain 2 barbaad ho chuke the barbaad ho rahe hain thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain  gairon se na shikaayat gairon se na gilaa hai 2 hindostaan ki naanv 2 hindii dabo rahe hain thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain 2 barbaad ho chuke the barbaad ho rahe hain thukaraa rahii hai duniyaa ham hain kii so rahe hain 2

Title: ab to mere kudaa mujhe jalavaa dikhaaiye
Lyrics: ab to mere kudaa mujhe jalavaa dikhaaiye apane namaaziyon kaa kahaa maan jaaiye  kuchh kah rahii hain aap se siine kii dhadakanen meraa nahiin to dil kaa kahaa maan jaaiye apane namaaziyon kaa kahaa maan jaaiye  main jaanataa huun tuu badaa rahamatnavaaz hai sab ke dilon pe raham kaa jaadu jagaaiye apane namaaziyon kaa kahaa maan jaaiye  muddat se tishnagii hai tumhaare jamaal kii nuurekamaal se zaraa pardaa uthaaiye apane namaaziyon kaa kahaa maan jaaiye

Title: sochenge tumhen pyaar kare ke nahiin ye dil bekaraar kare ke nahiin
Lyrics: sochenge tumhen pyaar kare ke nahiin ye dil beqaraar kare ke nahiin  yaadon men basaayaa tumako khvaabon men chhupaayaa tumako  2 miloge hamen tum jaanam kahiin na kahiin  sochenge tumhen pyaar kare ke nahiin  tum ho khilataa mahakaa saa kamal  2 ham jo gaaye tum ho vo gazal  kamasin bholaa saa mukhadaa lagatii ho chaand ka ik tukadaa  tumasa nahiin hai koi pyaaraa sanam pyaaraa sanam  sochenge tumhen pyaar kare ke nahiin ye dil beqaraar kare ke nahiin   jis din tum ko dekhegii nazar  2 jaane dil pe hogaa kya asar rakhenge tumako nigahon men bhar lenge tumhen baahon men zulfon ko ham sulajhaayenge ishq men duniya bhulaa denge  ye beqaraarii ab to hogii na kam hogii na kam  sochenge tumhen pyaar kare ke nahiin threedots

Title: tujhako yuun dekhaa hai
Lyrics: tujhako yuun dekhaa hai yuun chaahaa hai yuun puujaa hai tuu jo patthar kii bhii hotii to kudaa ho jaatii bekataa ruuth gaii ruuth ke dil tod diyaa kyaa sazaa detii agar koii kataa ho jatii  haath phailaa diye inaamemohabbat ke liye ye na sochaa kii main kyaa merii mohabbat kyaa hai rakh diyaa dil rakh diyaa dil tere qadamon pe tab aayaa ye kayaal tujhako is tuute hue dil kii zaruurat kyaa hai 2  terii ulfat ke kariidaar to itane honge 2 tere gusse kaa talabagaar mile yaa naa mile likh de mere hii muqaddar men sazaayen saarii phir koii mujhasaa gunahagaar mile yaa naa mile 2

Title: is mod se jaate hain kuchh sust kadam raste
Lyrics: kuchh sust kadam raste  is mod se jaate hain kuchh sust kadam raste kuchh tez kadam raahen is mod se jaate hain  saharaa kii taraf jaa kar ik raah bagolon men kho jaatii hai chakaraa kar ik raah udhadatii sii chhilatii huii kaanton se jangal se guzaratii hai ik daud ke jaatii hai aur kuud ke giratii hai anajaan kalaaon men is mod se jaate hain  us mod pe baithaa huun jis mod se jaatii hai har ek taraf raahen ik roz to yuun hogaa is mod pe aa kar tum ruk jaaogii kah dogii wo kaun saa rastaa hai jis raah pe jaanaa hai 2 wo kaun saa rastaa hai jis raah pe jaanaa hai 2 wo kaun saa rastaa hai

Title: suniyo araj hamaarii prabhujii
Lyrics: suniyo araj hamaarii prabhujii suniyo araj hamaarii duniyaa kii is bharii sabhaa mein rakhiyo laaj muraarii suniyo araj hamaarii   threedots  tod diyaa andhe haathon ne raam naam ka pyaalaa jal ke raakh huii re kaanhaa bhakton kii madhushaalaa suniyo araj hamaarii   threedots  paap ke mandir nis din banate jhuut kii gangaa bahatii dhamr kii aankhen andhii ho gayiin puujaa ho gayii sastii suniyo araj hamaarii   threedots  har man men tum base hue ho jaane ye sansaarii aas milan kii janam janam tak phir bhii rahe kunvaarii suniyo araj hamaarii   threedots

Title: shekh jii thodii pii kar aaie
Lyrics: shekh jii thodii sii pii kar aaie  aap kyon hain saarii duniyaa se judaa aap bhii dushaman mere ban jaaie    threedots  kyaa hai achchhaa kyaa buraa bandaa na jaane aap samajhe to hamen samajhaaie  jaane diijiye akal kii baaten janaab dil kii suniye aur piite jaaie  ulajhanen duniyaa kii sulajhaayenge ham aap aapanii zulfen to sulajhaaiye  shekh jii thodii sii pii kar aaie

Title: main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaan morii
Lyrics: main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaan morii morii morii morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo re maiyyaan morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  maiyyaan morii bhor bhayo gaiyyan ke paachhe tuune madhuban mohii pathaayo chaar prahar bansii bat bhatayo saanjh pare main ghar aayo o ri maiyyaan morii main kab maakhan khaayo  3  maiyyaan morii main baalak bahiyan ko chhoto ye chhiipaa kis vidhii paayo maiyyaan ye gvaal baal sab bair pare hain barabas mukh lapataayo re maiyyaan morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  2  haan rii o morii maiyaan arii ho merii maiyaan arii pyaarii merii maiyaan arii bholii merii maiyaan o sundar sundar merii maiyaan o pyaarii pyaarii merii maiyaan arii ho merii maiyaan o kaisii nyaarii merii maiyaan maiyaan tuu jananii maiyaan morii tuu jananii man kii ati bholii tuu jananii man kii ati bholii in ke kahe patiaayo ri maiyaan morii in ke kahe patiaayo maiyaan ye le apanii laputii kambaliyaa tuune bahut hii naach nachaayo nii maiyaan morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  maiyaan morii maiyaan jiiya tere kuchh bhed upaj hai tuune mohe jaanyo paraayo jaayo suuradaas tab hansii yashodaa le ur kanth lagaayo nain niir bharii aayo kanhaiyaa kanhaiyaa tai nahiin maakhan khaayo kanhaiyaa more tai nahiin maakhan khaayo o lallaa more tai nahiin maakhan khaayo kanhaiyaa more tai nahiin maakhan khaayo  kanhaiyaa tai nahiin maakhan khaayo arii maiyaan main nahiin maakhan khaayo sun maiyaan morii o sun maiyaan morii maine hii maakhan khaayo  2 re maakhan khaayo  9 rii maiyaan morii maine hii maakhan khaayo sun maiyaan morii maine hii maakhan 3 khaayo

Title: tumhiin ho maataa pitaa tumhii ho tumhii ho bandhu sakhaa tumhii ho
Lyrics: tumhiin ho maataa pitaa tumhii ho tumhii ho bandhu sakhaa tumhii ho  tumhii ho saathii tumhii sahaare koi na apanaa sivaa tumhaare tumhii ho nayyaa tumhii khivayyaa tumhii ho bandhu sakhaa tumhii ho  jo khil sake naa vo phuul ham hain tumhaare charanon kii dhuul ham hain dayaa kii drishhti sadaa hii rakhanaa tumhii ho bandhu sakhaa tumhii ho

Title: aajakal tere mere pyaar ke charche har zabaan par
Lyrics: aajakal tere mere pyaar ke charche har zabaan par sabako maalum hai aur sabako khabar ho gai   2  1 hamane to pyaar men aisaa kaam kar liyaa pyaar kii raah men apanaa naam kar liyaa    2 pyaar kii raah men apanaa naam kar liyaa aajakal threedots  2 do badan ek din ek jaan ho gae manzilen ek huiin hamasafar ban gae   2 manzilen ek huiin hamasafar ban gae  aajakal threedots  3 kyon bhalaa ham daren dil ke maalik hain ham har janam men tujhe apanaa maanaa sanam   2 har janam men tujhe apanaa maanaa sanam aajakal threedots

Title: dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men
Lyrics: dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men are dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men kahiin dhal naa jaaye raat tuut naa jaayen sapane dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men  vo kyaa chiiz thii milaake nazar giraa dii huaa vo asar ke hamane nazar jhukaa dii gun gun guunje raag aaj pavan men dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men  do dil mil gaye diye jal gaye hazaaron ajii tum mil gaye to gul khil gaye hazaaron hongii do do baat aaj milan men are dhiire dhiire chal chaand gagan men

Title: chalo baant lete hain apanii sazaaen jagjit singh gazal
Lyrics: chalo baant lete hain apanii sazaaen naa tum yaad aao naa ham yaad aaen  sabhii ne lagaayaa hai chehare pe cheharaa kise yaad rakhen kise bhul jaaen chalo threedots  unhen kyaa khabar ho aanevaala naa aayaa barasatii rahiin raat bhar ye kadaaen chalo threedots

Title: ruk jaa raat thahar jaa re chandaa
Lyrics: ruk jaa raat thahar jaa re chandaa biite na milan kii belaa aaj chaandanii kii nagarii men aramaanon kaa melaa ruk jaa raat threedots  pahale milan kii yaaden lekar aaii hai ye raat suhaanii doharaate hain chaand sitaare merii tumhaarii prem kahaanii merii tumhaarii prem kahaanii ruk jaa raat threedots  kal kaa daranaa kaal kii chintaa do tan hai man ek hamaare jiivan siimaa ke aage bhii aauungii main sang tumhaare aauungii main sang tumhaare ruk jaa raat threedots

Title: haan main diivaanaa huun chaahuun to  mukesh gazal
Lyrics: haan main divaanaa huun chaahuun to machal sakataa huun khilaavatehusn ke kaanuun badal sakataa huun khaar to khaar hain angaaron pe chal sakataa huun  mere mahabuub mere dost nahiin ye bhii nahiin merii bebaak tabiiyat kaa takaazaa hai kuchh aur   isii raftaar se duniyaa ko guzar jaane duun dil men ghut ghut ke tamannaon ko mar jaane duun terii zulfon ko saredosh bikhar jaane duun  ek din chhiin luun main azamatebaasil kaa junuun tod duun tod duun main shaukh se duniyaa kaa khus  aur bah jaaye yuun hii nafzezaarosim kaa khuun  gairateishq ko manzuur tamaashaa hai yahii merii fitarat kaa mere dost takaazaa hai yahii

Title: kaahe tarasaae jiyaraa yauvan ritu sajan jaake naa aae
Lyrics: kaahe tarasaae jiyaraa yauvan ritu sajan jaake naa aae kaahe jiyaraa tarasaae kaahe tarasaae threedots  nit nit jaage naa soyaa shrringaar jhanan jhan jhanan nit naa bulaae kaahe jiyaraa tarasaae kaahe tarasaae threedots  nit nit barase naa ras kii phuhaar  sapanaa ban gagan nit naa lutaae kaahe jiyaraa tarasaae kaahe tarasaae threedots  nit nit aaye na tan pe nikhaar saavan man suman nit na khilaaye kaahe jiyaraa tarasaae kaahe tarasaae threedots

Title: badanaam muhabbat kaun kare
Lyrics: badanaam badanaam muhabbat kaun kare 2 aur ishq ko rusavaa kaun kare 2 badanaam   jab de diyaa dil hii haathon se 2 phir aap se shiikavaa kaun kare 2 badanaam   aakhon men samaye jab tum ho aur dil men samaye jab tum ho 2 phir tum hii bataa do aake zaraa 2 duniyaa kii tamannaa kaun kare 2 badanaam badanaam muhabbat  threedots   aansuu to kiye hain khuushk magar itanaa to bataado ab aakar 2 jo aag lagii hai siine men 2 us aag ko thandaa kaun kare 2 badanaam badanaam muhabbat  threedots

Title: paayo jii main ne raam ratan dhan paayo
Lyrics: paayo jii main ne raama ratana dhana paayo  threedots  vastu amolika dii mere sataguru kirapaa karii apanaayo   janama janama kii puunjii paaii jagamen sabhii khovaayo   kharachai na khuutai chora na luutai dina dina badhata savaayo   sata kii naava khevatiyaa sataguru bhavasaagara tara aayo   miiraa ke prabhu giridhara naagara harakha harakha jasa gaayo

Title: dil diivaanaa dil mastaanaa maane na
Lyrics: dil diivaanaa dil mastaanaa maane na lagii bujhaanaa buraa zamaanaa jaane na bhiigaa bhiigaa pahaluu hai dliadaar jahaan bhiigii bhiigii raaton kaa vo pyaar kahaan  raste pe terii merii pahalii mulaaqaat huii akhiyon kii akhiyon se vo jo ek baat huii usii ek miithi baat pe ye dil aabaad hai  pyaar kaa jo duhkh uthaayaa apanaa hii qusuur hai teraa koii dosh nahiin dil majabuur hai apana jahaan to apane haathon barabaad hai

Title: jaane chale jaate hain kahaan duniyaa se jaanevaale
Lyrics: jaane chale jaate hain kahaan duniyaa se jaanevaale jaane chale jaate hain kahaan kaise dhundhe koi unako nahin kadamon ke bhii nishaan  jaane hai vo  2 kaun nagariyaa aaye jaaye khat naa khabariyaa aaye jab jab unakii yaaden aaye hothon pe fariyaaden jaake phir naa aane vaale jaane chale jaate hain kahaan threedots  mere bichhade  2 jiivan saathii saathii jaise dipak baatii mujhase bichhad gaye tum aise saavan ke jaate hii jaise udake baadal kaale kaale jaane chale jaate hain kahaan   duniyaa se jaanevaale jaane chale jaate hain kahaan kaise dhundhe koi unako nahiin kadamon ke bhii nishaan jaane chale jaate hain kahaan threedots

Title: jaag aur dekh zaraa aalameviiraan meraa
Lyrics: jaag aur dekh zaraa aalameviiraan meraa subah ke bhes men nikalaa hai gariibaan meraa  band aankhen kiye yuun jaag rahaa huun shabegam ki unhen aaye nazar kvabepareshaan meraa  muddaton kuuevafaa aaye ki butkhaanon se uud ban ban ke jalaa hai dilesozaan meraa  tumhen kyon maddenazar ab hai karaabii is kii tum to kahate the ki ghar hai dileinsaan meraa  pad gaii kis kii nigaahemutabassam siimaab ho gayaa harfegalat daftareisayaan meraa

Title: gair ban ke na milen ham tumhen apanaa kar len
Lyrics: gair ban ke na milen ham tumhen apanaa kar len ho ijaazat to ye chhotii sii tamannaa kar len  tez saanson men rachii pyaar kii shahanaaii ho phuul saa cheharaa ho mahakii huii tanahaaii ho niichii nazaren jo uthen dekh ke pardaa kar len  hamane allaah se yuun daadewafaa maangii hai jald mil jaao hamen tum ye duaa maangii hai haan jo kah do to abhii shukr kaa sajadaa kar len  hai mukaddar par hamen naaz mohabbat pe yaqiin jiite jii tumase judaaii kabhii mumakin hii nahiin marake bhii ham na judaa honge ye waadaa kar len

Title: kisamat kaa maaraa panchhii akelaa roye
Lyrics: kisamat kaa maaraa kisamat kaa maaraa panchhii akelaa roye roye milan kii belaa 2  dhiimedhiime chaand ne apanii kiranon kaa jaal phailaayaa halakehalake hawaa ke jhonkon ne phuulon ko sahalaayaa jab laharen naachnaach kar chuumiin tat ko jhat jhuumjhuum chandaa kii chhaanv men raat ne raat ne rang udelaa  kisamat kaa maaraa kisamat kaa maaraa panchhii akelaa roye roye milan kii belaa  paagal man kii aashaaon kaa ek sitaaraa tuutaa 2 prempanth ke raahii se ummiid kaa daaman chhuutaa 2  madhur chaandanii ban dulahan aaii aakaash ke dwaar pe janamjanam kaa pyaasaa chakoraa paagal huaa singaar pe kab biitii kab biitii wo raat usane naa jaanaa muurakh ghuumghuum kar maar thak gayaa tuutaa tuutaa wo sapan rupahalaa  kisamat kaa maaraa kisamat kaa maaraa panchhii akelaa roye roye milan kii belaa 2

Title: kayaalokwaab huii hain muhabbaten kaisii
Lyrics: kayaalokwaab huii hain muhabbaten kaisii lahuu men naach rahii hain ye wahashaten kaisii  na shab ko chaand hii achchhaa na din ko mehar achchhaa ye ham pe biit rahii hain qiyaamate kaisii  wo saath thaa to kudaa bhii thaa meharabaan kyaa bichhad gayaa to huii adaawaten kaisii  azaab jisakaa tabassum gazab hai jisakii nigaah khinchii huii hain pasejaan ye suuraten kaisii  hawaa ke ruk pe hii rakhe huye chiraag hain ham jo bujh gaye to hawaa se shiqaayaten kaisii  jo bekabar koii guzaraa to ye sadaa dii hai main sangeraah huun mujhape inaayaten kaisii

Title: wo dilnawaaz hain lekin nazar shanaas nahiin
Lyrics: wo dilnawaaz hain lekin nazar shanaas nahiin meraa ilaaj mere chaaraagar ke paas nahiin  kabhii kabhii jo tere kurb men guzaare the ab un dinon kaa tasavvur bhii mere paas nahiin  guzar rahe hain ajab marahalon se diidaaodil sahar kii aas to hai zindagii kii aas nahiin  mujhe ye dar hai terii aarazuu na mit jaaye bahut dinon se tabiiyat merii udaas nahiin  tere dilon men bhii dil kaanp kaanp uthataa hai mere majaaj ko aasuudagii bhii raas nahiin  tadap rahe hain zabaan par kaii sawaal magar mere liye koii shaayaaneiltamaas nahiin

Title: merii duniyaa men aakar kyaa karogii
Lyrics: merii duniyaa men aakar kyaa karogii mujhe apanaa banaakar kyaa karogii  kahiin gum hai merii manzil merii viiraan raahen hain badii gaharii udaasii hai merii duniyaa men aahen hain mere dil men samaa kar kyaa karogii  tumhaare dil kii kaliyon ko mahakanaa muskuraanaa hai tumhen kwaabon kii jannat ko abhii rangiin banaanaa hai mujhe sapanon men laakar kyaa karogii  merii maano tum apane dil ko samajhaalo to behatar hai jo mujhase tum na milane ki qasam khaalo to behatar hai gamon se dil lagaa kar kyaa karogii

Title: pyaar bhare do sharmiile nain
Lyrics: pyaar bhare do sharmiile nain jinase milaa mere dil ko chain koii jaane jaa kyuun mujhase sharmaayen kaise mujhe tadapaayen  2  dil ye kahe giit main tere gaauun tuu hii sune aur main gaataa jaauun tuu jo rahe saath mere duniyaa ko thukaraauun teraa dil bahalaauun pyaar bhare do sharmiile nain  ruup teraa kaliyon ko sharmaaye kaise koii apane dil ko bachaaye paas hai tuu phir bhii jaanam kaun tujhe samajhaaye saawan biitaa jaaye pyaar bhare do sharmiile nain  dar hai mujhe tujhase bichhad na jaauun kho ke tujhe milane kii raah na paauun aisaa na ho jab bhii teraa naam labon par laauun main aansuu ban jaauun pyaar bhare do sharmiile nain

Title: aa terii tasaviir banaa luun
Lyrics: aa terii tasaviir banaa luun main apanii taqadiir banaa luun dil ke kore kaagaz par  ulfat kii lakiir banaa luun aa terii tasaviir banaa luun threedots  rang hamaare terii javaanii ban jaaye ek prem kahaanii duur kisii ko lene jaa ke sun luun aur sunaa luun aa terii tasaviir banaa luun threedots  baal hain baadal jaise kaale saagar se nainaa matavaale tere gulaabii gaalon se jii karataa hai rang churaa luun aa terii tasaviir banaa luun threedots

Title: pyaar jhaalaa re jhaalaa
Lyrics: pyaar jhaalaa re jhaalaa raadhaa gorii govindaa hai kaalaa  us ko rokaa vahaan khatpat kii khaayaa maakhan kahiin todii matakii us ko rokaa vahaan khatpat kii khaayaa maakhan kahiin todii matakii maan yashodaa zaraa dekh le tuu bhii aa raah chalane na de teraa baalaa re jhaalaa raadhaa gorii govindaa hai kaalaa   chhede raadhaa ko raadhaa kii sakhiyaan gorii ham se chhupaa tuu na batiyaan pyaar kaise huaa ye bataa de zaraa kab andhere men dekhaa ujaalaa re jhaalaa raadhaa gorii govindaa hai kaalaa  naam us ke jape sab zamaanaa shyaam giridhaarii govindaa kaanhaa naam us ke jape sab zamaanaa shyaam giridhaarii govindaa kaanhaa saamane jo gayaa us ke vo na bachaa aisaa jaaduu hai kuchh us ne daalaa re jhaalaa raadhaa gorii govindaa hai kaalaa

Title: royaa karenge aap bhii paharon isii tarah
Lyrics: royaa karenge aap bhii paharon isii tarah atakaa kahiin jo aapakaa dil bhii merii tarah  naa taab hijr men hai na aaraam vasl men kambakt dil ko chain nahiin hai kisii tarah  mar chuk kahiin ke tuu gamehijraan se chhuut jaaye kahate to hain bhale kii wo lekin burii tarah  naa jaaye waan banii hai naa bin jaaye chain hai kyaa kiijiye hamen to hai mushkil sabhii tarah   lagatii hain gaaliyaan bhii tere munh se kyaa bhalii qurbaan tere phir mujhe kah le isii tarah  huun jaanbalab butaanesitamagar ke haath se kyaa sab jahaan men jiite hain momin isii tarah

Title: o priit nibhaanevaalii mujhe kabar hai
Lyrics: o priit nibhaanevaalii mujhe kabar hai tuu bhulegii ek din meraa pyaar apane gale se mere prem kii maalaa degii utaar  merii aashaaon kii bastii ko mitaayegii tuu dil meraa luut ke ik din chalii jaayegii tuu   o dil se khelanevaalii  prem bhare aramaanon se hai khelanaa teraa kaam terii nazar men koii chiiz nahiin hai dil kaa daam  merii aashaaon kii bastii ko mitaayegii tuu dil meraa luut ke ik din chalii jaayegii tuu   o yauvan madmatavaalii tere charanon ko aataa hai prem kaa thukaraa denaa terii aankhen jaanatii hain dil le kar bahakaa denaa  merii aashaaon kii bastii ko mitaayegii tuu dil meraa luut ke ik din chalii jaayegii tuu

Title: terii dhuum har kahiin tujh saa yaar koii nahiin
Lyrics: suuraj ke jaisii golaaii	golaaii chandaa ki thandak bhii paaii	shshshshthreedots haa thanake to pyaare duhaaii laii laii laii laii  terii dhuum har kahiin tujh saa yaar koii nahiin ham ko to pyaare tuu sab se pyaaraa laii laii laii laii terii dhuum threedots   duniyaa kii gaadii kaa pahiyaa tuu chor tuu hii sipahiyaa raajon kaa raajaa rupaiyaa	2 laii laii laii laii terii dhuum threedots   buudhon kii tuu hii javaanii	cough cough bachapan kii dilakash kahaanii tere binaa duudh paanii		2 laii laii laii laii terii dhuum threedots   daulat kaa mazahab chalaake	om dhanaaya namah ham ek mandir banaake		hare dhan hare dhan puujenge tujhako bithaake	2 jay jay jay jay  terii dhuum threedots

Title: hamaare saath jise maut se ho pyaar chale
Lyrics: hamaare saath jise maut se ho pyaar chale koii chale na chale ham to suuedaar chale  na daurejaam na ab qissaaebahaar chale unhiin kaa zikr chale aur baar baar chale  hamiin chaman men payaamebahaar laaye the chaman se le ke hamiin hasaratebahaar chale  ye gam nahiin ki yahaan kuchh hamen amaan na milii kushii men aise terii anjuman sanwaar chale

Title: aahaa rimajhim ke ye pyaare pyaare giit lie
Lyrics: t aahaa rimajhim ke ye pyaare pyaare giit lie aai raat suhaanii dekho priit lie miit mere suno zaraa havaa kahe kyaa aa threedots suno to zaraa jhiingar bole chiikiimiikii chiikiimiikii rimajhim ke ye pyaare pyaare giit lie   t khoii sii bhiigii bhiigii raat jhuume aankhon men sapano kii baaraat jhuume   2 dil kii ye duniyaa aaj baadalon ke saath jhuume aahaa rimajhim ke ye threedots  l aa jaao dil men basaa luun tumhen nainon kaa kajaraa banaa luun tumhen   2 jaalim zamaane kii nigaahon se chhupaa luun tumhen aahaa rimajhim ke ye threedots  t haathon men tere meraa haath rahe dil se jo nikalii hai vo baat rahe   2 meraa tumhaaraa saarii zindagii kaa saath rahe aahaa rimajhim ke ye threedots

Title: aaj ham ishq kaa izahaar karen to kyaa ho
Lyrics: k  aaj ham ishq kaa izahaar karen to kyaa ho l  jaan pahachaan se inkaar karen to kyaa ho k  bharii mahafil men tumhe pyaar karen to kyaa ho l  koshishe aap kii betaar kare to kyaa ho  k  kahate daratii ho dil men maratii ho jaaneman tum kamaal karatii ho kahate daratii ho dil men maratii ho jaaneman tum kamaal karatii ho  k  aankhon aankhon men muskuraatii ho baaton baaton men dil lubhaatii ho narm saanson kii garm laharon se dil ke taaron ko gudagudaatii ho arre in sab baaton kaa matalab puchhe to rang chehare kaa laal karatii ho jaaneman tum kamaal karatii ho  l  chup bhii rahie ye kyaa kayaamat hai aap kii bhii ajib aadat hai itanaa hangaamaa kisaliye aakhir pyaar hai yaa koii musibat hai jab bhii milate ho jaane tum kyaakyaa ultesidhe savaal karate ho jaaneman tum kamaal karate ho  k  mastiyaan sii fazaan pe chhaayii hain vaadiyaan rang men nahaai hain l  narmsabzped shokh phulon ne makhamalii chhaadaren bichhaayii hain k  aah chhodo sharamaanaa aise mausam me tabiyat kyon nihaal karatii ho ho jaaneman tum kamaal karatii ho l  jab bhii milate ho jaane tum kyaakyaa ultesidhe savaal karate ho jaaneman tum kamaal karate ho

Title: pyaar kisii se kab hotaa hai  pyaar kaa matalab rab hotaa hai
Lyrics: pyaar kisii se achchhaa kab hotaa hai kab hotaa hai  jab honaa ho tab hotaa hai pyaar kaa matalab kyaa hotaa hai pyaar kaa kyaa matalab hotaa hai pyaar kaa matalab rab hotaa hai pyaar kisii se threedots  hamako kisii kii kahaanii sunaa do chaahat men hotaa hai kyaa kyaa bataa do jab bhii kisii ko ye rog lag jaae saarii saarii raat use niind naa aae pyaar men kabhii bhii aisii aahen na bharanaa taubaa merii taubaa mujhe pyaar nahiin karanaa shaam savere aahen bharate hain o ho pyaar men jiite aur marate hain kyon marate hain jo na zamaane se darate hain pyaar vahii dil se karate hain pyaar kisii se threedots  jaane kahaan dil khone lagaa hai kuchh kuchh mujhe bhii hone lagaa hai aao zaraa aao mere gale lag jaao apane diivaane ko na aise tadapaao dil men tumhaare kyaa hai mujhako pataa hai chhodo baabaa chhodo mujhe dar lagataa hai yahii adaaen kaun sii mujhako lubhaaen sach mere jiyaa kaa kyaa chain churaaen jhuuthe terii baaten mujhe sataaen miithaa miithaa dard jagaaen miithaa dil men dard jagaaen pyaar kisii se threedots  raahevafaa men chal ke to dekho baahon men aa ke machal ke to dekho ho main bhalaa aise kaise kar luun bharosaa vaadaa karo doge kabhii na mujhe dhokhaa tuu jo kahegii vahii ye kahegaa teraa ye diivaanaa tere dil men rahegaa chalo jii kahaan chalen yuun naa baat banaao kaun sii baat aise na meraa kyaa dil dhadakaao achchhaa duur hii baitho paas na aao mujhe na aise haath lagaao pyaar kisii se threedots

Lyrics: raat akeli hai bujh gae diye aake mere paas kaanon men mere jo bhi chaahe kahiye jo bhi chaahe kahiye raat threedots  1 tum aaj mere liye ruk jaao rut bhi hai furasat bhi hai  tumhen na ho na sahii mujhe tumase muhabbat hai muhabbat kii ijaazat hai to chup kyuun rahiye jo bhi chaahe kahiye raat threedots  2 savaal banii huii dabii dabii ulajhan siinon men javaab denaa thaa to duube ho pasiinon men thaanii hai do hasiinon men to chup kyuun rahiye jo bhi chaahe kahiye raat threedots

Lyrics: kahataa hai ye mausam chhaa rahii hai kahiin pe ghataa panchhii gaa rahe hain inase puuchhuungii teraa pataa merii julphon ko chhede diivaanii ye paagal havaa sapane saajan ke de rahe ab hamako sadaa  bhanvare tarane gaye gaake hame sunaaye phuulon kaa dil hai javan aaii javaanii aaii kyaa rut suhanii aaii kitanaa hasiin hai samaa aise men jii karataa hai karane ko koii khata kahataa hai ye mausam chhaa rahii hai kahiin pe ghataa  apanaa banaauungii main dil men basaauungii main jab vo milegaa mujhe kisakii diivaanii huun main kisakii kahaanii huun main kaise bataauun tujhe aaj nahiin to kal mil jaayegaa usakaa pataa kahataa hai ye mausam  chhaa rahii hai kahiin pe ghataa  2

Lyrics: priitam aan milo priitam aan milo dukhiyaa jiyaa pukaare priitam aan milo  raat andherii aayii baalamaa man moraa ghabaraae hai duur ped par baithaa panchhii yahii ratanaa lagaae hai aan milo priitam aan milo priitam aan milo  bhiigii raat men ped ke niiche aankhmicholii khel rachaayaa priitam yaad karo jab tumane prem bharaa ik giit sunaayaa aan milo priitam aan milo priitam aan milo

Title: jab koii baat bigad jaae jab koii mushakil pad jaae
Lyrics: saanuu  jab koii baat bigad jaae jab koii mushkil pada jaae tum denaa saath meraa o hamanavaaz jaba koi baata bigada jaae jaba koi mushkila pada jaae naa koi hai naa koi thaa zindagii men tumhaare sivaa tuma denaa saatha meraa o hamanavaaza  saanuu  ho chaandanii jaba taka raata detaa hai hara koi saatha tuma magara andheron men naa chhodanaa meraa haatha   2 jaba koi baata bigada jaae threedots naa koi hai naa koi thaa threedots  saadhanaa  vafaadarii kii vo rasmen nibhaaenge hama to kasamen eka bhii saansa zindagii kii jaba taka ho apane basa men   2 jaba koi baata bigada jaae threedots shaanuu  naa koi hai naa koi thaa threedots  saanuu  dila ko mere hua yakiin hama pahale bhii mile kahiin silasilaa ye sadiyon kaa koi aaja kii baata nahiin saadhanaa dila ko mere hua yakiin hama pahale bhii mile kahiin silasilaa ye sadiyon kaa koi aaja kii baata nahiin dono jaba koi baata bigada jaae jaba koi mushkila pada jaae tuma denaa saatha meraa o hamanavaaza naa koi hai naa koi thaa zindagii men tumhaare sivaa tuma denaa saatha meraa o hamanavaaza  2

Lyrics: gulashan kii faqat phuulon se nahiin kaanton se bhii ziinat hotii hai jiine ke liye is duniyaa men gam kii bhii zaruurat hotii hai  ai vaaizenaadaan karataa hai tuu ek qayaamat kaa charchaa yahaan roz nigaahen milatii hain yahaan roz qayaamat hotii hai  vo purasishegam ko aaye hain kuchh kah na sakuun chup rah na sakuun kaamosh rahuun to mushkil hai kah duun to shikaayat hotii hai  karanaa hii padegaa zaqatealam piine hii padenge yah aansuu fariyaadofugaan se ai naadaan tauhiinemohabbat hotii hai  jo aake ruke daaman pe sabaa vo ashq nahiin hain paanii hai jo aansuu na chhalake aankhon se us ashq kii qiimat hotii hai

Lyrics: tujhe apane dil se main kaise bhulaa duun terii yaad hii to merii zindagii hai merii zindagii hai tujhe apane dil se main kaise bhulaa duun bhulaa duun  tujhe kyaa kabar hai ke tujhase bichhad kar tadap kar har ik pal guzaaraa hai mainne judaaii ke gam  se pariishaan hokar kaii baar tujh ko pukaaraa hai mainne sadaa de rahaa hai tujhe pyaar meraa merii zindagii tuu kahaan kho gaii hai kahaan kho gaii hai tujhe apane dil se main kaise bhulaa duun bhulaa duun  tujhe bhuul jaanaa nahiin mere bas men mujhe dard de kar chale jaane waale tere gam se daaman main kaise chhudaa luun har ek saans par mujhako yaad aane waale in aankhon men har dam jalegaa teraa gam kabhii na bujhe jo ye wo roshanii hai wo roshanii hai tujhe apane dil se main kaise bhulaa duun terii yaad hii to merii zindagii hai merii zindagii hai

Lyrics: jiyen to jiyen kaise bin aapake  2 lagataa nahiin dil kahiin bin aapake  2  kaise kahuun binaa tere zindagii ye kyaa hogii   2 jaise koii sazaa koii badduaa hogii  2 maine kiyaa hai ye faisalaa jiinaa nahiin hai tere binaa jiyen to jiyen kaise bin aapake  2  mujhe koii dede zahar hansake main pii luungii   2 hara darda sah luungii har haal main jii luungii  2 dardejudaaii sah naa sakuungii tere binaa main rah naa sakuungii jiyen to jiyen kaise bin aapake  2  dekh ke vo mujhe teraa palaken jhukaa denaa  2 yaad bahut aae teraa muskuraa denaa  2 kaise bhulaauun vo saarii baaten vo miithii raaten vo mulaakaaten jiyen to jiyen kaise bin aapake  2 lagataa nahiin hai dil kahiin bin aapake

Lyrics: bin dekhe aur bin pahachaane tum par ham qurabaan mohabbat isako kahate hain mohabbat isako kahate hain  bin dekhe aur bin pahachaane tum par ham qurabaan mohabbat isako kahate hain mohabbat isako kahate hain gar tum par naa marate to jiinaa thaa aasaan mohabbat isako kahate hain mohabbat isako kahate hain  chaahat ke sandesh lekar aatii hai shaam gar tum bhii aa jaate to aa jaataa aaraam   2 dil kii bastii bas hii jaatii  merii har dhadakan ye gaatii tum aate to mujhapar hotaa kitanaa badaa ehasaan bin dekhe aur bin pahachaane threedots  bekal mere aramaan bekal hai meraa pyaar kabase main karataa huun tumhaaraa intazaar   2 kabase merii baahen suunii jiivan kii ye raahen suunii tum bin kaise puure honge dil men base aramaan  bin dekhe aur bin pahachaane threedots

Lyrics: main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaa morii kasam torii main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  bhor bhayo gaiyan ke paachhe2 madhuban mohe pathaayo2 chaar prahar bansii bat bhatakyo2 saanjh pade ghar aayo maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  main baalak paiyan ko chhoto2 chhiinkaa kehiin bidh paayo2 gwaal baal sab bair pade hain2 barabas mukh lipataayo maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  ye le apanii lakhutii  kamaliyaa2 bahut hii naach nachaayo2 suuradaas tab bihansii yashodaa2 lai ur kantha lagaayo maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaa morii kasam torii main nahiin maakhan khaayo maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo

Title: dolii men bithaaii ke kahaar
Lyrics: ho raamaa re ho o raamaa dolii men bithaaii ke kahaar  2 laae mohe sajanaa ke dvaar o dolii men bithaaii ke kahaar biite din khushiyon ke chaar deke dukh man ko hajaar o dolii menthreedots  mar ke nikalanaa thaa o mar ke nikalanaa thaa ghar se saanvariyaa ke jiite jii nikalanaa padaa phuulon jaise paanvon men pad gae ye chhaale re kaanton pe jo chalanaa padaa patajhad o ban gaii patajhad o ban gaii patajhad bairan bahaar                dolii menthreedots  jitane hain aansuu merii o jitane hain aansuu merii ankhiyon men utanaa nadiyaa men naahiin re niir o likhanevaale tuune likh dii ye kaisii merii tuutii nayyaa jaisii taqadiir uthaa maajhii o maajhii uthaa maajhii o maajhii re uthaa maajhii uthe patavaar                dolii menthreedots  tuutaa pahale mere man o tuutaa pahale man ab chuudiyaan tuutiin ye saare sapane yuun chuur kaisaa huaa dhokhaa aayaa pavan kaa jhonkaa mit gayaa meraa sinduur lut gae o raamaa lut gae o raamaa mere lut gae solah shrringaar           dolii menthreedots

Title: vo rulaataa hai rulaae mujhe jii bhar ke
Lyrics: vo rulaataa hai rulaae mujhe jii bhar ke kadii   vo merii aankh hai main usako rulaauun kaise   ashkon ke motii hamane piroe tamaam raat  ik bevafaa ke yaad men roe tamaam raat   aisii girii zahan pe yaadon kii bijaliyaan  baithe rahe khayaalon men khoe tamaam raat   kahane lage vo sunake meraa haaledil kii bas  itanii sii baat pe kyaa roe tamaam raat

Title: chandaa suuraj laakhon taare
Lyrics: chandaa suuraj laakhon taare hain jab tere hii ye saare kis baat par hotii hai phir taqaraare  khinchii hain lakiiren is zamiin pe par na khiincho dekho biich men do dilon ke hai diivaare  duniyaa men kahiin bhii dard se koii bhii  karate to hamako yahaan pe ehasaas usake zakhmon ka ho ke apanaa bhii dil bhar bhar laayen roye na kahen  duurii kyon dilon men rahen faasalen kyon badhate rahen pyaarii hai zindagii hai pyaaraa jahaan  rishte badii mushkilon se banate hain yahaan pe lekin tuutane ke liye bas ek hii lamhaa  ishq davaa hai har ek dard kii zanjiir ishq hai har ek rishte kii ishq saari hadon ko tod daale ishq to duniyaa ko pal men mitaa bhii le ishq hai jo saare jahaan ko aman bhii de  raunak hai ishq se hii saare aalam kii  chandaa suuraj laakhon taare hain jab tere hii ye saare kis baat par hotii hain phir taqaraare  khinchii hain lakiiren is zamiin pe par na khiincho dekho biich men do dilon ke hai diivaare  duniyaa men kahiin bhii dard se koii bhii

Lyrics: hamako mitaa sake ye zamaane men dam nahiin2 hamase zamaanaa kud hai zamaane se ham nahiin hamako mitaa sake  merii zubaan pe shikawaaeehalesitam nahiin2 mujhako jagaa diyaa yahii ehasaan kam nahiin  yaa rab hujuumedard ko de aur vusuaten2 daaman to kyaa abhii merii aankhen bhii nam nahiin  shikawaa to ek chhed hai lekin haqiiqatan2 teraa sitam bhii terii inaayat se kam nahiin hamako mitaa sake threedots

Title: do buunde saavan kii haay do buunde saavan kii
Lyrics: do buunde saavan kii haay do buunde saavan kii ek saagar kii siip men tapake aur motii ban jaaye duujii gande jal men girakar apana aap gavaaye kisako mujarim samajhe koi kisako doshh lagaaye do buunde saavan kii  do kaliyaan gulashan kii haay do kaliyaan gulashan kii ek sehare ke biich gundhe aur man hii man itaraaye ek arthii ke bhent chadhe aur dhuuli me mil jaaye kisako mujarim samajhe koi kisako doshh lagaaye  2 do kaliyaan saavan kii  do sakhiyaan bachapan kii haay do sakhiyaan bachapan kii ek sinhaasan par baithe aur ruupamatii kahalaaye duujii apane ruup ke kaaran galiyon me bik jaaye kisako mujarim samajhe koi kisako doshh lagaaye do sakhiyaan bachapan kii

Title: bolo bolo kuchh to bolo gussaa chhodo dil na todo
Lyrics: bolo bolo kuchh to bolo gussaa chhodo dil na todo pyaar ho to kah do yas  pyaar nahiin to kah do no phir jo ho ho so ho  phir jo ho ho so ho  haay pyaar ho to kah do yaathreedotsh  aapakii adaaon kaa hisaab nahiin laakhon men hamaaraa bhii javaab nahiin kam nahiin tum   kam nahiin tum   socho zaraa  bolo bolo kuchh to bolo gussaa chhodo dil na todo aise na aanchal bachaalo sanam pyaar ho to kah do yas threedots  kaahe ko nazar ghabaraai sii hai mahafil bhii hai tanahaai bhii hai ruke ruke tum ruke ruke ham socho zaraa  bolo bolo kuchh to bolo gussaa chhodo dil na todo ab to nigaahen milaa lo sanam pyaar ho to kah do yas threedots  kahaan chale jii zaraa haal suno kisii dilavaale kaa savaal suno dare dare tum dare dare ham socho zaraa  bolo bolo kuchh to bolo gussaa chhodo dil na todo thokar lage naa sambhaalo sanam pyaar ho to kah do yas threedots  2

Title: ho gayaa dil aur aankh men jhagadaa
Lyrics: ho gayaa dil aur aankh men jhagadaa dil ko churaa gayaa paradesii nahiin aankh ne pakadaa ho gayaa dil threedots  aankhen boliin paagal dil hai jisake zakhamon par maraham hai dil kehataa ham lute magar kuchh nahiin aankh kaa bigadaa dil ko churaa gayaa threedots  dil ne apanaa bhed chhupaayaa aankhon ne jag ko batalaayaa duniyaa hansii dekh ke un kaa ronaa honaa mukhadaa dil ko churaa gayaa threedots  dono karane lage gulaamii kaisii miithii ye badanaamii is jhagde men aansuu banakar dil aankhon se bichhadaa dil ko churaa gayaa threedots

Title: bahaaron ne meraa chaman luutakar
Lyrics: bahaaron ne meraa chaman luutakar  khizaan ko ye ilzaam kyon de diyaa  kisiine chalo dushmanii kii magar  ise dostii naam kyon de diyaa  bahaaron ne meraa threedots  main samajhaa nahiin ai mere hamanashiin  sazaa ye milii hai mujhe kis liye 2  ke saaqii ne lab se mere chhiin kar  kisii aur ko jaam kyon de diyaa  bahaaron ne meraa threedots  mujhe kya pataa thaa kabhi ishq men  raqibon ko kaasid banaate nahiin 2  khataa ho gaii mujhase kaasid mere  tere haath paigaam kyon de diyaa  bahaaron ne meraa threedots  khudaayaa yahaan tere insaaf ke  bahut mainne charche sune hain magar 2  sazaa kii jagah ek khataavaar ko  bhalaa tuune iinaam kyon de diyaa   bahaaron ne meraa chaman luutakar  khizaan ko ye ilzaam kyon de diyaa threedots

Lyrics: ki  chandaa o chandaa  2 kisane churaaii terii merii nindiyaa jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa  2  hansake main teraa man bahalaauun  apane ye aansuu magar kise main dikhaauun   2 mainne to guzaaraa jiivan saaraa besaharaa ho jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa  chandaa o threedots  terii aur merii ek kahaanii ham dono ki kadar kisii na jaanii   2 saath ye andheraa jaise meraa vaise teraa ho jaage saari rainaa tere mere nainaa   lataa  chandaa o chandaa  kisane churaaii terii merii nindiyaa  jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa  2  ki  jaage saarii threedots

Title: tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa kisii kaa naa ho sakegaa
Lyrics: tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa kisii kaa naa ho sakegaa parii ho bhalaa ho kyaa ho tum tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa threedots  duniyaa chale udhar hii jidhar ye nigaah ghuume shabanam ko dekh lo gar banakar sharaab jhuume nashaa hii nashaa ho kyaa ho tum tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa threedots  kajaraare nain bhanvare palaken jo kholate hain dilon kii bhii baat kyaa hai imaan bhii dolate hain bhuuton ke khudaa ho kyaa ho tum tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa threedots  kahaan ye dhamakataa cheharaa kahaan aisaa nuur hogaa jisane banaayaa tumako use bhii guruur hogaa khudaa kii adaa ho kyaa ho tum tumhen jo bhii dekh legaa threedots

Title: bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa
Lyrics: category  lata bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa o bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa  shamshad aaj hanse kal rulaa na denaa  2  both o bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa   shamshad lambe hain jiivan ke raste  2 aao chale ham gaate hansate gaate hansate aaa aaaaa  lata duur des ek mahal banaayen pyaar kaa jis men diip jalaayen diip jalaayen  both diip jalaakar bujhaa na denaa aaj hanse kal rulaa na denaa  o bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa   lata rut badale yaa jiivan biite dil ke taraane hon na puraane   shamshad  nainon men ban kar sapan suhaane aayenge ek din yahii zamaane yahii zamaane  both yaad hamaarii mitaa na denaa aaj hanse kal rulaa na denaa  o bachapan ke din bhulaa na denaa

Title: sabaa se ye kah do ke kaliyaan bichhaae
Lyrics: sabaa se ye kah do ke kaliyaan bichhaae vo dekho vo jaanebahaar aa rahaa hai churaa le gayaa jo in aankhon kii niinden vahii leke dil kaa qaraar aa rahaa hai sabaa se ye kah do threedots  ye kaun aa gayaa dil ko karataa ishaare ke mahakii fazaa muskuraae nazaare qadam badhake tuu chuum le ai mohabbat ke dil ko bahut unape pyaar aa rahaa hai sabaa se ye kah do threedots  ye maanaa ke mahafil men anjaan hai tuu magar jab bhii tujhase nigaahen milii hain mujhe ye lagaa hai payaamemohabbat nazar se terii baarbaar aa rahii hai sabaa se ye kah do threedots  ye rangiin fasaanaa koii mujhase puuchhe ke tuu kaisaa pyaaraa hai kitanaa hasiin hai sunaa thaa hasiin jinape karate hain jaaduu tujhe dekhakar aitabaar aa rahaa hai sabaa se ye kah do threedots

Title: ye tasarruf allah allaah tere maikhaane men hai
Lyrics: ye tasarruf allah allaah tere maikhaane men hai aql kii sab kotakaarii tere diivaane men hai  may parastii kaa mazaa jab hai ki saaqii kah uthe may men vo mastii kahaan jo mere mastaane men hai  saaqiierozeazal kii vo nigaahen mast mast aaj ham rindon ke is tuute se paimaane men hai  aa talsadiiloqausarotasniin kii maujobahaar yaa kiraameyaar men yaa apane paimaane men hai  ye tasarruf threedots

Title: karoge yaad to har baat yaad aayegii
Lyrics: karoge yaad to har baat yaad aayegii  2 guzarate vaqt kii har mauj thahar jaayegii  2 karoge yaad to threedots  ye chaand biite zamaanon kaa aaiinaa hogaa     2 bhatakate abra men chaharaa koi banaa hogaa udaas raah koi daastaan sunaaegii     2 karoge yaad to threedots  barasataabhiigataa mausam dhuaandhuaan hogaa     2 pighalatii shamon pe dil kaa mere gumaan hogaa hatheliyon kii hinaa yaad kuchh dilaayegii     2 karoge yaad to threedots  galii ke mod pe suunaa saa koi daravaazaa     2 tarasatii aankhon se rastaa kisii kaa dekhegaa nigaah duur talak jaa ke laut aaegii     2 karoge yaad to threedots

Title: aise to na dekho ke hamako nashaa ho jaaye
Lyrics: aise to na dekho ke hamako nashaa ho jaae kuubasuurat sii koii hamase kataa ho jaae 2 aise to na dekho  tum hamen roko phir bhii ham naa ruken tum kaho kaafir phir bhii aise jhuken qadamenaaz pe ik sajadaa adaa ho jaae aise to na dekho ki hamako nashaa ho jaae khuubasuurat sii koii hamase khataa ho jaae aise to na dekho  yuun na ho aankhen rahen kaajal ghole badh ke bekhudii hansii gesuu khole khul ke phir zulfen siyaah kaalii balaa ho jaaye aise to na dekho ki hamako nashaa ho jaae khuubasuurat sii koii hamase khataa ho jaae aise to na dekho  ham to mastii men jaane kyaa kyaa kahe labenaazuk se aisaa na ho tumhe beqaraarii kaa gilaa ham se sivaa ho jaae aise to na dekho ki hamako nashaa ho jaae khuubasuurat sii koii hamase khataa ho jaae aise to na dekho

Title: akele akele kahaan jaa rahe ho hamen saath le lo jahaan jaa rahe ho
Lyrics: akele akele echo akele akele  kahaan jaa rahe ho echo rahe ho rahe ho  dhiime akele akele kahaan jaa rahe ho  hamen saath le lo jahaan jaa rahe ho  akele akele kahaan jaa rahe ho  hamen saath le lo jahaan jaa rahe ho  akele akelethreedots kahaan jaa rahe ho   koi mit rahaa hai tumhe kuchh pataa hai  2 tumhaaraa hua hai tumhe kuchh pataa hai  2 ye kyaa maazaraa hai tumhe kuchh pataa hai   dhiime akele akele threedots  tadapataa na chhodo meri jaan ho tum  2 ye mukhadaa na modo meri jaan ho tum  2 meraa dil na todo meri jaan ho tum   dhiime akele akele threedots  koi rok legaa to phir kyaa karoge  2 kadam thaam legaa to phir kyaa karoge  2 khushaamad karegaa to phir kyaa karoge   dhiime akele akele kahaan jaa rahe ho  hamen saath le lo jahaan jaa rahe ho  akele akele kahaan jaa rahe ho  hamen saath le lo jahaan jaa rahe ho  akele akelethreedots kahaan jaa rahe ho  akele akelethreedots akele akelethreedots kahaan jaa rahe ho rahe ho  rahe hothreedots akele akelethreedots akele akelethreedots kahaan jaa rahe ho rahe ho  rahe hothreedots

Lyrics: bi alakh ilaahii ek hain naam dharayaa doe raam rahiim ek hain naam dharayaa doe  krishhn kariim ek hain naam dharayaa doe kaashii kaabaa ek hain ek raam rahiim  maidaa ek pakavaan bahu baithii kabiraa jiin  ko bhajo man raam rahiim bi bhajo man raam rahiim  ko bhajo man krishhn kariim  jo hii raam so hii rahiim jo hii krishhnaa so hii kariim raam rahiim krishhn kariim  bhajo man man raam rahiim
