Title: suramaii shaam is tarah aaye
Lyrics: suramaii shaam is tarah aaye  saans lete hain jis tarah saaye  suramai shamthreedots   koi ahat nahiin badan ki kahiin phir bhi lagata hain tu yahiin hai kahin 2 vaqt jata sunai deta hai tera saya dikhai deta hai jaise khushabu nazar se chhu jaye saans lete hain jis tarah saaye suramai shaam threedots  din ka jo bhi pahar guzarata hai koi ahasan sa utarata hai vaqt ke panv dekhata hun main roz ye chhanv dekhata hun main aaye jaise koi khayal aaye saans lete hain jis tarah saaye suramai sham threedots

Title: aaj mere man men sakhii baansurii bajaae koii
Lyrics: la  aa haa haathreedots     aaj mere man men sakhii baansurii bajaae koii     aaj mere man menthreedots     aaj mere man men sakhii baansurii bajaae koii     pyaar bhare giit sakhii baarbaar gaae koii     baansurii bajaaethreedots     baansurii bajaae sakhii gaae sakhii re koii chhailavaa ho ko koii alabelavaa ho koii chhailavaa ho la  rang merii javaanii kaa kie jhuumataa ghar aayaa hai saavan ko rang merii javaanii kaa kie jhuumataa ghar aayaa hai saavan la  aa haa haathreedots     ho sakhii ho re sakhii aayaa hai saavan ko mere nainon men hai saajan  la  in uundii ghataaon men havaaon men sakhii naache meraa man     ho sakhii naache meraa man ko ho aangan men saavan manbhaavan ho jii la  ho in uundii ghataaon men havaaon men sakhii naache meraa man ko lallaa laalaa laa laalaa la  dil ke hindole pe mohe jhuule na jhulaae koii ko pyaar bhare giit sakhii baarbaar gaae koii la  baansurii bajaae sakhii gaae sakhii re     koii chhailavaa ho ko koii alabelavaa ho koii chhailavaa ho  la  kahataa hai ishaaron men koii     aa mohe ambuaa ke tale mil ko bhalaa vo kaun hai ghaayal     kahataa hai ishaaron men koii     aa mohe ambuaa ke tale mil la  main naam na luun     aaj lage laaj sakhii dhadake meraa dil ho sakhii dhadake meraa dil ko ho aangan men saavan manbhaavan ho jii la  ho main naam na luun     aaj lage laaj sakhii dhadake meraa dil ho sakhii dhadake meraa dil ko lallaa laalaa laa laalaa la  taar pe jiivan ke madhur raaginii sunaae koii ko pyaar bhare giit sakhii baarbaar gaae koii la  baansurii bajaae sakhii gaae sakhii re la  koii chhailavaa ho ko koii alabelavaa ho koii chhailavaa ho

Title: zindagii zindagii zindagii kab tum ko dekhaa hai
Lyrics: zindagii zindagii zindagii  2  kab tum ko dekhaa hai  2 taaron ke sang  phuulon ke rang men tum ko paanaa hai  ye mainne thaanaa hai tum ko paanaa hai  ye mainne thaanaa hai apane ghar laanaa hai  ye mainne thaanaa hai   tum mere sath ho main tere sath huun  vo zamiin sath hai aasamaan sath hai  ye bhiigaa bhiigaa jism ye bhiigii aarazuu  zindagii mil gayii zindagii hai saudaagar  detii hai kuchh lene ke baad  dii bahaar mujh ko magar phir  lii chaman rakhane ke baad  sang ke sang lahuu ke rang men  tum ko paanaa hai tum ko paanaa hai   zindagii threedots

Title: ishq men jalate rahe kal jo charaagon kii tarah
Lyrics: ishq men jalate rahe kal jo charaagon kii tarah zindagii unakii hai manzil ke suraagon kii tarah  ashq aankhon men chamakate hain sitaare ban kar aur jam jaate hain palakon pe ye daagon kii tarah  main bhii ik taajamahal apanaa banaauungaa kabhii sochataa rahataa huun shaahon ke dimaagon kii tarah  usane daanistaa andheron men mujhe rakhaa hai hamiid main bhii jalataa rahaa hasarat se charaagon kii tarah

Title: haqewafaa jo ham jataane lage
Lyrics: haqewafaa jo ham jataane lage aap kuchh kah ke muskuraane lage  hamako jiinaa padegaa furqat men wo agar himmat aazamaane lage  dar hai merii zubaan na khul jaaye ab wo baaten bahut bataane lage  jaan bachatii nazar nahiin aatii gair ulfat bahut jataane lage  tumako karanaa padegaa ujr wafaa ham agar dardedil sunaane lage  bahut mushkil hai shevaaetasliim ham bhii aakir ko jii churaane lage  vaqteruksat thaa sakt haalii par ham bhii baithe the jab wo jaane lage

Title: zindagii tuu meraa saath denaa
Lyrics: zindagii tuu meraa saath denaa haath men tuu haath denaa karz mujhako chukaanaa hai har saans kaa zindagii tuu meraa saath denaa  ghuunt piitaa rahaa main lahuu ke paanv haare nahiin justajuu ke dil ke jalane se kitanaa ujaalaa huaa  pyaar kii raah men mod aayaa jo meraa thaa main sab chhod aayaa ek tinakaa havaaon men udataa gayaa

Title: urvashi urvashi take it easy urvashi
Singer: a r rahman noel james shankar mahadevan
Lyrics: rahman marahabaa marahabaa marahabaa marahabaa marahabaa ungalii jaisii dubalii ko nahiin chaahiye pharmacy  jiit kaa mantra hai take it easy policy chaar dinakii chaandanii yah javaanii fantasy  mahadevan jaanatii ho hindii men pyaar ke kitane akshar bol do merii khaatir pyaar ke do hii akshar  mahadevanjames jiit kaa mantra hai take it easy policy chaar dinakii chaandanii yah javaanii fantasy  rahman chitrahaar men bijalii ud gaii mahadevanjames rahman padhane par bhii fel ho gaye mahadevanjames rahman baap ne bolaa ammaa kaa dushhman mahadevanjames rahman paap kare aur gangaa nahaae mahadevanjames rahman  mahadevan jaanatii ho itanaa to badan men laakhon nadii bataa do mujhako itanaa kahaan main pyaar kii nadii  mahadevanjames jiit kaa mantra hai take it easy policy chaar dinakii chaandanii yah javaanii fantasy  nazar ke mil jaane se hii shiil to bhang  nahiin hotaa billiyaan na shaakaahaarii har koii raan nahiin hotaa bhalaaii kabhii auraton kii kraantii ke binaa nahiin hogii zamaanaa badal gayaa pyaare puraanii baat nahiin hogii  rahman filam dekhane vo nahiin aaii mahadevanjames rahman bagal siit par budhhdhii ho to mahadevanjames rahman mahadevanjames pyaar kare aur not bhii maange  rahman ungalii jaisii dubalii ko nahiin chaahiye faarmasii  jiit kaa mantra hai take it easy policy chaar dinakii chaandanii yah javaanii fantasy  mahadevanjames agar ladakii ko andhere men aankh maarii to hogaa kyaa agar aazaadii na ho to svarg milane se hogaa kyaa biis kii umr kaa jo hai khel saath men khelake hogaa kyaa

Title: dil kii baat labon par laa kar ab tak ham dukh sahate hain
Lyrics: dil kii baat labon par laa kar ab tak ham dukh sahate hain hamane sunaa thaa is bastii men dilawaale bhii rahate hain  ek hamen aawaaraa kahanaa koii badaa ilzaam nahiin duniyaa waale dilawaalon ko aur bahut kuchh kahate hain  biit gayaa saawan kaa mahiinaa mausam ne nazaren badaliin lekin in pyaasii aankhon se ab tak aansuu bahate hain  jinakii kaatir shahar bhii chhodaa jinake liye badanaam huye aaj wohii hamase begaane begaane se rahate hain  wo jo abhii is raahaguzar se chaakgirebaan guzaraa thaa us aawaaraa diiwaane ko jaalib jaalib kahate hain

Title: duniyaa vaalon se duur jalane vaalon se duur
Lyrics: duniyaa vaalon se duur jalane vaalon se duur aajaa aajaa chalen kahiin duur kahiin duur kahiin duur  ye pyaar kaa jahaan hai har dil pe maharabaan hai kuchh aur ye zamiin hai kuchh aur aasamaan hai na zulm kaa nishaan hai na gam kii daastaan hai har koii jisako samajhe vo pyaar kii zubaan hai duniyaa vaalon se duur   threedots  ulfat kii raaginii men mastaanii bekudii men so jaayenge do dil ulfat kii chaandanii men phir kyaa karegii duniyaa jal jal maregii duniyaa taaron men do sitaare dekhaa karegii duniyaa duniyaa vaalon se duur   threedots  haathon men haath dale kud ko bhii na sambhaale nikalenge ham jidhar se ho jaayenge ujaale chandaa kahegaa hansakar siine pe haath rakh kar vo jaa rahe hain dekho do pyaar karane vaale duniyaa vaalon se duur   threedots

Title: tere aane kaa dhokhaa saa rahaa hai
Lyrics: tere aane kaa dhokhaa saa rahaa hai diyaa saa raat bhar jalataa rahaa hai  ajab hai raat se aankhon kaa aalam ye dariyaa raat bhar chadhataa rahaa hai  sunaa hai raat bhar barasaa hai baadal magar wah shahar jo pyaasaa rahaa hai  wo koii dost thaa achchhe dinon kaa jo pichhalii raat se yaad aa rahaa hai  kise dhuundhoge in galiyon men naasir chalo ab ghar chalen din dhal rahaa hai

Title: bechain nazar betaab jigar
Lyrics: bechain nazar betab jigar ye dil hai kisika divana hay divana kab sham ho aur vo shamma jale kab ud kar pahunche paravana hay paravana  hai dil ka chaman khilane ke liye aega koi milane ke liye phulon se kaho taron se kaho  2 chupake se saja den virana hay virana  jab rat zara shabanam men ghule laharai hui vo zulf khule nazaron se nazar ej bhed kahe  2 dil dil se kahe ek afasana hay afasana  rangin fiza chhae to zara  vade pe koi ae to zara ai joshevafa dil chiz hai kya  2 ham jan bhi den den nazarana hay nazarana  bechain nazar betab jigar threedots

Title: tum apane paas bulaa lo bahut udaas huun main
Lyrics: yuun intazaar kaa dukh ab sahaa nahiin jaataa tadap rahii hai mohabbat rahaa nahiin jaataa tum apane paas bulaa lo bahut udaas huun main  bhatak chukii huun bahut zindagii kii raahon men mujhe ab aake chhupaa lo tum apanii baahon men meraa savaal na taalo bahut udaas huun main  har ek saans men milane kii pyaas palatii hai sulag rahaa hai badan aur ruuh jalatii hai bachaa sako to bachaa lo bahut udaas huun main

Title: o sone saaqiyaa merii galii bhii pheraa baandaa jaa punjabi
Lyrics: o sone saaqiyaa merii galii bhii pheraa baandaa jaa 2 merii ujadii huii aasaandii nagarii yuun basaandaa jaa 2  piyaallaa dil daa de kar chhut gayaa te pher kii hoyaa 2 may bhuk wich piinaa maangaa saaqiyaa do ghut pilaandaa jaa 2 oh sone saaqiyaa merii galii bhii pheraa baandaa jaa  meraa dil bujh gayaa hai main andhere vich bhatakanaa haan 2 merii dil wich naviin koii prem dii jotii jagaandaa jaa oh sone saaqiyaa merii galii bhii pheraa baandaa jaa  dilebeqal to dhote daag ne paapaande marmar ke taras khaa ke koii hun aur hii rangat chadhaandaa jaa oh sone saaqiyaa merii galii bhii pheraa baandaa jaa

Title: usakii hasarat hai jise dil se mitaa bhii na sakuun
Lyrics: usakii hasarat hai jise dil se mitaa bhii na sakuun  dhuundhane usako chalaa huun jise paa bhii na sakuun  chutakiyaan lene se dil men wo karen sau inakaar daag kuchh dard nahiin hai ki dikhaa bhii na sakuun  koii puuchhe to muhabbat se ye kyaa hai insaaf wo mujhe dil se bhulaa den main bhulaa bhii na sakuun  usake pahaluu men jo le jaa ke sulaa duun dil ko  niind aisii use aaye ki jagaa bhii na sakuun

Title: tuune kuchh bhii na kahaa jo jaise
Lyrics: tuune kuchh bhii na kahaa jo jaise mere hii dil kii sadaa ho jaise  yuun terii yaad se jii ghabaraayaa tuu mujhe bhuul gayaa ho jaise  is tarah tujhase kiye hain shikawe mujhako apane se gilaa ho jaise  yuun har ek naqsh pe jhukatii hai zabiin teraa naqsheqafepaa ho jaise  tere honthon kii kafii sii larzish ik hasiin sher huaa ho jaise

Title: nuqtaachiin hai gamedil
Lyrics: nuqtaachiin hai gamedil jisako sunaaye na bane kyaa bane baat jahaan baat banaaye na bane  main bulaataa to huun usako magar ai jazbaaedil usape ban jaaye kuchh aisii ki bin aaye na bane  bojh vo sar pe giraa hai ki uthaaye na bane kaam vo aan padaa hai ki banaaye na bane  ishq par zor nahiin hai ye vo aatish gaalib ki lagaaye na lage aur bujhaaye na bane

Title: kar de zaraa ishaaraa
Lyrics: kar de zaraa ishaaraa tere naam kaa sahaaraa 2  chhaaii huii siyaahii bhatakaa huaa hai raahi sar par khadii tabaahii 2 terii razaa se chamake duubaa huaa sitaaraa tere naam kaa sahaaraa threedots  anjaam zindagii kaa dil ko daraa rahaa hai tuufaan aa rahaa hai 2 tuu hii use bachaa le duniyaa ne jis ko maaraa tere naam kaa sahaaraa threedots  kar de zaraa ishaaraa tere naam kaa sahaaraa

Title: beqaraar karake hamen yuun na jaaiye
Lyrics: beqaraar karake hamen yuun na jaaiye  aapako hamaarii kasam laut aaiye    2  dekhiye vo kaalii kaalii badaliyaan zulf kii ghataa churaa na le kahiin chorii chorii aake shokh bijaliyaan aapakii adaa churaa na le kahiin yuun qadam akele na aage badhaaiye aapako hamaariithreedots  dekhiye gulaab kii vo daaliyaan  badhake chuum le na aap ke qadam   2 khoe khoe bhanvare bhii hain baag men koii aapako banaa na le sanam bahakii bahakii nazaron se khud ko bachaaiye aapako hamaariithreedots  zindagii ke raaste ajiib hain inamen is tarah chalaa na kiijiye khair hai isii men aapakii huzuur apanaa koii saathii dhuundh liijiye sunake dil kii baat naa muskuraaiye aapako hamaariithreedots

Title: tujhe kyaa sunaauun main dilarubaa tere saamane meraa haal hai
Lyrics: tujhe kyaa sunaaun main dilarubaa tere saamane meraa haal hai terii ik nigaah kii baat hai merii zindagii kaa savaal hai  merii har kushii tere dam se hai merii zindagii tere gam se hai tere dard se rahe bekabar mere dil kii kab ye mazaal hai  tere husn par hai merii nazar mujhe subah shaam kii kyaa kabar merii shaam hai terii justajuu merii subaha teraa kayaal hai  mere dil jigar men samaa bhii jaa rahe kyon nazar kaa bhii faasalaa ke tere bagair o jaanejaan mujhe zindagii bhii muhaal hai

Title: kwaab thaa yaa kayaal thaa kyaa thaa
Lyrics: kwaab thaa yaa kayaal thaa kyaa thaa hijr thaa yaa visaal thaa kyaa thaa  chamakii bijalii sii par na samajhe ham husn thaa yaa jamaal thaa kyaa thaa  jisako ham rozehijr samajhe the maah thaa wo ki saal thaa kyaa thaa  musahafii kal jo chup saa baithaa thaa kyaa tujhe kuchh malaal thaa kyaa thaa

Title: maataa sarasvatii shaaradaa
Lyrics: maataa sarasvatii shaaradaa vidyaa daanii dayaanii duhkha harinii jagata jananii jvaalaamukhii maataa sarasvatii  kiije sudrishtii sevak jaan apanaa itanaa varadaan diije taan taal aur alaap buddhii alankaar shaaradaa maataa sarasvatii

Title: jyoti kalash chhalake jyoti kalash chhalake
Lyrics: jyoti kalash chhalake  4 hue gulaabii laal sunahare rang dal baadal ke jyoti kalash chhalake 	 ghara aangana vana upavana upavana karatii jyoti amrita ke siinchana mangala ghata dhala ke  2 jyoti kalash chhalake 	 paata paata birava hariyaalaa dharatii kaa mukha hua ujaalaa sacha sapane kal ke  2 jyoti kalash chhalake 	 ushhaa ne aanchala phailaayaa phailii sukha kii shiitala chhaayaa niiche aanchala ke  2 jyoti kalash chhalake 	 jyoti yashodaa dharati maiyyaa niila gagana gopala kanhaiyyaa shyaamala chhavi jhalake  2 jyoti kalash chhalake  ambar kumakum kan barasaaye phuul pankhudiyon par muskaaye bindu tuhin jal ke  2 jyoti kalash chhalake

Title: patthar hai khudaa patthar ke sanam
Lyrics: patthar hai khudaa patthar ke sanam patthar ke hii inasaan paae hain tum shaharemohabbat kahate ho ham jaan bachaake aae hain  butakaanaa samajhate ho jisako puuchho na vahaan kyaa haalat hai ham log vahiin se laute hain bas shukr hai ke laut aae hain  ham soch rahe hain muddat se ab umr guzaarenge bhii to kahaan saharaa men kushii ke phuul nahiin sharaon me gamii ke saae hain  honthon pe tabassum halakaa saa aankhon men namii sii hai faakir ham ahlemohabbat par aksar aise bhii zamaane aae hain  patthar hai khudaa threedots

Title: ham bevafaa haragiz na the par ham vafaa kar naa sake
Lyrics: ham bevafaa haragiz na the par ham vafaa kara naa sake hamako milii usakii sajaa ham jo kataa kara naa sake  kitanii akelii thii vo raahen ham jinapara ab tak akele chalate rahen tujhase bichhada ke bhii o bekhabar tere hii gam men jalate rahen tuune kiyaa jo shikavaa ham vo gilaa kar naa sake  tumane jo dekhaa sunaa sach thaa magar itanaa thaa sach ye kisako pataa jaane tumhe maine koii dhokha diyaa jaane tumhe koii dhokha huaa is pyaar men sach jhuutha kaa tum faisalaa kar naa sake

Title: main kshamaa aapase chaahuun
Lyrics: main kshamaa aapase chaahuun prabhujii  main kshamaa aapase chaahuun  chalatechalate jiivan path par main piichhe rah jaauun main thakakara yadi piichhe rah jaauun  to kshamaa aapase chaahuun  kaanp rahaa tharthar tan meraa bharaa vedanaa se man meraa kaanp rahaa2 tharthar tan meraa bharaa vedanaa se man meraa apanii tanman kii durbalataa  yadi na duura kar paauun prabhujii jo na duura kar paauun to kshamaa aapase chaahuun  vinatii karii dhuup men  puujaa kii maalaa suukh rahii kara na sakii puurii puujaa  apane kartavya se chuuk rahii2 kshamaa karo aparaadh kshamaa karo aparaadh prabhu in charanon men bali jaauun2 main kshamaa aapase chaahuun

Title: raste men tere kab se hain khade
Lyrics: raste men tere kab se hain khade ajii le lo salaam gariibon kaa raste men tere kab se hain khade ajii le lo salaam gariibon kaa  galiyon men ghuumate the ham beqaraar se mil jaaoge kahiin to chalate phirate pyaar se mil hii gaye hain to khul ke milo dil tod na do munh mod na lo pyaare le lo salaam gariibon kaa  sulajhaanaa chhod dete uljahe se baal kaa sun lete aap jo afsaanaa mere haal kaa haan haan sunii nahiin fursat magar le jaaye kidhar hasarat kii nazar pyaare le lo salaam gariibon kaa  ab tak jo ham khade hain hii chaahat aap kii takate hain der se diivaane suurat aap kii kab tak yuun hii koii piichhaa kare ab haath mere mere thakane bhii lage chaahe le lo salaam gariibon kaa

Title: hat gaii lo kaalii ghataa
Lyrics: hat gaii lo kaalii ghataa chhitak rahe taare 2 hat gaii lo kaalii ghataa chhitak rahe taare 2  man kii umang taraj khadii akhiyan kii jyot badhii 2 prem lagan se lau uthii 2 bujhe diye baare hat gai lo kaalii ghataa chhitaka rahe taare 2  duubii aas phir se phirii jal men jaise jal kii parii 2 sotii jyot jaag gai jaag gai sotii jyot jaag gai din phire hamaare hat gai lo kaalii ghataa chhitak rahe taare 2  aajaa aajaa aajaa mere paas tanmandhan sab kii aas dagar paar paatpaat karatii kyon ishaare 2 hat gai lo kaalii ghataa chhitak rahe taare 2

Title: dil lagaakar ham ye samajhe zindagii kyaa chiiz hai male
Lyrics: dil lagaakar ham ye samajhe zindagii kyaa chiiz hai ishq kahaten hain kise aur aashiqii kyaa chiiz hai  haay ye rukasaar ke shole ye baahen marmarii aapase milakar ye do baaten samajh men aa gaiin dhuup kisakaa naam hai aur chaandanii kyaa chiiz hai  aapakii shokii ne kyaakyaa ruup dikhalaae hamen aapakii aankhon ne kyaakyaa jaam pilavaae hamen hosh kho baithe to jaanaa bekudii kyaa chiiz hai  aapakii raahon men jabase hamane rakhaa hai qadam 2 hamako ye mahasuus hotaa hai ki hain manzil pe ham koii kyaa jaane mohabbat kii khushii kyaa chiiz hai

Title: dil ne tujhako jo paa liyaa  ye kyaa kiyaa piyaa
Lyrics: dil ne tujhako jo paa liyaa samaa liyaa chhupaa liyaa piyaa jisase shikavaa gilaa kiyaa usako dil men basaa liyaa haay maine ye kyaa kiyaa piyaa  hansanaa mujhako sikhaa diyaa hansaa diyaa rulaa diyaa piyaa is kalii ko khilaa diyaa mujhako mujhase milaa diyaa haay tuune ye kyaa kiyaa piyaa  ab to sapanaa churaa liyaa sajaa liyaa jataa liyaa piyaa rog kaisaa lagaa liyaa dil men dard jagaa liyaa haay hamane ye kyaa kiyaa piyaa  faasalon ko ghataa liyaa duuriyon ko mitaa liyaa haay hamane ye threedots

Title: tere mere honthon men miithe miithe giit mitavaa
Lyrics: fa tere mere honthon men miithe miithe giit mitavaa ma aage aage chalen ham piichhe piichhe priit mitavaa  fa pahale pahale pyaar kii pahalii raat yaad rahegii ma phuulon ke is shahar kii mulaqaat yaad rahegii fa kaash yahiin saarii umr yuunhii jaae biit mitavaa fama aage aage chalen ham piichhe piichhe priit mitavaa  fa ankhiyon men tuu bas jaa ankhiyaan main band kar luun ma pahale in ankhiyon se baaten main chand kar luun fa terii inhiin baaton ne liyaa mujhe jiit mitavaa fama aage aage chalen ham piichhe piichhe priit mitavaa  fa chhote chhote din raat lambii lambii baaten hain ma jaldii hai kis baat kii badii mulaqaaten hain fa baaton mulaqaaton men umr jaae biit mitavaa fama aage aage chalen ham piichhe piichhe priit mitavaa

Title: tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu satarangii re
Lyrics: tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu satarangii re tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu man rangiin re   threedots  dil kaa saayaa hamasaayaa satarangii re man rangiin re koii nuur hai tuu kyon duur hai tuu jab paas hai tuu ehasaas hai tuu koii kvab hai yaa parachhaaii hai satarangii re man rangiin re is baar bataa manzuur havaa thaharegii kahaan      ishq par zor nahiin hai ye vo aatish gaalib     jo lagaaye na lage aur bujhaaye na bane  aankhon ne kuchh aise chhuaa halkaa halkaa uns huaa halkaa halkaa uns huaa dil ko mahasuus huaa tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu jiine kii saarii khushabuu tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu aarazuu aarazuu terii jism kii aanch ko chhuute hii mere saans sulagane lagate hain mujhe ishq dilaase detaa hai mere dard bilakhane lagate hain  tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu jiine kii saarii khushabuu tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu aarazuu aarazuu chhuutii hai mujhe saragoshii se aankhon men ghulii khaamoshii se main farsh pe sajade karataa huun kuchh hosh men kuchh behoshii se dil kaa saayaa hamasaayaa   threedots  terii raahon men ulajhaa ulajhaa huun terii baahon men ulajhaa ulajhaa sulajhane de hosh mujhe terii chaahon men ulajhaa huun meraa jiinaa junuun meraa maranaa junuun tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu satarangii re tuu hii tuu tuu hii tuu man rangiin re      ishq par zor nahiin hai ye vo aatish gaalib     jo lagaaye na lage aur bujhaaye na bane  mujhe maut kii god men sone de terii ruuh men jism dubone de satarangii re man rangiin re

Title: tere chahare men vo jaaduu hai bin dor khiinchaa jaataa huun
Lyrics: tere chehare men vo jaaduu hai bin dor khinchaa jaataa huun jaanaa hotaa hai aur magar terii aur chalaa aataa huun  jab se tujhako dekhaa hai dekh ke khuda ko maanaa hai maanake dil ye kahataa hai merii khushiyon kaa tuu hai khajaanaa paanaa tujhako mushkil hii sahii paane ko machal jaataa huun tere chehare men threedots  terii hiire jaise aankhen aankhon men hai laakhon baaten baaton men ras kii barasaaten mujhamen pyaar kii pyaas jagaaye chal padate hain tere saath kadam main rok nahiin paataa huun tere chehare men threedots

Title: aashiyaan jal gayaa gulsitaan lut gayaa
Lyrics: aashiyaan jal gayaa gulsitaan lut gayaa ab qafas se nikal kar kidhar jaayenge kitane maanuus saiyaad se ho gaye ab rihaaii milegii to mar jaayenge aashiyaan jal gayaa threedots  kaale kaale vo gesuu shikandarshikan vo tabassum kaa aalam chamandarchaman khiinch lii un kii tasaviir dil ne mere ab vo daaman bachaa kar kidhar jaayenge aashiyaan jal gayaa threedots  aur kuchh din ye dastuuremaikaanaa hai tashnaqaamii ke ye din guzar jaayenge mere saaqii ko nazaren uthaane to do jitane khaalii hain sab jaam bhar jaayenge aashiyaan jal gayaa threedots  ashqegam le ke aakir kahaan jaayen ham aansuon kii yahaan koii qiimat nahiin aap hii apanaa daaman badhaa diijiye varanaa motii zamiin par bikhar jaayenge aashiyaan jal gayaa threedots  ai nasiimesahar tujh ko un kii qasam un se jaa kar na kahanaa meraa haalegam mere mitane kaa dar to nahiin hai mujhe dar ye hai un ke gesuu bikhar jaayenge aashiyaan jal gayaa threedots

Title: zikr us pariivash kaa aur phir bayaan apanaa
Lyrics: zikr us pariivash kaa aur phir bayaan apanaa  ban gayaa raqiib aakiir thaa jo raazadaan apanaa  may vo kyon bahut piite bazmegair men yaarab  aaj hii huaa manzuur unako imtihaan apanaa  manzar ik bulandii par aur ham banaa sakate  arsh se udhar hotaa kaash ke makaan apanaa  ham kahaan ke daanaa the kis hunar men yaktaa the  besabab huaa gaalib dushman aasamaan apanaa

Title: tum ladakii ho main ladakaa huun
Singer: lata s p balasubramaniam usha shailendra singh
Lyrics: tum ladakii ho main ladakaa huun tum aaii to sach kahataa huun aayaa mausam dostii kaa main ladakii huun tum ladake ho yuun lagataa hai jab milate ho aayaa mausam dostii kaa   threedots  jaane kyon lagataa hai merii tumhaarii pahale se pahachaan hai tum maan itanaa jo de rahe ho mujhape ye ehasaan hai ehasaanon kii baaten chhodo aao hamase naataa jodo aayaa mausam dostii kaa   threedots  main kaa jaanuu kaa chiiz hove hai pyaar karajavaa pe laagii najar kii kataar arii diivaanii na kar naadaanii terii baaten hain badii tuufaanii nahiin ye mausam dillagii kaa nahiin ye mausam kudkushii kaa aayaa mausam dostii kaa   threedots  rishtaa nahiin hai dono ko phir bhii baandhe koii dor hai is dostii ko kyaa naam de ham ye baat kuchh aur hai diivaanaapan kah sakate ho dil kii dhadakan kah sakate ho ki aayaa mausam dostii kaa   threedots

Title: tuu laakh chale rii gorii tham tham ke
Lyrics: tuu laakh chale rii gorii thamtham ke paayal men giit hain chhamchham ke  tuu piyaa se mil kar aaii hai bas aaj se niind paraaii hai dekhegii sapane saajan ke tuu laakhe chale   threedots  ye jiivan bhar kaa rog sakhii tujhe pagalii kahenge log sakhii yaad aayenge vaade baalam ke tuu laakh chale   threedots  main ne bhii kiyaa thaa pyaar kabhii aaii thii yahii aavaaz kabhii ab giit main gaatii huun gam ke tuu laakh chale   threedots

Lyrics: aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men2 terii zulfon men kho jaauun main dil ye chaahe meraa raat dhalane naa duun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men  o jhilamil jhilamil chaand sitaare hanste hain hamako karake ishaare chhup chhup ke ye dekhen hamen kahate hain kyaa ye naa jaane koii kuchh bhii kahe meraa dil ye kahe terii aankhon men duubaa rahuun aisii bhiigii suhanni raat men aisii bhiigii suhanni raat men terii zulfon men kho jaauun main dil ye chaahe meraa raat dhalane na duun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men  o saamane tujhako apane bithaa ke nazaron se terii nazaren milaa ke itanii kushii mujhako milii aise men jaanewafaa ho ijaazat agar main yuunhii jhuumkar pyaar ke giit gaataa rahuun aisii bhigii suhaani raat men aisii bhiigii suhanni raat men terii zulfon men kho jaauun main dil ye chaahe meraa raat dhalane na duun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun umr bhar yuun hii baithaa rahuun aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men aisii bhiigii suhaanii raat men

Title: hamaarii saanson men aaj tak vo hinaa kii khushabuu mahak rahii hai
Lyrics: hamaarii saanson men aaj tak  vo hinaa kii khushabuu mahak rahii hai labon pe nagamen machal rahe hain nazar se mastii jhalak rahii hai  tadap mere bekaraar dil kii kabhii to un pe asar karegii kabhii to vo bhii jalenge is men jo aag dil men dahak rahii hai  vo mere nazadiik aate aate hayaa se ik din simat gaye the mere khayaalon men aaj tak vo badan kii daalii lachak rahii hai  sadaa jo dil se nikal rahii hai vo shaayaronagamon men dhal rahii hai ki dil ke aangan men jaise koii gazal kii jhanjhar chhanak rahii hai

Lyrics: aashaa	niind churaake raaton men tumane baaton baaton men 		dekho baat badal dii hai kishor		ham phir baat badal denge aaj nahiin dil kal denge bhaaii 		aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai  2   2 	 aashaa		raat biitii saarii zaalimaa men haarii 		tum kyaa jaano anga anga meraa phuunk gai chingaarii re   2 		aag lagaa barasaaton men tumane baaton baaton men 		dekho baat badal dii hai 		 kishor		ham phir baat badal denge aaj nahiin dil kal denge bhaaii 		aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai 		arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai 	 aashaa		aathreedots duur bahut rah baithii  2 		tumako jo kahanaa thaa mujhe main tumase kah baithii re   2 		haatha pakadake haathon men tumane baaton baaton men 		dekho baat badal dii hai 		 kishor		ham phir baat badal denge aaj nahiin dil kal denge bhai 		aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai 		arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai 		 aashaa		arre arre niind churaake raaton men tumane baaton baaton men 		dekho baat badal dii hai 		 kishor		ham phir baat badal denge aaj nahiin dil kal denge bhaaii 		aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai 		arre aisii bhii kyaa jaldii hai

Title: mere hamanafas mere hamanavaa mujhe dost ban ke
Lyrics: mere hamanafas mere hamanavaa mujhe dost ban ke dagaa na de main huun dadreishq se jaanblab mujhe zindagii kii duaa na de  mere daagedil se hai raushanii us raushanii se hai zindagii mujhe dar hai ai mere chaaraagar ye charaag tuu hii bujhaa na de  mujhe chhod de mere haal par teraa kyaa bharosaa hai chaaraagar ye terii navaazishemuqtasar mera dadr aur badhaa na de  meraa hazm itanaa buland hai ki paraaye sholon kaa dar nahiin mujhe kauf aatishegul se hai ye kahiin chaman ko jalaa na de  vo uthe hain leke homosubuu are o shaqiil kahaan hai tuu teraa jaam lene ko bazm men koi aur haath badhaa na de

Title: main gvaalo rakhavaalo maiyyaa
Lyrics: main gvaalo rakhavaalo maiyyaa  maakhan naahi churaayo  kaun kamii maakhan kii apane jo main parghar jaauun raaj men tere chaahe jitano khaauun aur khilaauun chor na hove laal tihaaro  kaahe man bharamaayo kaahe man bharamaayo main gvaalo rakhavaalo maiyyaa   threedots  tuu maiyya hai sneh ki jyoti hum sab teri kirane tere aanchal kii chhaayaa men behte sukh kii jharane tere charanon kii dhuulii men  maiyyaa svagr samaayo maiyyaa svagr samaayo main gvaalo rakhavaalo maiyyaa   threedots  brij ko maakhan mero maakhan naahi ye barajorii ye adhikaar janam ko mero kaun kahe ye chorii vo muurakh agyaani jisane mohe chor bataayo mohe chor bataayo main gvaalo rakhavaalo maiyyaa   threedots

Title: ro diye jab yaad unakii aa gaii
Lyrics: ro diye jab yaad unakii aa gaii kyaa bataauun kaise dil tadapaa gaii  wo sadaa ruuthe rahe main unako samajhaataa rahaa wo sitam karate rahe main dil ko bahalaataa rahaa ye adaa unakii kuchh aise bhaa gaii  chal diye wo jabase dil ko tod kar is bharii duniyaa men tanahaa chhod kar tabase dil par gam kii badalii chhaa gaii

Title: terii baat hasiin lagatii hai duniyaa bhar kii baaton men
Film: bhulaye na bane  kali khili gali gali nonfilm
Lyrics: terii baat hasiin lagatii hai duniyaa bhar kii baaton men jaise chaand nikal aayaa ho ghor andherii raaton men  jaanetamannaa unakii mahak se aa teraa daaman bhar duun jitane phuul khile hain abake dil kii in saugaaton men terii baat hasiin lagatii hai threedots  man kaa chandan tan ki kushbuu ek duuje se ulajhe hain saavan hamako dhuundh rahaa hai bhiigii huii barasaaton men terii baat hasiin lagatii hai threedots

Title: kajaraa muhabbat vaalaa ankhiyon men aisaa daalaa
Lyrics: kajaraa muhabbat vaalaa ankhiyon men aisaa daalaa kajare ne le lii merii jaan haay re main tere qurabaan duniyaa hai mere pichhe lekin main tere pichhe apanaa banaa le merii jaan  haay re threedots  aai ho kahaan se gorii aankhon men pyaar le ke chadhatii javaanii kii ye pahalii phuhaar le ke dillii shahar kaa saaraa miinaa baazaar le ke jhumakaa barelii vaalaa kaanon men aisaa daalaa jhumake ne le lii merii jaan haay re threedots  motar naa bangalaa maanguun jhumakaa naa haar maangun dil ko chalaane vaale dil kaa qaraar maanguun saiyaan bedardii mere thodaa saa pyaar maanguun kismat banaa de merii apanaa banaa le merii  kar le sagaaii merii jaan haay re threedots  jab se hai dekhaa tujhako ho gae gulaam tere apanaa banaa le gorii aaenge kaam tere apanaa ye jiivan saaraa likh denge naam tere kurtaa ye jaalii vaalaa usapar motiyan kii maalaa kurte ne le lii merii jaan haay re threedots

Title: bujhate hue chiraag par
Lyrics: bujhate hue chiraag par maatam manaae kaun jo usako chaahataa thaa usako bataae kaun  wo kud bhii bekafan hii duniyaa se uth gayaa hai chaahat kii maut ko hii manzil samajh chukaa hai usako thaa ye bharosaa ye bhii mitegii mujh pe usako thii ye tamannaa ye bhii koii kah de mitate hue dilon par aansuu bahaae kaun bujhate hue chiraag par threedots  duniyaa ko kyaa zaruurat jalanaa kisii kaa dekhe us kii to hai ye aadat haradam ujaalaa dekhe lutataa hai ghar kisii kaa koii tamaashaa dekhe kitanon kii imtahaan par duniyaa saveraa dekhe duniyaa kii is subah ko zaalim bataae kaun bujhate hue chiraag par threedots  jal jal ke jiine waale terii ye daastaan hai mitate hue nishaan hai ujadaa huaa jahaan hai dushaman terii zamiin hai dushaman ye aasamaan hai tuu puuchhataa hai kis se tuu dhuundhataa kahaan hai viiran zindagii ko phir se basaae kaun bujhate hue chiraag par threedots

Title: suune panaghat pe biitii huii raat ko
Lyrics: suune panaghat pe biitii huii raat ko vo mastii men duubii huii baat ko haay dil se jo tumane bhulaayaa bolo bolo kyaa sukh tumane paayaa  meraa ghar aaii thii tum basaane gaii phir mitaakar kyon na jaane yuun hansaakar jo hamako rulaayaa bolo bolo kyaa sukh tumane paayaa threedots  ham se birahaa thaa anajaan pyaarii diyaa tumane hai ye daan pyaarii ham ko basakar ujadanaa sikhaayaa bolo bolo kyaa sukh tumane paayaa

Title: saavan ke mahiine men ik aag sii siine men
Lyrics: sochataa huun ki piyuun piyuun na piyuun taak daaman ke siyuun siyuun na siyuun dekh kar jaam kashamakash men huun kyaa karuun main jiyuun jiyuun haay na jiyuun  saavan ke mahiine men ik aag sii siine men lagatii hai to pii letaa huun do chaar ghadii jii letaa huun saavan ke mahiine men  chaand kii chaal bhii hai bahakii huii raat kii aankh bhii sharaabii hai saarii kudarat nashe men hai chuur are main ne pii lii to kyaa kharaabii hai saavan ke mahiine men threedots   barason chhalakaaye main ne ye shiishe aur ye pyaale kuchh aa j pilaa de aisii jo mukjahko hii pii daale har roz to yuun hii dil ko bahakaa ke main pii letaa huun do chaar ghadii jii letaa huun threedots  lambe jiivan se achchaa vo ik pal jo apanaa ho us pal ke baad ye duniyaa kyaa gam hai agar sapanaa ho kuchh soch ke aisii baaten ghabaraa ke main pii letaa huun do chaar ghadii jii letaa huun threedots  maikhaane men aayaa huun mausam kaa ishaaraa paa ke dam bhar ke liye baithaa huun rangiin sahaaraa paa ke saathii jo terii ziddh hai to sharamaa ke main pii letaa huun do chaar ghadii jii letaa huun threedots

Title: kahanaa hii kyaa ye nain jo ek anjaan se jo mile
Lyrics: gumsum gumsum gupchup gumsum gam gupchup  halchal halchal ho gayii teri  honth hai tere chup  khalbal khalbal ho gayii teri  baithen hain gupachup  pyaraapyaraa cheharaa lekar degaya ishaaraa  dekhaa teri aankhon ne hai sapanaa koi pyaraa  hamase gorii na tu sharamao aa kah de hamase zaraa  2   kahanaa hii kya ye nain jo ek anjaan se jo mile  chalane lage mohabbat ke jaise ye silasile  background chorus ceases  aramaan naye aise dil men khile jinako kabhi main na jaanuun  vo hamase ham unase kabhi na mile kaise mile dil na jaanuun ab kya karen kya naam len kaise unhe main pukaaruun    2  ga ma pa ga aa  ga ma pa ni reeta all that stuff in the backgound      pahalii najar men kuchh ham kuchh tum ho jaaten hai yuun gum  naino se barasaae rimjhim rimjhim hamape pyaar ka savan  sharm thodiithodii hamako aaye to nazaren jhuk jaaen  sitam thodaathodaa hamape shok havaa bhi kar jaaye  aisi chalii aanchal ude dil men ek tuufaan uthe  ham to lut gaye khade hii khade  kahanaa hii kyaa threedots  cho gumasum threedots  in honthon ne maangaa saragam saragam tu aur tera hii pyaar hai  aankhen dhundhe hai jisako har dam har dam tu aur tera hii pyaar hai  mahafil men bhi tanhaa hai dil aise dil aise  tujhako kho na de darataa hai ye aise ye aise  aaj milii aisi khushi jhuum uthii duniya ye meri  tumako paayaa to paaii zindagii  kahanaa hii kya threedots

Title: raahii manavaa dukh kii chintaa kyon sataatii hai
Lyrics: dukh ho yaa sukh   beginning of the song jab sadaa sang rahe na koii phir dukh ko apanaaiye ki jaae to dukh na hoye  raahii manavaa dukh kii chintaa kyon sataatii hai   main song dukh to apanaa saathii hai   2 sukh hai ek chhaanv dhalatii aatii hai jaatii hai dukh to apanaa saathii hai raahii manavaa dukh kii chintaa kyon sataatii hai dukh to apanaa saathii hai  duur hai manzil duur sahii pyaar hamaaraa kyaa kam hai pag men kaante laakh sahii par ye sahaaraa kyaa kam hai hamaraah tere koii apanaa to hai  2 othreedots sukh hai ek chhaanv threedots  dukh ho koii tab jab jalate hain path ke diip nigaahon men itanii badii is duniyaa kii lambii akelii raahon men hamaraah tere koii apanaa to hai  2 othreedots sukh hai ek chhaanv threedots dukh to apanaa saathii hai  2

Title: terii galiyon men ham aaye
Lyrics: teri galiyon mein hum aaye diye armaanon ke jalaaye or is it dil armaanon bharaa laaye hum pe ho jaaye karam haaye jo tera apni kismat bhi sanwar jaaye zara  jaise majboor hain hum koi majboor na ho kisike man ka mahal aise choor na ho aise khusiyon se koi door na ho teri galiyon   zindagi teri baharon mein muskaye sada tere daamanko na chhoo paaye ghum ki hava hum garibon kii lage tujhko dua teri galiyon

Title: kal terii tasaviir ko
Lyrics: kal terii tasavir ko sajade kiyaa hai raat bhar ham ne terii yaad ke  aansuu piye hai raat bhar  chaand jab nikalaa sitaaren aur itaraane lage 2 tum sitaaron ne ham ko gam diye hai raat bhar ham ne terii yaad ke  aansuu piye hai raat bhar kal terii tasaviir ko threedots  tum to sapnon jahaan me so rahe the bekabar 2 raat ke taaron se zakhme  dil piye hai raat bhar ham ne terii yaad ke  aansuu piye hai raat bhar kal terii tasaviir ko threedots

Title: indra jimi jrimbhapar
Lyrics: indra jimi jrimbha par baadava suambha par raavan sadambha par raghukul raaj hai indra jimi jrimbha par threedots  pavan baari baah par sambhu rati naah par jyon saahas baah par raam dhvaj raaj hai indra jimi jrimbha par threedots  daavaa drima danda par chiitaa mrig jhunda par bhuushhana vitunda par jaise mriga raaj hai indra jimi jrimbha par threedots  teja tama ans par kaanhaa jimi kans par tyon mlechchh bans par ser sivaraaj hai indra jimi jrimbha par threedots

Title: ab davaa kii zaruurat nahiin mujhako dardejigar ke lie
Lyrics: ab davaa kii zaruurat nahiin mujhako dardejigar ke lie ik nazar terii mere masiihaa kaafii hai umr bhar ke lie ab davaa kii zaruurat threedots  main huun biimaaredil merii taskiin kii har davaa terii palakon ke parade men hai maine maangii hai jo zindagii ke lie vo duaa terii palakon ke parade men hai parade parade men ik adaa terii ik nazar terii mere threedots  pyaar teraa mile tuu mile naa mile teraa gam jaaneman sabase pyaar mujhe ho karam yaar kaa mile to sansaar kaa har alam har sitam hai ganvaaraa mujhe sabake badale men ik hansii terii ik nazar terii mere threedots

Title: jiyaa beqaraar hai chhaaii bahaar hai
Lyrics: jiyaa beqaraar hai chhaai bahaar hai aajaa more balamaa teraa intazaar hai jiyaa beqaraar hai threedots  o threedots suuraj dekhe chandaa dekhe sab dekhen ham tarase ho sab dekhen ham tarase   2 jaise barase koii badariyaa vaise ankhiyaan barase  2 vaise ankhiyaan barase  jiyaa beqaraar hai threedots  o threedots nainon se ek taaraa tuute mittii men mil jaae ho mittii men mil jaae   2 aansuu kii barasaat balamavaa dil men aag lagaae  2 dil men aag lagaae  2 jiyaa beqaraar hai threedots  o threedots tujhako nazaren dhuundh rahii hain mukhadaa to dikhalaa jaa ho mukhadaa to dikhalaa jaa   2 raste par huun aas lagaae jaane vaale aa jaa  2 jiyaa beqaraar hai threedots

Title: jise merii yaad naa aaye haay dil naa use bhulaaye
Lyrics: jise merii yaad naa aaye haay dil naa use bhulaaye  2  biite huye sapane 2 hamen to saarii raat jagaayen haay dil naa use bhulaaye jise merii yaad naa aaye haay  jisane mere giit the gaaye raag mere raag mere kabhii jisake man bhaaye jisane mere giit the gaaye raag mere kabhii jisake man bhaaye wohii hamaare miithe suron ko suunaa raag bataaye bataaye bataaye dil naa use bhulaaye jise merii yaad naa aaye haay  birahaa ke aansuu se nainaa nainaa the anajaan wo gaye dil ulajh gayaa haay honthon ne bhii kho diyaa musakaan  le jo gaye sukh saare ab bhii hain wo pyaare  2 main huun usako phuul kahataa jo mere liye kaante bichhaye mere liye kaante bichhaye dil naa use bhulaaye jise merii yaad naa aaye haay dil naa use bhulaaye

Title: aaj is kat men naii baat tumhen likhataa huun
Lyrics: aaj is kat men naii baat tumhen likhataa huun ek shaayar ke kayaalaat tumhen likhataa huun aaj is kat threedots  mujhako maaluum ye hai gair kaa aramaan ho tum chand lamhe ko jo aaye ho wo mehamaan ho tum ulajheulajhe se sawaalaat tumhen likhataa huun aaj is kat threedots  apanii viiraan mohabbat ko sajaane ke liye kitanii maangii thii duaayen tumhen paane ke liye kaisii purakaif thii wo raat tumhen likhataa huun aaj is kat threedots  mere hamadam mere saathii mere gamakwaar kaho kyaa isii tarah miloge mujhe har baar kaho jo na likhanii thii wahii baat tumhen likhataa huun aaj is kat threedots

Title: baithe hain rahaguzar par dil kaa diyaa jalaaye
Lyrics: baithe hain rahaguzar par dil kaa diyaa jalaaye shaayad vo dard jaane shaayad vo laut aaye baithe hain rahaguzar par threedots  aakaash par sitaare chal chal ke tham gae hain shabanam ke sard aansuu phuulon pe jam gae hain ham par nahiin kisii par ai kaash raham khaaye shaayad vo dard jaane shaayad vo laut aaye baithe hain rahaguzar par threedots  raahon men kho gaii hain hasarat bharii nigaahen kab se lachak rahii hain aramaan kii narm baahen har mod par tamannaa aahat usii kii paaye shaayad vo dard jaane shaayad vo laut aaye baithe hain rahaguzar par threedots

Title: main ne aaj piyaa piyaa aa honthon kaa pyaalaa
Lyrics: main ne  main ne aaj piyaa piyaa aa honthon kaa pyaalaa  2 amarit ko bhii jo sharamaa de 2 aag lagaa kar aag bujhaa de aise aise mad ke ek ghuunt se bujhaa chukaa main dil kaa jwaalaa  piyaa piyaa aa honthon kaa pyaalaa main ne aaj piyaa piyaa aa honthon kaa pyaalaa  ragrag men 3 ragrag men jisane daudaa dii ek bijalii kii lahar ghuumatii duniyaa merii nazar men pal bhar gaii thahar  main ne dil ko banate dekhaa be piikar matawaalaa  2 main yaad karuungaa jab bhii is shaam ke niilepan ko honthon men jalan sii jalan aur pyaar lagegii man ko tab aankhon men tab aankhon men chhaa jaayegaa is din kaa prempyaalaa  piyaa piyaa aa honthon kaa pyaalaa 2

Title: meraa dil phir tuutaa kyuun tuutaa kaise tuutaa
Lyrics: meraa dil phir tuutaa kyuun tuutaa kaise tuutaa kisii naadaan kii thokar se khilaunaa jaise tuutaa meraa dil phir tuutaa  bikhar gayaa dil tuut ke meraa kaun ise ab jode dukh kii raaten lambii hain aur kushiyon ke din thode dil kaa saaz badaa naazuk thaa apanii lay se tuutaa kisii naadaan kii thokar se khilaunaa jaise tuutaa meraa dil phir tuutaa  saahil se phir jaa takaraaii duub chalii phir naav naye dukhon se aan mile hain aaj puraane ghaav jaise dil pahale tuutaa thaa aaj bhii vaise tuutaa kisii naadaan kii thokar se khilaunaa jaise tuutaa meraa dil phir tuutaa  kabhii jo dekhaa karate the merii kushiyon ke sapane kidhar gaye wo saathii mere kahaan gaye wo apane ekek kar ke chhod gaye sab ye dil aise tuutaa kisii naadaan kii thokar se khilaunaa jaise tuutaa meraa dil aise tuutaa

Title: ye kaisaa anyaay daataa
Lyrics: yah kaisaa anyaay daataa yah kaisaa anyaay meraa banataa kaam bigadakar bigade kaam banaaye 2 bedaa paar lagaaye daataa bedaa paar lagaaye  duhkh jhele jis sukh ke kaaran vah sukh bhii chhin jaaye 2 jaise apane diye kii jyoti duuje ke ghar jaaye daataa 2 yah kaisaa anyaay daataa yah kaisaa anyaay  main bhii yuun hii jamaa rahuungaa kaisaa hii tuufaan aaye kaathaa ban kar hil nahiin sakataa laakh thapede khaaye 2  kabhii to duhkh ko sukh kar degaa anyaayii kaa nyaay 2 andhaa to jab hii pathiyaaye jab do aankhen paaye 2 daataa

Title: dil to hai dil dil kaa aitabaar kyaa kiijai
Lyrics: dil to hai dil dil kaa aitabaar kyaa kiijai    2 aa gayaa jo kisii pe pyaar kyaa kiijai      2 dil to hai dil dil kaa aitabaar kyaa kiijai  yaadon men terii khoi raaton ko main naa soii haalat ye mere mana kii jaane naa jaane koi barason hii tarasii aankhen jaagii hai pyaasii raaten aai hain aate aate hothon pe dil kii baaten pyaar men tere dil kaa meraa kuchh bhii ho anjaam beqaraarii men hai iqaraar kyaa kiijai aa gayaa jo kisii pe pyaar kyaa kiijai      2  chhaayaa hai man pe mere madahosh rahanaa teraa mere hii tanako milaa terii baaho kaa feraa duurii sahii na jaaye chain kahiin naa aaye chalanaa hai ab to terii palako ke chhaaye chhaaye bas naa chale re kaam savere leke teraa naam  dil dhadakataa hai baar baar kyaa kiijai aa gayaa jo kisii pe pyaar kyaa kiijai      2 dil to hai dil dil kaa aitabaar kyaa kiijai

Title: tuu nahiin to zindagii main aur kyaa rah jaayegaa
Lyrics: tu nahiin to zindagii main aur kya rah jaayegaa  3 dur tak tanhaaiyon ka silasilaa rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to threedots  dard kii sarii tahen aur saare guzare haadase  2  sab dhuaan ho jaayenge ek vaaqiyaa rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to zindagii main aur kya rah jaayegaa threedots  tu nahiin to threedots  yuun bhi hogaa vo mujhe dil se bhulaa dega magar 2  ye bhi hogaa khud usii main ek khalaa rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to zindagii main aur kya rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to threedots  daayare inkaar ke ikaraar kii sarahoshiyaan threedots2  ye agar tuute kabhi to faasalaa rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to zindagii main aur kya rah jaayegaa threedots tu nahiin to threedots

Title: din hai suhaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai
Lyrics: din hai suhaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai  2 khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  bivii bolii ghar zaraa jaldii se aanaa jaldii se aanaa shaam ko piyaajii hamen sinemaa dikhaanaa hamen sinemaa dikhaanaa karo naa bahaanaa haan bahaanaa bahaanaa karo naa bahaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  kis ne pukaaraa ruk gayaa baabuu laalaajii kii jaan aaj aayaa hai kaabu aayaa hai kaabu o paisaa zaraa laanaa laanaa laanaa o paisaa zaraa laanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  bandaa bekaar hai qisamat kii maar hai sab din ek hai rozeaitabaar hai mujhe naa sunaanaa haan sunaanaa sunaanaa mujhe naa sunaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  daftar ke saamane aae mehamaan hain bade hii shariif hain puraane meharabaan hain   2 are jeb ko bachaanaa bachaanaa bachaanaa jeb ko bachaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  dil beqaraar hai soe nahiin raat se sethajii ko gam hai ki paiso chalo haath se are luutegaa khazaanaa khazaanaa khazaanaa luutegaa khazaanaa aaj pahali taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  ai sinemaavaalon aao aao khel mazedaar hai o khel mazedaar hai jii khel mazedaar hai aagaa hai bhagavaan hai kishor kumaar hai nimmi giitaa baalii hai ashok kumaar hai naragiis raaj kapuur hai diliip kumaar hai giiton kaa tuufaan hai naach kii bahaar hai naach ki bahaar hai paanch aane kaa das aanaa  3 are vaapas nahiin jaanaa jaanaa jaanaa vaapas nahiin jaanaa aaj pahali taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai  milajul ke bachchon ne baapu ko gheraa baapu ko gheraa kahate hain saare kii baapu hai meraa baapu hai meraa khilaune zaraa laanaa khilaune zalaa laanaa aaj pahali taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa threedots   pahalii taariikh threedots  din hai suhaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai khush hai zamaanaa aaj pahalii taariikh hai pahalii taariikh ajii pahalii taariikh hai

Title: kisii patthar kii muurat se muhabbat kaa iraadaa hai
Lyrics: kisii patthar kii muurat se muhabbat kaa iraadaa hai parastish kii tamannaa hai ibaadat kaa iraadaa hai kisii patthar kii muurat se   threedots  jo dil kii dhadakanen samajhe na aankhon kii zubaan samajhe nazar kii guftaguu samajhe na jazabon kaa bayaan samajhe usii ke saamane usakii shiqaayat kaa iraadaa hai kisii patthar kii muurat se   threedots  muhabbat berukii se aur bhadakegii vo kyaa jaane tabiiyat is adaa pe aur phadakegii vo kyaa jaane vo kyaa jaane ki apanaa kis qayaamat kaa iraadaa hai kisii patthar kii muurat se   threedots  sunaa hai har javaan patthar ke dil men aag hotii hai magar jab tak na chhedo sharm ke parde men sotii hai ye sochaa hai kii dil kii baat usake ruubaruu kah de natiijaa kuch bhii nikale aaj apanii aarazuu kah de har ik bejaan taqalluf se bagaavat kaa iraadaa hai kisii patthar kii muurat se   threedots

Title: zaraa man kii khevadiyaan khol sainyaa tore dvaare khade
Lyrics: koii pyaar ke pankh pasaare aayaa hai paas tehaare sudhsudh apanii bisaraae pagalaa man tohe pukaare  zaraa man kii khevadiyaan khol sainyaa tore dvaare khade sainyaa tore sajanaa tore dvaare khade o sainyaa tore sajanaa tore dvaare khade  birahaa kii rainaa 2 terii galiyon ke phere 2 jogii kaa ruup liyaa priitam ne tere 2 gorii sun le balam ke bol sainyaa tore dvaare khade o sainyaa tore sajanaa tore dvaare khade  milanaa hai aaj tohe apane piaa se 2 jaane na bhed koii tere jiaa ke 2 manman men sajaniyaa dol sainyaa tore dvaare khade sainyaa tore dvaare khade o sainyaa tore sajanaa tore dvaare khade  bigade na baat kahiin dhiiraj na khonaa 2 jaage na bhaag ab kaahe kaa ronaa 2 teraa jiivan badaa anamol sainyaa tore dvaare khade sainyaa tore dvaare khade o sainyaa tore sajanaa tore dvaare khade  o man kii khevadiyaan khol sainyaa tore dvaare khade

Title: na ye berukii dil bhulaa paaegaa
Lyrics: na ye berukii dil bhulaa paaegaa guzarane ko vaqt bhale hii guzar jaaegaa  muqaddar ne hamase hamaarii kushii chhiin lii hai hamaarii honthon kii jhalakatii hansii chhiin lii hai kyaa kabar thii gam kaa ye tuufaan idhar aaegaa  na ye berukii dil bhulaa paaegaa threedots  na ab vo nazaare rahe na vo tasaviiren shamaa bujhii ab to bachii hain dhune kii lakiiren na ab to koii paravaanaa idhar aaegaa  na ye berukii dil bhulaa paaegaa threedots

Title: apanaa dil pesh karuun apanii vafaa pesh karuun
Lyrics: apanaa dil pesh karuun apanii vafaa pesh karuun kuchh samajh men nahiin aataa tujhe kyaa pesh karuun  mere kvaabon men bhii tuu mere kayaalon men bhii tuu kaun sii chiiz tujhe tujhase judaa pesh karuun jo tere dil ko lubhaa le vo adaa mujhamen nahiin kyon na tujhako koii terii hii adaa pesh karuun  tere milane kii kushii men koii nagamaa chheduun yaa tere dardejudaaii kaa gilaa pesh karuun

Title: dil pe jab terii inaayat kii kamii rahatii hai
Lyrics: dil pe jab terii inaayat kii kamii rahatii hai zindagii dard ke saanche men dhalii rahatii hai  mere daaman men to ashkon ke siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin chaand taaron se terii maang bharii rahatii hai  aalameyaas men duubaa ye bahaaron kaa samaa gard sii phuul ke chehare pe jamii rahatii hai  tere bakshe hue har daagemuhabbat ki qasam anjuman dil kii sitaaron se sajii rahatii hai

Title: ai hasiinon nazaniinon main dil hathelii pe leke
Lyrics: hehe hai hehe hai  hehehehe hehehehe  do do do do baba baba bababababa   ai hasiinon naazaniinon main dil hathelii pe leke aa rahaa huun  2 javaab do bhi meri suno bhi  main kabase nagame mohabbat ke gaa rahaa huun  ai hasiinon threedots  do duuo duuuuo uuuuuuo   dil meraa hai ek khazaanaa chhipaa jis hai dard puraanaa  koi hai koi lene vaalaa jo pyaar ka hai divaanaa  paravana koi ata hai nahiin main kab se shammen jalaa rahaa huun  ai hasiinon threedots   haa haa haa oho oho oho  main saudaagar bhi nahiin huun koi jaaduugar bhi nahiin huun  bekaar huun na aavaaraa beghar bedar bhi nahiin huun  main huun matavaalaa ek dilavaalaa saath degaa koi main bulaa rahaa huun  ai hasinon  babad babad dashapeth dashapeth peth bena mushara   raahii huun main apanii dhun ka kahiin aur chal jaaungaa  dhuundhoge mujhe ro ro ke main haath nahiin aauungaa  ziddii huun magar nahiin dil ka buraa  jo hai dil men vo honthon pe la rahaa huun  ai hasiinon threedots   ai hasiinon nazaninon main dil hathelii pe leke aa rahaa huun  2  javaab do bhi meri suno bhi  2 javaab do bhi meri suno bhi fades away

Title: ai mere vatan ke logon zaraa aankh men bhar lo paanii
Lyrics: ai mere vatan ke logon tum khuub lagaa lo naaraa ye shubh din hai ham sab kaa laharaa lo tirangaa pyaaraa par mat bhuulo siimaa par viiron ne hai praan ganvaae kuchh yaad unhen bhii kar lo 2 jo laut ke ghar na aaye 2  ai mere vatan ke logon  zaraa aankh men bhar lo paanii jo shahiid hue hain unakii zaraa yaad karo qurabaanii 	 jab ghaayal huaa himaalay khatare men padii aazaadii jab tak thii saans lade vo phir apanii laash bichhaa dii sangiin pe dhar kar maathaa  so gaye amar balidaanii jo shahiidthreedots  jab desh men thii divaalii vo khel rahe the holi jab ham baithe the gharon men vo jhel rahe the golii the dhanya javaan vo aapane thii dhanya vo unakii javaanii jo shahiidthreedots  koii sikh koii jaat maraathaa koii gurakhaa koii madaraasii sarahad par maranevaalaa  har viir thaa bhaaratavaasii jo khuun giraa pavrat par vo khuun thaa hindustaanii jo shahiidthreedots  thii khuun se lathpath kaayaa phir bhii banduuk uthaake dasdas ko ek ne maaraa phir gir gaye hosh ganvaa ke jab antsamay aayaa to kah gaye ke ab marate hain khush rahanaa desh ke pyaaron ab ham to safar karate hain kyaa log the vo divaane kyaa log the vo abhimaanii jo shahiidthreedots 	 tum bhuul na jaao unako is liye kahii ye kahaanii jo shahiidthreedots  jay hindthreedots jay hind kii senaa 2 jay hind jay hind jay hind

Title: ho gaye barabaad ham unakii kushii to ho gaii
Lyrics: ho gaye barabaad ham unakii kushii to ho gaii pyaar men naakaam apanii zindagii to ho gaii  haay re dil kii lagii se jal uthe gam ke chiraag ghar andheraa thaa chalo kuchh roshanii to ho gaii  aansuuon ne apanii aankhon men baseraa kar liyaa hansanewaale dekh le terii hansii to ho gaii

Title: de bhii chuke ham dil nazaraanaa dil kaa
Lyrics: year1952     de bhii chuke ham dil nazaraanaa dil kaa 2     are chhodo bhii     chhodo bhii ye raag puraanaa dil kaa 2      ek nazar men haar chuke hain dil ko 2     terii adaa pe vaar chuke hain dil ko     ajii mushkil hai ab laut ke aanaa dil kaa     jaa jaa jaa     chhodo bhii ye raag puraanaa dil kaa      munh dho le o jaal bichhaane waale 2     ham nahiin in baaton men aane waale     khel hai ye jaanaa pahchaanaa dil kaa     are de bhii chuke ham dil nazaraanaa threedots     threedots dil kaa      chhiin ke dil aashiq kaa mukarane waale 2     are mar jaaenge tujh par marane waale     haay chhod bhii de zaalim tadapaanaa dil kaa     jaa jaa     chhodo bhii ye raag puraanaa dil kaa      daalii daalii phirate hain harajaaii 2     lobhii bhanvaron ne kab priit nibhaaii     yuun hii sab karate hain bahaanaa dil kaa     haae de bhii chuke ham dil nazaraanaa dil kaa     yuun hii sab karate hain bahaanaa dil kaa     khel hai ye jaanaa pahchaanaa dil kaa     chhodo bhii ye raag puraanaa dil kaa

Title: kahe tose sajanaa ye toharii sajaniyaa
Lyrics: kahe tose sajanaa ye toharii sajaniyaa pag pag liye jaauun toharii balaiyaan magan apanii dhun men rahe moraa sainyaa pag pag liye jaauun toharii balaiyaan  badariyaa sii barasuun ghataa ban ke chhaauun jiyaa to ye chaahe tohe ang lagaauun laaj nigodii morii roke hai painyaa pag pag liye jaauun toharii balaiyaan  main jag kii koii riit na jaanuun maang kaa tohe sinduur maanuun tuu hii chuudhiyaan morii tuu hii kalaiyaan pag pag liye jaauun toharii balaiyaan  mohe laage pyaare sabhii rang tihaare duhkhsukh men har pal rahuun sang tihaare daradavaa ko baante umar larakaiyaan pag pag liye jaauun toharii balaiyaan

Title: saat samundar paar main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii
Lyrics: saat samundar paar main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii zulmii merii jaan threedots o zulmii merii jaan tere kadamon ke niiche aa gaii saat samundar paar main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii  na rastaa maaluum na teraa maanpataa maaluum kaise mere pyaar ne tujhako dhuundhaa kyaa maaluum siidhii tere paas threedots siidhii tere paas main ankhiyaan miiche miiche aa gaii saat samundar paar main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii  mainne terii yaadon ke zulfon men lagaae phuul aage terii marzii tuu kar na kar mujhe kabuul chhod ke main apane chhod ke main apane baabal ke baagbagiiche aa gaii saat samundar paar main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii main tere piichhe piichhe aa gaii

Title: jahaan men aayii diivaalii
Lyrics: jahaan men aayii diivaalii bade charaag jale hamaare dil men tere gam ke daag jale  kadam kadam pe charaagon kaa aaj melaa hai bujhaa huaa mere dil kaa diyaa akelaa hai kabhii na aise kisii kii khushii kaa baag jale hamaare dil men   threedots  ajiib rang liye ab ke aayii diivaalii kisii ne ghar ko jalaake manaayii diivaalii udhar charaag idhar dil kaa daag daag jale  zamiin pe utaraa huaa qaafilaa sitaaron kaa dilaaye yaad samaa pyaar kii bahaaron kaa jo tum nahiin ho to kaise meraa charaag jale hamaare dil men   threedots

Title: saanson kii zaruurat hai jaise zindagii ke liye
Lyrics: saanson kii zaruurat hai jaise     2 zindagii ke liye     2 bas ek sanam chaahiye  aashiqii ke liye  jaam kii zaruurat hai jaise  2 bekhudii ke liye haan ek sanam chaahiye aashiqii ke liye  bas ek sanam chaahiye  aashiqii ke liye  vaqt ke haathon men sabakii taqadiiren hain     2 aainaa jhuuthaa hai sachchii tasaviiren hain jahaan dard hai vahiin giit hai jahaan pyaas hai vahiin miit hai koi naa jaane magar jiine kii yahii riit hai saaz kii zaruurat hai jaise 2 mausiqii ke liye  bas ek sanam chaahiye  aashiqii ke liye  ho ho ho ho ho ho ho  2  manzilen haasil hain phir bhii ek duurii hai binaa hamaraahii ke zindagii adhuurii hai milegii kahiin koi rahaguzar tanhaa kategaa kaise ye safar mere sapane ho jahaan  dhuundhuun main aisii nazar chaand kii zaruurat hai jaise 2 chaandanii ke liye bas ek sanam chaahiye  aashiqii ke liye

Title: donon jahaan men koii bhii tujhasaa to nahiin hai
Lyrics: donon jahaan men koii bhii tujhasaa to nahiin hai tuu chaand se behatar hai sitaaron se hasiin hai  aankhen hain jaise jaam se chhalakii huii sharaab cheharaa hai kisii shaayarerangiin kaa hasiin kwaab tuu mere takayyul se kahiin badh ke hasiin hai  ye mast hawaaen ye fizaaen nisaar hain zulfon pe terii kaalii ghataaen nisaar hain sadaqe terii adaaon ke firadaus bharii hain

Title: akhiyon ko asnaan karaake
Lyrics: ankhiyon ko asnaan karaake main darshan ko aaii 2 tuute man ko lekar man ke bhent chadhaane aaii main darshan ko aaii threedots  saadhu ne sanyaas liyaa aur ang bhabhuut ramaaii 2 dhuul banii raahon kii miira charanan biich samaaii main darshan ko aaii threedots  o pagalii ke pagale priitam kaisii priit nibhaaii 2 sakhiyon kaa to jii bahalaayaa hamarii hansii udaaii main darshan ko aaii threedots  suunaa man kaa nagar sajaayaa priit kii jyot jagaaii 2 is nagarii se duur na jaiyo o hamare harajaaii main darshan ko aaii threedots

Title: jhuumataa muskaraataa chal
Lyrics: jhuumataa muskaraataa chal pyaar men gunagunaataa chal o mere man ho ke magan sapane kushii ke sajaataa chal jhuumataa muskaraataa chal threedots  phuulon bharii ye daaliyaan mahakii mahakii vaadiyaan kaliyon kaa ye nikharaa joban nazaron se tuu churaataa chal o mere man ho ke magan threedots  mauqaa milaa hai sunaharaa uth gayaa gam kaa paharaa aashaaon kii dharatii par tuu duniyaa naii basaataa chal o mere man ho ke magan threedots

Title: koii aarazuu nahiin hai koii muddaaa nahiin hai
Lyrics: koii aarazuu nahiin hai koii muddaaa nahiin hai teraa gam rahe salaamat mere dil men kyaa nahiin hai  tuu bachaae laakh daaman meraa phir bhii hai ye daavaa tere dil men main hii main huun koii duusaraa nahiin hai  tumhen kah diyaa sitamagar ye kasuur thaa zubaan kaa mujhe tum muaaf kar do meraa dil buraa nahiin hai  merii aankh ne tujhe bhii baakudaa shakiil paayaa main samajh rahaa thaa mujh saa koii duusaraa nahiin hai

Title: zulmatkade men mere shabegam kaa josh hai
Lyrics: zulmatkade men mere shabegam kaa josh hai ik shamaa hai daliilesahar so khamosh hai  ai taazaa vaaredaanebisaatehawaaedil zinhaar gar tumhen havasenaavnosh hai  dekho mujhe jo diidaaeibaratnigaah ho merii suno jo goshenasiihatniosh hai  daagefiraaqesohabateshab kii jalii huii ik shammaa rah gaii hai so wo bhii khamosh hai  aate hain gaib se ye mazaamiin kayaal men gaalib sariirekaamaa naawaaesarosh hai   ai taazaa vaaredaanebisaatehawaaedil zinhaar gar tumhen havasenaavnosh hai  dekho mujhe jo diidaaeibaratnigaah ho merii suno jo goshenasiihatniosh hai  ya shab ko dekhate the ke har goshaebisaat daamaanebaagabaanokafegulfarosh hai  yaa subahdam jo dekhiye aakar to bazm men nai wo suuruuroshor na joshokharosh hai  daagefiraaqesohabateshab kii jalii huii ik shammaa rah gaii hai so wo bhii khamosh hai  zulmatkade men mere shabegam kaa josh hai ik shamaa hai daliilesahar so khamosh hai   zulmatkade men mere shabegam kaa josh hai ik shamaa hai daliilesahar so kamosh hai  daagefiraaqesohabateshab kii jalii huii ik shammaa rah gaii hai so wo bhii kamosh hai  aate hain gaib se ye mazaamiin kayaal men gaalib sariirekaamaa naawaaesarosh hai

Title: ek ho gaye ham aur tum
Lyrics: ek ho gaye ham aur tum tuu ud gaii niinden re aur khanakii paayal mastii men to kangan khanake re		  hammaa hammaa  hammaa hammaa hammaa	2  hai pahalii baar mile tum pe dam ye nikale tum pe ye javaanii dhiiredhiire maatam machale re  hammaa hammaa  hammaa hammaa hammaa        2  khilii chaandanii jaisaa ye badan janaab milaa tumako man men sochataa jaisaa ruup teraa aayaa nazar hamako sitam khuliikhulii ye sanam goriigorii ye baahen karatii hai yuun hamen tumane jab gale lagaayaa to kho hii gaye ham to  hammaa hammaa  hammaa hammaa hammaa        2 ek ho gaye threedots threedots khanake re hammaa hammaa  hammaa hammaa hammaa        2 hai pahalii baar threedots threedots machale re  khulii zulf men terii aankhon men madahosh ho gaye gore gaal pe bhiige honth pe yaaraa fidaa ho gaye sanam pyaar men bhiigii raat men pyaas jagaate rahen khatam na ho sanam pyaar kaa mausam chaahat badhatii rahe  hammaa hammaa  hammaa hammaa hammaa        2 hammaa

Title: aadhaa hai chandramaa raat aadhii
Lyrics: aadhaa hai chandramaa raat aadhii rah na jaae terii merii baat aadhii mulaaqaat aadhii aadhaa hai chandramaathreedots  aas kab tak rahegii adhuurii pyaas hogii nahiin kyaa ye puurii pyaasaapyaasaa gagan pyaasaapyaasaa chaman pyaase taaron kii bhii hai baaraat aadhii aadhaa hai chandramaathreedots  sur aadhaa hai shyaam ne baandhaa rahaa raadhaa kaa pyaar bhii aadhaa nain aadhe khile honth aadhe hile rahii pal men milan kii vo baat aadhii aadhaa hai chandramaathreedots  piyaa aadhii hai pyaar kii bhaashhaa aadhii rahane do man kii abhilaashhaa aadhe chhalake nayan aadhe dhalake nayan aadhii palakon kii bhii hai barasaat aadhii aadhaa hai chandramaathreedots

Title: aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain
Lyrics: kishor	aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain      2 palaken uthaa ke aap ne jaaduu jagaaye hain lataa	sapanaa bhii aap hii hain haqiiqat bhii aap hain      2 bas aap aap aap hii mujhamen samaaye hain kishor	aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain  kishor	aankhon kaa rang dhuundhaa hain hiire talaash kar dil men sajaayenge ye rang yuun hii umr bhar mushkil se zindagii ke mushkil se zindagii ke  rang haath aaye hain aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain  lataa	doharaaye jaayenge naa ye lamahaat ab kabhii sapanon men bhii na chhuutegaa ye saath ab kabhii milatii hain zindagii jab aap muskuraaye hain      2  lataa	ye dil kuchh aise aap ke sajade men jhuk gayaa kishor	nazare uthaayii aap ne to vaqt ruk gayaa lataa	thahare hue palo men thahare hue palo men  zamaane bithaaye hain kishor	aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain lataa	aa aa bas aap aap aap hii mujh men samaaye hain kishor lataa  aankhon men hamane aap ke sapane sajaaye hain

Title: laayii hayaat aaye qazaa le chalii chale
Lyrics: laai hayaat aaye qazaa le chalii chale 2 apanii khushii na aaye na 2 apanii khushii chale haa apanii khushii na aaye na apanii khushii chale  behatar to hai yahii kii na duniyaa se dil lage 2 par kyaa karuun jo kaam na 2 bedillagii chale par kyaa karuun jo kaam na bedillagii chale   duniyaa ne kis kaa raahefanaan 2 men diyaa hai saath duniyaa ne kis kaa raahefanaan men diyaa hai saath tum bhii chale chalo yuunhii jab tak chalii chale 2  jaa ki havaaeshauq men hain 2 is chaman se zauq jaa ki havaaeshauq men hain is chaman se zauq apanii balaa se baadesabaa 2 ab kahiin chale 2  laayii hayaat aaye qazaa le chalii clale

Title: ye inaayaten gazab kii
Lyrics: ye inaayaten gazab kii ye balaa kii maharabaanii merii kairiyat bhii puuchhi kisii aur kii zubaanii  merii bezubaan aankhon se ye gire hain chand qatare vo samajh saken to aansuu na samajh saken to paanii  teraa husn so rahaa thaa merii chhed ne jagaayaa vo nigaah main ne daalii ki sanvar gayii javaanii   ye ghata bataa rahii hai ki baras chukaa hai paanii

Title: kisii kii yaad men paaii hai jab kamii hamane
Lyrics: kisii kii yaad men paaii hai jab kamii hamane to aansuon se jalaa dii hai zindagii hamane  siyaah raat kaa daaman hai aur kuchh bhii nahiin wo jis muqaam pe dekhii thii raushanii hamane  tere kayaal kaa shiishaa na tuut jaae kahiin isii kayaal men har shab guzaar dii hamane

Title: waqtepiirii shabaab kii baaten
Lyrics: waqtepiirii shabaab kii baaten aisii hain jaise kwaab kii baaten  phir mujhe le chalaa udhar dekho dilekaanaakharaab kii baaten  mahajabiin yaad hai ki bhuul gaye wo shabemaahataab kii baaten  tujhako rusawaa karengii kuunedil terii ye iztiraab kii baaten  sunate hain unako chhed chhed ke ham usake munh se itaab kii baaten  zikr thaa josheishq men ai zauq ham se hon sabrotaab kii baaten

Title: sapane suhaane ladakapan ke
Lyrics: sapane suhaane ladakapan ke mere nainon men dole bahaar ban ke   2  jab chhaae ghataa matavaalii mere dil pe chalaae aarii ghabaraaye akele manavaa main leke javaanii haarii kaise katen din ulajhan ke koi laade zamaane vo bachapan ke sapane suhaane threedots  jab duur papiihaa bole dil khaaye meraa hichakole main laaj men marmar jaauun jab phuul pe bhanvaraa dole chhede pavaniyaa taraane jab man ke mujhe bhaaye na rang ye jiivan ke sapane suhaane threedots

Title: kaise chhupaauun raazegam
Lyrics: kaise chhupaauun raazegam diidaaetar ko kyaa karuun dil kii tapish ko kyaa karuun sozejigar ko kyaa karuun  shorisheaashiqii kahaan aur merii saadagii kahaan husn ko tere kyaa karuun apanii nazar ko kyaa karuun  gam kaa na dil men ho guzar vasl kii shab ho yuun basar sab ye qubuul hai magar aabesahar ko kyaa karuun  haal meraa thaa jab batuu tab na tujhe huii kabar baad mere jo huaa asar ab main asar ko kyaa karuun

Title: kaun viraane men dekhegaa bahaar
Lyrics: ek ahaledard ne sunasaan jo dekhaa kafas bolaa ab aatii nahiin hai kyon sadaaeandalii baalon par dochaar dikhalaa kar kahaa saiyaad ne yeh nishaanii rah gai hai ab bajaaeandalii  kaun viiraane men dekhegaa bahaar 3  kaun viiraane men dekhegaa bahaar  phuul jangal men khile kinake liye 3  dil kaa zaaman tuu teraa kyaa aitabaar 2 pahale ik zaaman ho zaaman ke liye 3  laash par ibarat yah kahatii thii amiir 2 aaye the duniyaa men is din ke liye 4

Title: aise to na dekho ke bahak jaaen kahiin ham
Lyrics: ra aise to na dekho ke bahak jaaen kahiin ham     aakhir ko ik inasaan hain farishtaa to nahiin ham su haay aise na kaho baat ke mar jaaen yahiin ham     aakhir ko ik inasaan hain farishtaa to nahiin ham  ra angadaaii sii letii hai jo khushabuu bharii zulfen     khushabuu bharii zulfen     giratii hai tere surkh labon par terii zulfen     labon par terii zulfen     zulfen na terii chuum len ai mahajabiin ham     aakhir ko ik inasaan hain farishtaa to nahiin ham  su sun sun ke terii baat nashaa chhaane lagaa hai     nashaa chhaane lagaa hai     khud apane pe bhii pyaar saa kuchh aane lagaa hai     aane lagaa hai     rakhanaa hai kahiin paanv to rakhate hain kahiin ham  donon aakhir ko ik inasaan hain farishtaa to nahiin ham     aahaa haa aahaa haa haa hamm hamm hamm hamm threedots     aahaa haa aahaa haa haa hamm hamm hamm hamm threedots

Title: man dhiire dhiire gaaye re
Lyrics: man dhiire dhiire gaaye re maaluum nahiin kyon bin gaaye rahaa na jaaye re maaluum nahiin kyon  palakon men chhupaa kar gorii laaii hai milan kii dorii ab saath hai jiivan bhar kaa lo thaam lo bainyaa morii ik baat zubaan par aaye re maaluum nahiin kyon  aashaaon ne lii angadaaii tan man men bajii shahanaaii dil duub gayaa mastii men ik lahar khushii kii chhaaii dil haath se nikalaa jaaye re maaluum nahiin kyon

Title: mujhe tum nazar se giraa to rahe ho
Lyrics: mujhe tum nazar se giraa to rahe ho mujhe tum kabhii bhii bhulaa naa sakoge naa jaane mujhe kyon yaqiin ho chalaaa hai mere pyaar ko tum mitaaa naa sakoge  merii yaad hogii jidhar jaaoge tum kabhii nagamaa ban ke kabhii ban ke aansuu tadapataa mujhe har taraf paaoge tum shamaa jo jalaayii merii vafaa ne bujhaanaa bhii chaaho bujhaaa naa sakoge  kabhii naam baaton men aayaa jo meraa to bechain hoho ke dil thaam loge nigaahon pe chhaayegaa gam kaa andheraa kisii ne jo puuchhaa sabab aansuon kaa bataanaa bhii chaaho bataa naa sakoge  mere dil kii dhadkan banii haii jo sholaa sulagate hain aramaan yuun banban ke aansuu kabhii to tumhen bhii ye ahasaas hogaa magar ham naa honge terii zindagii men bulaanaa bhii chaaho bulaa naa sakoge

Title: aanaa merii jaan merii jaan sunday ke sunday

Lyrics: hamen koii gam nahiin thaa gameaashiqii se pahale na thii dushmanii kisii se terii dostii se pahale  hai ye merii badanasiibii teraa kyaa qusuur isamen tere gam ne maar daalaa mujhe zindagii se pahale  meraa pyaar jal rahaa hai are chaand aaj chhup jaa kabhii pyaar thaa hamen bhii terii chaandanii se pahale  main kabhii na muskuraataa jo mujhe ye ilm hotaa ke hazaar gam milenge mujhe ik kushii se pahale  ye ajiib imtihaan hai ki tumhiin ko bhuulanaa hai mile kab the is tarah ham tumhen bedilii se pahale

Title: aa jaa aa jaa main huun pyaar teraa allaah allaah inkaar teraa
Lyrics: rafii aa jaa aa jaa main huun pyaar teraa  allaah allaah inkaar teraa o o aa jaa aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa threedots aa jaa aa jaa main huun pyaar tera  allaa allaa inakaar tera o  o aa jaa aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa threedots  rafii o threedots tumape hazaaron kii aankhen chaahiye tumako sahara o  palkon main aao chhupaaluun naazuk tan hain tumhaaraa o  o aa jaa threedots aa jaa aa jaa main huun pyaar tera  allaa allaa inakaar tera o  o aa jaa aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa threedots  aashaa o threedots meraa khayaal tujhe hain mainne abhii yahii jaanaa o  sachchaa hain pyaar kii jhuthaa ye hain mujhe aazamaanaa ho  o aa jaa threedots aa jaa aa jaa dekho pyaar tera  allaa allaa inakaar tera o  o aa jaa aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa threedots  rafii o threedots rakhanaa tha dil pe hamara haath chhudaake chalii ho  aashaa o threedots jii haan zaraa ye bhi kahiye aag lagaa ke chalii huun o  o aa jaa threedots rafii  aa jaa aa jaa dekho pyaar tera  allaah allaah inkaar tera o   dono o aa jaa aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa jaa aa e e aa jaa  aah aah aa threedots

Title: mausam ko ishaaron se bulaa kyon nahiin lete jagjit gazal
Lyrics: mausam ko ishaaron se bulaa kyon nahiin lete  ruuthaa hai agar vo to manaa kyon nahiin lete   divaanaa tumhaaraa koi gair nahiin  machalaa bhi to siine se lagaa kyon nahiin lete   khat likhakar kabhi aur kabhi khat ko jalaakar  tanhaaii ko rangiin bana kyon nahiin lete   tum jaag rahe ho mujhako achchhaa nahiin lagataa  chupake se meri niind churaa kyon nahiin lete

Title: kar le pyaar kar le ki din hain yahii
Lyrics: maaf kiijiyegaa  inhon ne abhii tak pyaar bhii nahiin kiyaa  kar le pyaar kar le ke din hain yahii par chorii se koii dekhe naa kahiin are pagale nazar milaa jahaan mile tujhe koii hasiin kar le pyaar kar le ki din hain yahii   threedots  aa main tujhe batalaa duun ye pyaar kaa rastaa chalanaa rangiin honth kisii ke chhuu kar bin sholon ke jalanaa aankh men aankhen daal ke kuchh naa kahanaa aur machalanaa are haaa are haaa haaa haa re aake sambhaale koii to phir naa sambhalanaa are pagale nazar milaa jahaan mile tujhe koii hasiin kar le pyaar kar le ki din hain yahii   threedots  aaj hii apane dil men rakh le tuu koii hasiinaa phir jhuum ke zulfon ke saaye men roz nazar se piinaa siikh le maranaa aaj kisii pe leke dhadakata siinaa are haaa are haaa haaa haa re maranaa naa siikhaa tuune to phir kyaa jiinaa are pagale nazar milaa jahaan milii tujhe koii hasiin kar le pyaar kar le ki din hain yahii   threedots

Title: zindagii kaa safar hai ye kaisaa safar
Lyrics: zindagii kaa safar hai ye kaisaa safar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin hai ye kaisii dagar chalate hain sab magar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin  zindagii ko bahut pyaar hamane kiyaa maut se bhii muhabbat nibhaayenge ham rote rote zamaane men aaye magar hansate hansate zamaane se jaayenge ham jaayenge par kidhar hai kise ye khabar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin  aise jiivan bhii hain jo jiye hii nahiin jinako jiine se pahale hii maut aa gayii phuul aise bhii hain jo khile hii nahiin jinako khilane se pahale fizaa khaa gai hai pareshaan nazar thak gaye chaaraagar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin  hai ye kaisii dagar chalate hain sab magar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin zindagii kaa safar hai ye kaisaa safar koii samajhaa nahiin koii jaanaa nahiin

Title: aaj mausam badaa beiimaan hai aaj mausam
Lyrics: aaj mausam badaa beiimaan hai badaa beiimaan hai aaj mausam aane vaalaa koii tuufaan hai koii tuufaan hai aaj mausam  kyaa huaa hai huaa kuchh nahiin hai baat kyaa hai pataa kuchh nahiin hai mujhase koii kataa ho gaii to is men merii kataa kuchh nahiin hai kuubasuurat hai tuu rut javaan hai aaj mausam badaa beiimaan hai  kaaliikaalii ghataa dar rahii hai thandii aahen havaa bhar rahii hai sabako kyaakyaa gumaan ho rahe hain har kalii ham pe shak kar rahii hai phuulon kaa dil bhii kuchh badagumaan hai  ai mere yaar ai husn vaale dil kiyaa mainne tere havaale terii marzii pe ab baat thaharii jiine de chaahe tuu maar daale tere haathon men ab merii jaan hai

Title: ishq kaa zarf aazamaan to sahii
Lyrics: ishq kaa zarf aazamaan to sahii tuu nazar se nazar milaa to sahii  mil hii jaayegaa zindagii kaa suraag doston ke fareb khaa to sahii  dil ko taskiin na ho to main zaamin tuu kabhii mayakade men aa to sahii  ziist ashqon men dhal na jaaye kahiin dost ik baar muskaraa to sahii  zindagii ko sambhaalane waale tuu kabhii pii ke ladakhadaa to sahii

Lyrics: mere shyaam suno merii vinatii haay mere shyaam suno merii vinatii main vinatii kar kar haarii mere shyaam suno merii vinatii tum sukh kii sej pe sovat ho sukh kii sej pe sovat ho main tadapat dukhiyaarii mere shyaam suno merii vinatii  tum se naa kahuun to kahuun kis se 2 tum se priit laagii jab se 2 tum priit lagaakar jiit gaye priit lagaakar jiit gaye main priit lagaakar haarii 2 merii vinatii haay merii vinatii haay mere shyaam suno merii vinatii  din raat virah duhkh jhelat huun tum bin pal chin chain kahaan 2 bas takat huun baat tumhaarii bas takat huun baat tumhaarii priit lagaakar haarii priit lagaakar jiit gaye tum priit lagaakar jiit gaye main priit lagaakar haarii 2 merii vinatii haay merii vinatii haay mere shyaam suno merii vinatii main vinatii kar kar haarii mere shyaam suno merii vinatii haay mere shyaam suno merii vinatii

Title: shauq har rang rakiibesarosaamaan nikalaa
Lyrics: shauq har rang rakiibesarosaamaan nikalaa qais tasviir ke parde men bhii uriyaan nikalaa  zakm ne daad na dii tangiiedil kii yaa rab tiir bhii siinaaebismil se parafshaan nikalaa  buuegul naalaaedil duuddcharaagemahafil jo terii bazm se nikalaa so pariishaan nikalaa  dilehasaratazadaa thaa maailelazaatedard kaam yaaron kaa baqadrelabodandaa nikalaa  hai nauaamozefan himmatedushwaar pasand sakt mushqil hai ki yah kaam bhii aasaan nikalaa  dil men phir giriye ne ik shor uthaayaa gaalib aah jo qataraa na nikalaa thaa so tuufaan nikalaa

Title: chhaliyaa meraa naam chhalanaa meraa kaam
Lyrics: chhaliyaa meraa naam chhaliyaa meraa naam hinduu musalim sikh isaaii sabako meraa salaam chhaliyaa meraathreedots  dekho logon zaraa to socho banii kahaanii kaise tumane merii rotii chhiinii chhiinii mainne paise siikhaa tum se kaam huaa main badanaam hinduu musalimthreedots  rok rahiin hain raahen merii nainaa tiikhetiikhe ham to khaalii maal ke rasiyaa ishq nahiin ham siikhe jahaan bhii dekhaa daam vahiin nikaalaa kaam hinduu musalimthreedots  main huun galiyon kaa shahazaadaa jo chaahuun vo le luun shahazaade talavaar se khelen main kainchii se kheluun mehanat meraa kaam denaa usakaa kaam hinduu musalimthreedots

Title: suramaii akhiyon men nanhaa munnaa ek sapanaa de jaa re
Lyrics: suramai akhiyon men nanhaa munnaa ek sapanaa de jaa re  nindiyaa ke udate paakhii re ankhiyon men aajaa sathi re   raa rii raa ram o raarii ram   sachchaa koi sapanaa dejaa  mujhako koi apana dejaa  anajaanaa saa magar kuchh pahachaanaa saa  halkaa phulkaa shabanamii  resham se bhi reshamii  suramai threedots   raat ke rath par jaane vaale  nind ka ras barasaane vaale  itana kar de ki meri aankhen bhar de  aankhon men basataa rahe sapana ye hansataa rahe  sapanaa yuun chalataa rahe  ankhiyon men basataa rahe  suramai threedots

Title: saktiyaan karataa huun dil par
Lyrics: saktiyaan karataa huun dil par gair se gaafil huun main haay kyaa achchhii kahii zaalim huun main jaahil huun main  main jabhii tak thaa ke terii jalawaapairaaii na thii jo numuudehaq se mit jaataa hai wo baatil huun main  bazmehastii apanii aaraaish pe tuu naazaan na ho tuu to ik tasviir hai mahafil kii aur mahafil huun main  dhuundhataa phirataa huun ai iqabaal apane aap ko aap hii goyaa musaafir aap hii manzil huun main

Title: bachapan kii mohabbat ko dil se na judaa karanaa
Lyrics: bachapan kii mohabbat ko dil se na judaa karanaa jab yaad merii aae milane kii duaa karanaa  ghar merii ummiidon kaa suunaa kie jaate ho duniyaa ai muhabbat kii luute lie jaate ho jo gam die jaate ho us gam kii duaa karanaa jab yaad merii aae threedots  saavan men papiihaa kaa sangiit sunaauungii fariyaad tujhe apanii gaagaa kar sunaauungii aavaaz merii sun ke dil thaam liyaa karanaa jab yaad merii aae threedots

Lyrics: chandaa re mere bhaiyaa se kahanaa  o mere bhaiyyaa se kahanaa bahanaa yaad kare	2 o chandaa rethreedots  kyaa batalaauun kaisaa hai vo bilakul tere jaisaa hai vo tuu usako pahachaan hii legaa dekhegaa to jaan hii legaa tuu saare sansaar men chamake har bastii har gaanv men damake kahanaa ab ghar vaapas aa jaa 2 tuu hai ghar kaa gahanaa bahanaa yaad kare  o chandaa rethreedots  raakhii ke dhaage sab laaen kahanaa ab na raah dikhaae maan ke naam kii kasamen denaa bhent merii ke rasamen denaa  puuchhanaa us ruuthe bhaaii se bhuul huii kyaa maanjaaii se bahan paraayaa dhan hai kahanaa usane sadaa nahiin rahanaa bahanaa yaad kare o chandaa rethreedots

Title: bahaaron phuul barasaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai
Lyrics: bahaaron phuul barasaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai  2 havaaon raaginii gaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai  2  o laalii phuul kii menhandii lagaa in gore haathon men utar aa ai ghataa kaajal lagaa in pyaarii aankhon men sitaaron maang bhar jaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai  2  nazaaron har taraf ab taan do ik nuur kii chaadar badaa sharmiilaa dilabar hai chalaa jaaye na sharamaa kar zaraa tum dil ko bahalaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai  2  sajaaii hai javaan kaliyon ne ab ye sej ulfat kii inhen maaluum thaa aaegii ik din ritu muhabbat kii fizaaon rang bikharaao meraa mahabuub aayaa hai  2 bahaaron threedots
