Lyrics: lataa	sakhii rii sun bole papiihaa us paar      2 bolat aisii miithii bolii chhede man ke taar dono	sakhii rii sun bole papiihaa us paar      2  lataa	ga ma pa pa ma pa ga ma pa nii saa nii pa ma ga ma pa nii saa rii saa nii pa nii pa ma ga ma ga rii saa aashaa	 pa nii saa rii saa nii pa nii pa ma ga ma ga rii saa  lataa	pii pii kii jab taan sunaae birahan man ghabaraae aashaa	pii pii kii jab taan sunaae birahan man ghabaraae lataa	bhuulii batiyaan yaad dilaae  aashaa	bhuulii batiyaan yaad dilaae dono	paapii baarambaar sakhii rii sun bole papiihaa us paar      2  lataa	ga ma ga saa nii saa da nii saa ga ma pa ga aashaa	ga ma ga saa nii saa da nii saa ga ma pa ga lataa	pa saa nii pa rii saa nii pa aashaa	pa nii saa rii saa nii pa nii pa ma ga ma ga rii saa  aashaa   bairii aisii dhun men bole sun sun manavaa dole lataa   bairii aisii dhun men bole sun sun manavaa dole aashaa	kaanon men amrit ras ghole lataa	kaanon men amrit ras ghole dono	rah rah madhur pukaar  dono	sakhii rii sun bole papiihaa us paar      2

Title: gam bade aate hain kaatil kii nigaahon kii tarah
Lyrics: gam bade aate hain kaatil kii nigaahon kii tarah tum chhipaa lo mujhe ai dost gunaahon kii tarah  apanii nazaron men gunahagaar na hote kyon kar dil hii dushman hain mukhaalif ke gvaahon kii tarah  har taraf ziist kii raahon men kadii dhuup hai dost bas terii yaad kaa saayaa hai panaahon kii tarah  jinake kaatir kabhii ilzaam uthaae faakir vo bhii pesh aae hain inasaaf ke shaahon kii tarah

Title: hasarat hii rahii ham se bhii kabhii koii pyaar karataa
Lyrics: hasarat hii rahi ham se bhi kabhi koi pyaar karataa koi pyaar karataa koi dil hamaare bhi miithii najar ek baar karataa koi pyaar karataa    2  nikale the ham dil kii jholii liye duniya ne kante hii kaante diye 2 itane to bure ham na the koi ham se najar chaar karataa koi pyaar karataa  hasarat hii threedots  duniya men kya kya na mele rahe ham the akele akele rahe  2 dil rakhate the ham hamako bhi koi diladaar karataa koi pyaar karataa  hasarat hii threedots  maangi thi hamane khudaaii kahaan thokar pe thokar milii jo yahaan  2 kya jaataa agar koi dil ka nagar gulazaar karataa koi pyaar karataa  hasarat hii threedots

Title: jahaan madhur koyaliyaa gaatii ho
Lyrics: jahaan madhur koyaliyaa gaatii ho bhanvaron ko kalii bulaatii ho jahaan hawaa basantii aatii ho hariyaalii ruup lutaatii ho 2 wahaan main huun tuu ho koii na ho 2  jahaan shaam dulhan ban aatii ho jahaan laal sej bichh jaatii ho jahaan giit chaandanii gaatii ho badalii jal bhar kar laatii ho 2 wahaan main huun tuu ho koii na ho 2  jahaan nadii samundar se milatii jahaan kalii phuul banakar khilatii 2 jahaan aag dilon men hai jalatii 2 jahaan pyaas na chaahat kii bujhatii 2 wahaan main huun tuu ho koii na ho 2

Title: hai isii men pyaar kii aabaruu vo jafaa karen main vafaa karuun
Lyrics: hai isii men pyaar kii aabaruu vo zafaa karen main vafaa karuun jo vafaa bhii kaam na aa sake to vohii kahen ke main kyaa karuun hai isii threedots  mujhe gam bhii unakaa aziiz hai  ke unhiin kii dii huii chiiz hai   2 ke unhiin kii dii huii chiiz hai yahii gam hai ab merii zindagii ise kaise dil se judaa karuun hai isii threedots  jo na ban sake main vo baat huun  jo na khatm ho main vo raat huun   2 jo na khatm ho main vo raat huun ye likhaa hai mere nasiib men yuunhii shammaa banake jalaa karuun hai isii threedots  na kisii ke dil kii huun aarazuu  na kisii kii nazar kii huun justajuu   2 na kisii kii nazar kii huun justajuu main vo phuul huun jo udaas ho na bahaar aae to kyaa karuun hai isii threedots

Title: hamen kyaa khabar thii isii mod par yuun
Lyrics: hamen kyaa khabar thii isii mod par yuun milegaa hamen bhii koii ajanabii badal jaegii yuun meriii zindagii  ham apanii hii dhun men akele akele chale hii chale jaa rahe the akele akele mil gae ho jo tum ab nahiin hain sanam akele akele ye dil jaanataa thaa mulaaqaat hogii kisii na kisii se kabhii na kabhii  dete hain gavaahii na nazaare hamne tum se pyaar hai dhadakan bhii ye pukaare hamen tum se pyaar hai kah rahaa hai samaa saanson kiii garmiyaan hamen tum se pyaar hai kariib aake tere huii ham ko haasil terii baahon men naii bekhudii

printtitile duniyaa kab chup rahtii hai kahne de jo kahtii hai mat kar duniyaa kii baat sajan kahiin biit naa jaae raat sajan  ye raat banii matvaalii hai is raat ko apnaa miit banaa main zulfon ko bikharaatii huun tuu saanson ko sangiit banaa aa jhuum le mere saath sajan kahiin biit naa jaae raat sajan  tere hii lie hai prrit merii sab giit mere hain tere lie honthon pe sajaake dil kii sadaa laaii huun piyaa main tere lie aa thaam le meraa haath sajan kahiin biit naa jaae raat sajan  duniyaa kab chup rahtii hai kahne de jo kahtii hai endsong

Title: ham bekhudii men tumako pukaare chale gae

Title: tuu to jaane naa maine kii terii bandagii  sun le maahiyaa
Lyrics: tere binaa main nahiin mere binaa tuu nahiin khushbuu binaa phuul nahiin phuul binaa khushbuu nahiin  tuu to jaane naa maine kii terii bandagii tuu sanam hai tuu khudaa hai maahiyaa merii aankhon men teraa jalavaa hai pyaar tujhase kiyaa dil diyaa  dhadakanon kii jubaan sirf sunataa sadaa hai tuu lamhaa lamhaa yahaan mujhako hai terii justajuu sun le maahiyaa merii saanson men terii khushbuu hai kah rahaa hai yahii ye jiyaa tuu to jaane naa threedots  ye zamiin aasamaan hain ye terii nishaaniyaan sabake honthon pe hain o sirf terii kahaaniyaan sun le maahiyaa har jagah har suu hai teraa jaaduu paa ke tujhako jahaan paa liyaa tuu to jaane naa threedots

Title: dil lagaakar ham ye samajhe zindagii kyaa chiiz hai female
Lyrics: baad muddat ke mile to is tarah dekhaa idhar jis tarah ek ajanabii par ajanabii daale nazar aapane ye bhii na sochaa dostii kyaa chiiz hai  pahalepahale aap hii apanaa banaa baithe hamen phir na jaane kisalie dil se bhulaa baithe hamen ab huaa maaluum hamako berukii kyaa chiiz hai  pyaar sachchaa hai meraa to dekh lenaa ai sanam aap aakar tod denge kud merii zanjiiregam bandaa paravar jaan lenge bandagii kyaa chiiz hai

Title: kammo meraa dil le gaii oy kammo kidhar
Lyrics: kammo meraa dil le gaii oy meraa dil le gaii oy kammo kidhar main dekhuun us ko idhar udhar yaaron jaao dhuundh ke laao yaaron jaao dhuundh ke laao  kal sapanon me aaii thii sharamaaii thii ghabaraaii thii kal sapanon me aaii thii sharamaaii thii ghabaraaii thii aisaa dard jagaayaa yaaro main nu niind na aayii bhangadaa paa bhangadaa kah de jag se saare bhangadaa paa bhangadaa kammo meraa chain churaa kar jaane kitthe kho gaii main sab kuchh ote upe vaaraa vo meraa buraa haal kar gaii meraa dil le gaii oy threedots  kammo tuu saamane mere aajaa kammo tuu jalavaa apanaa dikhaa jaa  sapanon kii us raanii ko main apanii jaan banaauungaa aaj nahiin to kal us ko main apane ghar le aauungaa us kii bholii aankhon kaa diivaanaa ban baithaa aisii aag lagaayii main paravaanaa ban baithaa paagal premii aashiq main mastaanaa ban baithaa duniyaa se alag lai sun main anajaanaa ban baithaa main nu husn ke rang dikhaa ke kammo to kamaal kar gaii meraa dil le gaii oy threedots  dil jo paanaa hai dhuundh ke laanaa hai aisiivaisii  chalo kammo ke ghar kammo

Title: hamaraahii daro nahiin honge kaamayaab
Lyrics: hamaraahii daro nahiin honge kaamayaab hamaraahii daro nahiin honge kaamayaab  mushkilen har qadam hain dagardagar   laakhon haath ek saath saath hain magar duur hain manzilen kar na tuu fikar chiir ke andherii raat laayenge aafataab sthaayii  chal re milake chal dhun baje magan umadghumad kar chhaa rahe baadal ab hamen to dard kaa na kauf hai zaraa ham hariibharii banaayenge vasundharaa ab to na rukanaa ab to na thakanaa mud ke dekho naa chukaanaa hai hamen to ab puraanaa har hisaab 1  alagalag dharam alagalag karam alag nahiin hai ham ek sab kaa gam mazahabon ke naam pe hamen ladaa diyaa nafaraton se rishtaa pyaar kaa mitaa diyaa ab to na sahanaa chup nahiin rahanaa tumako hai qasam milake ab likhenge ham to ek nayii kitaab 2

Title: beqaraar hai koii aa mere diladaar aa
Lyrics: beqaraar hai koii aa mere diladaar aa hai kisii kii zindagii aa ishq hai gamakvaar aa  dasatii hai naagan sii furaqat kii raaten jhutii hain bin tere jiine kii baaten haay kaisii bebasii aa main huun talabagaar aa  chun luun gam tere dukhdard mitaa duun honthon pe nagamon kii kaliyaan khilaa duun ro rahii hai beqasii aa husn hai biimaar aa  hansanaa hai bas men na ronaa hai bas men mahalon men rahakan  manzilon men pyaar kii aa tod ke diivaar aa

Title: chhotaa saa balamaa
Lyrics: chhotaa saa balamaa ankhiyan niind churaa le gayo ratiyan niind na aaye chhotaa saa balamaa   kis bairan ke jaal men phansake bhuul gayaa tuu pyaar ke raste chhotaa saa balamaa ankhiyan niind churaa le gayo ratiyan niind na aaye chhotaa saa balamaa   mere dil ko jaan khilonaa tod gayaa bedard salonaa chhotaa saa balamaa ankhiyan niind churaa le gayo ratiyan niind na aaye chhotaa saa balamaa

Title: kuchh aur puuchhiye ye haqiiqat na puuchhiye
Lyrics: kuchh aur puuchhie ye haqiiqat na puuchhie kyon aap se hai hamako muhabbat na puuchhie  sajadon se tay muqaamemuhabbat na ho sakaa kyaa kyaa huii hai sar ko nadaamat na puuchhie  donon hii bhuul jaane ke qaabil hain ishq men afsaanaaemajaazohaqiiqat na puuchhie  taskiin ye jaanodil the hamen bhii kabhii aziiz ab zindagii hai kis kii badaulat na puuchhie

Title: bechaaraa dil kyaa kare saavan jale bhaadon jale
Lyrics: bechaaraa dil kyaa kare saavan jale bhaadon jale do pal kii raah nahiin ik pal ruke ik pal chale  gaanv gaanv men ghuume re jogii rogii change kare  mere hii man kaa tadap naa jaane haath naa dhare  tere vaaste laakhon raaste tuu jahaan bhii chale mere liye hai terii hii raahen tuu jo saath le

Title: ai ishq mujhe aur to kuchh yaad nahiin hai
Lyrics: aa ai ishq mujhe aur to kuchh yaad nahiin hai 2 haan dil meraa barabaad hai aabaad nahiin hai 2  ye dil kii lagii hai to koii kaaq jiyegaa 2 ab naam bhii jiine kaa mujhe yaad nahiin hai 2

Title: dil de ke dardemuhabbat liyaa hai  main ne pyaar kiyaa
Lyrics: dil de ke dardemuhabbat liyaa hai soch samajh ke ye saudaa kiyaa hai main ne pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa hai main ne   threedots  pahale pahal jab use main ne dekhaa vo ban gaii merii qisamat kii rekhaa khabar kyaa thii ye baat itanii badhegii muhabbat men mehanat bhii karanii padegii dilavaale mehanat se darate nahiin hain darate hain vo pyaar karate nahiin hain main ne pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa   threedots  duniyaa kii daulat thukaraa chukaa huun zulfon kii chhanv men aakar rukaa huun ye chhanv merii hai merii rahegii jo main kahuungaa vo duniyaa kahegii ye chaand suuraj bhii chhoden chamakanaa mushakil hai meraa iraade badalanaa main ne pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa   threedots  main terii dil teraa ye jaan terii terii muhabbat hai pahachaan merii main aaj kahatii huun ye sab ke aage ik din main kah duungii main rab ke aage tujhako hii bigadii banaa padegaa bichhude hue dil milaanaa padegaa main ne pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa   threedots

Title: duniyaa ye duniyaa tuufaan mel
Lyrics: tuufaan mel duniyaa ye duniyaa tuufaan mel  isake pahiye zor se chalate aur apanaa rastaa tay karate sayaane is se kaam nikaalen bachche samajhe khel tuufaan mel   threedots  koii kahaan kaa tikat kaatataa ek hai aataa ek hai jaataa sabhii musaafir bichhad jaayenge pal bhar kaa hai mel tuufaan mel   threedots  jo jitanii puunjii hai rakhataa usii mutaabiq safar vo karataa jiivan kaa hai bhed bataatii gyaanii ko ye rel tuufaan mel   threedots

Title: kyaa kyaa na log chal base
Lyrics: kyaa kyaa na log chal base 2 shauqejamaaleyaar men hamase hazaaron mit gaye 2 haalateintezaar men  puurii tarah khile na phuul rah gayii dil men hasaraten 2 baag hii saaraa jal gayaa 2 aag lagii bahaar men kyaa kyaa na log threedots  phiikii padii hai chaandanii taare bhii jhilamilaate hain 2 sab hain nazar men beqaraar 2 dil jo nahiin qaraar men kyaa kyaa na log threedots  mit bhii gaye to kyaa huaa maut hai ek zindagii 2 ek naam aur badh gayaa 2 duniyaa kii yaadagaar men kyaa kyaa na log threedots

Title: guzar jaaye din din din
Lyrics: guzar jaaye din din din  ki har pal gin gin gin kisii kii haay yaadon men  kisii kii haay baaton men kisii se mulaaqaaton men ki ye silasile jab se chale kvaab mere ho gaye rangiin  rahe na dil bas men ye na maane koii rasamen ye ki khaauun main to kasamen ye unhen hai pataa ki jag chaahe ruuthe ye ki jag chaahe chhuute ye naataa nahiin tuute ye haay haa guzar jaaye din   threedots  kabhii ye meraa man chaahe  phuulon ke jahaan ho saaye  jahaan pe har dil gaaye dhun pyaar kii zamaane chaahe ho jaayen vahiin pe jaake kho jaayen vahiin pe jaake so jaayen haay haa guzar jaaye din   threedots

Title: maan kare kyaa rang ruup kaa
Lyrics: terii ik ik adaa jhuutii vafaa jhuuthii hayaa jhuutii chalegii ai hasiinaa kab talaq aakhir havaa jhuutii  maan kare kyaa rang ruup kaa tuu kaagaz kaa phuul hai tujh men khushabuu dhuundh rahii hai ye duniyaan kii bhuul hai maan kare kyaa rang ruup kaa threedots  tujhe dekh ke laakh bujhaa le pyaas koii akhiyan kii binaa baas kaa phuul banegaa kyaa shobhaa bagiyan kii daal kaa phuul chadhe mandir men tuu raste kii dhuul hai maan kare kyaa rang ruup kaa threedots  binaa jyot kaa diipak hai tuu binaa tel kii baatii jab tan ujalaa aur man kaalaa phir kaahe itaraatii shabanam khud ko saagar samajhe ye shabanam kii bhuul hai maan kare kyaa rang ruup kaa threedots

Title: aansuuon kii chhaanv men bhii hans le o dilwaale
Lyrics: aansuuon kii chhaanv men bhii hans le o dilwaale qismat ke ulajhe hue jaal ko sulajhaa le  2  chup bhii gam kii god men palataa hai 2 duub bhii suraj phir nikalataa hai mausam badalataa hai ban jaayegii bigadii huii baat bhii matawaale  aansuuon kii chhaanv men bhii hans le o dilwaale qismat ke ulajhe hue jaal ko sulajhaa le  giit khaamoshii kaa suhaanaa hai 2 har dhadakan ek shok taraanaa hai maasuum fasaanaa hai sun le zaraa dil kii sadaa are o bhole bhaale   aansuuon kii chhaanv men bhii hans le o dilwaale qismat ke ulajhe hue jaal ko sulajhaa le  2

Title: kyaa karuun kyaa karuun
Lyrics: kyaa karuun kyaa karuun kyaa karuun siine men huuk uthii hai ghabaraataa hai dil laakh bahalaataa huun bahalaayaa nahiin jaataa hai dil  kin andhere men ho tum is raaz se ho bekhabar roshanii hotii hai jab nazaron se milatii hai nazar aag lag uthatii hai jis dam dil se jab takaraataa hai dil laakh bahalaataa huun threedots  haay ik dil kii badaulat lut gayii duniyaan tamaam is tabaahii men tumhaaraa kis liye aataa hai naam dil ko tadapaataa ho tum aur mujhako tadapaataa hai dil laakh bahalaataa huun threedots

Title: jo samar men ho gae amar main unakii yaad men
Lyrics: jo samar men ho gae amar main unakii yaad men gaa rahii huun aaj shradhdhaanjaliigiit dhanyavaad men  jo samar men ho gae amar threedots  laut kar na aaenge vijay dilaane vaale viir mere giit anjalii men unake lie nayanniir sang phuulpaan ke rang hain nishaan ke shuur viir aan ke jo samar men ho gae amar threedots  vijay ke phuul khil rahe hain phuul adhkhile jhare unake khuun se hamaare khetbaagban hare dhruva hain kraantigaan ke suurya navavihaan ke shuur viir aan ke jo samar men ho gae amar threedots  vo gae ki rah sake svatantrataa svadeshh kii vishva bhar men maanyataa ho mukti ke sandesh kii praan deshpraan ke muurti svaabhimaan ke shuur viir aan ke  jo samar men ho gae amar main unakii yaad men gaa rahii huun aaj shradhdhaanjaliigiit dhanyavaad men

Title: kuchh baat hai tumamen to hamako pahalii nazar men maar gae
Lyrics: kuchh baat hai tumamen to hamako pahalii nazar men maar gae ham pyaar ke qaayal kab the magar ye sach hai tumase haar gae kuchh baat hai threedots  milii kaise kaise nazaaron se nazar pariyon ke kuuche hasiinon ke nagar dil kahe thahar to maine kahaa chal dekhen zaraa kyaa hai nazaaron ke udhar sab mansuube bekaar gae kuchh baat hai threedots  haathon men liyaa hai tabhii jo meraa haath kuchh bhii naa kah ke kahii hain kaii baat nazaren milii to dil ne kahaa ab to ho jaanam ye din hai ki raat kyaa kahate jab haar gae kuchh baat hai threedots

Title: inshaa jii utho ab kuuch karo
Lyrics: inshaajii utho ab kuuch karo is shahar men jii kaa lagaanaa kyaa vahashii ko sukuun se kyaa matalab jogii kaa nagar men thikaanaa kyaa   threedots  is dil ke dariidaa daaman men dekho to sahii socho to sahii jis jholii men sau ched hue us jholii ko phailaanaa kyaa   threedots  shab biitii chaand bhii duub chalaa zanjiir padii daravaaze pe kyon der gaye ghar aaye ho sajanii se karoge bahaanaa kyaa   threedots  jab shahar ke log na rastaa de kyon ban men na jaa bisaraam kare diivaanon kii sii na baat kare to aur kare diivaanaa kyaa   threedots

Title: chhup gaye sitaare nadiyaa kinaare
Lyrics: chhup gaye sitaare nadiyaa kinaare 2 tum naahin aaye piyaa tum naahin aaye chhup gaye sitaare  paanii men tadape chandaa bichaaraa 2 siine men dhadake dil gam kaa maaraa roro ke haare nainaa hamaare tum naahin aaye piyaa tum naahin aaye chhup gaye sitaare  tadapaa rahii hai suunii fazaayen 2 kyaa na sunoge merii sadaayen jhuuthe hain saare vaade tumhaare tum naahin aaye piyaa tum naahin aaye chhup gaye sitaare nadiyaa kinaare tum naahin aaye piyaa tum naahin aaye chhup gaye sitaare

Title: kudaa vo vaqt na laaye ki sogavaar ho tuu
Lyrics: kudaa vo vaqt na laaye ki sogavaar ho tuu  suquun kii niind tujhe bhii haraam ho jaaye terii masarraten paiham tamaam ho jaayen terii hayaat tujhe talkhjaam ho jaaye gamon se aainaaedil udaas ho teraa kudaa vo vaqt na laaye threedots  hujuumeyaas se betaab ho ke rah jaaye gufuuredard se siimaab ho ke rah jaaye teraa shabaab faqat kvaab ho ke rah jaaye guruurehusn saraapaa nayaaz ho teraa kudaa vo vaqt na laaye threedots  kaviil raton ko tuu bhii qaraar ko tarase terii nigaah kisii gamgusaar ko tarase kizaa raqiibaa tamannaa bahaar ko tarase koii jabiin na tere sangeaastaan pe jhuke kudaa vo vaqt na laaye threedots

Title: daayii aankh bole kabhii baayii aankh bole
Lyrics: daayii aankh bole kabhii baayii aankh bole kittii baar ye kivaade bhide kabhii khole  dekh dekh raahen nainaa thakane lage hain piya kis des jaa ke basane lage hain daayi aankh roye kabhi baayi aankh roye   threedots  ek aas duube man kii ek aas jaage jaagiijaagii soye birahan soyiisoyii jaage daayii or dole kabhii baayii or dole   threedots

Title: ye kahaan aa gaye ham yuunhii saath saath chalate
Lyrics: amitaabh main aur meri tanhaaii aksar ye baaten karate hain tum hotii to kaisaa hotaa tum ye kahatii tum vo kahatii  tum is baat pe hairaan hotii tum us baat pe kitanii hansatii  tum hotii to aisaa hotaa tum hotii to vaisaa hotaa  main aur merii tanhaaii aksar ye baaten karate hain  ruu ruu threedots  lataa  ye kahaan aa gaye ham  yuunhii saath saath chalate   terii baahon men hai jaanam mere jismojaan pighalate  2  amitaabh ye raat hai yaa tumhaarii zulfen khulii huii hain hai chaandanii tumhaarii nazaron se meri raate dhulii huii hain ye chaand hai yaa tumhaaraa kangan  sitaare hain yaa tumhaaraa aanchal havaa kaa jhonkaa hai yaa tumhaare badan kii khushabuu  ye pattiyon kii hai sarasaraahat  ke tumane chupake se kuchh kahaa  ye sochataa huun main kabase gumasum ki jabakii mujhako bhii ye khabar hai ki tum nahiin ho kahiin nahiin ho magar ye dil hai ki kah rahaa hai tum yahiin ho yahiin kahiin ho    lataa  tuu badan hai main huun saayaa tu na ho to main kahaan huun  mujhe pyaar karane vaale tuu jahaan hai main vahaan huun  hamen milanaa hii thaa hamadam isii raah pe nikalate  ye kahaan aa gaye ham   meri saans saans mahake koi bhiinaa bhiinaa chandan tera pyaar chaandanii hai meraa dil hai jaise aangan  koi aur bhi mulaayam  meri shaam dhalate dhalate  2  ye kahaan aa gaye ham   amitaabh majabuur ye haalaat idhar bhi hai udhar bhii  tanhaaii ke ye raat idhar bhi hai udhar bhii  kahane ko bahut kuchh hai magar kisase kahen ham  kab tak yuunhii khaamosh rahen aur sahen ham  dil kahataa hai duniyaa kii har ik rasm uthaa den  diivaar jo ham dono men hai aaj giraa den  kyon dil men sulagate rahen logon ko bataa den  haan hamako muhabbat hai mohabbat hai mohabbat hai  ab dil men yahii baat idhar bhi hai udhar bhii   lataa  ye kahaan aa gaye ham ye kahaan aa gaye ham

Title: dekh lii terii khudaaii bas meraa dil bhar gayaa
Lyrics: dekh lii terii khudaaii bas meraa dil bhar gayaa terii rahmat chup rahii main roterote mar gayaa  vo bahaaren naach uthii thiin jhuum uthii thiin badaliyaan apanii qismat yaad aate hii meraa dil dar gayaa  mere maalik kyaa kahuun terii duaaon kaa fareb mujh pe yuun chhaa gayaa ki mujhako ghar se beghar kar gayaa

Title: bhuulanewaale se koii kah de zaraa
Lyrics: bhuulnewaale se koii kah de zaraa   is tarah yaad aane se kyaa faayedaa jab mere dil kii duniyaa basaate nahiin   phir kyaalon men aane kaa kyaa faayedaa  chaar tinke jalaa ke kyaa mil gyaa  mit sakaa naa zamaane se meraa nishaan mujh pe bijlii garaao to jaane sahii   aashiyaan par giraane se kyaa faayedaa  kyaa kahuun aap se kitnii ummiid thii   aap kyaa badle duniyaa badal sii gaii aasraa de ke dil todte hain meraa   is tarah sataane se kyaa faayeda  tum ne muusaa ko naahaq takliif dii  lutf aataa agar yaad karte hamen jin kii aankhon men taabenazzaaraa naa ho   unako jalwaa dikhaane kaa kyaa faayedaa  pahle dil ko buraaii se kar paak tuu   phir kuluuseaqiidat se kar justajuu aise sijdon se allaah miltaa nahiin   har jagaah sar jhukaane se kyaa faayedaa  laakh samjhaayaa tujh ko magar ai shamim  terii hushayaarii aakir naa kaam aa sakii aankh miltii gaii raaz khulte gae   ab haqiiqat chhupaane se kyaa faayedaa

Title: bainyaa na dharo o balamaa na karo mose raar
Lyrics: bainyaa na dharo o balamaa bainyaa na dharo o balamaa bainyaa na dharo o balamaa na karo mose raathreedots r bainyaa na dharo  dhalegii chunariyaa tan se dhalegii chunariyaa tan se threedots tan se threedots aa aa aathreedots dhalegii chunariyaa tan se hansengii re chudiyaan chhan se  hansengii re chudiyaan chhan se threedots chhan se chhan se hansengii re chudiyaan chhan se machegii jhanakaa threedots r threedots bainyaa na dharo threedots na dharo threedots na dharo o balamaa  mohe chhodo hay threedots sajanaa threedots mohe chhodo hay threedots mohe chhodo  mohe  threedots chhodo threedots chhodo sajanaa threedots mohe chhodo hay sajanaa threedots jiyaa siich uthaaye threedots sajanaa jiyaa siich uthaaye threedots uthaaye sajanaa threedots rahaa mohe nihaa threedots r bainyaa na dharo threedots na dharo threedots na dharo o balamaa  main to aap bahakii bahakii main to aap bahakii bahakii bahakii aa threedots aa threedots aa main to aap bahakii bahakii chaluun jaise mahakii mahakii chaluun jaise mahakii threedots mahakii chaluun jaise mahakii chameliyaa kii daa threedots ra bainyaa na dharo o balamaa na karo mose raa threedots ra bainyaa na dharo threedots na dharo threedots na dharo o balamaa

Title: kamar baandhe hue chalane ko yaan sab yaar baithe hain
Lyrics: kamar baandhe hue chalane ko yaan sab yaar baithe hain bahut aage gaye baaqii jo hain taiyyaar baithe hain  na chhed ai nakahatebaadebahaarii raah lag apanii tujhe atakheliyaan suujhii hain ham bezaar baithe hain  tasavvur arsh pe hai aur sar hai paaesaaqii par garaz kuchh aur dhun men is ghadii maikwaar baithe hain  bhalaa gardish falak kii chain detii hai kise inshaa ganiimat hai ke hamasuurat yahaan do chaar baithe hain

Title: main rotaa huun mat manaa karo
Lyrics: main rotaa huun 2 mat manaa karo tum mere aansuu ginaa karo main rotaa huun mat manaa karo  rone men merii duniyaa hai aansuu men merii basatii hai main dukh kaa kaalaa baadal huun giiton men aag barasatii hai tum meraa ronaa sunaa karo  main rotaa huun 2 mat manaa karo  main rokar jiinaa siikh gayaa siikh gayaa phir hans kar ke kyaa karanaa hai bas yaad tumhaarii aankhon men le kar ke paar utaranaa hai tum dukh kaa taanaa bunaa karo  main rotaa huun 2 mat manaa karo  main patajhad men huun badaa sukhii badaa sukhii mat bhuul se sakhii bahaar bano o o o o bhuul se sakhii bahaar bano hai tuutaaphuutaa ghar achchhaa tum mat isakii diiwaar chuno  main rotaa huun 2 mat manaa karo

Lyrics: dil ko huaa tum se pyaar ab hai tumhen iktiyaar chaahe banaa do chaahe mitaa do  takaraa gayaa tum se dil hii to hai roye na ye kyon ghaayal hii to hai ghaayal hii to hai   threedots  vo pyaar se nafarat karate hain ham hain ke unhiin pe marate hain ab kaise nibhe mushkil hii to hai takaraa gayaa tum se   threedots  bedadr ko ai dil yaad na kar tadape jaa yuun hii fariyaad na kar kyon raham kare qaatil hii to hai takaraa gayaa tum se   threedots

Title: jaane ye mujh ko kyaa ho rahaa hai
Lyrics: sahamii sahamii aahen hai dahashat sii man men jaane ye mujh ko kyaa ho rahaa hai yaad un kii dil se jaatii nahiin hai jaane ye mujhako kyaa ho rahaa hai  viiraanagii hai har suu har pattaa hil rahaa hai mere haaledil pe haay aashiyaanaa ro rahaa hai yaad un kii dil se   threedots  vo agar aa bhii paayen ruk paayengii gardishen kyaa jin ki kaatir meraa ye jahaan mit rahaa hai yaad un kii dil se   threedots  jitanii bhii kii hai koshish main ne bhuulane kii unako utanaa hii unakaa mujh par nashaa chhaa rahaa hai yaad un kii dil se   threedots

Title: tuu aaye na aaye terii khushii
Lyrics: tuu aaye na aaye terii khushii ham aas lagaaye baithe hain diidaar kii pyaasii aankhon men tuufaan chhupaaye baithe hain tuu aaye na aaye   threedots  itanaa to bataa de o zaalim ab nazaron se kyon duur hai tuu milanaa hii tujhe manzuur nahiin yaa merii tarah majabuur hai tuu tuu kah de agar ham uth jaayen ham tere bithaaye baithe hain tuu aaye na aaye   threedots  ae dadremuhabbat terii qasam dil hamane lagaa kar dekh liyaa asqon kii zubaanii kissaaegam duniyaa ko sunaa ke dekh liyaa tuufaan se kah do ghir ke uthe ham    baithe hain tuu aaye na aaye   threedots

Title: tum sareaam mulaaqaat se darate kyon ho
Lyrics: tum sareaam mulaaqaat se darate kyon ho ishq karate ho to haalaat se darate kyon ho tum sareaam mulaaqaat se   threedots  ye baataao to zaraa meraa khayaal aate hii din se ghabaraate ho tum raat se darate kyon ho ishq karate ho to   threedots  tum to kahate ho tumhen mujhase muhabbat to nahiin phir judaaii ke khayaalaat se darate kyon ho ishq karate ho to   threedots  mujhase khud aa ke lipat jaanaa sambhal kar hatanaa tez hote huii barasaat se darate kyon ho ishq karate ho to   threedots

Title: tadabiir se bigadii huii taqadiir banaa le taqadiir banaa le
Lyrics: tadabiir se bigadii hui taqadiir banaa le taqadiir banaa le   apane pe bharosaa hai to ye daanv lagaa le  lagaa le daanv lagaa le   2  darataa hai zamaane kii nigaahon se bhalaa kyuun  nigaahon se bhalaa kyuun   2 insaaf tere saath hai ilazaam uthaa le ilazaam uthaa le apane pe bharosaa hain to ye daanv lagaa le lagaa le daanv lagaa le  kyaa khaak vo jiinaa hai jo apane hii liye ho  apane hii liye ho   2 khud mitake kisii aur ko mitane se bachaa le apane pe bharosaa hain to ye daanv lagaa le lagaa le daanv lagaa le  tuute hue patavaar hain kashtii ke to ham kyaa haarii hui baahon ko hii patavaar banaa le patavaar banaa le apane pe bharosaa hain to ye daanv lagaa le lagaa le daanv lagaa le  tadabiir se bigadii hui threedots

Title: unase ummiideruunumaaii hai
Lyrics: unase ummiideruunumaaii hai kyaa nigaahon kii maut aaii hai  is liye hai aziiz mujhako bahaar tere andaaz leke aaii hai  dil kii barbaadiyon pe naazaan huun fatah paakar shikast khaaii hai  vo havaa de rahe hain daaman kii haay kis vaqt niind aaii hai  gul fasurdaa chaman udaas shakiil  yuun bhii aksar bahaar aaii hai

Title: teraa meraa saath rahe ho teraa meraa saath rahe
Lyrics: teraa meraa saath rahe ho teraa meraa saath rahe dhuup ho chhaayaa ho din ho ki raat rahe teraa meraa threedots  dard kii shaam ho yaa sukh kaa saveraa ho sab gavaaraa hai mujhe saath bas teraa ho 3 jiite jii mar ke bhii haath men haath rahe teraa meraa threedots  koii vaadaa naa karen kabhii khaayen na qasam jab kahen bas ye kahen mil ke bichhadenge na ham 3 sab ke honthon pe apanii hii baat rahe teraa meraa threedots  biich ham donon ke koii diivaar na ho tuu kabhii mere kudaa mujhase bezaar na ho 3  pyaar kii priit kii yuun hii barasaat rahe teraa meraa threedots

Title: jab chalii thandii havaa jab uthii kaalii ghataa
Lyrics: jab chalii thandii havaa jab uthii kaalii ghataa  mujhako ai jaanevafaa tum yaad aae    2  zindagii kii daastaan chaahe kitanii ho hansiin bin tumhaare kuchh nahiin  bin tumhaare kuchh nahiin kyaa mazaa aataa sanam  aaj bhuulese kahiin tum bhii aajaate yahiin tum bhii aajaate yahiin ye bahaaren ye fizaa  dekhakar o dilarubaa jaane kyaa dil ko huaa  tum yaad aaye jab chalii threedots  ye nazaare ye samaa  aur phir itane javaan haaye re ye mastiyaan  haaye re ye mastiyaan aisaa lagataa hain mujhe  jaise tum nazadiik ho is chaman se jaanejaan  is chaman se jaanejaan sun ke usakii sadaa dil dhadakataa hain meraa aaj pahalese sivaa tum yaad aae jab chalii threedots

Title: kaise main aauun piyaa paas tumhaare
Lyrics: kaise main aauun piyaa paas tumhaare chaand bhii hai bairii meraa pataa na bataaye teraa  raah na dikhaaye yah sitaare  akhiyon men asuvan diip jalaauun main phir bhii balam terii raah na paauun jaayen bataa de kahaan dadr ke maare dadr ke maare kaise main aauun   kaun ghadii o sainyyaa laagii tose nain re bhuul ke na paayaa merii priit ne chain re do din hans ke na saath guzaare saath guzaare kaise main aauun   yaad sataaye terii dil ghabaraaye re dekh akelii mohe raat daraaye re tadap tadap jiyaa tujhako pukaare tujhako pukaare kaise main aauun

Lyrics: roshanii lene chale the aur andhere chhaa gaye muskuraane bhii na paaye the ke aansuu aa gaye  zindagii ab maut se badhakar bhayaanak ho gaii jiine waale zindagii ke naam se ghabaraa gaye  aah wo manzil jo merii gafalaton se gum huii haay wo rahabar jo mujhako raah se bhatakaa gaye  unako kyaa chaahaa ke ek aalam mukaalif ho gayaa ik kushii kyaa maang lii ke gam ke baadal chhaa gaye

Title: tum ho jaanam meraa jiivan  chandralekhaa
Lyrics: statvsrc00107 100 album tum ho jaanam meraa jiivan teraa hii pyaar hai mere man men   thodii kushiyaan thode gam hain miithii sii aag hai mere tan men   thode shole thodii shabanam donon saath hain mere dil men   chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa  tum ho jaanam meraa jiivan teraa hii pyaar hai mere man men    e bevafaa kuchh to samajh le kyuun jalatii ye shamaa pyaar men   itane tuufaan saanson men kyuun itane saagar aankhon men kyuun   jaane kaise is dil ko bhaa gayaa tuu jaane kaise sapanon men aa gayaa tuu   lut gaii pyaar men   aa zulamii ab aur naa sataa tuu ye jaan merii tere hii naam likh duun   tere qadamon tale rakhaa hai meraa dil terii kushbuu se hii mahakii hai ye mahafil   phuulon saa cheharaa hai mast javaanii hai   tere honthon pe hii merii kahaanii hai  jaanam sun lo tum ho jiivan   teraa hii pyaar hai mere man men  thodii kushiyaan thode gam hain miithii sii aag hai mere tan men  thode shole thodii shabanam donon saath hain mere dil men  chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa  phuulon saa cheharaa hai mast javaanii hai  tere honthon pe hii merii kahaanii hai  tum ho jaanam meraa jiivan teraa hii pyaar hai mere man men  thodii kushiyaan thode gam hain miithii sii aag hai mere tan men  thode shole thodii shabanam donon saath hain mere dil men  chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa chandralekhaa

Lyrics: t  o arapbatii kii chhorii gorii gorii gorii gorii dillii duur nahiin      ajiiho dillii duur nahiin g  koii aayaa chorii chorii chorii chorii chorii chorii dillii duur nahiin     ajiiho dillii duur nahiin  g  laakhon men tumhiin bhaaye t  ye baat tabiiyat kii 2 g  rusavaa na karo hamako t  aadat hai muhabbat kii 2 g  karate ho joraa jorii joraa jorii joraa jorii dillii duur nahiin  g  mahamaan mere galiyon ke anganaa main tere aaii 2     naadaan nanhe dil ko main tere liye laaii laaii laaii t  baaten ye korii korii korii korii korii korii dillii duur nahiin  g  naazon kaa paalaa dil hai kahiin tod na denaa jii t  ham bhii to yahii kahate hain muunh mod na lenaa jii g  dil tod na denaa jii b  rahe sang patang ke dorii gorii gorii gorii gorii dillii duur nahiin

Title: gazab kiyaa tere waade pe aitabaar kiyaa
Lyrics: gazab kiyaa tere waade pe aitabaar kiyaa tamaam raat qayaamat ka intazaar kiyaa  hansaahansaa ke shabewasl ashqabaar kiyaa tasaliyaan mujhe dede ke beqaraar kiyaa  ham aise mahavenazaaraa na the jo hosh aataa magar tumhaare tagaaful ne hoshiyaar kiyaa  fasaanaaeshabegam unako ek kahaanii thii kuchh aitabaar kiyaa kuchh na aitabaar kiyaa   tujhe to waadaaediidaar hamase karanaa thaa ye kyaa kiyaa ke jahaan ko ummiidavaar kiyaa  ye dil ko taab kahaan hai ke ho maan andesh unhon ne waadaa kiyaa hamane aitabaar kiyaa  na puuchh dil kii haqiiqat magar ye kahate hain wo beqaraar rahe jisane beqaraar kiyaa

Title: kar ke waade kaa tumhaare aitabaar
Lyrics: kar ke waade kaa tumhaare aitabaar le liyaa hai umr bhar kaa intazaar  gum andhere men huii hai roshanii phiikiiphiikii lag rahii hai chaandanii phuul murajhaaye huye laaii bahaar  chaunk yuun padataa huun har aawaaz par ungaliyaan pad jaayen jaise saaz par dil kii dhadakan bhii huii hai dil pe baar

Title: janmabhuumi maan
Lyrics: janmabhuumii maan main yahaan tuu wahaan tujhase duur jaa rahaa main jaane kahaan  bhaagya vash mainne jo hai kho dii yaad aatii vo terii godii wo sataanaa chaman maan kar lenaa kshhama janmabhuumii maan   threedots  ye jo apanii biich hai duurii ye hai maan qisamat kii majabuurii kuup hai jananii merii aatmaa janmabhuumii maan   threedots  tujhase shaayad ab na mil paauun ro na mat maan jo na ghar aauun hai abhii baakii meraa intihaan janmabhuumii maan   threedots

Title: saanvalii salonii sii mahabuubaa
Lyrics: saanvalii salonii sii mahabuubaa  terii shuudiyaan shadang kar ke  jaane kaise aas dilaaen  haay haay karen sab ladake		 2  amariikaa ke na jaapaan ke		 2 ham to hain diivaane mulataan ke jaamanii honth saraaekii bole aur kaahon men ras tapake saanvalii salonii threedots  dil aayaa hai jab se shaam pe		 2 ham baithe hain bas aaraam se subah suhaanii raat nashiilii kiyaa karenge pasand karake saanvalii salonii threedots  terii naazuk kalaaii saanvalii          2 jis din se haay ham ne thaam lii jitane the tere chaahane vaale ab jiite hain mar mar ke saanvalii salonii threedots

Title: chale chalo prem ke saathii prem nagar hai jaanaa
Lyrics: chale chalo prem ke saathii prem nagar hai jaanaa raah pe laanaa priit kii chaayaa prem kii paas  basaanaa chale chalo prem ke saathii  koyal pyaarii prem se bolii bolii bolii koyal pyaarii prem se bolii phuul kii kaliyaan sukh se dole dole phuul kii kaliyaan sukh se dole phuul kaa saathii aayaa bhanvaraa gaayaa prem taraanaa 2 chale chalo prem ke saathii  raah  sa chaand banaayaa 2 premiyon kaa man lalachaaya taare saarii mil hua jab 2 dil kii bedh chadaanaa 2 chale chalo prem ke saathii

Title: aaraam ke the saathii kyaa kyaa
Lyrics: bharosaa kar na daulat par na suurat par na chaahat par ye duniyaa hai sadaa rahatii nahiin jo ek haalat par  aaraam ke the saathii kyaa kyaa jab vaqt padaa to koii nahiin sab dost hain apane matalab ke duniyaa men kisii kaa koii nahiin  kal chalate the jo ishaaron par kal chalate the jo ishaaron par ab milatii nahiin hai unakii nazar ab milatii nahiin hai unakii nazar yaa chaahanevaale laakhon the yaa puuchhanevaalaa koii nahiin aaraam ke the saathii kyaa kyaa jab vaqt padaa to koii nahiin jab vaqt padaa to koii nahiin  jaisaa ki hai mujh par vaqt padaa jaisaa ki hai mujh par vaqt padaa aisaa na koii bebas hogaa aisaa na koii bebas hogaa jiine ko sahaaraa koii nahiin marane ko bahaanaa koii nahiin aaraam ke the saathii kyaa kyaa jab vaqt padaa to koii nahiin jab vaqt padaa to koii nahiin

Title: jab apanaa begaanaa ho jaaye tuut dil jaaye
Lyrics: jab apanaa begaanaa ho jaaye tuut dil jaaye phir nikale haayhaay ankhiyaan niir bahaayen  jab apanaa begaanaa ho jaaye tuut dil jaaye  har roz musiibat aatii hai 2 ik naii hii aafat laatii hai 2 gam khaayen to aakir kab tak kab tak thokar khaayen  ankhiyaan niir bahaayen jab apanaa begaanaa ho jaaye tuut dil jaaye  ham jinake the jo hamaare hain 2 dukhdard ke wo bhii maare hain 2 koii aisii suurat ban jaaye ham donon hii mil jaayen  ankhiyaan niir bahaayen jab apanaa begaanaa ho jaaye tuut dil jaaye

Title: saath ho tum aur raat javaan niind kise ab chain kahaan
Lyrics: saath ho tum aur raat javaan niind kise ab chain kahaan kuchh to samajh ai bhole sanam kahatii hai kyaa nazaron kii zubaan  mahakatii havaa chhalakatii ghataa hamase ye dil sambhalataa nahiin kii minnaten manaakar thake karen kyaa ye ab to bahalaataa nahiin dekh ke tumako mahakane lagaa lo bahakane lagaa hasaraton kaa jahaan  ham is raah pe mile is tarah ke ab umr bhar na honge judaa mere saazedil kii aavaaz tum main kuchh bhii nahiin tumhaare binaa aao chalen ham jahaan pyaar se vo gale mil rahe hain zamiin aasmaan

Title: hai ye mausamebahaar
Lyrics: hai ye mausamebahaar sun javaanii kii pukaar dil huaa beqaraar bolo aankhen kar len chaar taa raa raa raa taa raa raa raa   tuu hai phuul main nikhaar tuu hai ruup main singaar tuu javaanii main huun pyaar kyon na honge aankhen chaar kyon na honge aankhen chaar raa raa raa raa raa raa raa raa   merii javaanii naam teraa bole bole merii dil kii duniyaa haay dole dole aajaa haule haule haule haule main huun dilabar tuu diladaar main huun aankhen tuu diidaar main huun nagama tuu sitaar aajaa kar len aankhen chaar aajaa kar len aankhen chaar taa raa raa raa raa raa raa raa   chhede    ko ye raat suhaanii suhaanii haay tadap rahii hai ye javaanii javaanii aajaa raanii o raanii raanii raanii tuu hai husn kii sarakaar main huun ishq kaa saradaar tuu hai bulabul main bahaar kyon na honge aankhen chaar kyon na honge aankhen chaar raa raa raa raa raa raa raa raa   jab chaandanii raat ho aadhii aadhii kare taaron kii chhaanv men  aa jaa saathii o saathii o saathii saathii kar ke solah main singaar ho ke dolii men savaar jaauun saajan ke dvaar jaa ke kar luun aankhen chaar jaa ke kar luun aankhen chaar  ye hai kaantaa kaantaa kaantaa tuu hai phuul phuul phuul tuu hai raanii ye bhikhaarii mat bhuul bhuul bhuul ye hai nakalii raajkumaar is kaa jhuutha hai ye pyaar kar le ham se aankhen chaar kar le ham se aankhen chaar  isane chhiinaa mere dil kaa dukaan  shamashaan shamashaan ye hai meraa raajkumar meraa pahalaa pahalaa pyaar isase karuungii aankhen chaar jaao jhuuthon ke saradaar jaao jhuuthon ke saradaar raa raa raa raa raa raa raa raa  raa raa raa raa raa raa raa raa

Title: sapanon ke shahar ham banaayenge ghar
Lyrics: sapanon ke shahar  ham banaayenge ghar pal bhar men ye banaa ye giraa  chaandii kaa rang hiire kaa ruup ghar par mere sone kii dhuup kal tak jo thaa hogaa na kal dil kaa meraa shiish mahal kho gayii roshanii sapanon ke shahar  ham banaayenge ghar threedots  ghar ko banaa dar ko sajaa kisake liye main hun khadaa tum bekhabar  main huun magar tanahaa padaa patthar ke ghar tum nahiin kuchh nahiin sapanon ke shahar  ham banaayenge ghar threedots  kyon ho judaa mujhase khafaa aa jaao tum na do sazaa mausam hanse gulashan hanse ghar par mere aangan hanse ro rahaa dil meraa sapanon ke shahar  ham banaayenge ghar threedots

Title: jab tere pyaar kaa afasaanaa likhaa hai mainne
Lyrics: jab tere pyaar kaa afasaanaa likhaa hai mainne har jagah apane ko diiwaanaa likhaa hai mainne  bekudii ne mujhe phir hosh men aane na diyaa terii aankhon ko hii maikaanaa likhaa hai mainne  kaun huun kyaa huun mujhe apanii kabar kuchh bhii nahiin aaj kud apane ko begaanaa likhaa hai mainne  jabase dekhaa hai tere ghar men bahaaron kaa hujuum apane is ghar ko hii viiraanaa likhaa hai mainne

Title: yaa rab gamehijraan men itanaa to kiyaa hotaa
Lyrics: yaa rab gamehijraan men itanaa to kiyaa hotaa jo haath jigar par hai wo dasteduaa hotaa  ik ishq kaa gam aafat aur us pe je dil aafat yaa gam naa diyaa hotaa yaa dil na diyaa hotaa  naakaametamannaadil is soch men rahataa hai yuun hotaa to kyaa hotaa yuun na hotaa to kyaa hotaa  ummiid to bandh jaatii taskiin to ho jaatii vaadaa na wafaa karate waadaa to kiyaa hotaa  gairon se kahaa tumnae gairon se sunaa tumane kuchh hamase kahaa hotaa kuchh hamase sunaa hotaa

Lyrics: ab kahaan pyaar men paakiizagii kaa naamonishaan jism kii bhuuk hai aur isake siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin  wo sadii biit chukii jisamen the lailaa majanuu aaj to sirf hai duniyaa men dikhaave kaa junuun aur phir dhuundhate phirate hain muhabbat kaa sukuun in iraadon men gunaahon ke siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin  zulm hotaa hai andheron men hawas palatii hai jisamen taaqat hai yahaan usakii sadaa chalatii hai zakm taazaa hain magar phir bhii chhurii chalatii hai marz kuchh aise bhii hain jinakii dawaa kuchh bhii nahiin

Lyrics: tuu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye  2  naa ho tuu udaas tere paas paas main rahuungaa zindagii bhar   2 saare sansaar kaa pyaar main ne tujhii men paayaa tuu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye  2  chandaa tujhe dekhane ko nikalaa karataa hai aainaa bhii o threedots didaar ko tarasaa karataa hai itanii hasiin koii nahiin  2 husna dono jahaan kaa ek tujhame simat ke aayaa tuu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye darling every breath you take every move you make i will be there what will i do without you i want to love you forever and ever and ever pyaar kabhii marataa nahiin ham tuu marate hain hote hain vo log amar pyaar jo karate hain jitanii adaa utanii vafaa  2 ik nazar pyaar se dekh lo phir se zindaa karado  tuu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye  2  naa ho tuu udaas tere paas paas main rahuungaa zindagii bhar  2 saare sansaar kaa pyaar maine tujhii men paayaa tuu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye  2   gam hai kise ho saraa jahaan chaahe dushmana ho kyaa chaahiye haathon men jo teraa daaman ho tuu hai jahaan manzil vahaan  2 dhadakanon kii tarah apane dil men mujhako chhupaa lo tu mile dil khile aur jiine ko kyaa chaahiye

Lyrics: ye zindagii  aaj jo tumhaare badan kii chhotiibadii nason men machal rahii hai tumhaare pairon se chal rahii hai  ye zindagii  tumhaarii aavaaz men gale se nikal rahii hai tumhaare lafzon men dhal rahii hai  ye zindagii  jaane kitanii sadiyon se yuunhii shaqalen badal rahii hai  badalatii shaqalen badalate jismon men chalataaphirataa ye ik sharaaraa jo is ghadii naam hai tumhaaraa isii se saarii shahalpahal hai isii se roshan hai har nazaaraa  sitaare todo yaa ghar basaao qalam uthaao yaa sar jhukaao  tumhaarii aankhon kii roshnii tak hai khel saaraa  ye khel hogaa nahiin dubaaraa ye khel hogaa nahiin dubaaraa

Lyrics: ai dil tujhe qasam hai tuu himmat na haaranaa din zindagii ke jaise bhii guzare guzaaranaa ai dil tujhe qasam hai   threedots  ulfat ke raaste men milenge hazaar gam ban jaaye jaan par bhii to gam se na haaranaa ai dil tujhe qasam hai   threedots  rone se kam na honge kabhii terii mushakilen bigade hue nasiib ko hans kar sanvaaranaa ai dil tujhe qasam hai   threedots  duniyaa sitam kare to na karanaa gilaa koii jo tere ho chuke hain tuu unako pukaaranaa ai dil tujhe qasam hai   threedots

Lyrics: tadap ai dil taapane se zaraa aaraam aataa hai ki lab par har tadap ke saath unakaa naam aataa hai  jise sun kar merii duniyaa khushii se jhuum uthatii thii na vo aavaaz aatii hai na vo paigaam aataa hai  tujhe main kyaa bataauun kis tarah tujh ko ye samajhaauun tere aane se is dil ko badaa aaraam aataa hai  lagaa le zor ye duniyaa na badalegii vafaa apanii badal jaaye vafaa to ishq par ilzaam aataa hai

Title: phir koii aayaa  ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aayegaa
Lyrics: phir koii aayaa dilezaar  nahiin koii nahiin raahrau hogaa kahiin aur chalaa jaayegaa dhal chukii raat bikharne lagaa taaron kaa ghubaar ladkhadaane lage aiwaanon men khwaabeeda chiraagh so gayii raasta taktak ke har ik raahguzar ajnabii khaak ne dhundhlaa diye qadmon ke suraagh gul karo shamen badhaa do maiomeenaaoayaagh apne bekhwaab kivaadon ko muqaffal kar lo ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aayegaa

Title: ai gulabadan ai gulabadan phuulon kii mahak kaanton kii chubhan
Lyrics: ai gulabadan ai gulabadan phuulon kii mahak kaanton kii chubhan tujhe dekh ke kahataa hai meraa man kahiin aaj kisii se muhabbat naa ho jaae  kyaa hasiin mod par aa gaii zindagaanii kii haqiiqat na ban jaae merii kahaanii jab aahen bhare ye thandii pavan siine men sulag uthatii hai agan tujhe dekh ke threedots  kyaa ajiib rang men saj rahii hai kudaaii kii har ik chiiz maalik ne sundar banaaii nadiyaa kaa chamakataa hai darapan mukadaa dekhen sapanon kii dulhan tujhe dekh ke threedots  main tumhiin se yuun aankhen milaataa chalaa huun ki tumhiin ko main tumase churaataa chalaa huun mat puuchho meraa diivaanaapan aakaash se uunchii dil kii udan tujhe dekh ke threedots

Title: ham ne dekhii hai in aankhon kii mahakatii khushabuu
Lyrics: ham ne dekhii hai in aankhon kii mahakatii khushabuu haath se chhuuke ise rishton kaa ilzaam na do sirf ehasaas hai ye ruuh se mahasuus karo pyaar ko pyaar hii rahane do koii naam na do ham ne dekhii hai threedots  pyaar koii bol nahiin pyaar aavaaz nahiin ek khaamoshii hai sunatii hai kahaa karatii hai naa ye bujhatii hai naa rukatii hai naa thaharii hai kahiin nuur kii buund hai sadiyon se bahaa karatii hai sirf ehasaas hai ye ruuh se mahasuus karo pyaar ko pyaar hii rahane do koii naam naa do ham ne dekhii hai threedots  muskaraahat sii khilii rahatii hai aankhon men kahiin aur palakon pe ujaale se chhupe rahate hain honth kuchh kahate nahiin kaanpate honthon pe magar kitane khaamosh se afasaane ruke rahate hain sirf ehasaas hai ye ruuh se mahasuus karo pyaar ko pyaar hii rahane do koii naam naa do ham ne dekhii hai threedots

Title: ham intazaar karenge teraa qayaamat tak
Lyrics: ham intazaar karenge  ham intazaar karenge teraa qayaamat tak khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae  2 ham intazaar karenge  bujhiibujhii sii nazar men terii talaash liye bhatakate phirate hain ham aap apanii laash liye yahii junuun yahii vahashat ho yahii junuun yahii vahashat ho aur tuu aae khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae ham intazaar karenge  na denge ham tujhe ilzaam bevafaaii kaa magar gilaa to karenge terii judaaii kaa tere khilaaf shikaayat ho  tere khilaaf shikaayat ho aur tuu aae khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae ham intazaar karenge  ye zindagii tere qadamon men daal jaaenge tujhii ko terii amaanat sanbhaal jaaenge hamaaraa aalamerukhasat ho hamaaraa aalamerukhasat ho aur tuu aae khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae ham intazaar karenge    aa	ham intazaar karenge  	ham intazaar karenge teraa qayaamat tak 	khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae  2 	ham intazaar karenge  	ye intazaar bhii ek imtihaan hotaa hai 	isii se ishq kaa sholaa javaan hotaa hai 	ye intazaar salaamat ho haay  	ye intazaar salaamat ho aur tuu aae 	khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae 	ham intazaar karenge  	bichhaae shauq se sajade vafaa kii raahon men 	khade hain diid kii hasarat lie nigaahon men 	qubuul dil kii ibaadat ho haay 	qubuul dil kii ibaadat ho  aur tuu aae 	khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae 	ham intazaar karenge  ra	vo khushanasiib hai jisako tuu intakhaab kare  2 	khudaa hamaarii muhabbat ko kaamayaab kare 	javaan sitaaraaeqismat ho 	javaan sitaaraaeqismat ho aur tuu aae 	khudaa kare ki qayaamat ho aur tuu aae 	ham intazaar karenge

Title: juuhii merii jaanejaan main huun teraa diivaanaa
Lyrics: juuhii merii jaanejaan main huun teraa diivaanaa tere bin gaae naa tuu hai nagamaa suhaanaa dekhuun tujhe chaahuun tujhe har jagah paauun tujhe mere hasiin khvaabon kaa hai tuu sangam juuhii merii jaanejaan threedots  bhor ujiyaalii sii tuu hai dhuup suriilii tuu hai shaam kii laalii men tuu hai raat nashiilii tuu hai baag men bhanvaraa jo aataa giit tere hii gaataa jhonkaa tujhako jab chhuu jaataa khushbuu terii hii laataa dekhuun tujhe chaahuun threedots  os ke darpan men tuu hai jharanaa jhilamil tuu hai mor ke nartan men tuu hai barakhaa rimajhim tuu hai udataa baadal bhii ruk jaataa piichhe tere vo aataa chalataa mausam bhii tham jaataa saath tere vo aataa dekhuun tujhe chaahuun threedots

Title: phuulon kii zubaan kubasuurat ho gaii
Lyrics: aa phuulon kii zubaan kubasuurat ho gaii     dekho daastaan kubasuurat ho gaii     o tumhaarii baanhon kii jholiyon se bahaaren barasiin to ye fizaa     haan kubasuurat ho gaii     phuulon kii zubaan threedots  ki  aakaash koraa hai aur chaand kanwaaraa hai     taaron ke hothon pe naam tumhaaraa hai  2 aa tumhaare naam se jodaa hai naam to badanaam ye daastaan     haan kubasuurat ho gaii     phuulon kii zubaan kubasuurat ho gaii ki dekho daastaan kubasuurat ho gaii  aa  byaahii bahaaron men koii ruuthe manaanaa hai     miithe se bolon se tumako bulaanaa hai  2 ki tumhaare lab se sunii hai jabase     tumhaarii ruuthii huii ye naa      kubasuurat ho gaii     phuulon kii zubaan kubasuurat ho gaii aa dekho daastaan kubasuurat ho gaii ki tumhaarii baanhon kii jholiyon se bahaaren barasiin to ye fizaa     haan kubasuurat ho gaii aa phuulon kii zubaan threedots

Title: ai dil hamen itanaa bataa
Lyrics: ai dil hamen itanaa bataa marate hain ham jinake liye kaise chale unako pataa ai dil hamen itanaa bataa dil hii agar ek dadr ho to kyaa karen dil kii davaa ai dil hamen itanaa bataa   threedots  jinhen hamane niindon men kvaabon men paalaa vo aankhon kii thandak vo dil kaa ujaalaa hain betaab ham bhii ye vo maanate hain magar voh ishaaron ko kam jaanate hain zamaane kii nazaron se hamane bahchaa ke unhen dhadakanon men rakhaa hai chhupaa ke  vo cheharaa koii aainaa bhii na dekhe koii aur to kyaa kudaa bhii na dekhe  maangii hai ye dil ne duaa marate hain ham jinake liye kaise chale unako pataa dil hi agar ek dadr ho   threedots  ye dil jinakii chaahat men paagal banaa hai unhen kyaa khabar hai hamen kyaa huaa hai unhen kyaa pataa kyaa hai haalat hamaarii tadapatii hai kaise mohabbat hamaarii ye dil keh raha hai dhadakate dhadakate vo aayenge ek din tadapate tadapate  hamaare hain vo unako paa ke rahenge agar mil na paaye to ham chhiin lenge  ham kuchh nahiin unake binaa marate hain ham jinake liye kaise chale unako pataa dil hii agar ek dadr ho to kyaa karen dil kii davaa ai dil hamen itanaa bataa   threedots

Title: rangbirangii raakhii leke aaii bahanaa
Lyrics: rangbirangii raakhii leke aaii bahanaa o raakhii bandhavaa le mere viir 2  koras rangbirangii raakhii threedots mere viir  main na chaandii na sone ke naar maanguun koras main na chaandii na bhaiyaa sone ke naar maanguun apane bhaiyaa kaa thodaa saa pyaar maanguun thodaa saa pyaar maanguun is raakhii men pyaar chhupaa le laaii bahanaa  koras raakhii bandhavaale mere viir  niile ambar se taare utaar laauun koras niile ambar se bhaiyaa taare utaar laauun yaa main  chandaa kii kiranon ke haar laauun kiranon ke haar laauun pyaar ke badale ban le laharaaii bahanaa  koras raakhii bandhavaale mere viir  kabhii bhaiyaa ye bahanaa na paas hogii koras kabhii bhaiyaa ye terii bahanaa na paas hogii  kahiin pardes baithii udaas hogii bahanaa udaas hogii milane kii aas hogii jaane kab bichhad jaaen bhaaiibahanaa  koras raakhii bandhavaale mere viir

Title: yaad na aaye koii
Lyrics: yaad na aaye koii lahuu na rulaaye koii yaad na aaye koii  haay akhiyon men baithaa thaa akhiyon se uth ke jaane kis desh gayaa  jogii meraa jogii ve raanjhaa meraa raanjhadaa meraa daraveshh gayaa rabbaa duur na jaaye koii yaad na aaye koii   threedots  shaam ke diye ne aankh bhii na kholii andhaa kar gayii raat  jalaa bhii nahiin thaa deh kaa baalan koyalaa kar gayii raat rabbaa aur na jalaaye koii yaad na aaye koii   threedots

Title: badii duur se aaye hain pyaar kaa tohafaa laaye hain
Lyrics: rafi badii duur se aaye hain pyaar kaa tohafaa laaye hain apanaalo yaa thukaraado pyaar kaa tohafaa laaye hain   jo dilon ke naate hain vo jode nahiin jaate jod liye to threedots phir tode nahiin jaate  ye naate dil men basaaye sajaaye hain pyaar kaa tohafaa threedots  anjaane logon men koi saathii to milegaa koi to hogaa jo hamako samajhegaa ye sapanaa dil men sajaaye hain pyaar kaa tohafaa threedots  dono ham yaar hain yaaron ke nibhaa denge yaarii yaarii hai hamako saarii duniyaa se pyaarii  apanaa to dil hai saada phiratii hai atal iraade hai jaan se pyaaraa vaadaa vaadaa kabhii na todenge jiitejii ham yaaron kaa saath naa chhodenge  rafii sahaare yaaron ke paaye hain   pyaar kaa tohafaa threedots

Title: ye safar bahut hai kathiin magar
Lyrics: dil naa ummiid to nahiin naakaam hii to hai  lambii hai gam kii shaam magar shaam hii to hai   ye safar bahut hai kathin magar  na udaas ho mere hamasafar   1 ye sitam kii raat hai dhalane ko  hai andheraa gam kaa pighalane ko  zaraa der is men lage agar na udaas threedots   2 nahiin rahanevaalii ye mushkilen  ye hain agale mod pe manzilen  merii baat kaa tuu yakiin kar na udaas threedots   3 kabhii dhundh legaa ye kaaravaan  vo naii zamiin nayaa aasamaan  jise dhuundhatii hai terii najar na udaas threedots

Title: muhabbat ne kaise diye hamako dhokhe
Lyrics: muhabbat ne kaise diye hamako dhokhe muhabbat ne kaise diye hamako dhokhe chale vo sautaniyaa ke merii galii hoke jii merii galii hoke  tham ai dardeulfat na kar haaye haaye na kar haaye haaye aaaaaaaa tham ai dardeulfat na kar haaye haaye na kar haaye haaye merii yaad aise men kyuun unako aaye merii yaad aise men kyuun unako aaye vo jaaye jahaan jii ho koii na toke chale vo sautaniyaa ke merii galii hoke jii merii galii hoke  muhabbat ne kaise diye hamako dhokhe chale vo sautaniyaa ke merii galii hoke jii merii galii hoke  muhabbat ne ik baat hamako sikhaaii jii hamako sikhaaii aaaaaaaa muhabbat ne ik baat hamako sikhaaii jii hamako sikhaaii kabhii dil kii haaye labon pe na aaii kabhii dil kii haaye labon pe na aaii meraa kyaa hai mar hii to jaauungii ro ke ro ro ke ro ro ke chale vo sautaniyaa ke merii galii hoke jii merii galii hoke  muhabbat ne kaise diye hamako dhokhe chale vo sautaniyaa ke merii galii hoke jii merii galii hoke

Title: hasiin hai raat magar wo mere qariib nahiin
Lyrics: hasiin hai raat magar wo mere qariib nahiin wo merii chaah karen ye meraa nasiib nahiin  wo hamasafar jo mere gam ko hans ke sahate the jo raat din mere kwaabon men duube rahate the wo mujhako bhuul gaye baat ye ajiib nahiin  ye pyaar karane kii kisane mujhe sazaa dii hai mere nadiim ki duniyaa merii mitaa dii hai jo mere saath chale aaj wo habiib nahiin

Title: dharatii kii god men
Lyrics: dharatii kii god me aasamaan ke chhaanv me kab se khadaa hai yah taaj chhupaae man me muhabbat kaa raaz ke sun lo isakii dil kii aavaaz  duniyaa ke aashiiqon duniyaa ke premiiyon sun lo muhabbat kaa raaz patnii ke vaaste biivii ke vaaste banataa yahaan aisaa taaj banataa yahaan aisaa taaj biivii ko chhod ke gairon se jor ke tode jo apanon se priit paison ke vaaste aisii mahalon men gaayaa nahiin jaae giit kabhii gaayaa nahiin jaae giit  begam ke ruup men soyaa hain pyaar yahaan aahistaa aahistaa bol apane jigar ko shaahenashaah ke is premii kaleje se tol mandir ye pyaar kaa tiirath sansaar kaa ulafat kaa hai ye mazahaar bhatake hue ko kehataa hai baar baar sun lo re is kii pukaar sun lo re is kii pukaar

Title: siine men sulagate hain aramaan aankhon men udaasii chhaaii hain
Lyrics: talat sine men sulagate hain aramaan aankhon men udaasi chhaai hai ye aaj teri duniyaa se hamen taqadir kahaan le aai hai sine men sulagate hain aramaan  lata  kuchh aankh men aansu baaki hain jo mere gam ke saathi hain  2 ab dil hain naa dil ke aramaan hain  2 bas main hun meri tanhaai hai sine men sulagate hain aramaan  talat na tujhase gilaa koi hamako na koi shikaayat duniyaa se do chaar kadam jab manzil thii  2 qismat ne thokar khaai hai sine men sulagate hain aramaan  lata  kuchh aisi aag lagi man men jine bhi naa de marane bhi naa de threedots chup hun to kalejaa jalataa hai  2 bolun to terii rusavaai hai  both  sine men sulagate hain aramaan

Title: aise chup hain ki ye manzil bhii kadii ho jaise
Lyrics: aise chup hain ki ye manzil bhii kadii ho jaise teraa milanaa bhii judaaii kii ghadii ho jaise  apane hii saaye se har gaam laraz jaataa huun raaste men koii diiwaar khadii ho jaise  manzilen duur bhii hain manzilen nazadiik bhii hain apane hii paanv men zanjiir padii ho jaise  kitane naadaan hain tere bhuulane waale ki tujhe yaad karane ke liye umr padii ho jaise  aaj dil khol ke roye hain to yuun kush hain faraaz chand lamhon kii ye raahat bhii badii ho jaise

Lyrics: aap jaisaa koii merii zindagii men aaye to baat ban jaaye haan haan baat ban jaaye   threedots  phuul ko bahaar bahaar ko chaman dil ko dil badan ko badan har ksii ko chaahiye tanman kaa milan kaash mujh par asiaa dil aapakaa bhii aaye to baat ban jaaye   threedots  main inasaan huun farishtaa nahiin dar hai bahak na jaauun kahiin tanhaa dil na sambhalegaa pyaar binaa ye tadapegaa aap saa kahaan hai dil aap ko hii paaye to baat ban jaaye   threedots

Title: ye baaten jhuuthii baaten hain
Lyrics: ye baaten jhuuthii baaten hain  ye logon ne phailaai hain  tum inshaa jii kaa naam na lo  2 kya inshaa jii saudaaii hain  ye baaten threedots  hain laakhon rog zamaane men  kyon ishq hai rusavaa bechaaraa  hain aur bhii vajahen vahashat kii  insaan ko rakhatii dukhiyaaraa  haan bekal bekal rahata hai  vo priit men jisane dil haaraa  par shaam se leke subahon talak  yuun kaun khade hai aavaaraa  ye baaten threedots  gar ishq kiyaa hai tab kyaa hai  kyon saaj nahii aavaaj nahiin  jo jaan liye bin tal naa sake  ye aisii bhii ustaad nahiin  ye baat to tum bhii maanoge  vo kaish nahiin farahaa nahiin kya hibra kaa daaru mushkil hai  kya fasl kii mushte yaad nahiin  ye baaten threedots  jo hamase kaho ham karate hain  kya insaan ko samajhanaa hai  us ladakii se bhii kah lenge  go ab kuchh aur zamanaa hai  ya chhode ya tasalim karen    ye kaisaa gorakh dhandhaa hai  ye kaisaa taanaa baanaa hai  ye baaten threedots

Lyrics: bhalaa bataavo apane man kii piir mitaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise  2 priit kiye par pachhataataa huun paagal man ko samajhaataa huun par ye ulajhan men adhiir hai dhiir dharaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise bhalaa bataavo apane man kii piir mitaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise  aag lagii thii bujhaa na paayaa apane sukh kaa mahal jalaayaa suukh gaye nainan ke ansuwaa niir bahaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise bhalaa bataavo apane man kii piir mitaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise  jisako mainne samajhaa apanaa wo thaa do chhan kaa hii sapanaa 2 ab bhuulon kii mitatii nahiin lakiir mitaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise bhalaa bataavo apane man kii piir mitaauun kaise piir mitaauun kaise bhalaa bataavo

Lyrics: jis ko naa taaberaks ho baarewafaa uthaaye kyuun wasl men intazaar kyaa hizr men haayhaay kyuun  kyuun na azal men ho gaye raddobisaat sau chale  husn agar ho mutamain ishq se aazamaaye kyuun  mujhako hai teraa intazaar isaliye huun main beqaraar gar naa ho tujhape aitabaar to phirphir aa na jaaye kyuun  wahashatedil huii fizuul kyaa rageroshan ho ai zunuun maddenazar jo aashiqii usakii galii men aaye kyuun

Lyrics: saanuu  ho ho ho ho  ho ho  ho ho oh oh  ho aah haa haa   jiitaa huun jisake liye jisake liye marataa huun 2  bas tu hii vo ladakii hai jise main pyaar karataa huun 2  jiitaa huun jisake liye jisake liye marataa huun 2  bas tuu hii vo ladakii hai jise main pyaar karataa huun 2   saanuu tera hii charchaa teri hii baaten  lab pe tera naam hai 2   alakaa dilabar qasam se tere hii dam se  meri subah shaam hai 2   saanuu hamaarii vafaa ke gavaah hai zamiin aasamaan   alakaa bas tu hii vo ladakaa hai  jise men pyaar karatii huun   saanuu bas tu hii vo ladakii hai  jise men pyaar karataa huun   alakaa mere bahaane meri mohabbat  tu hai meri aarazuu 2   saanuu dekhuun jise men aankhon men bhar ke  hai vohii khvaab tu 2   alakaa main kaise jiuungii tere bin  tu hai meri jaan   saanuu bas tu hii vo ladakii hai  jise men pyaar karataa huun   alakaa bas tu hii vo ladakaa hai  jise men pyaar karatii huun   alakaa jiitii huun jisake liye  jisake liye maratii huun  bas tu hii vo ladakaa hai  jise men pyaar karatii huun   saanuu bas tu hii vo ladakii hai   alkaa bas tu hii vo ladakaa hai  dono jise men pyaar

Lyrics: rahii hai daad talab unakii shokhiyaan hamase adaa shanaas to bahut hain magar kahaan hamase  sunaa diye the kabhii kuchh galatsalat kisse vo aaj tak hain usii tarah badagumaan hamase  ye kunj kyun naa ziaarat gahe muhabbat ho mile the vo inhii pedon ke darmiyaan hamase  ham hii ko zoqenazaaraa nahiin rahaa varanaa ishaare aaj bhii karatii hain khidakiyaan hamase  har ek nashe men tere badan kaa khayaal naa jaane tut gai kai suraahiyaan hamase

Title: o meraa dil thaa akelaa tuune khel aisaa khelaa baaziigar o baaziigar
Lyrics: a  o meraa dil thaa akelaa tune khel aisaa khelaa terii yaad me jaaguun raat bhar baaziigar o baaziigar tu hai badaa jaadugar baaziigar o baaziigar tu hai badaa jaadugar o meraa dil thaa akelaa tune khel aisaa khelaa terii yaad me jaaguun raat bhar  ku baaziigar mai baaziigar dilavaalon kaa mai dilavar baaziigar mai baaziigar dilavaalon kaa mai dilavar  o dil leke dil diyaa hai saudaa pyaar kaa kiyaa hai dil kii baazii jitaa dil haar kar  a baaziigar o baaziigar tu hai badaa jaadugar  chupake se aankhon ke raste tu mere dil me samaayaa chahat kaa jaadu jagaake mujhako divaanaa banaayaa  ku pahalii nazar me banii hai tu mere sapanon kii raanii yaad rakhegii ye duniyaa apanii vafaa kii kahaanii  a o  meraa chain churaake merii ninden udaake kho naa jaanaa kisii mod par ku baaziigar mai baaziigar dilavaalon kaa mai dilavar a baaziigar o baaziigar tu hai badaa jaadugar  ku o dil leke dil diyaa hai saudaa pyaar kaa kiyaa hai dil kii baazii jitaa dil haar kar a baaziigar o baaziigar ku baaziigar mai baaziigar dhak dhak dhadakataa hai ye dil a bolo naa kyaa kah rahaa hai ku paas aao bata duun al na babaa dar lag rahaa hai  ku mujhako galat naa samajhanaa main hii huun baadal aavaaraa dil kii divaaron pe mainne naam likhaa hai tumhaaraa  a o  tere pyaar pe qurabaan meraa dil merii jaan tujhe lag jaaye merii umar  baaziigar o baaziigar tu hai badaa jaadugar  ku baaziigar main baaziigar dilavaalon kaa mai dilavar  a o meraa dil thaa akelaa tune khel aisaa khelaa terii yaad me jaaguun raat bhar baaziigar o baaziigar ku baaziigar mai baaziigar a baaziigar o baaziigar ku baaziigar mai baaziigar

Lyrics: bhagavaan bhagavaan threedots bhagavaan o duniyaa ke rakhavaale sun dard bhare mere naale sun dard bhare mere naale aash niraash ke do rangon se  duniyaa tuune sajaai nayyaa sang tuufaan banaayaa  milan ke saath judaai jaa dekh liyaa harajaai o threedots lut gai mere pyaar kii nagarii  ab to niir bahaa le ab to niir bahaa le  o threedots ab to niir bahaa le o duniyaa ke rakhavaale threedots  aag banii saavan kii barasaa phuul bane angaare naagan ban gaii raat suhaanii patthar ban gae taare sab tuut chuke hain sahaare o threedots jiivan apanaa vaapas le le jiivan dene vaale o duniyaa ke rakhavaale threedots  chaand ko dhuundhe paagal suuraj shaam ko dhuundhe saveraa main bhii dhuundhuun us priitam ko ho naa sakaa jo meraa bhagavaan bhalaa ho teraa o threedots qismat phuutii aas na tuutii paanv men pad gae chhaale o duniyaa ke rakhavaale threedots  mahal udaas aur galiyaan suunii chupchup hain diivaaren dil kyaa ujadaa duniyaa ujadii ruuth gai hain bahaaren ham jiivan kaise guzaaren o threedots mandir girataa phir ban jaataa dil ko kaun sambhaale o duniyaa ke rakhavaale threedots  o duniyaa ke rakhavaale rakhavaale rakhavaale rakhavaale threedots  throat bleeding pitch

Lyrics: jab pukaaraa hai tujhe apanii sadaa aaii hai dil kii diiwaar se lipatii huii tanhaaii hai  hai koii jauharii ashqon ke nagiinon kaa yahaan aankh baazaar men ik jinsegiraan laaii hai  dil kii bastii men tum aaye ho kyaa paaoge ab yahaan koii tamaashaa na tamaashaaii hai  dil bhii aabaad hai ik shaharekamoshaan kii tarah har taraf log magar aalametanhaaii hai  jis kii aankhon se barasatii hain lahuu kii buunden ye wohii mohasineaashuftaaosaudaaii hai

Title: sunii sunaayii baat nahiin hai
Lyrics: der lagii aane men tum ko shukar hai phir bhii aaye to aas ne dil kaa saath na chhodaa vaise ham ghabaraaye to  shafaaq dhanak mahataab ghataen taare nagamen bijalii phuul kyaakyaa us daaman men hai vo daaman haath men aaye to  sunii sunaayii baat nahiin hai apane uupar biitii hai phuul nikalate hain sholon se chaahat aag lagaye to  jhuuth hai sab taariik hameshaa apane ko dohoraatii hai achchhaa meraa kvaabejavaanii thodaa saa doharaaye to  chaahat ke badale men ham to bech den apanii marzii tak koii mile to dil kaa gaahak koii hamen apanaaye to  kyon ye maharangez tabassum maddenazar jab kuchh bhii nahiin haay agar koii anjaan agar is dhokhe men aa jaaye to  naadaanii aur majabuurii men yaaro kuchh to farq karo ek bebas insaan kare kyaa tuut ke dil aa jaaye to

Title: subaha na aaii shaam na aaii
Lyrics: khushii jisane khojii vo dhan leke lautaa hansii jisane khojii chaman leke lautaa magar pyaar ko khojane jo chalaa vo na tan leke lautaa na man leke lautaa  subaha na aaii shaam na aaii 2 jis din teri yaad na aaii yaad na aaii  subaha na aaii shaam na aaii   kaisii lagan lagi ye tujh se kaisii lagan ye lagi  hansi kho gaii khushii kho gai  aansuu tak sab rahan ho gaii  arthii tak sab nilaam ho gaii 2  duniyaa ne dushmani nibhaai yaad na aaii  subaha na aaii shaam na aaii   tum mil jaate to ho jati puurii apanii raam kahani  ghar ghar taaj mahal ban jaataa ganga jal aankhon kaa pani  saanson ne hathakadii lagaai yaad na aaii  subaha na aaii shaam na aaii   jaise bhi ho tum aa jaao  aag lagi hai tan men aur man men 2  ek taar kii duurii hai 2  bas daaman aur qafan men  huii maut ke sang sagaai yaad na aaii   aa jaao aa jaao aa jaao

Lyrics: rang rang ke phuul khile hain mohe bhaaye koii rang naa ab aan milo sajanaa diipak sang patangaa naache koii mere sang naa ab aan milo sajanaa   threedots sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa sajanaa threedots  dhuundhate tohe taaro ke chhanv men kitane kaante chubhe mere paanv men tuune suurat dikhaayii na zaalimaa paradesii huaa rah ke gaanv men o oy shaabaa shaabaa priit miit bin suunaa suunaa laage moraa anganaa o ab aan milo sajanaa   threedots  aayii baagon men phuulo kii savaariyaan mele kii ho gayii sab taiyyaariyaan teraa meraa milan kab hogaa milii priitam se sab panahaariyaan o oy shaabaa shaabaa duur duur rah ke jiine se main aa jaauun tang naa o ab aan milo sajanaa   threedots  kaise puuchhuun main prem kii paheliyaan sang hotii hain terii saheliyaan ve channaa kis dam kiyaa ye saheliyaan meriyaa raataa ne giniyaa akeliyaan o o shaabaa shaabaa raat raat bhar niind na aaye khankhan khanake kanganaa o ab aan milo sajanaa   threedots

Lyrics: lataa		ye nayii nayii priit hai 		tuu hii to meraa miit hai 		naa jaane koii saajanaa  		ye terii merii daastaan 	 talat		samaa hai ye pyaar kaa 		naye iqaraar kaa 		naa ho koii jahaan  		banaa len vahiin aashiyaan 	 lataa		ye nayii nayii priit hai 	 lataa		nazar tumase milii aise 		ke ham sharmaa gaye talat		pukaaraa jab tere dil ne 		to phir ham aa gaye   2 lataa		kasam tumhen pyaar kii 		isii iqaraar kii 		naa jaane koii saajanaa  		ye terii merii daastaan talat		samaa hai ye pyaar kaa 	 talat		nigaahon hii nigaahon men 		kaho kyaa kar diyaa lataa		mere daaman ko phuulon se  		ye kisane bhar diyaa   2 talat		chalo chal den vahaan 		zamiin aur aasamaan 		gale milate jahaan 		banaa le vahiin aashiyaan 	 lata		ye nayii nayii priit hai 		tu hii to mera miit hai 		naa jaane koii saajanaa  		ye terii merii daastaan 	 		naye iqaraar kaa 		naa ho koii jahaan  		banaa len vahiin aashiyaan 		ye nayii nayii priit hai

Lyrics: tum se milake aisaa lagaa tum se milake aramaan hue puure dilake ai merii jaane vafaa terii merii merii terii  ek jaan hai saath tere rahenge sadaa tum se naa honge judaa tum se milake aisaa lagaa tum se milake  aramaan hue puure dilake  mere sanam terii kasam chhodenge ab naa ye saath ye zindagii guzaregii ab hamadam tumhaare hii saath apanaa ye vaadaa rahaa tum se naa honge judaa tum se milake threedots  maine kiyaa hai raat din bas teraa hii intazaar tere binaa aataa nahiin ek pal mujhe ab qaraar hamadam meraa mil gayaa ham tum naa honge judaa  2  tum se milake aisaa lagaa tum se milake aramaan hue puure dilake ai merii jaane vafaa terii merii merii terii  ek jaan hai saath tere rahenge sadaa tum se naa honge judaa tum se milake aisaa lagaa tum se milake aramaan hue puure dilake
