Lyrics: ab main kaah karuun kit jaauun main kaah karuun kit jaauun 2  chhuut gayaa 3 sab saath sahaaraa apane bhii kar gaye kinaaraa chhuut gayaa sab saath sahaaraa apane bhii kar gaye kinaaraa ik baazii men sab kuchh haaraa aashaa haarii himmat haarii ab kyaa daanv lagaauun main kaah karuun kit jaaun ab main kaah karuun kit jaauun main kaah karuun kit jaaun jo paudhaa siinchaa murajhaayaa tuut gayaa jo mahal banaayaa 2 bujh gayaa jo bhii diyaa jalaayaa man andhiyaaraa jag andhiyaaraa jyot kahaan se laauun main kaah karuun kit jaauun

Title: aisaa naa ho aramaan jaag jaaen
Lyrics: raajaa ye kyaa karate ho ye koii sharaafat hai sharaafat nahiin nishaa ye mohabbat hai muhabbat  aisaa naa ho aramaan jaag jaaen soe hue tuufaan jaag jaaen chalo ek duusare se duur bhaag jaaen achchhaa main chalataa huun jaauun haan jaao ok see you bye bye  achchhaa huaa vo chalii gaii varanaa qayaamat ho jaatii achchhaa huaa vo chalaa gayaa koii sharaarat ho jaatii mujhe usase dar lagataa thaa meraa dil dhak dhak karataa thaa  bhuul gayaa thaa baat koii main vo kahane aayaa huun chhod ke ye duniyaa tere dil men rahane aayaa huun dekho ham paas jo aaenge duur na phir jaa paaenge thiik hai baabaa jaataa huun haan  kudarat kii marzii hai yahii meraa koii kusuur nahiin ham tum duur rahen ye is mausam ko manzuur nahiin kachche dhaage men bandhe hue chale aae ham khinche hue jaagate hain to aramaan jaag jaaen soe hue tuufaan jaag jaaen chalo ik duusare ke sang bhaag jaaen haan chalo ik duusare ke sang bhaag jaaen

Title: tum hamasafar nahiin to koii hamasafar nahiin
Lyrics: tum hamasafar nahiin to koii hamasafar nahiin ab ye hai dil shariikegamerahaguzar nahiin  achchhaa kiyaa ki tumane bhii chhodaa hamaaraa saath lo ab koii charaagesarerahaguzar nahiin  ek dil milaa hai wo bhii nahiin iktiyaar men ik gam milaa hai wo bhii gamemotabar nahiin  ham aaj darbadar sahii lekin gamehayaat aisii bhii koii raat hai jisakii sahar nahiin

Title: insaaf kii dagar pe bachchon dikhaao chal ke
Lyrics: insaaf kii dagar pe bachchon dikhaao chal ke ye desh hai tumhaaraa netaa tumhiin ho kal ke  duniyaa ke ranj sahanaa aur kuchh na munh se kahanaa sachchaaiyon ke bal pe aage ko badhate rahanaa rakh doge ek din tum sansaar ko badal ke insaaf kii threedots  apane hon yaa paraae sabake liye ho nyaay dekho kadam tumhaaraa haragiz na dagamagaae raste bade kathin hain chalanaa sambhalsambhal ke insaaf kii threedots  insaaniyat ke sar par izzat kaa taaj rakhanaa tan man bhii bhent dekar bhaarat kii laaj rakhanaa jiivan nayaa milegaa antim chitaa men jal ke insaaf kii threedots

Title: ghuunghat hataayke nazaren milaayke
Lyrics: ghuunghat hataayke nazaren milaayke balmaa se kah duungii baat chorii chorii chupake chupake balmaa se kah duungii baat ghuunghat hataayke nazaren milaayke balmaa se kah duungii baat  baar baar leke angadaaii2 main khud hii hansii khud hii sharmaai khud hii hansii khud hii sharmaai kahane to aur kii  chorii chorii chupake chupake threedots  har dhadakan men naye taraane honthon par hain giit suhaane2 nainon men kyon barasaat haay raam nainon men kyon barasaat chorii chorii chupake chupake threedots

Title: itane qariib aake bhii na jaane kis liye
Lyrics: t  itane qariib aake bhii kyaa jaane kis liye 2     kuchh ajanabii se aap hain kuchh ajanabii se ham     kuchh ajanabii se aap hain m  vo ek baat jo thii faqat aap ke liye 2     vo ek baat kah na sake aap hii se ham 2     kuchh ajanabii se aap hain   t  aisii to koii qaid nahiin dil kii baat par     apas kii baat hai to dare kyon kisii se ham     kuchh ajanabii se aap hain   threedots  m  tum duur ho to maut bhii aaye na ham ko raas 2     tum paas to jaan bhii de de khushii se ham     kuchh ajanabii se aap hain   threedots  t  maut ek vaham aur haqiikat hai zindagii     ik duusare ko maangenge is zindagii se ham do ik duusare ko maangenge is zindagii se ham     ik duusare ko maangenge

Title: jaane kahaan gae vo din kahate the terii raah men
Lyrics: jaane kahaan gae vo din kahate the terii raah men nazaron ko ham bichhaaenge chaahe kahiin bhii tum raho chaahenge tumako umr bhar tumako naa bhuul paaenge jaane kahaan gae vo din threedots  mere kadam jahaan pade sajade kiye the yaar ne  2 mujhako rulaa rulaa diyaa jaatii huii bahaar ne jaane kahaan gae vo din threedots  apanii nazar men aaj kal din bhii andherii raat hai  2 saayaa hii apane saath thaa saayaa hii apane saath hai jaane kahaan gae vo din threedots  is dil ke aashiyaan men bas unake kayaal rah gaye tod ke dil vo chal diye ham phir akele rah gaye jaane kahaan gae vo din threedots

Title: dil hii dil men le liyaa dil
Lyrics: dil hii dil men le liyaa dil maharabaanii aap kii dil ke qaabil kahaan ye kadardaanii aap kii  apane dil ko kyon na chahuun jis ne chaahaa aap ko ab to meraa dil bhii hai jaise nishaanii aap kii  aur is duniyaa men kyaa hai jiit ke qaabil bhalaa ek meraa diivaanaapan hai ek javaanii aap kii  phadphadaate honth jis ko kah na paaye shamr se jhukatii aankhon ne sunaa dii ye kahaanii aap kii

Title: mere dil men dil kaa pyaaraa
Lyrics: mere dil men dil kaa pyaaraa hai magar milataa nahiin chashm men usakaa nazaaraa hai magar milataa nahiin  dhuundhataa phirataa huun usako darbadar aur kuubakuu har jagah vo aashakaaraa hai magar milataa nahiin  mere dil men vo hii khele aur khilaave mujhako vo ghar men dulhan kaa dulaaraa  hai magar milataa nahiin

Title: tum jiyo hazaaron saal
Lyrics: tum jiyo hazaaron saal  saal ke din hon pachaas hazaar   suuraj roz aataa rahe roz gaataa rahe  leke kiranon ke mele  palachhin kaliyaan gin gin teraa har din  tab tak rangon se khelen rang jab tak baakii hai bahaaron men tum jiyo hazaaron saal  saal ke din hon pachaas hazaar threedots   yahaan vahaan shaam ho chaahe jahaan yuun hii jhuume shamaa sunake tumhaarii baaten pyaar liye chaand kaa tiikaa liye  yuun hii juganuu liye chamake tumhaarii raaten nuur jab tak baakii hai sitaaron men tum jiyo hazaaron saal  saal ke din ho pachaas hazaar threedots

Title: jaya jagadiisha hare
Lyrics: hare muraare madhu kaitabha haare      gopaala govinda mukunda shaure       pralaya payodhi jale dhrutavan asi vedam      vihita vahitra charitram akhedam      keshava dhrta mina sharira jaya jagadisha hare     now geeta comes in with the last line of the shloka which is used by  jaydev as the refrain with only the name of the incarnation changing  she is constantly singing in the background if hemantda is reciting the  shloka in the foreground when he stops she is in the foreground with  her beautiful voice incredible  keshava dhruta mina sharira jaya  jagadisha hare       chalayasi vikramane balim adbhuta vamana      pada nakha nira janita jana pavana      keshava dhrta vamana rupa jaya jagadisha hare       vitarasi dikshu rane dikpati kamaniyam      dashamukha mouli balim ramaniyam      keshava dhrta rama sharira jaya jagadisha hare       nindasi yajnya viderahaha shruti jatam      sadaya hrudaya darshita pashu ghatam      keshava dhrta buddha sharira jaya jagadisha hare       mlechcha nivaha nidhane kalayasi karavalam      dhumaketum iva kimapi karalam      keshava dhrta kalki sharira jaya jagadisha hare        at the end of the song there is a great shloka which is also usually  song in  the bhajan tradition which is a succinct summary of the dashaavatara  per  jaydev here is that shloka         vedan uddharate jagannivahate bhugolam udbibhrate      daityam darayatem balim chalayate kshatra kshayam kurvate      poulasyam jayate halam kalayate karunyam atanvate      mlechchan murchayate dashakruti krute krushnaya tubhyam namah

Title: har ik suurat har ik tasviir mubaham hotii jaatii hai
Lyrics: har ik suurat har ik tasviir mubaham hotii jaatii hai ilaahii kyaa merii diivaanagii kam hotii jaatii hai  jahaan tak dil kaa shiiraazaa faraaham karataa jaataa huun ye mahafil aur baraham aur baraham hotii jaatii hai  vo rahrah kar gale milmil ke ruksat hote jaate hain merii aankhon se ya rab roshanii kam hotii jaatii hai  jidhar se main guzarataa huun nigaahen uthatii jaatii hain merii hastii bhii kyaa teraa hii aalam hotii jaatii hai

Title: tum mujhe bhuul bhii jaao to ye haq hai tumako
Lyrics: sudha tum mujhe bhul bhi jao to ye haq hai tumako meri bat aur hai mainne to muhabbat ki hai  mere dil ki mere jazabat ki kimat kya hai ulajheulajhe se khyalat ki kimat kya hai mainne kyun pyar kiya tumane na kyun pyar kiya in pareshan savalat ki kimat kya hai tum jo ye bhi na batao to ye haq hai tumako meri bat aur hai mainne to muhabbat ki hai tum mujhe bhul bhi jao to ye haq hai tumako  mukesh zindagi sirf muhabbat nahin kuchh aur bhi hai zulforukasar ki jannat nahin kuchh aur bhi hai bhukh aur pyas ki mari hui is duniya men ishq hi ek haqikat nahin kuchh aur bhi hai tum agar ankh churao to ye haq hai tumako mainne tumase hi nahin sabase muhabbat ki hai tum agar ankh churao to ye haq hai tumako  sudha tumako duniya ke gamodard se furasat naa sahi sabase ulafat sahi mujhase hi muhabbat na sahi main tumhari hun yahi mere liye kya kam hai tum mere hoke raho ye meri qismat na sahi aur bhi dil ko jalao ye haq hai tumako meri bat aur hai mainne to muhabbat ki hai tum mujhe bhul bhi jao to ye haq hai tumako

Title: ulfat kii naii manzil ko chalaa
Lyrics: ulfat kii naii manzil ko chalaa wo baanhen daal ke baanhon men dil todane waale dekh ke chal ham bhii to pade hain raahon men  kyaa kyaa na jafaaen dil pe sahiin par tumase koii shikawaa na kiyaa is zurm ko bhii shaamil kar lo mere maasuum gunaahon men  jab chaandanii raaton men tuune kud hamase kiyaa iqaraarewafaa phir aaj hai kyuun ham begaane tere beraham nigaahon men  ham bhii hain wahii tum bhii ho wahii ye apanii apanii qismat hai darate hii rahe wo kushiyon se jo duub gae hain aahon men

Title: dost ban kar bhii nahiin saath nibhaane waalaa
Lyrics: dost ban kar bhii nahiin saath nibhaane waalaa vahii andaaz hai zaalim kaa zamaane waalaa  kyaa kahen kitane maraasim the hamaare usake wo jo ik shakhs hai munh pher ke jaane waalaa  mainne dekhaa hai bahaaron men chaman ko jalate hai koii kaab kii taabiir bataane waalaa  tum takalluf ko bhii ikalaas samajhate ho faraaz dost hotaa nahiin har haath milaane waalaa

Title: aa piyaa in nainan men jo palak dhaanp tohe luun
Lyrics: aa piyaa in nainan men jo palak dhaanp tohe luun na main dekhuun gair ko na tohe dekhan duun kaajar daaruun kirakiraa jo suramaa diya na jaaye jin nainan men pii base to duujaa kaun samaaye  chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaai ke  premapati kaa madavaa pilaai ke matavaarii kar diinhiin re mose nainaa milaai ke  bal bal jaaun main tore rang rajavaa apanii sii rang diinhiin re mose nainaa milaai ke maybe this occurs later  gorii gorii baiyyaan harii harii chuudiyaan baiyyaan pakad har liinhiin re mose nainaa milaai ke  khusaro nizaam ke bal bal jaiyyaan mohe suhaagan diinhii re mose nainaa milaai ke maybe this occurs vearlier

Title: ham aap ke aap ke hain kaun
Lyrics: ham aap ke hain kaun bechain hai merii nazar hai pyaar kaa kaisaa asar na chup raho itanaa kaho ham aap ke aap ke hain kain   threedots  kud ko sanam rokaa badaa aakhir mujhe kahanaa padaa kvaabon men tum aate ho kyon ham aap ke aap ke hain kaun   threedots  bechain hai merii nazar hai pyaar kaa kaisaa asar hain hosh gum puuchho na tum ham aap ke aap ke hain kain   threedots  kaise kahuun dil kii lagii cheharaa meraa padh lo kabhii ye sharam kii surkhii kahe ham aap ke aap ke hain kaun   threedots

Title: ek do tiin chaar paanch chhe saat
Lyrics: namaskaar namaskaar   kahiye kya sunenge aap  are pahale ye kahiye kahaan thin aap   main threedots main kar rahi thi kisii ka intazaar kaun hai vo   jise karatii huun pyaar hai threedots  aur jisase karatii huun minnaten baar baar kaise  aise threedots    ek do tiin chaar paanch chhai saat aath nau das gyaarah barah terah  2  tera karuun tera karuun din gin gin ke intazaar  aajaa piyaa aaii bahaar    2  chaudah ko tera sandeshaa aya pandrah ko aaungaa ye kahalaayaa chaudah ko aayaa na pandrah ko tu tadapaake mujhako tune kya paaya solah ko bhi  solah ko bhi solah kiye the singaar aajaa piyaa aayii bahaar  tera karuun tera karuun din gin gin ke intazaar aajaa piyaa aai bahaar  2  ek do tiin chaar paanch chhai saat aath nau das gyaarah barah terah 2   satrah ko sang  tuut gayii attharah ko   ro ro guzaaraa mainne saaraa unniis  biis ko dil ke tukade hue biis phir bhi nahiin  phir bhi nahiin dil se gayaa tera pyaar aajaa piyaa aayii bahaar   tera karuun tera karuun din gin gin ke intazaar aajaa piyaa aaye bahaar 2  ek do tiin chaar paanch chhai saat aath nau das gyaarah barah terah  2    ikkiis biitii baais gai teis guzarii chaubiis gai pachchis ko samajhaayaa sabane mujhe   din bane hafte hafte mahine mahine ban gaye saal  aake zaraa tu dekh to le kya hua hai meraa haal  diivaanii dar dar main phiratii huun  na jiitii huun naa main maratii huun  tanhaai kii raaten sahatii huun  aajaa aajaa aajaa ke din ginatii rahatii huun   ek do tiin chaar paanch chhai saat aath nau das gyaarah barah terah  2  tera karuun tera karuun din gin gin ke intazaar aajaa piyaa aayii bahaar 2

Title: chal ud jaa re panchhii ki ab ye desh huaa begaanaa
Lyrics: chal ud jaa re panchhii 2 ki ab ye desh huaa begaanaa chal ud jaa re panchhii threedots  khatam hue din us daalii ke jis par teraa baseraa thaa aaj yahaan aur kal ho vahaan ye jogii vaalaa pheraa thaa sadaa rahaa hai is duniyaa men kisakaa aabuudaanaa chal ud jaa re panchhii threedots  tune tinakaatinakaa chun kar nagarii ek basaaii baarish men terii bhiigii kaaya dhuup men garamii chhaii gam naa kar jo terii mehanat tere kaam naa aaii achchhaa hai kuchh le jaane se dekar hii kuchh jaanaa chal ud jaa re panchhii threedots  bhuul jaa ab vo mast havaa vo udanaa daaliidaalii jab aankh kii kaantaa ban gai chaal terii matavaalii kaun bhalaa us baag ko puchhe ho naa jisakaa maalii terii qismat men likhaa hai jiite jii mar jaanaa chal ud jaa re panchhii threedots  rote hain vo pankhpakheruu saath tere jo khele jinake saath lagaaye tune aramaanon ke mele bhiigii aankhon se hii unakii aaj duaayen le le kisako pataa ab is nagarii men kab ho teraa aanaa chal ud jaa re panchhii threedots

Title: dhiire dhiire bol koii sun naa le sun naa le koii sun naa le
Lyrics: dhiiredhiire bol koii sun na le sun na le koii sun na le sej se kaliyaan chun na le chun na le koii chun na le hamako kisii kaa dar nahiin koii zor javaanii par nahiin dhiiredhiirethreedots  kuchh kah le kuchh kar le ye sansaar ham premii hain ham to karenge pyaar koii dekh le to dekh le koii jaan le to jaan le koii dosh hamaare sar nahiin koii zorthreedots  baaton ke badale aankhon se lo kaam varanaa ham ho jaayenge re badanaam naadaan tum anjaan tum beiimaan tum  tum kyuun chain tumhen pal bhar nahiin koii zorthreedots  ekek din ab lagataa hai ek saal tere bin ab meraa bhii hai yahii haal aa pyaar kar duniyaa se dar mat duur jaa mat paas aa main shiishaa huun patthar nahiin koii zorthreedots

Title: aake terii baahon men
Lyrics: ake teri baahon men har shaam lage sinduri  mere man ko mahakaaya mere man ko mahakaaya tere man ki kasturi ake teri baahon menthreedots  mahaki havaayen udata aanchal lat ghungharaale kaale baadal prem sudha nainon se barase pii lene ko jiivan tarase bahon men dhans lene de priit ke chumban dene de in adharon se chhalak na jaaye in adharon se chhalak na jaaye yauvan ras anguri ake teri baahon menthreedots  priit threedots bahata saagar tere liye hai ruup ke baadal indradhanush ke rang churaaun teri zulmi maang sajaun  do phulon ke khilane ka vaqt yahi hai milane ka aja milake aaj mita den aja milake aaj mita den thodi si ye duuri ake teri baahon menthreedots

Title: dil men ho tum aankhon men tum bolo tumhe kaise chaahuun
Lyrics: dil men ho tum aankhon men tum bolo tumhe kaise chaahuun puujaa karun sajadaa karun jaise kaho vaise chaahuun jaanuun merii jaanuun jaane yaa naa jaanuun  akelaa huun main akelaa tumhe phir dila ne pukaaraa tumhaarii yaaden sataaain nahiin hai koi hamaaraa duniyaa ke gam sahataa huun main birahaa ke gam sah naa paaun jaanuun merii jaanuun jaane yaa naa jaanuun  hameshaa dekhaa yahii hai milana ke sanga hai judaai shaayada vo hogaa diivaanaa chaahata hai jisane banaai chaahe jaluun chaahe maruun phir bhii tere guna men gaaun jaanuun merii jaanuun jaane yaa naa jaanuun  dila men ho tum aankhon men tum bolo tumhe kaise chaahuun puujaa karun sajadaa karun jaise kaho vaise chaahuun jaanuun merii jaanuun jaane yaa naa jaanuun

Title: dekho vo chaand chupake karataa hai kyaa ishaare
Lyrics: he dekho vo chaand chupake karataa hai kyaa ishaare l shaayad ye kah rahaa hai ham ho gaye tumhaare  ho gaye tumhaare dekho threedots   l ulfat kaa aaj hamane iqaraar kar liyaa hai  lekin ye kaun jaane kismat men kya likhaa hai  manjil ko chal pade hain taqadir ke sahaare  ho gaye tumhaare dekho threedots   he aisa na ho ki hamako raste men chhod jaao  jaakar kahiin kisikii duniya naii basaao  manjhadhaar men rahe ham lag jaao tum kinaare  ho gaye tumhaare dekho threedots  l dil men sivaa tumhaare koi nahiin hamaare  ye apane dil se puuchho kya dil men hai tumhaare  denge meri gavaahii kudarat ke ye nazaare  ho gaye tumhaare dekho threedots

Title: mere haathon men nau nau chuudiyaan hain
Lyrics: mere haathon men naunau chuudiyaan hain  thoda thaharo sajan majabuuriyaan hain	2 milan hogaa abhii ik raat kii duuriyaa hai mere haathon men naunau chuudiyaan hain  lambiilambii vo kaaliikaalii raaton men  kaahe chuudiyaan khanakatii hain haathon men 2 na aanaa tuu nigodii chuudiyon kii baaton men mere haathon menthreedots  le jaa vaapas tuu apanii baaraat mundeyaa  main nahiin jaanaa nahiin jaanaa tere saath mundeyaa 2 jagaaegaa jagaaegaa tuu saarii raat mundeyaa mere haathon menthreedots   aate jaate galii men meraa dil dhadake  mere piichhe pade hain aathdas ladake	2 ve le jaaen kisii din ye sapere naagin phadake mere haathon menthreedots  mere ghutanon se lambii haay merii chotii hai  merii aankh shataranj kii gotii hai		2 mere baabul na phir kahanaa abhii tuu chhotii hai mere haathon menthreedots  mere darzii se aaj merii jang ho gaii  kal cholii silaaii aaj tang ho gaii		2 oe shaavaa shaavaa kare vo kyaa tuu ladakii thii patang ho gaii mere haathon menthreedots  mere sainyaa kiyaa ye buraa kaam tuune kahiin kaa bhii nahiin chhodaa mujhe haay raam tuune mere sainyaa mere haathon men nau nau chuudiyaan hain

Title: tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa
Lyrics: tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa tumhiin devataa ho koii merii aankhon se dekhe to samajhe ki tum mere kyaa ho tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa tumhiin devataa ho  jidhar dekhatii huun udhar tum hii tum ho na jaane magar kin khayaalon men gum ho mujhe dekhakar tum zaraa muskuraa do  nahiin to main samajhuungii mujhase kafaa ho tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa tumhiin devataa ho  tumhiin mere maathe kii bindiyaa kii jhilmil tumhiin mere haathon ke gajaron kii manzil main huun ek chhotiisii maatii kii gudiyaa tumhiin praan mere tumhiin aatmaa ho tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa tumhiin devataa ho  bahut raat biitii chalo main sulaa duun pavan chhede sargam main lorii sunaa duun tumhen dekhakar yah kayaal aa rahaa hai ki jaise farishtaa koii so rahaa hai tumhiin mere mandir tumhiin merii puujaa tumhiin devataa ho

Title: dil use do jo jaan de de jaan use do jo dil de de
Lyrics: dil use do jo jaan de de jaan use do jo dil de de  1 ye pyaar ke nazaare hain dekh lo jidhar ab naachatii hai duniyaa khushii kaa hai asar lo khatm huaa hai ye aaj kaa safar ab hogii suhaanii vo kal kii sahar dil use threedots  2 jo sochate rahoge to kuchh na milegaa jo chupake rahoge to kaam na banegaa jo dil men jaloge to aramaan rahegaa jo badhate chaloge to raastaa milegaa dil use threedots  3 vo gunchaa nahiin hai jo khilanaa na jaane vo baadesabaa kyaa jo chalanaa na jaane vo bijalii nahiin jo chamakanaa na jaane vo insaan nahiin jo tadapanaa na jaane dil use threedots

Title: zindagii aa rahaa huun main
Lyrics: liye sapane nigahon men chala hun teri rahon men zindagii aa raha hun main  2  kai yaadon ke chehare hain kai kisse purane hain teri sau dastanen hain tere kitane fasane hain   2 magar ek vo kahani hai jo ab mujhako sunani hai zindagi aa raha hun main   mere haathon ki garami se pighal jaayengi zanjiren mere kadamon ki aahat se badal jaayengi taqadiren  2 ummidon ke diye lekar ye sab tere liye lekar zindagi aa raha hun main   kabhi tujhako gila mujhase kabhi mujhako shikayat hai magar phir bhi tujhe meri mujhe teri zarurat hai  2 main ye iqaraar karata hun main tujhase pyaar karata hun zindagi aa raha hun main

Title: pal pal more mukh se nikale nis din tero naam more shyaam
Lyrics: more shyaam more shyaam pal pal more mukh se nikale nis din tero naam more shyaam more shyaam   threedots  tere charan kii main huun daasii liijo aanchal thaam bhatak na jaaye jiivan aashaa ghir aayii hai shyaam more shyaam more shyaam   threedots  daras kii baatii ab to jalaa do dhuundh phirii nandgaanv man kii muraliyaa vo sur khoje jin men base ghanashyaam more shyaam more shyaam   threedots  ho na sakii main raadhaa terii phir bhii pujaarin huun main hansii udaaye brij ke baasii priit huii badanaam more shyaam more shyaam   threedots

Title: om jay jagadiish hare svaamii jay jagadiish hare  bhajan
Lyrics: aum  om jay jagadiish hare svaamii jay jagadiish hare bhakt janon ke sankat daas janon ke sankat xan men duur kare om jaythreedots  jo dhyaave phal paave dukh binase man kaa svaamii dukh binase man kaa sukh sampati ghar aave kashht mite tan kaa  om jaythreedots  maat pitaa tum mere sharan gahuun kisakii svaamii sharan gahuun main kisakii tum bin aur na duujaa aasha karuun kisakii  om jaythreedots  tum puuran paramaatmaa tum antarayaamii svaamii tum antarayaamii param brahm parameshvar tum sabake svaamii  om jaythreedots  tum karunaa ke saagar tum paalan karataa svaamii tum paalan karataa diin dayaalu kripaalu kripaa karo bharataa  om jaythreedots  tum ho ek agochar sabake praan pati svaamii sabake praan pati kis vidhi miluun dayaamii tumako main kumati  om jaythreedots  diin bandhu dukh harataa tum raxak mere svaamii tum raxak mere karunaa hast badhaao sharan paduun main tere  om jaythreedots  vishhay vikaar mitaavo paap haro devaa svaamii paap haro devaa shraddhaa bhakti badhaao santan kii sevaa  om jaythreedots

Title: roz roz daalii daalii kyaa likh jaaye
Lyrics: roz roz daalii daalii kyaa likh jaaye bhanvaraa baavaraa kaliyon ke naam koii likhe paigaam koii baavaraa bhanvaraa baavaraa roz roz daalii daalii threedots  biite hue mausam kii koii nishaanii hogii pa ma pa ma ga ma ga re ga ni re ni ma ga re pa biite hue mausam kii koii nishaanii hogii dadr puraanaa koii yaad puraanii hogii koii to daastaan hogii naa roz roz daalii daalii threedots  hogaa koii vaadaa hogaa vaadaa nibhaataa hogaa shaakhon pe likh kar yaad dilaataa hogaa yaad to aatii hii hogii naa roz roz daalii daalii threedots

Title: haay sharamaauun  apanii prem kahaaniyaan
Lyrics: haay sharamaauun oe oe haay sharamaauun kis kis ko bataauun aise kaise main sunaauun sab ko apanii prem kahaaniyaan apanii prem kahaaniyaan baalama kii baalama kii haay tiin nishaniyaan  aise kaise main sunaauun sab ko apanii prem kahaaniyaan apanii prem kahaaniyaan  pahalii nishaanii main huun jisakii divaanii  2 rut jaisii tuufaanii aisii unakii javaanii mastaanii usake aage phiikii laage haay sabakii javaaniyaan kurtaa hai niilaa rang pagadii kaa piilaa  2 ruup usakaa katiilaa aisaa hai chhailaa ruup usakaa katiilaa aisaa hai chhailaa rangiilaa chaal sharabii rang gulaabii te akhaan mastaaniyaan aankhon ko miinche dekho saanson ko khiinche  2 vahaan piipal ke niiche mele men sabase piichhe  2 khadaa hai niind udaaye chain churaaye te kare beimaaniyaan

Title: jiyaa o jiyaa o jiyaa kuchha bol do
Film: jab pyar kisi se hota hai
Lyrics: ho ho	aah haathreedots jiyaa o jiyaa o jiyaa kuchh bol do are o dil kaa pardaa khol do   2 aah haa aathreedots jab pyaar kisii se hotaa hai to dard saa dil men hotaa hai tum ek hasiin ho laakhon men bhalaa paake tume koi khota hai jiyaa o jiyaa o jiyaa kuchha bol do	  nazaron se kitane tiir chale chalane do jigar par jhelenge in pyaar kii ujalii raahon par ham jaana ki baazii khelenge in do nainon ke saagar men koi dil kii naiyaa dubotaa hai o jiyaa o jiyaa o jiyaa kuchha bol do are o dil ka pardaa khol do threedots  tum bhii to is aag men jalte ho chehare se bayaan ho jaataa hain har baat pe aahen bharate ho har baat pe dil tharraataa hai	 jab dil pe chhuriyaan chalati hain to chain se koi sotaa hai jiyaa o jiyaa o jiyaa kuchha bol do are o dil kaa pardaa khol do

Title: jiivan se bharii terii aankhen
Lyrics: jiivan se bharii terii aankhen majabuur kare jiine ke liye saagar bhii tarasate rahate hain tere ruup kaa ras piine ke liye jiivan se bharii terii aankhen threedots  tasviir banaaye kyaa koii kyaa koii likhe tujhape kavitaa rangon chhandon men samaaegii kis tarah se itanii sundarataa ek dhadakan hai tuu dil ke liye ek jaan hai tuu jiine ke liye jiivan se bharii terii aankhen threedots  madhuban ki sugandh hai saanson men baahon men kanval kii komalataa kiranon kaa tej hai chehare pe hiranon kii hai tujh men chanchalataa aanchal kaa tere ek taar bahut koi chhaak jigar siine ke liye jiivan se bharii terii aankhen threedots

Title: naath mohe ab kii ber ubaaro
Lyrics: naath mohe threedots naath mohe ab kii ber ubaaro mohe ab kii ber ubaaro  tiin lok ke tum pratipaalak main huun daas tihaaro taarii jaati kujaati shyaam tum mopar kirapaa dhaaro dhaaro ab kii ber ubaaro mohe threedots  xudra patita tum taare ramaapati ab naa karo jiyaa daaro suuradaas saacho tab maane 2 jo hai mama nis taaro nis taaro ab kii ber ubaaro mohe threedots

Lyrics: ghaayal niraniyaa main banban doluun kisakaa lagaa baan 2 mukh se na boluun ghaayal hiraniyaa threedots  mud ke jo dekhuun to bachapan bulaae bulaae threedots mud ke jo dekhuun to bachapan bulaae palakon men lekin koii muskuraae jii ko dukhaauun ke pii sang ho luun ghaayal hiraniyaa main banban doluun  aa aa aa aa ho ho ho ho mm mm mm mm la la la laa  paa paa nii paa paa saa paa paa re maa dhaa paa saa dhaa re shh maa paa saa saa saa saa saa gaa re saa gaa re saa gaa re maa gaa re saa nii dhaa paa maa gaa gaa threedots re saa nii dhaa paa maa gaa re maa dhaa nii saa gaa re saa  jab se ye nainaa balam sang laage  jab se ye nainaa threedots balam sang laage  jab se ye nainaa balam sang laage  dukhsukh mere man men ik saath jaage pal men hansuun pal men nainaa bhigo luun ghaayal hiraniyaa main banban doluun  ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaa ghaayal hiraniyaa ban ban ban ban ban doluun na na na na na na na na na na na na boluun na doluun na boluun na daa daa daa daa daa daa daa daa daa daa daa daa doluun aa aa aa threedots

Title: aaj ye kisako nazar ke saamane paataa huun main
Lyrics: aaj ye kisako nazar ke saamane paataa huun main pyaar kii bhuulii huii yaadon se takaraataa huun main  kyaa tumhen wo chaandanii raaten bhii yaad aatii nahiin 2 tum to kahate the sitaaron kii qasam khaataa huun main 2  aao un tuutii huii yaadon ko aa kar jod do 2 ab tumhaarii yaad aatii hai to kho jaataa huun main 2  tuu na ro tuu na ro mere liye jaanetamannaa tuu na ro 2 tere aansuu dekh kar betaab ho jaataa huun main 2

Title: gulamohar gar tumhaaraa naam hotaa
Lyrics: ki  gulamohar gar tumhaaraa naam hota  mausamegul lo hansaanaa bhi hamara kaam hota  gulamohar gar tumhaaraa threedots   k  aayengii bahaaren to abake unhe kahanaa zaraa itanaa sune  aayengi bahaaren to abake unhe kahanaa zaraa itanaa sune  2 mere gul binaa unakaa kahaan bahaar naam hota  l gulamohar gar tumhaaraa naam hota  mausamegul lo hansaanaa bhi hamara kaam hota  gulamohar gar tumhaaraa threedots  l  shaam ki gulaabii se anchal men ye diyaa jalaa hai chaand saa  shaam ki gulaabii se anchal men ye diyaa jala hai chaand saa  mere gul binaa unakaa bhalaa kya naam hota  k  gulamohar gar tumhaaraa naam hota  mausamegul lo hansaanaa bhi hamara kaam hota  l gulamohar gar tumhaaraa naam hota  mausamegul lo hansaanaa bhi hamara kaam hota

Title: chalate ho to chaman ko chaliye
Lyrics: chalate ho to chaman ko chaliye kahate hain ke bahaaraan hai paat hare hain phuul khile hain kam kam baadobaaraan hai  rang hawaa se yuun tapake hai jaise sharaab chuwaate hain aage ho maikhaane ke nikalo ahadebaadagusaaraan hai  dil hai daagii jigar hai tukade aansuu the so kuun huye lohuu paanii ek kare ye ishqelaaloajaaraan hai  kohakanomajanuu kii kaatir dashtokoh men ham na gaye ishq men hamako miir nihaayat paaseizzatadaaraan hai

Title: yaad na jaaye biite dinon kii
Lyrics: yaad na jaae biite dinon kii jaake na aaye jo din dil kyuun bulaae unhen dil kyon bulaae yaad na jaaye threedots  din jo pakheruu hote pinjare men main rakh detaa  2 paalataa unako jatan se paalataa unako jatan se motii ke daane detaa siine se rahataa lagaae yaad na jaae threedots  tasviir unakii chhupaake rakh duun jahaan jii chaahe  2 man men basii ye suurat man men basii ye suurat lekin mite na mitaae kahane ko hai vo paraae yaad na jaae threedots

Title: aajaa mere qariib ke soii huii hai raat
Lyrics: aajaa mere qariib ke soii huii hai raat2 rangiiniiebahaar me khoii huii hai raat aajaa mere qariib ke soii huii hai raat  tuu jaaneqaayanaat hai tuu jaanezindagii apanaa banaa ke mujhase na kar itanii berukii tere liye nahiin meraa aagosh ajanabii aajaa mere qariib threedots  dil leke is tarah se na dil kaa qaraar le ye aansuu ponchh daal ye zulfen sanwaar le thodii sii raat hai ise hans kar guzaar le aaja mere qariib threedots

Title: chandaa des piyaa ke jaa
Lyrics: chandaa des piyaa ke jaa saajan hamare bhuule hamako unhen manaa kar laa des piyaa ke jaa chandaa des piyaa ke jaa   threedots  sundar manahar ritu hai duhaaii madhuban men kyon birahaa banaaii itanii sunaakar aa des piyaa ke jaa   threedots  saanjh bhaye main diip ban jalatii raat raat bhar  dhalatii jaake yaad dilaa chandaa jaake yaad dilaa chandaa des piyaa ke jaa   threedots

Title: vo shaam kuchh ajiib thii
Lyrics: vo shaam kuchh ajiib thii ye shaam bhii ajiib hai vo kal bhii paas paas thii vo aaj bhii kariib hai  jhukii huii nigaah men kahiin meraa kayaal thaa dabii dabii hansiin men ik hasiin saa savaal thaa main sochataa thaa meraa naam gunagunaa rahii hai vo na jaane kyuun lagaa mujhe ke muskuraa rahii hai vo vo shaam kuchh ajiib thii threedots  meraa kayaal hain abhii jhukii huii nigaah men khulii huii hansii bhii hai dabii huii sii chaah men main jaanataa huun meraa naam gunagunaa rahii hai vo yahii kayaal hai mujhe ke saath aa rahii hai vo  vo shaam kuchh ajiib thii ye shaam bhii ajiib hai vo kal bhii paas paas thii vo aaj bhii kariib hai

Title: dardogam kaa na rahaa naam tere aane se
Lyrics: dardogam kaa na rahaa naam tere aane se dil ko kyaa aa gayaa aaraam tere aane se  shukr sad shukr ke labarez huaa ai saaqii mayeisharat se meraa jaam tere aane se  sahareiid kazil jisase ho ai maahelakaan vasl kii bhulii hai ye shaam tere aane se

Title: saaqii kii har nigaah pe bal khaa ke pii gayaa
Lyrics: saaqii kii har nigaah pe bal khaa ke pii gayaa laharon se khelataa huaa laharaa ke pii gayaa  zaahid ye merii shokiierindaa na dekhanaa rahamat ko baaton baaton men bahalaa ke pii gayaa  ai rahamatetamaam merii har kataa muaaf main intihaaneshauq men ghabaraa ke pii gayaa  kal mastiieajal mujhe jab yaad aa gaii duniyaaeaitabaar ko thukaraa ke pii gayaa

Title: aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai
Lyrics: aankhon aankhon men har ik raat guzar jaatii hai yuun terii yaad merii niind udaa jaatii hai  main to har waqt tujhe yaad kiyaa karataa huun tujhako bhuule se kabhii yaad merii aatii hai  tera har zulmositam mujhako gawaaraa hai magar terii gaflat se merii jaan pe ban aatii hai  katm hotii hai shabegam ki kahaanii faiyyaaz shammaa bujhatii hai bas ab subah huii jaatii hai

Title: jalwaa baqadrezarfenazar dekhate rahe
Lyrics: jalwaa baqadrezarfenazar dekhate rahe kyaa dekhate ham unako magar dekhate rahe   laakh aaftaab paas se hokar guzar gaye ham baithe intazaaresahar dekhate rahe  hain daurebedilii kii wo majabuuriyaan bhii yaad aankhen thiin sogawaar magar dekhate rahe  aisii bhii kuchh firaaq kii raaten guzar gaiin jaise unhiin ko peshenazar dekhate rahe

Title: jab chaand meraa nikalaa chhaaiin thiin ghataayen
Lyrics: jab chaand meraa nikalaa chhaaii thiin niilii ghataayen jab chaand meraa nikalaa us raat ke us raat ke ek sukh se sau raat bhii sharamaayen chhaaii thiin niilii ghataayen jab chaand meraa nikalaa  un aankhon se kahate the un aankhon se kahate the aankhen merii kushii men tum amar ujaalaa ho do din kii zindagii men phir kyuun na tumhen paa ke ham bhaag pe itaraayen chhaaii thiin niilii ghataayen jab chaand meraa nikalaa  aakaash pe jab chhaaye ghanaghor andhiyaare the tab man ke gagan men mere ugate huye taare the  jaaduu saa mujh pe kiyaa thaa jaaduu bharii hawaa ne gam meraa mitaa gaye the un honton ke paimaane ab tak hai wo mastii baakii ham hosh men kyaa aayen  chhaaii thiin niilii ghataayen jab chaand meraa nikalaa chhaaii thiin niilii ghataayen

Title: vo kushnasiib hain
Lyrics: vo kushnasiib hain jinako yahaan qaraar milaa hamen to dil jo milaa vah bhii beqaraar milaa threedots  milii hain pyaar me dar dar kii thokaren hamako lagaaye rakhate hain siine se har ghadii gam ko jo khatm ho naa kabhii aisaa intazaar milaa hamen to dil jo milaa vah bhii beqaraar milaa threedots  sitam hai gam ke samandar men har kushii duubii hamaare ashq men khud apanii zindagii duubii sahaaraa de koii aisaa naa ek baar milaa hamen to dil jo milaa vah bhii beqaraar milaa threedots

Title: dil chiiz kyaa hai aap merii jaan liijiye
Lyrics: dil chiiz kyaa hai aap merii jaan liijiye bas ek baar meraa kahaa maan liijiye  is anjuman men aapako aanaa hai baar baar diivaarodar ko gaur se pahachaan liijiye  maanaa ke doston ko nahiin dostii kaa naaz  lekin ye kyaa ke gair kaa ahasaan liijiye  kahiye to aasamaan ko zamiin par utaar laaen mushkil nahiin hai kuchh bhii agar thaan liijiye

Title: hamasafar mere hamasafar pankh tum paravaaz ham
Lyrics: hamasafar mere hamasafar pankh tum paravaaz ham zindagii kaa saaz ho tum saaz kii aavaaz ham hamasafar mere hamasafar pankh tum paravaaz ham zindagii kaa giit ho tum giit kaa andaaz ham  aankh ne sharamaa ke kah dii dil ke sharamaane kii baat pyaar kii tum intahaa ho pyaar kii aagaaz tum hamasafar mere hamasafar   threedots  jii men ho jab aasamaan ki yaa zamiin kii baat ho khatm hotii hai tumhiin par ab kahiin kii baat ho ho hasiin tum mahajabiin tum aur tumhaaraa naaz ham hamasafar mere hamasafar   threedots

Title: dil huun huun kare ghabaraae
Lyrics: dil huun huun kare ghabaraae ghan dham dham kare garajaae ek buund kabhii paanii kii more ankhiyon se barasaae  terii jholii daaruun sab suukhii paat jo aae teraa chhuaa lage merii suukhii daal hariyaae dil huun huun kare ghabaraae  jis tan ko chhuuaa tuune us tan ko chhupaauun jis man ko laage nainaa vo kisako dikhaauun o morii chandramaa terii chaandanii ang jalaae uunchii torii ataarii main ne pankh lie katavaae   dil huun huun kare ghabaraae

Title: tum paas aaye yuun muskuraaye  kuchh kuchh hotaa hai
Lyrics: tum paas aaye yuun muskuraaye tumane na jaane kyaa sapane dikhaaye ab to meraa dil jaage na sotaa hai  kyaa karuun haay kuchh kuchh hotaa hai   threedots  na jaane kaisaa ehasaas hai bujhatii nahiin hai kyaa pyaas hai kyaa nashaa is pyaar kaa mujhape sanam chhaane lagaa koii na jaane kyon chain khotaa hai kyaa karuun haay kuchh kuchh hotaa hai   threedots  kyaa rang laayii merii duaa ye ishq jaane kaise huaa bechainiyon men chain na jaane kyon aane lagaa tanahaaii men dil yaaden sanjotaa hai kyaa karuun haay kuchh kuchh hotaa hai   threedots

Title: aah ko chaahie ek umr asar hone tak
Lyrics: aah ko chaahie ek umr asar hone tak kaun jiitaa hai tere zulf ke sar hone tak  aashiqii sabr talab aur tamannaa betaab dil kaa kyaa rang karuun khuunejigar hone tak  ham ne maanaa ke tagakul na karoge lekin khaak ho jaaenge ham tum ko khabar hone tak  gamehastii kaa asad kisase ho kuzmargeilaaj shamaa har rang men jalatii hai sahar hone tak

Title: o mere shaahekhuubaan
Lyrics: o mere shaahekhuubaan o merii jaanejanaanaa tum mere paas hote ho koii duusaraa nahiin hotaa  kab khayaalon kii dhuup dhalatii hai har qadam pe shamaa sii jalatii hai meraa saayaa jidhar bhii jaataa hai terii tasaviir saath chalatii hai o mere shaahekhuubaanthreedots  tum ho saharaa men tum gulistaan men tum ho zarron men tum bayaanbaan men main ne tum ko kahaan kahaan dekhaa chuup ke rahate ho tum ragejaan men o mere shaahekhuubaanthreedots  merii aankhon kii justajuu tum ho iltajaa tum ho aarazuu tum ho main kisii aur ko to kyaa jaanun merii ulfat kii aabaruu tum ho o mere shaahekhuubaanthreedots

Title: pyaas wo dil kii bujhaane kabhii aayaa bhii nahiin
Lyrics: pyaas wo dil kii bujhaane kabhii aayaa bhii nahiin kaisaa baadal hai ki jisakaa koii saayaa bhii nahiin  berukii isase badii aur bhalaa kyaa hogii ek muddat se hamen usane sataayaa bhii nahiin  roz aataa hai daredil pe wo dastak dene aaj tak hamane jise paas bulaayaa bhii nahiin  sun liyaa kaise kudaa jaane zamaane bhar ne wo fasaanaa jo kabhii hamane sunaayaa bhii nahiin  tum to shaayar ho qatiil aur wo ik aam saa shakhs usane chaahaa bhii tujhe aur jataayaa bhii nahiin

Title: aa guchup gupchup pyaar karen
Lyrics: tam tale to tam tale naache hamse kyon tale  tam tale to tam tale  s aa gupchup gupchup pyaar karen h chhupchhup aankhen chaar karen  s o chaand musaafir raat ke h o ho s o chaand musaafir raat ke kyon sune hamaarii baaten h tuu ne to dekhii hogii aisii kitanii hii raaten s chhup jaa re jaa chhup jaa terii minnaten sau sau baar karen    aa gupchup gupchup threedots  h o chhupanaa hai to jaldii chup jaa s jaa jaa jaa jaa jaa h o chhupanaa hai to jaldii chup jaa raat hai thodii baakii s pyaase rah naa jaayen donon main aur meraa saathii    chhup jaa re jaa chhup jaa yuun kab tak ham takaraar karen h terii minnat sau sau baar karen  dono aa gupchup gupchup pyaar karen       chhupchhup aankhen chaar karen

Title: jab naam teraa pyaar se likhatii hain ungaliyaan jagjit ghazal
Lyrics: jab naam teraa pyaar se likhatii hain ungaliyaan merii taraf zamaane kii uthatii hain ungaliyaan  daaman sanam kaa haath men aayaa thaa ek pal dinraat us hii pal se mahakatii hain ungaliyaan  jis din se duur ho gae us din se hii sanam bas din tumhaare aane kii ginatii hain ungaliyaan  patthar taraashakar na banaa taaj ek nayaa fanakaar kii jahaan men katatii hain ungaliyaan

Title: shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar
Lyrics: shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar ye duniyaa hai pyaare yahaan gam ke maare tadapate rahe shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar  kizaan is gulistaan men aatii rahii hai havaa suukhe patte udaatii rahii hai yahaan phuul khil ke bahaaron se mil ke bichhadate rahe shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar  yahaan tere ashkon kii qiimat nahiin hai raham karanaa duniyaa kii aadat nahiin hai kisii ne na dekha yahaan kuun ke aansuu dhalakate rahe shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar  yahaan kaa hai dastuur kaamosh rahanaa jo guzarii hai dil pe kisii se na kahanaa ye din  ke yahaan log bas ke ujadte rahe shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar  ye duniyaa hai pyaare yahaan gam ke maare tadapate rahe shikavaa na kar gilaa na kar

Title: kahiin bekhayaal hokar yuun hii chhuu liyaa kisii ne
Lyrics: kahiin bekhayaal hokar yuun hii chhuu liyaa kisii ne  2 kaii khvaab dekh daale yahaan meri bekhudii ne  kahiin bekhayaal hokar   mere dil main kaun hai tu ki hua jahaan andheraa  vahiin sau diye jalaaye tere rukh kii chandani ne  kaii khvaab kaii khvaab dekh daale yahaan meri bekhudii ne  kahiin bekhayaal hokar   kabhi us parii ka hai kuchh kabhi is hasiin kii mahafil  mujhe darabadar phiraayaa mere dil kii saadagii ne  kaii khvaab kaii khvaab dekh daale yahaan meri bekhudii ne  kahiin bekhayaal hokar   hai bhalaa saa naam usakaa main abhii se kya bataauun  kiyaa bekaraar hansakar mujhe ek aadamii ne  kaii khvaab kaii khvaab dekh daale yahaan meri bekhudii ne  kahiin bekhayaal hokar   are mujhape naaz vaalon ye nayaazamandiyaan kyon  hai yahii karam tumhaaraa to mujhe na doge jiine  kaii khvaab kaii khvaab dekh daale yahaan meri bekhudii ne  kahiin bekhayaal hokar

Title: puujaapraanaayaam puujaa
Lyrics: praanaayaamah      om pranavasya parabrahma rishhih paramaatmaa devataa devii  gaayatrii chhandah praanaayaame viniyogah    om bhurbhuvah svah om tath saviturvarenyam  bhargo devasya dhiimahi dhiyo yo nah prachodayat    om bhuh  om bhuvah  om svah  om mahah  om janah om tapah  om satyam om tath saviturvarenyam bhargo devasya dhiimahi  dhiyo yo nah prachodayat  om aapojyoti rasomritam brahma  bhuurbhuvassuvaromh

Title: raat andherii dar laage
Lyrics: raat andherii dar laage akelii mohe chhod na jaanaa jii dekho jii dekho more sainyyaa yah dil meraa tod na jaanaa jii  leke na jaanaa mere dil kaa qaraar tuu hai merii bahaar  meraa kahataa hai pyaar main ne kiyaa hai dil tere havaale mohe apanaa banaa le  sun merii pukaar o more sainyyaa paduun main tore painyyaa mohe chhod na jaanaa jii  maano jii maano piyaa dekho idhar ik miithii nazar  mere jaanejigar kaarii kaarii raat jiyaa moraa jagaaye mohe nindiyaa naa aaye main na jaauun kidhar o more raajaa qasam merii aajaa mohe chhod na jaanaa jii

Title: ajiib saanehaa mujh par guzar gayaa yaaro
Lyrics: ajiib saanehaa mujh par guzar gayaa yaaro main apane saaye se kal raat dar gayaa yaaro  har ek naqsh tamannaa kaa ho gayaa dhundhalaa har ek zakm mere dil kaa bhar gayaa yaaro  bhatak rahii thii jo kashtii vo gaqreaab huii chadhaa huaa thaa jo dariyaa utar gayaa yaaro  vo kaun thaa vo kahaan kaa thaa kyaa huaa thaa use sunaa hai aaj koii shaks mar gayaa yaaro

Title: tum jaan ho dil ho mohabbat ho vafaa tum ho
Lyrics: tum jaan ho dil ho mohabbat ho vafaa tum ho qurbaan dil tum par mere dil ke kudaa tum ho qurbaan dil tum par threedots  letii hain tumhaaraa naam saansen merii sanam puujen tumhen subahoshaam aankhen merii sanam naa tumase main huun duur naa mujhase tum judaa ho qurbaan dil tum par threedots  maine tumhen paakar paayaa hai apanaa pataa  tasviir lage merii cheharaa ye pyaar bharaa main jisamen suurat dekhuun vo aaiinaa tum ho qurbaan dil tum par threedots

Title: tum ko fursat ho merii jaan to idhar dekh to lo
Lyrics: tum ko fursat ho merii jaan to idhar dekh to lo chaar aankhen na karo ek nazar dekh to lo  baat karane ke lie kaun tumhen kahataa hai na karo hamase koii baat magar dekh to lo  apane biimaaremohabbat kii tasallii ke lie haaledil puuchh to lo zakmejigar dekh to lo  dilebarbaad ko aabaad karo yaa na karo kam se kam tum meraa ujadaa huaa ghar dekh to lo

Title: kaamosh saa afasaanaa paanii se likhaa hotaa
Lyrics: kaamoshsaa afasaanaa paanii se likhaa hotaa na tum ne kahaa hotaa na ham ne sunaa hotaa dill kii baat na puuchh dil to aataa rahegaa dil bahakataa rahaa hai dil bahakataa rahegaa dil ko ham ne kuchh samajhaayaa hotaa kaamoshsaa afasaanaa threedots  sahame se rahate hain jab ye din dhalataa hai ek diyaa bujhataa hai ek diyaa jaltaa hai tum ne koii to diip jalaayaa hotaa kaamoshsaa afasaanaa threedots  itane saahil dhuundhe koii na saamane aayaa jab manjhadhaar men duube saahil thaamane aayaa tum ne saahil ko pahale bichhaayaa hotaa kaamoshsaa afasaanaa threedots

Title: sar se sarake sarake chunariyaa
Lyrics: koras sar se sarake sarake chunariyaa laaj bharii akhiyon men  2  ho maiyaa gaae saajan o bahanaa hoke magan naachen sakhiyon men  strii nainon men nindiyaa nindiyaa men sapane sapanon men saajan jabase basaa bahaaren aayii jiivan men nayiin halachal hai tan man men ik ruup basaa hai ankhiyon men koras sar se sarakethreedots  purushh kuchh lamhen jiivan ke churaalen saanson kii ye aag bujhaa den duniyaa se duur nayiin duniyaan basaa den  strii jab se milii hai tujhase nazar jaaduu ye kaisaa mujhape huaa ke dil jab tanahaa lagataa hai mujhe kuchh aisaa lagataa hai tuu jhanak rahaa hai ankhiyon men koras sar se sarakethreedots  purushh aaj kaa har ik pal sundar hai kal kyaa ho kisako ye khabar hai lanbaa safar zindagi muqtasar hai  strii dar lag rahaa hai kyaa jaane kyaa ho dil tujh ko maine jab se diyaa udii hain niinden ankhiyon se terii aisii hii baaton se badanaam huii huun sakhiyon men koras sar se sarakethreedots  purushh taaron se ye maang sajaa duun hothon pe ik phuul khilaa duun tere liye saarii duniyaa bhulaa duun  strii mahakegaa saaraa gulashan hamaaraa dil kaa sahaaraa baahen terii khushii se harii bharii hogii ye duniyaa terii merii hogii ik phuul khilegaa bagiyon men

Title: jahaan men koii nahiin hai apanaa
Lyrics: jahaan  men  koii  nahiin  hai  apanaa har  ek  ko kuub  aazmaayaa huii  karam  kii  jahaan  tavaqqo usii  ne  jii  khol  kar  sataayaa  kisii  kii  barbaad zindagii hai kisii  ko  ronaa hai apane dil kaa tumhiin bataa do bajuz ziyaan ke kisii ne kyaa tum se mil ke payaa  har ek  zarre  se  tum  ko puuchhaa har ek goshe men dii sadaaen pataa to do kuchh kahaan chhupe ho ki har jagah tum ko dhuundh aayaa  jo haan kahuun unape harf aae nahiin jo kah duun to main hii jhuutaa savaal  karate  hain  woh  mujhii  se ke  ham  ne  dil  ko tere dukhaayaa

Title: tum ik gorakhdhandaa ho
Lyrics: kabhii yahaan tumhen dhuundhaa kabhii vahaan pahunchaa tumhaarii diid kii kaatir kahaankahaan pahunchaa gariib mit gae paamaal ho gae lekin kisii talak na teraa aaj tak nishaan pahunchaa  ho bhii nahiin aur har jaa ho ho bhii nahiin aur har jaa ho tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  har zarre men kis shaan se tuu jalvaanumaa hai hairaan hai magar aql ke kaisaa hai tuu kyaa hai tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  tujhe dairoharam men mainne dhuundhaa tuu nahiin milataa magar tashariigfarmaa tujhe apane dil men dekhaa hai tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  dhuundhe nahiin mile ho na dhuundhe se kahiin tum aur phir ye tamaashaa hai jahaan ham hain vahiin tum tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  jab bajuz tere koii duusaraa maujuud nahiin phir samajh men nahiin aataa teraa pardaa karanaa tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  jo ulfat men tumhaarii kho gayaa hai usii khoe hue ko kuchh milaa hai nahiin hai tuu to phir inakaar kaisaa nafii bhii tere hone kaa pataa hai main jisako kah rahaa huun apanii hastii agar vo tuu nahiin to aur kyaa hai nahiin aayaa khayaalon men agar tuu to phir main kaise samajhaa tuu khudaa hai tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  hairaan huun is baat pe tum kaun ho kyaa ho haath aao to but haath na aao to kudaa ho tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  aql men jo ghir gayaa laintahaa kyonkar huaa jo samajh men aa gayaa phir vo kudaa kyonkar huaa tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  chhupate nahiin ho saamane aate nahiin ho tum jalvaa dikhaake jalvaa dikhaate nahiin ho tum dairoharam ke jhagade mitaate nahiin ho tum jo asl baat hai vo bataate nahiin ho tum hairaan huun mere dil men samaae ho kis tarah haalaanke do jahaan men samaate nahiin ho tum ye maabaadoharam ye kaliisaa vo dair kyon harjaaii ho tabhii to bataate nahiin ho tum tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  dil pe hairat ne ajab rang jamaa rakhaa hai ek ulajhii huii tasaviir banaa rakhaa hai kuchh samajh men nahiin aataa ke ye chakkar kyaa hai khel kyaa tumane azal se ye rachaa rakhaa hai ruuh ko jism ke pinjare kaa banaakar kaidii usape phir maut kaa paharaa bhii bithaa rakhaa hai ye buraaii vo bhalaaii ye jahannum vo bahisht is ulatpher men farmaao to kyaa rakhaa hai apanii pahachaan kii khaatir hai banaayaa sabako sabakii nazaron se magar khud ko chhupaa rakhaa hai tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  raahetahaqiiq men har gaam pe ulajhan dekhuun vahii haalaatokhayaalaat men anaban dekhuun banake rah jaataa huun tasaviir pareshaanii kii gaur se jab bhii kabhii duniyaa kaa darpan dekhuun ek hii kaaq pe fitrat ke tajaadaat itane itane hisson men bantaa ek hii aangan dekhuun kahiin zahamat kii sulagatii huii patjhad kaa samaa kahiin rahamat ke barasate hue saavan dekhuun kahiin phunkaarate dariyaa kahiin khaamosh pahaad kahiin jangal kahiin saharaa kahiin gulashan dekhuun kuun rulaataa hai ye taqsiim kaa andaaz mujhe koii dhanavaan yahaan par koii nirdhan dekhuun din ke haathon men faqat ek sulagataa suuraj raat kii maang sitaaron se muzaiiyyan dekhuun kahiin murajhaae hue phuul hain sachchaaii ke aur kahiin jhuuth ke kaanton pe bhii joban dekhuun  raat kyaa shay hai saveraa kyaa hai ye ujaalaa ye andheraa kyaa hai main bhii naayib huun tumhaaraa aakir kyon ye kahate ho ke teraa kyaa hai tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho  jo kahataa huun maanaa tumhen lagataa hai buraa saa phir bhii hai mujhe tumase baharhaal gilaa saa har zulm kii taufiiq hai zaalim kii viraasat mazaluum ke hisse men tasallii na dilaasaa kal taaj sajaa dekhaa thaa jis shaqs ke sar par hai aaj usii shaqs ke haathon men hii kaasaa yah kyaa hai agar puuchhuun to kahate ho javaaban is raaz se ho sakataa nahiin koii shanaasaa tum ik gorakh dhandaa ho

Title: gam na kar zamaanaa aur aayegaa
Lyrics: gam na kar khushii kaa daur aayegaa gam na kar zamaanaa aur aayegaa  khatm ho gayii sitam kii daastaan jhuk rahaa hai ab zamiin pe aasamaan ab na ye hansii terii rulaayegaa gam na kar threedots  aa gaye hain dekho din bahaar ke din guzar gaye hain intazaar ke duhkh kaa ye samaa badal hii jaayegaa gam na kar threedots  chaar din guzaar de hansii khushii aa gayaa vo vaqt jab kii aadamii thokaren nasiib ke na khaayegaa gam na kar threedots  dekhanaa ye raat kat hii jaayegii isake baad subah muskuraayegii ik nayaa jahaan jagamagaayegaa gam na kar threedots

Title: shaamegam kii qasam aaj gamagiin hain ham
Lyrics: shaamegam kii qasam aaj gamagiin hain ham aa bhii jaa aa bhii jaa aaj mere sanam shaamegam kii qasam dil pareshaan hain raat viiraan hain dekh jaa kis tarah aaj tanahaa hain ham shaamegam kii qasam  chain kaisaa jo pahaluu men tuu hii nahiin maar daale na dardejudaai kahiin rut hansiin hain to kyaa chaandanii hai to kyaa chaandanii zulm hai aur judaai sitam shaamegam kii qasam  ab to aajaa ke ab raat bhii so gai zindagii gam ke seharaav men kho gai   2 dhuundhatii hain nazar tuu kahaan hain magar dekhate dekhate aayaa aankhon men gam shaamegam kii qasam

Title: aansuu kii buund hai kabhii jiivan
Lyrics: aansuu kii buund hai kabhii jiivan  kabhii muskaan hai                    2 aansuu kii buund  barasaat kii ulajhan men jaa  aashaaon ke diipak jalaa            2 jiinaa bahut mushkil sahii maranaa kahaan aasaan hai aansuu kii buund  jo baat hai dil men dabii  khoii na aankhon men kahiin      2 tham jaaegaa dil men teraa jo dard kaa tuufaan hai aansuu kii buund  baazii us kii maut ho  bhuule jo apane aap ko                2 us ne gagan ko chhuu liyaa apane jise pahachaan hai aansuu kii buund hai kabhii jiivan kabhii muskaan hai aansuu kii buund

Title: dilarubaaii kii adaa dekhe koii
Lyrics: dilarubaaii kii adaa dekhe koii but men bhii shaanekudaa dekhe koii  kaat daale mere par sayyaad ne chahachahaane kii sazaa dekhe koii  bin kahe kaifiiyatedil kah gaii jaaduuechashmehayaa dekhe koii  apanon se apanii shanaashaaii nahiin ye bhii jiine kii adaa dekhe koii  jab bhii aarif ye chalii ultii chalii kyaa zamaane kii hawaa dekhe koii

Title: nigaahen naa phero chale jaaenge ham
Lyrics: nigaahen naa phero chale jaaenge ham 2 magar yaad rakhanaa ki yaad aaenge ham 2 nigaahen naa phero threedots  tumane jaaduu kiyaa hai nazaron se nazaren milaa ke 2 aashiyaan ab to banaa mere pahaluu men aa ke na daaman chhudaanaa bahak jaaenge ham 2 nigaahen naa phero threedots  kyuun naa kho jaaen sanam dil kii dhadakan hai javaan na tadapaao itanaa ki mar jaaenge ham 2 nigaahen naa phero threedots  zindagii pyaar kii hai fizaa ikaraar kii hai ye ghadii terii qasam nahiin inkaar kii hai mohabbat kii duniyaa men kho jaaenge ham nigaahen naa phero threedots

Title: jaaduu terii nazar khushabuu teraa badan
Lyrics: jadu teri nazar khushabu tera badan 2 	tu han kar ya na kar 2 	tu hai meri kiran 2 	jadu teri nazar threedots 	 	mere khvabon ki tasvir hai tu  	bekhabar meri taqadir hai tu    2 	tu kisi aur ki ho na jana 	kuchh bhi kar jaunga main divana 	tu han kar ya threedots 	 	fasale aur kam ho rahen hain  	dur se pas ham ho rahen hain    2 	mang lunga main tujhe asaman se 	chhin lunga tujhe is jahan se 	tu han kar ya threedots

Title: apanon ke sitam ham se bataae nahiin jaate
Lyrics: apanon ke sitam ham se bataae nahiin jaate ye haadase vo hain jo sunaae nahiin jaate  kuchh kam hii talluk hai muhabbat kaa junuun se diiwaane to hote hain banaae nahiin jaate  ik umr kii koshish se bhulaa dii hai terii yaad lekin abhii tak yaad ke saaye nahiin jaate  pyaalon men ho zaharaab ki kuchh aur ho faakir ab hothon se waapas to ye laae nahiin jaate

Title: jhiil rakhuun kamal rakhuun yaa jaam rakhuun
Lyrics: jhiil rakhuun kamal rakhuun yaa jaam rakhuun terii aankhon kaa kyaa naam rakhuun  saavan aah bhare ghataa jhuk jaaye dhuup chhup jaaye kahiin chhaanv ruk jaaye ghataa rakhuun chhaanv rakhuun ki shaam rakhuun terii zulfon kaa kyaa naam rakhuun  surkh honthon pe hansii aise khil jaaye bhor kii pahalii kiran jaise muskaaye kalii rakhuun kiran rakhuun gulfaam rakhuun tere honthon kaa kyaa naam rakhuun  mere kvaabon men kabhii tuu jo chalii aaye merii har saans giit nayaa koii gaaye giit rakhuun gazal rakhuun qalaam rakhuun terii suurat kaa kyaa naam rakhuun

Title: zulf raaton sii hai rangat hai ujaalon jaisii
Lyrics: zulf raaton sii hai rangat hai ujaalon jaisii par tabiiyat hai abhii bhuulane waalon jaisii  dhuundhataa phirataa huun logon men shabaahat usakii ke wo kwaabon men bhii lagatii hai kayaalon jaisii  kis ilaajaaremusaafat se main lautaa huun ke hain aansuon men bhii tapak paanv ke chhaalon jaisii  usakii baaten bhii dilaavez hain suurat kii tarah merii sochen bhii pariishaan mere baalon jaisii  usakii aankhon ko kabhii gaur se dekhaa hai faraaz

Title: pahale jo mohabbat se inkaar kiyaa hotaa
Lyrics: pahale jo mohabbat se inkaar kiyaa hotaa  yuun hamako na duniya se bezaar kiyaa hotaa   ab tere sivaa koi aankhon men nahiin rahataa  do roz to paradon men gulazaar kiyaa hotaa  pahale jo mohabbat se threedots   maaluum agar hotaa anjaam mohabbat ka  na dil hii diyaa hotaa na pyaar kiyaa hotaa  pahale jo mohabbat se threedots  main teri huun main teri kaanon mere kahanaa  aur bhaag ke duniya se aankhon men meri rahanaa  itanaa jo samajhate ham chupake se tera   na dil hii diyaa hotaa na pyaar kiyaa hotaa  pahale jo mohabbat se threedots

Title: merii zindagii hai zaalim
Lyrics: merii zindagii hai zaalim tere gam se aashakaaraa  teraa gam hai darhaqiiqat mujhe zindagii se pyaaraa   tuu agar buraa na maane to jahaanerangobuu men  main sukuunedil kii kaatir koii dhuundh luun sahaaraa  main bataauun farq naaseh jo hai mujh men aur tujh men  merii zindagii talaatum terii zindagii kinaaraa  koii ai shakiil dekhe ye junuun nahiin to kyaa hai  ki usii ke ho gaye ham jo na ho sakaa hamaaraa

Title: rahiye ab aisii jagah chalakar jahaan koii na ho
Lyrics: rahiye ab aisii jagah chalakar jahaan koii na ho ham sukan koii na ho aur hamzabaan koii na ho  be darodiivaar sa ek ghar banaayaa chaahiye koii hamasaayaa na ho aur paasabaan koii na ho  padiye gar biimaar to koii na ho tiimaaradaar aur agar mar jaayen to nohaakvaan koii na ho

Title: madhuban men na shyaam bulaao
Lyrics: madhuban men  madhuban men na shyaam bulaao mujh me nahiin bal jaane kaa zor hai tum me to aane kaa bebas ko duniyaa thukaraatii tum to nahiin thukaraao  madhuban men na shyaam bulaao  jis man me tumhaaraa pyaar basaa vo sunaa man gulazaar banaa tum basant ban kar aaoo madhuban men na shyaam bulaao   jag me dayaa kii dhuum tumhaarii phir kyon tadape aankh hamaarii jiivan dvaar to bandh honaa hain ab na raah dikhaao  madhuban men na shyaam bulaao  3

Title: aanchal se kyon baandh liyaa mujh paradesii kaa pyaar
Lyrics: aanchal se kyon baandh liyaa mujh paradesii kaa pyaar jaanewaale se rukane kii aashaa hai bekaar aanchal se kyon threedots  kal subah hone se pahale karungaa jaane kii taiyaarii phir saaraa din dhal jaayegaa aur aayegii shaam andhiyaarii khadii khadii tum raah takogii rakh ke kamar par haath aa haa aanchal se kyon threedots  yuun hii raat bhii aa jaayegii lekin main nahiin aauungaa duur khadaa manzil pe kahiin main thak kar jab so jaauungaa  merii kamii mahasuus karoge rowoge afasos karoge bolo phir kyaa nirdayii kah kar bandh  khule dvaar aanchal se kyon threedots

Title: hansane kii chaah ne itanaa mujhe rulaayaa hai
Lyrics: hansane ki chaah ne itana mujhe rulaaya hai koi hamadard nahin dard mera saaya hai  dil to ulajha hi raha zindagi ki baaton men saansen  jalati hain kabhi kabhi raaton men kisi ki aahaten ye kaun muskuraaya hai koi hamadard nahin threedots  sapane chhalate hi rahe roz nai raahon se koi phisalaa hai abhi abhi baahon se kisi ki aah par taaron ko pyaar aaya hai koi hamadard nahin threedots

Title: odh chunariyaa taaron kii chandaa ko lene raat chalii
Lyrics: kar solah singaar baanvarii mahandii se rang haath chalii  badii badii ummiiden lekar chalii piyaa ko manaane man hii man men daratii hai vo maane yaa na maane haay ye diivaane dil men ab dilakii lekar baat chalii  jab usane pii apane dekhe aankh usakii bhar aaii ye thii apanaa jise samajhatii nikalaa vo harjaaii ye baanvarii prem kii dekho aaj hai lekar ghaat chalii  odh chunariyaa taaron kii chandaa ko lene raat chalii

Title: are tuune abhii dekhaa nahiin dekhaa hai to jaanaa nahiin
Lyrics: are tune abhii dekhaa nahiin dekhaa hai to jaanaa nahiin jaanaa hai to maanaa nahiin mujhe pahachaanaa nahiin        	    duniyaa divaanii merii           	    mere piichhe piichhe bhaagii kis men hai dam yahaan thahare jo mere aage  mere aage aanaa nahiin dekho takaraanaa nahiin kisii se bhii haare nahiin ham   	    jo soche jo chaahe vo karake dikhaaden 	    ham vo hain jo do aur do paanch banaa den  2  		haay 		tune abhii dekhaa nahiin  		dekhaa hai to jaanaa nahiin  		ham aag lagaa den paanii men 	 		patthar pe phuul khilaayen  		bin mausam bin baadal  		rimajhim saavan barasaaye  		hu  ho ho ho ho  		puurab ke suuraj ko pashchim se ugaa den 		ham vo hain jo do aur do paanch banaa den  		he tune abhii dekhaa nahiin  		dekhaa hai to jaanaa nahiin  		are ham manamaujii mastaane mastii ke saaj bajaayen  		to jhuumen ye dharatii o chaand sitaare gaaen   		ho  ho ho ho ho  		phuulon kii raahon se kaaton ko hataa den 		ham vo hain jo do aur do paanch banaa den  		he  tune abhii dekhaa nahiin  		dekhaa hai to jaanaa nahiin  		jaanaa hai to maanaa nahiin  		mujhe pahachaanaa nahiin  		duniyaa divaanii merii  		mere piichhe piichhe bhaagii  		kisamen hai dam yahaan  		thahare jo mere aage 		mere aage aanaa nahiin  	        dekho takaraanaa nahiin 		kisii se bhii haare nahiin hamthreedots 		 		jo sochen jo chaahen vo kar ke dikhaa den  		ham vo hain jo do aur do paanch banaa den 		 		jo sochen jo chaahen vo kar ke dikhaa den  		ham vo hain jo do aur do paanch banaa den  		laa laathreedots

Title: jafaaon ke badale bhii nazarewafaa dii
Lyrics: jafaaon ke badale bhii nazarewafaa dii sitam karane waalon ko hamane duaa dii  adaa ho sakii kab mohabbat kii kiimat tere pyaar men jaan bhii dii to kyaa dii  teraa naam aayaa jo merii zabaan par hawaa gunagunaa dii fizaa muskuraa dii  dilon se jo karataa rahaa dil kaa suadaa dukaan usane kahate hain kabase badhaa dii  samandar kii maujon ne aarif se puuchhaa kinaare pe kyuun tuune kashtii jalaa dii

Title: tuu mere saamane hai terii zulfen hain khulii
Lyrics: tuu mere saamane hai  terii zulfen hain khulii  teraa aanchal hai dhalaa  main bhale hosh men kaise rahuun  2  tuu mere saamane hai threedots  terii aankhen to chhalakate hue paimaane hain aur tere honth larajate hue maikhaane hain main bhalaa hosh men kaise rahuun kaise rahuun tuu mere saamane hai threedots  tuu jo hansatii hai to bijalii sii chamak jaatii hai terii saanson se gulaabon kii mahak aatii hai tuu jo chalatii hai to kudarat bhii bahak jaatii hai main bhalaa hosh men kaise rahuun kaise rahuun tuu mere saamane hai threedots

Title: dil pukaare aare aare aare abhii naa jaa mere saathii
Lyrics: rafii dil pukaare aare aare aare  2 abhii naa jaa mere sathi  dil pukaare aare aare aare  lataa othreedots abhii na jaa mere sathi  dono dil pukaare aare aare aare   rafii barason biite dil pe kaabuu paate  ham to haare tum hii kuchh samajhaate  lataa samajhaatii main tumako laakhon aramaan  kho jaate hain lab tak aate aate  rafii othreedots puuchho na kitanii baaten padii hain  dil men hamaare  dil pukaare aare aare aare  lataa othreedots abhii na jaa mere sathi  dono dil pukaare aare aare aare   lataa paake tumako hai kaisii matavaalii  aankhen meri bin kaajal ke kaalii  rafii jivan apana main bhi rangiin kar luun  mil jaaye jo in hothon kii laalii  lataa othreedots jo bhi hai apana laayii huun sab kuchh  paas tumhaare  dil pukaare aare aare aare  rafii othreedots abhii na jaa mere sathi  dono dil pukaare aare aare aare   rafii mahakaa mahakaa anchal halke halke  rah jati ho kyon palkon se malake  lataa jaise suuraj ban kar aaye ho tum  chal doge phir din ke dhalate dhalate  rafii othreedots aaj kaho to mod duun badhake  vaqt ke dhaare  dil pukaare aare aare aare  lataa othreedots abhii na jaa mere sathi  dono dil pukaare aare aare aare  abhii na jaa mere sathi  dil pukaare aare aare aarethreedots

Lyrics: merii muhabbat qubuul kar lo merii muhabbat qubuul kar lo gariib shaayar ke aansuon kaa haqiir tohafaa qubuul kar lo merii muhabbat  merii muhabbat men saadagii hai merii muhabbat me aajadii hai merii muhabbat men shaayarii hai ye shaayarii bhii to aapakii hai merii muhabbat qubuul kar lo haaye  merii muhabbat hai chaand jaisii jo shab men kiranen lutaa rahaa ho merii muhabbat hai fuul jaisii jo har ghadii muskuraa rahaa ho merii muhabbat  mujhe to kuchh isakaa gam nahiin hai ke merii duniyaa men gam hii gam hain merii muhabbat chakor jaisii ke jis pe jitanaa ho naaz kam hai merii muhabbat threedots

Title: chhotii sii kahaanii se baarishon kii paanii se

Title: yaa dil kii suno duniyaavaalon yaa mujhako abhii chup rahane do
Lyrics: yaa dil kii suno duniyaavaalon yaa mujhako abhii chup rahane do main gam ko khushii kaise kah duun jo kahate hain unako kahane do  ye phul chaman me kaisaa khilaa maalii kii nazar me pyaar nahiin hansate hue kyaa kyaa dekh liyaa ab bahate hain aansuu bahane do yaa dil kii suno threedots  ek khvaab khushii kaa dekhaa nahiin dekhaa jo kabhii to bhul gaye maanaa ham tumhen kuchh de naa sake jo tumane diyaa vo sahane do yaa dil kii suno threedots  kyaa dard kisii kaa legaa koi itanaa to kisii men dard nahiin bahate hue aansuu aur bahen ab aisii tasallii rahane do ya dil kii suno threedots

Title: chandaa re chandaa re kabhii to zamiin par aa
Lyrics: ha   chandaa re chandaa re       kabhii to zamiin par aa       baithenge baaten karenge       tujhako aate idhar        laaj aaye agar       odh ke aajaa tuu baadal ghane        gulashan gulashan vaadii vaadii bahatii hai resham jaisii havaa       jangal jangal parvat parvat hain niind men sab ik mere sivaa       cahndaa chandaa       aajaa sapanon kii niilii nadiyaa men nahaayen       aajaa ye taare chunake ham ghaar banaaen       in dhundhalii dhundhalii raahon men aa donon hii kho jaaen  saa  chandaa re chandaa re       kabhii to zamiin par aa       baithenge baaten karenge       tujhako aate idhar       laaj aaye agar       odh ke aajaa tuu baadal ghane        chandaa se puuchhenge ham saare savaal niraale       jharane kyon gaate hain panchhii kyon matavaale ha   ho kyon hai saavan mahiinaa ghataaon kaa       chandaa se puuchhenge ham saare savaal niraale saa  chandaa chandaa       titalii ke par kyon itane rangiin hote hain       juganuu raaton men jaage to kab sote hain ha   in dhundhaliidhundhalii raahon men aa donon hii kho jaaen

Title: yaar chulabulaa hai hasiin dilarubaa hai
Lyrics: yaar chulabulaa hai hansiin dilarubaa hai jhuuth bolataa hai magar zaraa zaraa to bolo jii phir kyaa kare diivaanaa  ye kise pataa hai ye husn kii adaa hai tumako dil diyaa hai magar zaraa zaraa to dekho jii dhokhe men aa na jaanaa  chhodo sharaarat shabaab ke hain din bachapan ke shaayad janaab ke hain din bas isii adaa pe ham sanam tumhaare ho liye kis tarah yaqiin hamako aae ye to boliye to suna lo to suna lo to sunsunsunsunsun to suna lo jii kahataa kyaa zamaanaa yaar chulabulaa hai threedots  ulajhe se baalon kaa hai ye haal kyaa tumane jo dekha to aa gayaa nashaa chal rahaa hai tiir dil bachaaiye bachaaiye pahale nainon kii jhukii kamaan to uthaaiye to dekho to dekho to dedededede to dekho jii dil ho gayaa nishaanaa yaar chulabulaa hai threedots  aise hasiinon kaa aitabaar kyaa achchhaa to takate ho baar baar kyaa dekhataa huun kisane ye hasiin shakal banaaii hai aisaa lag rahaa hai tumane gaharii chot khaaii hai to dekho to dekho to dedededede to dekho jii is dil ka talamalaanaa yaar chulabulaa hai threedots

Title: bichhad ke bhii mujhe tujhase ye badagumaanii hai
Lyrics: bichhad ke bhii mujhe tujhase ye badagumaanii hai ke merii yaad kabhii to tujhe bhii aanii hai  har ek shaks ko apanaa banaa ke dekh liyaa milenge ab na kisii se ye dil men thaanii hai  shajar udaas hai chidiyon ke chahachahe gumasum ki tere baad ye tanhaa sii zindagaanii hai

Title: do ghadii vo jo paas aa baithe ham zamaane se duur jaa baithe
Lyrics: rafi  do ghadi vo jo paas aa baithe  ham zamaane se dur jaa baithe   asha  do ghadi vo jo paas aa baithe  ham zamaane se dur jaa baithe   rafi  bhuul kii unakaa hamnashiin ho ke  royenge dil ko umr bhar kho ke  2 haay kyaa chiiz thii ganvaa baithe   asha  dilako ek din zarur jana thaa  vahi pahuncha jahan thikana thaa   2  dil vahii dil jo dil men jaa baithe  rafi  ek dil hi tha gamagusar apanaa  meharaban khaas raazadar apanaa   2 gair ka kyon ise banaa baithe   asha  gair bhi to koi hasin hogaa  dil yun hi de diya nahin hogaa   2 dekh kar kuchh to dil lagaa baithe  do ghadi vo jo paas aa baithe  ham jamaane se dur jaa baithe

Title: bhuulane vaale yaad na aa
Lyrics: bhuulane vaale yaad na aa   2  dekh hamen majabuur na kar  tujhako kasam dukh dur na kar  ham to jiye bas tere liye  tune kuchh aise ranj diye  thes lagi dil tuut gayaa  bhuulane vaale yaad na aa threedots   haay vafaa nakaam huii  subah ke badale shaam huii  phuul khushi ke khil na sake  aankh milii dil mil na sake  dekh liyaa anjaamevafaa  bhulane vaale yaad na aa threedots   dil se mitaa ulfat ka nishaan  tujhase hamaaraa pyaar kahaan  pyaar ka naataa tod yahiin  giit adhuuraa chhod yahiin  main bhi na gaaun tu bhi na gaa  bhulane vaale yaad na aa threedots

Title: terii to chaand sitaaron men baat hotii hai
Lyrics: terii to chaand sitaaron men baat hotii hai 2 chaman chaman men bahaaron men baat hotii hai chaman chaman men  mere junuun se wo shoharat hai tere jalawon kii 2 jidhar bhii jaao hazaaron men baat hotii hai chaman chaman men  sitam wo karate hain jisapar badii tavajjo se 2 ye usake uunche muqaddar kii baat hotii hai chaman chaman men  tere shabaab ko dekhaa sharaab chhuut gaii 2 yahii sharaab ke maaron men baat hotii hai terii to chaand sitaaron men baat hotii hai chaman chaman men bahaaron men baat hotii hai chaman chaman men

Lyrics: dil ke aa jaane ke din aane lage aaiinaa dekhaa to sharamaane lage  band palakon men koii chhupane lagaa chaandanii raaton se ghabaraane lage  suramaii kvaabon men kvaabon kii qasam ajanabii chehare nazar aane lage  kamasinii terii adaaen taubaa thaa idhar jaanaa udhar jaane lage  aashiyaan men na chhupaao bijalii naasamajh the jo ye samajhaane lage  dil ko ab kaise bachaaen anjum vo mere sar kii qasam khaane lage

Title: na shivaale na khalisaa na haram jhuuthe hain
Lyrics: naa shivaale naa khalasaa naa haram jhuthe hai  2 bas yahii sach hai ke tum jhuthe ho ham jhuthe hain naa shivaale threedots  hamane dekhaa hii nahii bolate ko ab tak  2 kaun kahataa hai ke patthar ke sanam jhuthe hain naa shivaale threedots  unase miliye to khushii hotii hai unase milakar  2 shahar ke dusare logon se jo kam jhuthe hain naa shivaale threedots  kuchh to hai baat tahariron men tasir nahiin  2 jhuthe fanakaar nahiin to kalam jhuthe hain naa shivaale threedots

Title: giit gaataa huun main gunagunaataa huun main
Lyrics: giit gaataa huun main gunagunaataa huun main main ne hansane kaa vaadaa kiyaa thaa kabhii isaliye ab sadaa muskuraataa huun main  ye muhabbat ke pal kitane anamol hain kitane phuulon se naazuk mere bol hain sab ko phuulon kii maalaa pahanaataa huun main muskuraataa huun main giit gaataa huun main threedots  roshanii hogii itanii kise thii khabar mere man kaa ye darpan gayaa hai nikhar saaf hai ab ye darpan dikhaataa huun main muskuraataa huun main giit gaataa huun main threedots

Title: ilaahii kyaa ye shabegam hai umr bhar ke liye mukesh gazal
Lyrics: ilaahii kyaa ye shabegam hai umr bhar ke liye main kabase jaag rahaa huun bas ek sahar ke liye  dil agar unake didaar ko tarasataa hai unhii ke gam men lahu aankh se barasataa hai shariiqehaal bane the jo umr bhar ke liye main kabase jaag rahaa huun bas ek sahar ke liye  mere hii dam se thii aabaad rahaguzar unakii merii taraf nahiin uthatii hai ab nazar unakii jahaan ko chhod diyaa jinakii rahaguzar ke liye main kabase jaag rahaa huun bas ek sahar ke liye  ye iltijaa hai ki ab umr mukhtasar karade main jisakii raat naa dekhuun vohii sahar karade ilaahii kya ye shabegam hai umr bhar ke liye main kabase jaag rahaa huun bas ek sahar ke liye

Lyrics: la chhabi terii madhur madhur pyaare     par aansuu mere haare hain     nainon se bahe jal kii dhaaraa     man men mere angaare hain     man men mere angaare hain 3  su aasha ke palav suukh gaaye     aasha ke palav suukh gaaye     kumhalayii sapanon kii kaliyaan     kal milan muralii kaa baagi jahaan     suunii man madhuban kii galiyaan     suune nainon ke gagan biich     ye aansuu bhor ke taare hain     man men mere angaare hai threedots  la man men mere angaare hain threedots      jab chaah na puurii honii thii     jab chaah na puurii honii thii     dii chaah milan kii kyon man ko     yuun jiinaa hai to jiine kaa     adhikaar diyaa kyon jiivan ko     kab ghadii milan kii aayegii     ye vikal praan path haare hain     man men mere angaare hain threedots  do man men mere angaare hain threedots
