Lyrics: pushhp kii abhilaashhaa  chaah nahiin main sur balaa ke  gahanon men guundhaa jaauun  chaah nahiin premii maalaa men bandh  pyaarii ko lalachaauun   chaah nahiin samraaton ke  shav par he hari dalaa jaauun chaah nahiin devon ke shir par  chadhuun bhaagya par ithalaauun   mujhe tod lenaa van maalii us path par denaa tum phenk  matribhuumi par shiish chadhaane  jis path jaayen vir anek  jis path jaayen vir anek

Title: phir chhedane aaii hai vo kaali badariyaa
Lyrics: phir chhedane aaii hai vo kaali badariyaa2 ab tum hii kaho haan ab tum hii kaho kaise main sambhaluun saanvariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai vo kaali badariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai  daaman men badariyaa ke hain saavan kii ghataayen2 khaamosh zabaanii men jo ye tujhako sunaayen2 ai ruuthe hue o ai ruuthe hue sabr kii chalakii hai gagariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai vo kaali badariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai  is rut men jo ruuthe vo kabhii chain naa paaye2 saavan kabhii jiivan men phir uske na aaye2 lag jaaye use o lag jaaye use kaali badariyaa kii nazariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai vo kaali badariyaa phir chhedane aaii hai

Title: ham ko man kii shakti denaa mana vijaya karen
Lyrics: ham ko man kii shakti denaa mana vijaya karen  duusaronkii jaya se pahale khudakii jaya karen  ham ko man kii shakti denaa  threedots  bhedabhaava apane dilase saaf kara saken  duusaronse bhuul ho to maaf kara saken  jhuutha se bache rahen sachakaa dama bharen  duusaronkii jayase pahale khudakii jaya karen  ham ko man kii shakti denaa  threedots  mushkilen paden to hamape itanaa karma kara  saatha den to dharm kaa chalen to dharm para  khudape hausalaa rahe sachakaa dama bharen  duusaronkii jayase pahale khudakii jaya karen  ham ko man kii shakti denaa  threedots

Title: jaane jigar haay haay dekho to idhar haay haay
Lyrics: jaane jigar haay haay dekho to idhar haay haay nazaren to laakhon hain magar terii nazar haay haay  rukii hai bahaar ghataaon ke tale javaan hai khumaar kahaan uth ke chale dekho jii meraa dil na jale dilbar haay haay jaane jigar haay haay dekho to idhar haay haay  na le dil kii aah teraa hogaa bhalaa milaa le nigaah chaahe dil na milaa nazaren milaa jaaduu chalaa chalaa jaaduu chalaa jaaduugar haay haay jaane jigar haay haay dekho to idhar haay haay  nazar men jalaa ke umangon ke diye aaye the huzuur badii aas liye mudake zaraa dekh bhii lo zaraa dekh bhii lo jii idhar haay haay jaane jigar haay haay dekho to idhar haay haay

Title: jaanebahaar husn teraa bemisaal hai
Lyrics: jaanebahaar husn teraa bemisaal hai vallaah kamaal hai are vallaah kamaal hai  aaii hai mere paas tuu is aanbaan se utarii ho jaise koii parii aasmaan se main kyaa kahuun khushii se ajab meraa haal hai  haay ye terii mast adaaen ye baakapan 2 kiranon ko bhii main chhuune na duungaa ye goraa tan tujhase nazar milaae ye kisakii majaal hai  main khushanasiib huun ke tujhe mainne paa liyaa 2 tuune karam kiyaa mujhe apanaa banaa liyaa aise mile hain ham ke bichhadanaa muhaal hai

Title: ham ki thahare ajanabii itanii madaaraaton ke baad
Lyrics: ham ki thahare ajanabii itanii madaaraaton ke baad phir banenge aashnaa kitanii mulaaqaaton ke baad  kab nazar men aayegii bedaag sabze kii bahaar kuun ke dhabbe dhulenge kitanii barasaaton ke baad  the bahut bedard katmedardeishq ke thiin bahut besabr subahen meharabaan raaton ke baad  dil to chaahaa par shikastedil ne mohalat hii na dii kuchh gile shikawe bhii kar lete munaajaaton ke baad  unase jo kahane gaye the faiz jaansadaqe kiye anakahii hii rah gaii wo baat sab baaton ke baad

Title: dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii fursat ke raat din
Lyrics: dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii furasat ke raat din  2 baithe rahe tasavvurejaanaan kiye hue dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii furasat ke raat dinthreedots  jaadon kii narm dhuup aur aangan men let kar  2 aankhon pe khiinchakar tere aanchal ke saae ko aundhe pade rahe kabhii karavat liye hue dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii furasat ke raat dinthreedots  yaa garamiyon kii raat jo puravaaiyaan chalen  2 thandii safed chaadaron pe jaagen der tak taaron ko dekhate rahen chhat par pade hue dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii furasat ke raat dinthreedots  barfiilii sardiyon men kisii bhii pahaad par  2 vaadii men guunjatii huii khaamoshiyaan sunen aankhon men bhiige bhiige se lamhe liye hue dil dhuundhataa hai phir vahii furasat ke raat dinthreedots

Title: aaj kal paanv zamiin par nahiin padate mere
Lyrics: aaj kal paanv zamiin par nahiin padate mere  bolo dekhaa hai kabhii tumane mujhe udate hue 2 aaj kal paanv zamiin par nahiin padate mere  jab bhii thaamaa hai teraa haath to dekhaa hai 2 log kahate hain ke bas haath kii rekhaa hai hamane dekhaa hai do taqadiiron ko judate hue aaj kal paanvthreedots  niind sii rahatii hai halakaa saa nashaa rahataa hai raatdin aankhon men ik chaharaa basaa rahataa hai par lagii aankhon ko dekhaa hai kabhii udate hue aaj kal paanvthreedots  jaane kyaa hotaa hai har baat pe kuchh hotaa hai din men kuchh hotaa hai aur raat men kuchh hotaa hai thaam lenaa jo kabhii dekho hamen udate hue aaj kal paanvthreedots  aaj kal paanv zamiin par nahiin padate mere

Title: pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa
Lyrics: pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa are pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa is ko pii kar aur pilaa kar is ko pii kar aur pilaa kar ban jaa tuu matavaalaa matavaalaa matavaalaa hari naam kaa pyaalaa are pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa  ye pyaalaa duniyaa se nyaaraa is kii rangat nyaarii 2 miithii miithii sondhii sondhii khushbuu pyaarii pyaarii are miithii miithii sondhii sondhii khushbuu pyaarii pyaarii are pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa is kii buund buund men bidhi ne is kii buund buund men bidhi ne sukh kaa amrut dhaalaa sukh kaa amrut dhaalaa ban jaa tuu matavaalaa matavaalaa matavaalaa hari naam kaa pyaalaa are pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaalaa  koii is ko sukh se pii kar dukh ko duur bhagaaye koii is ko duur duur se dukh kaa zahar bataaye haan dukh kaa zahar bataaye2 binaa piiye koii kyaa samajhe binaa piiye koii kyaa samajhe is kaa bhed niraalaa ban jaa tuu matavaalaa matavaalaa matavaala hari naam kaa pyaalaa 2 are pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaala haan re pii le pii le pii le pii le hari naam kaa pyaala

Title: raaste yaad nahiin raahanumaa yaad nahiin
Lyrics: raaste yaad nahiin raahanumaa yaad nahiin kuchh mujhe ab terii galiyon ke siwaa yaad nahiin  ek waadaa thaa jo shiishe kii tarah tuut gayaa haadasaa kab ye huaa kaise huaa yaad nahiin  yaad kyaa aayen wo biite huye saawan mujhako main wo panchhii huun jise apanii sadaa yaad nahiin  de sake tuu mere jazbaat kaa taanaa jisako mujhako aisii to koii apanii kataa yaad nahiin  duur rah kar bhii terii yaad ko puujaa mainne ye na kahanaa mujhe aadaabewafaa yaad nahiin

Title: terii aankhon ke sivaa duniyaa men rakhaa kyaa hai
Lyrics: terii aankhon ke sivaa duniyaa men rakkhaa kyaa hai ye uthen subah chale ye jhuken shaam dhale meraa jiinaa meraa maranaa inhiin palakon ke tale terii aankhon ke sivaa threedots  rafii palakon kii galiyon men chehare bahaaron ke hansate hue hain mere kaabon ke kyaakyaa nagar inamen basate hue ye uthen subah chale threedots  inamen mere aanevaale zamaane kii tasviir hai chaahat ke kaajal se likhii huii merii taqadiir hai ye uthen subah chale threedots  lataa thokar jahaan maine khaai inhonne pukaaraa mujhe ye hamasafar hain to kaafii hai inakaa sahaaraa mujhe  ye uthen subah chale threedots  ye hon kahiin inakaa saayaa mere dil se jaataa nahiin inake sivaa ab to kuchh bhii nazar mujhako aataa nahiin ye uthen subah chale threedots

Title: tere binaa jiyaa jaae naa
Lyrics: tere binaa jiyaa jaae naa  2 bin tere tere bin saajanaa saans men saans aae naa tere binaa threedots  jab bhii kayaalon men tuu aae mere badan se kushbuu aae mahake badan men rahaa na jaae rahaa jaae naa tere binaa threedots  reshamii raaten roz na hongii ye saugaaten roz na hongii zindagii tujh bin raas na aae raas aae naa tere binaa threedots

Title: saaqii pe ilzaam na aaye
Lyrics: saaqii pe ilzaam na aaye chaahe mujh tak jaam na aaye  qataraa qataraa pilaa na ai saaqii os se pyaas bhii bujhii hai kabhii saaqiyaa tashnagii kii taab nahiin zahar de de agar sharaab nahiin  tere siwaa jo kii ho muhabbat merii jawaanii kaam na aaye  jinake liye to mar bhii gaye ham wo chal ke do gaam na aaye  ishq kaa saudaa itanaa garaan hai puure hamase daam na aaye  mayakaane men sab hii to aaye lekin jigar kaa naam na aaye

Title: shall hue  paanv mere
Lyrics: shall hue  paanv mere ishq  men  manzil  ke  qariib nazaretuufaan huii kashatii merii saahil ke qariib  shiddatedard hii mumkin hai madaavaa ho jaae aap  laaen  to zaraa haath  mere  dil ke qariib  faizyaabii  ke   sabab   luut   liyaa   gairon  ne aah bhii apanii naa puhnchii terii mehafil ke qariib  allah allah  tere  rangiin  labon  kii  junbash rah gaii kaund ke bijalii sii mere dil ke qariib

Title: badaa natakhat hai re krishhnkanhaiyyaa kaa kare yashodaa maiyyaa
Lyrics: badaa natakhat hai re krishhnkanhaiyaa kaa kare yashodaa maiyyaa  haan threedots  badaa natakhat hai re  dhuundhe rii ankhiyaan use chaaron or jaane kahaan chhup gayaa nandakishor     2 ud gayaa aise jaise puravayyaa  kaa kare yashodaa maiyyaa  haan threedots  badaa natakhat hai re  aa tohe mai gale se lagaa luun  laage naa kisii kii nazar man me chhupaa luun      2 dhuup jagat hai re mamataa hai chhainyaa kaa kare yashodaa maiyyaa  haan threedots  badaa natakhat hai re  mere jiivan kaa tuu ek hii sapanaa  jo koi dekhe tohe samajhe vo apanaa      2 sab kaa hai pyaaraa ho sab kaa hai pyaaraa bansiibajayyaa kaa kare yashodaa maiyyaa  haan threedots  badaa natakhat hai re

Title: kaahe kaa ronaadhonaa hai
Lyrics: kaahe kaa ronaa kaahe kaa ronaadhonaa hai ho ke rahegaa jo honaa hai  ho ke rahegaa jo honaa hai 2 kaahe kaa ronaadhonaa hai 2 jab tak hamako jiinaa hai 2 dukh sahanaa aansuu piinaa hai kaahe kaa ronaadhonaa hai  dukh men hii aaraam milegaa 2 dukh men hii bhagawaan milegaa raambhagat ban jaane hii se shaktii kaa saamaan milegaa kaahe kaa ronaadhonaa hai  naam raam kaa bol re baabaa 4  ko 	raamraam siitaaraam 2  naam raam kaa bol re baabaa 4  ko 	raamraam siitaaraam 9

Title: baabul moraa naihar chhuuto hii jaae
Lyrics: baabul moraa naihar chhuuto hii jaae baabul moraa naihar chhuuto hii jaae  chaar kahaar mil morii doliyaa sajaaven   4 moraa apanaa begaanaa chhuto jaae baabul moraa threedots  aanganaa to parbat bhayo aur deharii bhayii bidesh je baabul ghar aapanaa main piiyaa ke desh baabul moraa threedots  baabul moraa naihar chhuuto hii jaae baabul moraa naihar chhuuto hii jaae

Title: dhiire dhiire se merii zindagii men aanaa
Lyrics: dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa tumase pyaar hame hai kitanaa jaanejaanaa tumase milakar tumako hai bataanaa  dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa tumase pyaar hame hai kitanaa jaanejaanaa tumase milakar tumako hai bataanaa  mere hothon pe ek tere sivaa koi naam nahin threedots bas yaad tujhe karate hain aur koi kaam nahin threedots dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa  dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa threedots  aur nind churaai mithii mithii baaton men threedots phir bhii terii har ek adaa par pyaar aayaa threedots aajaa aajaa ab kaisaa sharamaanaa dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa  dhire dhire se dil ko churaanaa threedots tumase milakar tumako hai bataanaa threedots

Title: ye terii saadagii ye teraa baankapan
Lyrics: ye terii saadagii ye teraa baankapan jaanebahaar jaanechaman haay taubaa shikan threedots  chaal men shokhiyaan yaa nashiilii bijaliyaan har taraf ye shor hai gir padegaa aasmaan par terii kaamoshii allaamaa  ye terii saadagii threedots  yuun kafaa na hoiye surkh gaalon kii qasam  threedots  ye sharam ye hayaa marhabaa ye terii saadagii threedots  tirchhii nazaron se na dekho aashiqedilgiir ko kaise tiir andaaz ho siidhaa to kar lo tiir ko ye gayaa dil meraa alvidaa ye terii saadagii threedots

Title: har koii chaahataa hai ik mutthii aasamaan
Lyrics: har koii chaahataa hai ik mutthii aasamaan har koii dhuundhataa hai ik mutthii aasamaan jo siine se lagaa le ho aisaa ik jahaan har koii chaahataa hai ik mutthii aasamaan har koii threedots  chaand sitaaron kaa melaa hai ye dil phir bhii akelaa hai  2 mahafil men hai shahanaaii phir bhii dil men hai tanahaaii hai saanson men jaise kaii tuufaan har koii har koii threedots  milataa nahiin kyaa yahaan ai dil phir kyon na mile giiton ki manjil  chalate jaanaa yuun hii rahon men bhar hii lagaa koi baahon main  hameshaa rahegaa na dil viraan har koi har koi threedots  har koi threedots mujhako jiine ka koi sahaaraa milaa gam ke tuufaan men koi kinaaraa milaa  suunii suunii thi jo raahen ban gayii pyaar kii baahen  lo khushiyon se meri huii pahachaan har koi har koi threedots  saudaa hai rishtedaarii yaarii ek dikhaavaa hai  apana kya hai duniya men man ka ek chhalaavaa hai  kahaan milegaa tujhako yaar zahar bharii duniya men pyaar  sabhii ajanabii hain sabhii anjaan  2 har koi har koi threedots  insaan honaa kaafii hai koi farishtaa nahiin to kya  dilon ke rishte kya kaam hain khuun ka rishtaa nahiin to kya  gair hii banate hain apane sach ho jaate hain sapane  jo dil ka ho sachchaa agar insaan har koi har koi threedots

Title: kaahe ko roye chaahe jo hoye
Lyrics: banegii aashaa ik din terii ye niraashaa  kaahe ko roye chaahe jo hoye safal hogii terii aaraadhanaa kaahe ko roye   threedots  aankhe terii kaahe naadaan chhalak gayii gaagar samaan samaa jaaye is men tuufaan jiyaa teraa saagar samaan jaane kyon tuune yuun asuvan se nain bhigoye kaahe ko roye   threedots  kahiin pe hai sukh kii chhaayaa kahiin pe hai dukhon kaa dhuup buraa bhalaa jaisaa bhii hai yahii to hai bagiyaa kaa ruup phuulon se kaanton se  maalii ne haar piroye kaahe ko roye   threedots  diyaa tuute to hai maatii jale to ye jyoti bane aansuu bahe to hai paanii ruke to ye motii bane ye motii aankhon kii puunjii hai ye na khoye kaahe ko roye   threedots

Title: bezubaanii zubaan na ho jaaye
Lyrics: bezubaanii zubaan na ho jaaye raazeulfat ayaan na ho jaaye  is qadar pyaar se na dekh mujhe phir tamannaa jawaan na ho jaaye  lutf aane lagaa jafaaon men wo kahiin meharabaan na ho jaaye  zikr unakaa zubaan par aayaa ye kahiin daastaan na ho jaaye

Title: javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad
Lyrics: yahaan vahaan saare jahaan men teraa raaj hai tere hii to sar pe muhabbat kaa taaj hai javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad  tuu bahaaron kaa ishaaraa besahaaron kaa sahaaraa sar pe tere haan haan tere hai bojh saaraa tere javaan haathon men duniyaa kii laaj hai javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad   threedots  tere liye kasamen nahiin kasamen nahiin rasamen nahiin tuu kisii ke haan kisii ke bas men nahiin judaa sabhii rasamon se teraa har rivaaz hai javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad   threedots  piichhe hai bachapan diivaanaa aage budhaapaa sayaanaa saath tere haan haan tere hai ye zamaanaa terii nazar to chaand taaron pe aaj hai javaanii o diivaanii tuu zindaabaad   threedots

Title: ye mard bade dil sard bade
Lyrics: ye mard bade dil sard bade bedard na dhokhaa khaanaa miithii miithii batiyon men bhuul ke na aanaa  hote hain chhote dil ke lambii zubaan vaale dete hain maal khotaa uunchii dukaan vaale chhotaa munh aur baat badii ye hai dastuur puraanaa miithii miithii batiyon men bhuul ke na aanaa   threedots  baat pate kii hai ye maano jo meraa kahanaa achchhaa hai aag se to duur hii duur rahanaa jhuuthii inakii jaat badii ye hai dastuur puraanaa miithii miithii batiyon men bhuul ke na aanaa   threedots  ye mard bade dil sard bade bedard chalo jii maanaa mardon kaa phir bhii gulaam hai zamaanaa   threedots  duniyaa ke saath chalo nayaa zamaanaa hai ye mardon ko dosh denaa raag puraanaa hai ye jhuuthii inakii jaat kaho yaa kaho inhen diivaanaa mardon kaa phir bhii gulaam hai zamaanaa   threedots  gussaa guruur ladanaa naarii kii bhuul hai ye thandaa mijaaz rakhanaa pahalaa usuul hai ye baat pate kii kahataa huun tum chaahe kaho diivaanaa mardon kaa phir bhii gulaam hai zamaanaa   threedots

Title: kaanton se khiinch ke ye aanchal
Lyrics: kaanton se khiinch ke ye aanchal tod ke bandhan baandhe paayal koii na roko dil kii udaan ko dil vo chalaa ha ha haa haa haa haa aaj phir jiine kii tamannaa hai aaj phir marane kaa iraadaa hai  2  kal ke andheron se nikal ke dekhaa hai aankhen malake malake phuul hii phuul zindagii bahaar hai tay kar liyaa a a aa aa aa aa aaj phir jiinethreedots  main huun khumaar yaa tuufaan huun koii bataae main kahaan huun dar hai safar men kahiin kho na jaauun main rastaa nayaa a a aa aa aa aa aaj phir jiinethreedots

Title: rulaa ke gayaa sapanaa meraa baithii huun kab ho saveraa
Lyrics: rulaa ke gayaa sapanaa meraa baithii huun kab ho saveraa rulaa threedots  vahii hai gamedil vahii hai chandaa taare haay vahii ham besahaare aadhii raat vahii hai aur har baat vahii hai phir bhii na aayaa luteraa rulaa threedots  kaisii ye zindagii ki saanson se ham uube haay ki dil duubaa ham duube ek dukhiyaa bechaarii is jiivan se haarii us par ye gam kaa andheraa rulaa threedots

Title: aa gayiin phir se bahaaren
Lyrics: aa gayiin phir se bahaaren aa gayiin dil pe gam kii badaliyaansii chhaa gayiin  hasaraton ke daag viiraan ho gaye ham to duniyaa se pariishaan ho gaye aap kii yaaden hamen tadapaa gayiin aa gayiin  kis tarah duniyaa merii aabaad ho tum na aaye tum bade jallaad ho dil kii kaliyaan khudbkhud murajhaa gayiin aa gayiin threedots

Title: rojaa jaaneman tuu hii meraa dil
Lyrics: rojaa jaaneman tuu hii meraa dil  tujh bin tarase nainaa  dil se na jaati hain yaaden tumhaarii  kaise tum bin jiinaa  aankhon men tuu hai aansuu men tuu hai  aankhen band kar luun to man men bhii tuu hai  kvaabon men tuu saanson men tuu rojaa threedots  1 chhuu ke yuun chalii havaa jaise chhuu gae ho tum  phuul jo khile the vo shuul ban gae hain kyon  jii rahaa huun is liye dil men pyaar hai teraa  zulm sah rahaa huun kyon intazaar hai teraa  tumase mile binaa jaan bhii na jaaegii  qayaamat se pahale saamane tuu aaegii  kahaan hai tuu kaisii hai tuu rojaa   2 thandii thandii aae havaa teraa kaam kyaa yahaan  miit nahiin paas men chaandanii tuu laut jaa  phuul kyon khile ho tum zulf nahiin vo yahaan  jhuke jhuke aasamaan merii hansii naa udaa  pyaar ke binaa merii zindagii udaas hai  koii nahiin hai meraa sirf terii aas hai  kvaabon men tuu saanson men tuu rojaa threedots

Title: so gayaa ye jahaan so gayaa aasamaan
Lyrics: so gayaa ye jahan so gayaa aasamaan  2 so gayi hai sari manzilen  o sari manzilen so gayaa hai rastaa  so gayaa ye jahan so gayaa aasamaan   2  raat aai to vo jinake ghar the  vo ghar ko gaye so gaye  raat aai to ham jaise aavaaraa  phir nikale rahon men aa kho gaye   2  is galii us galii is nagar us nagar  jaayen bhi to kahaan jana chaahen agar  o so gayi hai sari manzilen  o sari manzilen so gayaa hai rastaa  so gayaa ye jahan so gayaa aasamaan  2  kuchh meri suno kuchh apani kaho  ho paas to aisi chup na raho  ham paas bhi hain aur dur bhi hain  aazaad bhi hain majabuur bhi hain   kyuun pyaar ka mausam bit gayaa  kyuun hamase zamaanaa jiit gayaa  har ghadi mera dil gam ke ghere men hai  zindagi dur tak ab andhere men hai  andhere men hai andhere men hai  o so gayi hai sari manzilen  o sari manzilen so gayaa hai rastaa  so gayaa ye jahan so gayaa aasamaan  2

Title: chiraag dil ke jalaao ki iid kaa din hai
Lyrics: chiraag dil ke jalaao ki iid kaa din hai taraane jhuum ke gaao ki iid kaa din hai  gamon ko dil se bhulaao ki iid kaa din hai kushii se bazm sajaao ki iid kaa din hai taraane jhuum ke gaao ki iid kaa din hai  huzuur us ke karo ab salaamatii kii duaa sareniyaaz jhukaao ki iid kaa din hai taraane jhuum ke gaao ki iid kaa din hai  sabhii muraaden ho puuriin har ek savaalii kii duaa ko haath uthaao ki iid kaa din hai taraane jhuum ke gaao ki iid kaa din hai

Title: shukriyaa hastii kaa
Lyrics: shukriyaa hastii kaa lekin tumane ye kyaa kar diyaa are parde hii parde men apanaa raaz afshaa kar diyaa  maang kar ham laaye the allaah se ek dardeishq vo bhii ab taqadiir ne auron kaa hissaa kar diyaa  do hii angaare the haathon men kudaaeishq ke ek ko dil ek ko meraa kalejaa kar diyaa  main to apanii bekudiieshauq ka mamanuun huun baarahaa mujh ko bharii mahafil men tanhaa kar diyaa  marahamat faramaa ke ai siimaab gam kii lazzaten ziist kii talkii ko fitarat ne gavaaraa kar diyaa

Title: achchhaa to ham chalate hain
Lyrics: achchhaa to ham chalate hain phir kab miloge jab tum kahoge jumme raat ko haan haan aadhii raat ko kahaan vahiin jahaan koii aataa jaataa nahiin achchhaa to ham chalate hain   threedots  kisii ne dekhaa to nahiin tumhen aate nahiin main aayii huun chhupake chhupaake der kar dii badii zaraa dekho to ghadii uff o merii to ghadii band hai terii ye adaa mujhe pasand hai dekho baate vaaten kar lo jaldii jaldii phir na kahanaa abhii aayii abhii chal dii to aao paas baithen pal do pal aaj nahiin kal ye to ik bahaanaa hai vaapas ghar bhii jaanaa hai kitani jaldii ye din dhalate hain haay taataa   threedots achchhaa to ham chalate hain phir kab miloge jab tum kahoge kal milo yaa parason parason nahiin narason kahaan yahiin yahaan koii aataa jaataa nahiin achchhaa to ham chalate hain   threedots  udaa hai kis liye teraa rang gorii hamaarii pakadii gayii hai bas chorii      achchhaa raam jaane kyaa ho ab kaise huaa ye gazab meraa aanchal jo zaraa dhal gayaa saarii duniyaa ko pataa chal gayaa kaise khelenge ab aankh micholi lejaa aake mere ghar se merii dolii tere ghar vaale na kar de inkaar sab hain taiyyaar sab hain taiyyaar sun le phir dil kii fariyaad bas baaqii shaadii ke baad piyaa dekho diye jalate hain achchhaa threedots achchhaa to ham chalate hain   threedots

Title: dil men ab yuun tere bhuule hue gam aate hain
Lyrics: dil men ab yuun tere bhuule hue gam aate hain jaise bichhade hue qaabe men sanam aate hain  raqsemai tez karo saaz kii lay tez karo suuemaikhaanaa sab safiiraanaa viraaneharam aate hain dil men ab yuun tere bhuule hue gam aate hain   threedots  aur kuchh der na guzare shabefurqat se kaho dil bhii kam dukhataa hai vo yaad bhii kam aate hain dil men ab yuun tere bhuule hue gam aate hain   threedots  kuchh ham hii ko nahiin ehasaan uthaane kaa damaar vo to jab aate hain maaiilfaqaram aate hain dil men ab yuun tere bhuule hue gam aate hain   threedots

Title: ek baat maan lo tum
Lyrics: ek baat maan lo tum jo kahuun main vo karo tum jo karo to meraa vaadaa main karuungii jo kaho tum tum tum mujhako chaand laake do  idlii uu idlii uu mujhko taare laake do  idlii uu idlii uu aur saare laake do  merii tumako jo tamannaa hai mujhase tumako agar milanaa hai to pareshaan ho kyon aise hairaan ho kyon main miluungii tumako pahale jaao to mujhako chaand laake do  idlii uu idlii uu mujhko taare laake do  idlii uu idlii uu aur saare laake do  ek baat maan lo tum jo kahuun main vo karo tum la la la   threedots  sa ga ni sa ga ma pa pa pa ma pa ga ma sa sa ga ni sa ga ma pa pa pa ma pa ga ma sa  tumako jitanii main pyaarii huun samajho utanii hii tumhaarii huun koii mushkil nahiin duur manzil nahiin chaahate ho tum jo mujhako paao to mujhako chaand laake do  idlii uu idlii uu mujhko taare laake do  idlii uu idlii uu aur saare laake do  sa sa sa sa   threedots ga ga sa sa   threedots pa pa   threedots

Title: meraa piyaa ghar aayaa o raamajii
Lyrics: laayaa baaraat laayaa ghunghataa uthaane aayaa apanaa banaane aayaa vo chandaa bhii saath laayaa taare bhii saath laayaa paagal banaane aayaa vo  meraa piyaa ghar aayaa o raamajii	 4 meraa piyaa ghar aayaa			 2  merii paayal chhanake chhan chhan merii bindiyaa chamake chham chham meraa kanganaa khanake khan khan meraa nikalaa jaae dam dam diivaanii main diivaanii sharam ko chhod duungii main ab naachuungii itanaa ki ghungaruu tod duungii nazar kaa vaar hogaa jigar ke paar hogaa merii aankhon ke aage meraa diladaar hogaa meraa kanganaa khanake khan khan meraa nikalaa jaae dam dam meraa piyaa ghar aayaa threedots  meraa dhalataa jaae aanchal meraa bikharaa jaae kaajal mujhe lagataa hai ye pal pal ho jaaungii main paagal kabhii ruuthuungii usase kabhii hogii sharaarat kabhii koii gussaa usakaa kabhii hogii mohabbat dhadakataa hai dil meraa na jaane kyaa karuun main kuchh hone vaalaa hai jii na jaane kyuun daruun main meraa dhalataa jaae aanchal meraa bikharaa jaae kaajal  meraa piyaa ghar aayaa threedots

Title: kiyaa hai pyaar jise ham ne zindagii ke tarah
Lyrics: kiyaa hai pyaar jise ham ne zindagii ke tarah  vo aashanaa bhi milaa ham se ajanabii ke tarah   badhaa ke pyaas meri us ne haath chhod diyaa  vo kar rahaa tha muravvat bhi dillagii ke tarah   kabhi na sochaa tha ham ne qatil us ke lie  karegaa ham pe sitam vo bhi har kisii ke tarah   kise khabar thii bade hii kuchh aur taarii kii  milaa hai hamase vo kisii badalii men chaandanii kii tarah  sitam to ye hai ke vo bhi na ban sakaa apana  kubuul hamane liye jis ke gam khushii ke tarah

Title: aaj safar men tumane kyon chhod diyaa meraa saath
Lyrics: ham aur tum the saathii abhii hai kal kii baat aaj safar men tumane kyon chhod diyaa meraa saath  kaise hain ye andhere dhalate nahin miilon talaq ujaale milate nahin hamare tumhare hamare tumhare jiivan men kaise aai ye andhiyari raat aaj safar threedots  jalata hai dil main phir bhi khamosh huun kisase karuun main shikava kya doshh duun hamare tumhare hamare tumhare sapane jo sach hue the thame hain mera haath aaj safar threedots

Title: bhulaataa laakh huun lekin baraabar yaad aate hain
Lyrics: bhulaataa laakh huun lekin baraabar yaad aate hain elaahii tarkeulfat par vo kyuun kar yaad aate hain  na chhed ai hamnashiin kaifiatesahbaa ke afasaane sharaabebekudii ke mujh ko saagar yaad aate hain  nahiin aatii to yaad unakii mahiinon tak nahiin aatii magar jab yaad aate hain to aksar yaad aate hain  haqiiqat khul gaii hasrat tere tarkemuhabbat kii tujhe to ab vo pahle se bhii badh kar yaad aate hain

Title: cheharaa chhupaa liyaa hai kisii ne hijaab men
Lyrics: ma cheharaa chhupaa liyaa hai kisii ne hijaab men     jii chaahataa hai aag lagaa duun naqaab men  sa bijalii thii ik jo ham ne chhupaa lii naqaab men     lag jaati varanaa aag tumhaare shabaab men  ma ham husn ke paravaane jalane se nahiin darate     anjaamemohabbat kii paravaah nahiin karate     ik baar hii dete hain dil apanaa hasiinon ko     ik baar hii marate hain sau baar nahiin marate  sa paravaane se pahale jalii aur paravaane ke saath jalii     vo to jalaa bas pal do pal shamaa to saarii raat jalii      ek paravaanaa jalaa ik kadar shor machaa     shamaa chupachaap jalii lab pe shikavaa na gilaa     kyaa hai jalane kaa mazaa husn se puuchho zaraa      kyonki      paravaane ko jal jaanaa ham ne hii sikhaayaa hai     vo tab hi jalaa ham ne jab kud ko jalaayaa hai     aashiq kii jaan ishq men jaane se peshtar     kud husn dubataa hai vafaa ke chanaab men  ko chehara chhupaa liyaa threedots  sa gar husn nahiin hotaa ye ishq kahaan hotaa     phir kis se vafaa karate phir kis kaa vafaa hotaa  ma takaraar se kyaa haasil kuchh bhii na huaa hotaa     gar tum na hasiin hote gar main na javaan hotaa     jis roz se is husn kaa diidaar kiyaa hai     bas pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa pyaar kiyaa hai  sa ye jhuuth hai ki tum ne hamen pyaar kiyaa hai     ham ne tumhen zulfon men giraftaar kiyaa hai  ma tum husn ho ham ishq hai sa gar tum nahiin to ham nahiin ma hai baat sachchii bas yahii koii kisii se kam nahiin sa hai baat sachchii bas yahii koii kisii se kam nahiin ma ek nagamaa hai ek raag hai sa donon taraf ek aag hai ma tum se hamen shikavaa bhii hai phir bhii aap se pyaar hai sa tum bin hamen kab chain ham ko bhii ye iqaraar hai  ma dekhe to hosh gum ho na dekhe to hosh gum     ye phans gaii hai jaan merii kis adaab men  ko cheharaa chhupaa liyaa threedots

Title: suniyo jii araj mhaarii o baabulaa hamar
Lyrics: aa  suniyo ji araj mhaarii o baabulaa hamar   2 saavan ayo ghar lai jaiho   saavan ayo ghar lai jaiho    2  saavan ayo ghar lye jaiho baabulaa hamaar suniyo ji suniyo jii suniyo  bhije bhije anganaa kii yaad jo aave   2 rukhi rukhi ankhiyon men retii udaave   2 sunii sunii  2 suunii suunii korii ankhiyaan bhejiyo phuhaar suniyo ji araj mhaarii ho  sa re ga ga dha dha pa ga sa sa ni dha ga pa sa ni dha ga ni dha pa ga dha pa ga sa re ni sa suniyo  bisaraa diyo hai kaahe bides bhijaay ke    2 hamakaa bulaay le babul doliyaa livaay ke 2 bhejo jii  2 bhejo jii dolii uthaaye chaaro kahaar suniyo jii araj mhaarii ho baabulaa hamaar saavan aayo ghar le jaiho baabula hamaar suniyo jii suniyo jii suniyo jii   threedots

Title: chhod do aanchal zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa
Lyrics: a  chhod do aanchal zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa chhod do aanchal zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa k   in adaaon kaa zamaanaa bhii hain diivaanaa  diivaanaa kyaa kahegaa     2 a  chhod do aanchal zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa  a  main chalii main chalii ab khuub chhedo pyaar ke afasaane kuchh mausam hain diivaanaa kuchh tum bhii ho diivaane  2 k   zaraa sunanaa jaanetamannaa 2 itanaa to sochiye mausam suhaanaa kyaa kahegaa a  chhod do aanchal threedots  a  yuun na dekho jaag jaae pyaar kii angadaaii ye rastaa ye tanahaai lo dil ne thokar khaaii k   yahii din hain mastii ke sin hain 2 kisako ye hosh hai apanaa begaanaa kyaa kahegaa a  chhod do aanchal threedots  a  ye bahaaren ye phuvaaren ye barasataa saavan thar thar kaanpe hain tan man merii bayyaan dhar lo saajan k   ajii aanaa dil men samaanaa 2 ek dil ek jaan hain ham tum zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa a  chhod do aanchal threedots

Title: suhaanii raat dhal chukii naa jaane tum kab aaoge
Lyrics: suhaanii raat dhal chukii naa jaane tum kab aaoge   2 jahaan kii rut badal chukii a a a  naa jaane tum kab aaoge  nazaare a a a  apanii mastiyaan dikhaa dikhaa ke so gaye sitaare a a a  apanii raushanii lutaa lutaa ke so gaye har ek shammaa jal chukii naa jaane tum kab aaoge suhaanii raat dhal chukii threedots  tadap rahe hain ham yahaan   2 tumhaare intazaar men  2 khizaa kaa rang aa chalaa hai       mausamebahaar men   2 mausamebahaar men              havaa bhii rukh badal chukii a a a  naa jaane tum kab aaoge  suhaanii raat dhal chukii naa jaane tum kab aaoge

Title: shaam ko subahechaman yaad aaii
Lyrics: yuun terii yaad se jii ghabaraayaa tuu mujhe bhuul gayaa ho jaise  shaam ko subahechaman yaad aaii kisakii kushbuuebadan yaad aaii  yaad aaye tere paikar ke kutuut apane kotaahiiefan yaad aaii  chaand jab duur ufaq men duubaa tere lahaje kii thakan yaad aaii  din shuaaon se ulajhate guzaraa raat aaii to kiran yaad aaii  jab kayaalon men koii mod aayaa tere gesuu kii shikan yaad aaii

Title: aisii muhabbat se hum baaz aaye
Lyrics: aisii muhabbat se ham baaz aaye jo dil ko jalaaye sataaye dukhaaye dil ko jalaaye sataaye dukhaaye  aisii muhabbat se ham baaz aaye jo dil ko jalaaye sataaye dukhaaye  banaakar tumhen apanaa kyaa hamane paayaa khushii lut gayii chain dil kaa ganvaayaa 2 bade gam sahe aur bahut dukh uthaaye aisii muhabbat se ham baaz aaye threedots  tasavvur men tumase huii kitanii baaten guzaarii bahut jaag kar hamane raaten 2 kabhii hamane chhup chhup ke aansuu bahaaye aisii muhabbat se ham baaz aaye threedots  aisii muhabbat se ham baaz aaye jo dil ko jalaaye sataaye dukhaaye dil ko jalaaye sataaye dukhaaye

Title: jaane kyaa dhuundhatii rahatii hain ye aankhen mujhamen
Lyrics: jaane kyaa dhuundhatii rahatii hain ye aankhen mujhamen raakh ke dher men sholaa hai na chingaarii hai ab na vo pyaar na usakii yaaden baakii aag yuun dil men lagii kuchh na rahaa kuchh na bachaa jisakii tasviir nigaahon men liye baithaa ho main vo diladaar nahiin usakii huun khaamosh chitaa  zindagii hans ke na guzaratii to bahut achchhaa thaa khair hans ke na sahii ro ke guzar jaayegii raakh barabaad muhabbat kii bachaa rakhii hain baarbaar isako jo chhedaa to bikhar jaayegii  aarazuu jurma vafaa jurma tamannaa hai gunaaha ye vo duniyaa hai jahaan pyaar nahiin ho sakataa kaise baazaar kaa dastuur tumhen samajhaauun bik gayaa jo vo khariidaar nahiin ho sakataa threedots

Title: nasiibediidaaodil aazmaa ke laut aae
Lyrics: nasiibediidaaodil aazmaa ke laut aae bahar nigaah naii chot khaake laut aae  gae the apanii wafaaon kii daad paane ko jawaabetalk kii lazzat uthaake laut aae  futuur dekh ke niyyat men rahanumaaon kii kushaa vo log jo manzil pe jaake laut aae  ye faatihe kaa tariiqaa ajiib thaa unakaa mere mazaar kii shamaen bujhaa ke laut aae

Title: raftaa raftaa vo mere hastii kaa saamaan ho gae
Lyrics: raftaa raftaa vo mere hastii kaa saamaan ho gae pahale jaan phir jaanejaan phir jaanejaanaa ho gae raftaathreedots  dinbadin badhatii gain us husn kii raanaaiyaan pahale gul phir gulabadan phir gulabadaanaa ho gae raftaathreedots  aap to nazadiik se nazadiikatar aate gae pahale dil phir dilarubaa phir dil ke mahamaan ho gae raftaathreedots  pyaar jab had se badhaa saare takalluf mit gae aap se phir tum hue phir tuu kaa unavaa ho gae raftaathreedots

Title: o mere sonaa re sonaa re sonaa re
Lyrics: o mere sonaa re sonaa re sonaa re de duungii jaan judaa mat honaa re maine tujhe zaraa der men jaanaa huaa kusuur khafaa mat honaa re   2 o mere sonaa re sonaa re sonaa re  o merii baanhon se nikalake tuu agar mere raste se hat jaaegaa to laharaake ho balakhaake meraa saayaa tere tan se lipat jaaegaa tum chhudaao laakh daaman chhodate hain kab ye aramaan ki main bhii saath rahuungii rahoge jahaan o mere threedots  o miyaan hamase na chhipaao vo banaavat ki saarii adaaen liye ki tum isape ho itaraate ki main piichhe huun sau iltizaaen liye jii main khush huun mere sonaa jhuuth hai kyaa sach kaho naa ki main bhii saath rahuungii rahoge jahaan o mere threedots  o phir hamase na ulajhanaa nahiin lat aur ulajhan men pad jaaegii o pachhataaogii kuchh aise ki ye surakhii labon kii utar jaaegii ye sazaa tum bhuul na jaanaa pyaar ko thokar mat lagaanaa ki chalaa jaaungaa phir main na jaane kahaan o mere threedots

Title: ye chaand koii diivaanaa hai
Lyrics: ye chaand koii diivaanaa hai koii aashiq badaa puraanaa hai piichhe kisake ye bhaage saarii raat ye jaage ye shamaa hai yaa paravaanaa hai diivaanaa hai ye chaand koii threedots  mere nain kanvaare kajaraare merii bindiyaa maare lashkaare mere sapanon men aae mujhe giit sunaae panchhii paradesii banjaare haan banjaare man mast magan ho jaae naa rang ruup ratan kho jaae naa man meraa akelaa ye puunam kaa melaa mele men milan ho jaae naa mere dil men chhupaa hai chor koii meraa dard na jaane aur koii ise dil se nikaaluun dil kaise sambhaaluun mere dil pe nahiin hai zor koii haay zor koii jis din se tujhako dekhaa hai us din se ye maine jaanaa hai tuu mere lie hai main tere lie huun ye sach baakii afasaanaa hai ye chaand koii threedots

Title: chalo man jaayen ghar apane
Lyrics: chalo man jaayen ghar apane is parades men o parades men kyon paradesii raahen ye chalo man jaayen ghar apane threedots  aankh jo bhaaye vo koraa sapanaa aankh jo bhaaye vo koraa sapanaa saare paraaye hain koii na apanaa 2 aise jhuute prem men pad naa bhuul men kaahe jiyen chalo man jaayen ghar apane threedots  sachche prem kii jyot jalaa ke sachche prem kii jyot jalaa ke man sun mere kaan lagaa ke 2 paap aur puny kii gadarii uthaa ke apanii raah chalen chalo man jaayen ghar apane threedots

Title: ghul rahaa hai saaara manzar
Lyrics: ghul rahaa hai saaraa manzar shaam dhundhalii ho gai chaandanii kii chaadar odhe har pahaadii so gai  vaadiyon men ped hai ab apanii hii parachhaiyaan uth rahaa hai koharaa jaise chaandanii kaa ho dhuaan chaand bikhraa to chattaanen bhii mulaayam ho gain raat kii saansen jo mahakii aur maddham ho gai  narm hai jitanii hawaa utanii fizaa kaamosh hai tahaniyon par os pii ke har kalii behosh hai mod par karavat lie ghuumate hain raaste duur koii gaa rahaa hai jaane kisake vaaste

Title: is ishqomuhabbat kii kuchh hain ajiib rasmen
Lyrics: m is ishqomuhabbat kii kuchh hain ajiib rasmen    kabhii jiine ke vaade kabhii marane kii kasamen f na ye tere bas men na ye mere bas men    kabhii jiine ke vaade kabhii marane kii kasamen  m kabhii intazaar karate barasaat kii raaton men    kabhii raat guzar jaae baaton hii baaton men f ik dard machalataa hai is dil kii nasnas men    kabhii jiine ke vaade kabhii marane kii kasamen  f gar hamako judaa kar den ik baar jahaan ke sitam    har baar janam lekar har baar milenge ham m yuun ahadevafaa kar len aa milakar aapas men    kabhii jiine ke vaade kabhii marane kii kasamen  m main terii mohabbat men har rasm nibhaa duungaa    apanii niinden dekar tere kvaab sajaa duungaa f aisaa hii hotaa hai jab dil na rahe bas men    kabhii jiine ke vaade kabhii marane kii kasamen

Title: chishtii ne jis zamiin men paigaamehaq sunaayaa
Lyrics: chishtii ne jis zamiin men paigaamehaq sunaayaa  naanak ne jis chaman men vehadaa ka giit gaayaa  tatariyon ne jis ko apana vatan banaayaa is ne hizaariyon se dusharab churaayaa meraa vatan vohii hai meraa vatan vohii hai  yunaaniyon ko jis ne hairaan kar diyaa tha  saare jahaan ko jis ne ilmohunar diyaa tha  mitti ko jisakii haq ne zar ka asar diyaa tha  turkon ka jis ne daaman hiron se bhar diyaa tha  meraa vatan vohii hai meraa vatan vohii hai  tuute the jo sitaare faaris ke aasamaan se  phir tab deke jis ne chamakaayaa kahakashaa se vehadat kii lai sunii thi duniyaa ne jis makaan se mirearab ko ai thandii havaa jahaan se meraa vatan vohii hai meraa vatan vohii hai  bande kalim jis ke parabat jahaan ke siinaa nuhenabii ka aksar theharaa jahaan safiinaa  rifat hai jis zamin kii bamifalak ka ziinaa jannat kii zindagii hai jis kii fazaa men jiinaa  meraa vatan vohii hai meraa vatan vohii hai    national song for indian children  this land  where chishti delivered the message of truth  and nanak delivered the message of divine unity  this land  adopted by turks  selected by arabs  this is mine my native land   the amazed greeks mused  while wisdom flowed from here to everywhere  its dust is gold  its diamonds fell in a heap  into the turks outstretched palms  this is mine my native land   this land where scholars  who fell meteorlike from the skies of iran  were nurtured polished and once again  sent back to crown the milkyway  the unity of god  the solace of prophet  it all arose from my village hut  this is mine my native land   its denizens wise like moses  its mountains grand like sinai  its oceans the anchor for noahm  its earth a stairway to the skies  a breathing paradise on earth  this is mine my native land

Title: vo kyaa dikhaaenge raah mujh ko
Lyrics: main khud hii apanii talaash men huun meraa koii rahanumaa nahiin hai vo kyaa dikhaaenge raah mujh ko jinhen khud apanaa pataa nahiin hai  1 bahut dinon se main sun rahaa thaa  sazaa vo dete hain har khataa kii  mujhe to isakii sazaa milii hai  kii merii koii khataa nahiin hai vo kyaa threedots   2 dil aaiinaa hai tum apanii suurat  sanvaar lo aur khud hii dekho  jo nuks hogaa dikhaaii degaa  ye bezubaan bolataa nahiin hai vo kyaa threedots   3 ye aap nazaren bachaa bachaa kar  baghaar kyaa dekhate hain mujh ko  tumhaare kaam aa sake to le lo  hamaare ye kaam kaa nahiin hai vo kyaa threedots   4 masarraton kii talaash men huun magar ye dil jaanataa nahiin hai  agar gamezindagii nahiin hai  to zindagii men mazaa nahiin hai vo kyaa threedots

Title: duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabgaar nahiin huun
Lyrics: duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabagaar nahiin huun baazaar se guzaraa huun khariidaar nahiin huun 3  duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabagaar nahiin huun baazaar se guzaraa huun khariidaar nahiin huun 2  zindaa huun magar ziist kii lazzat nahiin baakii har chand ke huun hosh men hushiyaar nahiin huun 2 duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabagaar nahiin huun  is khaanaaehastii se guzar jaauungaa belaus 2 saayaa huun faqat naqshbdiivaar nahiin huun 2 duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabagaar nahiin huun  vah gul huun kizaa ne jise barbaad kiyaa hai 2 ulajhuun kisii 2 daaman se main vah khaar nahiin huun ulajhuun kisii daaman se main vah khaar nahiin huun 2 duniyaa men huun duniyaa kaa talabagaar nahiin huun

Title: ye kyaa zindagii hai ye kaisaa jahaan hai
Lyrics: zakamon se kalejaa chuur huaa had ho gaii gam men naalon kii kyaa huunhii tabaahii hotii hai duniyaa men mohabbatvaalon kii  ye kyaa zindagii hai ye kaisaa jahaan hai 2 jidhar dekhiye zulm kii daastaan hai 2  kahiin hai kafas men kisiikaa baseraa kahiin hai nigaahon men gam kaa andheraa kahiin dil kaa lutataa huaa kaaravaan hai jidhar dekhiye zulm kii daastaan hai 2  yahaan aadamii aadamii kaa hai dushman yahaan chaak inasaaniyat kaa hai daaman mohabbat kaa ujadaa huaa aashiyaan hai jidhar dekhiye zulm kii daastaan hai 2  ye beraham duniyaa samajh men na aae yahaan kar rahe hain sitamagar kudaaii na jaane tuu ai duniyaavaale kahaan hai jidhar dekhiye zulm kii daastaan hai 2  ye kyaa zindagii hai ye kaisaa jahaan hai jidhar dekhiye zulm kii daastaan hai

Title: ye meraa prema patra padha kara ke tuma naaraaja naa honaa
Lyrics: ye meraa premapatra padha kara ke ki tuma naaraaja naa honaa ki tuma merii zindagii ho  2  tujhe main chaanda kahataa thaa magara usamen bhii daag hai tujhe suuraja main kahataa thaa magar usamen bhii aaga hai tujhe itanaa hii kahataa huun ki mujhako tumase pyaara hai  3  ye meraa premapatra threedots  tujhe gangaa main samajhuungaa tujhe jamunaa main samajhuungaa tuu dil ke paasa hai itanii tujhe apana main samajhuungaa agara mara jaaun ruh bhatakegi tere intajaara men  3  ye meraa premapatra padha kara ke ki tuma naaraaja naa honaa ki tuma merii zindagii ho ki tuma merii bandagii ho

Title: tumhaarii nazaron men ham ne dekhaa
Lyrics: tumhari nazaron men ham ne dekha  ajab si chaahat jhalak rahi hain  tumhare hothon ki surkhiyon se  2  vafa ki shabanam jhalak rahi hain   tumhari nazaron threedots  ajab si threedots  hamari sanson ko chhu ke dekho  tumhari khushabu mahak rahi hai  qasam khuda ki yaqin karalo  kahin bhi na hoga husn aisa  na dekho aise jhuka ke palaken  2  hamari niyat bahak rahi hain   tumhari nazaron threedots  ajab si threedots  tumhari ulfat men jaanejana  hamen mili thi jo ek dhadakan  hamare sine men aaj tak vo  2  tumhari dhadakan dhadak rahi hain   tumhari nazaron threedots  ajab si threedots

Title: yaar ko ragabateagyaar na hone paaye
Lyrics: yaar ko ragabateagyaar na hone paaye guletar ko hawasekaar na hone paaye  baag kii sair ko jaate to ho par yaad rahe sabzaa begaanaa hai dochaar na hone paaye  jamaa kar liijiye gamazon ko magar kuubiiebazm bas wahiin tak hai ki baazaar na hone paaye  aap jaate to hain is bazm men lekin shiblii haaledil dekhiye izahaar na hone paaye

Title: tum ne kyaa kyaa kiyaa hai hamaare liye
Lyrics: tum ne kyaa kyaa kiyaa hai hamaare liye  ham na kar paaye kuchh bhii tumhaare liye   kitane ehasaan kiye tum ne ham pe sanam  sau janam tumako de den to vo bhii hai kam  tum ne patajhad ko savan ke dhaare diye  tum ne ashkon ke badale sitaare diye  tum ne kyaa kyaa kiyaa   tumako maalum thaa naav bah jaayegii  ye thapede na tuufaan ke sah paayegii  phir bhii tum ne baahon ke sahaare diye  tum ne duube huon ko kinaare diye  tum ne kyaa kyaa kiyaa

Title: dekh tere sansaar kii haalat kyaa ho gaii bhagavaan
Lyrics: dekh tere sansaar kii haalat kyaa ho gaii bhagavaan kitanaa badal gayaa inasaan kitanaa badal gayaa inasaan suuraj na badalaa chaand na badalaa naa badalaa re aasamaan kitanaa badal gayaa inasaan kitanaa badal gayaa inasaan  aayaa samay badaa bedhangaa aaj aadamii banaa lafangaa kahiin pe jhagadaa kahiin pe dangaa naach rahaa nar ho kar nangaa chhal aur kapat ke haathon apanaa bech rahaa iimaan kitanaa threedots  raam ke bhakt rahiim ke bande rachate aaj fareb ke phande kitane ye makkar ye andhe dekh liye inake bhii dhandhe inhiin kii kaalii karatuuton se banaa ye mulk mashaan kitanaa threedots  jo ham aapas men na jhagadate bane hue kyon khel bigadate kaahe laakhon ghar ye ujadate kyon ye bachche maan se bichhadate phuutphuut kar kyon rote pyaare baapuu ke praan kitanaa threedots

Title: ye hasiin vaadiyaan ye khulaa aasamaan
Lyrics: chi ye hasiin vaadiyaan ye khulaa aasamaan aa gaye ham kahaan ai mere saajanaa in bahaaron men dil kii kali khil gayii mujhako tum jo mile har khushii mil gayii su  tere hothon pe hain husn kii bijaliyaan tere gaalon pe hain zulf kii badaliyaan tere daaman kii khushabu se mahake chaman sangemaramar ke jaisaa hai teraa badan chi merii jaanejaan main terii chaandanii chhed lo tum aaj koi pyaar kii raaginii dono ye hasiin vaadiyaan ye khulaa aasamaan threedots  su ye bandhan hai pyaar kaa dekho tute naa sajanii chi ye janmon kaa saath hai dekho chhute naa saajanaa su tere aanchal kii chhaanv ke tale merii manzil mujhe mil gayii chi terii palakon kii chhaanv ke tale muhabbat mujhe mil gayii dono ye hasiin vaadiyaan threedots  chitra  jii karataa hai saajanaa dil men tumako bithaa lun su aa mastii kii raat men apanaa tum ko banaa lun chitra udane lage hain tufaan kyon mere sine men ai sanam su tumhen chaahungaa dilojaan se meri jaanejaan merii qasam dono  ye hasiin vaadiyaan threedots

Title: maatii kahe kumhaar ko tuu kyaa ruunde mohe
Lyrics: maatii kahe kumhaar ko tuu kyaa ruunde mohe ek din aisaa hoyegaa main ruundungii tohe2  aaye hain so jaaenge raajaa rank faqiir2 ek singhaasan chadhi chale ek bandhe janjiir  durbal ko na sataaiye jaakii motii haay binaa jiibh ke swaas saun lauh bhasm hoi jaay  chalatii chaakii dekhake diyaa kabiiraa roy do paatan ke biich men baakii bachaa na koy2  dukh men sumiran sab karen sukh men kare na koy jo sukh men sumiran karen to dukh kaahe hoy  pattaa tuutaa daal se le gaii pawan udaay2 abake bichhade kab milenge duur padenge jaay  kabiir aap thagaaiye aur na thagiye koy aap thage sukh uupaje aur thage dukh hoy2  maatii kahe kumhaar ko tuu kyaa ruunde mohe ek din aisaa aaegaa main ruundungii tohe2

Title: dar laage garaje badariyaa saavan kii rut kajaraa re kaarii

Title: aramaan machal rahe hain dilebeqaraar men

Title: jhuumjhuum naachen ham
Lyrics: jhuumjhuum naachen ham qisamat huii hai roshan   daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham   rupiyaa jo paas men ho duniyaa kariid len ham   daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham   jhuumjhuum naachen ham qisamat huii hai roshan  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham  rupiyaa jo paas men ho duniyaa kariid len ham  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham    apanaa hii aasamaan ho us men sadaa uden ham   hamasafar ban ke mere haradam hii saath men rahanaa tum   phuulon kii ye zamiin ho us par sadaa chalen ham   mastiyon kaa ye aalam ho gaate rahen giit ham aur tum   gulasitaan khilataa rahe ye kaaravaan chalataa rahe   svarg men ab ye zamiin badalenge ham   pyaar ke rang men tumhen rang denge ham   rupiyaa jo paas men ho duniyaa kariid len ham  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham jhuumjhuum naachen ham qisamat huii hai roshan  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham    yuddh naa ho kahiin pe sukhshaanti ho is zamiin pe   pyaar kii baat se saathii duniyaa ko badalenge ham aur tum   bhuukh naa ho zamiin pe pyaas naa ho kahiin pe   shaantshaant ye dharatii ho sukh mil ke baant len ham aur tum   mahafilen dinraat hon pyaar kii barasaat ho   naa kabhii dil todanaa mere yaar tum   saamane hain manzilen meraa pyaar tum   jhuumjhuum naachen ham qisamat huii hai roshan  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham  rupiyaa jo paas men ho duniyaa kariid len ham  daulat jo mil gaii to jiivan sanvaar len ham

Title: nirdhan kaa ghar luutane vaalon luut lo dil kaa pyaar
Lyrics: nirdhan kaa ghar lutane vaalon luut lo dil kaa pyaar pyaar vo dhan hai jisake aage sab dhan hai bekaar insaan bano insaan bano karalo bhalaai kaa koi kaam insaan bano duniyaa se chale jaaegaa rah jaaegaa badanaam insaan bano  o threedots is baag men suraj bhii nikalataa hai liye gam phulon kii hansii dekh ke ro detii hai shabanam kuchh der kii khushiyaan hain to kuchh der kaa maatam kis niind men ho threedots kis niind men ho jaago zaraa dekh lo anjaam insaan bano  o threedots laakhon yahaan shaan apanii dikhaate hue aaye dam bhar ko rahe naach gaye dhup men saaye vo bhul gaye the ke ye duniyaa hai saraay aataa hai koi threedots aataa hai koi subah ko jaata hai koi shaam insaan bano  o threedots kyon tumane bichhaaye hain yahaan zulm ke dere dhan saath na jaayegaa bane kyon ho lutere piite ho gariibon kaa lahuu shaam savere khud paap karo threedots khud paap karo naam ho shaitaan ka badanaam insaan bano

Title: ham jis raste pe chale us raste pe thii priit khadii
Lyrics: aa ham jis raste pe chale us raste pe thii priit khadii    priit ne hamako pahanaa dii armaanon kii hathakadii    tuu jahaan chale main vahaan chaluun    tuu jahaan ruke main vahaan rukuun la ham jis raste threedots  la ham anjaane ik duuje kii jaan bane     pahale do dil the ab sau armaan bane 2 aa are jaan ke dekho ham kaise anjaan bane    jaane kab dil takaraae jaane kab aankh se aankh ladii laaa priit ne hamako threedots  aa mausam hai yaa pyaar kaa ek paigaam hai     isiilie ye pyaar badaa badanaa hai 2 la bhuul gae ham duniyaa kisakaa naam hai    yaad rahenge hamen hameshaa ye din ye rut ye ghadii laaa priit ne hamako threedots  aa dekho abhii subah thii ho gaii shaam abhii la dil phir tadapaa aayaa thaa aaraam abhii aa are apane dil par likh do meraa naam abhii la o chhote se saajanaa tuu baaten karataa hai badii laaa priit ne hamako threedots

Lyrics: bahaaron ne chhedaa kushii kaa taraanaa 2 merii aaj unase mulaaqaat hogii 2 bahaaron ne chhedaa threedots  salaamemohabbat main unase kahuungaa 2 taraanaa vafaa kaa sunaa ke rahuungaa dil ko yaqiin hai vo baat merii maan jaaenge 2 bahaaron ne chhedaa threedots  muhabbat kii raahon men jiine se pahale 2 lagaauungaa main unako siine se pahale vo pyaar ke ikaraar ko pahachaan jaaenge 2 bahaaron ne chhedaa threedots  muqaddar se aae mulaaqaat ke din 2 ye din bhii to hain unakii inaayaat ke din ham aaj ban ke husn ke mehamaan jaaenge 2 bahaaron ne chhedaa threedots
