Lyrics: tera cheharaa mujhe gulaab lage  dono aalam men laajavaab lage  din ko dekhun to aafatab lage  shab ko dekhun to maahataab lage   roz milate ho par nahiin milate  aisaa milana bhi mujhako khvab lage  padhata rahata hun teri surat ko  teri surat mujhe kitaab lage  tera cheharaa mujhethreedots   teri ankhon ki mastiyan taubaa  mujhako chhalaki hui sharaab lage  jab bhi chamake ghata men bijali  mujhako teraa hi vo shabaab lage  tera cheharaa mujhethreedots   tujhako dekhun to kis tarah dekhun  rukh pe kiranon ke sau naqaab lage  pyaar shaayad isi ko kahate hain  ek mujhase hi kyun hijaab lage  tera cheharaa mujhethreedots

Title: tere kaaran tere kaaran
Lyrics: tere kaaran tere kaaran tere kaaran mere saajan jaag ke phir so gayii sapanon men kho gayii aag lage saarii duniyaa ko main terii ho gayii re baalama tere kaaran tere kaaran   threedots  aajaa threedots  priitam kitanaa hii bulaaye na jaanuu laaj ne rokaa par aadhii raat men uthake uthake milate hii maukaa ye gayii vo gayii sapanon men kho gayii aag lage saarii duniyaa ko   threedots  nikalii ye soch ke ghar se sainyyaa se mil aauungii pal do pal thahar ke jaldii main vaapas aa jaauungii piyaa milan ko gayii to sapanon men kho gayii aag lage saarii duniyaa ko   threedots  rang laayaa chorii chorii ye milanaa teraa meraa raaton kaa pataa chalaa na baaton men huaa saveraa haay niind merii to gayii sapanon men kho gayii aag lage saarii duniyaa ko   threedots

Title: musaafir chalate chalate thak gayaa hai
Lyrics: musaafir chalate chalate thak gayaa hai safar jaane abhii kitanaa padaa hai  maqaan ke sab maqiin soye pade hain hawaa kaa shor mujhase kah rahaa hai  wo mere saamane baithaa hai lekin dilon ke biich kitanaa faasalaa hai

Title: maiyyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo
Lyrics: maiyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo kahat sunat men aakar kaahe jhuuthaa dosh lagaayo ri maiyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo  yamunaa ke tat par gvaal ban sang chaar sahaar main khelaa gaiyyaa charaavat bansii bajaavat saanjh kii belaa bhuuk lagii to daudat daudat siidhaa main ghar aayo maiyaa morii main nahiin maakhan khaayo   threedots  na koii main ne matakii phodii na koii kii hai chorii jaan liyaa kyon mujhako jhuuthaa tuune maiyya morii apane ang ko kaise samajhaa tuune aaj paraayo maiyaa mori main nahiin maakhan khaayo   threedots  main to baabaa nand ke laalaa kaahe chor kahaauun apane ghar men kaun kamii jo baahar maakhan khaauun baat sunii to maataa yashodaa hansakar kanth lagaayo phir bolii tuu nahiin maakhan khaayo re krishhnaa more tuu nahiin maakhan khaayo

Title: sarakatii jaaye hai rukh se naqaab aahistaa aahistaa
Lyrics: sarakatii jaaye hai rukh se naqaab aahistaa aahistaa nikalataa aa rahaa hai aafataab aahistaa aahistaa  javaan hone lage jab vo to hamase kar liyaa paradaa hayaa yakalakt aaii aur shabaab aahistaa aahistaa  savaalevasal pe unako uduu kaa khauf hai itanaa dabe honthon se dete hain javaab aahistaa aahistaa  hamaare aur tumhaare pyaar men bas fark hai itanaa idhar to jaldiijaldii hai udhar aahistaa aahistaa  vo bedardii se sar kaaten amiir aur main kahuun unase huzuur aahistaa aahistaa janaab aahistaa aahistaa  shabefurqat kaa jaagaa huun farishton ab to sone do kabhii fursat men kar lenaa hisaab aahistaa aahistaa

Title: mere rang men rangane vaalii
Lyrics: mere rang men rangane vaalii parii ho yaa ho pariyon kii raanii yaa ho merii prem kahaanii mere savaalon kaa javaab do do na  bolo na kyon ye chaand sitaare takate hain yuun mukhade ko tumhaare chhuuke badan ko havaa kyon mahakii raat bhii hai kyon bahakii bahakii mere savaalon kaa javaab do   threedots  kyon ho tum sharamaaii huii sii lagatii ho kuchh ghabaraaii huii sii dhalakaa huaa saa aanchal kyon hai ye mere dil men halachal kyon hai mere savaalon kaa javaab do   threedots  dono taraf benaam sii ulajhan jaise mile ho dulhaadulhan dono kii aisii haalat kyon hai aakhir itanii muhabbat kyon hai mere savaalon kaa javaab do   threedots

Title: ek main huun ek merii beqasii kii shaam hai
Lyrics: verbal prelude jalii jo shaakhechaman saath baagabaan bhii jalaa jalaa ke mere nasheman ko aasmaan bhii jalaa   ek main huun ek merii beqasii kii shaam hai ab to tujh bin zindagii bhii mujh pe ik ilzaam hai   dil pe kyaa guzarii tere jaane se koii kyaa kahe saans jo aatii hai vo bhii dard kaa paigaam hai   aansuuon mujh par hanso mere muqaddar par hanso ab kahaan vo zindagii jis kaa muhabbat naam hai

Title: andoh se huii na rihaaii tamaam shab
Lyrics: andoh se huii na rihaaii tamaam shab mujh dilazadaa ko niind na aaii tamaam shab  chashmak chalii gaii thii sitaaron kii subah tak kii aasmaan se diidaawaraaii tamaam shab  baithe hii guzarii vaade kii shab wo na aa phiraa iizaa ajab tarah kii uthaaii tamaam shab  jab main shuruu qissaa kiyaa aankhen khol diin yaqiinii thii mujhako chasmnumaaii tamaam shab  waqtesiyah ne der men kal yaavarii sii kii thii dushmanii se isakii ladaaii tamaam shab  taare se terii palakon pe qatare se ashq ke dete rahe hain miir dikhaaii tamaam shab

Title: main dukh kii raat huun aisii saveraa duur hai jisakaa
Lyrics: main dukh kii raat huun aisii saveraa duur hai jisakaa  hai merii raah bhuulii sii qadam bhii dagamagaate hain mere sapane adhuure se mujhe rahrah bulaate hain main panachhii pankh bin aisaa baseraa duur hai jisakaa  ye merii zindagii guzarii hai tuufaanon ke siine se jawaanii bujh gaii hai gam ke khaare ashq piine se main gam kaa wo samandar huun kinaaraa duur hai jisakaa

Title: kitanii muddat baad mile ho
Lyrics: kitanii muddat baad mile ho kin sochon men gum rahate ho   kaunasii baat hai tum men aisii itane achchhe kyon lagate ho  hamase na puuchho hijr ke kisse apanii kaho ab tum kaise ho  tez havaa ne mujhase puuchhaa ret pe kyaa likhate rahate ho

Title: dashtetanhaaii men ai jaanejahaan larazaan hai
Lyrics: dashtetanhaaii men ai jaanejahaan larazaan hai terii aavaaz ke saaye tere honthon ke seraab dashtetanhaaii men duurii ke khasokhaag tale khil rahe hain tere pahaluu ke saamen aur gulaab  dashtetanhaaii men   threedots   uth rahii hai kahiin qurabat se terii saans kii aanch apanii khushabuu men sulagatii huii maddham maddham duur ufaq paar chamakatii hui qataraa qataraa mil rahii hai terii diladaar nazar kii shabanam  dashtetanhaaii men   threedots   is qadar pyaar se ai jaanejahaan rakhaa hai dil ke rukasaar pe is vaqt terii yaad ne haath yuun gumaan hotaa hai garaje hai abhii subhefiraaq dhal gayya hijr kaa din aa bhii gayii vasl kii raat  dashtetanhaaii men   threedots   dashtetanhaaii men ai jaanejahaan larazaan hai terii aavaaz ke saaye tere honthon ke seraab

Title: aaj kisii ne baatonbaaton men jab unakaa naam liyaa
Lyrics: aaj kisii ne baatonbaaton men jab unakaa naam liyaa dil ne jaise thokar khaaii dard ne badh kar thaam liyaa  raahetalab men chalatechalate thak kar jab ham chuur huye zulf kii thandii chhaanv men baithe pal do pal aaraam liyaa  diiwaaron ke saayesaaye umr bitaaii diiwaane muft men tan aasaaniiegam kaa apane sar ilzaam liyaa  ghar se daaman jhaad ke nikale wahashat kaa saamaan na puuchh yaanii garderaah se hamane raktesafar kaa kaam liyaa

Title: gamedil kisase kahuun koii bhii gamakvaar nahiin
Lyrics: gamedil kisase kahuun koii bhii gamakvaar nahiin hain sabhii gair yahaan koii bhii hamaraaz nahiin zakmedil kii ye jalan qaabileizahaar nahiin hain sabhii gair yahaan threedots  silasilaa tuut gayaa pyaar ke afasaanon kaa ho gayaa kaaq chaman tinake bikharaa ke gaii  vo ek puradard havaa rah gae gam ke nishaan gamedil kisase kahuun threedots  aaj ashqon men bahe jaate hain tuute sapane aur ye dauresitam kisase fariyaad karen kaun sune dil kii zubaan hai ye bedard jahaan gamedil kisase kahuun threedots

Title: ab yaad hamen kyon aatii ho
Lyrics: ab yaad hamen kyon aatii ho ujad gaii duniyaa apanii yaad hamen kyon aatii ho   dil men ab vo zor kahaan bekaar hamen tadapaatii ho yaad hamen kyon aatii ho   hansii hansii men rulaa gaye tum bane hue ko mitaa gaye tum biite giit puraane ho gae un ko phir kyon gaatii ho yaad hamen kyon aatii ho   dil ko khilaunaa jaan ke todaa ham ko paagal banaa ke chhodaa ab bhii kyaa jii bharaa nahiin hai jo yuun hamen jalaatii ho yaad hamen kyon aatii ho

Title: saathii na koii manzil diyaa hai na koii mahafil
Lyrics: saathii na koii manzil diyaa hai na koii mahafil chalaa mujhe leke ai dil akelaa kahaan threedots  hamadam mile koii kahiin aise nasiib hii nahiin bedard hai zamiin duur aasamaan threedots  galiyaan hain apane desh kii phir bhii hain jaise ajanabii kisako kahe koii apanaa yahaan threedots  patthar ke inasaan mile patthar ke devataa mile shiishe kaa dil liye jaauun kahaan threedots

Title: dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men
Lyrics: dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaana bagiyan men2 aaj hai chaandanii raatii mere jiivan kaa saathii hai jo sovat hai niind magan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men aaj hai chaandanii raatii2 mere jiivan kaa saathii hai jo sovat hai niind magan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men  torii gun gun gun gunajaar torii jhan jhan jahn jhanakaar baadhaa naa daale sukhan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men  kahiin paath na gir jaaye koii kahiin phuul naa murajhaaye koii2 tes laage naa kaliyan men re bhanvara dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men  ai rii koyaliyaa kuu kuu naa bol o papihe naa kar tuu kalol2 piyaa aagaye hamare bhavan men piyaa aagaye hamare bhavan men re bhanvaraa dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men

Title: saagar se suraahii takaraatii baadal ko pasiinaa aa jaataa
Lyrics: saagar se suraahii takaraatii baadal ko pasiinaa aa jaataa tum zulf agar laharaa dete saavan kaa mahiinaa aa jaataa  jiine kii adaa se naavaaqif inasaan ko bhii jiinaa aa jaataa thodii sii agar tum de dete zaahid ko bhii piinaa aa jaataa  kismat men naa thiin ye do raaten ek pyaar kii ek tanahaaii kii ek raat men jiinaa aa jaataa ek raat men maranaa aa jaataa  afasos tum apanii aankhon se chhalakaa naa sake jhalakaa naa sake thodii sii agar chhalakaa dete anavar ko bhii piinaa aa jaataa

Title: puuchh na mujhase dil ke fasaane
Lyrics: puuchh na mujhase dil ke fasaane ishq kii baaten ishq hii jaane          voh din jab ham tumase mile the dil ke naazuk phuul khile the mastii aankhen chuum rahii thii saarii duniyaa jhuum rahii thii do dil the vo bhii diivaane ishq kii baaten ishq hii jaane   threedots  vo din jab tum duur hue the dil ke shiishe chuur hue the aayii khizaan rangiin chaman men aag lagii jab dil ke ban men koii na aayaa aag bujhaane ishq kii baaten ishq hii jaane   threedots

Title: honthon men aisii baat main dabaake chalii aaii
Lyrics: honthon men aisii baat main dabaake chalii aaii khul jaaye vohii baat to duhaaii hai duhaaii haan re haan baat jisamen pyaar to hai zahar bhii hai haay honthon menthreedots  ho shaaluuthreedots raat kaalii naagan sii huii hai javaan haay dayyaa kisako dansegaa ye samaa jo dekhuun piichhe mudake to pag men paayal tadape aage chaluun to dhadakatii hai saarii anganaaii honthon menthreedots  ho shaaluuthreedots aise meraa jvaalaa saa tan laharaaye lat kahiin jaae ghuunghat kahiin jaaye are ab jhumakaa tuute ke merii bindiyaa chhuute ab to banake qayaamat letii huun angadaaii honthon menthreedots

Title: havaa ke saath saath ghataa ke sang sang o saathii chal
Lyrics: havaa ke saath saath ghataa ke sang sang o saathii chal mujhe leke saath chal tuu yuun hii dinraat chal tuu sambhal mere saath chal tuu le haathon men haath chal tuu o saathii chal  ek to ye mausam hai badaa suhaanaa apanaa to ye dil bhii hai diivaanaa parbat se aake na takaraa jaanaa tuu banake baadal o saathii chal threedots  hansatii hai ye duniyaa to hansane de are naagan banakar is rut ko dansane de mujhako apanii aankhon men basane de o banake kaajal o saathii chal threedots  apani reshamii zulphen laharaane de mujhako apanii baanhon men aane de thak gaii aaj bahut main ab jaane de naa milenge phir kal o saathii chal threedots

Title: ai phuulon kii raanii bahaaron kii malikaa
Lyrics: ai phuulon kii raanii bahaaron kii malikaa teraa muskuraanaa gazab ho gayaa na dil hosh men hai na ham hosh men hain nazar kaa milaanaa gazab ho gayaa  tere honth kyaa hain gulaabii kanval hain ye do pattiyaan pyaar kii ik gazal hain vo naazuk labon se muhabbat kii baaten hamiin ko sunaanaa gazab ho gayaa  kabhii khul ke milanaa kabhii khud jhijhakanaa kabhii raaston pe bahakanaa machalanaa ye palakon kii chilaman uthaakar giraanaa giraakar uthaanaa gazab ho gayaa  fizaaon men thandak ghataa bhar javaanii tere gesuon kii badii meharabaanii har ik pench men saikadon maikade hain teraa ladakhadaanaa gazab ho gayaa

Title: pyaar nahiin hai sur se jis ko
Lyrics: pyaar nahiin hai sur se jis ko voh muurakh insaan nahiin pyaar nahiin hai sur  jag men agar sangiit na hotaa koii kissi kaa miit na hotaa yeh ahsaan hai saat suron kaa ki duniyaa viiraan nahiin pyaar nahiin hai sur  sur insaan banaa detaa hai sur rehman milaa detaa hai sur kii aag men jalane vaale parawaane naadaan nahiin pyaar nahiin hai sur

Title: akhiyon ke jharokhon se
Lyrics: akhiyon ke jharokhon se maine dekhaa jo saanvare tum duur nazar aae badii duur nazar aae band karake jharokhon ko zaraa baithii jo sochane  man men tumhiin muskaae bas tumhiin muskaae akhiyon ke jharokhon se  ik man thaa mere paas vo ab khone lagaa hai paakar tujhe haay mujhe kuchh hone lagaa hai ik tere bharose pe sab baithii huun bhuul ke yuunhii umr guzar jaae tere saath guzar jaae  jiitii huun tumhen dekh ke maratii huun tumhiin pe tum ho jahaan saajan merii duniyaa hai vahiin pe din raat duaa maange meraa man tere vaaste kahiin apanii ummiidon kaa koi phuul na murajhaae akhiyon ke jharokhon se threedots  main jab se tere pyaar ke rangon men rangii huun jagate hue soi rahii niindon men jagii huun mere pyaar bhare sapane kahiin koi na chhiin le dil soch ke ghabaraae yahii soch ke ghabaraae akhiyon ke jharokhon se threedots  kuchh bolake khaamoshiyaan tadapaane lagii hain chup rahane se majabuuriyaan yaad aane lagii hain tuu bhii merii tarah hans le aansuu palakon pe thaam le jitanii hai khushii yah bhii ashkon men naa baha jaae ankhiyon ke jharokhon se   kaliyaan ye sadaa pyaar kii musakaatii rahengii khaamoshiyaan tujhase mere afasaane kahengii jii luungii nayaa jiivan terii yaadon men baithake khushabuu jaise phuulon men udane se bhii raha jaae ankhiyon ke jharokhon se

Title: gul khile chaand raat yaad aaii
Lyrics: gul khile chaand raat yaad aaii aapakii baatbaat yaad aaii  ek kahaanii kii ho gayii takamiil ek saavan kii raat yaad aaii  ashk aankhon men phir umad aaye koii maazii kii baat yaad aaii  unakii mahafil se laut kar shahazaad raunakekaayanaat yaad aaii

Title: jal bhii chuke parawaane ho bhii chukii rusavaaii
Lyrics: jal bhii chuke parawaane ho bhii chukii rusavaaii ab kaak udaane ko baithe hain tamaashaaii  taaron kii ziyaa dil men ek aag lagaate hain aaraam se raaton ko sote nahiin saudaaii  raaton kii udaasii men kaamosh hai dil meraa behis hain tamannaaen niind aaye ke maut aaii

Title: aa jaa tujhako pukaaren mere giit re mere giit re
Lyrics: aa jaa tujhako pukaaren mere giit re mere giit re o mere mitava mere mit re aja threedots  nam na janun tera desh na janun kaise main bhejun sandesh na janun ye phulon ki ye jhulon ki rut na jaye bit re aja tujhako threedots  tarasegi kab tak pyasi nazariya barasegi kab mere angan badariya tod ke aja chhod ke aja duniya ki har rit re aja tujhako threedots

Title: yuunhii dil ne chaahaa thaa ronaa rulaanaa
Lyrics: yuunhii dil ne chaahaa thaa ronaa rulaanaa terii yaad to ban gaii ik bahaanaa  hamen bhii nahiin ilm ham jis pe roe vo biitii ruten hain ke aataa zamaanaa 2  gamedil hai aur gamezindagii bhii na isakaa thikaanaa na usakaa thikaanaa 2  koii kisape tadape koii kisape roe idhar dil jalaa hai udhar aashiyaanaa 2

Title: aanevaalii hai aanevaalii hai milan kii ghadii
Lyrics: aanevaalii hai 4 aanevaalii hai milan kii ghadii naa puchho meraa haal yaaron naa puchho meraa haal yaaron hoke judaa main pyaar se rahaa kaii saal yaaron aanevaalii hai milan ki ghadii 2  gujarii hai kaise judaaii ki raaten usako bataaungaa main saarii baaten   2 had se jyaadaa muhabbat karungaa baahon men bharake use chum lungaa rab ne sunalii merii duaa main divaanaa aisaa huaa badal gayi chalo yaron aanevaalii hai milan kii ghadii 2  milane ko vo bhii machalatii hogii raaton ko karavat badalatii hogii   2 sine se saadii sarakatii to hogii haathon kii chudii khanakatii to hogii aatii hogii usako sharam bahake honge usake kadam khule honge baal yaaron aanevaalii hai milan ke ghadii 2  naa puchho meraa haal yaaron  2 hoke judaa main pyaar se rahaa kai saal yaaron aanevaalii hai milan ke ghadii

Title: kabuutar jaa jaa jaa
Lyrics: kabuutar jaa jaa jaa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa pahale pyaar kii pahalii chitthii saajan ko de aa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa   threedots  unase kahanaa jab se gaye tum main to adhuurii lagatii huun in honthon pe chup sii lagii na rotii na hansatii huun bhuul huii jo unhen sataayaa kaisaa paap kiyaa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa   threedots  man hii man men unako apanaa sab kuchh maan chukii huun main vo kyaa hain main kaun huun unakii ab ye jaan chukii huun main unako apane saath  hii laanaa dil hii nahiin lagataa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa   threedots  yahaan kaa mausam badaa hasiin hai phir bhii pyaar udaas hai unase kahanaa duur sahii main dil to unhiin ke paas hai tuu ye sandeshaa unakoo sunaanaa main piichhe aayaa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa   threedots  jahaan bhii dekhuun tum hii tum ho aur nazar na kuchh aaye dil ye chaahe is aalam men kaash zamaanaa ruk jaaye aaj se pahale kabhii nahiin thii itanii hasiin duniyaa kabuutar jaa jaa jaa   threedots

Title: zindagii kitanii khuubasuurat hai aaiye aapakii zaruurat hai
Lyrics: zindagi kitani khubasurat hai aiye apaki zarurat hai zindagi kitani threedots  arazuon ke diye aj raushan kijiye ae hain milane ko ham zindagi ke parade liye  kya hasin rat kya muhurat hai zindagi kitani threedots  yun na ab sharamaiye yun na ab ghabaraiye phul ke ghunghat se ab chandani barasaiye chandani rat kya zarurat hai zindagi kitani threedots

Title: aaj sochaa to aansuu bhar aaye muddaten ho gaiin muskuraae
Lyrics: aaj sochaa to aansuu bhar aae mudhdaten ho gain muskuraae  har kadam par udhar mud ke dekhaa 2 unakii mahafil se ham uth to aae aaj sochaa threedots  dil kii naazuk ragen tuutatii hain 2 yaad itanaa bhii koi na aae aaj sochaa threedots  rah gaii zindagii dard banake 2 dard dil men chhupaae chhupaae

Title: meraa jo haal ho so ho barkenazar giraaye jaa
Lyrics: meraa jo haal ho so ho barkenazar giraaye jaa main yuun hii naalaakash rahuun tuu yuun hii muskuraaye jaa  dil ke har ek goshaa men aag sii ik lagaaye jaa mutarabeaatishiinnavaa haan isii dhun men gaaye jaa  jitanii bhii aaj pii sakuun uzr na kar pilaaye jaa mast nazar kaa waastaa mast nazar banaaye jaa  lutf se ho ke qahar se hogaa kabhii to ruubaruu usakaa jahaan pataa chale shor wahiin machaaye jaa  ishq ko mutamain na rakh husn ke etamaad par wo tujhe aazamaa chukaa tuu use aazamaaye jaa

Title: tuu mere saamane main tere saamane tujhako dekhuun ki pyaar karuun
Lyrics: tuu mere saamane main tere saamane  tujhako dekhuun ki pyaar karuun  ye kaise ho gayaa tuu merii ho gayii  kaise main aitabaar karuun   tuut gaii tuut ke main chuur ho gayii  teri zid se mazabuur ho gayii  tera jaadu chal gayaa o jaaduugar   teri julfon se kheluungaa main tujhako baahon main le luungaa main  dil to dete hain aashiq sabhii  jaan bhi tujhako de duungaa main   ek baar nahiin sau baar kar le  jii bhar ke tu mujhe pyaar karale  tera jaadu chal gayaa o jaaduugar   is kahani ke sau saal hain  2 ye tere pyaar ke chaar pal  zindagaanii ke sau saal hain

Title: mujhe kaamosh rahane do
Lyrics: mujhe kaamosh rahane do mujhe kaamosh rahane do guzartii hai jo is dil par mere ashkon ko kahane do mujhe kaamosh rahane do  mere zakamejigar kyon dekhate hain dekhane vaale kare gaa kyaa koii sun kar merii aahain mere naale merii aankhon se motii pyaar ke bahate hain bahane do guzartii hai jo is dil par mere ashkon ko kehane do mujhe kaamosh rahane do   ye dil meraa hai gam meraatadap merii fugaan merii karegaa kyaa koii sun kar ye  gam kii daastaan merii kushii se dard sahataa huun kushii se dard sahane do guzartii hai jo is dil par mere ashkon ko kehane do mujhe kaamosh rahane do

Title: sab penchotaabeshauq ke tuufaan tham gae
Lyrics: sab penchotaabeshauq ke tuufaan tham gae wo zulf khul gaii to hawaaon ke kam gae  wo jinase shauq se tabassum thii pardaadaar aakir wo kaun the ki bameshaamenam gae  wahashat sii ek laalaaekuunii qafan se thii abake bahaar aaye to samajho ki ham gae  aisii koii kabar to nahiin saakinaaneshahar dariyaa mohabbaton ke jo bahate the tham gae

Title: main tujh ko agar ik phuul kahuun
Lyrics: main tujh ko agar ik phuul kahuun tere rutabe kii tauhiin hai ye teraa husn hameshaa qaayam hai dam bhar ke liye rangiin hai ye  ye aankh agar uth jaaye  to har ek sitaaraa sajadaa kare aa jaaye kahiin honthon par hansii bijalii bhii tadap kar aah bhare main tujh ko agar ik phuul kahuun threedots  ye zulf agar khul jaaye to raaton kii javaanii sharamaaye raftaar kaa aalam kyaa kahiye bahataa huaa dariyaa tham jaaye main tujh ko agar ik phuul kahuun threedots  din raat mahakate rahane kii kaliyon ne adaa tujh se paaii ye chaand jo ghatataa badhaataa hai darasl hai terii angadaaii main tujh ko agar ik phuul kahuun threedots

Title: ajii ruuth kar ab kahaan jaaiegaa
Lyrics: lataa   ajii ruuth kar ab kahaan jaaiyegaa rafii  ajii hamase bachakar kahaan jaaiyegaa jahaan jaaiyegaa hamen paaiyegaa  nigaahon men chhupakar dikhaao to jaanen kayaalon men bhii tum na aao to jaanen ajii laakh parade men chhup jaaiyegaa nazar aaiyegaa nazar aaiyegaa  jo dil men hain hothon pe laanaa bhii mushkila magar usako dil men chhupaanaa bhii mushkila nazar kii zubaan ko samajh jaaiyegaa samajh kar zaraa gaur faramaaiyegaa  ye kaisaa nashaa hain ye kaisaa asar hain na kaabuu men dil hain na bas men jigar hain zaraa hosh aa le phir jaaiyegaa thahar jaaiyegaa thahar jaaiyegaa

Title: pii hai sharaab zabt kii had se badhen
Lyrics: jab kabhii ghutane lagaa siine men dam  pii hai sharaab zabt kii had se badhen jab ranjogamthreedots  ek to chadhatii javaanii kaa nashaa hii kam na thaa  dusare us par ye dhaayaa hai sitam pii hai threedots   mujh pe ilzaamebalaanoshii saraasar hai galat  jis kadar aansuu piye hain us se kam pii hai threedots   jab kabhii saakii se ae kaashif nigaahen mil gaiin  todakar main ne na piine kii kasam pii hai threedots

Title: maar udaarii nii kukiye maar udaarii
Lyrics: maar udaari ni kukiye maar udaari  ud jaanaa chidiyaa ne ud jaanaa lag gaii chid sang yaari   maar udaari ni kukiye maar udaari  baithibaithi chuulhe pe uunghe chuumchuum chitthiyon ko suunghe udatii phire chingaari ni  maar udaari ni kukiye maar udaari  maahii meraa aankh se haay na hate baarii baarii chaakuu se ungali kate katatii nahiin tarakaari ni  mar udaari ni kukiye maar udaari   akhiyon ko jab se par lag gaye satarangii piingon pe sar lag gaye  daalake gale men guluuband puuchhe aaine se piyaa kii pasand puuchhe galiyon men ghuumate hain yaar boliye dhiire chal ediyaan na maar boliye dolii men uthegii sawaari ni  maar udaari ni kukiye maar udaari

Title: ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii umar morii baari
Lyrics: ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii umar morii baarii aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii saaj samaaj piya le aaye aur kahariyaa achaarii hoo ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii umar morii baarii   threedots  bham na bedadrii daradiyo na jaane jo ratgathiya hamaarii hoo ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii   threedots  nadiyaa kinare nadiyaa kinare nadiyaa kinaare balam more rasiya diini ghuunghat pat taarii hoo ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii   threedots  kahat kabiir suno bhaii saadhu chhuute mahal ataarii hoo ab aayii gaavanavaa kii saarii   threedots

Title: pyaar huaa hai jab se mujh ko nahiin chain aataa
Lyrics: pyaar huaa hai jab se mujh ko nahiin chain aataa chhup ke nazar se bhii tuu dil se nahiin jaataa are pyaar huaa hai jab se threedots  lipatii hai tuu merii hii baahon se phir hai sajanaa ojhal kyon merii nigaahon se main huun tere dil haay men phir bhii merii jaan tuu ne hii mujhako nahiin dekhaa main karuun kyaa are pyaar huaa hai jab se threedots  rakhanaa dil ko le kar in haathon men dil hai paagaal aanaa na tuu is kii baaton men lekin is dil pe are qaabuu kis ko ye to hai teraa diivaanaa main karuun kyaa are pyaar huaa hai jab se threedots  juujhaa tere gesu bikharaane men milataa hai kyaa ai zaalim mujhe sataane men tujhako ulajhaa ke mujhako merii jaan achchhii lagatii hai terii suurat main karuun kyaa are pyaar huaa hai jab se threedots

Title: ek bholiibhaalii gaanv kii raanii
Lyrics: ek bholiibhaalii gaanv kii raanii jisakii kahaanii aao sunaayen suno  pake dhaan kaa khet khadaa balakhaa khaa ke laharaaye odh chunariyaa hariyaalii kii dharatii hai muskaaye wahaan banii ek sundar kutiyaa mahalon ko sharmaaye usmen rahatii ek matawaalii sundar raanii jisakii kahaanii aao sunaayen suno  kutiyaa hii sab kuchh hai usakii kutiyaa hii sab kuchh hai wo aatejaate raahii paate aage badhane kii himmat ko gaanv kii raanii piyaa ke path men baithii bichhaaye aankhon ko saanjh diip ne milaa diye aur dekh rahaa is madhurmilan ko aisii gaanv kii raanii jisakii kahaanii aao sunaayen suno  niind parii ke jaaduu ne jab lutaa diye sapane anamol lagii luutane saarii duniyaa apanii manmastii men dol par haay vidhaataa ruup badal kar gaanv ke aangan aaii bholiibhaalii mukhadaa dekh apane aap se voh sharamaaii jo kuchh karanaa thaa karanaa aur chillaa uthii jaag ke duniyaa kaal par gayaa kaal kaal par gayaa kaal  daakanjogan aaii pishaachan chhaaii ghataaen kaalikaalii re maut ke saaz pe pralay raaginii baaj rahii matawaalii re milaa kaaq men gaanv salonaa gam ne manaaii diiwaalii re shaanti gaii sukhchain gayaa sone se bharaa saa wo khet gayaa daakanjogan aaii pishaachan chhaaii ghataaen kaalikaalii re  kahaan gaii wo saanjh suhaanii kahaan paxion kaa gaanaa kahaan gayaa wo madhurmilan aur kahaan kushii se bharaa zamaanaa  kyuun uge ho ab chaand salone kyaa lene ab aaye sitaare chale gaye wo chhod ke duniyaa jinako the tum bade hii pyaare  har gaanv kii tuutii diiwaren kahatii hain aaj kahaanii merii god men banii samaadhi kitanii kutiyaa kitanii raanii

Title: o raajuu o daddy
Lyrics: o raaju o daddy ik pappii se saaraa jhagadaa mitaa do main tum se kal mulaaqaat karuungaa achchhaa main mummy se baat karuungaa threedots  kahanaa bhuul jaaye merii ik bhuul ko bhuul kaisii bhuul daddy tum nahiin samajhoge betaa kahanaa bhuul jaaye merii ik bhuul ko dhuul men na phenke kisii aisii bhuul ko merii taariifen karanaa  haan merii taariifen karanaa behisaab tum le ke aanaa koii achchhaa saath javaab tum main tum se kal mulaaqaat karuungaa achchhaa main mummy se baat karuungaa threedots  aakhir tum se haaregii mujhako chhat par taangoge jurmaanaa bharanaa hogaa ik vaadaa karanaa hogaa phir na mujhe sataaoge mujh ko sab manzuur hai phir dillii kyaa duur hai mujhe akelaa chhodaa to tum ne vaadaa todaa to kattii main tumhaare saath karuungaa achchhaa main mummy se baat karuungaa threedots  pahale mujhe le do dher se khilone o o o chalegaa aise kaam na paise nikaalo haath daalo jeb men paise nikaalo nikaalo paise nikaalo paison kii to main barasaat karuungaa achchhaa main mummy se baat karuungaa threedots

Title: vaadaa rahaa sanam honnge judaa na ham abhiijit  alkaa
Lyrics: alakaa vaadaa rahaa sanam honge judaa na ham chaahe na chaahe zamaanaa hamaarii chaahaton kaa  mit naa sakegaa fasaanaa  abhiijiit vaadaa rahaa sanam honge judaa na ham chaahe na chaahe zamaanaa hamaarii chaahaton kaa  mit naa sakegaa fasaanaa  alakaa in vaadiyon men yuun hii milate rahenge dil men vafaa ke diye jalate rahenge   2 ye maangaa hai duaaon men  kamii na ho vafaaon men  rahe terii nigaahon men dekho na in fizaaon men o jaane jaan hamaarii chaahaton kaa threedots  abhiijiit kaisii udaasii tere chehare pe chhaaii kyaa baat hai jo terii aankh bhar aaii  2 dekho to kyaa nazaare hain tumhaarii tarah pyaare hain hanso na mere liye tum  sabhii to tumhaare hain o jaane jaan hamaarii chaahaton kaa threedots  dono vaadaa rahaa sanam honge judaa na ham chaahe na chaahe zamaanaa hamaarii chaahaton kaa  mit naa sakegaa fasaanaa

Title: chiinoarab hamaaraa hindostaan hamaaraa
Lyrics: chiinoarab hamaaraa hindostaan hamaaraa rahane ko ghar nahii hai saaraa jahaan hamaaraa chiinoarab hamaaraa threedots  kholii bhii chhin gai hai benchen bhii chhin gai hain sadakon pe ghuumataa hai ab kaaravaan hamaaraa jeben hain apanii khaalii kyon detaa varanaa gaalii vo santarii hamaaraa vo paasabaan hamaaraa chiinoarab hamaaraa threedots  jitanii bhii bildingen thiin sethon ne baant lii hain futapaath bambaii ke hain aashiyaan hamaaraa sone ko ham kalandar aate hain borii bandar har ek kholii yahaan hai raazadaan hamaaraa chiinoarab hamaaraa threedots  taliim hai adhuurii milatii nahii majuurii maaluum kyaa kisiko dardenihaan hamaaraa chiinoarab hamaaraa threedots  patalaa hai haaleapanaa lekin lahuu hai gaadhaa phaulaad se banaa hai har naujavaan hamaaraa miljulake is vatan ko aisaa sajaayenge ham hairat se munh takegaa saaraa jahaan hamaaraa chiinoarab hamaaraa threedots

Title: duniyaa rang rangiili baabaa
Lyrics: p  duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii 2     yah duniyaa ik sundar bagiyaa shobhaa isake nyaare hain 2    har daarii par jaaduu chhaayaa 2    har daarii matavaarii hai    adbhut panchhii phuul manohar 2    kaliikalii chatakiilii baabaa    duniyaa rang rangiilii  p  duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii u  ahahaaahahaaahahaaahahaa ahahaaahahaaahahaa saath men  u  kadam kadam par aashaa apanaa ruup anuup dikhaatii hai 2    bigade kaaj banaatii hai dhiiraj ke giit sunaatii hai 2    isakaa sur misrii se miithaa isake taar sajiilii baabaa    duniyaa rang rangiilii  u  duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii s  ahahaaahahaaahahaaahahaa ahahaaahahaaahahaa saath men  s  duhkh kii nadiyaa jiivan naiyaa aashaa ke patavaar lage 2    o naiyaa ke khene vaale 2    naiyaa terii paar lage paar basat hai desh sunaharaa    kismat chhailchhabiilii baabaa    duniyaa rang rangiilii    duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii  s  duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii pu  ahahaaahahaaahahaaahahaa ahahaaahahaaahahaa saath men  sab  duniyaa rang rangiilii baabaa duniyaa rang rangiilii

Title: krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar
Lyrics: krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar3 bhajate nar ur dhaarii re krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar3  shesh shaaradaa paar naa paawen2 nigam kahat om kaarii re tehi ghanashyaam ko sumiran kari le2 mitahiin bhav dukh bhaarii re krrishn hari hari  krrishn manohar threedots  sundar shriighanashyaam sadaaii2 sharanaagat sukhakaarii re ehi chhabi antar me dhari le2 det garbhadukh taarii re krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar threedots  adham uddhaar patit ke paawan2 bhaktawachchhal bhayahaarii re aise hari sukhakaarii bisaarat 2 so nar hot ku waarii re krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar threedots  jehi jan aaii rahe in sharane2 ho gae bhavajal paarii re awadh prasaadanaath kii chhabi pe2 baaranbaar balihaarii re krrishn hari hari krrishn manohar threedots

Title: churaa ke dil meraa goriyaa chalii
Lyrics: churaa ke dil meraa goriyaa chalii  2 udaa ke nindiyaa kahaan tuu chalii  pagal huaa divaanaa huaa  kaisii ye dil kii lagii  churaa ke dil teraa chalii main chalii  mujhe kyaa pataa kahaan main chalii  manzil merii bas tuu hii tuu  churaa ke dil meraa churaa ke dil   abhii to lage hain chaahaton ke mele  abhii dil meraa dhadakanon se khele  kisii mod pe main tumako pukaaruun  bahaanaa koii banaa to na loge  agar main bataa duun mere dil men kyaa hai  tum mujhase nigaahen churaa to na loge  agar badh gayii hai betaabiyaan  kahiin mujhase daaman chhudaa to naa loge  kahataa hai dil dhadakate hue  tum sanam hamaare ham tumhaare hue  manzil merii bas tuu hii tuu  2 terii galii main chalii   churaa ke dil meraa goriyaa chalii churaa ke dil teraa chalii main chalii  nahii bevafaa tum ye mujhako khabar hai  badalatii ruton se magar mujhako dar hai  naii hasaraton kii naii sej par tum  nayaa phuul koii sajaa to naa loge  vafaaen to mujhase bahut tumane kii hai  magar is jahaan men hasiin aur bhii hain  kasam merii khaa kar itanaa bataa do  kisii aur se dil lagaa to naa loge  dhiire dhiire chorii corii aake mil  tut naa jaaye pyaar bharaa dil  manzil merii bas tuu hii tuu  2 terii galii main chalii   churaa ke dil meraa goriyaa chalii

Title: vatan kii raah men vatan ke naujavaan shahiid ho
Lyrics: vatan kii raah men vatan ke naujavaan shahiid ho pukaarate hain ye zamiinoaasamaan shahiid ho  shahiid terii maut hii tere vatan kii zindagii tere lahuu se jaag uthegii is chaman men zindagii khilenge phuul us jagah ki tuu jahaan shahiid ho vatan kii threedots  gulaam uth vatan ke dushmanon se intaqaam le in apane donon baajuon se khanjaron kaa kaam le chaman ke vaaste chaman ke baagabaan shahiid ho vatan kii threedots  pahaad tak bhii kaanpane lage tere junuun se tuu aasamaan pe inqalaab likh de apane khuun se zamiin nahiin teraa vatan hai aasamaan shahiid ho vatan kii threedots  vatan kii laaj jisako thii ajiiz apanii jaan se vo naujavaan jaa rahaa hai aaj kitanii shaan se is ek javaan kii khaak par har ik javaan shahiid ho vatan kii threedots  hai kaun khushanasiib maan ki jisakaa ye chiraag hai vo khushanasiib hai kahaan ye jisake sar kaa taaj hai amar vo desh kyuun na ho ki tuu jahaan shahiid ho vatan kii threedots

Title: chadhataa suuraj dhiire dhiire dhalataa hai dhal jaayegaa
Lyrics: hue naamavar threedots benishaan kaise kaise threedots zamiin khaa gayii threedots naujavaan kaise kaise threedots  aaj javaanii par itaraanevaale kal pachhataayegaa  3 chadhataa suraj dhiire dhiire dhalataa hai dhal jaayegaa  2 dhal jaayegaa dhal jaayegaa  2  tu yahaan musaafir hai ye saraaye faanii hai chaar roj kii mehamaan terii zindagaanii hai zar zamiin zar zevar kuchh naa saath jaayegaa khaalii haath aayaa hai khaalii haath jaayegaa jaanakar bhii anjaanaa ban rahaa hai diivaane apanii umr e faanii par tan rahaa hai diivaane kis kadar tu khoyaa hai is jahaan ke mele me tu khudaa ko bhuulaa hai phansake is jhamele me aaj tak ye dekhaa hai paanevaale khotaa hai zindagii ko jo samajhaa zindagii pe rotaa hai mitanevaalii duniyaa kaa aitabaar karataa hai kyaa samajh ke tuu aakhir ise pyaar karataa hai apanii apanii fikron men jo bhii hai vo ulajhaa hai  2 zindagii haqiikat men kyaa hai kaun samajhaa hai  2 aaj samajhale threedots aaj samajhale kal ye maukaa haath n tere aayegaa o gafalat kii niind men sonevaale dhokhaa khaayegaa chadhataa suraj dhiire dhiire dhalataa hai dhal jaayegaa  2 dhal jaayegaa dhal jaayegaa  2  maut ne zamaane ko ye samaa dikhaa daalaa kaise kaise rustam ko khaak men milaa daalaa yaad rakh sikandar ke hausale to aalii the jab gayaa thaa duniyaa se dono haath khaalii the ab naa vo halaaku hai aur naa usake saathii hain jang jo na koras hai aur na usake haathii hain kal jo tanake chalate the apanii shaanoshaukat par shamaa tak nahii jalatii aaj unakii qurabat par adanaa ho yaa aalaa ho sabako laut jaanaa hai  2 mufhilison kaa andhar kaa kabr hii thikaanaa hai  2 jaisii karanii threedots jaisii karanii vaisii bharanii aaj kiyaa kal paayegaa sarako  uthaakar chalanevaale ek din thokar khaayegaa chadhataa suraj dhiire dhiire dhalataa hai dhal jaayegaa  2 dhal jaayegaa dhal jaayegaa  2  maut sabako aanii hai kaun isase chhuutaa hai tu fanaa nahii hogaa ye khayaal jhuuthaa hai saans tutate hii sab rishte tuut jaayenge baap maan bahan biivii bachche chhuut jaayenge tere jitane hain bhaai vaqatakaa chalan denge chhiinakar terii daulat dohii gaz kafan denge jinako apanaa kahataa hai sab ye tere saathii hain kabr hai terii manzil aur ye baraatii hain laa ke kabr men tujhako muradaa bak daalenge apane haathonse tere munh pe khaak daalenge terii saarii ulfat ko khaak men milaa denge tere chaahanevaale kal tujhe bhulaa denge is liye ye kahataa huun khuub sochale dil men kyuun phansaaye baithaa hai jaan apanii mushkil men kar gunaahon pe taubaa aake bas sambhal jaayen  2 dam kaa kyaa bharosaa hai jaane kab nikal jaaye  2 mutthii baandhake aanevaale threedots mutthii baandhake aanevaale haath pasaare jaayegaa dhan daulat jaagiir se tuune kyaa paayaa kyaa paayegaa chadhataa suraj dhiire dhiire dhalataa hai dhal jaayegaa  4

Title: tere jalave ab mujhe harasuu nazar aane lage jagjit gazal
Lyrics: tere jalave ab mujhe harasuu nazar aane lage  kaash ye bhi ho ke mujhame tu nazar aane lage   ibtadaa ye thi ke dekhii thi khushi kii ek jhalak  intahaa ye hai ke gam harasuu najar aane lage   beqaraarii badhate badhate dil kii fitarat ban gayii  shayad ab taskiin ka pahaluu nazar aane lage   khatm karade aai sabaa ab shaamegam kii daastaan  dekh un aankhon men bhi aansuu najar aane lage      dictionary              1      harasuu                          everywhere 2      ibtadaa                          begining 3      intahaa                          end 4      fitarat                          nature 5      taskiin ka pahaluu               peace of mind

Title: tuu pyaar tuu priit tuu chaand tuu raat
Lyrics: la tuu pyaara ki tuu priita la tuu chaanda ki tuu raata la jiinaa maranaa saatha teraa maranaa judaa honaa mushkila hai la tuu pyaara ki tuu priita la haan tuu chaanda ki haan tuu raata la jiinaa maranaa saatha teraa maranaa judaa honaa mushkila hai ki tuu saaza la tuu giita ki haan tuu ruupa la haan tuu ranga ki chhuute naa ye sanga teraa meraa judaa honaa mushkila hai la tuu pyaara threedots  la baata aajakii to ye nahiin bhuula jaaye jo vo ye nahiin  haan baata aajakii to ye nahiin bhuula jaaye jo vo ye nahiin nayii hai zindagaanii hai sadiyon puraanii hamaarii mulaakaata  teraa meraa judaa honaa mushakila hai ki tuu saaza la tuu giita ki haan tuu ruupa la haan tuu rang ki chhuute naa ye sang teraa meraa judaa honaa mushkil hai tuu pyaara threedots  ki duurduur aba rahanaa nahiin aaja aura kuchha kahanaa nahiin ho duurduur aba rahanaa nahiin aaja aura kuchha kahanaa nahiin naa lage aba jiyaa re kahe ko tere dvaare main le aauun baarat teraa meraa judaa honaa mushakila hai la tuu pyaara ki tuu priita la haan tuu chaanda ki haan tuu raata la jiinaa maranaa saatha teraa maranaa judaa honaa mushkila hai tuu pyaara  ki raata aura dina dhalate rahen la saatha2 hama chalate rahen ki raata aura dina dhalate rahen la saatha2 ham chalate rahen ki bane ham aise saathii la ke jaise diyaa baatii ki dila men hai ye umanga teraa meraa judaa honaa mushkila hai la tuu pyaara ki tuu priita la haan tuu chaanda ki haan tuu raata dono jiinaa maranaa saatha teraa maranaa judaa honaa mushkila hai dono haan tuu pyaara

Title: aashiqii hamane kii tumase sanam  tere pyaar men jiinaa
Lyrics: aashiqii hamane kii tumase sanam zindagii hamako dii tumane sanam tere pyaar men jiinaa tere pyaar men maranaa dostii tumane kii hamase sanam haan ye khushii hamako dii tumane sanam tere pyaar men jiinaa tere pyaar men maranaa he aashiqii hamane kii threedots  pyaar kii vaadii men phuul khil jaate hain pyaar ke maare do dil mil jaate hain ho pyaar men ye saudaa kab ho jaataa hai pyaar men kab saajan rab ho jaataa hai bekhudii chhaa gaii terii kasam o zindagii hamako dii threedots  aa tere honthon pe giit ban jaauun main aa terii saanson kii miit ban jaauun main aa tere haathon men menhadii rachaa duun main aa tere maathe pe bindiyaa sajaa duun main roshanii ho gaii dil men sanam zindagii hamako dii threedots

Title: dil ko hai tumase pyaar kyon ye na bataa sakuungaa main
Lyrics: dil ko hai tumase pyaar kyon ye na bataa sakuungaa main   ye na bataa sakuungaa main  dil ko hai tumase pyaar kyon pyaar kyon  pahale milan ki chhaanv men tumase tumhaare gaanv men   2 aankhen huin thii chaar kyon ye na bataa sakuungaa main  dil ko hai threedots  tumako nazar men rakh liyaa  dil men jigar men rakh liyaa   2 khud main huaa shikaar kyon ye na bataa sakuungaa main  dil ko hai threedots  ruup kii kuchh kamii nahiin duniyaa men ik tumhiin nahiin   2 par main tumhaarii yaad men rahataa huun beqaraar kyon ye na bataa sakuungaa main  dil ko hai threedots

Title: jiiwan hai madhuban tuu isamen phuul khilaa
Lyrics: jiiwan hai madhuban tuu isamen phuul khilaa kaanton se na bhar daaman ab maan bhii jaa 2 jiiwan hai madhuban   dekh zaraa dil men tuu hai kaun sii manzil men  2  uth jaane de har pardaa ab aur na kud ko chhupaa  2 jiiwan hai madhuban   diip jalaataa chal musakaan lutaataa chal  2  thokar se sambhal kud bhii auron ko bhii raah dikhaa  2  jiiwan hai madhuban tuu isamen phuul khilaa kaanton se na bhar daaman ab maan bhii jaa 2 jiiwan hai madhuban

Title: suno gaur se duniyaa vaalon  hindustaanii
Singer: udit narayan shankar mahadevan dominic mahalakshmi
Lyrics: suno gaur se duniyaa vaalon burii nazar naa hamape daalo chaahe jitanaa zor lagaa lo sabase aage honge hindustaanii suno gaur se duniyaa threedots  hamane kahaa hai tum bhii kaho hamane kahaa hai jo tum bhii kaho aao ham mil jul ke bolen ab to yaaraa apanaa jahaan hai sabase pyaaraa hamane kahaa hai jo tum bhii kaho o o jalate sharaare hain paanii ke dhaare hain ham kaate katate nahiin jo vaadaa karate hain karake nibhaate hain ham piichhe hatate nahiin vaqt hai umr hai josh hai aur jaan hai naa jhuken naa miten desh to apanii shaan hai hamane kahaa hai threedots  sabake dilon ko mohabbat se baandhe jo ham aisii zanjiir hain uunchii udaane hain uunche iraade hain ham kal kii tasviir hain jo hamen pyaar de ham use yaar pyaar den dostii ke lie zindagii apanii vaar den hamane kahaa hai threedots

Title: hain sabase madhur vo giit jinhen ham dard ke sur men gaate hain
Lyrics: hain sabase madhur vo git jinhen ham dadr ke sur men gate hain  jab had se guzar jati hai khushi ansu bhi chhalakate aate hain  hain sabase madhur vo git  pahalu men paraaye dard basake hansana hansana sikh zaraa  tu hansana hansaana sikh zaraa   2 tufan se kah de ghir ke uthe ham pyaar ke dip jalaate hain  ham pyaar ke dip jalaate hain hain sabase madhur vo git threedots  kanton men khile hain phul hamaare rang bhare aramanon ke  rang bhare aramaanon ke   2 nadan hain jo in kanton se daaman ko bachaaye jaate hain  daaman ko bachaaye jaate hain hain sabase madhur vo git threedots  jab gam ka andhera ghir aaye samajho ke savera dur nahiin  samajho ke savera dur nahin   2 har rat ki hai saugat yahi tare bhi yahi doharate hain tare bhi yahi doharate hain hain sabase madhur vo git threedots

Lyrics: raadhike tune bansurii churaaii  2  bansurii bajaaii kya mere man bhai  2 kahe ko rar machai machai re raadhike tune bansurii churaaii  2   deduungii kahe qasamen khaaye  2  kahaan chhupaaii par na bataaye  2  raadhike tune bansurii churaaii  2   na teri bairan na teri sautan aa aa sautan  na teri bairan na teri sautan  meri muraliyaa mohe sabakaa man  2  kare teri kaun buraaii buraaii re not sure about this line   raadhike tune bansurii churaaii  2

Title: agar bevafaa tumako pahachaan jaate khudaa kii qasam ham
Lyrics: agar bevafaa tumako pahachaan jaate kudaa kii qasam ham muhabbat na karate jo maaluum hotaa ye ilazaameulafat to dil ko lagaane kii zurrat na karate  jinhen tumane samajhaa merii bevafaaii merii zindagii kii vo majabuuriyaan thiin hamaarii muhabbat ik imtihaan thii ye do din kii thodii sii jo duuriyaan thiin agar sachchii hotii muhabbat hamaarii to ghabaraa ke tum yuun shikaayat na karate  jo ham par hai guzarii hamiin jaanate hain sitam kaun saa hai nahiin jo uthaayaa nigaahon men phir bhii rahii terii suurat har ek saans men teraa paigaam aayaa agar jaanate tum hii ilazaam doge to bhuule se bhii ham to ulafat na karate

Title: main ne lakhon ke bol sahe sitamgar tere liye
Lyrics: main ne lakhon ke bol sahe sitamgar tere liye  huaa jo goregariibaan men ek roz guzar to us jagah mujhe ik taazaa qabr aaii nazar jo padh ke faatahaa chalane lagaa to main ne sunaa baazereqabr koii kah rahaa hai roro kar main ne lakhon ke bol sahe sitamgar tere liye  thahar gyaa main vahiin ruk gyaa qadam meraa ilaahii kaun hai is qabr men ye main ne kahaa abhii main bahretafukkar men garq thaa naazish ki itane men phir usii qabr se ye aaii sadaa main ne lakhon ke bol sahe sitamgar tere liye  sunaa dobaaraa jo us se yahii bayaanealam to puuchhaa main ne ki ai dardmand kushtaaegam tuu kis ke hijr men muztir hai sab bataa lillaah tuu kis kii yaad men roro ke kahataa hai haradam main ne lakhon ke bol sahe sitamgar tere liye

Lyrics: ahaderangiin kii yaadagaar huun main yaanii apanaa hii sogawaar huun main  aa ke betaabeintazaar huun main dard kii aakirii pukaar huun main  merii hastii kaa waah kyaa kahanaa terii hastii kaa pardaadaar huun main  mujhako rangekhizaan samajh ke na dekh muzadaaeaamadebahaar huun main

Title: hai mubaarak aaj kaa dinshaadamaanii ho shaadamaanii
Lyrics: hai mubaarak aaj kaa din raat aayii hai suhaanii shaadamaanii ho ho shaadamaanii  aaj to nashaa aisaa chadhaa puuchho na yaaro main huun aasamaan pe mujhe niiche utaaro mujh pe sadaa hansatii raho yuun hii bahaaron mil ke mere saath naacho aapakii hai maharabaanii shaadamaanii ho ho shaadamaanii   threedots  dekho merii aankhon men hain dore gulaabii main to nahiin piitaa huaa phir bhii sharaabii ye hai tere pyaar kaa nashaa chandaa  bhaiyyaa raajaa ghar men le ke aa gayaa pariyon kii raanii shaadamaanii ho ho shaadamanii   threedots  aangan men yuun barase sadaa khushiyon kii jhadii bandhe tere sehare men ye aashaa kii ladii  hai nayaa andaaz chaahe riit hai vo hii puraanii shaadamaanii ho ho shaadamaanii   threedots

Title: phir kisii rahaguzar par shaayad
Lyrics: phir kisii rahaguzar par shaayad ham kabhii mil sake magar shaayad jinake jum mumtazir rahe unako mil gae aur hamasafar shaayad ajanabiiyat kii dhundh chhant jaae chamak uthe terii nazar shaayad jaan pahachaan se bhii kyaa hogaa phir bhii aur dost gaur kar shaayad jo bhii bichhade hain voh kab mile hain faraz phir bhii tuu intezaar kar shaayad threedots

Title: jiivan kii bagiyaa mahakegii lahakegii chahakegii
Lyrics: lataa jiivan kii bagiyaa mahakegii lahakegii chahakegii khushiyon kii kaliyaan jhuumengii jhuulengii phuulengii jiivan kii bagiyaa threedots lataa vo meraa hogaa  vo sapanaa teraa hogaa milajul ke maangaa  vo teraa meraa hogaa jab jab vo muskuraaegaa  apanaa saveraa hogaa threedots thodaa hamaaraa thodaa tumhaaraa aayegaa phir se bachapan hamaaraa jiivan kii bagiyaa threedots  kishor ham aur bandhenge  ham tum kuchh aur bandhenge hogaa koii biich  to ham tum aur bandhenge baandhegaa dhaagaa kachchaa  ham tum tab aur bandhenge threedots thodaa hamaaraa thodaa tumhaaraa aayegaa phir se bachapan hamaaraa jiivan kii bagiyaa threedots  lataa meraa raajadulaaraa  vo jiivan praan hamaaraa phuulegaa ek phuul  khilegaa pyaar hamaaraa din kaa vo suuraj hogaa  raaton kaa chaand sitaaraa threedots thodaa hamaaraa thodaa tumhaaraa aayegaa phir se bachapan hamaaraa jiivan kii bagiyaa threedots

Lyrics: kisii bevafaa ke sataaye hue hain  2 muhabbat ke sadame uthaaye hue hain  2 kisii bevafaa ke sataaye hue hain  muhabbat na karanaa na karanaa na karanaa  2 muhabbat ko ham aazamaaye hue hain  2 kisii bevafaa ke sataaye hue hain  na todo sitam aaj ham bekason pe ham bekason pe na todo sitam aaj ham bekason pe ke thokar zamaane kii khaaye hue hain  2 kisii bevafaa ke sataaye hue hain  muhabbat kii qasamen uthaaye hue hain  2 kisii bevafaa ke sataaye hue hain

Title: ye kis bandhan men ulajhaayaa hai tuu ne
Lyrics: ye kis bandhan men ulajhaayaa hai tuu ne zindagii mujh ko jo todaa bhii nahiin jaataa nibhaayaa bhii nahiin jaataa ye kis bandhan men ulajhaayaa hai tuu ne thredots  ye ulajahan ye pareshaanii kudaa ye bebasii taubaa mere saaqii ne mujh ko de diyaa hai jaam kuchh aisaa jo chodaa bhii nahiin jaataa uthaayaa bhii nahiin jaataa ye kis bandhan men ulajhaayaa hai tuu ne threedots  jo kahataa thaa muhabbat men vafaa kaa devataa ho jaa taajjub hai vahii kahataa hai jaa mujh se bevafaa ho jaa magar ai bevafaa mujh se bhulaayaa bhii nahiin jaataa ye kis bandhan men ulajhaayaa hai tuu ne threedots

Title: saanchii kahen tore aavan se hamare
Lyrics: saanchii kahen tore aavan se hamare anganaa men aaii bahaar bhaujii  lakshmii sii suurat mamataa kii muurat  laakhon men ek hamaar bhaujii  1 tulasii kii sevaa chandaramaa kii puujaa  kajarii jaisaa anganavaa men guunjaa  ab hamane jaanaa ke phagavaa sivaa bhii  2  hote hain kitane tyohaar bhaujii saanch threedots  2 ye ghar thaa bhuutan kaa deraa  jab se bhayaa tumharaa pag pheraa  duniyaa badal gaii haalat sambhal gaii  2  an dhan ke laage bhandaar bhaujii saanch threedots  3 bachapan se ham kaakaa kahikahi ke haare  koii hamen bhii to kaakaa pukaare  deii de bhatiijaa phulavaa sariikhaa  2  maanenge ham upakaar bhaujii saanch threedots

Title: soch rahaa huun kaii dinon se
Lyrics: soch rahaa huun kaii dinon se kaise tumhen samajhaauun dil kii baat bataauun soch rahaa huun threedots  aankhen bhiigii rahatii hain haule haule bahatii hain chupake se kuchh kahatii hain soch rahaa huun threedots  ban hai yaa gharaangan hai suunaa suunaa jiivan hai tanman hai yaa jaalaa hai soch rahaa huun threedots

Title: bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai
Lyrics: bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai varanaa duniyaa men kyaa hamaaraa hai log marate hain maut aane se hamako is zindagii ne maaraa hai bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai   threedots  is muqaddar ka ye sitam dekho duubate jaa rahe hain ham dekho aur vo saamane kinaaraa hai bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai   threedots  aadamii kuchh bhii kar nahiin sakataa vaqt aisaa guzar nahiin sakataa vaqt aisaa magar guzaaraa hai bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai   threedots  kitanii halkii hai kitanii bojhil hai koii aurat nahiin ye botal hai band is men jahaan saaraa hai bekhudii kaa badaa sahaaraa hai   threedots

Title: tum aaj hansate ho hans lo mujh par mukesh gazal
Lyrics: tum aaj hansate ho hans lo mujh par ye aazamaaish naa baar hogii main jaanataa huun mujhe khabar hai ki kal fazaa khushagavaar hogii  rahe muhabbat men zindagii bhar rahegii ye kashamakash baraabar naa tumako qurabat men jiit hogii naa mujhako furaqat men haar hogii  hazaar ulfat sataaye lekin mere iraadon se hai ye mumakin agar sharaafat ko tumane chhedaa to zindagii tum pe vaar hogii

Title: koii bataa de dil hai jahaan
Lyrics: lataa  koii bataa de dil hai jahaan         kyon hotaa hai dard vahaan rafii  tiir chalaa ke ye to na puuchho         dil hai kahaan aur dard kahaan  lataa  jaane raat ko aankhon se         niind kahaan ud jaatii hai rafii  apane ghar men gair ko paa kar         bechaarii mud jaatii hai  rafii  jab ho kalish sii pahaluu men         samajho pyaar ne kaam kiyaa lataa  aise pyaar ko kyaa kahiye         ke jisane beaaraam kiyaa  lataa  dil pe aisii kyaa guzarii         ghadii ghadii ye ghabaraaye rafii  main to kisii kaa ho baithaa         baar baar ye samajhaaye

Title: ye to nahiin ke tumasaa jahaan men hasiin nahiin
Lyrics: ye to nahiin ke tumasaa jahaan men hasiin nahiin is dil ko kyaa karuun ki bahalataa kahiin nahiin  kahataa huun dil se aur hasiin dhuundhie koii aataa hai phir kayaal ki aisaa kahiin nahiin  afsos hai ki dard bhii ab chhodataa hai saath ye bhii akiir waqt kahiin hai kahiin nahiin  kahate hain log daag se wo badagumaan hai usako tumharii zaat pe aisaa yaqiin nahiin

Title: tiir nainon kaa zaalim ne haay maaraa mujhe
Lyrics: tiir nainon kaa zaalim ne haay maaraa mujhe  nainaa bade gariib hain are rahen palak kii ot daanv pade chuuken nahiin re karen laakhan men chot

Title: aavaaraa bhanvare jo haule haule gaaye
Lyrics: aavaaraa bhanvare jo haule haule gaaye phuulon ke tan pe havaaen sarasaraaen  koyal kii kuhuu kuhuu papiihe kii pihuu pihuu jangal men jhiingar kii jhaany jhaany nadiyaa men laharen aayen balakhaayen chhalakii jaayen bhiigii honthon se vo gunagunaaen gaatii hai saahil gaataa hai bahataa paanii gaataa hai ye dil sun     saa re gaa maa paa dhaa ni saa re  raat jo aaye to sannaataa chhaaye to tiktik kare ghadii suno duur kahiin guzare rel kisii pul pe guunje dhadadhadii suno sangiit hai ye sangiit hai man kaa sangiit suno baahon men leke bachchaa maan jo koii lorii gaaye mamataa kaa giit suno  aavaaraa bhanvare jo haule haule gaaye phuulon ke tan pe havaaen sarasaraaye  bhiige parinde ko kud ko sukhaane ko par phadphadaate hain suno gaay bhii bail bhii gale men padii ghantii kaise bajate hain suno sangiit hai ye sangiit hai man kaa sangiit suno barakhaa raanii buundon kii dharatii kaa giit suno

Title: dil men aur to kyaa rakhaa hai
Lyrics: dil men aur to kyaa rakhaa hai teraa dard chhupaa rakhaa hai  itane dukhon kii tez hawaa men dil kaa diip jalaa rakhaa hai  is nagarii ke kuchh logon ne dukh kaa naam dawaa rakhaa hai  vaadaaeyaar kii baat na chhedo ye dhokhaa bhii khaa rakhaa hai  bhuul bhii jaao biitii baaten in baaton men kyaa rakhaa hai  chup chup kyuun rahate ho naasir ye kyaa rog lagaa rakhaa hai

Title: baadal chaandii barasaaye runajhun runajhun
Lyrics: baadal chaandii barasaaye runajhun runajhun buundon ke saaz bajaaye runajhun runajhun paanii apanii paayal dharatii par jhanakaaye runajhun runajhun  paapii hai papiihaa dekho shor kare ban men huuq sii uthe siine men aag lage man men pagalii puravaaii gaaye runajhun runajhun bhiige aur naache jaaye runajhun runajhun paanii apanii paayal dharatii par   threedots  bagiyaa men bhanvare aaye pedo par bhanvare aaye daalii par chidyaan aayiin laharon men laharen aaye jaare kaagaa jaake kahade tuu mere saajan se sab aaye ab tuu bhii aajaa aa mil jaa birahan se barakhaa har din aa jaaye har din bas ye doharaaye paanii apanii paayal dharatii par   threedots

Title: dekhe bhaale dost hamaare ye jaane pahachaane log
Lyrics: shaharetarab men giile giile phirate hain mastaane log apanii nazar hai viiraanon par ham thahare diivaane log  dekhe bhaale dost hamaare ye jaane pahachaane log inakii nazar phirate hii ban gaye sab ke sab begaane log  bazmetarab men shiishe uchhale jaane kitane dil tuute saagarochashm chhalakate rahe aur bharate rahe paimaane log  tere karam se merii vusaat raunak kaa saamaan banii ab bhii aa jaate hain aksar apanaa dil bahalaane log  apane aish kii jot jagaane mere gam ke andhere men apane hii pindaar kii kaatir aate hain samajhaane log

Title: dhikh tanaa dhikh tanaa dhikh tanaa
Lyrics: dhikh tanaa tikh tanaa dhikh tanaa dhikh dhikh tanaa tikh tanaa dhikh tanaa bhaabhii tum khushiyon kaa khazaanaa dhikh tanaa tikh tanaa dhikh tanaa  pahalii kiran jab se uge bhaabhii merii tab se jage sabakaa puuraa dhyaan dhare vo shaam dhale tak kaam kare kal tak rahaa is chaanv se meraa bachapan anjaanaa dhikh tanaa   threedots  hogii merii shaadii kabhii kahate hain ye mujhase sabhii kud apanii devaraanii chunanaa baat kisii kii mat sunanaa tum dhuundh ke rang ruup men apanii parachhaaii laanaa dhikh tanaa   threedots  kab tak rahuun sabase chhotaa aaye koii mujhase chhotaa hansataa bolataa koii khilaunaa ab in baahon ko do na tumase maange ghar kaa aangan pyaaraa pyaaraa nazaraanaa dhikh tanaa   threedots

Title: ye chaand chamakaa is liye
Lyrics: ye chaand chamakaa is liye ki chaandnii zindaa rahe main jii rahaa huun is liye  ki zindagii zindaa rahe ye chaand chamakaa is liye  dil me hazaaron gham bhare aansuu bhare aahen bhariin kyaa jaanataa koii bhalaa kitanii bhujii chaahen bhariin kitanii bhujii chaahen bhariin main gaa rahaa huun is liye ki raaginii zindaa rahe main jii rahaa huun is liye  ki zindagii zindaa rahe ye chaand chamakaa is liye  jalatii shamaa jalataa badan milakar jagaaden pyaar ko meraa sanam koi nahii meraa sanam koi nahii mujhako mile upahaar kyon upahaar kyon main jal rahaa huun is liye ki roshanii zindaa rahe main jii rahaa huun is liye  ki zindagii zindaa rahe ye chaand chamakaa is liye

Title: ham jab honge saath saal ke aur tum hogii pachapan kii

Title: nirbal se ladaaii balavaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye aur tuufaan kii
Lyrics: nirbal se ladaaii balavaan kii 2 yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii 2  ik raat andhiyaarii thiin dishaaen kaariikaarii mandmand pavan thaa chal rahaa andhiyaare ko mitaane jag men jyot jagaane ek chhotaasaa diiyaa thaa kahiin jal rahaa apanii dhun men magan usake tan men agan usakii lau men lagan bhagavaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii  kahiin duur thaa tuufaanthreedots kahiin duur thaa tuufaan diiye se thaa balavaan saare jag ko masalane machal rahaa jhaad hon yaa pahaad de vo pal men ukhaad sochsoch ke zamiin pe thaa uchhal rahaa ek nanhaasaa diiyaa usane hamalaa kiyaa 2 ab dekho liilaa vidhi ke vidhaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii  duniyaa ne saath chhodaa mamataa ne mukh modaa ab diiye pe yah dukh padane lagaa 2 par himmat na haar man men maranaa vichaar atyaachaar kii havaa se ladane lagaa sar uthaanaa yaa jhukaanaa yaa bhalaaii men mar jaanaa ghadii aaii usake bhii imtehaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii  phir aisii ghadii aaii  2 ghanaghor ghataa chhaaii ab diiye kaa bhii dil lagaa kaanpane bade zor se tuufaan aayaa bharataa udaan us chhote se diiye kaa bal maapane tab diiyaa dukhiyaaraa vah bichaaraa besahaaraa chalaa daav pe lagaane baazii praan kii  4 chalaa daav pe lagaane baazii praan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii  ladateladate vo thakaa phir bhii bujh na sakaa 2 usakii jyot men thaa bal re sachchaaii kaa chaahe thaa vo kamazor par tuutii nahiin dor usane biidaa thaa uthaayaa re bhalaaii kaa huaa nahiin vo niraash chalii jab tak saans use aas thii prabhu ke varadaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii  sar patakpatak pag jhatakjhatak na hataa paayaa diiye ko apanii aan se baarbaar vaar kar ant men haar kar tuufaan bhaagaa re maidaan se atyaachaar se ubhar jalii jyot amar rahii amar nishaanii balidaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii nirbal se ladaaii balavaan kii yah kahaanii hai diiye kii aur tuufaan kii

Lyrics: ham to hain chhuiimuii ib kyaa karen 2 o bhanvaraa banake aaegae ho  hamakaa vo dekhen aisii nazar se 2 mujhako pataa naazuk saa jiyaaraa chhaliyaa banake aaegae ho  ib to sajaaile julaphuul men apanii 2 mushqil men pad gaii haay raamaa main phuulavaa banake aaegae ho  maaraa hai bairii ne dank aisaa 2 nasnas men bhar dalaa hai zahar bichchhuaa banake aaegae ho  hamakaa vo bole ras kii bharii ho 2 besharam aisii batiyaa kare hain rasiyaa banake aaegae ho  hamakaa banaay lie apanii dulhaniyaa 2 baabul se hamare puuchhe binaa o dulhaa banake aaegae ho

Title: jab ham chalen to saath hamaaraa saayaa bhii na de
Lyrics: jab ham chalen to saath hamaaraa saayaa bhii na de jab tum chalo zamiin chale aasmaan chale jab ham ruken to saath ruke shamebekasii jab tum ruko bahaar ruke chaandanii ruke  ye hansataa huaa phuul ye mahakaa huaa gulashan ye rang aur nuur men duube hue raahen  ye phuulon kaa ras piike machalate hue bhanvare main duun bhii to kyaa duun ai shokh nazaaron le de ke mere paas kuchh aansuu hain kuchh aahen  o aasmaanvaale kabhii to nigaah kar 2 ab tak ye zulm sahate rahe kaamoshii se ham tang aa chuke hain kashamaakashezindagii se ham  thukaraa na de jahaan ko kahiin bedilii se ham maayuusiiemakemuhabbat na puuchhiye apanon se pesh aaiye hain begaangegii se ham  aavaaz bhaaii koii khushii kaa giit sunaao  ham gamazadaa hain laaen kahaan se khushii ke giit denge vohii ho paaenge is zindagii se ham  gar kabhii mile zindagii ko itteffaaq se puuchhenge apanaa haal terii bebasii se ham  ubharenge ek baar abhii dil ke valavale maanaa ke dab gae hain gamezindagii se ham  lo aaj hamane tod diaa rishtaaeummiid lo ab kabhii gilaa na karenge kisii se ham

Lyrics: ladakaa  sakalavedatraataa dharaniidhara vidhaataa asuradaityahantaa jagath ke niyantaa  kiye leke avataara satkarma uddhaara  vandana karuun krrishna karunaa ke aadhaara  ladakii  sakhii mere bina jo vicharate vihaarii magana gopiyon men rame vamshiidhaarii nithura miita ke priita kii vandinii main ragii shyaama ke ranga shyaamaanginii main  binaa shyaama pala pala viraha chaina luute milana yaada aae sakhii dhiira tuute kaho ab tarasate nayana ko darasa de gahen anka apane nahin praana chhuute  liye piira mana men milana kii lagana men jalii mauna raadhaa viraha kii agana men suno ai kanhaaii tadapatii hai kaise koii miina tadape binaa jala ke jaise  ladakaa  badii maaninii hai gaii ruutha kara vo rahii paasa lekina sadaa priita kara vo vikala raadhikaa bina tere miita panchhii nayana johate baat palakon    ladakii  vahaan shyaama aakula hain yamunaa kinaare vikala baat dekhen muraliyaa pukaare nahiin gopiyon men magana mana ramaate bhujaa aaj pyaase piyaa ko bulaate  ladakaa  nahiin shyaama puuraa tere bin o raadhe binaa eka duuje ke hama aadhe aadhe meraa prema arpana samarpana tumhiin ho tumhii praanadhana meraa jiivana tumhiin ho2

Lyrics: ai zindagii huii kahaan bhuul jisakii hamen milii ye sazaa  ai zindagii huii kahaan bhuul jisakii hamen milii ye sazaa kahaan se kahaan laaii tuu hamen hamase hai kyuun itanii kafaa ai zindagii   kahaan gae din wo suhaane kahaan khoyaa pyaar hamaaraa kahaan udii kyaa chingaarii jal gayaa wo sukh saaraa hoa apanaa kahiin koii nahiin laa ke kahaan hamen maaraa  ai zindagii huii kahaan bhuul jisakii hamen milii ye sazaa ai zindagii   biite jo dil pe hamaare jaake kahaan kisako sunaaen chhalake jo aankhon se dil ke aansuu ye kisako dikhaaen hoa kaun sune dil kaa ye gam dushman hai jag saaraa  ai zindagii huii kahaan bhuul jisakii hamen milii ye sazaa ai zindagii   jaaen to ham kahaan jaaen suujhe na koii kinaaraa bhar gayaa jii yahaan jii ke chhodd de piichhaa hamaaraa hoa terii qasam duniyaa men ham aaenge naa dobaaraa  ai zindagii huii kahaan bhuul jisakii hamen milii ye sazaa kahaan se kahaan laaii tuu hamen hamase hai kyuun itanii kafaa ai zindagee huee kahaan bhool  ai zindagii kyaa hain tere khel tere siwaa kisako pataa kis mod pe kyaa de hamen kis mod pe chhiin le kyaa

Title: bandau gurupad kanj krripaasindhu nararuup hari
Lyrics: so  bandau gurupad kanj krripaasindhu nararuup hari       mahaamoh tam punj jaasu bachan rabi kar nikar 5  baalakaand  do  barashaa ritu raghupati bhagati tulasii saali sudaas       raam naam bar baran jug saawan bhaadav maas  19  baalakaand  do raam naam manidiip dharu jiih dehariin dwaar      tulasii bhiitar baaherahun jaun chaahasi ujiaar  21  baalakaand  do  sakal kaamanaa hiin je raam bhagati ras liin       naam suprem piyuush hrrid tinhahun kie man miin  22  baalakaand  do  brahm raam ten naamu bad bara daayak bara daani       raamacharit sat koti mahn liy mahes jiyn jaani  25  baalakaand  do  naamu raam ko kalapataru  kali kalyaan niwaasu       jo sumitar bhayo bhaang ten tulasii tulasiidaasu  26  baalakaand  do  raam naam narakesarii kanakakasipu kalikaal       jaapak jan prahalaad jimi paalihi dali surasaal  27  baalakaand  do  raam anant anant gun amit kathaa bistaar       suni aacharaju na maanihahin jinhaken bimal bichaar  33  baalakaand  do  raam kathaa sur dhenu sam sewat sab sukh daani       sat samaaj sur lok sabahun ko na sune asi jaani    siyaawar raamachandra pad jayasharanan shankar hari om jay jay siyaaraam siyaawar raamachandra kii jay pawanasut hanumaan kii jay siyaawar raamachandra pad jayasharanan4

Title: dekhaa ek kvaab to ye silasile hue
Lyrics: dekhaa ek kvaab to ye silasile hue duur tak nigaahon men hain gul khile hue ye gilaa hai aap kii nigaahon men phuul bhii hon darmiyaan to faasale hue dekhaa ek threedots  merii saanson men basii kushabuu terii ye tere pyaar kii hai jaadugarii terii aavaaz hai havaaon men pyaar kaa rang hai fizaaon men dhadakanon men tere giit hain khile hue kyaa kahuun ke sharm se hain lab sile hue dekhaa ek kvaab threedots  meraa dil hai terii panaahon men ab chhupaa luun main tujhe baahon men terii tasviir hai nigaahon men duur tak roshanii hai raahon men kal agar na roshanii ke kaafile hue pyaar ke hazaar diip hain jale hue dekhaa ek kvaab threedots

Title: husn vaalon ne kiyaa jalavaa to bijaliyaan gulam ali gazal
Lyrics: husn vaalon ne kiyaa jalavaa to bijaliyaan hazaar giriin  ham bhi kuchh dikhaate to qayaamat ho jaatii   chalataa huun thodii dur har ik tez rau ke saath  pahachaanataa nahiin huun abhii raahabar ko main
