Lyrics: alakaa		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa 		diidaar adhuuraa rahataa hai  2 		jab tak naa pade aashiq kii nazar  2 		singaar adhuraa rahataa hai 		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa  shaanuu	ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa 		diidaar adhuuraa rahataa hai 		jab tak naa mile nazaron se nazar  2 		iqaraar adhuuraa rahataa hai 		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa  alakaa		dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa shaanuu	dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa  shaanuu	gore mukhade se ghuunghataa hataane de alakaa		ghadii apane milan kii to aane de shaanuu	mere dil pe nahiin meraa kaabuu hai alakaa		kuchh nahiin ye chaahat kaa jaaduu hai shaanuu	badhati hii jaatii hain sanam pyaar kii ye bekhudii ho alakaa		do premiyon ke naa milane se 		sansaar adhuuraa rahataa hai 		jab tak naa pade aashiq kii nazar  2 		singaar adhuraa rahataa hai 		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa  shaanuu	dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa alakaa		haan dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa  alakaa		baag men gul kaa khilanaa zaruurii hai shaanuu	haan mohabbat men milana zaruurii hai alakaa		paas aane kaa achchhaa bahaanaa hai shaanuu	kyaa karuun main ki mausam diivaanaa hai alakaa		dil meraa dhadakaane lagii ab to ye diivaanagii ho shaanuu	binaa kisii yaar ke jaanejaan  		ye pyaar adhuuraa rahataa hai  		jab tak na mile nazaron se nazar  2 		iqaraar adhuuraa rahataa hai 		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa  alakaa		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa 		diidaar adhuuraa rahataa hai 		jab tak naa pade aashiq kii nazar 		singaar adhuraa rahataa hai 		ghuunghat kii aad se dilabar kaa  shaanuu	dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa alakaa		haan dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa shaanuu	dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa alakaa		hon dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa shaanuu	haan dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa alakaa		haan dilabar kaa dilabar kaa dilabar kaa

Title: jab shaam kaa suuraj dhalataa hai
Lyrics: jab shaam kaa suuraj dhalataa hai chhup chhup ke chaand ke saaye men koii mujhe pukaaraa karataa hai jab shaam kaa suuraj threedots  jab hosh men taare aate hain bekud raat ho jaatii hai mere kaanon men dhiire dhiire aavaaz kisii kii aatii hai jab shaam kaa suuraj threedots  kahiin aankh zaraa sii lag jaaye sapanon kii raanii aatii hai main us se aankh churaauun vo ulfat kii saaz bajaatii hai jab shaam kaa suuraj threedots

Title: cheharaa apanaa dekhate hain aaine men vo
Lyrics: cheharaa apanaa dekhate hain aaine men vo vo aur ye bhii dekhate hain koii dekhataa na ho  apanii duaa men sirf mujhako maangate hain vo vo aur ye bhii maangate hain koii maangataa na ho  gore badan se unakaa aanchal zaraa saa dhalakaa jaagaa mere siine men koii dard halkaa halkaa  mujhako pataa hai mujhase vo pyaar kar rahe hain phir bhii naa jaane kyuun kahane se dar rahe hain  har lamhaa mere baare men sochate hain vo vo aur ye bhii sochate hain koii sochataa na ho  khaamosh hai jubaan lekin aankhen bolatii hain dhadakan men jo hai chhupaa vo raaj kholatii hain  unakii isii adaa ne diivaanaa mujhe kar diyaa hai saare jahaan se begaanaa dekho kar diyaa hai  bas mujhako dilojaan se ab chaahate hain vo vo aur ye bhii chaahate hain koii chaahataa na ho cheharaa apanaa dekhate threedots

Title: suunii suunii ankhiyon men juganuun chamak uthe jab se milaa hai
Lyrics: suunii suunii ankhiyon men juganuun chamak uthe jab se milaa hai teraa pyaar tumane to jaise meraa rang hii badal diyaa kahaan the abhii tak yaar suunii suunii ankhiyon threedots  kal bhii yahii jahaan thaa lekin thaa phiikaa phiikaa gulon ne khilanaa shamaa ne jalanaa terii nazar se siikhaa aaj zaraa dekho merii duniyaa kaa ruup singaar suunii suunii ankhiyon threedots  main bhii bujhii bujhii thii chaahat kii aarazuu men chahak uthii huun mere milan ke gulaab kii khushbuu men meraa hansanaa meraa gaanaa sab teraa upakaar suunii suunii ankhiyon threedots

Title: nigaaheyaar jise aashanaaeraaz kare
Lyrics: nigaaheyaar  jise  aashanaaeraaz  kare vo apanii kuubiieqismat pe kyon naa naaz kare  dilon ko fikaredoaalam se kar diyaa aazaad tere junuun kaa kudaa silsalaa daraaz kare  gamejahaan se jise ho firaag kii kwaahish vo unake dardemuhabbat se saazbaaz kare  ummiidwaar hain har simt aashiqon ke groh terii nigaah ko allaah  dilniwaaz kare

Title: khushiyaan yahiin pe milengii hamen re
Lyrics: khushiyaan yahiin pe milengii hamen re apanaa hai apanaa ye des pardes  vahii puraane saare fasaane nayaa hai lekin jahaan raste vahii yah manzil naii hai nayaa hai lekin jahaan teraa na meraa apanaa hai apanaa ye des pardes  akelaa nahiin huun main 2 tere binaa sang mere terii yaad hai mil kar khilen phuul har rang ke bas yahii merii fariyaad hai  apna hey apna yeh des pardes

Title: ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin
Lyrics: ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat  jiine to detii nahiin jiine to detii nahiin jaan bhii letii nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat  diivaanon ke fasaane sune diivaanon ke fasaane sune logon ko fursat hii nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat  gam pii ke marataa koii gam pii ke marataa koii zahar kii zaruurat nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat  mere marane pe doston kabhii mere marane pe doston kabhii ashq giraanaa nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat  dastuur hai puraanaa dastuur hai puraanaa jiitejii hamadam kaam aate nahiin ai mohabbat yuun hii tuu badanaam nahiin ai mohabbat

Title: jay ganesh gananaath dayaanidhi  shrii raadhe govindaa man bhaj le
Lyrics: jaya ganesha gananaath dayaanidhi sakal vighan karo duur hamaare mama vandana swiikaar karo prabhu charana sharana ham aaye tumhaare jaya ganesha gananaath dayaanidhi  jaya nandalaalaa jaya gopaalaa jaya nandalaalaa jaya jaya  shrii raadhe govindaa mana bhajale hari kaa pyaaraa naam hai gopaalaa hari kaa pyaaraa naam hai nandalaalaa hari kaa pyaaraa naam hai shrii raadhe govindaa threedots   mor mukut sir garabana maalaa  kesar tilak lagaaye  2  2 vrindaavan kii punya galin men sabako naach nachaaye oh sabako naach nachaaye shrii raadhe govindaa threedots   jamunaa kinaare dhenu charaaven  maadhav madan muraarii  2  2 madhur muraliyaa jabhii bajaaye harale sudhabudh saarii oh harale sudhabudh saarii shrii raadhe govindaa threedots   giradhar naagar kahatii miiraa  suur ko shyaamal bhaayaa  2  2 tukaaraam aur naamadev ne vitthal vitthal gaayaa oh vitthal vitthal gaayaa shrii raadhe govindaa threedots   raadhaa shakti binaa na koii  shyaamal darshan paaven  2  2 aaraadhan kar raadhe raadhe kaanhaa bhaage aaven oh kaanhaa bhaage aaven shrii raadhe govindaa threedots

Title: piine kii ham ko aadat dukh men bhalii lagii hai
Lyrics: piine kii ham ko aadat dukh men bhalii lagii hai gam dil ko khaa rahaa hai mai gam ko khaa rahii hai  itane to  garm  aansuu hote  nahiin  kisii ke kyaa buund kuunedil kii aankhon se bah rahii hai  khilane ke din se pahale hansne ke din se pahale ai dil ki suukh jaae kahane ko vo kalii hai  aathon pahar vo hanste dinraat ham tadapate ik vo bhii zindagii hai ik ye bhii zindagii hai

Title: havaaon pe likh do havaaon ke naam
Lyrics: havaon pe likh do havaon ke naam  ham anajan paradesiyon ka salaam  havaon pe likh do threedots  shaakh par jab dhup ai haath chhune ke liye  2 chhanv chham se niche kudi hns ke boli aiye  ye bhole se chehare hain masum naam  havaon pe likh do threedots  chulabula ye pani apani raah bahana bhulakar  lete lete aina chamaka raha hai phul par  yahan subah se khela karati hai shaam  havaon pe likh do threedots

Title: raam kare kahiin nainaa na ulajhe
Lyrics: raam kare kahiin nainaa na ulajhe  in nainan kii riit burii hai in nainon ulajhaaye na sulajhe  shabefiraaq men yuun dil kaa daag jalataa hai makaane jaise charaag jalataa hai  chashmepuranam hai jigar jalataa hai kyaa qayaamat hai ke barasaat men ghar jalataa hai  qaraar chhiin liyaa beqaraar chhod gaye bahaar le gaye yaadebahaar chhod gaye  hamaare chashmehaziin ko na kuchh kayaal kiyaa vo umr bhar ke liye ashqabaar chhod gaye

Title: aane vaalaa pal jaane vaalaa hai
Lyrics: aane vaalaa pal jaane vaalaa hai ho sake to is men zindagii bitaa do pal jo ye jaane vaalaa hai  ek baar yuun milii  maasuum sii kalii   2 khilate hue kahaa  khush paash main chalii dekhaa to yahiin hain dhuundhaa to nahiin hain pal jo ye jaane vaalaa hain  o ho aane vaalaa pal jaane vaalaa hain ho sake to is men  zindagii bitaa do pal jo ye jaane vaalaa hain  ek baar vaqt se  lamahaa giraa kahiin   2 vahaan daastaan milii lamahaa kahiin nahiin thodaa saa hansaake thodaa saa rulaake pal ye bhii jaane vaalaa hain  o ho aane vaalaa pal jaane vaalaa hain ho sake to is men  zindagii bitaa do pal jo ye jaane vaalaa hain

Title: zaraa saamane to aao chhaliye
Lyrics: zaraa saamane to aao chhaliye chhup chhup chhalane men kya raz hai  yun chhup na sakega paramatma meri atma ki ye avaz hai  zara samane threedots   ham tumhen chahe tum nahin chaho aisa kabhi nahin ho sakata  pita apane balak se bichhud se sukh se kabhi nahin so sakata  hamen darane ki jag men kya bat hai jab hath men tihare meri laj hai  yun chhup na sakega paramatma meri atma ki ye avaz hai  zara samane threedots   prem ki hai ye ag sajan jo idhar uthe aur udhar lage  pyar ka hai ye qarar jiya ab idhar saje aur udhar saje  teri prit pe bada hamen naz hai mere sar ka tu hi sarataj hai  yun chhup na sakega paramatma meri atma ki ye avaz hai  zara samane threedots

Title: mere dukh kii koiii davaa na karo
Lyrics: mere dukh kii koiii davaa na karo mujhako mujhase abhii judaa na karo  naakudaa ko kudaa kahaa hai to phir duub jaao kudaa kudaa na karo  yah sikhaayaa hai dostii ne hamen dost banakar kabhii vafaa na karo  ishq hai ishq yah mazaak nahiin chand lamhon men faisalaa na karo  aashiqii ho yaa bandagii faakir bedilii se to ibtidaa na karo

Title: dekho main ne dekhaa hai yah ik sapanaa
Lyrics: a  dekho main ne dekhaa hai yah ik sapanaa     phuulon ke shahar men hai ghar apanaa     kyaa samaa hai tuu kahaan hai la main aaii aaii aaii aaii a  aa jaa la kitanaa hasiin hai yah ik sapanaa     phuulon ke shahar men hai ghar apanaa     kyaa samaa hai tuu kahaan hai a  main aayaa aayaa aayaa aayaa la aa jaa   a  yahaan teraa meraa naam likhaa la rastaa nahiin yah aam likhaa hai a  ho yah hai daravaazaa tuu jahaan khadii hai la andar aa jaao sardii badii hai a  yahaan se nazaaraa dekho parvaton kaa la jhaankuun main kahaan se kahaan hai jharokhaa a  yah yahaan hai tuu kahaan hai la main aaii aaii aaii threedots   la achchhaa yah bataao kahaan pe hai paanii a  baahar bah rahaa hai jharanaa diivaanii la bijalii nahiin hai yahii ik gam hai a  terii bindiyaa kyaa bijalii se kam hai la chhodo mat chhedo baazaar jaao a  jaataa huun jaauungaa pahale yahaan aao     shaam javaan hai tuu kahaan hai la main aaii aaiii aaii threedots   la kaisii pyaarii sii hai yah chhotii sii rasoii     ho ham donon  hain bas duujaa nahiin koii     is kamare men hongii miithii baaten a  us kamare men guzarengii raaten la yah to bolo hogii kahaan pe ladaaii a  main ne vah jagah hii nahiin banaaii     pyaar yahaan hai tuu kahaan hai la main aaii aaii aaii threedots

Title: jahaan teraa naqsheqadam dekhate hain
Lyrics: jahaan teraa naqsheqadam dekhate hain bayaavaan bayaavaan iram dekhate hain  tere sarvekaamat se ik kaddeaadam qayaamat ke fitne ko kam dekhate hain  tamaashaa kar ai mahaweaaiinaadaarii tujhe kis tamannaa se ham dekhate hain  suraagetafenaalaadaar dil se ki shabrau naqsheqadam dekhate hain  banaa kar faqiiron kaa ham bhes gaalib tamaashaaeahalekaram dekhate hain

Title: yuun to hamane laakh hasiin dekhe hain tumasaa nahiin dekhaa
Lyrics: yuun to hamane laakh hasiin dekhe hain tumasaa nahiin dekhaa ho tumasaa nahiin dekhaa 2  uf ye nazar uf ye adaa kaun na ab hogaa fidaa zulfen hain yaa badaliyaan aankhen hain yaa bijaliyaan jaane kis kisakii aaegii kazaa yuun to hamane laakh hasiin dekhe hain threedots  tum bhii hasiin rut bhii hasiin aaj ye dil bas men nahiin 2 raaste kaamosh hain dhadakane madahosh hain piye bin aaj hamen chadhaa hai nashaa yuun to hamane laakh hasiin dekhe hain threedots  tum na agar bologe sanam mar to nahiin jaaenge ham kyaa parii yaa huur ho itanii kyuun magaruur ho maan ke to dekho kabhii kisiikaa kahaa yuun to hamane laakh hasiin dekhe hain threedots

Title: tujhako pukaare meraa pyaar
Lyrics: aa jaa aa jaa aa jaa tujhako pukaare meraa pyaar aajaa main to mitaa huun terii chaah men tujhako pukaare meraa pyaar  dono jahaan kii bhent chadhaa dii maine raah men terii apane badan kii khaaq milaa dii maine aah men terii ab to chalii aa is paar aajaa main to mitaa huun threedots  itane yugon se itane dukhon ko koi sah naa sakegaa merii qasam mujhe tuu hai kisiikii koi kah naa sakegaa mujhase hai teraa iqaraar aajaa main to mitaa huun threedots  aakhirii pal hai aakhirii aanhen tujhe dhuundh rahii hain duubatii saansen bujhatii nigaahen tujhe dhuundh rahii hain saamane aajaa ek baar aajaa main to mitaa huun threedots

Title: apanii aazaadii ko ham haragiz mitaa sakate nahiin
Lyrics: apanii aazaadii ko ham haragiz mitaa sakate nahiin sar kataa sakate hain lekin sar jhukaa sakate nahiin  hamane sadiyon men ye aazaadii kii nemat paaii hai saikadon qurabaaniyaan dekar ye daulat paaii hai muskaraakar khaaii hain siinon pe apane goliyaan kitane viiraanon se guzare hain to jannat paaii hai kaak men ham apanii izzat ko milaa sakate nahiin  kyaa chalegii zulm kii ahale vafaa ke saamane jaa nahiin sakataa koii sholaa havaa ke saamane laakh faujen le ke aaii aman kaa dushman koii ruk nahiin sakataa hamaarii ekataa ke saamane ham vo patthar hain jise dushman hilaa sakate nahiin  vaqt kii aazaadii ke ham saath chalate jaaenge har qadam par zindagii kaa ruk badalate jaaenge gar vatan men bhii milegaa koi gaddaarevatan apanii taaqat se ham usakaa sar kuchalate jaaenge ek dhokhaa khaa chuke hain aur khaa sakate nahiin

Title: garache sau baar gamehijr se jaan guzarii hai
Lyrics: garache sau baar gamehijr se jaan guzarii hai phir bhii jo dil pe guzaranii thii kahaan guzarii hai  aap thahare hain to thaharaa hai nizaameaalam aap guzare hain to ik maujerawaan guzarii hai  hosh men aaye to batalaaye teraa diiwaanaa din guzaaraa hai kahaan raat kahaan guzarii hai

Title: aap aaye to kayaaledilenaashaad aayaa
Lyrics: aap aaye to kayaaledilenaashaad aayaa aap ne yaad dilaayaa to mujhe yaad aayaa  kyaa kahaa phir to kaho bhuul gaye ham kisako sadaqe usake jo tumhen bhuul ke bhii yaad aayaa  nazar aatii hain kaii aisii bhii qaatil shaqlen dekh kar jinakii taraf hamako kudaa yaad aayaa  kal shab men koii sau baar to bijalii chamakii raat dil ko koii sau baar tuu hii yaad aayaa

Title: samay tuu dhiire dhiire chal saarii duniyaa chhod ke piichhe
Lyrics: samay tuu dhiire dhiire chal saarii duniyaa chhod ke piichhe aage jaauun nikal main to aage jaauun nikal pal pal ho pal pal  ye rut aur ye pyaaraa samaa saaraa jiivan thahare yahaan pyaar ki raahon men khoi rahuun terii hii baahon men soi rahuun aaj kaa din meri mutthii men hai kisane dekhaa kal are kisane dekhaa kal pal pal threedots  ruk jaaen ghadiyaan tuk jaaen chhin raat kii rut men bandh jaaen din naa main main rahuun naa tum tum ik duuje men ho jaaen gum ban ke shamaa paravaanaa donon pyaar men jaaen jal ham to pyaar men jaaen jal pal pal threedots  chhotaa saa ho apanaa ghar naa kuchh fikr naa koi dar haradam aisaa vaqt rahe aankhon se naa aansuu bahe dharatii paravat hil sakate hain apanii priit atal dekho apanii priit atal pal pal threedots

Title: dil de kar dard liyaa main ne
Lyrics: dil de kar dard liyaa main ne main ne main ne tere naam kii kaatir sajanii apne ko badnaam kiyaa main ne dil de kar dard liyaa  terii hansii men hansii hai merii terii kushii men kushii hai merii yahii soch kar aansuu piyaa hai aansuu piyaa hai main ne dil de kar dard liyaa threedots  mere gagan par chamake the jo taare tere ghar ke diip bane deep bane hain saare apanii duniyaa ko lutaa ke mahafil ko terii basaa ke apanaa haal badal diyaa hai badal diyaa main ne dil de kar dard liyaa threedots

Title: tum sang laage piyaa more nainaa
Lyrics: tum sang laage piyaa more nainaa ik pal chain na aaye  paapii man morii baat na maane kaun ise aaye samajhaane machal machal rah jaaye tum sang laage   threedots  man men samaayii more shyaam suratiyaa kis dis bhuuluu main pii kii muuratiyaa baat samajh nahiin aaye tum sang laage   threedots

Title: mastii hai chhaaii
Lyrics: mastii hai chhaaii basantii pavan par bikharaa huaa hai sonaa gagan par bikharaa huaa hai duub rahaa hai kiranavaalaa baithii hai ik brij kii baalaa jamanaa kinaare haan jamanaa kinaare threedots  hrriday kaa aanchal patha pe bichhaae nainon men aashaa ke diip jalaae haathon men le kar phuulon kii maalaa baithii hai ik braj kii baalaa jamanaa kinaare haan jamanaa kinaare threedots  rah rah ke it ut dekh rahii hai man hii man kachhu soch rahii hai na jaane hai kaun aanevaalaa jamanaa kinaare haan jamanaa kinaare threedots  jaaduu se badakar hai isakaa shrringaar karegii ye saajan se jab aankhen chaar hogaa samaa ek vo bhii niraalaa baithii hai ek braj ki baalaa jamanaa kinaare haan jamanaa kinaare threedots

Title: kabhii aah lab pe machal gaii
Lyrics: kabhii aah lab pe machal gaii kabhii ashq aankh se dhal gaye wo tumhaare gam ke charaag hain kabhii bujh gaye kabhii jal gaye  main kayaalokaab kii mahafilen na bakadreshauq sajaa sakaa terii ik nigaah ke saath hii mere sab iraade badal gaye  kabhii rang men kabhii ruup men kabhii chhaanv men kabhii dhuup men kahiin aafataabenazar hain wo kahiin maahataab men dhal gaye  jo fanaa huye gameishq men unhen zindagii kaa na gam huaa jo na apanii aag men jal sake wo paraaii aag men jal gaye  thaa unhen bhii merii tarah junuun to phir unamen mujhamen ye farq kyuun main gariftegam se na bach sakaa wo huduudegam se nikal gaye

Title: saalaa main to saahab ban gayaa
Lyrics: kishor  saalaa main to saahab ban gayaa   are saalaa main to to saahab ban gayaa hain   re saahab banake kaisaa tan gayaa   ye buut meraa dekho ye suut meraa dekho   jaisaa goraa koii lanadhan kaa haa 		2  pankaj vaah fakiire vaah fakiire vaah fakiire suut pahanakar kaisaa kuude phaande kavva jaise pankh mayuur ke apanii dum men baandhe  kishor apanii dum men baandhe  kyaa jaano hum is bhejaa men kyaakyaa nakshaa khiinchaa 2 liidar log kii uunchii baaten kyaa samajhe tum niichaa haan kyaa samajhe tum niichaa meraa vo jaahilapan gayaa  saalaa main to threedots  pankaj suurat hai bandar kii phir bhii lagatii hai alabelii 2 kaisaa raajaa bhoj banaa hai meraa ganguu telii  kishor teraa ganguu telii  tum langotiivaalaa na badalaa main na badalegaa tum sab saalaa log kaa kismat ham saalaa badalegaa ham saalaa badalegaa haan ham saalaa badalegaa  haa threedots khaanstaa hai siinaa dekho kaisaa tan gayaa  haa haa haa threedots hansate hue saalaa main to threedots

Title: jay jay shiv shankar
Lyrics: jay jay shiv shankar kaantaa lage na kankar jo pyaalaa tere naam kaa piyaa o gir jaauungii main mar jaauungii jo tuune mujhe thaam na liyaa so rab dii  ek ke do do ke chaar hamako to dikhate hain aisaa hii hotaa hai jab do dil milate hain sar pe zamiin paanv ke niiche hai aasamaan ho so rab dii jay jay shiv shankar   threedots  kandhe pe sar rakh ke tum mujhako sone do mastii men jo chaahe ho jaaye hone do aise men tum ho gaye bade beiimaan ho so rab dii jay jay shiv shankar   threedots  raste men ham donon ghar kaise jaayenge ghar vaale ab hamako khud lene aayenge kuchh bhii ho lekin mazaa aa gayaa merii jaan ho so rab dii jay jay shiv shankar   threedots

Title: ashq aankhon se ravaan
Lyrics: ashq aankhon se ravaan aur jigar jalataa hai kyaa qayaamat hai ki barasaat men ghar jalataa hai  na kahiin aag na shole na dhuaan uthataa hai vaah kis dhang se ulafat kaa shahar jalataa hai kyaa qayaamat hai ki barasaat men ghar jalataa hai   aamadesubah se jo gul ho vo charaag nahiin dilemaasuum sanam shaamosahar jalataa hai kyaa qayaamat hai ki barasaat men ghar jalataa hai

Title: saathii tere naam ek din jiivan kar jaayenge partial
Lyrics: saathii tere naam ek din jiivan kar jaayenge jiivan kar jaayenge  tuu hai meraa khudaa tuu naa karanaa dagaa tum bin mar jaayenge tum bin mar jaayenge   khushabuon kii tarah tuu mahakatii rahe bulabulon kii tarah tuu chahakatii rahe dil ke har taar se aa rahii hai sadaa tuu salaamat rahe bas yahii hai duaa tuu hai meraa khudaa tuu naa karanaa dagaa tum bin mar jaayenge tum bin mar jaayenge

Title: zindagii kii raat men shammaa jalaane kii sazaa
Lyrics: zindagii kii raat men shammaa jalaane kii sazaa umar bhar ronaa hai ik pal muskuraane kii sazaa  saikadon nagame hain dil men phir bhii beaawaaz huun waqt ke haathon men main tuutaa huaa ik saaz huun ghut ke maranaa hai jahaan men gunagunaane kii sazaa  is jahaan men dostii aur pyaar jisakaa naam hai ek sapanon kaa saveraa ek gam kii shaam hai hamane paaii gair ko apanaa banaane kii sazaa

Title: dil se terii nigaah jigar tak utar gaii
Lyrics: dil se terii nigaah jigar tak utar gaii donon ko ik adaa men razaamand kar gaii  vo baadesabaa kii sarmastiyaan kahaan uthie bas ab ki lajjatekvaabesahar gaii  dekho to dil fareb ye andaazenaqshopaa maujekiraameyaar bhii kyaa gul qadar gaii  nazaare ne bhii kaam kiyaa vaan naqaab kaa mastii se har nigaah tere ruk par bikhar gaii  maaraa zamaane ne asadullaah kaak men vo valavale vo vo valavale kahaan vo javaanii kidhar gaii

Title: kabhii shaakhosabzaaobarg par
Lyrics: aan kabhii shaakosabzaaobarg par kabhii gunchaaogulo kaar par main chaman men chaahe jahaan rahuun meraa haq hai fasalebahaar par  main chaman men chaahe jahaan rahuun  mujhe de na gaib men dhamakiyaan giren laakh baar ye bijaliyaan merii sar tanak yahii aashiyaan merii milkiyat yahii pyaar par  merii sar tanak yehii aashiyaan  merii simt se use ai sabaa ye payaameaakiregam sunaa abhii dekhanaa ho to dekh jaa ke kizaan hai apanii bahaar par  abhii dekhanaa ho to dekh jaa  ye farebejalavaaesar basar mujhe dar hai ye dilebekabar kahiin jam na jaaye terii nazar inhiin chand naqshonigaar par  kabhii shaakhosabzaaobarg par   ajab inqalaabezamaanaa hai meraa muqtasar saa fasaanaa hai ye jo aaj baar hai dosh par yahii sar thaa zaanoeyaar par  kabhii shaakhosabzaaobarg par  main rahiinedadr sahii magar mujhe aur kyaa chaahiye jigar gameyaar hai meraa shefataa main farefataa gameyaar par  kabhii shaakhosabzaaobarg par

Title: goraa goraa mukhadaa ye tuune kahaan se paayaa
Lyrics: goraa goraa mukhadaa ye tuune kahaan se paayaa hai tuu hai gorii chor tuune chaand ko churaayaa hai 2  amaavas kii raat hai ye huii kaise roshanii nahiin hai gagan men chaand chhaaii kaise chaandanii huii kaise roshanii chhaaii kaise chaandanii 2 dhiire dhiire paradaa tuune chehare se hataayaa hai tuu hai gorii chor threedots  chale aae piine vaale maikhaanon ko chhod ke khade tere raste men paimaanon ko tod ke maikhaanon ko chhod ke paimaanon ko tod ke badii badii aankhon se ye tuune kyaa chhalakaayaa hai tuu hai gorii chor threedots

Title: aankh padatii hai kahiin paanv kahiin padataa hai
Lyrics: aankh padatii hai kahiin paanv kahiin padataa hai sabakii hai tumako kabar apanii kabar kuchh bhii nahiin  shamaa hai gul bhii hai bulabul bhii hai parawaanaa bhii raat kii raat ye sab kuchh hai sahar kuchh bhii nahiin  hashr kii dhuum hai sab kahate hain yuun hai yuun hai fitanaa hai ek terii thokar kaa magar kuchh bhii nahiin  rektii kii hai mujhse kuuchehastii men talaash pair karataa huun udhar kii ke jidhar kuchh bhii nahiin

Title: daaim padaa huaa tere dar par nahiin huun main
Lyrics: daaim padaa huaa tere dar par nahiin huun main kaaq aisii zindagii pe ki patthar nahiin huun main   kyon gadrishemudaam se ghabaraa na jaaye dil insaan huun pyaalaaosaagar nahiin huun main   yaa rab zamaanaa mujhako mitaataa hai kis liye lauhejahaan pe hafremuqarrar nahiin huun main   had chaahiye sazaa men aquubat ke vaaste aakhir gunaahgaar huun qaafir nahiin huun main   kis vaaste aziiz nahiin jaanate mujhe laalozamurradozarogauhar nahiin huun main   rakhate ho tum qadam merii aankhon se kyon direg rutabe men maharomaah se kamatar nahiin huun main  karate ho mujhako maneqadam baase kis liye kyaa aasamaan ke bhii baraabar nahiin huun main  gaalib vaziifaakvaar ho do shaah ko duaa vo din gaye ki kahate the naukar nahiin huun main

Title: pyaar kii mahafil terii sahii par viiraane sab mere hain
Lyrics: pyaar kii mahafil terii sahii par viiraane sab mere hain apanon ne thukaraayaa to kyaa begaane sab mere han  ghabaraa kar is duniyaa se koii ruuth gayaa to kyaa hogaa raah men chalatechalate raahii chhuut gayaa to kyaa hogaa palakon pe jo chamak rahe hain afasaane sab mere hain  mere naa hone par phir tum kisakii hansii udaaoge kisase pyaar jataaoge tum aur kisako thukaraaoge honthon pe jo mahak rahe hain nazaraane sab mere hain

Title: kitanaa duhkh bhulaayaa tumane
Lyrics: kitanaa duhkh bhuulaayaa tumane pyaare mere zakhmii dil pe rakhakar apanaa komal haath priitam kyon ghabaraaye ho bas chhed ke itanii baat sab dadr mitaayaa tumane pyaare   threedots  apanii balakhaaii zulfen siine se mere lagaake apanii gulaabii honthon ko mere honthon se milaake amrit ras pilaayaa tumane pyaare   threedots  ham tum chup baithe hain dil kahataa hai kisse dil ke churaa liyaa hai hosh hamaaraa chaar aankhon ne milake kismat ko jagaayaa tumane pyaare threedots

Title: gam kii andherii raat men
Lyrics: rafii gam kii andherii raat men  dil ko na beqaraar kar  subah zaruur aayegii  subah ka intazaar kar  gam kii andheri raat men   talat dard hai saarii zindagi  jisakaa koi silaa nahiin  dil ko fareb dijiye  aur ye hausalaa nahiin  2  rafii khud se to badagumaan na ho  khud pe to aitabaar kar  subah zaruur aayegii  subah ka intazaar kar  gam kii andheri raat men   talat khud hii tadap ke rah gaye  dil ki sadaa se kyaa milaa  aag se khelate rahe ham ko vafaa se kyaa milaa  2  rafii dil ki lagii bujhaa na de  dil ki lagii se pyaar kar  subah zaruur aayegii  subah ka intazaar kar   gam kii andheri raat men threedots

Title: sab din ek samaan nahiin thaa
Lyrics: sab din ek samaan nahiin thaa 2 ban jaauungaa kyaa se kyaa main 2 is kaa to kuchh dhyaan nahiin thaa sab din ek samaan nahiin thaa  us ne mujh ko thaa apanaayaa 2 banaa main us kii jiivan chhaayaa 2 meraa gulashan haraabharaa thaa 2 ujadaa yaa sunasaan nahiin thaa 2 sab din ek samaan threedots  us ke gale kaa haar kabhii thaa mujh se us ko pyaar kabhii thaa 2 basaa huaa sansaar hriday kaa 2 sab din to shamashaan nahiin thaa 2 sab din ek samaan threedots  kabhii giit jo hans kar gaayaa 2 ro kar us ko ab doharaayaa 2 main thaa swaamii sukh nagarii kaa 2 dukh kaa to mahamaan nahiin thaa 2 sab din ek samaan threedots

Title: sab ko maaluum hai main sharaabii nahiin  pankaj udhaas
Lyrics: sab ko maaluum hai main sharaabii nahiin phir bhii koi pilaae to main kyaa karuun sirf ek baar nazaron se nazaren milen aur qasam tuut jaae to main kyaa karuun  mujh ko main khush samajhataa hai sab badaa khush kyuun ke unakii tarah ladakhadaataa huun main merii rag rag men nashaa muhabbat kaa hai jo samajh men naa aae to main kyaa karuun  haal sun kar meraa sahamesahame hain vo koi aayaa hai zulfen bikhere hue maut aur zindagii donon hairaan hain dam nikalane na paae to main kyaa karuun  kaisii luut kaisii chaahat kahaan kii khataa bekhudii men haay anavar khiduu kaa nashaa zindagii ek nashe ke sivaa kuchh nahiin tum ko piinaa na aae to main kyaa karuun

Title: sainyaa pyaaraa hai apanaa milan
Lyrics: sainyaa pyaaraa hai apanaa milan	 2 duur tum the kahiin duur ham the kahiin paas aae jude ye nayan sainyaa pyaaraa hai apanaa milan  aaj kii raat tum yaad rakhanaa ho yaad rakhanaa main nashe men huun gam yaad rakhanaa ho yaad rakhanaa jab se tum ho mile taar dil ke hain khile paas mere shamii hai qafan   yah mulaakaat ye mel dekho mel dekho apanii kismat kaa ye khel dekho khel dekho baat hii baat men ek hii raat men ban gaii main tumhaarii dulhan  jo baat tumhen kah na paauun ho kah na paauun kaun ho tum mere kyaa bataauun ho kyaa bataauun itanaa jaano piiyaa meraa dhadake jiiyaa aaj bas men nahiin meraa man sainyaa pyaaraa hai apanaa milan

Title: mere ashkon kaa gam na kar ai dil
Lyrics: mere ashkon kaa gam na kar ai dil apanii barabaadiyon se dar ai dil  silsilaa  rok  biitii   baaton  kaa varanaa tadape gaa raat bhar ai dil  raah sunsaan hai andheraa  hai kaise tai hogaa ye safar ai dil  tiir barasaaen chaand kii kiranen raat  ke  nange  jism  par  ai  dil

Title: chaand chhupaa aur taare duube raat gazab kii aaii
Lyrics: chaand chhupaa aur taare duube raat gazab kii aaii husn chalaa hai ishq se milane zulm kii badalii chhaaii  tuut padii hai aandhii gam kii aaj pavan hai paagal kaanp rahii hai dharatii saarii chiikh rahe hain baadal duniyaa ke tuufaan hazaaron husn kii ik tanahaaii  maut kii naagan aaj khadii hai raah men phan phailaaye jangaljangal naach rahe hain shaitaanon ke saae aaj kudaa khaamosh hai jaise bhuul gayaa ho kudaaii  ghor andheraa mushkil raahen kadamkadam pe dhokhe aaj mohabbat ruk na sakegii chaahe kudaa bhii roke raahevafaa men piichhe hatanaa pyaar kii hai rusvaaii  paar nadii ke yaar kaa deraa aaj milan hai teraa odh le tuu leharon kii chunarii baandh le mauj kaa seharaa dole men manjhadhaar ke hogii aaj terii vidaaii  duub ke in uunchii leharon men naiyyaa paar lagaa le ulfat ke tuufaan men zindaa rahate hain marane vaale jiitejii sansaar men kisane pyaar kii manzil paayii  tere dil ke khuun se hogaa laal chenaab kaa paanii duniyaa kii taariikh men likhii jaayegii yeh qurbaanii sohanii aur mahivaal ne apanii ishq men jaan ganvaayii       hamaare pyaar ke kisse sunaaye jaayenge yeh giit saare zamaane men gaaye jaayenge ham na honge fasaana hogaa 2 aane vaale ko aanaa hogaa jaane vaale ko jaanaa hogaa

Title: chandaa dekhe chandaa to vo chandaa sharamaae
Lyrics: ki chandaa dekhe chandaa to vo chandaa sharmaae gorii gorii chandanii men gorii jab muskaae la jiyaa bole piyaa to ye jiyaa sharmaae gorii gorii chandanii men gorii jab muskaae  ki chaand se maathe pe bindiyaa jhilamilaae aise chaand suuraj raat men ek saath chamake aise jii kare ye umar yuuhiin dekhate kat jaae la jiyaa bole piyaathreedots  nain ban jaatii hai ghuunghat man dulhan kii aashaa baanchate hain jab nayan tere nayan kii bhaashhaa nain men chhup kar mere mujhako tuu mujhase churaae ki chandaa dekhe chandaathreedots  priit ke rang men rangaa hai teraa udataa aanchal la maine baandhaa hai isii men ek diivaanaa paagal ki aanchal kii chhaayaa men ye paagal jiye mar jaae la jiyaa bole piyaathreedots

Title: chupake chupake chal rii puravaiiyaa
Lyrics: chupake chupake chal rii puravaiyaa  o chupake chupake chal rii puravaiyaa  chupake chupake chal rii puravaiyaa   baansurii bajaaye re raas rachaae dayyaa re dayyaa  gopiyon sang kanhaiyaa  chupake   pagal pavan se kaise koi bole 2  gorii ke mukh se ghunghataa naa khole  dole haule se man kii naiyaa  gopiyon sang kanhaiyaa chupake threedots  ye kya hua mujhako kya hai ye pahelii 2  aise jaise ke koi raadhaa kii sahelii main bhi  dhundhuu kadam kii chhainyaa gopiyon sang kanhaiyaa  chupake threedots   aise samay pe koi chup bhi rahe kaise 2  baandh liye rut ne pag main ghungharuu jaise naache man taa thaiyya taa thaiyaa  gopiyon sang kanhaiyaa  chupake threedots

Title: jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa
Lyrics: jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa  vijayii vishva tirangaa pyaaraa 2 jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa  sadaa shaktii barasaane vaalaa prem sudhaa sarasaane vaalaa viiron ko harshhaane vaalaa maatri bhuumii kaa tan man saaraa 2 jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa threedots  svatantrataa ke bhiishan ran men rakh  kar josh badhe kshankshan men kaanpe shatru dekhakar man men mit jaaye bhay sankat saaraa 2 jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa threedots  is jhande ke niiche nirbhaya ho svaraaj janataa kaa nishchaya bolo bhaarat maataa kii jaya svatantrataa hii dhyeya hamaaraa 2 jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa threedots  aao pyaare viiron aao desh dhamr par balibali jaao ek saath sab mil kar gaao pyaaraa bhaarat desh hamaaraa jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa   threedots  shaan na isakii jaane paaye chaahe jaan bhale hii jaaye vishv vijayii kar ke dikhalaaen tab hoe pran puunr hamaaraa 2 jhandaa uunchaa rahe hamaaraa threedots

Title: ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii lata version
Lyrics: ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan chaandanii raaten pyaar kii baaten kho gayii jaane kahaan ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan  aatii hai sadaa terii tuute hue taaron se aahat terii sunatii huun khaamosh nazaaron se bhiigii havaa umadii ghataa kahatii hai terii kahaanii tere liye bechain hai sholon me lipatii javaanii siine me bal khaa rahaa hai dhuaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan  laharon ke labon par hain khoye hue afasaane gulazaar ummiidon ke sab kho gaye viiraane teraa pataa paauun kahaan suune hain saare thikaane jaane kahaan gum ho gaye jaake vo agale zamaane barabaad hai aarazuu kaa jahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan daastaan daastaan daastaan

Title: vaadaa rahaa sanam honnge judaa na ham abhijiit
Lyrics: vaadaa rahaa sanam honge judaa na ham chaahe na chaahe zamaanaa hamaarii chaahaton kaa  mit naa sakegaa fasaanaa  dil de diyaa hai tumhen pahalii nazar men tum kho gaye jo kabhii milake safar men  2 sitaaron ke thikaanon se phuulon ke aashiyaanon se main tumhen dhuundh laaungaa zamiin se aasamaanon se o jaane jaan hamaarii chaahaton kaa threedots  kitane hansii hain lamhe ye zindagii ke saanson men phuul mahake laakhon khushii ke  2 ye dil to akelaa thaa  tanhaaii kaa melaa thaa tum mujhe mil jaaogii  ye kabhii nahiin sochaa thaa o jaane jaan hamaarii chaahaton kaa threedots

Title: chingaarii koii bhadake to saavan use bujhaaye
Lyrics: aanand baabuu  ro mat pushpaa aaj tum jo ho jis jagah ho tumhaare aankh ke paanii  saline water i mean  namakiin paanii ke alaavaa kuchh nahiin hai isaliye inhen ponchh daalo pushpaa  i hate tears pushpaa  haan aanand baabuu aap thiik kahate hain  baithiye aanand baabuu  chhodo pushpaa chalo aaj kahiin baahar chalate hain dhuundhen koii aisii jagah jahaan thodii der ke liye hii sahii kuchh yaad na aaye na tumhen na mujhe  chingaarii koii bhadake  to saavan use bujhaaye saavan jo agan lagaaye  use kaun bujhaaye othreedots use kaun bujhaaye  patajhad jo baag ujaade  vo baag bahaar khilaaye jo baag bahaar men ujade  use kaun khilaaye othreedots use kaun khilaaye  hamase mat puuchho kaise  mandir tuutaa sapanon kaa  2 logon kii baat nahiin hai  ye kissaa hai apanon kaa koii dushman thes lagaaye  to miit jiyaa bahalaaye man miit jo ghaav lagaaye  use kaun mitaaye  na jaane kyaa ho jaataa  jaane ham kyaa kar jaate  2 piite hain to zindaa hain  na piite to mar jaate duniyaa jo pyaasaa rakhe  to madiraa pyaas bujhaaye madiraa jo pyaas lagaaye  use kaun bujhaaye othreedots use kaun bujhaaye  maanaa tuufaan ke aage  nahiin chalataa zor kisiikaa  2 maujon kaa doshh nahiin hai  ye doshh hai aur kisii kaa majadhaar men naiyaa dole  to maajhii paar lagaaye maajhii jo naav duboye  use kaun bachaaye othreedots use kaun bachaaye  chingaarii threedots

Title: apane pyaar ke sapane sach hue
Lyrics: lataa apane pyaar ke sapane sach hue honthon pe giiton ke phuul khil gae saarii duniyaan chhod ke man miit mil gae apane pyaar ke threedots  kishor apane pyaar ke sapane sach hue  lataa pal bhar ko mile jo ankhiyaan dekhuun main sunii hain jo batiyaan padh luun main tore nainon kii patiyaan  kishor binaa dekhe tum dekho merii aankhon se  lataa apane pyaar ke threedots  donon apane pyaar ke threedots  kishor kaanton se bharii thii jo galiyaan un men khilii hain ab kaliyaan jhuumo naacho manaao rangareliyaan  lataa chalo sajanaa kahen chalake saare logon se  kishor apane pyaar ke threedots  donon apane pyaar ke threedots  lataa ab jab mile jiivan o sajanaa tum hii mujhe pahanaao kanganaa  kishor terii dolii ruke mere anganaa  lataa meraa ghunghataa tum kholo apane haathon se  donon apane pyaar ke sapane sach hue honthon pe giiton ke phuul khil gae saarii duniyaa chhod ke man miit mil gae apane pyaar ke threedots

Title: totaa mainaa kii kahaanii to puraanii puraanii ho gaii
Lyrics: totaa mainaa kii kahaanii to puraanii puraanii ho gaii ab hai sabake labon par ye taazaa kabar ek ladakii diivaanii ho gaii tujhase milake zindagaanii haay kitanii suhaanii ho gaii milate hii nazar huaa aisaa asar main fakiire kii raanii ho gaii totaa mainaa kii kahaanii threedots  kahiin koi na thaa duur duur tak ham jisako hamaaraa kahate tuu na milataa agar suunii raah par piyaa ham besahaaraa rahate ai mere hamasafar chaahane vaalon par vaqt kii meharabaanii ho gaii totaa mainaa kii kahaanii threedots  tuu rang hai main huun kushabuu gul khilate hain apane milan se teraa mukhadaa hai saamane mere mujhe matalab nahiin hai chaman se ek apanii dagar ek apanaa nagar ek apanii kahaanii ho gaii totaa mainaa kii kahaanii threedots

Title: zindagii kii qasam ho chuke unake ham
Lyrics: zindagii kii qasam ho chuke unake ham yah zamaanaa diivaanaa jo chaahe kahe  pyaar karake nibhaanaa badii chiiz hai dil kii duniyaa bhii aakhir koii chiiz hai zindagii bhar na ham unase honge judaa dil kii raahon pe chalate rahenge sadaa jaise tuufaan kii maujon men saahil rahe  zor kisakaa chalaa hai bhalaa ishq par apanaaapanaa hai dil apaniiapanii nazar yah na hogaa ke ham unase munh mod len dor taqadiir kii baandhakar tod den aadamii vo jo vaade pe kaayam rahe

Title: jiine do aur jiyomaranaa to sabako hai jii ke bhii dekh le
Lyrics: jiine do aur jiyo chadhatii javaanii ke din hain phir aisaa samaan milegaa kahaan yahii zindagaanii ke din hain maranaa to sabako hai jii ke bhii dekh le chaahat kaa ek jaam pii ke bhii dekh le maranaa to sabako hai   threedots  ye havaa ye fizaa kahatii hai jhuum le mazaa le koii phuul chun koii kvaab bun dil kaa muqaddar jagaa le maranaa to sabako hai jii ke bhii dekh le chaahat kaa ek jaam pii ke bhii dekh le maranaa to sabako hai   threedots  ye hasiin zindagii hai ik rasiilaa taraanaa na le dil men gam o mere sanam ki hai ye khushii kaa zamaanaa maranaa to sabako hai jii ke bhii dekh le chaahat kaa ek jaam pii ke bhii dekh le maranaa to sabako hai   threedots

Title: hawaa chalii thii kuchh aisii bikhar gaye hote
Lyrics: hawaa chalii thii kuchh aisii bikhar gaye hote ragon men kuun na hotaa to mar gaye hote  ye sard hawaa ye aawaaragii ye niind kaa bojh ham apane shahar men hote to ghar gaye hote  hamiin ne rok liye apane sar pe ye ilzaam vagaranaa shahar men kis kis ke sar gaye hote  hamiin ne zakmedilojaan chhipaa liyaa waranaa na jaane kitanon ke chehare utar gaye hote  sukuunedil ko na is tarah tarasate ham tere karam se jo bach kar guzar gaye hote

Title: meraa dil bhii kitanaa paagal hai ye pyaar jo tum se karataa hai
Lyrics: meraa dil bhii kitanaa paagal hai  ye pyaar jo tum se karataa hai    2  par saamane jab tum aate ho  kuchh bhii kahane se darataa hai o mere saajan o mere saajan saajan saajan mere saajanthreedots  meraa dil bhii kitanaa paagal hai threedots  kitanaa isako samajhaataa huun  kitanaa isako bahalaataa huun 2 naadaan hai kuchh na samajhataa hai din raat ye aahen bharataa hai threedots  meraa dil bhii kitanaa paagal hai threedots  har pal mujhako tadapaataa hai  mujhe saarii raat jagaataa hai 2 is baat ki tumako khabar nahiin  ye sirf tumhii pe marataa hai  meraa dil bhii kitanaa paagal hai threedots

Title: jaan men merii jaan aaii thii
Lyrics: na udaa yuun thokaron se merii kaaqeqabr zaalim yahii ek rah gaii hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii ye jhukii jhukii nigaahen ye dabii dabii jawaanii teraa husn kar rahaa hai mere gam kii tarjumaanii  jaan men merii jaan aaii thii kal sabaa kisakii baas laaii thii  phir dahak utthii aag dil kii haay hamane ro ro abhii bujhaaii thii  kal baguulon se bhar gayaaa thaa dasht kisakii wahashat ne kaaq udaaii thii  puuchhiyo shama se ke kaise katii raat to mere sar pe aaii thii  dil ko rouun ke yaa jigar ko hasan apanii donon se aashanaaii thii

Title: aaj kii raat mere dil kii salaamii le le
Lyrics: ye raat jaise dulhan ban gai hai chiraagon se karungaa ujaalaa main dil ke daagon se  aaj kii raat mere dil kii salaamii le le dil kii salaamii le le kal terii bazm se diivaanaa chalaa jaaegaa shammaa rahe jaaegii paravaanaa chalaa jaaegaa  terii mahafil tere jalave hon mubaarak tujhako terii ulfat se nahiin aaj bhii inakaar mujhe teraa maykhaanaa salaamat rahe ai jaanevafaa muskuraakar tuu zaraa dekh le ik baar mujhe phir tere pyaar kaa mastaanaa chalaa jaaegaa  maine chaahaa ki bataa duun main haqiiqat apanii tuune lekin na meraa raazemuhabbat samajhaa merii ulajhan mere haalaat yahaan tak pahunche terii aankhon ne mere pyaar ko nafarat samajhaa ab terii raah se begaanaa chalaa jaaegaa  tuu meraa saath na de raahemuhabbat men sanam chalatechalate main kisii raah pe mud jaauungaa kahakashaan chaand sitaare tere chuumenge qadam tere raste kii main ek dhuul huun ud jaauungaa saath mere meraa afasaanaa chalaa jaaegaa

Lyrics: shaamefiraaq ab na puuchh aaii aur aa ke tal gaii dil thaa ke phir bahal gyaa jaan thii ke phir sambhal gaii  bazamekyaal men tere husn kii shamaa jal gaii dard kaa chaand bhuj gyaa hijr kii raat dhal gaii  jab tujhe yaad kar liyaa subah mahak mahak uthii jab teraa gam jagaa liyaa raat machal machal gaii  dil se to har muaamalaa kar ke chale the saaf ham kahane men unake saamane baat badal badal gaii  aakireshab ke hamsafar faiz na jaane kyaa hue rah gaii kis jagah sabaa subah kidhar nikal gaii

Lyrics: aa kaun bujhaave  kaun bujhaave ho raam  kaun bujhaave  kaun bujhaave raam he raamaa ho kaun bujhaave tapat more man kii ho raam tapat more man kii he raam tapat more man kii raam raamaa ho kaun bujhaave  he laagii laagii  laagii aag lagan kii haay raam laagii haay re laagii laagii aag lagan kii haay raam raamaa ho raam kaun bujhaave kaun bujhaave tapat more man kii raam tapat more man kii raamaa kaun bujhaave  priitam gayo bides sakhii kaho kaa se kahuun man kii batiyaan birahaa agan phuunkyo man moraa ab kaun kare shiital chhatiyaa raamaa kaun bujhaave  haay re bujhaave tapat more man kii raamaa ho raamaa ho kaun bujhaave kaun bujhaave ho raamaa kaun bujhaave

Title: o rangarejavaa rang de aisii chunariyaa
Lyrics: from uday udaypatelbtinternetcom date 20030209 052156 pst o rangarejavaa rang de aisii chunariyaa ke ranga naa phiikaa pade  pag pag pal laakhon hii thag the tan rangane kii dhun men sabase sab din bach nikalaa man par bach naa sakaa phaagun mem to jag men ye tan ye meraa man rah naa sakaa bairaagii korii korii chunarii morii ho gaii haay re daagii ab jiyaa dhadake is chunarii pe sabakii najariyaa gade  rang vo jis men rangii thii raadhaa rangii thii jis men miiraa usii rang men sab rang duube kah gae daas kabiiraa to niile piile laal saa badarangaa tuu naa mujhe dikhalaa re main samajhaa duun bhed tujhe ye tuu naa mujhe samajhaa re prem hai rang vo chadh jaae to rang naa duujaa chadhe

Title: ajii aisaa maukaa phir kahaan milegaa
Lyrics: ajii aisaa maukaa phir kahaan milegaa hamaare jaisaa dil kahaan milegaa aao tumako dikhalaataa huun pairis kii ek rangiin shaam dekho dekho dekho dekho dekho  dekho ye pariyon kii tolii miithii miithii jinakii bolii kyaa kyaa rang dil par jamaae jalavon kii ye aankh michaulii ajii aisaa maukaa threedots  haathon men haathon ko daale phirate hain aashiq niraale dhuundho yahaan tum bhii saathii mil jaaenge husn vaale ajii aisaa maukaa threedots  apane dil kaa daaman bhar lo mar jaaoge pyaar kar lo kal kaa sapanaa kis ne dekhaa in raahon se aaj guzar lo ajii aisaa maukaa threedots

Title: main saaz bajaauun
Lyrics: main saaz bajaauun tum gaao tum gaao taaron men main tumhe sunaa duun is dil kii jhankaar giiton men tum mujhase kah do chhuupii baat ek baar main tum ko kuchh samajhaauun tum mujhako kuchh samajhaao main saaz bajaauun threedots  mere sur men dard chhupaa ho ek jaaduu ho giit tumhaaraa ham tum dono mile jahaan jhuume vo dariyaa kaa kinaaraa merii dhun par maujen tadape tum giit se laharon ko sharmaao main saaz bajaauun threedots

Title: lagii mast nazar kii kataar
Lyrics: lagii mast nazar kii kataar dil ke utar gayii paar in pyaar kii raahon men dil bhii gayaa ham bhii gaye zakhmejigar hai bahaar  cheharaa chamakiilaa suuraj ho jaise pyaar kaa baahen laharaatii naqshaa hai ik talavaar kaa ham to lut gaye khushii se ham to lut gaye khaamosh nazaaron men pyaasii adaa jis pe fidaa ham to hue sau baar mast nazar kii kataar  aankhen matavaalii ulfat ke jaise raaste palaken alabelii chhaayaa hai mere vaaste ghuume zindagii nashe men jhuumen zindagii dilabar ke khayaalon men ham to magan gaate chale pyaar ke nagame hazaar mast nazar kii kataar  khushabuu zulfon kii aatii hai sard havaaon se khoyaa chaahat men ab guzaruun huun jis gaanv se yaaden gher len hamako yaaden gher len jangal kii fizaaon men vo jo nahiin phiikaa lage rang bharaa sansaar

Lyrics: jiivan kyaa hai chalataaphirataa ek khilonaa hai do aankhon men ek se hansanaa ek se ronaa hai  jo jii chaahe vo mil jaae kab aisaa hotaa hai har jiivan jiivan jiine kaa samajhotaa hai ab tak jo hotaa aayaa hai ho hii honaa hai jiivan kyaa hai threedots  raat andherii bhor suhaanii yahii zamaanaa hai har chaadar men dukh kaa taanaa sukha kaa baanaa hai aatii saans ko paanaa jaatii saans ko khonaa hai jiivan kyaa hai chalataaphirataa ek khilonaa hai do aankhon men ek se hansanaa ek se ronaa hai

Title: garaj baras pyaasii dharatii par phir paanii de maulaa
Lyrics: garaj baras pyaasii dharatii par phir paanii de maulaa  chidiyon ko daane bachchon ko guddhaanii de maulaa  garaj baras   threedots   do aur do kaa jod hameshaa chaar kahaan hotaa hai  sochsamajh vaalon ko thodii naadaanii de maulaa  chidiyon ko daane   threedots   tere hote koyii kisii kii jaan kaa dushman kyon ho  jiine vaalon ko marane kii aasaanii de maulaa  chidiyon ko daane   threedots   phir muurat ke baahar aakar chaaron or bikhar jaa  phir mandir ko koii miira diivaanii de maulaa  chidiyon ko daane   threedots   phir roshan kar zahar kaa pyaalaa chamakaa nayii saliiben  jhuuthon kii duniyaa men sach ko taabaanii de maulaa   garaj baras pyaasii dharatii par phir paanii de maulaa  chidiyon ko daane bachchon ko guddhaanii de maulaa  garaj baras   threedots
