Lyrics: aa naahin naa naahin kholuun haa haa ghuunghat pat saiyaan haan haan naahin naahin kholuun haan ghuunghat pat saiyaan haan naahin naahin kholuun ghuunghat pat o saiyaan ho naahin naahin kholuun haan ghuunghat pat saiyaan  kar joro chaahe binatii karo tum 2 ari chaahe chaahe paro morii paiyaan aan naahin naahin kholuun haan ghuunghat pat saiyaan ghuunghat pat saiyaan  aap to kiinhiin chit kii chorii haan haan ho karat mose barajorii are barajoriim kare barajo barajorii naazuk morii kalainyaan ho naahin kholuun haan ghuunghat pat saiyaan ghuunghat pat saiyaan saiyaan ghuunghat pat saiyaan saiyaan kholuun 3 ghuunghat pat saiyaan 2

Title: aa aa idhar aa phir maang phir maang qavvaalii
Lyrics: jo maanganaa hai musabbibesabab se maango minnat se kushaamat se adab se maango kyun gair ke aage haath phailaate ho bande ho agar rab ke to rab se maango  maayuus saayal ne jab ghar kii raah lii aankhon men aansuu the thii jholii kaalii itane men rahamat jhunjhalaake bolii maayuus jaataa hai kyun haath kaalii saayal idhar aa phir maang phir maang  kush hote hain ham terii sadaa se aa phir sadaa de dilkash adaa se ai bande mat ruuth apane kudaa se le haath phailaa phir maang phir maang aa aa idhar aa phir maang phir maang  paidaa siqandar ko kisane kiyaa thaa aadam ke haathon men kisane diyaa thaa tuu kyaa samajhakar vaapas chalaa thaa maayuus jaane ko kisane kahaa thaa aa aa idhar aa phir maang phir maang  ham apanii shaanerahamat dikhaaen sab aarzuen terii bar laaen tuu maangataa jaa ham dete jaaen  tuu chup na ho jaa phir maang phir maang	 2  ab ye sukuun hai ye beqaraarii zor aur zar se hehatar hai zaarii chhaaii hai tujhapar rahamat hamaarii har dam hamaare fazlokaram kaa jaarii hai dariyaa phir maang phir maang  tuu hai bhikaarii ham hain daataa le bhar le amjad kaasaa havas kaa ham bhii to dekhen hai zarf kitanaa le haath phailaa phir maang phir maang aa aa idhar aa phir maang phir maang

Title: baahar se koii andar na aa sake  ham tum ik kamare men
Lyrics: baahar se koii andar na aa sake andar se koii baahar na jaa sake socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho  ham tum ik kamare men band hon aur chaabhii kho jaaye tere nainon ke bhuul bhulaiyyaa men bacbii kho jaaye ham tum   threedots  aage ho ghanaghor andheraa      baabaa mujhe dar lagataa hai piichhe koii daakuu luteraa      un kyon daraa rahe ho aage ho ghanaghor andheraa piichhe koii daakuu luteraa upar bhii jaanaa ho mushakil niiche bhii aanaa ho mushakil socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho ham tum kahiin ko jaa rahe hon aur rastaa bhuul jaaye tere bainyyaa ke jhuule men sinyyyaa bacbii jhuul jaaye ham tum   threedots  bastii se duur parabat ke piichhe mastii men chuur ghane pedon ke niiche andekhii anjaanii sii jagah ho bas ek ham ho aur duujii havaa ho socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho ham tum ek jangal se guzare aur sher aa jaaye sher se kahuun tumako chod ke mujhe khaa jaaye ham tum   threedots  aise kyon khoye hue ho jaage ho ki soye hue ho kyaa hogaa kal kisako khabar hai thodaa saa mere dil men ye dar hai socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho socho kabhii aisaa ho to kyaa ho ham tum yuun hii hans khel rahe hon aur aankh bhar aaye tere sar kii qasam tere gam se bacbii mar jaaye ham tum   threedots

Title: dil men aur to kyaa rakhaa hai
Lyrics: dil men aur to kyaa rakhaa hai teraa dard chhupaa rakhaa hai  itane dukhon kii tez hawaa men dil kaa diip jalaa rakhaa hai  is nagarii ke kuchh logon ne dukh kaa naam dawaa rakhaa hai  vaadaaeyaar kii baat na chhedo ye dhokhaa bhii khaa rakhaa hai  bhuul bhii jaao biitii baaten in baaton men kyaa rakhaa hai  chup chup kyuun rahate ho naasir ye kyaa rog lagaa rakhaa hai

Title: tum bin aawe na chain
Lyrics: tum bin aawe na chain re sanwariyaa re  dekh na luun tohe jiyaa nahiin laage mohe suunii laage rain sanwariyaa  priitam priit lagaa ke duur des mat jaa baso hamaarii naagarii ham maange tuu khaa  kaagaa sab tan khaaiyo moraa chun chun khaaiyo maas re do nainaa mat khaaiyo mohe piyaa milan kii aas re

Title: jise paayaa wo saazezindagii ka ek sholaa thaa
Lyrics: jise paayaa wo saazezindagii ka ek sholaa thaa main tere shahar men ai dost pahalii baar aayaa thaa  main apane dil ke har kone men har zarre men jhaank aayaa yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin mere siwaa ab tak yahaan main kal bhii tanhaa thaa yahaan main ab bhii tanhaa huun wahii aansuu wahii aahen wahii dil kii ghutan ab tak wahii gam phir mujhe ab duur se aawaaz detaa hai jo mujhako ek din is shahar tak pahunchaane aayaa thaa  pahaadii waadiyon ke biich mere gaanv kii maatii mujhe parades ke gam se chhudaa letii to achchhaa thaa main ik chalataa huaa laashaa huun in anjaan galiyon men tuu is laashe ko siine se lagaa letii to achchhaa thaa

Title: chaand sitaare karate ishaare
Lyrics: chaand sitaare karate ishaare ham hain tumhaare tum ho hamaare  aao milaa len ham tum nigaahen tum hamen chaaho ham tumhen chaahen pyaar bharaa dil tumako pukaare ham hain tumhaare threedots  aankhon men mastii ye husn pyaaraa dekhaa hai jab se jalavaa tumhaaraa sharamaa rahen hain rangiin nazaare ham hain tumhaare threedots  yuun hii muskuraaye hamaarii vafaaen rah rah ke aaen lab par duaaen kabhii na judaa hon muhabbat ke maare ham hain tumhaare threedots

Title: husn jis rang men hotaa hai jahaan hotaa hai
Lyrics: husn jis rang men hotaa hai jahaan hotaa hai ahaledil ke lie sarmaayaaejaan hotaa hai  haay wo waqt ki jab husn pe aataa hai shabaab uf vo hangaam ke jab ishq jawaan hotaa hai  dil ko bedard muhabbat men bataane waale dil saa hamadard zamaane men kahaan hotaa hai  waqt aataa hai ik aisaa bhii muhabbat men ki jab dil pe ahasaasemuhabbat bhii giraan hotaa hai

Title: bekas pe karam kiijiye sarkaaremadiinaa
Lyrics: ai mere mushkilakushaa fariyaad hai fariyaad hai aapake hote hue duniyaa merii barabaad hai  bekas pe karam kiijiye sarkaaremadiinaa bekas pe karam kiijiye gardish men hai taqadiir bhanvar men hai safiina	2 bekas pe karam kiijiye sarkaaremadiinaa bekas pe karam kiijiye  hai vaqtemadad aaii bigadii ko banaane goshiidaa nahiin aapase kuchh dil ke fasaane zakmon se bharaa hai kisii majabuur kaa siinaa bekas pe karam kiijiye threedots  chhaaii hai musiibat kii ghataa gesuon vaale gesuon vaale lillaah merii duubatii kashtii ko bachaale tuufaan ke aasaar hain dushvaar hai jiinaa bekas pe karam kiijiye threedots  gardish men hai taqadiir bhanvar men hai safiina bekas pe karam kiijiye sarkaaremadiinaa bekas pe karam kiijiye

Title: tum bin jiivan kaisaa jiivan phuul khile to dil murajhaaye
Lyrics: tum bin jiivan kaisaa jiivan phuul khile to dil murajhaae aag lage jab barase saavan tum bin jiivanthreedots  ruuthe tum jabase piyaa ruuthe tum jabase suunaa saa hai man kaa dheraa bairii hai duniyaa baante koii kyuun dukh meraa apane aansuu apanaa hii daaman tum bin jiivanthreedots  kaise dil bahale hansanaa chaahuun ronaa aaye dhuundhaa jag saaraa  2 kuchh na suujhe kuchh na bhaaye tod gae tum man kaa darpan tum bin jiivanthreedots  kaise samajhaauun guzarii kyaa kyaa biitii kyaa kyaa puuchhe yah duniyaa  kisake haathon yah dil tuutaa haal huaa yah kisake kaaran tum bin jiivan threedots

Title: chiraag ban ke jaluungii
Lyrics: baabul ye ajnabii desh har taraf begaane hii begaane uf is kadar sannaataa hai main anaginat insaanon men ghir kar bhii kud to tanhaa mahasuus kar rahaa huun jahaan tak bhii nigaah jaatii hai sivaay anjaane cheharon ke aur kuchh dikhaaii nahiin detaa in cheharon kii nigaahon men ek ajiib wahashat hai ek tilamilaa denewaalii darindagii hai is maahual men meraa dam ghut jaataa agar tumhaaraa ye nagamaa mere zahan men na laharaataa hotaa  aashaa chiraag ban ke jaluungii tumhaarii raahon men 2 kizaan ko apane lahuu se bahaar kar duungii 2 mere jahaanemuhabbat ke devataa tujh par 2 kudaaii kyaa hai kudaa ko nisaar kar duungii 3  baa merii mahabuub agar aurat ek baar  muhabbat nibhaane kii pratiggyaa kar le to mard kii himmat pahaadon ke sar jhukaa detii hai isii liye tumhaaraa ye nagamaa mujhe jab bhii yaad aataa hai aasamaan se sitaare zamiin par utar kar mere iraadon ke qadam chuumane lagate hain  aa samajh samajh na samajh tuu vafaa ko main lekin vafaa ke naam pe jalatii chitaa men jii luungii kabhii bhulaa bhii diyaa tuune jo mujhe dilabar 2 labon pe aahen jalaa duungii ashk pii luungii 2 haay ashk pii luungii  baa jaanemuhabbat tumhaare is giit kii yaad mere dil ke viraane men phuul khilaa detii hai aur phir zindagii hasiin nazar aane lagatii hai  aa kunwaarii kaliyon sii maasuum chand ummiiden tere nazar ko main mahabuub leke aaii huun kunwaarii kaliyon sii tere jahaan men tere vaadaaemuhabbat par 2 main diinoduniyaa kaa balidaan deke aaii huun kunwaarii kaliyon sii maasuum chand ummiiden 2  baa merii zindagii kii kaaradaar raahon par jab pareshaaniyon kaa gurraa chhaa jaataa hai aur haddenazar tak sivaay andhere ke aur kuchh dikhaaii nahiin detaa mujhe apanii manzil ke diiye  jhagamagaate hue nazar aane lagate hain jab tumhaare ye madabhare bol mujhe yaad aate hain  aa vafaa kaa naam huun aurat huun vaqt padane par tere liye main kudii kii bhii aan de duungii kabhii jo farz kiyaa terii berukii dekhii main tere qadamon pe sar rakh ke jaan de duungii 2

Title: chaandanii ruup kii yaa kiran dhuup kii
Lyrics: chaandanii ruup kii yaa kiran dhuup kii suramaii sii ghataa yaa subah kii havaa khvaab jaisii lagii tujhako kaisii lagii vo merii dilarubaa dil mere tuu bataa  chaandanii ruup kii yaa kiran dhuup kii khushbuon kii lahar ke javaan gulamohar titaliyon kii tarah umr se bekhabar phuul banatii kalii kokilaa manachalii khvaab jaisii lagii threedots  chaandanii ruup kii yaa kiran dhuup kii ve maahiyaa ve chhad des na jaa  raaginii raag kii shokhiyaan faag kii miir kii tuu gazal nazm thii daag kii aasamaan kii parii yaa ke jaaduugarii khvaab jaisii lagii threedots

Title: un ko ye shikaayat hai ke ham kuchh nahiin kahate
Lyrics: un ko ye shikayat hai ke ham kuchh nahin kahate  2 apani to ye aadat hai ke ham kuchh nahin kahate  2  majabur bahaut karata hai ye dil to zubaan ko  2 kuchh aisi hi haalat hai ke ham kuchh nahin kahate  2  apani to ye aadat threedots  kahane ko bahaut kuchh tha agar kahanepe aate  2 duniya ki inaayat hai ke ham kuchh nahin kahate  2 apani to ye aadat threedots  kuchh kahanepe tufan utha leti hai duniya  2 ab isape qayamat hai ke ham kuchh nahin kahate  2  apani to ye aadat threedots

Title: aap ye soch ke milate hue ghabaraate hain
Lyrics: aap ye soch ke milate hue ghabaraate hain roz milane se muhabbat ke maze jaate hain haan ham yahii soch ke milate hue ghabaraate hain roz milane se threedots  ik nashaa hotaa hai ajii aisii mulaakaaton men ham na aaenge sanam aapakii in baaton men aapako hamape yakiin karanaa padegaa ik din ham jo kahate hain ye mausam bhii samajhaate hain ham yahii soch ke threedots  dil machalataa hai mile aapase par darate hain aapakii aisii adaa par hii ham to marate hain aap hamako zaraa aashiq mizaaj lagate hain in khyaalon se hii aate hue sharamaate hain ham yahii soch ke threedots  roz milane se muhabbat ke maze aate hain

Title: chakke men chakkaa chakke pe gaadii gaadii men nikalii
Lyrics: chakke men chakkaa chakke pe gaadii gaadii men nikalii apanii savaarii thodaa agaadii thodaa pichhaadii thodaa agaadii thodaa pichhaadii  1 chunnuu chhabiile munnuu hathiile makhamal kii topii chhotuu rangiile laaluu bataataa laalii tamaataa kam banenge gattuu gathiile  pet men inakii lambi si daadhii chakke men threedots  2 umar men kachche ye chhote bachche hain bhole bhaale hain siidhe sachche thaanenge jo bhii kar ke rahenge ye apanii dhun ke hain puure pakke koi naa samajhe inako anaadii chakke men threedots  3 lambaa safar hai tedhii dagar hai manzil hai mushkil girane kaa dar hai par naa rukenge chalate chalenge ye saarii duniyaa ab apanaa ghar hai haar na maanenge ye khilaadii chakke men threedots

Title: tere khayaalon men ham tere hii baahon men ham
Lyrics: tere khayaalon men ham tere hii baahon men ham 2 apane hain dono jahaan o jaanebekhudii yahaan tere khayaalon threedots  yuun roshanii bhor kii palakon men tere chhupii jab aankh kholegaa tuu putalii men honge hamiin ham hain kalaa kii jagah aankhon men tere ravan  tere khayaalon men ham tere hii baahon men ham madabhar chanchal ye shaam detii hai tujhako payaam patthar se kar shaayarii tujhako hamaaraa salaam tuu hai jahaan ham vahaan jhuume zamiin aasmaan  tere khayaalon men ham tere hii baahon men ham

Title: tere pyaar kaa aasaraa chaahataa huun vafaa kar rahaa huun
Lyrics: tere pyaar kaa aasaraa chaahataa huun vafaa kar rahaa huun vafaa chaahataa huun  hasiino se ahadevafaa chaahate ho bade naasamajh ho ye kyaa chaahate ho  1 tere narm baalon men taare sajaa ke tere shokh kadamon men kaliyaan bichhaa ke mohabbat kaa chhotaa saa mandir banaa ke tujhe raat din pujanaa chaahataa huun vafaa threedots  2 zaraa soch lo dil lagaane se pahale ki khonaa bhii padataa hai paane ke pahale ijaazat to le lo zamaane se pahale ki tum husn ko pujanaa chaahate ho bade threedots  3 kahaan tak jiyen terii ulfat ke maare guzaratii nahiin zindagii bin sahaare bahut ho chuke duur rahakar ishaare tujhe paas se dekhanaa chaahataa huun vafaa threedots  4 mohabbat kii dushman hai saarii khudaaii mohabbat kii taqadiir men hai judaaii jo sunate nahiin hain dilon kii duhaaii unhiin se mujhe maanganaa chaahate ho bade threedots  5 dupatte ke kone ko munh men dabaa ke zaraa dekh lo is taraf muskuraa ke mujhe lut lo mere nazadiik aa ke ki main maut se khelanaa chaahataa huun vafaa threedots  6 galat saare daaven galat saarii kasamen nibhengii yahaan kaise ulfat ki rasmen yahaan zindagii hai rivaazon ke bas men rivaazon ko tum todanaa chaahate ho bade threedots  7 rivaazon kii paravaah naa rasmon kaa dar hai terii aankh ke faisale pe nazar hai balaa se agar raastaa purkhatar hai main is haath ko thaamanaa chaahataa huun vafaa threedots

Title: maaluum hai mujh ko maaluum hai mujh ko
Lyrics: maaluum hai mujh ko maaluum hai mujh ko tum rakh nahiin sakatii ho tum rakh nahiin sakatii ho sadaa ham ko bhikaarii ban jaao gii tum ik din taqadiir hamaarii maaluum hai mujh ko maaluum hai mujh ko  jis dil men dard hai vahaan aaraam base gaa jin aankhon men aansuu hain vahaan sog hanse gaa phele gii mere ghar men ik chaandnii niyaarii ban jaao gii tum ik din taqadiir hamaarii maaluum hai mujh ko maaluum hai mujh ko  jis dil ko tum ne phaink diyaa dekh bhaal ke rakhkho gii ek din use tum hii sanbhaal ke haalat jo hamaarii hai badal jaae gii saarii ban jaao gii tum ik din taqadiir hamaarii maaluum hai mujh ko maaluum hai mujh ko

Title: hans le gaa le  kaisii ye jaagii agan  duur kahiin ek taaraa
Lyrics: year1952 hans le gaa le dhuum machaa le duniyaa faanii hai kah le dil kii baat sajan se raat suhaanii hai kaisii ye jaagii agan  duur kahiin ek taaraa karataa hai ye ishaaraa2 jiit hai aaj usii kii jis ne sab kuchh haaraa siine men tuufaan hai jalane kaa aramaan hai kaisii ye jaagii agan  hans le gaa le dhuum machaa le duniyaa faanii hai kah le dil kii baat sajan se raat suhaanii hai kaisii ye jaagii agan maariiyaa threedots  duur nagariiyaa terii rastaa hai anajaanaa 2 raah men milane waale raah men chhod na jaanaa siine men tuufaan hai jalane kaa aramaan hai kaisii ye jaagii agan  hans le gaa le dhuum machaa le duniyaa faanii hai kah le dil kii baat sajan se raat suhaanii hai kaisii ye jaagii agan maariiyaa threedots  tod ke naate saare chalii huun un ke dvaare ghar aangan se kahiyo ab naa mujhe pukaare siine men tuufaan hai jalane kaa aramaan hai kaisii ye jaagii agan lagii hai dil men lagan  siine men tuufaan hai jalane kaa aramaan hai kaisii ye jaagii agan hans le gaa le dhuum machaa le duniyaa faanii hai kah le dil kii baat sajan se raat suhaanii hai maariiyaa threedots

Title: raah pe rahate hain yaadon pe basar karate hain
Lyrics: raah pe rahate hain yadon pe basar karate hain  khush raho ahale vatan ho ham to saphar karate hain   jal gaye jo dhup men to saya ho gaye  2 asaman ka koi kona le thoda so gaye  jo guzar jati hai bas usape guzar karate hain  ho raah pe rahate hain yadon pe basar karate hain  khush raho ahale vatan ho ham to saphar karate hain   udate pairon ke tale jab bahati hain zamin  2 mudake hamane koi manzil dekhi hi nahin  raat din rahon pe ham shamo sahar karate hain  ho raah pe rahate hain yadon pe basar karate hain  khush raho ahale vatan ho ham to saphar karate hain   aise ujade ashiyan men tinake ud gaye  ho aise ujade ashiyan men tinake ud gaye  bastiyon tak aate aate raste mud gaye  ham thahar jayen jahan usako shahar kahate hain  ho raah pe rahate hain yadon pe basar karate hain  khush raho ahale vatan ho ham to saphar karate hain

Title: ai dilenaadaan ai dilenaadaan aarazuu kyaa hai
Lyrics: ai dilenadaan ai dilenadaan aarazuu kyaa hai justajuu kyaa hai   2 ai dilenadaanthreedots  ham bhatakate hain kyon bhatakate hain dashtoseharaa men aisaa lagataa hai mauj pyaasii hai apane dariyaa men kaisii ulajhan hai kyon ye ulajhan hai ek saayaa saa rubaruu kyaa hai ai dilenadaan ai dilenadaan aarazuu kyaa hai justajuu kyaa hai  kyaa qayaamat hai kyaa musiibat hai kah nahiin sakate kisakaa aramaan hai zindagii jaise khoyiikhoyii hai hairaan hairaan hai ye zamiin chup hai aasamaan chup hai phir ye dhadakan sii chaar su kyaa hai ai dilenadaan ai dilenadaan  aisii raahon men kitane kaante hain arazuuon ne arazuuon ne har kisii dil ko dard baante hain kitane ghaayal hain kitane bismil hain is khudaaii men ek tuu kyaa hai ek tuu kyaa hai ek tuu kyaa hai ai dilenadaan ai dilenadaan

Title: o zindagii ke dene vaale zindagii ke lene vaale
Lyrics: o zindagii ke dene vaale zindagii ke lene vaale  2 priit merii chhin ke bataa tujhe kyaa milaa  zindagii ke dene vaale zindagii ke lene vaale prit merii chhiin ke bataa tujhe kyaa milaa   kahaa kare diip jab bujh gai baatii bichhad gayaa meraa saathii tune todii merii viinaa deke saharaa chhiinaa laaj tujhe kyun na aatii chain meraa lut ke bataa tujhe kyaa milaa  othreedots zindagii ke dene vaalethreedots  maine kab tode bhalaa chaand sitaare tere phir kyon bujhaae tune dil ke ujaale mere   2 mujhe merii jaan dede priit ko ye daan dede khoe hue mere praan dede dil meraa tod ke bataa tujhe kyaa milaa  othreedots zindagii ke dene vaalethreedots

Title: hansake bolaa karo bulaayaa karo jagjit gazal
Lyrics: hans ke bolaa karo bulaayaa karo aapakaa ghar hai aayaa jaayaa karo  muskuraahat hai husn kaa zevar muskuraanaa na bhuul jaayaa karo  aapakaa threedots  had se badhakar hasin lagate ho jhuthii kasamen zarur khaayaa karo  aapakaa threedots

Title: ai shaam kii hawaaon unase payaam kahanaa
Lyrics: ai shaam kii hawaaon unase payaam kahanaa meraa salaam kahanaa  kahanaa ke dil kisii kaa bhuula nahiin wo baaten chhup chhup ke tumase milanaa taaron bharii haan taaron bharii vo raaten rukataa nahiin hai ab to in aansuuon kaa bahanaa ai shaam ki havaaon threedots  tum jab se chhuut gayii ho dil apanaa ro rahaa hai ashqon me jaise koii dil ko dubo rahaa hai kyaa umr bhar chalegaa furqat me gam hii sahanaa ai shaam ki havaaon threedots  ik roz mere gam me tum beqaraar hoge tum  beqaraar hoge beikatiyaar hoge laayegaa rang ek din meraa udaas rahanaa ai shaam ki havaaon threedots

Title: o nadiyaa chale chale re dhaaraa
Lyrics: ohoho threedots chorus  2 o nadiyaa chale chale re dhaaraa ohohoh threedots chorus o nadiyaa chale chale re dhaaraa  chandaa chale chale re taaraa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa chorus  ohoho threedots chorus  2   jivan kahiin bhii thaharataa nahiin hai   2 aandhii se tuphan se darataa nahiin hai  tuu na chalegaa to chal dengii raahen  hai re hai re hai re hai re chorus  o threedots tuu na chalegaa to chal dengi raahen  manzil ko tarasengii teri nigaahen  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa chorus  o nadiyaa chale chale re dhaaraa  chandaa chale chale re taraa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa chorus  o threedots up and down threedotsthreedots chorus  8   paar hua vo rahaa vo safar men  o threedots paar hua vo rahaa vo safar men  jo bhi ruka phir gayaa vo bhanvar men  naav to kya baha jaye kinaaraa o threedots naav to kya baha jaye kinaaraa  badii hii tez samay kii hai dhaaraa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa chorus  ohthreedots nadiyaa chale chale re dhaaraa  chandaa chale chale re taaraa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa  tujhako chalanaa hogaa tujhako chalanaa hogaa chorus  ohohoh threedotschorus  4 with manna ohing  in the background

Title: haath aayaa hai jab se teraa haath men
Lyrics: aashaa   haath aayaa hai jabase teraa haath men           aa gayaa hai nayaa rang jazabaat men           main kahaan huun mujhe ye khabar hii nahiin           tere kadamon pe hii gir na jaauun kahiin           haath aayaa hai threedots               dil men nazaron se chhupchhupake aayaa hai tuu           dil churaakar meraa muskuraayaa hai tuu           tuu kahe to threedots           tuu kahe to ek baat tujhase kahuun            meraa saathii nahin balakii saayaa hai tuu	 2               ungaliyaan jab zamaane kii mujhapar uthen           kho na jaanaa kahiin aise haalaat men            roshanii zindagii men mohabbat se hai           varanaa rakhaa hai kyaa chaandanii raat men           haath aayaa hai threedots   mahendra dil ke jazabaat ko main na thukaraauungaa            balakii tasaviirejazabaat ban jaauungaa           haq mohabbat kaa threedots           haq mohabbat kaa hotaa hai kaise adaa           vaqt aayaa to main ye bhii dikhalaauungaa 	 2     aashaa   pyaar ke devataa ke kadam chuumakar            zindagii nazar kar duungii saugaat men           ab na ghabaraao manzil kii duurii se tum           tum akele nahiin main bhii huun saath men           haath aayaa hai threedots

Title: dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii  tuu bhii aajaa ke aa gaii rut mastaanii
Lyrics: rafii tuu bhii aajaa ke aa gaii rut mastaanii         o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii   2         merii galii aa terii maharabaanii    lataa o threedots         tere bin suuniisuunii hai shaam suhaanii         o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii         merii galii aa terii maharabaanii    rafii kahanii hain sunanii hain kitanii hii baaten  2         thodese din hain ye thodiisii raaten         ho threedots aisaa naa ho threedots         ke aisaa naa ho gujar jaae yuunhii javaanii         o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii         merii galii aa terii maharabaanii  lataa tere bin suuniisuunii hai shaam suhaanii         o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii         merii galii aa terii maharabaanii    lataa laajsaram se main to mariimarii jaauun  2         raah chalat main to dariidarii jaauun         o threedots aisaa laage threedots         aisaa laage main ho gaii premdivaanii         o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii         merii galii aa terii maharabaanii  rafii ho tuu bhii aajaa ke aa gaii rut mastaanii   donon o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii          merii galii aa terii maharabaanii   lataa   tuu bhii aajaa ke aa gaii rut mastaanii  o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii   2  merii galii aa terii maharabaanii    rog judaaii kaa kyun jii ko lagaayaa  aane kaa vaadaa kiyaa kaahe na aayaa  ho chaaii banake badariiyaa preet puranii   o dhol sajanaa dhol jaanii   2  merii galii aa terii maharabaanii

Title: tumhare dayaa kii hai aas muhammad
Lyrics: tumhare dayaa kii hai aas muhammad paatii huun tumhen nahiin paas muhammad  shiishh bhare huye paap kii gatharii aayaa huun tumhare paas muhammad tum ho jagat ke taaranahaare main huun tumhaaraa daas muhammad  niind kaa ghuunghat mukh se hataake pahunche ahad ke paas muhammad hind se apane paas bulaa lo baithaa hai saaqii udaas muhammad

Title: mainne sochaa thaa agar maut se pahale pahale
Lyrics: mainne sochaa thaa agar maut se pahale pahale mainne sochaa thaa agar duniyaa ke viiraanon men mainne sochaa thaa agar hastii ke shamashaanon men kisii insaan ko bas ek bhii insaan kii gar sachchii belaag muhabbat kahiin ho jaae nasiib wahii saahil jo bahut duur nazar aataa hai kud bakud khinchataa chalaa aataa hai kashtii ke qariib mainne sochaa thaa yuun hii dil ke kanwal khilate hain mainne sochaa thaa yuun hii sabrosukuun milate hain mainne sochaa thaa yuun hii zakhmejigar silate hain   lekin sochane hii se muraaden to nahiin mil jaatii aisaa hotaa to har ek dil ki tamannaa khilatii koshishen laakh sahii baat nahiin banatii hai aisaa hotaa to har ek raahii ko manzil milatii mainne sochaa thaa ke insaan kii qismat aksar tuut jaatii hai bikharatii hai sanbhal jaatii hai apsaraa chaand kii badalii se nikal jaatii hai par mere waqt kii gardish kaa to kuchh ant nahiin kushk dharatii bhii to majhadhaar banii jaatii hai kyaa muqaddar se shikaayat kyaa zamaane se gilaa kud merii saans hii talawaar banii jaatii hai  haae phir bhii sochataa huun raat kii syaahii men taaron ke diiye jalate hain kuun jab rotaa hai dil giit tabhii dhalate hain jinako jiinaa hai wo marane se nahiin darate hain isaliye meraa pyaalaa hai jo kaalii to ye kaalii hii sahii mujhako honthon se lagaane do yuun hii piine do zindagii merii har ek mod pe naakaam sahii phir bhii ummiidon ko pal bhar ke liye jiine do2

Title: kaahe banaao jhuuthii batiyaan hamase
Lyrics: kaahe banaao jhuuthii batiyaan hamase main to jiitii huun tore dam se  sautan kii galiyaan tum ho aaye akhiyaan torii bhed bataaye main to mar gaii tore gam se  hamase saiyaan duur na jaao is birahan ko yuun na sataao hamaraa naataa janam janam se  huzuur jaaiye gairon ke mehamaan rahiye mizaaj chaahe jahaan aapakaa wahaan rahiye

Title: dilabar dil se pyaare dilabar dil kii sunataa jaa re
Lyrics: dilbar haan dilbar	3  dilbar dil se pyaare dilbar dil kii sunataa jaa re saarii duniyaa haarii hamase ham tujhape dil haare dilbar dil se pyaare threedots  gaharii nahin vaale lahariilaharii nainon vaale gaharii nahin vaale nainon vaale  lahariilaharii nainon vaale nainon vaale	2 dilabar dil se pyaare threedots  are haan haan yak yak din ginatii rahuun sadaa jabase main tujhape tujhape fidaa o sunataa hai re babuaa tuu hii meraa na huaa nahiin jag men kyaa nahiin hotaa ye he dilabar dil se pyaare threedots  o taktak rahuun chunarii bhariibharii o dikhalaauun bainyaan bhariibharii o mohe chhuu le sajanaa sajanaa gussaa hai kyon itanaa jo mar rahii usako kyon maare dilabar dil se pyaare threedots  o nasnas merii sulage aise piiyaa sadaasadaa o jalii banake lakadii jaise piiyaa o kyon sulagaae mujhako mujhako merii lag jaae tujhako tujhako rahe tuu bhii jalataa bujhataa re dilabar dil se pyaare threedots

Title: tuu hamako dekh aur hamaarii nazar se dekh
Lyrics: tuu hamako dekh aur hamaarii nazar se dekh  adaa se pyaar se pyaarii nazar se dekh  rangat gulon se chaand se ujalii sii chaandanii bulabul ke taraane liye koyal sii raaganii rangat gulon se chaand se ujalii sii chaandanii tab husnedil fareb kiye threedots tuu hamako dekh threedots  ham voh nahiin ki hona asar jinakii chaah men yah yaad rukh ke tuu hai hamaarii nigaah men ham voh nahiin ho na asar jinakii chaah men lekin hai ek farq mohabbat kii raah men tuu hamako dekh threedots  phuulon se khelanaa hai bahaaron se aake mil milane kii baat hai zaraa muskuraake mil phuulon se khelanaa hai bahaaron se aake mil aaiye hoshdaar hosh kaa paradaa uthaake mil tuu hamako dekh threedots

Title: chal diyaa kaaravaan lut gae ham yahaan tum vahaan
Lyrics: chal diyaa kaaravaan lut gae ham yahaan tum vahaan gir padi bijaliyaan jal gayaa aashiyaan uth rahaa hai dhuaan chal diyaa kaaravaan threedots  o jaane vaale thahar zaraa fariyaad hamaarii sunataa jaa daaman pe likhii hai ashkon ne ruudaad hamaarii sunataa jaa jii sakenge na ham tumase hoke judaa jaa meri zindagii teraa haafiza kudaa teraa mahamil chalaa asaraedil chalaa rah gaii daasataan  chal diyaa kaaravaan lut gae ham yahaan tum vahaan chal diyaa kaaravaan threedots

Title: are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab ghuunghat to zaraa odho
Lyrics: kishor are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab ghuunghat to zaraa odho ahaa maano kahaa ab tum ho javaan merii jaan ladakapan chhodo aashaa jab merii chunariyaa malamal kii phir kyon na phiruun jhalakiijhalakii kishor are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab threedots  aashaa koi jo mujhako haath lagaaegaa  haath na usake aauungii  mai tere man kii laal parii huun re  man men tere ud jaauungii     2 kishor tum parii to zaruur ho  par badii mashahuur ho aashaa jab merii chunariyaa malamal kii threedots kishor are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab threedots  aashaa dekhake tarase laakh ye bhanvare  aur inhen tarasaauungii  terii galii kii ek kalii huun  tere gale lag jaauungii      2 kishor tum kalii to zaruur ho  par badii mashahuur ho aashaa jab merii chunariyaa malamal kii threedots kishor are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab threedots  aashaa daalake ghunghataa ruup ko apane  aur nahiin main chhupaauungii sundarii banake terii balamavaa  aaj to main laharaauungii     2 kishor sundarii to zaruur ho  par badii mashahuur ho aashaa jab merii chunariyaa malamal kii threedots kishor are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab threedots aashaa jab merii chunariyaa malamal kii threedots kishor  whispers  are yaar merii tum bhii ho gazab threedots

Title: gorii kaa saajan saajan kii gorii
Lyrics: gorii kaa saajan saajan kii gorii lo jii shuruu ho gayii lavh storii vo jaa rahii hai merii hiroinh hiiro kaa dil kar ke chorii  maakaa naakaa go roko na mujhe toko na mujhe chhuo na mujhe chhedo na mujhe mat kar mere sang joraajorii  he gorii kaa saajan saajan kii gorii   threedots  apanii is lav storii men koii vilan na aa jaaye apanii prem tapasyaa men koii vighn na aa jaaye dil kii patangen nayanon kii dorii lo jii shuruu ho gayii lav storii taaraa ram pam pam vo jaa rahii hai merii hiroinh   threedots  yaad karo to filmon men kyaa kyaa siin dikhaate hain kyaa kyaa siin dikhaate hain let ke baaten karate hain daud ke gaanaa gaate hain main piichhe bhaagaa tuu aage daudii lo jii shuruu ho gayii lav storii taaraa ram pam pam vo jaa rahii hai merii hiroinh   threedots  he gorii kaa saajan hehe saajan kii gorii hehe lo jii shuruu ho gayii lav storii taaraa ram pam pam vo jaa rahe hain hiirohiroinh ek duuje kaa dil karake chorii

Title: aansuu bharii hain ye jiivan kii raahen
Lyrics: aansuu bharii hain ye jiivan kii raahen koii unase kah de hamen bhuul jaaen aansuu threedots  vaade bhulaa den qasam tod den vo  2 haalat pe apanii hamen chhod den vo unhen ghar mubaarak hamen apanii aanhen koii unase kah de threedots  barabaadiyon kii ajab daastaan huun  2 shabanam bhii roe main vo paasabaan huun aise jahaan se kyuun ham dil lagaaen koii unase kah de threedots aansuu threedots

Title: khelaa khel muhabbat kaa aur dil kii baazii haar chale
Lyrics: khelaa khel muhabbat kaa aur dil kii baazii haar chale haay haar chale  khelaa khel muhabbat kaa aur dil kii baazii haar chale  o sansaar banaane waale haay o sansaar banaane waale chhod teraa sansaar chale haay haar chale  khelaa khel muhabbat kaa aur dil kii baazii haar chale haay haar chale  aramaan lekar aaye the ab aansuu le kar jaate hain haay jaate hain  aramaan lekar aaye the ab aansuu le kar jaate hain tumane jo dil tod diyaa ham tod aas ke taar chale haay haar chale  khelaa khel muhabbat kaa aur dil kii baazii haar chale haay haar chale  uthe terii mahafil se haay uthe terii mahafil se to dil men ek tuufaan uthaa  uthe terii mahafil se to dil men ek tuufaan uthaa

Title: ham tum honge baadal hogaa
Lyrics: ham tum honge baadal hogaa raqs men saaraa jangal hogaa  vasl kii shab aur itanii kaalii un aankhon kaa kaajal hogaa  kisane kiyaa mahmez havaa ko shaayad unakaa aanchal hogaa  kyaa milanaa faaruuq se logon hogaa koii paagal hogaa

Title: shaam rangiin huii hai tere aanchal kii tarah
Lyrics: su shaam rangiin huii hai tere aanchal kii tarah     surmaii rang sajaa hai tere kaajal kii tarah u  paas ho tum mere dil ke mere aanchal kii tarah     merii aankhon men base ho mere kaajal kii tarah  u  merii hastii pe kabhii yuun koii chhaayaa hii na thaa su tere nazdiik main pahale kabhii aayaa hii na thaa u  main huun dharatii kii tarah tum kisii baadal kii tarah su surmaii rang sajaa hai tere kaajal kii tarah  u  aasmaan hai mere armaanon ke darpan jaise su dil yuun dhadake ki lage baj uthe kangan jaise u  mast hain aaj havaaen kisii paayal ki tarah su surmaii rang sajaa hai tere kaajal kii tarah  u  aisii rangiin mulaaqaat kaa matalab kyaa hai su in chhalakate hue jazbaat kaa matalab kyaa hai u  aaj har dard bhulaa do kisii paagal kii tarah surmaii rang sajaa hai tere kaajal kii tarah

Title: unase nain milaa kar dekho
Lyrics: unase nain milaa kar dekho ye dhokhaa bhii khaa kar dekho  duurii men kyaa bhed chhipaa hai isakii khoj lagaa kar dekho  kisii akelii shaam kii chup men giit puraane gaa kar dekho  aaj kii raat bahut kaalii hai soch ke diip jalaakar dekho  jaag jaag kar umr katii hai niind ke dwaar hilaa kar dekho

Title: tum ko bhii to aisaa hii kuchh hotaa hogaa o sajanaa
Lyrics: la 	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga o sajana  ki	kaisa kaisa la  	teri yaad sataati hai niind nahin aati hai raaton men  2 ki	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga o sajani la     kaisa aa aa threedots ki	tera pyaar sataata hai chain nahiin aata hai raaton men  2 dono	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga threedots  ki	meri haalat jaisi hai tera haal bhi aisa hai  2 	halka halka sa jiya men jaane dard ye kaisa hai threedots 	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga o sajani la  	kaisa kaisa ki	taare ginata main rahata huun jaagata rahata huun raaton men  2  la  	in bhiigi fizaaon se in thandi havaaon se  2 	aag si lagati hai jiya men saavan kii ghataaon se threedots 	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga o sajana ki	kaisa la 	intazaar tera karati huun aahen main bharati huun raaton men  2  ki	ye mast nazar teri mere hosh udati hai  2 la 	ye teri masti mujhe bhi madahosh banati hai threedots 	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga o sajana ki	kaisa la  	roz kvab men tuu aata hai dil dhadakaata hai raaton men  2  dono	tum ko bhi to aisa hi kuchh hota hoga threedots

Title: kabhii na kabhii kahiin na kahiin koii na koii to aayegaa
Lyrics: kabhii na kabhii kahiin na kahiin koii na koii to aayegaa apanaa mujhe banaayegaa dil men mujhe basaayegaa  kab se tanhaa dhuundh raahaa huun duniyaan ke viiraane men khaalii jaam liye baithaa huun kab se is maikhaane men koii to hogaa meraa saaqii koii to pyaas bujhaayegaa kabhii na kabhii threedots  kisii ne meraa dil na dekhaa na dil kaa paigaam sunaa mujhako bas aavaaraa samajhaa jis ne meraa naam sunaa ab tak to sab ne thukaraayaa koii to paas bithaayegaa kabhii na kabhii threedots  kabhii to degaa sannaate men pyaar bharii aavaaz koii kaun ye jaane kab mil jaaye raste men hamraaz koii mere dil kaa dard samajh kar do aansu to bahaayegaa kabhii na kabhii threedots

Title: man mandir kaa tuu ujiyaaraa
Lyrics: man mandir kaa tuu ujiyaaraa naam teraa hii laage pyaaraa  jii chaahe tere charanon men arpan kar duun jiivan saaraa  palpal tere hii gun gaae 2 mere saanson kaa ikataaraa 2  tujh bin meraa jiivan kyaa hai tuu saagar main terii dhaaraa  man mandir kaa tuu ujiyaaraa naam teraa hii laage pyaaraa

Title: kaare kaare badaraa suunii suunii ratiyaa
Lyrics: kaare kaare badaraa suunii suunii ratiyaa o sajanaa bijurii jo chamake dhadak jaae chhatiyaa  main akelii piaa lalache moraa jiaa aise men tuu na jaa  ang lag jaa baalamaa haay more ang lag jaa baalamaa main akelii piaa threedots  aaj havaaen moh se kar charaa chorii  ud jaanaa chaahe 2 leke saarii ko morii in havaaon se bachaa baalamaa  o more ang lag jaathreedots main akeliithreedots  pagalaa ye man moraa mas men na aae haath chhudaa ke paapii 2 jahaantahaan jaae use tuu hii samajhaa baalamaa  o more ang lag jaa threedots main akelii threedots

Title: koii din gar zindaganii aur hai
Lyrics: koii din gar zindagaanii aur hai  apane jii men hamane thaanii aur hai   aatishedozakh men ye garmii kahaan  sozegamahaaenihaanii aur hai  baarahaa dekhii hain unakii ranjishen  par kuchh abake saragiraanii aur hai  deke kat munh dekhataa hai naamaabar  kuchh to paigaamezabaanii aur hai   ho chukiin gaalib balaaen sab tamaam  ek margenaagahaanii aur hai

Title: laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa
Lyrics: he aa aa aa aa la aa aa aa aa  la laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa     aaii khushii laharaatii     laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa he laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa     aaii khushii laharaatii     laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa  he duur gagan men dekho chamake     aashaaon ke taare aashaaon ke taare     jhilamil pyaare pyaare la badalii men chhupkar taaron ke sang     chandaa kare ishaare chandaa kare ishaare do kisakii lagan me aaj pavan hain     baagon men ithalaatii      laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa     aaii khushii laharaatii     laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa  la raat nayii har baat nayii hain     nayaa nayaa hai zamaanaa     kaisaa samaa suhaanaa     kaisaa samaa suhaanaa he gaaye chandaniyaa dhiire dhiire     priit bharaa afasaanaa     priit bharaa afasaanaa la aaj mere chhote se man men     aashaa hai musakaatii  do laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa     aaii khushii laharaatii     laut gayaa gam kaa zamaanaa

Title: kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun
Lyrics: kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun main zindaa huun par zindagii se kafaa huun ho kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun  mujhe doston se shiqaayat hai shaayad mujhe dushmanon se muhabbat hai shaayad main is dostii dushmanii se kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun  na jaane kahaan kab kise dekhataa huun magar main jahaan jab jise dekhataa huun samajhataa hai vo main usii se kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun  main jaagaa huaa huun main soyaa huaa huun main dil ke andheron men khoyaa huaa huun main is chaand kii chaandanii se kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kafaa huun kisii baat par main kisii se kafaa huun

Title: ham ne aaj se tumhen ye naam de diyaa
Lyrics: ra ham ne aaj se tumhen ye naam de diyaa     jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman     ham ne aaj se tumhen ye naam de diyaa      la is bahaane pyaar kaa baigaam de diyaa     jaaneman jaaneman jaanejaan jaanejaan      ra paigaam kaa kuchh javaab do baithe ho kyon chupchaap se     baithe ho kyon chupchaap se la sharmaa rahe hain aaj ham kahate hue kuchh aap se     kahate hue kuchh aap se     ham ne aankhon ko zubaan kaa kaam de diyaa ra vaah is bahane pyaar kaa paigaam de diyaa     jaaneman jaaneman jaanejaan jaanejaan      la baaton hii baaton men aap to karane lage hamase pyaar bhii     karane lage hamase pyaar bhii ra tumane hii luutii hai niind bhii tumane hii luutaa hai qaraar bhii     aur chupake se hamen ilzaam de diyaa la is bahaane pyaar kaa paigaam de diyaa     jaaneman jaaneman jaanejaan jaanejaan      ra bechain tumane kar diyaa is dil ke har aramaan ko     is dil ke har aramaan ko     ye raat ho tum ye kaho is dil kii har daastaan ko     is dil kii har daastaan ko     pyaar ne badaa hasiin anjaam de diyaa ra huun vaah is bahaane pyaar kaa paigaam de diyaa     jaaneman jaaneman la jaanejaan jaanejaan  do jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman

Title: nikale the kahaan jaane ke liye
Lyrics: nikale the kahaan jaane ke liye pahunche hai kahaan maalum nahiin  ab apane bhatakate qadamon ko manjil ka nishaan maalum nahiin   hamane bhi kabhi is gulshan men ek khvaabebahaara dekhaa thaa  kab phuul jhare kab gard udii kab aaii khizaan maalum nahiin   dil sholaaegam se khaak hua ya aag lagi aramanon men  kya chiiz jalii kyuun siine se uthaa hai dhuaan maalum nahiin   barabaad vafaa ka afasaanaa ham kise kahen aur kaise kahen  khaamosh hain lab aur duniya ko ashkon ki zubaan maalum nahiin

Title: ham the jinake sahaare vo hue naa hamaare
Lyrics: ham the jinake sahaare  vo hue naa hamaare duubii jab dil kii nayyaa  saamane the kinaare ham the jinake sahaare threedots  kyaa muhabbat ke vaade  kyaa vafaa ke iraade ret kii hain diivaaren  jo bhii chaahe giraa de jo bhii chaahe giraa de ham the jinake sahaare threedots  hai sabhii kuchh jahaan men  dostii hai vafaa hai apanii ye kamanasiibii  hamako naa kuchh bhii milaa hai hamako naa kuchh bhii milaa hai ham the jinake sahaare threedots  yuun to duniyaa basegii  tanahaai phir bhii dasegii jo zindagii men kamii thii  vo kamii to rahegii vo kamii to rahegii ham the jinake sahaare threedots

Title: kaho sajanaa mere bin kaise rahe itane dukh tum sahe
Lyrics: kaho sajanaa mere bin kaise rahe itane dukh tum sahe kaho sajanaa threedots  merii kabhii yaad aatii thii tumako merii tarah kyaa rulaatii thii tumako aake zaraa merii aankhon men dekho kitane aansuu bahe kaho sajanaa threedots  aake mujhe tum gale se lagaa lo jaaoge phir naa kasam merii khaa lo haal jiyaa kaa maine bataayaa tum to kuchh naa kahe kaho sajanaa threedots  biite dinon ko chalo bhuul jaao aankhon se aise naa motii bahaao sajanii ye tujhako bataanaa hai mushkil kitane dukh ham sahe tere bin kaise rahe

Title: sunate hain ke mil jaati hai har chiiz duaa se
Lyrics: sunate hain ke mil jaatii hai har chiiz duaa se ek roz tumhen maang ke dekhenge kudaa se  duniyaa bhii milii hai gameduniyaa bhii milaa hai vo kyon nahiin milataa jise maangaa thaa kudaa se  sunate hain ke mil jaatii hai har chiiz duaa se ek roz tumhen maang ke dekhenge kudaa se

Title: pukaaro mujhe naam lekar pukaaro
Lyrics: pukaaro mujhe naam lekar pukaaro mujhe tumase apanii khabar mil rahii hai  kaii baar yuun bhii huaa hai safar men achaanak se do ajanabii mil gae ho jinhen ruup pahachaanatii ho  se bhatakatebhatakate vahii mil gae ho kunvaare labon kii qasam tod do tum zaraa muskuraakar bahaaren sanvaaro pukaare mujhe naam threedots  khayaalon men tum ne bhii dekhii to hongii kabhii mere khvaabon kii dhundhalii lakiiren tumhaarii hathelii se milatii hain jaakar mere haath kii ye adhuurii lakiiren badii sar chadhii hain ye zulfen tumhaarii ye zulfen mere baazuon men utaaro pukaaro mujhe naam threedots

Title: kahaan le chale ho bataado musaafir
Lyrics: kahaan le chale ho bataado musaafir  sitaaron se aage ye kaisaa jahaan hai  khayaalon kii manjil ye khvaabon kii mahafil  samajh men na aaye ye duniyaa kahaan hai   kahaan rah gaye qaafilen baadalon ke  zamiin chhup gayii hai tale baadalon ke  hai mujhako yaqiin ke hai jannat vahiin ye ajab si fizaa hai ajab ye samaa hai kahaan le chale ho   nazar kii dua ka javaab aa rahaa hai  meri aarazuu pe shabaab aa rahaa hai  ye khamoshiyaan bhi hain ik daastaan  koi kahata hai mujhase mohabbat javaan hai  kahaan le chale ho  muhabbat bharii is jahaan kii hain raahen jinhen dekhakar kho gayii hain nigaahen ye halakii havaa laayii kaisaa nashaa na rahaa hosh itana meraa dil kahaan hai kahaan le chale ho

Title: muhabbat tark kii main ne
Lyrics: muhabbat tark kii main ne garebaan sii liyaa main ne zamaane ab to khush ho zahar ye bhii pii liyaa main ne  abhii zindaa huun lekin sochataa rahataa huun ye dil men ki ab tak kis tamanaa ke sahaare jii liyaa main ne  tujhe apanaa nahiin sakataa magar itanaa bhii kyaa kam hai ki kuchh ghadiyaan tere kvaabon men khokar jii liyaa main ne  bas ab to meraa daaman chhod do bekaar ummiidon bahut dukh sah liye main ne bahut din jii liyaa main ne

Title: koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare
Lyrics: koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare 2 taaron ke jhuramut me aa kar wo milane kii fariyaad kare koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare threedots  wo kahe gagan pe aa jaao  ye taaren mujhe daraate hain ham naam tumhaaraa lete hai  ye aur mujhe dhamakaate hai ye chaand bhii terii chaahat ko 2 na jaane kyuun barabaad kare koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare threedots  main chup thaa panchhii bol uthe aur wo fariyaadii ruuth gayaa 2 wo ruuthe dil pe chot lagii main chaukaa sapnaa tuut gayaa ab rotaa huun kab raat pare 2 fariyaadi phir fariyaad kare koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare threedots  pahale to gagan jalaa daaluun phir puuchuun chaand sitaaron se kyaa bair hai tumako ulafat se aur ham ulfat ke maaro se main chaand ko girahan lag jauun 2 har taaraa ye fariyaad kare koii mujhe raat ko yaad kare threedots

Title: pyaar hii jiine kii suurat hai
Lyrics: pyaar hii jiine kii suurat hai sab se badii zaruurat hai pyaar se kyaa daranaa  2  jiivan se haare dil ko jiine kaa armaan do  jaan de kar ahasaan na utare itanaa pyaar karo  2 pyaar hii jiine kii threedots  jode binaa jud jaataa hai ye dilon kaa naataa hai  saansen chalaatii nahiin insaan ko pyaar chalaataa hai  2 pyaar hii jiine kii threedots

Title: saaqii sharaab laa ke tabiiyat udaas hai
Lyrics: saaqii sharaab laa ke tabiiyat udaas hai mutarib rabaab uthaa ke tabiiyat udaas hai  chubhatii hai kal wo jaamesitaaron kii roshanii ai chaand duub jaa ke tabiiyat udaas hai  shaayad tere labon kii chatak se ho jii bahaal ai dost muskuraa ke tabiiyat udaas hai  hai husn kaa fusuun bhii ilaajefusuurdagii ruk se naqaab uthaa ke tabiiyat udaas hai  mainne kabhii ye zid to nahiin kii par aaj shab ai mahajabiin na jaa ke tabiiyat udaas hai

Title: aapan jiivan darpan nyaaraa
Lyrics: aapan jiivan darpan nyaaraa is men samaayaa ruup tihaaraa  jag kii sevaa jiivan rakhataa karm tumhaare dharm hamaaraa rogii man ko tumhaarii aashaa jiivan  hamarii tumhaaraa  man men samaayaa ruup tihaaraa aapan jiivan darpan nyaaraa  andhii aankh ko tumhaaraa darshan duhkh badarii men chamakataa taaraa mujhako bhii apanaa saa banaa do aap ho mere  tumhaaraa  man men samaayaa ruup tihaaraa aapan jiivan darpan nyaaraa

Title: niraas men aas prabhu meraa
Lyrics: niraas men aas prabhu meraa duhkh ke din se kyon dar jaauun hansate hansate kyon na bitaauun kab tak merii duniyaa ko  barabaad karegaa andheraa niraas men aas prabhu meraa threedots  kabhii to aansuu hansii banenge kabhii to apane din bhii phirenge kabhii to merii dard bharii  raaton kaa hogaa saveraa niraas men aas prabhu meraa threedots  ye voh aas hai jo nahiin tuute is kaa sahaaraa kabhii na chhuute duubanevaalon kaa bhii is ne paar kiyaa hai bedaa niraas men aas prabhu meraa threedots

Title: paravardigaareaalam teraa hii hai sahaaraa
Lyrics: parvardigaareaalam tera hi hai sahaara tere siwan jahaan me koi nahin humaara  stanza 1  nooh ka safina tune toofan se bachaya duniya me tu humesha bandon ke kaam aaya maangi khalil ne jab tujhse dua khudaya aatish ko tune fauran ek gulsitan banaya har ilteja ne teri rehmat ko hai ubhaara parvardigaareaalam  safina  boat the first line refers to the story of noahs ark  khalilullah  friend of allah is the title of prophet ibrahim abraham he was thrown into fire aatish and came out untouched the third and fourth lines refer to him gulsitan  garden ilteja  wish prayer  stanza 2  younus ko tune machhli ke pet se nikaala tune hi mushkilon me ayub ko sambhaala ilyaas par karam ka tune kiya ujaala hai do jahaan me ya rab tera hi bolbaala tune sada ilaahi bigri ko hai sanwaara parvardigaareaalam  younus jonah was swallowed by a large fish and later saved by god line 1 refers to him the second line is about ayub who was afflicted with sores all over his body and the third line is about ilyaas  stanza 3  yousuf ko tune maula di quaid se rihaai yaaqub ko dubaara shaklepisar dikhaai behti hui nadi me moosa ki raah banaai tune saleeb par bhi isa ki jaan bachaai daata tere karam ka koi nahin kinaara  yousuf was imprisoned in egypt and line 1 is about him he was later reunited with his father yaaqub line 2 shakl  face pisar  soni think  line 3 refers to moses parting the sea  saleeb  cross line 3 is about jesus crucifixion the muslim belief is that he did not die on the cross  parvardigaareaalam tera hi hai sahaara tere siwa jahaan me koi nahin humaara

Lyrics: aalaap s teri mahafil men kismat aazamaa kar ham bhi dekhenge  ghadii bhar ko tere nazadiik aakar ham bhi dekhenge  2  ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge  2   l teri mahafil men kismat aazamaa kar ham bhi dekhenge  tere kadamon pe sar apanaa jhukaa kar ham bhi dekhenge  2  ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge  2   s bahaaren aaj paigaamemohabbat le ke aaii hain  badi muddat men ummiidon kii kaliyaan muskuraai hain  badi muddat men ajii haan  badi muddat men ummiidon kii kaliyaan muskuraai hain  gamedil se jaraa daaman bachaakar ham bhi dekhenge  2  ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge   l agar dil gam se khaalii ho to jiine ka mazaa kya hai  na ho khuunejigar to ashq piine ka mazaa kya hai  na ho khuunejigar haan haan  na ho khuunejigar to ashq piine ka mazaa kya hai  mohabbat men jaraa aansuu bahaakar ham bhi dekhenge  2  ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge   s mohabbat karane vaalo ka hai bas itanaa hii afasaanaa  tadapanaa chupake chupake aahen bharanaa ghut ke mar jaanaa  tadapanaa chupake chupake haan haan  tadapanaa chupake chupake aahen bharanaa ghut ke mar jaanaa  kisii din ye tamaashaa muskuraa kar ham bhi dekhenge  2  teri mahafil men kismat aazamaa kar ham bhi dekhenge  ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge   l mohabbat hamane maanaa zindagii barabaad karatii hai  ye kya kam hai ke mar jaane se duniya yaad karatii hai  ye kya kam hai ajii haan haan  ye kya kam hai ke mar jaane se duniya yaad karatii hai  kisii ke ishq men duniya lutaakar ham bhi dekhenge  2  teri mahafil men kismat aazamaa kar ham bhi dekhenge   l tere kadamon pe sar apanaa jhukaakar aa aa threedots s ghadii bhar ko tere nazadiik aakar aa aa threedots donon teri mahafil men kismat aazamaa kar ham bhi dekhenge  s ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge  l ajii haan ham bhi dekhenge

Lyrics: chikalakii chikalakii chumbii chikalakii chikalakii lumbaa chumbii nahiin chhode piichhaa zamaanaa kahanaa sunanaa ye ladakaa to hai yaar badaa hii lappuujhannaa ise samajhaauungii ke meraa rastaa chhode banaa main sakatii nahiin usakaa diivaanaa kyaa bananaa chikalakii chikalakii threedots  luut baithaa jo dil use kyaa kahanaa nahiin bachchon kaa khel koii diivaanaa bananaa jo chaaho samajho tum mohabbat kii hai maine to kaise chhoduun bolo o jaanetamannaa chikalakii chikalakii threedots  jaake ab sajii hai mahafil kitanii mahafilon ke baad aaj ham mile hain jaake kitane faasalon ke baad dar badar bhatakane ko kaise chhod den tumako dil ek dilabar paayaa itanii mushkilon ke baad vo mil gae hain jo sajan the mere aage main bhii huun majabuur kyaa karuun main kyaa kare dil chikalakii chikalakii threedots  aaj to diivaanii ho tuu aaj hai tumhaarii shaam ye nashaa utar jaae to logii phir meraa hii naam kaise kaise aa jaate hain akl se chalen paidal koii aa ke puuchhe inase aapakaa yahaan kyaa kaam ai phir se dekho tumhaare kab hai kaabil ye dil gayaa to kyaa karuun main kyaa kare dil chikalakii chikalakii threedots  nahiin chhode piichhaa zamaane kahanaa sunanaa ye ladakaa to yaar badaa hii lappuujhannaa jo chaaho samajho tum mohabbat kii hai maine to kaise chhoduun tumako o jaanetamannaa chikalakii chikalakii threedots

Lyrics: aar dii biiraathreedots taraa taraa taraa paraa paraa paraa taraataraataraataraa taraaruu  duniyaa men logon ko dhokhaa kabhii ho jaataa hai aankhon hii aankhon men yaaron kaa dil kho jaataa hai  aashaa duniyaa men threedots   aar dii duniyaa men threedots   aashaa naagin sii merii chaal rakhanaa dil kaa khayaal  mere diivaanon kaa ho jaataa hai ye haal		2 biidaa biidaa baayaraa baayaraa taraataraa taraa turu turu turu turu turu turu turu turu ruu jaagii main saarii rain saaraa jahaan so jataa hai aankhon hii aankhon men yaaron kaa dil kho jaataa hai  aar dii kahatii hai ye nazar kab kyaa ho kyaa khabar  duniyaa men chand log hote hain jaaduugar		2 biidaa biidaa baayaraa baayaraa taraataraa taraa turu turu turu turu turu turu turu turu ruu  aashaa suniye jii un pe bhii jaaduu kabhii ho jaataa hai aankhon hii aankhon men yaaron kaa dil kho jaataa hai  aar dii  pinjare men chalake aap aa jaataa hai shikaar  aashaa  qaatil pe bhii kabhii aa jaataa hai yuun pyaar	2 biidaa biidaa baayaraa baayaraa taraataraa taraa turu turu turu turu turu turu turu turu ruu baaton hii baaton men honaa hai jo ho jaataa hai aankhon hii aankhon men yaaron kaa dil kho jaataa hai  aashaa duniyaa men threedots
