Lyrics: vo jab yaad aae bahut yaad aae gamezindagii ke andhere men hamane chiraagemuhabbat jalaae bujhaae  aahaten jaag uthiin raaste hans diye thaamakar dil uthe ham kisii ke liye kaii baar aisaa bhii dhokhaa huaa hai chale aa rahe hain vo nazaren jhukaae  dil sulagane lagaa ashq bahane lage jaane kyaakyaa hamen log kahane lage magar roterote hansii aa gaii hai kayaalon men aake vo jab muskuraae  vo judaa kyaa hue zindagii kho gaii shammaa jalatii rahii roshanii kho gaii bahut koshishen kiin magar dil na bahalaa kaii saaz chhede kaii giit gaae

Title: chhod gae baalam mujhe haay akelaa chhod gae
Lyrics: mu chhod gae baalam mujhe haay akelaa chhod gae tod gae baalam meraa pyaar bharaa dil tod gae l chhuut gayaa baalam haay saath hamaaraa chhuut gayaa tuut gayaa baalam meraa pyaar bharaa dil tuut gayaa mu chhod gae baalam threedots  l phuul sang muskaae kaliyaan main kaise muskaauun baadal dekh ke bhar aai ankhiyaan  2 chhamchham niir bahaauun main chhamchham niir bahaauun mu chhod gae baalam threedots  dil kii lagii ko kyaa koii jaane main jaanuun dil jaane palakon kii chhaayaa men naachen  2 dard bhare afasaane ye dard bhare afasaane l chhuut gayaa baalam threedots  l pahale man men aag lagii aur phir barasii barasaat aisii chalii birahaa kii aandhii  2 tadapat huun dinraat main tadapat huun dinraat mu chhod gae baalam threedots

Title: manzar samet laaye hain jo tere gaanv ke
Lyrics: manzar samet laaye hain jo tere gaanv ke niinden udaa rahe hain wo jhonke hawaaon ke  terii galii se chaand bhii zyaadaa hansii nahiin kahate sune gaye gain musaafir kalaaon ke  pal bhar ko terii yaad men dhadakaa thaa dil meraa ab duur tak bhanwar se pade hain sadaaon ke  daadesafar milii hai kise raaheshauq men hamane mitaa diye hain nishaan apane paanvon ke  zindaa the jinase sard hawaaon men ham qatiil ab zaharaab ho gaye saaye hawaaon ke

Title: sapt suran tiin graam
Lyrics: sapt suran tiin graam unanchaas koti taan gunijan sab karat dhyaan naad brahm jaake sapt suran tiin graam   threedots  sur alaap alankaar muurchhanaa vividh prakaar kalakala jyon jal kii dhaar thumak chalat aage thumak chalat aage thumak chalat aage sapt suran tiin graam   threedots  jiivan ko giit jaan saans saans jaise taan har dhadakan lay samaan har pal prabhu aage har pal prabhu aage har pal prabhu aage sapt suran tiin graam   threedots  guruu brahmaa guruur vishnu guruu devo maheshvarah guruu saaxaat parabrahmaa tasmaisrii guravenamah

Title: sholaa thaa jal bujhaa huun hawaaen mujhe na do
Lyrics: sholaa thaa jal bujhaa huun hawaaen mujhe na do main kab kaa jaa chukaa huun sadaaen mujhe na do  jo zahar pii chukaa huun tumhiin ne mujhe diyaa ab tum to zindagii kii duaaen mujhe na do  aisaa kabhii na ho ke palat kar na aa sakuun har baar duur jaa ke sadaaen mujhe na do  kab mujhako aitaraafemuhabbat na thaa faraaz kab mainne ye kahaa thaa sazaaen mujhe na do

Title: cheharaa hai yaa chaand khilaa hai
Lyrics: ho cheharaa hai yaa chaand khilaa hai zulf ghanerii shaam hai kyaa   2 saagar jaisii aankhon vaalii   ye to bataa tera naam hai kyaa threedots  tu kya jaane teri khaatir  kitanaa hai betaab ye dil  tu kya jaane dekh rahaa hai  kaise kaise khvaab ye dil  dil kahataa hai threedots tu hai yahaan to jaataa lamhaa tham jaaye vaqt ka dariyaa bahate bahate  is manjar men jam jaaye tune divaanaa dil ko banaayaa  is dil pe ilzaam hai kya  saagar jaisii aankhon vaalii  ye to bataa tera naam hai kya  cheharaa hai yaa threedots  ho aaj main tujhase dur sahii  aur tu mujhase anjaan sahii threedots tera saath nahiin paaun to  gair tera aramaan sahii threedots ye aramaan hain shor nahiin ho khamoshii ke mele hon  is duniya men koi nahiin ho  ham dono hii akele hon  tere sapane dekh rahaa huun  aur meraa ab kaam hai kya  saagar jaisii aankhon vaalii   ye to bataa tera naam hai kya   cheharaa hai yaa threedots

Title: kuubakuu phail gaii baat shanaashaaii kii
Lyrics: kuubakuu phail gaii baat shanaashaaii kii usane kushbuu kii tarah merii paziiraaii kii   kaise kah duun ke mujhe chhod diyaa hai usane baat to sach hai magar baat hai rusvaaii kii  teraa pahaluu tere dil kii tarah aabaad rahe tujhape guzaren na qayaamat shabetanhaaii kii  wo kahiin bhii gayaa lautaa to mere paas aayaa bas yahii baat hai achchhii mere harajaaii kii  usane jalatii huii peshaanii pe jab haath rakhaa ruuh tak aa gaii taasiir masiihaaii kii

Title: zindagii kvaab hai thaa hamen bhii pataa
Lyrics: zindagii kvaab hai thaa hamen bhii pataa par hamen zindagii se bahut pyaar thaa sukh bhii the dukh bhii the dil ko ghere hue chaahe jaisaa thaa rangiin sansaar thaa  aa gaii thii shikaayat labon tak magar kise kahate to kyaa kahanaa bekaar thaa chal pade dard dekar to chalate rahe haar kar baith jaane se inakaar thaa  chand din thaa baseraa hamaaraa yahaan ham bhii mehamaan the ghar to us paar thaa hamasafar ek din to bichhadanaa hii thaa alavidaa alavidaa alavidaa alavidaa threedots

Title: aaj sajan mohe ang lagaalo janam safal ho jaaye
Lyrics: sakhii rii birahaa ke dukhade sah sah kar jab raadhe besudh ho lii to ik din apane manamohan se jaa kar yuun bolii  aaj sajan mohe ang lagaalo  janam safal ho jaaye  hriday kii piidaa deh kii agni  sab shiital ho jaaye   karuun laakh jatan more man kii tapan  more tan kii jalan nahiin jaaye  kaisii laagii ye lagan kaisii jaagii ye agan  jiyaa dhiir dharan nahiin paaye  prem sudhaa threedots more saanvariyaa  prem sudhaa itani barasaa do jag jal thal ho jaaye  aaj sajan threedots  mohe apanaa banaalo meri baanh pakad  main huun janam janam kii daasii  meri pyaas bujhaa do manahar giridhar pyaas bujhaa do  main huun antarghat tak pyasi  prem sudhaa threedots more saanvariyaa  prem sudhaa itani barasaa do jag jal thal ho jaaye  aaj sajan threedots  kaii jug se hain jaage more nain abhaage 2 kahiin jiyaa nahiin laage bin tore sukh dekhe nahiin aage 2 duhkh piichhe piichhe bhaage jag suunaa suunaa laage bin tore prem sudhaa more saanvariyaa saanvariyaa prem sudhaa itanii barasaa do jag jal thal ho jaaye aaj sajan threedots

Title: aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe
Lyrics: aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe ho aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe  meraa man jale meraa tan jale  o meraa man jale meraa tan jale  tuu baahon men le le mujhe		 2  mainne kisiise kabhii pyaar nahiin kiyaa  kitanon ne puuchhaa iqaraar nahiin kiyaa	 2 mere honthon pe haan aaii hai aaj pahalii dafaa jaan le aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe ho aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe  aankhen churaa ke jo guzar jaaegaa tuu  saarii umr phir pachhataaegaa tuu	 2 le jaaegaa mujhe aur koii usase pahale mujhe thaam le aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe ho aa jaa re aa sajanaa tuu chhuu le mujhe  meraa man jale  meraa tan jale o meraa man jale meraa tan jale tuu baahon men le le mujhe threedots

Title: zubaan pe dard bharii daastaan chalii aaii
Lyrics: zubaan pe dard bharii daastaan chalii aaii bahaar aane se pahale khizaan chalii aaii  khushii kii chaah men main ne uthaaye ranj bade 2 meraa nasiib kii mere qadam jahaan bhii pade ye badanasiibii merii bhii vahaan chalii aaii zubaan pe dard bharii daastaan chalii aaii  udaas raat hai viiraan dil kii mahafil hai 2 na hamsafar hai koii aur na koii manzil hai ye zindagii mujhe lekar kahaan chalii aaii zubaan pe dard bharii daastaan chalii aaii bahaar aane se pahale khizaan chalii aaii zubaan pe dard bharii daastaan chalii aaii

Title: andhere men jo baithe hain nazar un par bhii kuchh daalo
Lyrics: andhere men jo baithe hain nazar un par bhii kuchh daalo are o roshani valon  bure ham hain nahin itane zara dekho hamen bhalo  are o roshani valon threedots   kafan se odh kar baithe hain ham sapanon kii lashon ko  jo kismat ne dikhae dekhate hain un tamashon ko  hamen nafarat se mat dekho zara ham par raham khalo  are o roshani valon threedots   hamare bhi the kuchh sathi hamare bhi the kuchh sapane  sabhi vo rah men chhute vo sab ruthe jo the apane  jo rote hain kai din se zara unako bhi samajha lo  are o roshani valon threedots

Title: vahii chaandanii hai vahii aasamaan hai
Lyrics: vahii chaandanii hai vahii aasamaan hai bahaaren vahii aur vahii gulsitaan hai magar jis se roshan ye dil kaa jahaan hai chhupaa chaand meraa vo jaa kar kahaan hai vahii chaandanii hai threedots  vahii dil vahii main muhabbat bhii vo hii nigaahon men ab tak hai suurat bhii vo hii magar na vo mahafil na vo daastaan hai na vo daastaan hai vahii chaandanii hai threedots  mahakatii hain kaliyaan to chubhate hain kaante sisakate hain gunche to lagate hain  magar dekhataa kaun ye maharabaan hai ye maharabaan hai vahii chaandanii hai threedots

Title: merii zindagii kisii aur kii mere naam kaa koii aur hai
Lyrics: merii zindagii kisii aur kii mere naam kaa koii aur hai meraa aks hai sareaaiinaa paseaaiinaa koii aur hai     merii dhadakanon men hai chaap sii ye judaaii bhii hai milaap sii mujhe kyaa pataa mere dil bataa mere saath kyaa koii aur hai  na gae dinon ko khabar merii na shariikehaal nazar terii tere des men mere bhes men koii aur thaa koii aur hai  vo merii taraf nigaraan rahe meraa dhyaan jaane kahaan rahe merii aankh men kaii suuraten mujhe chaahataa koii aur hai

Title: meraa pyaar mujhe lautaa do
Lyrics: meraa pyaar mujhe lautaa do main jiivan men ulajh gayaa huun tum jiinaa sikhalaa do meraa pyaar mujhe lauaa do threedots  thukaraane se pahale mujhako  lautaa do vo priit kii baaten merii hansii mastiyaan merii lautaa do vo chaandanii raaten mere sapanon ko lautaa do meraa tuutaa dil lautaa do meraa pyaar mujhe lauaa do threedots  main ne jis ko jiivan samajhaa tumane usakii hansii udaayii dikhaa dikhaa phuulon ke sapane mujhako kaanton kii raah bataayii meraa apanaapan lautaa do mere giit mujhe lautaa do meraa pyaar mujhe lautaa do threedots

Title: raghupati raaghava raajaa raam patit paavan siitaa raam
Lyrics: raghupati raaghava raajaa raam patit paavan siitaa raam  siitaa raam siitaa raam bhaj pyaare tuu siitaa raam raghupati threedots  iishvar allaah tere naam sabako sanmati de bhagavaan raghupati threedots  raat ko nindiyaa din to kaam kabhii bhajoge prabhu kaa naam karate rahiye apane kaam lete rahiye hari kaa naam raghupati threedots

Title: tum kab tak pyaar chhupaaogii
Lyrics: tum kab tak pyaar chhupaaogii kamasin ho jag se daratii ho aahen bhii hans kar bharatii ho dil dard se jab bhar jaayegaa tab nainon ko chhalakaaogii   yuun duur duur mujhase rahanaa kuchh khel nahiin kuchh na kahanaa dil chhiin ke haay ghabaraaogii kab tak pyaar chhupaaogii  ye ruup thaan kaa kaam kahaan tak piiron kii dukh kaa jaam kahaan tak apane haath se apane ghar me kab tak aag lagaaogii kab tak pyaar chhupaaogii

Title: raushan tumhiin se duniyaa
Lyrics: raushan tumhiin se duniyaa raunaq tumhiin jahaan kii phuulon men palane vaalii raanii ho gulasitaan kii  salaamat raho salaamat raho  naazuk ho naaz se bhii tum pyaar se bhii pyaarii tum husn se hasiin ho kyaa baat hai tumhaariia ankhon men do jahaan hain maalik ho do jahaan kii  salaamat raho salaamat raho  dil chaahe tuut jaaye mere dil se yuun hii khelo  jiitii raho yuun hii tum merii bhii umr le lo kis din duaa na maangii hamane tumhaarii jaan kii  salaamat raho salaamat raho

Title: rang laae gamedauraan to mazaa aa jaae
Lyrics: rang laae gamedauraan to mazaa aa jaae vo bhii ho jaaen pareshaan to mazaa aa jaae  zikr karate hain bahaaron kaa bahut ahlekirad thaam le koii garebaan to mazaa aa jaae  tuu samajhataa hai jise baagonasheman ai dost vahii nikale darezindaan to mazaa aa jaae  hai bahut naaz tumhen apanii nigaahon pe shakeel dekh lo jalwaaejaanaan to mazaa aa jaae

Title: allaah megh de paanii de chhaayaa de re raamaa megh de
Lyrics: allaah megh de paanii de  chhaayaa de re raamaa megh de shyaamaa megh de allaah megh de paanii de  chhaayaa de re raamaa megh de  aankhen phaade duniyaa dekhe  hay ye tamaashaa aankhen phaade threedots aankhen phaade duniyaa dekhe  hay ye tamaashaa hai ye vishvaas teraa hai terii aashaa allaah megh de threedots  allaah megh de paanii de  chhaayaa de re raamaa megh de

Title: aramaan bhare dil kii lagan tere liye hai
Lyrics: t aramaan bhare dil kii lagan tere liye hai 2 ho lagan tere liye hai2 g nazaren mere jiivan kii sajan tere liye hai ho sajan tere liye hai2  t luutaa hai mere dil ne mohabbat ka khazaanaa ho mohabbat ka khazaanaa2 g jo terii kahaanii hai vahii meraa fasaanaa ho vahii meraa fasaanaa2 t ye phuul ye khushbuu ye chaman tere liye hai ho chaman tere liye hai2 aramaan bhare dil kii lagan tere liye hai  g kyon pyaar kii duniyaa men na ho raaj hamaaraa kyon na ho raaj hamaaraa2 t hai dil ko terii naragisii aankhon kaa sahaaraa terii aankhon kaa sahaaraa2 g ye chaand ye chaand ye dharatii ye gagan tere liye hai ho gagan tere liye hai2  t aramaan bhare dil kii lagan tere liye hai 2 ho lagan tere liye hai2 g nazaren mere jiivan kii sajan tere liye hai ho sajan tere liye hai2

Title: aa jaa aaii bahaar dil hai beqaraar o mere raajakumaar
Lyrics: aa jaa aaii bahaar dil hai beqaraar o mere raajakumaar tere bin rahaa na jaae aa jaa aaii bahaar dil hai beqaraar o mere raajakumaar tere bin rahaa na jaae aa jaa  julfon se jab bhii chale puravaaii    2 tan meraa tuute    2 aayi angadaaii    2 dekhuun baar baar teraa intazaar o mere raajakumaar tere bin rahaa na jaae aa jaa aaii threedots  man me sunuu main terii muraliyaa    2 naachuun main chhamchham    2 baaje paayaliyaa    2 dil kaa taartaar terii kare pukaar o mere raajakumaar tere bin rahaa na jaae aa jaa aaii threedots  jal kii machhariyaa jal me hai pyaasii    2 khushiyon ke din hain    2 phir bhii udaasii    2 lekar meraa pyaar aa jaa ab ke baar o mere raajakumaar tere bin rahaa na jaae aa jaa aaii threedots

Title: dhiiraj dhar manavaa
Lyrics: dhiiraj dhar manavaa dhiiraj dhar tere sukhake bhare din aayenge taqadiir kaa suuraj chamakegaa gam ke baadal hat jaayenge dhiiraj dhar manavaa dhiiraj dhar  kyon ghuum rahe ho bhanvare se kyon ghuum rahe ho bhanvare se ghabaraaye hue bharamaaye hue terii patajhad ke patte udaate aanchal men basant chhupaaye hue in kaanton ko in kaanton ko chun chun rakh le kaliyon ke chaman ban jaayenge                       dhiiraj dhar manavaa dhiiraj dhar                       saagar kii tarangen takaraake takaraake svayn hii duubengii terii sach kii naav dolegi bahut dolegi magar na duubegii tuufaanon ke tuufaanon ke jhonke hii terii naiyyaa ko kinaare lagaayenge  dhiiraj dhar manavaa dhiiraj dhar tere sukhake bhare din aayenge taqadiir kaa suuraj chamakegaa gam ke baadal hat jaayenge dhiiraj dhar manavaa dhiiraj dhar

Title: jab tere nain muskuraate hain
Lyrics: jab tere nain muskuraate hain ziist ke ranj bhuul jaate hain  kyuun shikan daalate ho maathe par bhuul kar aa gae ham jaate hain  kashtiyaan yuun bhii duub jaatii hain naakudaa kisaliye daraate hain  ik hasiin aankh ke ishaare par qaafile raah bhuul jaate hain

Title: zaraa sii baat pe har rasm tod aayaa thaa mukesh gazal
Lyrics: zaraa sii baat pe har rasm tod aayaa thaa diletabaah ne bhii kyaa mizaaj paayaa thaa  muaaf kar naa sakii merii zindagii mujhako vo ek lamhaa ki main tujhase tang aayaa thaa  shaguftaa phul simat kar kalii bane jaise kuchh is tarah se tune badan churaayaa thaa  guzar gayaa hai koi lamhaaesharar kii tarah abhii to main use pahachaan bhii na paayaa thaa  pataa nahiin ki mere baad unape kyaa guzarii main chaand khvaab zamaane men chhod aayaa thaa

Title: dekho ruuthaa naa karo baat nazaron kii suno
Lyrics: rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  baat nazaron kii suno lataa ham na bolenge kabhii tum sataayaa naa karo   2 rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  rafii cheharaa to laal huaa kyaa kyaa haal huaa is adaa par terii main to paagal huaa tum bigadane jo lago  aur bhii hansiin lago lataa ham na bolenge kabhii tum sataayaa naa karo rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  lataa jaan par merii banii aapakii thaharii hansii haay main jaan gaii pyaar kii fitanaagarii dil jalaane ke liye thandii aahen na bharo rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  baat nazaron kii suno lataa ham na bolenge kabhii  rafii terii khushabuu ne mere hosh bhii chhiin liye hain khushii aaj hame tere pahaluu men gire dil kii dhadakan pe zaraa phuul saa haath rakho lataa ham na bolenge kabhii tum sataayaa naa karo rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  lataa kyaa kahegaa ye samaa in raahon kaa dhunaa laaj aae mujhe mujhako laae ho kahaan ham tumhe maan gae  tum bade vo ho hato rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo  baat nazaron kii suno lataa ham na bolenge kabhii tum sataayaa naa karo rafii dekho ruuthaa naa karo

Title: saaqii terii mahafil men ham jaam uchhaalenge
Lyrics: jazbevafaa se kaam liyaa aur pii gae saaqii se badhake jaam liyaa aur pii gae maaluum jab huaa ke mainaab hai haraam allaa miyaan kaa naam liyaa aur pii gae  saaqii terii mahafil men ham jaam uchhaalenge jab kaabe men jaaenge zamazam se nahaa lenge  duniyaa ke harek gam se behatar hai gamejaanaa sau shammen bujhaakar ham ek shammaa jalaa lenge  ai pardaanashiin tumako ye pardaa mubaarak ho ham apane tasavvur men tasviir banaa lenge  jaane do zaraa kashtii machalii huii maujon men tuufaan kab aaegaa andaazaa lagaa lenge  ham dekh nahiin sakate sharmindagiieqaatil duniyaa kii nigaahon se zakmon ko chhupaa lenge

Title: honth surkh yaakuut jyuun laal chamakan
Lyrics: honth surkh yakut jyun lal chamakan thodi seb valaiti sar vichchon dand chambe di ladi ki hans moti dane nikale husn anar vichchon nakk alf hussaini da pippala e zulf nah khazane di bar vichchon likhi chin tasvir kashmir jatti kadd sroo bahasht gulzar vichchon gardan kunj di ungaliyan ravanh falian hath kulade barg chinar vichchon chhati thath di ubhari pet khahanu sau bakh de chune ambar vichchon dhunni bahasht de hauzadan mushk kuppa pedu makhamali khaskhas sarakar  vichchon kafur sahanan surin banke saf stun minar vichchon surkhi honthan di lod dandasade da kheje khatari katl bazar vichchon bahan velan valian gunnh makkhan chhati sangamarmar sand dhar vichchon shah pari di bhain panj phull rani gujhi rahe na hir hazar vichchon sanyya nal latkadi manamatti jiven hirnian truthian bar vichchon lanka bag di pari ki indrani ruh nikali chand anavar vichchon putali pikani di naksh rum vale ladha pari ne chand ujar vichchon thik tez talvar di shan vali chamk nikali mian di dhar vichchon je koi vekhada oshde husn tain zakhm lagada os talvar vichchon matthe a laggan jede bhaur ashak rag nikale zal di dhar vichchon phire chanakadi cha de nal jatti chadhia gazb da katak kandhar vichchon ki kujh vekhie rabb vikhaunda e inhan kuvarian de avokar vichchon  kazlabas jallad savar khuni nikl daudya odak bazar vichchon varis shah jan nainan da da lagge koi bache na jue di har vichchon

Title: itanii sii ye merii kahanii
Lyrics: itaniisii ye merii kahaanii  bas itaniisii ye merii kahaanii  kahate kahate in aankon men bhar aataa hai paanii itaniisii ye merii kahaanii threedots  jii kahataa hai binaa likhe hii kaagaz ko main aag lagaa duun 2 kabhii unakii galiyon men jaakar kud kaagaz kii raakh bichhaa duun kaagaz kii main raakh bichhaa duun usake talavon se mit jaae merii bujhii nishaanii itanii sii ye merii kahaanii threedots  dil ne aramaanon kii sunakar kar dii hai dar baahii  merii hii aankhon ne mere dil kii baaten bataa dii 2 phir bhii mujhe diivaanaa kahatii ye duniyaa diivaanii  itanii sii ye merii kahaanii threedots  chalataa chalataa chalataa jaauun jahaan na koii ho bas jaauun ho bas jaauun jiivan mujhase ruuth jaae maut kaa riit hai maanii  itanii sii ye merii kahanii threedots

Title: bindiyaa tarase kajaraa barase aaye naa saajanaa
Lyrics: bindiyaa tarase kajaraa barase aaye naa saajanaa dhal gaii rainaa bujh gaii baatii main khadii aanganaa 2  main pyaasii piyaa aavan kii koyal sii bin saavan kii 2 bhatakuun re saathii binaa bindiyaa threedots  yaad karuun jab suuratiyaa aur jalen bhiigii ankhiyaan 2 kuch mohe suujhe naa bindiyaa threedots  dhuundha thakii sab dvaar galii raat yuun hii phir biit chalii 2 aae piyaa ajahun naa bindiyaa threedots  bindiyaa threedots  main khadii aanganaa 4

Title: havaa havaa ai havaa khushabuu lutaa de
Lyrics: havaa havaa ai havaa khushabuu lutaa de  kahaan khulii haan khulii zulf bataa de  ab usakaa pataa de zaraa mujhako bataa de  main us se miluungaa ek baar milaa de  yaar milaa de diladaar milaa de  2   2  phir kisii ke chehare kaa rang khil gayaa  bichhadaa hua aaj koi usako mil gayaa   2 kaise mil gayaa kahaan mil gayaa  ham ne to dhundh liyaa saaraa zamaanaa  havaa havaa ai threedots  ye adaa bhi usakii kyaa kaam kar gayii  jaate jaate ek hasiin shaam kar gayii   2 shaam kar gayii tere naam kar gayii  aise hasiin chehare ko apanaa banaanaa  havaa havaa ai threedots  zindagii kii dhuup ko saayaa kar gayii  aaj mere paas se vo guzar gayii   2 usane jo kahaa tumane hii sunaa  ye baat aur kisii ko na bataanaa  havaa havaa ai threedots havaa havaa ai threedots

Title: mailii chaadar odhake kaise dwaar tumhaare aauun
Lyrics: mailii chaadar odhake kaise dwaar tumhaare aauun   2 he paawan parameshwar mere man hii man sharamaauun  tuune mujhako jaga men bhejaa nirmal dekar kaayaa aakar ke sansaar men mainne isako daag lagaayaa janamjanam kii mailii chaadar kaise daag chhudaauun mailii chaadar threedots  nirmal vaanii paakar tujhase naam na teraa gaayaa nain muundakar he parameshwar kabhii na tujhako dhyaayaa man viinaa kii taaren tuutii ab kyaa giit sunaauun mailii chaadar threedots  in pairon se chalakar tere mandir kabhii naa aayaa jahaanjahaan ho puujaa terii kabhii na shiish jhukaayaa he harihar main haar ke aayaa ab kyaa haar chadhaauun mailii chaadar threedots

Title: ai havaa mere sang sang chal
Lyrics: ai havaa mere sang sang chal mere dil men huii halachal kaahe dariyaa kaa paanii kal kal tujhe aas milan kii pal pal  1 ruk naa sakuun main daudii aauun phir kuchh soch ke main ghabaraauun ai havaa threedots  2 tuune ye kaisaa jaaduu kiyaa hai bin dor ke mujhe baandh diyaa hai ai havaa threedots  3 kathaputalii sii naach rahii huun kaise kahuun tujhe dhuundh rahii huun ai havaa threedots

Title: koii dost na raqiib hai
Lyrics: koii dost hai na raqiib hai teraa shahar kitanaa ajiib hai  vo jo ishq thaa vo junuun thaa ye jo hijr hai ye nasiib hai  yahaan kis kaa cheharaa padhaa karuun yahaan kaun itanaa kariib hai  main kisase kahuun mere saath chal yahaan sab ke sar pe saliib hai

Title: le jaa merii taqadiir mujhe jahaan biit din kii yaad na ho
Lyrics: le jaa merii taqadiir mujhe jahaan biit din kii yaad na ho jahaan aankh se aansuu nikale naa aur honthon par fariyaad na ho  dil bhii siine men jalataa hai aankhen tarasaa karatii hain bhuulane waale tere liye ye paharon barasaa karatii hain kyuun na jaauun us duniyaa men jahaan tumhaarii yaad na ho  tum bhuul gaye ho wo raaten jab mujhe pukaaraa karate the in chaandsitaaron par merii tasviir utaaraa karate the aisii duaaen dete ho ab teraa pyaar kabhii aabaad na ho

Title: zikr us pariivash kaa aur phir bayaan apanaa
Lyrics: zikr us pariivash kaa aur phir bayaan apanaa ban gayaa rakiib aakir thaa jo raajadaan apanaa  manzar ik balandii par aur ham banaa sakate arsh se idhar hotaa kaash phir makaan apanaa  dardedil kuun kab tak jaauun unako dikhalaa duun ungaliyaan figaar apanii kaamaa kuun zakaar apanaa  ham kahaan ke daanaa the kis hunar men yakataa the besabab huaa dushman gaalib aasamaan apanaa

Title: jaisaa des vaisaa bhes phir kyaa daranaa
Lyrics: ki 	jaisaa des vaisaa bhes phir kyaa daranaa la     oha threedots haay ki 	jaisaa des vaisaa bhes phir kyaa daranaa 	are chhodo raanii chhodo yuunhiin aahen bharanaa 	are kaahe kii sharam hai kudiye jaldii karanaa la	main nahiin karanaa yuun nahiin bananaa  2  la	kaisii ye nagariyaa kaise hain ye log kaise hain ye log 	haaya sabako laagaa prabhu besharamii kaa rog 	aba tuu hii bataa bhagavan main bhii kyaa karuun 	main bhii kyaa karuun 	main to kuchha bhii karane se naa jaane kyuun daruun 	ghunghataa kholuun naa kholuun naa kholuun kholuun re ki	are chhod de nakharaa aba to goriye 	are aayaa hai maukaa le aba tuu bana saanvaranaa 	are kaahe kii sharam hai kudiye jaldii karanaa la	main nahiin karanaa yuun nahiin bananaa  2  ki	mana ko dhak le gorii tana kaa dhakanaa hai bekaar 	dhakanaa hai bekaar 	phuul naa mahake jaba taka usakaa khilanaa hai bekaar 	are aksara aisaa hotaa hai pahalii pahalii baar 	pahalii pahalii baar 	aa mujhase tuu le le himmat thodii sii udhaar 	jhuutha boluun naa boluun naa boluun boluun re la	are gira naa jaauun main to kamasin re aauucha ki	are haathon men mere tuu apanaa haatha dharanaa la     are kaahe kii sharama ve mundayaa jaldii karanaa ki	are vaaha bhai vaaha huii gala naa la	jaisaa des vaisaa bhes phir kyaa daranaa dono   jaisaa des vaisaa bhes phir kyaa daranaa la	are kaahe kii sharama ve mundayaa jaldii karanaathreedots

Title: dil kii duniyaa basaa gayaa hai kaun
Lyrics: dil kii duniyaa basaa gayaa hai kaun ranjogam thaa mitaa gayaa hai kaun  aake chupake se kwaab men mere niinden miithii banaa gayaa hai kaun  duur rah kar bhii shaak se kaliyo tumako jiinaa bataa gayaa hai kaun  kyon ye sarashaariyaan hawaaon men mastii apanii lutaa gayaa hai kaun

Title: javaaniyaan ye mast mast bin piye
Lyrics: javaaniyaan ye mast mast bin piye jalaatii chal rahii hai raah men diye na jaane inamen kisake vaaste huun main na jaane inamen kaun hain mere liye mere liye mere liye  2  sabhii hansiin sabhii javaan kahaan pe dil ko haariye sabhii hain dil ke mehamaan kise kise pukaariye javaaniyaan ye mast mast threedots  diivaane ham the chaah ke to beqaraar ho liye ke duur kii nigaah ke gunahagaar ho liye javaaniyaan ye mast mast threedots

Title: duniyaa se dil lagaa kar duniyaa se kyaa milegaa
Lyrics: duniyaa se dil lagaa kar duniyaa se kyaa milegaa yaadekudaa kiye jaa tujh ko kudaa milegaa  daulat ho yaa hukuumat taaqat ho yaa javanii har chiiz mitane vaalii har chiiz aaniijaanii ye sab gurur ek din mittii men jaa milegaa yaadekudaa kiye jaa tujh ko kudaa milegaa  aataa nahiin palat kar guzaraa huaa zamaanaa kyaa kaab kaa bharosaa kyaa maut kaa thikaanaa ye zindagii ganvaa kar kyaa faayada milegaa yaadekudaa kiye jaa tujh ko kudaa milegaa

Title: main un kii ban jaauun re
Lyrics: main un kii ban jaauun re pal chhin unakaa panth nihaaruun nainan diip jalaauun main nainan diip jalaauun main un kii ban jaauun re   threedots  khadii rahii huun main piyaa ke path men aaye vo aaye vo chandaa ke rath men main man hii man  lagaauun duur khadii sharamaauun  main solah singaar karuungii aaye rii sakhii aaye rii sakhii main  bhole man ke aramaanon kii jayamaalaa pahanaauun main jayamaalaa

Title: sapane men dekhaa sapanaa
Lyrics: sapane men dekhaa sapanaa  ho sapane men dekhaa sapanaa  aage  ek din sapane men dekhaa sapanaa  kyaa vo jo hai na amitaabh apana  bachchan haan threedots main amitaabh ho gayaa  ho sapane men dekhaa sapanaa   daayen men hemaa  maalinii baayen men ziinat  amaan saamane rekhaa piichhe jo dekhaa  kya hua ratnaa khadii thi haath men chhadii thi  dekhate dekhate main bhaag rahaa tha  dekhaa main bhaag rahaa tha  ho sapane men dekhaa sapane   haan ek aur yaad aya  ek din sapane men dekhaa sapanaa  kyaa vo jo hai na mistar pele apana  kaisaa khilaadii hai badaa anaadii hai  mere saath maich ho gayaa gayaa gayaa threedots are maaraa jo chhakkaa kaich ho gayaa  futabaul men criket kahaana sapane men dekhaa dekhaa sapanaa threedots  ek din chhotii si dekhii sapanii  sapanii are vo jo hai na lataa apanii  lataa gaa rahi thi main tabale pe tha  vo mukhade pe thi main antare pe thaa  taal kahaan taam kahaan tum kahaan ham kahaan  taal kahaan taam kahaan tum kahaan ham kahaan  lataafat fataafat fataafat karaamaat   taake tiikaa taake tikaa  taake tiikaa taake tikaa  thayya thai   sapane men dekhaa sapanaa  ho sapane men dekhaa sapana threedots

Title: kathin hai raahaguzar thodii duur saath chalo
Lyrics: kathin hai raahaguzar thodii duur saath chalo bahut kadaa hai safar thodii duur saath chalo  tamaam umr kahaan koii saath detaa hai ye jaanataa huun magar thodii duur saath chalo  nashe men chuur huun main bhii tumhen bhii hosh nahiin badaa mazaa ho agar thodii duur saath chalo  ye ek shab kii mulaakaat bhii ganiimat hai kise hai kal kii kabar thodii duur saath chalo  duaafemanzilejaanaan hamen bhii karanaa hai faraaz tum bhii agar thodii duur saath chalo

Title: tiin taal par naach budhaape bachapan aur javaanii kaa
Lyrics: tiin taal par naach budhaape bachapan aur javaanii kaa rang hazaaron magar zindagii ek bulabulaa paanii kaa  hariibharii daalii ko yuun hii patajhad men lut jaanaa hai khilaa phuul jo aaj chaman men kal usako murajhaanaa hai subah huii aur katm fasaanaa shabanam kii zindagaanii kaa  saarii duniyaa ko hathiyaane muurakh inasaan daude re do gaz dharatii bane bichhaunaa uupar maatii odhe re mile dhuul men sapan suhaanaa duniyaa kii sultaanii kaa  ek buund kii pyaas pyaar kii taaltalaiyaa riite re  badhii magar vo bujh na paaii janam hazaaron biite re de na paaen saat samundar ek bhii qataraa paanii kaa

Title: strawberry aankhen sochatii kyaa hain
Lyrics: ke       strawberry aankhen sochatii kyaa hain           ladakii tum ho mahalon men ho palii           vo ice cream ho jo hai frijh men rakhii           tumane jo bhii kahaa vo hameshaa huaa           tumhen har chiiz milii mercedes milii           phir bhii aankhon men hai koii gam chhupaa huaa           phir bhii tum khush nahiin bolo hai baat kyaa            ain no reaction volume double karuun           strawberry aankhen   threedots           tum dil kii har ik baat pe kyon itanii ho bezaar           tum pyaar ke sab kvaabon ko bhii kahatii ho bekaar           pagalii kahiin ho to nahiin           laauun main kyaa koii davaa  kavitaa  koii pagalii vagalii nahiin main suno           davaa mujhako na do ilaaj apanaa karo           mere daadaaparadaadaa bhii paagal na the           na koii paagalpan mujh men hai            paauun kaise khushii apane hii pyaar men           jab ke hai duhkh bharaa saare sansaar men           mujhako aisii khushii se nahiin vaasataa           meraa to hai alag raastaa  ke       kyaa shaadii nahiin chaahiye           to phir route change            aankhon men hain hiire chamakate           chehare par hain chaand damakate           gaalon men hain phuul mahakate           honthon men hain kaliyaan gulaabii           dil ko banaa den jaise sharaabii           naak to thodii oversize hai           its okay madam plastic surgery kar denge  kavitaa  merii to naak jaisii hai tu apanaa sar dikhaa           lagataa hai tere sar men hai bhuusaa bharaa huaa           kise pataa kise khabar tuu aadamii hai yaa bandar

Title: aa ke sajjaadaanashiin kaise huaa mere baad
Lyrics: aa ke sajjaadaanashiin kaise huaa mere baad na rahii dasht men kaalii koii jaa mere baad  chaak karanaa hai isii gam se girebaaneqafan kaun kholegaa tere bandekabaa mere baad  wo hawaakhaahechaman huun ke chaman men har subah pahale main jaataa thaa aur baadesabaa mere baad  tez rakhanaa sarehar kaar ko ai dashtejunuun shaayad aa jaaye koii aablaapaa mere baad  munh pe rakh daamanegul royenge murgaanechaman har ravish kaak udaaegii sabaa mere baad  baad marane ke merii kabr pe aayaa wo miir yaad aaii mere iisaa ko davaa mere baad

Title: kuchh na kuchh to zaruur honaa hai saamanaa aaj unase honaa hai
Lyrics: kuchh na kuchh to zaruur honaa hai saamanaa aaj unase honaa hai  todo phenkon rakho karo kuchh bhii dil hamaaraa hai kyaa khilaunaa hai  zindagii aur maut kaa matalab tumako paanaa hai tumako khonaa hai  itanaa daranaa bhii kyaa hai duniyaa se jo bhii honaa hai so to honaa hai  uth ke mahafil se mat chale jaanaa tumase roshan ye konaakonaa hai

Title: hai duaa yaad magar harfeduaa yaad nahiin
Lyrics: dil kii choton ne kabhii chain se rahane na diyaa jab chalii sard hawaa mainne tujhe yaad kiyaa puuchhane aate ho har roz asiiron ke mizaaj kyuun nahiin kahate ho jaao tumhen aazaad kiyaa  hai duaa yaad magar harfeduaa yaad nahiin mere nagmaat ko andaazenavaa yaad nahiin  zindagii zabremusalasal kii tarah kaatii hai jaane kis jurm kii kaatii hai sazaa yaad nahiin  sirf dhundhalaaye sitaaron kii chamak dekhii hai kab huaa kaun huaa mujhase kafaa yaad nahiin  aao ek sajadaa karen aalamemadahoshii men log kahate hain saagar ko kudaa yaad nahiin

Title: ulfat kii nayii manzil ko chalaa
Lyrics: ulfat kii nayii manzil ko chalaa tuu baahen daal ke baahon men dil todane vaale dekh ke chal ham bhii to pade hain raahon men  kyaa kyaa na jafaaen dil pe sahiin par tum pe koii shiqavaa naa kiyaa is jumr ko bhii shaamil kar lo mere maasuum gunaahon men  jab chaandanii raaton men tuu ne kud ham se kiyaa iqaraarevafaa phir aaj hain kyon ham begaane terii beraham nigaahon men  ham bhii hain vahii tum bhii ho vahii ye apanii apanii qisamat hai tum khel rahe ho khushiyon se ham duub gaye hain aahon men  dil todane vaale dekh ke chal ham bhii to pade hain raahon men

Title: taubaa ye matavaalii chaal jhuk jaae phuulon kii daal
Lyrics: taubaa ye matavaalii chaal jhuk jaae phuulon kii daal chaand aur suuraj aakar maangen tujhase rangejamaal hasiinaa terii misaal kahaan  sitam ye adaaon kii raanaaiyaan hain kayaamat hai kyaa terii angadaaiyaan hain bahaarechaman ho ghataa ho dhanak ho ye sab terii suurat kii parachhaiyaan hain ke tan se udataa gulaal kahaan  huun main bhii diivaanon kaa ik shahazaadaa tujhe dekhakar ho gayaa kuchh zyaadaa kudaa ke lie mat buraa maan jaanaa ye lab chhuu liye hain yuun hii beiraadaa nashe men itanaa kayaal kahaan  yahii dil men hai tere nazadiik aa ke miluun tere palakon pe palake jhukaa ke jo tujh saa hasiin saamane ho to kaise chalaa jaauun pahaluu men dil ko dabaa ke ki merii itanii majaal kahaan

Title: suno ye zamaane kii kahaanii hai aansuu kii zabaanii
Lyrics: suno ye zamaane kii kahaanii hai aansuu kii zabaanii  o jaane vaale kar le yaqiin o teraa duniyaa men koii nahiin 2 koii roe koii gaae  kahiin pe dhuup aur kahiin pe saae vaah re maalik teraa nyaay  2 teraa nyaay suno ye zamaane kii threedots   koii dulhan sajakar aae kisii kii arthii tanhaa jaae  2 raah men koii thokar khaae vaah re maalik teraa nyaay  2 teraa nyaay suno ye zamaane kii threedots

Title: baaziichaaeatfaal hai duniyaa mere aage
Lyrics: baaziichaaeatfaal hai duniyaa mere aage  hotaa hai shaboroz tamaashaa mere aage   mat puuchh ke kyaa haal hai meraa tere piichhe  tuu dekh ke kyaa rang hai teraa mere aage   hotaa hai nihaan gard men saharaa mere hote  ghisataa hai jabiin kaak pe dariyaa mere aage   go haath ko junbish nahiin aankhon men to dam hai  rahane do abhii saagaromiinaa mere aage

Title: merii maano yaaro mujhako aaj na roko piine se
Lyrics: merii maano yaaro mujhako aaj na roko piine se behoshii men maranaa achchhaa hosh men aakar jiine se  main pyaasaa huun mujhe pilaao jalate hain jab dil ke ghaav aataa huun mayakhaane men jaam nahiin bharate to aao qataraa qataraa hii tapakaao tum mere paimaane men khaalii jaam lagaa rakhaa hai mainne apane siine se  aaj mere aansuu na poncho apane haal pe ro lene do mujh aawaaraa paagal ko kaise gale lagaa loge tum kitanii der sambhaaloge tum may kii khaalii botal ko thokar maaro mujhe giraa do tum ehasaas ke ziine se

Title: svapn jhade phuul se miit chubhe shuul se
Lyrics: svapn jhade phuul se miit chubhe shuul se lut gaye shrringaar sabhii baag ke babuul se aur ham khade khade bahaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzar gayaa gubaar dekhate rahe  aankh bhii khulii na thii ki haaya dhuup dhal gaii paanv jab talaq uthe ki zindagii fisal gaii paat paat jhad gae ki shaakhshaakh jal gaii chaah to nikal sakii na par umar nikal gaii  2 giit ashk ban gae svapn ho dafan gae saath ke sabhii diye dhuaan pahanpahan gae aur ham jhukejhuke mod par rukeruke umr kii chadhaav kaa utaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzarthreedots  kyaa shabaab thaa ki phuul phuul pyaar kar uthaa kyaa kamaal thaa ki dekh aainaa sihar uthaa is taraf zamiin aur aasamaan udhar uthaa thaamakar jigar uthaa ki jo milaa nazar uthaa  2 par tabhii yahaan magar aisii kuchh havaa chalii lut gaii kalii kalii ki ghut gaii galii galii aur ham lutelute vaqt se pitepite shaam kii sharaab kaa khumaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzarthreedots  haath the mile ke zulf chaand kii savaar duun honth the khule ke har bahaar ko pukaar luun dard thaa diyaa gayaa ke har dukhii ko pyaar duun aur saans yuun ke svarg bhuumi par utaar duun  2 ho sakaa na kuchh magar  shaam ban gaii sahar vo uthii lahar ke dhah gaye kile bikhar bikhar aur ham dare dare  niir nain men bhare odh kar kafan pade mazaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzarthreedots  maang bhar chalii ke ek jab naii naii kiran dhol se dhunak uthii thumak uthe charan charan shor mach gayaa ke lo chalii dulhan chalii dulhan gaanv sab umada padaa bahak uthe nayan nayan  2 par tabhii zahar bharii gaaz ek vah girii puunchh gayaa sinduur taar taar huii chunarii aur ham ajaan se  duur ke makaan se paalakii liye huye kahaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzarthreedots  svapan jhade phuul se miit chubhe shul se lut gaye shrringaar sabhii baag ke babuul se aur ham khade khade bahaar dekhate rahe kaaravaan guzar gaya gubbaar dekhate rahe

Title: college kaa ik ladakaa hai aur college kii ik ladakii
Lyrics: tum ko pataa hai tum ko pataa hai is college ke ik ladake aur ladakii men kyaa naam hai un kaa tum ko bataa detaa huun lekin dekho yaani samajhii uff o hadh hai kaan men bolo sach haan bilakul sach hai  nain mile aur unake dil men ik chingaarii bhadakii pyaar kaa chakkar hai ye hai na dekho kisii se na kahanaa  vo ladakaa aur ye ladakii koii maan nahiin sakataa hai kab kyaa ho jaataa hai koii jaan nahiin sakataa hai  ladake ne sochaa aur bolaa aaj nahiin vo aaii pyaar kaa chakkar hai ye hai na threedots  ab to dekhen kyaa ho bhaiyaa kyaa kyaa gul khilate hain  ladake kii dhun men ladakii bhii aisii hai pagalaaii hindii kii kakshhaa men bhaiyaa  english book  le aaii kyon ki pyaar kaa chakkar hai ye hai na threedots  kal jab ladakaa college aayaa ladakii bhii saath aaii achchhaa main ne puuchhaa ye sab kyaa hai kyaa bole vo bolenge kyaa ladkaa kaafii jhenp gayaa aur ladakii bhii sharamaayii  jab se donon ek hue hain ye hotaa hai aksar ladakii kaa jab naam pukaaraa ladakaa bolaa  yes sir  pyaar kaa chakkar hai ye hai na threedots

Title: mujh saa na de zamaane ko parawaradigaar dil
Lyrics: mujh saa na de zamaane ko parawaradigaar dil maashuuqedilfareb kaa dil beqaraar dil  mashahuur ho gaii hai jiyaarat shahiid kii naaqaam aarazuu kaa banaa hai mazaar dil  nikale merii bagal se wo aisii tadap ke saath yaad aa gayaa mujhe wahiin beiktiyaar dil  usane kahaa ki sabr badhegaa rakiib kaa le aur beqaraar ho ai beqaraar dil

Title: thaa thaii thatha thaii aththathaii thaii that
Lyrics: tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that  phirake pag jiyaa gaaye gaaye gaaye  tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that  jaane na hua mujhe kyaa phirake pag jiyaa gaaye gaaye gaaye  tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that   mahakii rahon tak bahakatii chhaahon tak  piyaa kii baahon taq mujhe hai jaanaa  ghata aaye jhuk jhuk ke havaa chale ruk ruk ke  kare dil dhuk dhuk re gaalii maare tan  o jaane na hua mujhe kyaa phirake pag jiyaa gaaye gaaye gaaye  tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that   na soii akhiyaan re rulaaye ratiyaan re  sataaye sakhiyaan re karuun hai main kya  zaraa balakhaake aa jaraa ghabaraake aa  zaraa laharaake aa dil hai pyas  o jaane na hua mujhe kya phirake pag jiyaa gaaye gaaye gaaye  tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that   kah do sitaaron se kah do bahaaron se  kah do nazaron se hamen vo dekhen na  rijhaauungii pii ko manaauungii pii ko  sulaauungii pii ko bichhaake nainaa  o jaane na hua mujhe kya phirake pag jiyaa gaaye gaaye gaaye  tha thai thatha thai aththathai thai that
