Title: tum judaa hokar hamen aur pyaare ho gaye
Lyrics: tum judaa hokar hamen aur pyaare ho gaye the qariib to duur the ab hamaare ho gaye  ek ek saanson men yaad banake mahakatii ho tum ai ho kahiin ho khafaa phir bhii mujh men dhadakatii ho tum dhuundhataa hai pyaar kaa raasataa aaj bhii tum judaa   threedots  duur ho to lagaa merii aankhon kii tum pyaas the hogaa pataa ye kahaan tum mere is qadar paas the dar nahiin raat kaa merii palakon pe juganuu puuche saath ab tum nahiin mere saath aarazuu to hai tum judaa   threedots  kyaa kahen kis tarah tuutakar rah gaii har qasam ye vaqt kaa hai sitam bevafaa the na tun aur na ham kyaa khabar thii hamen pyaar men hongii majabuuriyaan jitane ham the qariib utanii nazadiik thii duuriyaan tum judaa   threedots

Title: ek chamelii ke mandave tale
Lyrics: dono ek chamelii ke mandave tale2         maikade se zaraa duur us mod par2         do badan pyaar kii aag men jal gaye         ek chameli threedots 2 rafii  pyaar harfevafaa pyaar unakaa kudaa2         pyaar unakii chitaa aa aa  aa aa dono do badan pyaar kii aag men jal gaye2         ek chameli threedots 2  dono os men bhiigate chaandanii men nahaate hue2         jaise do taazaaruu taazaadam phuul pichhale pahar 2         thandii thandii subukruu chaman kii havaa2         sar pe maatam huii 3 rafii  kaalii kaalii laton se lipat garm ruksaar par         ek pal ke liye ruk gayii  dono do badan pyaar kii aag men jal gaye2         ek chameli threedots 2          aa aa  dono hamane dekhaa unhen din men aur raat men         nuurozulmaat men         hamane dekhaa unhen         hamane dekhaa unhen threedots zulmaat  men rafii  masjidon kii miinaaron ne dekhaa unhen aashaa mandiron ke kivaadon ne dekhaa unhen rafii  maikade kii daraadon ne dekhaa unhen         dekhaa unhen2  dono do badan pyaar kii aag men jal gaye2         ek chameli threedots 2          aa aa  dono ye bataa chaaraagar terii zambiil men terii zambiil men          ye bataa chaaragar          ye bataa chaaraagar terii zambiil men terii zambiil men rafii  nuskaaekiimiyaaemuhabbat bhii hai aashaa nuskaaekiimiyaaemuhabbat bhii hai rafii  kuchh ilaajomadaavaaeulfat bhii hai          ulfat bhii hai 2  dono  do badan pyaar kii aag men jal gaye 2         ek chameli threedots 2

Title: jab jab duniyaa tadapaaegii mohabbat badhatii jaaegii
Lyrics: ho threedots jab jab pyaar pe paharaa huaa hai pyaar aur bhii gaharaa 4 huaa hai do pyaar karane valon ko ho ho ho  and a bottle of rum  jab jab duniyaa tadapaaegii mohabbat badhatii jaaegii ho kuchh bhii karale duniyaa ye na mit paaegii mohabbat badhatii jaaegii  baadal ko barasane se bijalii ko chamakane se koi bhii rok naa paaegaa 2 phuulon ko mahakane se bulabul ko chahakane se koi bhii rok naa paaegaa 2 jab jab ulfat kii raahon men duniyaa diivaar uthaaegii mohabbat badhatii jaaegii 2  is dil kii yaadon ko mahabuub ke vaadon ko koi kyaa baandhe zanjiiron se 2 chaahat ke khazaano ko nazaron ke fasaano ko koi paa naa sake jaagiiron se jab jab duniyaa dilavaalon ko  diivaaron me chunavaaegii mohabbat badhatii jaaegii 2

Title: raam terii gangaa mailii ho gaii paapiyonke paapa dhote dhote
Lyrics: suno to gangaa ye kyaa sunaae ke mere tatapara jo loga aae jinhonne aise niyam banaae ke praana jaae para vachana na jaae gangaa hamaari kahe baata ye rote rote  raam terii gangaa mailii ho gaii paapiyonke paapa dhote dhote       hama usa deshake vaasii hain jisa deshame gangaa bahatii rishhiyonke sanga rahanevaalii patitonke sanga rahatii naa to hothonpe sachchaaii nahii dilame safaaii karake gangaako kharaab dete gangaakii duhaaii kare kyaa bichaarii ise apanehii loga dubote threedots  raam terii gangaa mailii ho gai paapiyonke paapa dhote dhote       vahii hai dharatii vahii hai gangaa badale hai gangaavaasii sabake haath lahu se range hain mukha ujale mana kaale diye vachana bhulaake jhuuthii saugandha khaake apanii aatmaa giraake chalen sarako uthaake aba to ye paapii gangaa jalasebhii shuddha na hote threedots  raam terii gangaa mailii ho gai paapiyonke paapa dhote dhote

Title: terii mahafil teraa jalvaa terii suurat dekh lii
Lyrics: terii mahafil teraa jalvaa terii suurat dekh lii merii aankhon ne isii duniyaa men jannat dekh lii terii mahafil teraa jalvaa threedots  ai merii jaanetamannaa ai merii jaanevafaa pyaar kii manzil dikhaa dii tuune teraa shukriyaa tere dar pe muskuraatii main ne qismat dekh lii merii aankhon ne isii duniyaa men jannat dekh lii terii mahafil teraa jalvaa threedots  ek dil aur us pe laakhon girane vaalii bijaliyaan ye javaanii ye adaayen ye tadap ye shokhiyaan sar se lekar paanv tak main ne qayaamat dekh lii merii aankhon ne threedots terii mahafil teraa jalvaa threedots  umr bhar zindaa rahuungaa main sahaare par tere zindagii apanii lutaa dungaa ishaare par tere main ne terii mast nazaron men muhabbat dekh lii merii aankhon ne threedots terii mahafil teraa jalvaa threedots

Title: ni sa ga ma pa ni sa re ga aa aa re mitavaa
Lyrics: nii sa ga ma pa nii sa re ga aa aa re mitavaa janam janam se hain ham to pyaase aa sang mere gaa nii sathreedots  sapanaa dekhen mere khoye khoye nainaa mitavaa mere aa tuu bhii siikh le sapane dekhanaa  2 aa nii sa nii dha pa ma ga re sa nii sathreedots  jaane na tuu gam kii gaharaaiyaan aajaa kat jaayen merii tanahaaiyaan  2 aa bhii jaa barasaa de priit kaa saavan barason ke jalate man kii bujh jaaye agan  2 aa re sa nii sa nii dha pa dha pa ma pa ma ga re sa nii sathreedots  ga pa dha nii da ga pa dha nii dha nii dha pa ga pa dha nii da sa ga pa dha dha nii sa dha nii pa dha nii pa dha ga ma dha pa dha  nii pa re nii pa ga sa nii sa nii sa pa dha nii dha ga ma pa ga ma re sa  nii sathreedots nii sa ga ma pa nii sa re ga aa aa aa

Title: main unhen chheduun aur kuchh na kahen
Lyrics: main unhen chheduun aur kuchh na kahe chal nikalate jo may piye hote  kahar ho yaa balaa ho jo kuchh ho kaash ki tum mere liye hote  merii qisamat men gam gar itanaa thaa dil bhii yaa rab kaii diye hote  aa hii jaataa vo raah par gaalib koii din aur bhii jiye hote

Title: biite na biite na rainaa
Lyrics: biite na biite na rainaa kore hain niind se nainaa naino ke sapane bhii guunge aaye to bole na bainaa biite na biite na rainaa   threedots  maaruu men udatii hain paagal havaaen maaruu akele na jaanaa retii ke dheron ke udate babuule retii men ghar na banaanaa biite na biite na rainaa   threedots  raaton ke pannon pe na koii saayaa na koii sangii na saathii aangan men utare na subah ke paakhii na koii saajan na saaqii biite na biite na rainaa   threedots

Title: pyaar kabhii naa todenge
Lyrics: pyaar kabhii naa todenge   saath kabhii naa chhodenge   kaun hamen rokegaa bolo   kaun hamen jiitegaa bolo   gorii tum ne jab se dil jiitaa   pyaar kabhi naa todenge  saath kabhii naa chhodenge  kaun hamen rokegaa bolo  kaun hamen jiitegaa bolo  gorii tum ne jab se dil jiitaa    paayaliyaa kii chhamchham se chuudiyon kii khankhan se   man bhii tan bhii sab kuchh hai jiitaa  pyaar mile naa chorii se bholii bhaalii gorii se  jo dil men bas jaayegaa jo mujh ko bhaa jayegaa  wahii churaa le jayegaa dil ko   sone kii juutii paanvon men pahanaa duun  hiiron kaa kangan terii baanhon men pahanaa duun  motii lutaa duun musakaan ke piichhe main   palaken bichhaa duun tere qadamon ke niiche main   hiiremotii kaa kyaa karanaa hai re   daulat ke piichhe main naa jaauun re   dil bhii bichhaa duun raanii ek baar tuu jo bole   jaan bhii lutaa duun raanii ek baar tuu jo bole   pyaar kabhi naa todenge  saath kabhii naa chhodenge  gorii tum ne jab se dil jiitaa paayaliyaa kii chhamchham se chuudiyon kii khankhan se  man bhii tan bhii sab kuchh hai jiitaa    kaisii phans gaii mushkil men do hain majanuun ek huun main   ek myaan men do talawaar kaise kar luun shaamil main   jo hai merii saanson men dil usako hii duungii main   rahataa huun terii aankhon men   main bhii huun terii saanson men   sun mere hamadam mere dil kii saragam kuchh samajho bhii tum   ab sochosamajho tum diivaano dil kii baaten dil se jaano   dil kii ye baaten saarii tum hii sikhaanaa ham ko   raahen mohabbat kii bhii tum hii dikhaanaa ham  ko   pyaar kabhi naa todenge  saath kabhii naa chhodenge  gorii tum ne jab se dil jiitaa paayaliyaa kii chhamchham se chuudiyon kii khankhan se  man bhii tan bhii sab kuchh hai jiitaa  dil bhii bichhaa duun raanii ek baar tuu jo bole  jaan bhii lutaa duun raanii ek baar tuu jo bole  pyaar mile naa chorii se bholiibhaalii gorii se jo dil men bas jaayegaa jo mujh ko bhaa jayegaa vahii churaa le jayegaa dil ko  pyaar kabhi naa todenge  saath kabhii naa chhodenge  paayaliyaa kii chhamchham se chuudiyon kii khankhan se

Title: naa jaane kyon main bekaraar dil men lie dardeintazaar
Lyrics: naa jaane kyon main bekaraar dil men lie dardeintazaar baithaa huun us raah men jo merii manzil nahiin  kahatii hai raat ye hans hans ke mujhase koii vahaan nahiin aaegaa chal shaayad koii mil jaae kahiin pe soyii huii galiyon se nikal shaayad koii diipak jale chuudii baje paradaa hate aur koii khidakii khul jaae kab naa jaane kyon main threedots  dhadakan sunuun to lagataa hai aisaa jaise kahe mujhase teraa pyaar gardan jhukaa aur kar le nazaaraa tujhamen sajii hai tasviireyaar tanhaaii kii ghadiyaan na gin aisaa bhii kyaa nikale naa din naa merii jaan aisii koii raat nahiin naa jaane kyon main threedots

Title: meraa pyaar haar gayaa haay re
Lyrics: ro rahii hain hasaraten milanaa bahut dushvaar hai is taraf main us taraf tuu darmiyaan diivaar hai  meraa pyaar haar gayaa haay re maangii kushii duhkh paaye re koii kahaan ab jaaye re meraa pyaar haar gayaa haay re  baras rahii hain aankhon se   chham chham bin baadal barasaaten ojhal ho gayaa chaand nazar se naagin ban gaii raaten haay naagin ban gaii raaten dil baar baar ghabaraaye re maangii kushii duhkh paaye re koii kahaan ab jaaye re meraa pyaar haar gayaa haay re  bepar huun main paas tumhaare kaise ud kar jaauun sar takaraa kar is pinjare se main naa kahiin mar jaauun haay main naa kahiin mar jaauun royen nain chain nahiin aaye re maangii kushii duhkh paaye re koii kahaan ab jaaye re meraa pyaar haar gayaa haay re

Title: jaao chamakaa subah kaa sitaaraa
Lyrics: jaao oh  jaao chamakaa subah kaa sitaaraa 2 phir judaaii ne aake pukaaraa jaao chamakaa threedots  dekh lo hamako jii bhar ke dilabar 2 kal na palate kahiin ye muqaddar 2 phir na mumakin ho aanaa dubaaraa jaao chamakaa threedots  prem ke phuul ek din khilenge 2 yaan na mil paae to vaan milenge 2 premiyon ko yahii hai sahaaraa jaao chamakaa threedots  aate rahate hain tuufaan baraabar 2 kyon ubalataa nahiin prem saagar 2 duub jaayen to paaen kinaaraa jaao chamakaa threedots

Title: ham bhuul gaye har baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule
Lyrics: ham bhuul gaye har baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule 2 kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule ham bhuul gaye har baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule  bachapan ke ham saathii donon sadaa rahe hain saath ek hii sapanaa dekhen jaise do aankhen dinraat do aankhen dinraat duniyaa ne kahii sau baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule  kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule ham bhuul gaye har baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule  haay re majabuurii dil ke bhed na dil ne khole apane ghar ko jalate dekhaa munh se kuchh na bole munh se kuchh na bole ham jalate rahe re dinraat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule  kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath kyaakyaa huaa dil ke saath magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule ham bhuul gaye har baat magar teraa pyaar nahiin bhuule

Title: na bol pii pii more anganaa panchhii jaa jaa re jaa
Lyrics: na bol pii pii more anganaa panchhii jaa jaa re jaa  rut alabelii aa gayii aur kaarii badariyaa chhaa gayii lo chhaa gayii panchhii teraa ho buraa kyon aag lagaane aa gayaa tuu maan meraa kahanaa bairii dil ko na jalaa panchhii jaa jaa re jaa threedots  main huun akelii baanvarii aur saath nahiin more saanvare more saanvare saajan bin tarasaa karuun main haay akelii kyaa karuun sun thes laage dil pe haaye vo gaanaa tuu na gaa panchhii jaa jaa re jaa threedots

Title: tumase milaa thaa pyaar
Lyrics: lataa tumase milaa thaa pyaar kuchh achchhe nasiib the ham un dinon amiir the jab tum qariib the  lataa tumase milaa thaa pyaar kuchh achchhe nasiib the ham un dinon amiir the jab tum qariib the  raajesh roshan suno zariin zindagii sirf amrrit hii nahiin zahar bhii hai aur phir zaraa socho to  lataa sochaa tha may hai zingagii aur zindagii kii may 2 pyaalaa hataake pyaalaa hataake terii hathelii se pienge  wo kwaahishen ajiib thiin sapane ajiib the tumase milaa thaa pyaar threedots  raa ro ye sab to thiik hai lekin main ek baat puuchhataa huun  lataa puuchhenge ek baar kabhii ham tumase ruuthakar 2 ham mar gae ham mar gae agar to aap kaise jienge  kishor wo kwaahishen ajiib thiin sapane ajiib the jiine ko tere pyaar kii daulat milii to thii jab tum nahiin the un dinon ham bhii gariib the  ki la  tumase milaa thaa pyaar kuchh achchhe nasiib the ham un dinon amiir the jab tum qariib the

Title: hamane dekhaa pyaar men
Lyrics: hamane dekhaa pyaar men do nainon kii maar men milane men vo mazaa kahaan hai jo hai intazaar men  rastaa takane vaalaa tuu kyon baithaa majabuur hai bhuul jaanaa vaadaa ye duniyaa ka dastuur hai halachal sii rahane de dilebeqaraar men  dil to ye kahataa hai ki aane vaalaa aayegaa aankhen ye kahatii hain ae dil tuu dhokhaa khaayegaa aisaa hii hotaa hai dono ke taqaraar men

Title: honthon se gulfishaan hain vo aankhon se ashqbaar ham
Lyrics: honthon se gulfishaan hain vo aankhon se ashqbaar ham saavan se vo hain bekhabar begaanaaebahaar ham  arsh kii ye bulandiyaan farsh kii bastiyon se hai un ka guruur dekh kar ban gaye khaaqsaar ham honthon se gulfishaan hain vo threedots  paravaanaa jaa ke jab giraa sholaa to kaanp kaanp uthaa us pe na kuchh asar huaa jis pe hue nisaar ham honthon se gulfishaan hain vo threedots  pii hai kisii kii bazm men itanii ki phir na uth sake hoshohavaas kuchh nahiin kitane hain hoshiyaar ham honthon se gulfishaan hain vo threedots

Title: ye galiyaan ye chaubaaraa yahaan aanaa na dobaaraa
Lyrics: ye galiyaan ye chaubaaraa yahaan aanaa na dobaaraa ab ham to bhae paradesii ke teraa yahaan koii nahiin le jaa rangbirangii yaaden hansane rone kii buniyaaden mere haathon men bhariibharii chuudiyaan mujhe bhaa gaii harii harii chuudiyaan dekh milatii hain terimerii chuudiyaan tuune piisii vah mehandii rang laii morii gorii  havelii rach aaii terii aankh kyon laado bhar aaii tere baar  bhii bajegii shahanaaii saavan men baadal se kahanaa parades men terii bahanaa aa maan  milane  chale ham pardesh tere aangan men apanaa bachapan chhod chale kal bhii suuraj nikalegaa kal bhii panchhii gaaenge sab tujhako dikhaaii denge par ham na nazar aaenge aanchal men sajaa lenaa ham ko sapanon men bulaa lenaa ham ko dekh tuu na hamen bhulaanaa maano duur hamen hai jaanaa merii alhad sii anakhaliyaan  sadaa palakon men basaanaa jab bajane lagen baaje gaaje lagane lagen khaaliikhaalii us din tuu samajhanaa merii dolii uthii hai phuulon vaalii thode din ye naate the kabhii ham hansate gaate the

Title: dekh lo aavaaz dekar paas apane paaoge
Lyrics: dekh lo aavaaz dekar paas apane paaoge  aaoge tanhaa magar tanhaa nahiin tum jaaoge   1 dur rahakar bhii tumhiin pe rahatii hai apanii najar  baahon men ham thaam lenge jab bhi thokar khaaoge dekh lo threedots  2 lenaa badale men tumhaare gar khudaaii bhii mile  chhod denge do jahaan ko jab bhi tum faramaaoge dekh lo threedots  3 bevafaaii bhii karo to maaf kar denge tumhen  ham na vaadon se phirenge tum agar phir jaaoge dekh lo threedots

Title: chalo tumane kisii ke saath ye ulfat nibhaaii to
Lyrics: chalo tumane kisii ke saath ye ulfat nibhaaii to meraa dil tod kar tumane naii duniyaa basaaii to  mujhe itanaa bataao kyaa tumhaaraa dil nahiin tadapaa merii tasaviir apanii mez se tumane hataaii to  nayaa mausam hazaaron rang kushiyon ke bikheregaa karoge kyaa agar aise men merii yaad aaii to  ye maanaa apane chehare par sajaayaa hai nayaa cheharaa kisii suurat magar tumane mujhe suurat dikhaaii to

Title: ye kaisii adaayen hain unakii adaayen
Lyrics: startsong  ye kaisii adaaen hain unakii adaaen ke dil ko bhii toden nazar bhii na aaen  ye dil jo lagaayaa badii chot khaaii jafaa tumane kii aur mujhe shamr aaii mujhe le na duube ye merii khataaen ye kaisii adaaen   threedots  vahii aasamaan hai vahii chaand taare magar tum nahiin vo na vaade tumhaare ye kis jumr kii mil rahii hain sazaaen ye kaisii adaaen   threedots

Title: dam maaro dam mit jaaye gam bolo subah shaam
Lyrics: dam maaro dam  mit jaae gam  bolo subah shaam  hare krishhnaa hare raam  duniyaa ne ham ko diyaa kyaa duniyaa se ham ne liyaa kyaa ham sab kii paravaah karen kyuun  sab ne hamaaraa kiyaa kyaa aa threedots dam maaro dam threedots  chaahe jiyenge marenge duniyaa se ham naa darenge hamako naa roke zamaanaa jo chaahenge ham karenge aa threedots dam maaro dam threedots  i love you   daba daba daba daba daba daba daba dab    aashaa kyaa threedots khushii kyaa gam  jab tak hai dam men dam are o threedots kash pe kash lagaate jaao he threedots galiyon men jhuumo sadakon pe ghuumo duniyaa kii khuub karo sair uushaa hare raamaa hare krishhnaa hare krishhnaa hare raamaa   aashaa aa aa threedots diivaane ham  jab tak hai dam men dam are o threedots kash pe kash lagaate jaao gore hon yaa kaale  apane hain saare duniyaa men koi nahiin gair uushaa hare raamaa hare krishhnaa hare krishhnaa hare raamaa

Title: dariichaa besadaa koii nahiin hai
Lyrics: wo karen bhii to kin alfaaz men shiqawaa teraa jinako terii nigahelutf ne barabaad kiyaa  dariichaa besadaa koii nahiin hai agarache bolataa koii nahiin hai  rukuun to manzilen hi manzilen hain chaluun to raastaa koii nahiin hai  khulii hain khidakiyaan har ghar kii lekin galii men jhaankataa koii nahiin hai  kisii se aashnaa aisaa huaa huun mujhe pahachaanataa koii nahiin hai  main aise jamaghate men kho gayaa huun jahaan mere siwaa koii nahiin hai

Title: biitii na bitaaii rainaa
Lyrics: lataa biitii na bitaaii rainaa birahaa kii jaaii rainaa bhiigii huii ankhiyon ne laakh bujhaaii rainaa  biitii huii batiyaan koii doharaaye bhuule hue naamon se koii to bulaaye chaand threedots chaand threedots ho o  o  bhupindar o chaand kii bindii vaalii bindii vaalii ratiyaa jaagii huii ankhiyon men raat na aaii rainaa biitii na bitaaii rainaa birahaa kii jaaii rainaa biitii na bitaaii rainaa   bhupindar yug aate hain aur yug jaaen chhotii chhotii yaadon ke  lataa pal nahiin jaaen jhuuth se kaalii laage laage kaalii ratiyaa ruuthii huiin ankhiyon ne laakh manaaii rainaa  lataa bhupindar biitii na bitaaii rainaa birahaa kii jaaii rainaa biitii na bitaaii rainaa

Title: tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo
Lyrics: tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo 2   bhaarat maataa ke karawaarii  tum saajan pe main balihaarii  2 ran men dhuum machaavo re baalam 2 tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo   jaavo nahiin tum holii khelo dukhsukh jo kuchh ho sab sah lo  2 lekin desh bachaavo re baalam 2 tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo   raah tumhaarii takaa kauungii aaj isii aashaa pe jiyuungii  2 jiit ke ghar ko aavo re baalam 2  tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo  tum jaavo tum jaavo re baalam tum jaavo tum jaavo

Title: bahaaron meraa jiivan bhii sanvaaron bahaaron
Lyrics: bahaaron meraa jiivan bhii sanvaaron bahaaron koi ae kahin se yun pukaro baharon threedots  tumhiin se dil ne sikhaa hai tadapanaa  2 tumhiin ko doshh duungii ai nazaaron bahaaron threedots   sajaao koii kajaraa laao gajaraa  2 lachakatii daaliyon tum phuul vaaro bahaaron threedots   rachaao mere in hathon men mehandii  2 sajaao maang merii yaa sidhaaro bahaaron threedots  na jaane kis kaa saayaa dil se guzaraa 2 zaraa aavaaz denaa raazadaaro bahaaro threedots

Title: kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye
Lyrics: kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye  2 phir sochaa ke kaamosh rahen rah nahiin paaye kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye  samajhaa naa meraa gam koii is baat kaa gam hai phir bhii mere dil tujhako wafaaon kii qasam hai aankhon men ho aansuu bhii magar bah nahiin paaye kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye  phuulon se chaman aasamaan taaron se bharaa hai ummiid kaa daaman meraa kaaron se bharaa hai qisamat ne sitam aise kiye sah nahiin paaye  kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye phir sochaa ke kaamosh rahen rah nahiin paaye kahane ko bahut kuchh thaa magar kah nahiin paaye

Title: bahaaron se kah do mere ghar na aayen
Lyrics: bahaaron se kah do mere ghar na aayen zamaanaa hai unakaa unhiin ko hansaayen bahaaron se kah do mere ghar na aayen  lagii aag dil men barasataa hai paanii 2 dilegamazadaa kii ajab hai kahaanii wahii jab nahiin hain to kisako sunaayen 2 bahaaron se kah do mere ghar na aayen  wo cheharaa sunaharaa wo chaandii kii baanhen 2 sabhii kuchh wohii hai nahiin wo nigaahen ke badalaa jo mausam to badaliin adaayen 2 bahaaron se kah do mere ghar na aayen

Title: bhiigii bhiigii raaton men miithii miithii baaton men
Lyrics: kishor	bhiigii bhiigii raaton men miithii miithii baaton men aisii barasaato men kaisaa lagataa hai  lataa aisaa lagataa hai tum banake baadal mere badan ko bhigoke mujhe chhed rahe ho o chhed rahe ho   2 	 lataa ambar khele holii uii maan bhiigii morii cholii hamajolii hamajolii   2 o paanii ke is rele men saavan ke is mele men chhat pe akele men kaisaa lagataa hai  kishor	aisaa lagataa hai tu banake ghataa apane sajan ko bhigoke khel khel rahii ho o khel rahii ho 	 lataa aisaa lagataa hai tum banake baadal mere badan ko bhigoke mujhe chhed rahe ho ho chhed rahe ho 	 kishor	barakhaa se bachaa luun tujhe  siine se lagaa luun   aa chhupaa luun aa chhuupaa luun   2 dil ne pukaaraa dekho rut kaa ishaaraa dekho uf ye nazaaraa dekho kaisaa lagataa hai bolo  lataa aisaa lagataa hai kuchh ho jaayegaa  mast pavan ke ye jhoken sainyaa dekh rahe ho o dekh rahe ho aisaa lagataa hai tum banake baadal mere badan ko bhigoke mujhe chhed rahe ho ho chhed rahe ho

Title: taskiin ko ham naa royen jo zauqenazar mile
Film: the one and only malika pukhraj nonfilm
Lyrics: taskiin ko ham naa royen jo zauqenazar mile 2 huuraanekuld men terii suurat magar mile 2  apanii galii men mujhako na kar dafn baadeqatl 2 mere pate se kalq ko kyuun teraa ghar mile 2  saaqiigarii kii sharm karo aaj varanaa ham 2 har shab piyaa hii karate hain may jis qadar mile 2  tujhase to kuchh kalaam nahiin lekin ai nadiim meraa salaam kahiyo agar naamaabar mile

Title: ek hii baat zamaane kii kitaabon men nahiin
Lyrics: ek hii baat zamaane kii kitaabon men nahiin jo gamedost me nashaa hai sharaabon men nahiin  husn kii bhiik na maangenge na jalawon kii kabhii ham faqiiron se milo khul ke hijaabon men nahiin  har jagah phirate hain aawaaraa kayaalon kii tarah ye alag baat hai ham aapake kwaabon men nahiin  na dubo saagaromiinaa men ye gam ai faaqir ke maqaam inakaa dilon men hai sharaabon men nahiin

Title: suramaii shaam ke ujaalon se
Lyrics: suramaii shaam ke ujaalon se jab bhii saj dhaj ke raat aatii hai bewafaa beraham o bedardii jaane kyuun terii yaad aatii hai  is jawaanii ne kyaa sazaa paaii reshamii sej haay tanhaaii shok jazbaat le hain angadaaii aankhen bojhal hain niind harajaaii terii tasviir terii parachhaaii de ke aawaaz phir bulaatii hai  aaj bhii lamhe wo muhabbat ke garm saanson se lipate rahate hain ab bhii aramaan terii chaahat ke mahakii zulfon men simate rahate hain tujhako bhuulen to kaise bhuulen bas yahii soch ab sataatii hai  wo bhii kyaa din the jab ke ham donon marane jiine kaa waadaa karate the jaam ho zahar kaa yaa amarit ka saath piine kaa waadaa karate the ye bhii kyaa din hain kyaa qayaamat hai gam to gam hai kushii bhii khaatii hai

Title: bedardii baalamaa tujhako meraa man yaad karataa hai
Lyrics: bedardii baalamaa tujhako meraa man yaad karataa hai barasataa hai jo aankhon se vo saavan yaad karataa hai  kabhii ham saath guzare jin sajiilii rahaguzaaron se fizaa ke bhes men girate hain ab patte chanaaron se ye raahen yaad karatii hain ye gulashan yaad karataa hai  koii jhonkaa havaa kaa jab meraa aanchal udaataa hai gumaan hotaa hai jaise tuu meraa daaman hilaataa hai kabhii chuumaa thaa jo tuune vo daaman yaad karataa hai  vo hii hain jhiil ke mandar vo hii kiranon ki barasaaten jahaan ham tum kiyaa karate the paharon pyaar kii baaten tujhe is jhiil kaa kaamosh darapan yaad karataa hai

Title: madiine ko jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai
Lyrics: madiine ko jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai muqaddar banaayen ye jii chaahataa hai  madiine ke aaqaa do alam ke maulaa tere paas aayen ye jii chaahataa hai madiine ko jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai  jahaan donon aalam hain mahvetamannaa vahaan sar jhukaayen ye jii chaahataa hai madiine ko jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai  muhammad kii baaten muhammad kii siirat sune aur sunayen ye jii chaahataa hai madiine ko jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai

Title: dastuur ibaadat kaa
Lyrics: printitle  dastuur ibaadat kaa duniyaa se niraalaa ho ik haath men maalaa ho ik haath men pyaalaa ho  puujenge saliiqe se andaaz magar apanaa ho yaadekhudaa dil men saaqii ne sambhaalaa ho  mastii bhii taqaddus bhii ek saath chale donon ik simt ho maikhaanaa ik simt shivaalaa ho  masjid kii taraf se tuu jaanaa na kabhii saaqii zaahid bhii kahiin teraa na chaahanevaalaa ho  voh duub kar mar jaayen madiraa kii suraahii men maashuq ne gar dil kii mahafil se nikaalaa ho   endsong

Title: chhupaii laakh muhabbat magar chhupaa na sake
Lyrics: chhupaii laakh muhabbat magar chhupaa na sake ham apane daag zamaane ko bhii dikhaa na sake  karishmaasaaziieulfat na puuchh ai hamdam qariib rahake bhii apana unhen banaa na sake  ye sozedil kii kalish hai ki hai junuun nusarat bhulaanaa laakh bhii chaahaa magar bhulaa na sake

Title: puraane din puraane pal puraane kwaab
Lyrics: puraane din puraane pal puraane kwaab jo piichhe chhuute hain yaad karo na miit nayaa sangiit nayaa koii giit nayii phir umang bharake aao milake gaao aaj gaao 2 puraane din puraane pal puraane kwaab sthaayii  judaa judaa hokar khoye hue ho kahaan 2 pyaar ke rangon se rang do ye saaraa jahaan 2 har dil hai apanaa kaun hai begaanaa mere hamadam bhulaa do tum giraa do diiwaaron ko jo khadii hain aaj hamaare biich nayaa sangiit nayaa koii giit nayii phir umang bharake aao milake gaao aaj gaao 1  dhiiraj chhodo naa gam se na haaro kabhii 2 jiinaa hai tumako hans ke jiyo zindagii 2 desh kaa har konaa kar do tum sonaa sunahare din sunahare pal sunahare kwaab jo dekhe the wo sach karane honge miit nayaa sangiit nayaa koii giit nayii phir umang bharake aao milake gaao aaj gaao 2  hinduu musalamaan sikh ho yaa kristaan 2 bhaarat maataa kii sabhii to hain santaan 2 sabakaa hai aramaan jaage hindustaan bhajan ke swar shabad ke paath ajaanon men hai jisakaa naam sikhaaii usane hamako priit nayaa sangiit nayaa koii giit nayii phir umang bharake aao milake gaao aaj gaao 3

Title: beshaq mandir masjid tode bulleshaah ye kahataa
Lyrics: beshaq mandir masjid tode bulleshaa ye kahataa  2 par pyaar bharaa dil kabhii na todothreedots is dil men dilavar rahataa jis palade men tule mohabbatthreedots jis palade men tule mohabbat usamen chaandii nahiin taulanaa taubaa merii naa dolanaa main nii bolanaa o nahiin bolanaa jaa main nahiin bolanaa jaa o main nahiin bolanaa jaa dolanaa main nii bolanaa taubaa merii na dolanaa main nii bolanaa  aag te ishq baraabar dono par paanii aag bujhaae  2 aashiq ke jab aansuu nikale aur agan lag jaae tere saamane baithake ronaathreedots o tere saamane baithake ronaa dil kaa dukhadaa nahiin tolanaa dolanaa main nii bolanaa o nahiin bolanaa jaa main nahiin bolanaa jaa ve main nahiin bolanaa jaa bolanaa main nii bolanaa taubaa merii na dolanaa main nii bolanaa ve main nahiin bolanaa o ve main nahiin bolanaa ve main nahiin bolanaa te main nahiin bolanaa nahiin bolanaa dolanaa main nii bolanaa nahiin bolanaa nahiin bolanaathreedots

Title: dil kii choton ne kabhii chain se rahane na diyaa
Lyrics: dil kii choton ne kabhii chain se rahane na diyaa jab chalii sard hawaa mainne tujhe yaad kiyaa  ye main sau jaan se tire tarzetaqallum ke nisaar phir to farmaaiye kyaa aapane irashaad kiyaa  isakaa ronaa nahiin kyon tumane kiyaa dil barabaad isakaa gam hai ki bahut der se barabaad kiyaa  itanaa maanuus huun fitarat se kalii jab chatakii jhuk ke mainne ye kahaa mujhase kuchh irshaad kiyaa  merii har saans hai is baat kii shaahid ai maut mainne har lutf ke mauqe pe tujhe yaad kiyaa  mujhako to hosh nahiin tumako kabar ho shaayad log kahate hain ki tumane mujhe barabaad kiyaa  kuchh nahiin isake siwaa josh hariifon kaa kalaam wasl ne shaad kiyaa hijr ne naashaad kiyaa

Title: dono javaanii kii mastii men chuur
Lyrics: dono javaanii kii mastii men chuur teraa qusuur na meraa qusuur na tuune signal dekhaa na main ne signal dekhaa  ham do anaadii na dekhaa agaadii na dekhaa pichhaadii patarii pe daal dii ye dil kii gaadii na tuune battii dekhii na main ne jhandii dekhii  raaheshabaab thii umrehijaab thii tuu benaqaab thii mausam kii bhii kuchh niiyat kharaab thii na tuune kataraa dekhaa na main ne kataraa dekhaa  are nukasaan saaraa to bharanaa padegaa ab pyaar hamako karanaa padegaa na tuune siitii maarii na main siitii maarii

Title: main duniyaa bhulaa duungaa terii chaahat men
Lyrics: main duniyaa bhulaa duungaa terii chaahat men  2 o dushman zamaanaa mujhe na bhulaanaa main khud ko mitaa duungaa terii chaahat men  main duniyaa bhulaa duungii terii chaahat men  2 teraa saath chhuutaa ye vaadaa jo tuutaa main khud ko mitaa duungii terii chaahat men main duniyaa bhulaa duungaa threedots  merii saansen terii kushabuu mere dil men terii dhadakan merii mahafil terii baaten merii aankhen tere darapan bin tere kuchh bhii nahiin main  2 main har gam uthaa luungii threedots main duniyaa bhulaa duungaa terii chaahat men  siine se lag jaa tuu main huun teraa diivaanaa mujhe tujhase milane se rokegaa kyaa zamaanaa choduungaa na saath teraa  2 main saba kuchh lutaa duungaa threedots

Title: ye dil ye paagal dil meraa kyon bujh gayaa aavaaragii
Lyrics: ye dil ye paagal dil meraa kyon bujha gayaa aavaaragii is dasht men ik shahar thaa vo kyaa huaa aavaaragii  kal shab mujhe beshakl sii aavaaz ne chaunkaa diyaa mainne kahaa tuu kaun hai usane kahaa aavaaragii  ik tuu ki sadiyon se mere hamraah bhii hamraaz bhii ik main ki tere naam se naaashnaa aavaaragii  ye dard kii tanahaaiyaan ye dasht kaa viiraan safar ham log to uktaa gaye apanii sunaa aavaaragii  ik ajanabii jhonke ne puuchhaa mere gam kaa sabab saharaa kii bhiigii ret mainne likhaa aavaaragii  le ab to dashteshab kii saarii vusaten sone lagiin ab jaaganaa hogaa hamen kab tak bataa aavaaragii  kal raat tanahaa chaand ko dekhaa thaa mainne kvaab men mohsin mujhe raas aayegii shaayad sadaa aavaaragii

Title: ye bahaaron kaa samaa chaand taaron kaa samaa
Lyrics: ye bahaaron kaa samaa chaand taaron kaa samaa  kho na jaaye aa bhi jaa ye bahaaron kaa samaa threedots   zindagaanii dard ban jaaye kahiin aisaa na ho  saans aahen sard ban jaaye kahiin aisaa na ho  dil tadap kar na  so na jaaye aa bhi jaa  ye bahaaron kaa samaa threedots   kyaa huaa kyon is tarah tune nigaahen pher liin  meri rahon kii taraf se apanii raahen pher liin  zindagii ka kaaravaan kho na jaaye aa bhi jaa  ye bahaaron kaa samaa threedots

Title: ek zaraa dil ke kariib aao to kuchh chain pade
Lyrics: ek zaraa dil ke kariib aao to kuchh chain pade jaam ko jaam se takaraao to kuchh chain pade  dil ulajhataa hai nagamaaomay rangiin sunakar giit ek dadr bharaa gaao to kuchh chain pade  baithe baithe to har mauj se dil dahalegaa badhake tuufaan se takaraao to kuchh chain pade  daag ke sher javaanii men bhale lagate hain mir kii koii gazal gaao to kuchh chain pade  yaadeayyaa men guzishtaan se ijaazat lekar tarz kuchh der ko so jaao to kuchh chain pade

Title: kar sakegaa na judaa tum ko kabhii ham se zamaanaa
Lyrics: baad muddat ke huaa duur andheraa gam kaa aaj se phir merii qismat kaa sitaaraa chamakaa  kar sakegaa na judaa tum ko kabhii ham se zamaanaa chal sakegaa na kisii kaa bhii koii ham pe bahaanaa  jo shart lagaayii thii huii vo aaj puurii ki huii aaj puurii sachchii hai muhabbat to rahe kaise adhuurii haan rahe kaise adhuurii pad ke duniyaa kii dhamakiyon men kahiin bhuul na jaanaa chal sakegaa na kisii kaa bhii threedots  o kaliyaan hain kahiin phuul kahiin chaand sitaare diivaanaa huaa jaataa hai dil pyaar ke maare aao phir gaayen gale mil ke muhabbat kaa taraanaa chal sakegaa na kisii kaa bhii threedots

Title: khoyii khoyii akhiyaan niind binaa
Lyrics: khoyii khoyii akhiyaan niind binaa dekh rahiin hain ek sapanaa khoyii khoyii akhiyaan niind binaa dekh rahiin hain ek sapanaa khoyii khoyii akhiyaan niind binaa threedots  jhuum jhuum ke bahaar merii sej bichhaaye ghadii ghadii kare ajab ishaare jhuum jhuum ke bahaar merii sej bichhaaye ghadii ghadii kare ajab ishaare sajdhaj ke main jaauun baithii baithii ghabaraauun gadii jaauun dekho laaj ke maare aate hii honge mere sajanaa khoyii khoyii threedots  aake mere man bhaaye meraa ghuunghataa uthaaye mose palak uthaaye uthe na aake mere man bhaaye meraa ghuunghataa uthaaye mose palak uthaaye uthe na merii maang ko vo chuum kare miithii miithii baat jhuume diip jhuume chaand jhuume rainaa aaj safal jiivan apanaa khoyii khoyii threedots  ek raat kii ye baat pahalii pahalii mulaaqaat piyaa meraa tan man ab teraa ek raat kii ye baat pahalii pahalii mulaaqaat piyaa meraa tan man ab teraa padii charanon men tere main ye man men manaauun aisii raat kaa kabhii na ho saveraa chaand mere ab mat chhupanaa khoyii khoyii threedots

Title: doston men koii baat chal jaatii hai
Lyrics: dil kii gaharaaiyon tak nazar jaatii hai tiir banakar jigar men utar jaatii hai  doston men koii baat chal jaatii hai 2 dostii dushmanii men badal jaatii hai doston men koii baat chal jaatii hai 2  raazedil ab chhupaane se kyaa faayadaa 2 is lagii ko bujhaane se kyaa faayadaa kyaa faayadaa aag bujh jaatii hai chiiz jal jaatii hai 2 dostii dushmanii men   kyaa huaa gar shikaayat kaa maukaa diyaa 2 sabane achchhaa kiyaa hamako dhokaa diyaa hamako dhokaa diyaa zindagii ladakhadaakar sambhal jaatii hai 2 dostii dushmanii men

Title: jyot se jyot jagaate chalo prem kii gangaa bahaate chalo
Lyrics: jyot se jyot jagaate chalo prem kii gangaa bahaate chalo raah men aae jo diin dukhii sabako gale se lagaate chalo  jisakaa na koii sangii saathii iishvar hai rakhavaalaa jo nirdhan hai jo nirbal hai vah hai prabhuu kaa pyaaraa pyaar ke motii lutaate chalo prem kii gangaathreedots  aashaa tuutii mamataa ruuthii chhuut gayaa hai kinaaraa band karo mat dvaar dayaa kaa de do kuchh to sahaaraa diip dayaa kaa jalaate chalo prem kii gangaathreedots  chhaai hai chhaaon aur andheraa bhatak gaii hain dishaaen maanav ban baithaa hai daanav kisako vyathaa sunaaen dharatii ko svarg banaate chalo prem kii gangaathreedots  jyot se jyot jagaate chalo prem kii gangaa bahaate chalo raah men aae jo diin dukhii sab ko gale se lagaate chalo prema kii gangaa bahaate chalo threedots  kaun hai uunchaa kaun hai niichaa sab men vo hii samaayaa bhed bhaav ke jhuuthe bharam men ye maanav bharamaayaa dharm dhvajaa phaharaate chalo prem kii gangaa threedots  saare jag ke kan kan men hai divya amar ik aatmaa ek brahm hai ek satya hai ek hii hai paramaatmaa praanon se praan milaate chalo prem kii gangaa threedots

Title: merii prem kii naiyaa chalii main akelii
Lyrics: ju merii prem kii naiyaa chalii main akelii premii tum aao ka ye kisane giit  gaayaa kahaan sunaao phir sunaao  ka tum manjhadhaar men binaa sahaare main huun duur kinaare aauun kaise paas tumhaare ju jyuun dariyaa saagar se milataa apanii baah pasaare tum aao paas hamaare do duniyaa ko tum man se bhuulo mujh men tum kho jaao aao premii tum aao  ju milan pyaas merii dindin men badhatii jaatii man men jo bujhe nahiin jiivan men ka milan niir bahataa hai nisadin premii ke nainan men tum dekho man darpan men do nainon hii nainon men apanii baat mujhe samajhaao aao premii tum aao

Title: saanvare rang raachii
Lyrics: saanvare rang raachii raanaa jii huun to baandh ghungharaa prem kaa huun to hari ke aage naachii saanvare rang raachii  ek nirakhat ek parakhat hai ek karat morii haasii aur log mhaaarii kaaiin kare sii huun to hari jii prabhu jii kii daasii saanvare rang raachii  raano vishh ko pyaalo bhejo huun to himmat kii kaachii miiraa charanaa naagar kii saanchii  saanvare rang raachii raanaa jii huun to baandh ghungharaa prem kaa huun to hari ke aage naachii saanvare rang raachii

Title: tere mere sapane ab ek rang hain
Lyrics: tere mere sapane ab ek rang hain ho jahaan bhii le jaaen raahen ham sang hain  tere mere dil kaa tay thaa ik din milanaa jaise bahaar aane par tay hai phuul kaa khilanaa o mere jiivan saathiithreedots  tere dukh ab mere mere sukh ab tere tere ye do nainaa chaand aur suuraj mere o mere jiivan saathiithreedots  laakh manaa le duniyaa saath na ye chhuutegaa aa ke mere haathon men haath na ye chhuutegaa o mere jiivan saathiithreedots

Title: chaandanii raat men chaand ke saamane rukh se paradaa hataanaa
Lyrics: chaandanii raat men chaand ke saamane rukh se paradaa hataanaa gazab ho gayaa chaandanii chhup gai chaand sharamaa gayaa 2 aapakaa muskaraanaa gazab ho gayaa chaandanii raat men chaand ke saamane ruk se paradaa hataanaa gazab ho gayaa  jhuum kar kaalii kaalii ghataa jab uthii raat apanii to karavat badalate katii     2 kuchh to mausam ne bechain rakhaa hamen kuchh teraa yaad aanaa gajab ho gayaa chaandanii raat men  apane hisse men tuufaan kii taqadiir thii zindagii apanii maujon kii zanjiir thii 2 duub jaane kaa apane hamen gam n thaa usakaa saahil pe aanaa gajab ho gayaa chaandanii raat men  chaandanii raat men chaand ke saamane ruk se paradaa hataanaa gazab ho gayaa chaandanii chhup gai chaand sharamaa gayaa 2 aapakaa muskaraanaa gazab ho gayaa chaandanii raat men chaand ke saamane ruk se paradaa hataanaa gazab ho gayaa

Title: na udaa yuun thokaron se merii kaakekabr zaalim
Lyrics: na udaa yuun thokaron se merii kaakekabr zaalim yahii ek rah gaii hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii  tujhe pahale hii kahaa thaa hai jahaan saraayefaanii dilebadanasiib tuune merii baat hii naa maanii  ye inaayat gazab kii ye balaa kii meharabaanii merii kairiyat bhii puuchhii kisii aur kii zabaanii

Title: tere husn kii kyaa taariif karuun kuchh kahate hue bhii darataa huun
Lyrics: rafii dhiime  tere husn kii kya taariif karuun  kuchh kahate hue bhi darataa huun   tej  tere husn kii kya taariif karuun  tere husn kii  tere husn kii kya taariif karuun  kuchh kahate hue bhi darataa huun  kahiin bhuul se tu na samajh baithe  kii main tujhase mohabbat karataa huun   lataa mere dil men kasak si hoti hai mere dil men mere dil men kasak si hoti hai  tere raah se jab main guzaratii huun  is baat se ye na samajh lenaa  kii main tujhase mohabbat karatii huun   rafii teri baat me giiton kii saragam  teri chaal me paayal kii chham chham   2 koi dekh le tujhako ek najar  2 mar jaaen teri aankhon kasam  main bhi huun ajab ik divaanaa  marataa huun na aahen bharataa huun  kahiin bhuul se tu na samajh baithe  kii main tujhase mohabbat karataa huun   dono aathreedots  lataa mere saamane jab tu ata hai  jii dhak se meraa ho jaataa hai   2 letii hai tamannaa angadaayii  2 dil jaane kahaan kho jaataa hai  mahasuus ye hota hai mujhako  jaise main tera dam bharatii huun  is baat se ye na samajh lenaa  kii main tujhase mohabbat karatii huun   rafii tere husn kii kya taariif karuun  kuchh kahate hue bhi darataa huun  kahiin bhuul se tu na samajh baithe  kii main tujhase mohabbat karataa huun

Title: chainyyaa chainyyaa
Lyrics: jinake sar ho ishq kii chhaanv paanv ke niiche jannat hogii jinake sar ho ishq kii chhaanv  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa  sare ishq kii chhaanv chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa chainyyaa  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa  vo yaar hai jo khushabuu kii tarah hai jisakii zubaan udruu kii tarah merii shaam raat merii qaayanaat vo yaar meraa sainyyaa sainyyaa  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa  gul posh kabhii itaraaye kahiin mahake to nazar aa jaaye kahiin taviiz banaake pahanuun use aayat kii tarah mil jaaye kahiin vo yaar hai jo iimaan kii tarah meraa nagamaa vahii meraa kalamaa vahii meraa nagamaa nagamaa meraa kalamaa kalamaa  yaar misaaleos chale paanv kii tale firadaus chale kabhii daal daal kabhii paat paat main havaa pe dhuundhuun usake nishaan  sare ishq kii chhaanv chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa   threedots  main usake ruup kaa saudaaii vo dhuup chhaanv saa harjaai vo shokh nazar badalataa hai main rang ruup kaa saudaaii  jinake sar ho ishq kii chhaanv paanv ke niiche jannat hogii jinake sar ho ishq kii chhaanv  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa  sare ishq kii chhaanv chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa chainyyaa paanv chalat chale chal chainyyaa  chal chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa chainyyaa

Title: ye terii aankhen jhukii jhukii
Lyrics: ye terii aankhen jhukii jhukii ye teraa cheharaa khilaa khilaa badii qisamat vaalaa hai vo pyaar teraa jise milaa ye terii aankhen jhukii jhukii   threedots  chhalakatii gaalon se laalii baduu tuu sharamohayaa vaalii honth tere puujaa ke phuul phuul kii naazuk tuu daalii ye terii aankhen jhukii jhukii   threedots  ksiii ke pyaare pyaare baal kisii kii pyaarii pyaarii chaal tuu sar se paanv talaq sundar tuu hai kudarat kaa koii kamaal ye terii aankhen jhukii jhukii   threedots

Title: chaand dekhaa yaad aaii suurat terii  aaj mahasuus ho rahii hai
Lyrics: chaand dekhaa yaad aaii suurat terii aaj mahasuus ho rahii hai zaruurat terii zaruurat terii duur hue yaad ho duur hue yaad aaii chaahat terii aaj mahasuus ho rahii threedots  dil se na jaae yaadon kaa mausam badii bekaraarii kaa meraa hai aalam badhane lagii mere dil kii lagii tujhe dhuundhatii hai merii zindagii aa lag jaa gale se mere hamasafar mere hamasafar duur hue yaad threedots  muhabbat ke dil men jalaake diye bas jii rahii huun main tere lie terii chaahaton ke ujaale lie andheron men tujhako pukaaraa kie aa baahon men le le o jaanejigar jaanejigar chaand dekhaa threedots

Title: ye shaam mastaanii madahosh kiye jaaye
Lyrics: ye shaam mastaanii madahosh kiye jaaye mujhe dor koii khiinche terii or liye jaaye  duur rahatii hai tuu mere paas aatii nahiin hothon pe tere kabhii pyaas aatii nahiin aisaa lage jaise ki tuu hansake zahar koii piye jaaye shaam mastaanii threedots  baat jab main karuun mujhe rok detii hai kyon terii miithii nazar mujhe tok detii hai kyon terii hayaa terii sharam terii qasam mere honth siye jaaye shaam mastaanii threedots  ek ruthii huii taqadiir jaise koii khaamosh aise hai tuu tasviir jaise koii terii nazar banake zubaan lekin tere paigaam diye jaaye  ye shaam mastaanii madahosh kiye jaaye mujhe dor koii khiinche terii or liye jaaye

Title: dulhan banii huii ab ke chaman men aaii hai
Lyrics: dulhan banii huii ab ke chaman men aaii hai  bahaar ho ke terii anjuman men aaii hai   to sajanaa aaye hain  dolii laye hain saheliyon ab to badhaao mori shaan taaron se mori maang bharo  3  aya hai koi lene mujhako baandh kar sar par seharaa  mere khyaalon ka gahanaa hai chaand saa usakaa cheharaa jag uthe hain aramaan taaron mori maang bharo  ho sajanaa aaye hain  dolii laaye hain saheliyon ab to badhaao mori shaan  taaron se mori maang bharo   maathaa bindiyaa se chamakaa do ankhiyon men bharado kajaraa  haath rachaa do mehandii se aur daalo gale men gajaraa  hogaa tumhaaraa ehasaan  taaron mori maang bharo ho sajanaa aaye hain  dolii laaye hain saheliyon ab to badhaao mori shaan taaron se mori maang bharo   mujhako vidaa karavaado sakhiyon  more maatpitaa se dur khadaa aansuu na bahaaye  kaha do ye bhaiyaa se main to thi mehamaan taaron se mori maang bharo  ho sajanaa aaye hain  dolii laaye hain saheliyon ab to badhaao mori shaan taaron se mori maang bharo   2

Title: ham se kyaa puuchhate ho dard kahaan hotaa hai
Lyrics: ham se kyaa puuchhate ho dard kahaan hotaa hai aap kaa tiir bataa degaa jahaan hotaa hai ham se kyaa puuchhate ho threedots  ye lagii aisii lagii hai ki pataa bhii naa lagaa aag lagane se bhii kuchh der dhuaan hotaa hai ham se kyaa puuchhate ho threedots  dil men jo dard hai tum us kii davaa mat dhuundho dard kam hone se ye dard javaan hotaa hai ham se kyaa puuchhate ho threedots

Title: chaand ko kyaa maaluum chaahataa hai use koii chakor
Lyrics: chaand ko kyaa maaluum chaahataa hai use koii chakor vo bechaaraa duur se dekhe  2 kare na koii shor  chaand ko kyaa maaluum threedots  duur se dekhe aur lalachaaye pyaas nazar kii badhatii jaaye badhatii jaaye badalii kyaa jaane hai paagal  kisake man kaa mor 			     chaand ko kyaa threedots  saath chale to saath nibhaanaa mere saathii bhuul naa jaanaa bhuul naa jaanaa maine tumhaare haath men de dii apanii jiivan dor chaand ko kyaa threedots

Title: aaye koii to baith bhii jaaye zaraa sii der
Lyrics: aae koii to beth bhii jaae zaraa sii der mushtaaqediid lutf uthaae zaraa sii der  thodaa saa hai qissaaegam vo sunaa to luun kaash un ko niind aur naa aae zaraa sii der  phirataa hai mere dil men koii harfemuddaa qaasid se kah do aur naa jaae zaraa sii der  tum ne tamaam umr jalaayaa hai daag ko kyaa lutf ho ki vo bhii jalaae zaraa sii der

Title: safar men dhuup to hogii jo chal sako to chalo
Lyrics: safar men dhuup to hogii jo chal sako to chalo sabhii hain bhiid men tum bhii nikal sako to chalo  kisiike vaasate raahen kahaan badalatii hain tum apane aap ko kud hii badal sako to chalo  yahaan kisiiko koii raasataa nahiin detaa mujhe giraake agar tum sambhal sako to chalo  yahii hai zindagii kuchh kaak chand ummiiden inhii khilaunon se tum bhii bahal sako to chalo

Title: balamaa maane naa
Lyrics: balamaa maane naa bairii chup na rahe laagii man kii kahe paa ke akelii mujhe morii bahiyaan dhare  jab jab palatuun gaagar bhar ke aa lat rah jaaye mukh pe bikhar ke baat kare aisii dil vaalaa tadape aur tadapaaye balamaa maane na threedots  ghuunghat daaruun nain churaauun ghabaraahat men raah na paauun vo baankaa rasiyaa matavaalaa sune na morii apanii hii kahe balamaa maane na threedots

Title: ab tere bin jii lenge ham zahar zindagii kaa pii lenge ham
Lyrics: ab tere bin ji lenge ham zahar zindagi kaa pi lenge ham kyaa huaa jo ek dil tuut gayaa kyaa huaa jo ek dil tuut gayaa threedots  ab tere bin ji lenge ham zahar zindagi ka pii lenge ham threedots  teri aashiqi bhi ye kyaa rang lai vafaa maine kii tuune kii bevafaai meri bhuul thii main ye kyaa chahataa thaa kisii bevafaa se vafaa chahataa thaa tu jane kyaa beqaraarii bedard bemuravvat jaa sangadil hasinaa dekhii teri muhabbat ab maine jaanaa tujhako beraham threedots ab tere bin ji lenge ham zahar zindagi ka pii lenge ham threedots  sanam tod detaa muhabbat ke vaade agar jaan jaataa main tere iraade kise mainne chaaha kahaan dil lagaayaa main naadaan thaa kuchh samajh hii na paayaa mere aansuon ke motii aankhon se bahataa paanii mere tuute dil ke tukade tere pyaar kii nishanii kaise main bhuluungaa tere sitam  ab tere bin ji lenge ham zahar zindagi kaa pii lenge ham kyaa huaa jo ek dil tuut gayaa  2 ab tere bin ji lenge ham zahar zindagi ka pii lenge ham ji lenge ham threedots  4

Title: saavaniyaa sanjhaa men ambar jhar aaii
Lyrics: saavaniyaa sanjhaa men saavaniyaa sanjhaa men ambar jhar aaii kaa chaal chalat kaan raadhaa bharamaaii saavaniyaa sanjhaa men  laag gaii maathe men buundan kii bindiyaa raadhaa ke romrom juuhii khil aaii saavaniyaa sanjhaa men  jalaa kaa hai belaa jalaa kaa hai belaa yaa lapaton kaa melaa more pang paras tarak na hii sanjaaii saavaniyaa sanjhaa men  baajat ghan mridang baajat ghan mridang baajat ghan mridang guunjat sab ang ang 2 raadhaa ne kaayaa kii baansurii bajaaii saavaniyaa sanjhaa men ambar jhar aaii kaa chaal chalat kaan raadhaa bharamaaii saavaniyaa sanjhaa men

Title: bhale tum ruuth jaao  sitaaro tum gavaah rahanaa
Lyrics: bhale tum ruuth jaao bhuul jaao ai mere hamadam merii har saans tum ko aatejaate yaad karatii hai  sitaaro tum gavaah rahanaa main un ko kyaa kabhii bhuulaa bahaaro tum gavaah rahanaa main un ko kyaa kabhii bhuulaa  vo mere the vo mere hain rahenge umr bhar mere bhale vo sangadil ho kar mere sapanon se munh phere main kush huun vo agar mujh ko jhulaaen gam kaa bhii jhuulaa bhale duniyaa mujhe bhuule par un ko main nahiin bhuulaa mere aansuu gavaahii hain main un ko kyaa kabhii bhuulaa merii dhadakan gavaahii hai main un ko kyaa kabhii bhuulaa  sitaaro tum gavaah rahanaa bahaaro tum gavaah rahanaa

Title: kal chaudahaviin kii raat thii shab bhar rahaa charchaa teraa
Lyrics: kal chaudahaviin kii raat thii shab bhar rahaa charchaa teraa kuchh ne kahaa ye chaand hai kuchh ne kahaa cheharaa teraa  1 ham bhi vahin maujuud the ham se bhii sab puchhaa ki ye ham hans diye ham chup rahe manzuur thaa paradaa teraa kal  threedots  2 is shahar men kis se milen ham se to chhutii mahafilen har shakhs teraa naam le har shakhs divaanaa teraa kal  threedots  3 kuche ko tere chhodakar jogi hii ban jaaen magar jangal tere parvat tere basti teri seharaa teraa kal  threedots  4 bedard tum hi ho to chal kahataa hai kyaa achchhi gazal aashiq teraa rusavaa teraa shaayar teraa inshaa teraa kal  threedots

Title: main terii dushman dushman tuu meraa
Lyrics: main terii dushman dushman tuu meraa main naagin tuu saperaa  2 janam janam se teraa meraa bair o rabbaa kair   aaj to badalaa main bas luungii chhed na mujhako main das luungii jantar mantar jaaduu tone ye to hain mere khelkhilaune mujhape chalegaa naa zor teraa main naagin tuu saperaa   chhed ke apanii biin kaa laharaa tuune bichhaayaa mujh pe paharaa or is it bithaayaa bas men nahiin main aane vaalii main nahiin dhokaa khaane vaalii aayaa hai jogii banake luteraa main naagin tuu saperaa   sab kii zubaan par merii kahaanii meraa dasaa huaa maange na paanii teraa tamaashaa sab dekhenge kyaa hotaa hai ab dekhenge dekhegaa naa tuu kal kaa saveraa main naagin tuu saperaa

Title: jaa kahiyo unase nasiimesahar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii
Lyrics: jaa kahiyo unase nasiimesahar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii tumhen merii na mujhako tumhaarii khabar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii  ai baadashaahekhubaanejahaan terii mohanii suurat pe qurbaan kii main ne jo terii jabiin pe nazar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii  huii baadebahaarii chaman men ayaan gulbuute men baaqii rahii na fizaa merii shaakheummiid na aaii sanvar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii  ai barqetajalli baharekhudaa na jalaa mujhe ishq men shammaa saa merii ziist mislechiraagesahar meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii  kahataa yahii ro ro ke zafar merii aaherasaa kaa huaa na asar terii hijr men maut na aaii abhii meraa chain gayaa merii niind gaii

Title: khile kamal sii kaayaa
Lyrics: khile kamal sii kaayaa terii buund gire to buund na tuute  tan hai madhuban saa chamake darpan saa buund badan pe rukane ne paae  kalii baalon se ghane gaalon pe honthon ko chhuuke badhatii hii jaae chalii man pe kisii ke ang kaa tere  rang chadhe to rang na chhuute  ruup ke ras men buund nahaaii baahon se lipatii paanvon pe aaii gorii ke charanon men aan saamaaii jal ke buund ke bhaag anokhe  amrit ras kii gaagar hai tuu sundarataa kaa saagar hai tuu sadaa rahe tuu piyaa ko pyarii ik pal tujhase piyaa na ruuthe

Title: jab chaahaa yaaraa tumane aankhon se maaraa tumane
Lyrics: jab chaahaa yaaraa tumane aankhon se maaraa tumane honthon se zindaa kar diyaa are tumhaarii marzii pe chal rahen hain kataa hamaarii kyaa ho jab chaahaa yaaraa tumane threedots  chalo jii ham bure sahii chalo jii ham jhuuthe hain  magar inahiin nigaahon se hazaaron dil tuute hain 2 are kasam se kahanaa hamaarii suurat nahiin hai pyaarii kyaa hothreedots jab chaahaa yaaraa tumanethreedots  samajh sako to hamasafar hamen tum apanaa jaano  are udhar nahiin idhar chalo kabhii to kahanaa maano 2 are lipat aake puuchhen ke aage marzii ab hai hamaarii kyaa hothreedots jab chaahaa yaaraa tumanethreedots

Title: thodii sii jo pii lii hai
Lyrics: thodii sii jo pii lii hai chorii to nahiin kii hai o juulii o shiilaa o raano jamaalo koii ham ko roko koii to bachaa lo kahiin ham gir na pade thodii sii jo pii lii hai threedots  main bhii jaanuun piinaa to burii baat hai kaise na pii luun pyaasii ye raat hai uupar se hasiinon kaa hasiin  saath hai  hamen gorii gorii baahon men uthaa lo kahiin ham gir na pade threedots  zuzuzu zuu zuzuzu zuu zuzuzu zuu uu  thodaathodaa dil pe hai javaanii kaa nashaa us pe phir nashaa hai ye tere pyaar kaa taubaa us nashe men ye nashaa mil gayaa  thodii sii jo pii lii hai chorii to nahiin kii hai o puuno merii jaan ye gussaa dabaa lo hamen do sahaaraa apanaa banaa lo kahiin ham gir na pade  are ham to gir pade hihii

Title: ajanabii kaun ho tum jabase tumhen dekhaa hai
Lyrics: ajanabii kaun ho tum jabase tumhen dekhaa hai  saarii duniyaa merii aankhon men simat aaii hai 2  tum to har giit men shaamil the tarannum kii tarah tum mile ho mujhe phuulon kaa tabassum banake aisaa lagataa hai ke barason se shamaa aaj aaii hai ajanabii kaun ho tumthreedots  kvaab kaa rang haqiiqat men nazar aayaa hai dil men dhadakan kii tarah koii utar aayaa hai aaj har saans men shahanaaiyon sii laharaaii hai ajanabii kaun ho tumthreedots  koii aahat sii andheron men chamak jaatii hai raat aatii hai to tanahaaii mahak jaatii hai tum mile ho yaa mohabbat ne gazal gaaii hai ajanabii kaun ho tumthreedots

Title: do panchhii bechain nain ke
Lyrics: do panchhii bechain nain ke do panchhii bechain kho baithe hain chain nayan ke do panchhii bechain  baandh liyaa jo priit kaa bandhan bandhan tuute naa rangaa liyaa jis rang men jiivan vo rang chhuute naa ras barase din rain nain ke do panchhii bechain  aajaa man ke miit lagaa len ham sapanon ke mele duur hai manzil chal na sakuungaa lambii raah akele mahak uthe har bain nain ke do panchhii bechain

Title: dil dhak dhak karataa hai  laal chundariyaa vaalii
Lyrics: dil dhak dhak karataa hai tujhape hii marataa hai re sun kyaa kyaa kahataa hai re o mere sonaa haay ruup salonaa teraa kyaa kahanaa re laal chundariyaa vaalii par dil aayaa re dil dhak dhak threedots  o jab chaand saa rang chhat pe aae terii yaad mujhe tadapaa jaae yaad men rahanaa gum taare ginate rahanaa tum khyaalon ke ladduu khaate rahanaa tum maine ladduu bantavaanaa band bajavaanaa tainuun pyaar sikhaanaa re laal chundariyaa vaalii threedots  karale karale pyaar karale o salonii pyaar karale re laa laa  kyaa chiiz hai tuu kyaa lagatii hai kyaa adaa hai ye kyaa mastii hai mastiyaan lutaauungii adaaen dikhaauungii par main terii baaton men na aauungii tainuun apanaa banaanaa tainuun dolii men bithaanaa tainuun anganaa men laanaa re laal chundariyaa vaalii threedots

Title: mere liye zindagii tere bagair kuchh nahiin
Lyrics: mere liye zindagii tere bagair kuchh nahiin tuu hai jahaan main vahiin tere bagair kuchh nahiin  1 jab tuu hai to kaahe kaa dar kat jaaegaa baakii safar sab kuchh diyaa bhagavaan ne achchhaa saa dil achchhaa saa ghar phir bhii merii bekudii tere bagair threedots  2 baithe rahen dekhaa karen chhidate rahen aankhon ke taar badhatii rahe andar kii pyaas is ko hii to kahate hain pyaar sun ai merii mehazabiin tere bagair threedots  3 phuulon saa man jharanon saa tan tujhako mile mere saajan puujaa terii karatii rahuun gaatii rahuun tere bhajan koi duaa aaratii tere bagair threedots

Title: zindagii ek safar hai suhaanaa
Lyrics: zindagii ek safar hai suhaanaa yahaan kal kyaa ho kisane jaanaa   2  hansate gaate jahaan se guzar duniyaa kii tuu paravaah na kar   2 muskuraate hue din bitaanaa yahaan kal kyaa ho kisane jaanaa haan zindagii ek safar threedots  maut aanii hai aaegii ik din jaan jaanii hai jaaegii ik din   2 aisii baaton se kyaa ghabaraanaa yahaan kal kyaa ho kisane jaanaa haan zindagii ek safar threedots  chaand taaron se chalanaa hai aage aasamaanon se badhanaa hai aage   2 piichhe rah jaaegaa ye zamaanaa yahaan kal kyaa ho kisane jaanaa haan zindagii ek safar threedots

Title: sitaaron chaand se kah do bas itanii baat dhiire se

Title: zindagii men to sabhii pyaar kiyaa karate hain

Lyrics: ham apane aansuon kaa afasaanaa haan kyaa sunaayen kyaa sunaayen ham apane aansuon kaa afasaanaa  duniyaa ne kar diyaa hai diiwaanaa haan kyaa bataayen kyaa bataayen ham apane aansuon kaa afasaanaa  sab zakm bhar chuke hain sab kaab mar chuke hain 2 ab kis ummiid par ham shamme naii jalaayen afasaanaa haan kyaa sunaayen kyaa sunaayen ham apane aansuon kaa afasaanaa  in kashtiyon kaa kyaa hai aksar yahii huaa hai 2 tuufaan se nikal kar saahil pe duub jaayen afasaanaa haan kyaa sunaayen kyaa sunaayen ham apane aansuon kaa afasaanaa  kab saath umar bhar kaa ham dilzadon ne chaahaa 2 par hamasafar hamaare kuchh duur tak to aayen afasaanaa haan kyaa sunaayen
