Lyrics: haay prem bel men phuul na patte naa phal naa phal isamen aaye prem bel men phuul na patte naa phal isamen aaye phir bhii man kitanaa murakh hai 2 priitam par mar jaaye prem bel men phuul na patte naa phal isamen aaye prem bel men phuul na patte  tadaptadap mar jaaye 2 chakoraa tadaptadap mar jaaye chakoraa 2 kaliikalii pe bhanware bhanwaraa premii kaa bholaapan dekho 2 aag se aag bujhaaye e premii kaa bholaapan dekho aag se aag bujhaaye  prem bel men phuul na patte naa phal isamen aaye prem bel men phuul na patte  mar kar jiinaa aa jii kar maranaa aa mar kar jiinaa jii kar maranaa hansanaa hans kar aahen bharanaa man hii man men ro kar premii 3 nainon men musakaaye e man hii man men ro kar premii nainon men musakaaye  prem bel men phuul na patte naa phal isamen aaye prem bel men phuul na patte

Title: dil se milaa ke dil pyaar kiijiye koii suhaanaa iqaraar kiijiye
Lyrics: dil se milaa ke dil pyaar kijiye koii suhaanaa iqaraar kijiye  1 sharamaanaa kaisaa ghabaraanaa kaisaa jiine se pahale mar jaanaa kaisaa faasalon kii chhaanv men ras bharii fizaaon men is zindagii ko gulazaar kijiye dil se threedots  2 aatii bahaaren jaatii bahaaren kab se khadii hain baandhii kataaren chhaa rahii hai bekhudii kah rahii hai zindagii dil kii umangen bedaad kijiye dil se threedots  3 dil se bhulaa ke rusavaaiyon ko jannat banaa len tanahaaiyon ko aarazuu javaan hai vaqt meharabaan hai dil kho na jaae khushii yaar kijiye dil se threedots

Title: more baalamaa ho more saajanaa ho
Lyrics: more baalamaa ho more saajanaa ho more baalamaa main nain sajaake laayi nain sajaake laayi more baalamaa 2 rehluaa beluaa baalama mhaanuaa main nain sajaake laayii  kuchh kaliyaan todii bele kii resham dori lii dhele kii haar pirokar laayii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  hothon pe ye kaalaa til hai sakhiyaan chhede teraa dil hai main sun sun sharmaaii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  zulf sanwaarii mom lagaakar laal kiya mukh paan chabaakar main phiratii itaraii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  tuu raajaa tuu duniyaa merii main damadii kii gudiyaa terii nanad uthaa ghar laayii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii  rehluaa beluaa baalama mhaanuaa main nain sajaake laayii  more baalamaa ho threedots

Title: tuu merii zindagii hai tuu merii har khushii hai
Lyrics: ku tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai tuhi pyaar tuhi chaahat tuhi aashiqii hai tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai  pahalii muhabbat kaa ahasaas hai tu  2 bujh ke bhii bujh na paaii vo pyaas hai tu tuhi meri pahalii khvaahish tuhi aakhirii hai tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai  har zakhm dil kaa mere dil se duaa de  2 khushiyaan tujhe gam saare mujhako khudaa de tujhako bhulaa naa paayaa meri bebasii hai  anu o aa threedots tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai tu meri zindagi hai tu meri har khushi hai ham threedots

Title: yaad karataa hai mujhe aaj bhii ronevaalaa
Film: bhulaye na bane  kali khili gali gali nonfilm
Lyrics: yaad karataa hai mujhe aaj bhii ronevaalaa ajanabii ho na sakaa ajanabii honevaalaa  haal mat puuchh tabaahii kaa merii tuufaan se mere nazadiik hii baithaa hai dubonevaalaa  dhuundhataa rahataa hai kaagaz pe mitii taqadiiren kat mujhe likhake mere kat ko bhigonevaalaa  bas yahii sochake tuufaan se ubhar aataa huun duub jaae na kahiin mujhako dubonevaalaa  jahaan jazabaat bhii chiizon kii tarah bikate hon aisii duniyaa men tujhe kaun hai ronevaalaa  puuchhataa rahataa hai kyaa kuchh merii tanahaaii se vaqteruksat mere kaandhe ko bhigonevaalaa  baad marane ke sabhii usake hue baithe hain ye vo anjum hai kisiikaa bhii na honevaalaa

Title: o merii o merii o merii sharamiilii aao naa tarasaao naa
Lyrics: o merii o merii o merii sharmiilii aao naa tarasaao naa o merii o merii o merii sharmiilii  teraa kaajala lekara raata banii raata banii terii menhadii lekara dina ugaa dina ugaa terii bolii sunakara sura jaage sura jaage terii khushabuu lekara phuula khilaa phul khilaa jaanaemana tuu hai kahaan o meriithreedots  terii raahon se guzare jaba se ham jaba se ham mujhe merii dagara taka yaada nahiin yaada nahiin tujhe dekhaa jaba se dilarubaa dilarubaa mujhe meraa ghara taka yaada nahiin yaada nahiin jaanaemana tuu hai kahaan o meriithreedots  o niiraja nayanaa aa zaraa aa zaraa terii laaja kaa ghuunghata khola duun khola duun tere aanchala para koi git likhuun git likhuun tere honthon men amrita ghola duun ghola duun jaanaemana tuu hai kahaan o meriithreedots

Title: dekhanaa qismat ki aap apane pe rashk aa jaaye hai
Lyrics: dekhanaa qismat ki aap apane pe rashk aa jaaye hai  main use dekhuun bhalaa kab mujhase dekhaa jaaye hai    gair ko yaarab vo kyon kar manaegustaakii  kare  gar hayaa bhii usako aatii hai to sharmaa jaaye hai   hoke aashiq vo pariiruk aur naazuk ban gayaa  rang khulataa jaaye hai jitanaa ki udataa jaaye hai    shauq ko ye lat ke haradam naalaa khenche jaaiye  dil kii vo haalat ki dam lene se ghabaraa jaaye hai

Title: guzare hain aaj ishq men ham us maqaam se
Lyrics: guzare hain aaj ishq men ham us maqaam se nafarat sii ho gaii hai muhabbat ke naam se  hamako na ye gumaan thaa o sangadil sanam raahevafaa se tere bahak jaaenge qadam chhalakegaa zahar bhii terii aankhon ke jaam se  o bevafaa teraa bhii yuun hii tuut jaae dil tuu bhii tadaptadap ke pukaare haay dil teraa bhii saamanaa ho kabhii gam kii shaam se  ham vo nahiin jo pyaar men rokar guzaar den parachhaain bhii ho terii to thokar se maar den vaaqif hain ham bhii kuub har ek intaqaam se

Title: suno to diivaanaa dil kahataa hai hamase mil jaanaa
Lyrics: suno to diivaanaa dil kahataa hai hamase mil jaanaa 2 kabhii naa kabhii to tuu bhii milake hamase khil jaanaa naazuk ye dil hai meraa aashiq ye dil hai teraa suno to diivaanaa dil   badii hii mushkil se milate hain yaar ham jaise yaar sun le mere dil men hai pyaar hii pyaar pyaar ke phuul yaar chun le 2 dil men jo chhupaa hai zubaan pe vo le aanaa kabhii naa kabhii to tuu bhii milake hamase khil jaanaa  pyaar kii manzil mil jaaegii yaar baanhon men aa merii khadaa huun kabase main dil leke yaar raahon men aa merii 2 ab to merii jaan dil meraa le le nazaraanaa kabhii naa kabhii to tuu bhii milake hamase khil jaanaa naazuk ye dil hai meraa  aashiq ye dil hai teraa suno to diivaanaa dil

Title: o saajanaa chhuutaa hai jo daaman teraa
Lyrics: gii o saajanaa chhuutaa hai jo daaman teraa      manzilmanzil hai andheraa o saajanaa  he  jaa dilarubaa tere saath chalaa dil meraa      rahe pyaar nigahabaan teraa jaa dilarubaa      jaa dilarubaa  ko  priit lagaa ke gam se aahen bharanaa kyaa      raah chale to kaanton se phir daranaa kyaa  gii aii o dil kii tamannaa puurii hone na paaii      aa ke jiigar pe lagaa tiirejudaaii o saajanaa      zaraa dekh tadapanaa meraa      manzilmanzil hai andheraa o saajanaa  he  jaa dilarubaa dil ko tere bahalaauungaa      ummiid kaa taaraa ban ke      jhuumuungaa aankhon men terii      manzil kaa nazaaraa ban ke      jaa dilarubaa nahiin duur milan kaa deraa      rahe pyaar nigahabaan teraa jaa dilarubaa  ko  priit lagaa ke  gii aii o hongiin jo suuniisuunii ulfat kii raahen      dhuundhaa karengii tujhako merii nigaahen      o saajanaa main le ke chalii gam teraa      manzilmanzil hai andheraa o saajanaa  he  jaa dilarubaa yaad hamaarii ban ke chaandanii      raah men khil jaaegii      qadamqadam par tujhako dhadakate dil kii sadaa aaegii      jaa dilarubaa terii raah men sab kuchh meraa      rahe pyaar nigahabaan teraa jaa dilarubaa  gii o saajanaa chhuutaa hai jo daaman teraa      manzilmanzil hai andheraa o saajanaa  he  jaa dilarubaa

Title: mariizemuhabbat unhiin kaa fasaanaa
Lyrics: mariizemuhabbat unhiin kaa fasaanaa  sunaataa rahaa dam nikalate nikalate magar zikreshaamealam jabki aayaa  chiraagesahar bujh gayaa jalate jalate  iraadaa thaa tarkemuhabbat kaa lekin  farebetabassum men phir aa gae ham abhii khaa ke thokar sambhalane na paae  ki phir khaaii thokar sambhalate sambhalate  are koii vaadaa kalaafii kii had hai  hisaab apane dil men lagaa kar to dekho qayaamat kaa din aa gayaa rafataa rafataa  mulaaqaat kaa din badalate badalate  unhen kat men likhaa ki dil muztarib hai  javaab un kaa aayaa muhabbat na karate tumhen dil lagaane ko kisane kahaa thaa  bahal jaaegaa dil bahalate bahalate  hamen apane dil kii to parawaa nahiin hai  magar dar rahaa huun ye kamsin kii zid hai kahiin paae naazuk men moch aa naa jaae  dilesakatjaan ko masalate masalate  vo mahamaan hamaare hue bhii to kab tak  huii shammaa gul aur na duube sitaare qamar kis qadar unako jaladii thii ghar kii  vo ghar chal diye chaandanii dhalate dhalate

Title: moranii baagaa maa bole aadhii raatamaa
Lyrics: moranii baagaa maa bole aadhii raatamaa  chhananachhan chudiyaan khanak gayii dekh saahibaan  chudiyaan khanak gayii haath maa   main to laaj ke maare ho gayii pani pani sab logon ne sun lii meri prem kahani  munhase baat nikal gayii baat baat maa baat baat maa  chhananachhan chudiyaan khanak gayii dekh saahibaan   jaane kaun ghadii main nikale saajan gharase  main ghunghat men jaaun gayii kitane savan barasaae  meri pyaas na bujhii re barasaat maa barasaat maa  chhananachhan chudiyaan  khanak gayii dekh sahibaan threedots  sunii sej pe saiyaan sari raat main jaagii tere piichhe piichhe meri niind to bhaagii  meraa chain bhi gayaa re tere sath maa  chhananachhan chudiyaan  khanak gayii dekh saahibaan threedots   o meraa neharaa chhute re maaerii chhaatii phuute dhola o dholaa mat jaa jaa jaa  re dholaa mat jaa jaa jaa threedots this part is by ila arun

Title: kaan men jhumakaa chaal men thumakaa kamar pe chotii latake
Lyrics: aae haay kaana men jhumakaa chaala men thumakaa kamara pe chotii latake ho gayaa dila kaa purajaapurajaa lage pachaasii jhatake ho teraa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa  2   2  nashe se palaken taniintaniin jaana pe merii baniibanii chadhatii javaanii terii kaise sambhaale tuu husna teraa matavaalaa hai arii kisake liye sambhaalaa hai banuun rakhavaalaa kara de mere havaale tuu terii ye javaanii alabelii ye pahelii hai akelii  mujhe saathii banaa le haan ina zulphon men ulajhaulajha ke kai musaaphira bhatake ho gayaa dila kaa purajaapurajaa lage pachaasii jhatake ho teraa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa  2  terii maanga men jo main sinduura bhara duun to hara raata ko chaandanii raata kara duun tujhe khiincha kara apane dila se lagaa luun zamiin para tujhe main khudaa se milaa duun aisii karungaa main divaanii mastaanii o jaanii  zaraa nazaren milaa le samajhii aramaanon ke khule dariiche aajaa zaraa simatake ho gayaa dila kaa purajaapurajaa lage pachaasii jhatake ho teraa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa  2  bola kahuun main kharekhare jaatii hai kyuun parepare terii zindagii men aajaa pyaara ko basaa duun main paas agar tuu aajaae heavy breathing saanssaans takara jae dila kyuun dhadakataa hai tujhako dikhaa duun main tiira pe tiira chalaa ke muskaa ke sharamaa ke mujhe paasa bulaa le vahiin pe mele laga jaaen tuu dekhe jahaan palata ke ho gayaa dila kaa purajaapurajaa lage pachaasii jhatake ho teraa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa  kaana men jhumakaa chaala men thumakaa kamara pe chotii latake ho gayaa dila kaa purajaapurajaa lage pachaasii jhatake ho teraa ranga hai nashiilaa angaanga hai nashiilaa  2 haay haay

Title: panchhii re kaahe hot udaas
Lyrics: panchhii re  panchhii kaahe hot udaas 2 tuu tod na man kii aas panchhii tod na man kii aas panchhii kaahe hot udaas panchhii kaahe hot udaas  dekh ghataaye aayii hain vo 2 ek sandeshaa laayii hain vo dekh ghataaye aayii hain vo  dekh sandeshaa laayii hain vo pinjaraa lekar ud jaa panchhii 2 jaa saajan ke paas panchhii kaahe hot udaas panchhii kaahe hot udaas  uth aur uthakar aag lagaa de 2 phuunk de pinjaraa pankh jalaa de 2 uth aur uthakar aag lagaa de 2 phuunk de pinjaraa pankh jalaa de 2 raakh babuulaa ban kar panchhii raakh babuulaa ban kar terii pahunche unake paas panchhii kaahe hot udaas panchhii kaahe hot udaas

Title: kabhii kabhii yuunhii hamane apane jii ko bahalaayaa hai
Lyrics: kabhii kabhii yuunhii hamane apane jii ko bahalaayaa hai jin baaton ko khud nahiin samajhe auron ko samajhaayaa hai  hamase puuchho izzat vaalon kii izzat kaa haal kabhii hamane bhii is shahar men rahakar thodaa naam kamaayaa hai  usase bichhade barason biite lekin aaj na jaane kyon aangan men hansate bachchon ko bekaaran dhamakaayaa hai  koii milaa to haath milaayaa kahiin gae to baaten kii ghar se baahar jab bhii nikale din bhar bojh uthaayaa hai

Title: ek hii baat zamaane kii kitaabon men nahiin rafi ghazal
Lyrics: ek hii baat zamaane kii kitaabon men nahiin jo gamedost men nashshaa hai sharaabon men nahiin   husn kii bhiikh na maangenge na jalwon kii kabhi ham faqiiron se milo khul ke hijaabon men nahiin   har jagah phirate hain aawaaraa kayaalon kii tarah ye alag baat hai ham aapake kwaabon men nahiin  na dubo saagaromiinaa men ye gam ai faakir ki maqaam inakaa dilon men hai sharaabon men nahiin

Title: diivaane dil kyon rotaa hai
Lyrics: diivaane dil kyon rotaa hai duniyaan men duhkh bhii hotaa hai duniyaan men sukh bhii hotaa hai tuu kyon itanaa ghabaraataa hai diivaane threedots  taariiq hai gar duniyaan terii aahen na bhar dil gam na kar har shaamegam ke baad aakhir khushiyon kaa saveraa hotaa hai diivaane threedots             kaaron men dukhade sahate hain gul phir bhii hansate rahate hain jiinaa to isii ko kahate hain kyon ro ro aankhen khotaa hai diivaane threedots

Title: tumhen aah banake jalaauungaa tumhen dard banake sataauungaa
Lyrics: tumhen aah banake jalaauungaa tumhen dard banake sataauungaa mere aansuon kaa vo rang hai jo dikhaauungaa to rulaauungaa  kahiin zikr teraa jo sun liyaa to main ashk ab na bahaauungaa kahiin ashk aankhon men aa gae to zubaan pe zikr na laauungaa  yahii sajadaa hai yahii bandagii yahii bandagii to hai zindagii tere dar se sar jo uthaa liyaa to jahaan se haath uthaauungaa  main terii nigaah se gir gayaa ye merii nazar se utar gayaa mujhe aansuon ne dubo diyaa inhen kaak men main milaauungaa

Title: wafaa kaa naam zamaane men aam kar jaauun
Lyrics: wafaa kaa naam zamaane men aam kar jaauun phir usake baad main zindaa rahuun ke mar jaauun  ilaahii mujhako ataa kar sadaaqaton ke charaag main unakii roshanii le kar nagar nagar jaauun  terii zamiin pe na ho naam nafaraton kaa kahiin muhabbaton ke fasaane sunuun jidhar jaauun  mere wujuud kaa ye bhii to ek masaraf hai dilon men pyaar kii maanind main utar jaauun  mazaa to jab hai ke dushman bhii mujhako yaad karen misaal pyaar kii aisii main chhod kar jaauun

Title: kushiyaan daa miinh vassiyaa
Lyrics: kushiyaan daa miinh vassiyaa sajanaa daa kat aayaa saadaa rondaa dil hassiyaa  khajiyaan diyaan pakhiyaan ne  maar faqiir kiitaa ae kiyaan zaalim akhiyaan ne  kothe utton ud kaanvaan sad patawaarii nuun jind mahiye de naan laavaan  jag rain baseraa ae assaan kehdaa mud aunaa sadaa jogii valaa pheraa ae

Title: hangaamaaegam se tang aakar izahaaremusarrat kar baithe
Lyrics: hangaamaaegam se tang aakar izahaaremusarrat kar baithe  mashahuur thii apanii zindaadilii daanistaa sharaarat kar baithe  koshish to bahut kii hamane magar paayaa na gamehastii se mafarr  viiraaniiedil jab had se badhii ghabaraake muhabbat kar baithe    nazaron se na karate purasishegam kaamosh hii rahanaa behatar thaa  diivaanon ko tumane chhed diyaa wallaah qayaamat kar baithe   allaah to sabakii sunataa hai daulat hai shakiil apaniiapanii haalii ne zubaan se kuch na kahaa iqabaal shikaayat kar baithe

Title: wohii palakon kaa jhapakanaa wohii jaaduu tere
Lyrics: wohii palakon kaa jhapakanaa wohii jaaduu tere saare andaaz churaa laaii hai kushbuu tere  tujhase main jism churaataa thaa magar ilm na thaa mere saaye se lipat jaayenge baazuu tere  terii aankhon men pighalatii rahii suurat merii merii tasviir pe girate rahe aansuu tere  aur kuchh der agar tez hawaa chalatii rahii merii baanhon men bikhar jaayenge gesuu tere

Title: kaise kategii zindagii tere bagair tere bagair
Lyrics: kaise kategii zindagii tere bagair tere bagair paauungaa har shai men kamii tere bagair tere bagair  phuul khilen to yuun lage phuul nahiin ye daag hain taare falak pe yuun lagen jaise bujhe chiraag hain aag lagaae chaandanii tere bagair tere bagair  kaise kategii zindagiithreedots  chaand ghataa men chhup gayaa saaraa jahaan udaas hai kahatii hai dil kii dhadakanen tuu kahiin aasapaas hai aa ki tadap rahaa hai jii tere bagair tere bagair paauungaa har shai men kamiithreedots

Title: tum itanaa jo muskuraa rahe ho kyaa gam hai jisako chhupaa rahe ho
Lyrics: tum itanaa jo muskuraa rahe ho kyaa gam hai jisako chhupaa rahe ho tum itanaathreedots  aankhon men namii hansii labon par kyaa haal hai kyaa dikhaa rahe ho kyaa gam haithreedots  ban jaayenge zahar piite piite  2 ye ashq jo piite jaa rahe ho kyaa gam haithreedots  rekhaaon kaa khel hai muqaddar  2 rekhaaon se maat khaa rahe ho kyaa gam haithreedots

Title: jahaan terii ye nazar hai merii jaan mujhe kabar hai
Lyrics: jahaan terii ye nazar hai merii jaan mujhe kabar hai bach na sakaa koii aaye kitane lambe hain mere haath itane dekh idhar yaar dhyaan kidhar hai jahaan terii ye nazar hai threedots  kyon nahiin jaanii tuu ye samajhataa kaam nahiin ye hai tere bas kaa kukudu kukuu hosh men aa jaa dhyaan kidhar hai jahaan terii ye nazar hai threedots  merii taraf jo uthaa hai tan ke kat ke vahii haath giraa badan se saamane aaye kis kaa jigar hai jahaan terii ye nazar hai threedots  chaal ye bandaa aisii bhii chal jaaye band ho mutthii aur chiiz nikal jaaye giligiligilii gilgilgil ye bhii karishmaa dekh idhar hai jahaan terii ye nazar hai threedots

Title: mere dil kabhii to koii aayegaa
Lyrics: mere dil kabhii to koii aayegaa hamadam jo teraa ban jaayegaa  ai beqaraar ab intazaar kuchh rang laa rahaa hai kahataa hai pyaar teraa raazadaar tere paas aa rahaa hai  hogii hasiin vo chaand raat ham saath saath honge barasegaa nuur kushiyon men chuur haathon men haath honge  badalegaa daur kuchh der aur tuu gam kaa zahar pii le hogaa milaap phir apane aap jaise bhii chaahe jii le  mere dil threedots

Title: ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko yaad aaye kabhii to mat ronaa
Lyrics: ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko yaad aaye kabhii to mat ronaa is dil ko tasallii de denaa ghabaraaye kabhii to mat ronaa ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko   threedots  ek kvaab saa dekhaa thaa hamane jab aankh khulii vo tuut gayaa ye pyaar agar sapanaa banakar tadapaaye kabhii to mat ronaa ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko  tum mere kayaalon men khokar barabaad na karanaa jiivan ko jab koii sahelii baat tumhen samajhaaye kabhii to mat ronaa ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko   threedots  jiivan ke safar men tanahaaii mujhako to na zindaa chhodegii marane kii khabar ai jaanejigar mil jaaye kabhii to mat ronaa ham chhod chale hain mahafil ko   threedots

Title: aankhon men basaayaa thaa
Lyrics: hai e ho o   aankhon men basaayaa thaa  aankhon men basaayaa thaa tumhen dil men chhupaayaa thaa  aankhon men basaayaa thaa tumhen dil men chhupaayaa thaa  jab chaahuun tumhen dekhuun aaiinaa banaayaa thaa 2  aankhon men basaayaa thaa tumhen dil men chhupaayaa thaa   aankhon men andheraa hai viraanaa seharaa hai  naa jaane meraa vo chaand kis shahar men utaraa hai  jine kaa bataa tu hii ab kyaa aramaan karuun  mar jaane kaa ai dil koii saamaan karuun  ik saath jiyenge ham  ik saath jiyenge ham kyon khvaab dikhaayaa thaa  2  jab chaahuun dekhuun aaiinaa banaayaa thaa   kyaa jaan sakoge tum din kaise guzarataa hai  ik pal bhii nahii gujare haan aise guzarataa hai  naa chain hii aataa hai naa niind hii aatii hai  terii yaad aatii hai aakar tadapaatii hai  mainne to tujhe jaanam  maine to tujhe jaanam palakon pe bithaayaa thaa  2  jab chaahuun dekhuun aaiinaa banaayaa thaa   hai e ho o  aankhon men basaayaa thaa  aankhon men basaayaa thaa tumhen dil men chhupaayaa thaa  aankhon men basaayaa thaa tumhen dil men chhupaayaa thaa  jab chaahuun tumhen dekhuun aaiinaa banaayaa thaa   2

Title: kaliyon kaa chaman tab banataa hai
Lyrics: kaliyon kaa chaman tab banataa hai 2   thodaa resham lagataa hai thoodaa shiishaa lagataa hai hiire motii jadate hain thodaa sonaa lagataa hai  2  paayal koii jab banatii hai 2  thodaa piital hotaa hai thode ghungharuu hote hain phir ek duurii hotii hai paanv men dorii hotii hai  2  saawan kii jhadii jab lagatii hai 2  thode baadal hote hain jaise kaajal hotaa hai thodii buunden hotii hain man ye paagal hotaa hai  2  yauvan kii rut jab aatii hai 2  thode bhanware hote hain thodii mastii hotii hai bade tuufaan hote hain unamen kashtii hotii hai  2

Title: ghar se masjid hai bahut duur
Lyrics: ghar se masjid hai bahut duur chalo yuun kar len kisii rote hue bachche ko hansaayaa jaaye ghar se masjid hai bahut duur   threedots  hamsafar to koii vaqt ke viiraane men  2 suunii aankhon men  2 koii khvaab sajaayaa ghar se masjid hai bahut duur   threedots  roshanii kii bhii hifaazat hai ibaadat kii tarah  2 bujhate suuraj se 2 chaaraagon ko jalaayaa jaaye ghar se masjid hai bahut duur   threedots  gam akelaa hai to saanson ko sataataa hai bahut  2 dard ko dard kaa 2 hamdard banaayaa jaaye ghar se masjid hai bahut duur   threedots

Title: ye ladakaa haay allaah kaisaa hai diivaanaa
Lyrics: asha ye ladakaa haay allaah kaisaa hai diivaanaa  kitanaa mushqil hai taubaa isako samajhaanaa  ke dhiiredhiire dil beqaraar hotaa hai  ke hote hote hote pyaar hotaa hai	2  ye ladakaa haay allaah threedots  hamane to itanaa dekhaa hamane to itanaa siikhaa  dil kaa saudaa hotaa hai saudaa zindagii kaa 2 milate hii kaise koii hotaa hai diivaanaa kitanaa mushqil hai taubaa isako samajhaanaa ke dhiiredhiire dil beqaraar hotaa hai ke hote hote hote pyaar hotaa hai  ho sakataa hai dekho na samajho mittii ko sonaa  pal bhar kaa hansanaa ho jaae jiivan bhar kaa ronaa 2 dekho jaldii men kabhii dilako na lagaanaa kitanaa mushqil hai taubaa isako samajhaanaa ke dhiiredhiire dil beqaraar hotaa hai ke hote hote hote pyaar hotaa hai  kishor bholii ho tum kyaa jaano ab bhii mujhako pahachaano  sapanaa tumhaaraa main huun maano yaa na maano 2 dekho naadaanii se mujhe na thukaraanaa nahiin to gaatii hii rahogii ye taraanaa ke dhiiredhiire dil beqaraar hotaa hai ke hote hote hote pyaar hotaa hai

Title: baat nikalegii to phir duur talak jaayegii
Lyrics: baat nikalegii to phir duur talak jaayegii  log bevajah udaasii kaa sabab puchhenge ye bhii puuchhenge ke tum itanii pareshaan kyun ho ungaliyaan uthengii suukhe hue baalon kii taraf ek nazar dekhenge guzare hue saalon kii taraf chuudiyon par bhii kai tanz kiye jaayenge kaanpate haathon pe bhii fikare kase jaayenge  log zaalim hain har ek baat kaa taanaa denge baaton baaton men meraa zikr bhii le aayenge  2 unakii baaton kaa zaraa saa bhii asar mat lenaa varanaa chehare kii taasur se samajh jaayenge chaahe kuchh bhi ho savaalaat naa karanaa unase mere baare men koi baat na karanaa unase  baat nikalegii to phir duur talak jaayegii

Title: yuun na mil mujhase kafaa ho jaise
Lyrics: yuun na mil mujhase kafaa ho jaise saath chal maujesabaa ho jaise  log yuun dekh ke hans dete hain tuu mujhe bhuul gayaa ho jaise  hichakiyaan raat ko aatiin hii nahiin tuune phir yaad kiyaa ho jaise  aise anjaan bane baithe ho tumako kuchh bhii na pataa ho jaise  ishq ko shirq kii had tak na badhaa yuun na chhup hamase kudaa ho jaise   maut bhii aaii to is naaz ke saath mujhape ehasaan kiyaa ho jaise  zindagii biit rahii hai daanish ek bezurm sazaa ho jaise

Title: tum ne mujhe dekhaa ho kar meharbaan
Lyrics: tum ne mujhe dekhaa ho kar meharbaan  ruk gaii ye zamiin ruk gaii zamiin  tham gayaa aasamaan jaaneman jaanejaan  2 tum ne mujhe dekhaa  o kahiin dard ke saharaa men rukate chalate hote in honthon kii hasarat men tapate jalate hote meharbaan ho gaii zulf kii badaliyaan jaaneman jaanejaan tum ne mujhe dekhaa threedots  o lekar ye hasiin jalave tum bhii na kahaan pahunche aakhir ko mere dil tak kadamon ke nishaan pahunche khatm se ho gae raaste sab yahaan jaaneman jaanejaan tum ne mujhe dekhaa threedots

Title: bangalaa gaadii  dil mat denaa merii sautan ko
Lyrics: o bangalaa gaadii jhumake kanganaa  sab de denaa usako sajanaa aag lage usake joban ko dil mat denaa merii sautan ko  tuu hai usake prem kaa rogii merii badii badanaamii hogii usakaa mat ban jaanaa jogii bhuul ke apanii jogan ko dil mat denaa threedots  usane gaa kar filmii gaanaa kar daalaa tujhako diivaanaa hotal men khaataa hai khaanaa chhod ke ghar ke bhojan ko dil mat denaa threedots  mere paas nahiin kyaa raajaa chhuu ke dekh badan ye aajaa kar ke bahaane galii men naa jaa milane kisii padosan ko dil mat denaa threedots

Title: salaameishq merii jaan zaraa kabuul kar lo
Lyrics: ishq vaalon se na puunchho ki unakii raat kaa aalam tanahaa kaise guzarataa hai judaa ho hamasafar jisakaa vo usako yaad karataa hai na ho jisakaa koi vo milane kii fariyaad karataa hai 	     salaameishq merii jaan zaraa qubuul kar lo tum hamase pyaar karane kii zaraa sii bhuul kar lo meraa dil bechain meraa dil bechain hai hamasafar ke liye  main sunaauun tumhen baat ik raat kii chaand bhii apanii puurii javaanii pe thaa dil men tuufaan thaa ek aramaan thaa  dil kaa tuufaan apanii ravaanii pe thaa ek baadal udhar se chalaa jhuum ke dekhate dekhate chaand par chhaa gayaa chaand bhii kho gayaa usake aagosh men uf ye kyaa ho gayaa josh hii josh men meraa dil dhadakaa meraa dil tadapaa kisiikii nazar ke liye salaameishq merii jaan zaraa qubuul kar lo threedots 	     isake aage kii ab daastaan mujhase sun sunake terii nazar dabadabaa jaaegii baat dil kii jo ab tak tere dil men thii meraa daavaa hai honthon pe aa jaaegii tuu masiihaa muhabbat ke maaron kaa hai ham teraa naam sunake chale aae hain ab davaa de hamen yaa tuu de de zahar terii mahafil men ye dilajale aae hain ek ehasaan kar ehasaan kar ik ehasaan kar apane mehamaan par apane mehamaan par ek ehasaan kar de duaaen  de duaaen tujhe umr bhar ke liye salaameishq merii jaan zaraa qubuul kar lo threedots

Title: itanii naazuk naa bano haay itanii naazuk naa bano
Lyrics: itanii naazuk naa bano haay itanii naazuk naa bano hadake andar ho nazaakat to adaa hotii hai hadase badh jaaye to aap apanii sazaa hotii hai itaniithreedots  jism kaa bojh uthaaye nahiin uthataa tumase zindagaanii kaa kadaa bojh sahogii kaise tum jo halakiisii havaaon men lachak jaatii ho tez jhonkon ke thapedon men rahogii kaise itaniithreedots  ye naa samajho ke har ik raah men kaliyaan hongii raah chalanii hai to kaanton pe bhii chalana hogaa ye nayaa daur hai is daur men jiine ke liye husn ko husn kaa andaaz badalanaa hogaa  itaniithreedots  koi rukataa nahiin thahare hue raahii ke liye jo bhii dekhegaa voh kataraake guzar jaayegaa ham agar vaqt ke hamaraah naa chalane paaye vaqt ham dono ko thukaraake guzar jaayegaa itaniithreedots

Title: kaun ye aayaa mahafil men bijalii sii chamakii dil men
Lyrics: kaun ye aayaa mahafil men bijalii sii chamakii dil men ujalaa mukhadaa kaalaa til honth gulaabii jaise dil rangebadan taubaa taubaa aankh milii to kyaa hogaa haay o o dilarubaa merii niitaa  pyaar kiyaa hai to phir nibhaanaa aaj khul ke yuun aankh milaanaa dekhataa rahe gam ye zamaanaa ho o ho o ho o o o o o  tuu jo hai merii baahon men jalate hai diipak raahon men khaabon kii bastii hai zamiin aaj hai duniyaa kitanii hansiin dila se dila kaa saath rahe  jiivan bhar ye raat rahe haay o o dilarubaa merii niitaa

Title: tum saath ho zindagii bhar ke liye
Lyrics: tum saath ho zindagii bhar ke liye tum saath rahanaa zindagiizindagii bhar tum saath ho   threedots  kuchh mere rang ho kuchh terii saragam phir kyaa khushii kyaa gam sabase alag hai sabase judaa teraa meraa sangam tum saath ho   threedots  tum ho subah kii pahalii kiran man se bandhaa hai man duur hain phir bhii duur nahiin hain itane paas hain ham tum saath ho   threedots

Title: pitu maatu sahaayaka svaami sakhaa tumahii eka naatha hamaare ho
Lyrics: centerlinebhajan pitu maatu sahaayaka svaamisakhaa tumahii eka naatha hamaare ho jinake kachhu aura aadhaara nahii tinake tumahii rakhavaare ho   saba bhaanti sadaa sukhadaayaka ho duhkha durguna naashaka haare ho pratipaala karo sagare jagako atishaya karunaa ura dhaare ho   upakaaranako kachhu anta nahii chhinahii chhina jo vistaare ho bhulii hai hamahii tumako tuma to hamarii sudhi naahin bisaare ho   mahaaraaja mahaa mahimaa tumharii samuche virale budhivaare ho shubha shaantiniketaka premanidhe manamandirake ujiyaare ho   yahii jiivanake tuma jiivana ho ina praananake tuma pyaare ho  tumaso prabhupaaya prataapaharii kehike aba aura sahaare ho

Title: radhe ranii re daro na
Lyrics: raadhe raanii re daro na 2 bansurii bolii re raadhe raanii re daro na  bansurii bolii re raam raadhe raanii re daro na  bansurii bolii re raadhe raanii re daro na  bansurii bole  kaahe se bajaauungaa re kaahe se main gaauun re 3 kaahe se main laauun gaiyaa 2 are kaahe se main laauun gaiyaa 2 derii re raadhe raanii re daro na 2 bansurii bolii  mukh se bajaao kaanhaa kanth se gaao re 3 lathiyaa chalaao gaiyaa 2 haay lathiyaa chalaao gaiyaa deri re raadhe raanii re daro na 2 bansurii bolii  yaa bansii men more kaanhaa basat hai 2 vahii bansii le gai haay re vahii bansii le gai vahii bansii le gai chorii re  raadhe raanii re daro na raadhe pyaarii re daro na bansurii bolii re raadhe raanii re daro na bansurii bolii

Title: jaane vo kaise log the jinake pyaar ko pyaar milaa
Lyrics: jaane vo kaise log the jinake pyaar ko pyaar milaa hamane to jab kaliyaan maangii kaanton kaa haar milaa jaane vo threedots  khushiyon kii manzil dhuundhii to gam kii gard milii chaahat ke nagame chaahe to aanhen sard milii dil ke bojh ko dhundhalaa kar gayaa jo gamakhaar milaa  hamane to jab threedots  bichhad gayaathreedots bichhad gayaa har saathii dekar  pal do pal kaa saath kisako furasat hai jo thaame diivaanon kaa haath hamako apanaa saayaa tak aqasar bezaar milaa hamane to jab threedots  isako hii jiinaa kahate hain to  yuunhii jii lenge uf na karenge lab sii lenge aansuu pii lenge gam se ab ghabaraanaa kaisaa gam sau baar milaa hamane to jab threedots

Title: kis ko qaatil main kahuun kis ko masihaa samajhuun jagjit gazal
Lyrics: kis ko qaatil main kahuun kis ko masihaa samajhuun  sab yahaan dost hii baithe hain kise kya samajhuun   vo bhi kya din the ke har vaham yakiin hota tha  ab haqikat nazar aaye to use kya samajhuun   dil jo tuutaa to kai haath duaa ko uthe  aise mahaul men ab kis ko paraayaa samajhuun   zulm ye hai ke hai yaqtaa teri beganaaravii  lutf ye hai ke main ab tak tujhe apana samajhuun     dictionary         1 masihaa                messiah 2 vaham                  doubt 3 yaqtaa                 rigid 4 beganaaravii             indifference 5 lutf                   pleasure

Title: karavaten badalate rahe saarii raat ham
Lyrics: karavaten badalate rahe saarii raat ham aap kii qasam gam na karo din judaaii ke bahut hain kam aap kii qasam  yaad tum aate rahe ik huuq sii uthatii rahii niind mujhase niind se main bhaagatii chhupatii rahii raat bhar bairan nigodii chaandanii chubhatii rahii aag sii jalatii rahii giratii rahii shabanam aap kii qasam   threedots  jhiil kee aankhon men aashiq duub ke kho jaayegaa zulf ke saaye men dil nagamaa bharaa so jaayegaa tum chale jaao nahiin to kuchh na kuchh ho jaayegaa dagamagaa jaayenge aise haal men qadam aap kii qasam   threedots  ruuth jaayen ham to tum hamako manaa lenaa sanam duur hon to paas hamako tum bulaa lenaa sanam kuchh gilaa ho to gale hamako lagaa lenaa sanam tuut na jaaye kabhii ye pyaar kii qasam aap kii qasam   threedots

Title: yaad piyaa kii mohe ratiyaan jagaae
Lyrics: yaad piyaa kii mohe ratiyaan jagaae laakh jatan karuun nindiyaa na aaye nindiyaa na aaye moraa man ghabaraae  chamake na bindiyaa mahake na gajaraa kitnii main kud ko sanwaaruun utanaa hii birhaa kaa dukhadaa sataae jitanaa main ruup nikhaaruun piyaa bin sakhii mohe kuchh na suhaae  kat likh bhejaa sanwariyaa ne aaye gaa vo saawan men jab tak vo nahiin aaye gaa tab tak huuk uthe gii man men kaash saawan se pahle vo chalaa aaye  dhadkan dhadkan un qadamon kii aahat suntii jaauun man hii man men piyaa milan ke sapne buntii jaauun man meraa piyaa bin kal nahiin paae

Title: chhalake terii aankhon se sharaab aur jiiyaadaa
Lyrics: chhalake terii aankhon se sharaab aur ziyaadaa  3 khilate rahe hothon se gulaab aur ziyaadaa  2  kyaa baat hai terii mahafil men sitamagar  3 dhadake hai dilakhaanaa kharaab aur ziyaadaa  2  is dil men abhii aur bhii zakhmon kii jagah hai bakii  3 ab ruup kii katarii ko doaab men jakad len ki ishq ke tufaan kii baaton men jakad len  2 allaah kare zoresharaab aur ziyaadaa khilate rahe hothon ke gulaab aur ziyaadaa

Lyrics: hansate raho khilate raho   2 mit jaayegaa saaraa gilaa  hamase gale milate raho chhodo sanam kaahe kaa gam  hansate raho khilate raho laa laa laa laa threedots laa laa laa laa threedots  hansate raho khilate raho   2 mit jaayegaa saaraa gilaa  hamase gale milate raho chhodo sanam kaahe kaa gam  hansate raho khilate raho  muskuraatii hasiin aankhon se  dekho dekho samaa badalataa hai kaise jaanejahaan threedots chehare kii rangat khul jaatii hai aise  hansate raho khilate raho      2  aao milakara ke yuun bahak jaaen  ki mahak jaaye aaj honthon kii kaliyaan jhuume fizaa threedots ye galiyaan ban jaaye phuulon kii galiyaan  hansate raho khilate raho     2 mit jaayegaa saaraa gilaa  hamase gale milate raho

Title: main kayaal huun kisii aur kaa
Lyrics: main kayaal huun kisii aur kaa mujhe sochataa koii aur hai sareaaiinaa meraa aks hai paseaaiinaa koii aur hai  main kisii ke dastetalab men huun to kisii ke harfeduaa men huun main nasiib huun kisii aur kaa mujhe maangataa koii aur hai  tujhe dushmanon kii kabar na thii mujhe doston kaa pataa na thaa terii daastaan koii aur thii meraa vaaqayaa koii aur hai   kabhii laut aayen to puuchhanaa nahiin dekhanaa unhen gaur se jinhen raaste men kabar huii ke ye raastaa koii aur hai

Title: sitaare raah takate hain chale aao chale aao
Lyrics: sitaare raah takate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao hazaaron dil dhadakate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao  kahaan ho tum jo apane ko meraa diivaanaa kahate the vo aankhen tum kabhii jinako hasiin paimaanaa kahate the hasiin paimaanaa kahate the vo paimaane chhalakate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao sitaare raah takate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao  yahii vaadii yahii saahil yahii rangiin nazaare the yahii gam men mohabbat ke javaan lamhe guzaare the javaan lamhe guzaare the kahaan ham bhuul sakate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao sitaare raah takate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao  mohabbat ke hasiin vaade the donon kii nigaahon men kabhii aankhen thii aankhon men kabhii baahen thii baahon men kabhii baahen thii baahon men akele ab bhatakate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao sitaare raah takate hain chale aao chale aao chale aao chale aao

Title: tere hote hue mahafil men jalaate hain charaag
Lyrics: wo aaye bazm men itanaa to miir ne dekhaa phir isake baad charaagon men roshanii na rahii  tere hote hue mahafil men jalaate hain charaag log kyaa saadaa hain suuraj ko dikhaate hain charaag  apanii maharuumii ke ehasaas se sharmindaa hain kud nahiin rakhate to auron ke bujhaate hain charaag  kyaa kabar unako ki daaman bhii bhadak uthate hain jo zamaane kii hawaaon se bachaate hain charaag  aise bedard hue ham bhii ke ab gulashan par barq giratii hai to zindaan men jalaate hain charaag  aisii taariikiyaan aankhon men basii hain ki faraaz raat to raat hai ham din ko jalaate hain charaag

Title: sholaa jo bhadake dil meraa dhadake dard javaanii kaa sataae
Lyrics: sholaa jo bhadake dil meraa dhadake dard javaanii kaa sataae badhbadh ke  mahakii havaaen bahake kadam mere aise men thaam lo aa ke balam more pattaa bhii khadake to bijalii sii kadake dard threedots  pyaar ko mere kisane pukaaraa dil men utar gayaa kisakaa ishaaraa yaad ye kisakii laai pakad ke dard threedots  dekhaa jo tumako dard huaa kam ab to na honge tumase judaa ham

Title: koii samajhaaye kyaa rang hai mayakhaane kaa
Lyrics: jaam jab piitaa huun munh se kahataa huun bismilaah kaun kahataa hai ki rindon ko kudaa yaad nahiin  koii samajhaaye kyaa rang hai mayakhaane kaa aankh saaqii kii uthe naam ho paimaane kaa  garmiieshammaa kaa afasaanaa sunaane waalo raks dekhaa nahiin tumane abhii parawaane kaa  kisako maaluum thii pahale se khirad kii qiimat aalamehosh pe ehasaan hai diiwaane kaa  chashmesaaqii mujhe har gaam pe yaad aatii hai raastaa bhuul na jaauun kahiin mayakhaane kaa  ab to har shaam guzaratii hai usii kuunche men ye natiijaa huaa naaseh tere samajhaane kaa  manzilegam se guzaranaa to hai aasaan iqabaal ishq hai naam kud apane se guzar jaane kaa

Title: palat merii jaan main tere qurbaan
Lyrics: palat merii jaan tere qurbaan o teraa dhyaan kidhar hai uunchii niichii tediimedhii pyaar kii dagar hai jaataa kidhar hai rastaa idhar hai oy oy oy oy oy oy palat merii jaan   threedots  aayaa kyaa zamaanaa ladake ladakiyon se darate hain aankhe bhii churaake chhupake galii se guzarate hain ye mardon ke naam ko badanaam karate hain e palat merii jaan   threedots  sochaa thaa ye main ne mujhase nayan vo ladaayegaa siitii vo bajaa ke koii prem giit gaayegaa naa jaanaa thaa ghar kaa rastaa bhuul jaayega e e e palat meerii jaan   threedots  maahiyaa ve sipahiyaa aajaa ve chatan dii chhaanv men sadake tere bachake kandaa chubh na jaaye paanv men ban jaa meraa mahamaan ik anajaan gaanv men are palat palat merii jaan   threedots

Title: bataa do tum hamen bedaad karanaa
Lyrics: bataa do tum hamen bedaad karanaa sikhaa den ham tumhen fariyaad karanaa  ham aa jaayenge apanii yaad ban kar na bhuule se hamen tum yaad karanaa  tasawwur men ye koii kah rahaa hai  wo unhen yaad karen jisane bhulaayaa ho kabhii hamane unako na bhulaayaa na kabhii yaad kiyaa  tasawwur men ye koii kah rahaa hai shabefurqat men hamako yaad karanaa  riyaaz ik mardeaakirdiin ho tum bhii samajh kar aakabat barabaad karanaa

Title: apanii dhun men rahataa huun
Lyrics: apanii dhun men rahataa huun main bhii tere jaisaa huun  o pichhalii rut ke saathii ab ke baras main tanahaa huun  terii galii men saaraa din dukh ke kankar chunataa huun  meraa diyaa jalaaye kaun main teraa khaalii kamaraa huun  apanii lahar hai apanaa rog dariyaa huun aur pyaasaa huun  aatii rut mujhe royegii jaatii rut kaa jhonkaa huun

Title: is andaaz se kaash wo shok aaye
Lyrics: is andaaz se kaash wo shok aaye hansen chaandtaare falaq jagamagaaye  koii naaz se hans ke nazaren milaaye jahaanetahammul  ulat kyuun na jaaye  fasaanaa mohabbat kaa doharaa rahaa huun wafaadaariyaan koii kyuun bhuul jaaye  chhupaaye se chhupataa nahiin raazulfat koii laakh parade men isako chhupaaye  nazar sahamiisahamii qadam bahakebahake liye jaa rahaa hai koii dil churaaye

Title: jalavaagaahedil men marate hii andheraa ho gayaa
Lyrics: jalavaagaahedil men marate hii andheraa ho gayaa jisamen the jalave tere vo aainaa kyaa ho gayaa  phir tasavvur ne badhaa dii naalaaemaujon kii lay phir fizaaedard men ik sher paidaa ho gayaa  birahaman kahataa thaa anahad shek bol uthaa ahad nuqtaaras donon na the aapas men jhagadaa ho gayaa  najd ke hiranon se aijaazemuhabbat puuchhiye pad gaii jis par nigaaheqais lailaa ho gayaa  raftaaraftaa kho gaye gardish men jalave sainkadon dil meraa siimaab ik aainaakaanaa ho gayaa

Title: ruup teraa mastaanaa pyaar meraa diivaanaa
Lyrics: ruup teraa mastaanaa pyaar meraa diivaanaa  bhuul koii hamase naa ho jaaye  raat nashiilii mast samaa hai  aaj nashe men saaraa jahaan hain  2 aaye sharaabii mausam bahakaaye  e  e  e threedots ruup teraa mastaanaa pyaar meraa diivaanaa  bhuul koii hamase naa ho jaaye  aankhon se aankhen milatii hain jaise  bechain hoke tuufaan men jaise  2 mauj koii saahil se takaraaye  e  e  e threedots ruup teraa mastaanaa pyaar meraa diivaanaa  bhuul koii hamase naa ho jaaye  rok rahaa hai hamako zamaanaa  duur hii rahanaa paas naa aanaa  2 kaise magar koii dil ko samajhaaye  e  e  e threedots ruup teraa mastaanaa pyaar meraa diivaanaa  bhuul koii hamase naa ho jaaye

Title: main ne bhii husn kii nazaron men jagah paayii hai
Lyrics: main ne bhii husn kii nazaron men jagah paayii hai tum mile ho to muhabbat se bahaar aayii hai mere siine pe zaraa haath to rakh kar dekho dil kii dhadakan ye nahiin pyaar kii shehanaaii hai  ye hasiin ruup ye zulfon ke nashiile saaye jaise bhar puur qayaamat pe shabaab aa jaaye ruk se parde ko zaraa der hataa rahane do tum ko dekhegaa vahii jis kii qazaa aayii hai mere siine pe zaraa threedots  dil to kyaa jaan bhii main tum pe lutaa sakataa huun zindagii maut ke parde men chhupaa sakataa huun mujhe gam do ki khushii ab hai tumhaarii marzii main ne to ishq men mitane kii qasam khaayii hai mere siine pe zaraa threedots  ishq kii raah men saahil bhii hai tuufaan bhii hain is men izzat bhii hai rusavaaii ke saamaan bhii hain merii jaan duniyaan ke dar se na badal jaanaa tuu kyon kii ab mil ke na milane men bhii rusavaaii hai

Title: gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa
Lyrics: gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa o bikhar jaanaa haay bikhar jaanaa bikhar jaanaa haay bikhar jaanaa o gorii o gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa  har adaa terii kamaal mukhadaa chaand kii misaal chaltii moranii kii chaal jaane kyuun naa dil kaa haal badgumaan thodii der to thahar jaanaa o thahar jaanaa haay thahar jaanaa thahar jaanaa haay thahar jaanaa o gorii o gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa  ye dupattaa jaalidaar pahane motiiyon kaa haar halkaa halkaa hai nikhaar aaye kis tarah naa pyaar ye bahaar uspe ye teraa sanwar jaanaa o sanwar jaanaa haay sanwar jaanaa sanwar jaanaa haay sanwar jaanaa o gorii o gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa gorii zulm kare zulf kaa bikhar jaanaa

Title: rote rote hansanaa siikho hansate hansate ronaa
Lyrics: rote rote hansanaa sikho hansate hansate ronaa  jitanii chaabhii bharii raam ne are utanaa chale khilaunaa   2  ham do ek hamaarii pyaarii pyaarii muniyaa hai  bas yahii chotii si apanii sari duniya hai  ham do ek hamaarii pyaarii pyaarii muniyaa hai  khushiyon se abad hai apane ghar ka konaa konaa  rote rote threedots   badi badi khushiyaan hain chhotii chhotii baaton men  nanhe munhe taare jaise sotii raton men  badi badi khushiyaan hain chhotii chhotii baaton men  aisa sundar hai ye jivan jaise koi sapana salonaa  rote rote threedots   mausam badale to mat dar jaanaa gudiyaa rani  mausam badale to mat dar jaanaa gudiyaa rani  savan men bijalii chamakegi barasegaa pani  dharatii ambar bhig jaayen nainon ko nahiin bhigonaa  rote rote threedots

Title: aankhon se duur subah ke taare chale gae
Lyrics: aankhon se duur subah ke taare chale gae niind aa gaii to gam ke nazaare chale gae  naakaamiiehayaat kaa karate bhii kyaa gilaa do din guzaaranaa the guzaare chale gae  allaah rii bekudii ki ham unake hii ruubaruu beiktiyaar unhiin ko pukaare chale gae  jalve kahaan jo zauqetamaashaa nahiin shakiil nazaren chalii gaiin to nazaare chale gae

Title: aho pati so upaai kachhu kiijai
Lyrics: aho pati so upaai kachhu kiijai  jihin upaai apano yah baalak raakhi kans so liijai  manasaa vaachaa kahat karmanaa nrip kabah na patiijai  budhi bal chhal kal kaise huun karike kaadhi anat hii diijai  naahin na itano bhaag jo yah ras nit lochan put piijai  suuradaas aise sut ko jas shravananii suni suni jiijai

Title: gameaashiqii se kah do raaheaam tak na pahunche
Lyrics: gameaashiqii se kah do raaheaam tak na pahunche mujhe kauf hai ye tohamat mere naam tak na pahunche  main nazar se pii rahaa thaa to ye dil ne badduaa dii teraa haath zindagii bhar kabhii jaam tak na pahunche  ye aadaaebeniyaazii tujhe bevafaa mubaarak magar aisii berukhii kyaa ki salaam tak na pahunche  vahii ik khaamosh nagamaa hai shakeel jaanehastii jo zubaan tak na aaye jo kalaam tak na pahunche

sirocco o chandaa jaa unse ye kahnaa ke tum bin banaa kathin hai jiite rahnaa o chandaa  chalii gaiin sab khushiyaan saath tumhaare roen merii tanhaaiyaan duub gayaa dil bujh gae aas ke taare dasane lagiin parchaaiyaan mere aas paas mandalaaen yaad ke saae mujhe raat raat bhar tum bin niind naa aae chandaa jaa unse ye kahnaa ke tum bin banaa kathin hai jiite rahnaa o chandaa  jaan akelii dard naa koii jaane apne paraae ho gae hame dikhaakar pal bhar kvaab suhaane jaane kahaan tum kho gae meraa chain chiin kar aankh churaane vaale mujhe ek baar phir aa kar gale lagaale chandaa jaa unse ye kahnaa ke tum bin banaa kathin hai jiite rahnaa o chandaa

Title: andherii raat men ham aur tum
Lyrics: andherii raat men ham aur tum haathon men haath hai hosh hain gum bhiigaa mausam mast samaan hai tum hasiin to ham bhii javaan hain aise men ab hosh kahaan hai aankhon men bas josh rahaa hai andherii raat men threedots  zamiin pe pyaar kii behoshii dekho chhaane lagii rimajhim rimajhim barasaat gaane lagii bhiinii khushbuu bhii havaaon men se aise milane lagii mastii men mast band kaliyaan bhii khilane lagiin hoe zamiin pe pyaar kii behoshii dekho chhaane lagii ek to hai ye mausam suhaanaa aur hai ye dil bhii diivaanaa dekho mauqaa ye naa ganvaanaa batalaanaa naa koii bahaanaa andherii raat men threedots  har ik dil ko milaa duuje dil kaa saath hai dil jo bejubaan to nazaron men baat hai ye zaruurii hai kahanaa baat kuchh khaas hai dhadakan tej hai aur honthon pe pyaas hai oe har ik dil ko milaa duuje dil kaa saath hai ik chehare men duuje kaa saayaa manachaahaa jab saathii paayaa jaaduu pyaar kaa aisaa chhaayaa chaand bhii dekho sharamaayaa andherii raat men threedots

Title: rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase
Lyrics: rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase are kaine maarii pichakaarii torii bhiigii angiyaa o rangarasiyaa rangarasiyaa ho rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase threedots  sone kii thaalii men jonaa parosaa are sone kii thaalii men jonaa parosaa haan sone kii thaalii men jonaa parosaa are khaae gorii kaa yaar balam tarase rang barase holii hai o rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase threedots 		     laungaa ilaayachii kaa are laungaa ilaayachii kaa laungaa ilaayachii kaa  haan are laungaa ilaayachii kaa biidaa lagaayaa haan laungaa ilaayachii kaa biidaa lagaayaa chaabe gorii kaa yaar balam tarase rang barase holii hai               o rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase threedots 		     are belaa chamelii kaa sej bichhaayaa belaa chamelii kaa sej bichhaayaa are belaa chamelii kaa sej bichhaayaa haan belaa chamelii kaa sej bichhaayaa soe gorii kaa yaar balam tarase rang barase holii hai               o rang barase bhiige chunaravaalii rang barase threedots

Title: aur kuchh der thahar aur kuchh der na jaa
Lyrics: aur kuchh der thahar aur kuchh der na jaa aur kuchh der thahar threedots  raat baaqii hai abhii raat men ras baaqii hai paake tujhako tujhe paane kii havas baaqii hai aur kuchh der thahar aur kuchh der na jaa aur kuchh der thahar threedots  jism kaa rang fazaa men jo bikhar jaayegaa maharabaan husn teraa aur nikhar jaayegaa laakh zaalim hai zamaanaa magar itanaa bhii nahiin tuu jo baahon men rahe vaqt thahar jaayegaa aur kuchh der thahar aur kuchh der na jaa aur kuchh der thahar threedots  zindagii ab inhiin qadamon pe lutaa duun to sahii ai hasiin but main kudaa tujhako banaa duun to sahii aur kuchh der thahar aur kuchh der na jaa aur kuchh der thahar threedots

Title: sakhii hamaaro atal suhaag shyaam sapane men aaye
Lyrics: sakhii hamaaro atal suhaag shyaam sapane men aaye dekho hamaare jaage bhaag sakhii ham un sang byaahe  na to baajaa dhol shahanaaii baaje 2 mohan kii baansuriyaa pe main aap hii naache main naachii wo dekh dekh ankhiyaan bhar laaye 2 bhakton ke bhagwaan ne uth kar pair dabaaye shyaam sapane men aaye threedots  mand mand musakaaye sakhii kaliyaan madhuban kii 2 laaj se jhuk gaye nain umange naachii man kii giridhar laal ka bhyaah rachaa taare muskaaye 2 miira ki ankhiyon men do aansuu sharmaaye shyaam sapane men aaye theedots

Title: badii suunii suunii hai zindagii ye zindagii
Lyrics: badii suunii suunii hai zindagii ye zindagii  2 main khud se huun yahaan ajanabii ajanabii badiithreedots  kabhii ek pal bhii kahiin ye udaasii dil meraa bhuule kabhii muskuraakar dabe paanv aakar dukh mujhe chhuule na kar mujhase gam mere dillagii ye dillagii badiithreedots  kabhii main na soyaa kahiin mujhase khoyaa sukh meraa aise pataa naam likhakar kahiin yuunhii rakhakar bhuule koii kaise ajab dukh bharii hai ye bebasii bebasii badiithreedots

Title: ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan
Lyrics: ye raat ye chaandanii phir kahaan sun jaa dil kii daastaan ye raatthreedots  pedon kii shaakhon pe soii soii chaandanii tere khayaalon men khoii khoii chaandanii aur thodii der men thak ke laut jaaegii raat ye bahaar kii phir kabhii na aaegii do ek pal aur hai ye samaa sun jaathreedots  laharon ke honthon pe dhiimaa dhiimaa raag hai bhiigii havaaon men thandii thandii aag hai is hasiin aag men tuu bhii jalake dekhale zindagii ke giit kii dhun badal ke dekhale khulane de ab dhadakanon kii zubaan sun jaathreedots  jaatii bahaaren hain uthatii javaaniyaan taaron ke chhaaon men pahale kahaaniyaan ek baar chal diye gar tujhe pukaarake lautakar na aaenge qaafile bahaar ke aajaa abhii zindagii hai javaan sun jaathreedots

Title: dhuup men nikalo ghataaon men nahaakar dekho
Lyrics: dhuup men nikalo ghataaon men nahaakar dekho  zindagii kya hai kitaabon ko hataakar dekho   vo sitaaraa chamakane do yuunhii aankhon men  kya zaruurii hai use jism banaakar dekho   pattharon men bhi zubaan hoti hai dil hota hai  apane ghar ke darodivaar sajaakar dekho   faasilaa nazaron ka dhokhaa bhi to ho sakataa hai  vo mile ya na mile haath badhaakar dekho

Title: ye sinduurii shaam chhedatii hai man kii taar
Lyrics: ye sinduurii shaam ye sinduuri shaam  chhedatii hai man kii taar  jii karataa hai udakar pahunchuun  niil gagan ke paar			2 ye sinduurii shaam  vo dekho dekho na do panchhii spoken vo dekho do panchhii udate hain gagan men udate hain laakhon gagan aaj mere man men satarangii kalpanaa men khoii jharane se bahatii jaauun ye sinduurii shaam  phuulon kii gandh leke pavan 		2 aayaa hai paas aayaa hai paas samajhe mere raajaa nahiin samajhe spoken with laughter phuulon kii gandh leke pavan aayaa hai paas aayaa hai paas rangon men kisakii rang kar udate uunchii patang kyaa hii usake sang spoken  ye sinduurii shaam ye sinduuri shaam chhedatii hai man kii taar jii karataa hai udakar pahunchuun niil gagan ke paar ye sinduurii shaam

Title: dil men ab dardemuhabbat ke sivaa kuchh bhii nahiin
Lyrics: dil men ab dardemuhabbat ke sivaa kuchh bhi nahiin  zindagii meri ibaadat ke sivaa kuchh bhi nahiin   main teri barahgahenaaz men kya pesh karuun  meri jholii men muhabbat ke sivaa kuchh bhi nahiin   ai khudaa mujhase na le mere gunahon ka hisaab  mere paas ashqenadamat ke sivaa kuchh bhi nahiin   vo to mit kar mujh ko mil hii gayii raahat varanaa  zindagii ranzomusiibat ke sivaa kuchh bhi nahiin

Title: laakh paradon men rahuun
Lyrics: laakh paradon men rahuun bhed mere kholatii hai shaayarii sach bolatii hai mainne dekhaa hai ke jab merii zubaan dolatii hai shaayarii sach bolatii hai  teraa isaraar ke chaahat merii betaab na ho vaaqif is gam se meraa halqaaeahabaab na ho tuu mujhe zabt ke saharaaon men kyuun rolatii hai shaayarii sach bolatii haithreedots   ye bhii kyaa baat ke chhup chhup ke tujhe pyaar karuun gar koii puuchh bhii baithe to main inakaar karuun jab kisii baat ko duniyaa kii nazar tolatii hai shaayarii sach bolatii hai  mainne is fikr men kaatiin kaii raaten kaii din mere sheron men teraa naam na aaye lekin jab terii saans merii saans me ras gholatii hai shaayarii sach bolatii hai

Title: ge ge ge gele zaraa timbakatuu
Lyrics: he gorii zaraa batiyaan suno jii morii koras dhin tak tak tak  koii terii galii aayaa chorii chorii chorii koras dhin tak tak tak  kakharii makharii aakharii makharii kakharii makharii aakharii makharii he he he he koras dhin tak tak taak  ge ge ge gele zaraa timbakatuu kaathamanduu kaathamanduu balle huu main main main main hun loha chumbak tuu kaise bhala bach bachake rahun  o ho ho bhanvare ko kyaa rokengii diivaaren kaante chamakaaen cham cham talvaaren pavan jab chalii o gorii gorii kalii main aayaa terii galii koii kyaa karegaa gaa gaa  ge ge gelezaraa threedots  o ho ho milane aayaa tujhase yah parvaanaa ai merii shamaa tuune nahiin pahachaanaa main vahii huun diivaanaa palak ha giraanaa tuu zaraa saa uthaanaa aankhon kaa pardaa daa daa  ge ge gelezaraa threedots   o ho ho tujhako mere sangsang chalanaa hai chandaa ko baadal se milanaa hai roke jo koii aake tuu lat bikharaake nazar ko bachaake andheraa kiye jaa jaa jaa  ge ge gelezaraa threedots

Title: unhiin ko dekh rahii hai nigaaheshauq merii
Lyrics: unhiin ko dekh rahii hai nigaaheshauq merii jo ban ke ajanabii mahafil men aaye baithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain2 yahii to hain jo meraa dil churaaye bithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain nazar uthaa ke vo ik baar ham ko dekh to len2  jo aaj pyaar ki qasamen bhulaaye baithe hain yahii to hain jo meraa dil churaaye baithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain kisii ghareeb ko luutaa hai jin ke vaadon ne2  tamaashaa dekhane uska vo aaye baithe hain yahii to hain jo meraa dil churaaye bithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain jinhon ne ham ko basaayaa thaa apanii aankhon men2  hamii se aaj vo aankhen churaaye baithe hain yahii to hain jo meraa dil churaaye bithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain nazar uthaa ke vo ik baar ham ko dekh to len2 jo aaj pyaar kii qasamen bhulaaye baithe hain yahii to hain jo meraa dil churaaye bithe hain nigaah niichii kiye sar jhukaaye baithe hain

Lyrics: ud gayaa bhanvaraa ud gayaa bhanvaraakalii udaas kalii udaaskalii udaas kyuun bhanvare ne priit lagaaiikaahe chhod gayaa harajaaii 2 lagii bujhii na thiiman kii pyaas ud gayaa bhanvaraa threedots  daal gale men sundar baahen  gaye dil men angaare2 chhod gaye mujhe sab kii paas ud gayaa bhanvaraa threedots  bujh gayaa diipak jalate jalateruk gaii naiyyaa chalate chalate2 ro ro pukaarii kisii pumaar  ud gayaa bhanvaraa threedots  bachane se pahale ujad gaii mainujad gaii mainujad gaii milake piyaa se bichhad gaii mainbichhad gaii mainbichhad gaii bichhade jaise phuulon se baag ud gayaa bhanvaraa threedots

Lyrics: balamaa badaa naadaan re balamaa badaa naadaan  bedadrii sang naataa laagaa mere priit kaa bhaag na jaagaa binatii karuun main painyaa paduun main ab to merii maan re balamaa badaa naadaan re   threedots  bainyaa pakaduun haath dabaauun samajhat naahi kaise samjhaauun laakh jatan kar haar gayii main rogii ho gayii jaan re  balamaa badaa naadaan re   threedots

Lyrics: chi bholii suurat dil ke khote       naam bade aur darashan chhote darashan chhote  chi naye zamaane kii ye naarii uunchii sandal baankii saadii      nainon men kajaraa honthon pe laalii ko  haath men kangan kaan men baalii kaan men baalii chi nainon men kajaraa honthon pe laalii      nakhare bade mote mote      naam bade aur darashan chhote   threedots  la  naye zamaane ke ye chhailaa ujale kapade dil hai mailaa      rangrangiilii inakii taaii ghar men lekin kadakii chhaaii ko  kadakii chhaaii kadakii chhaaii kadakii chhaaii la  rangrangiilii inakii taaii ghar men lekin kadakii chhaaii      fashion bade mote mote      naam bade aur darashan chhote   threedots  la  husn aur ishq kii ye ladaaii shuruu se jag men hotii aayii chi naa koii jiite naa koii haare ajii kyon na dil mil jaaye saare  do  na ham bade na tum chhote      naam bade aur darashan chhote   threedots

Title: bas ek chup sii lagii hai
Lyrics: bas ek chup sii lagii hai nahiin udaas nahiin kahiin pe saans rukii hai nahiin udaas nahiin bas ek chup sii lagii hai   koii anokhii nahiin aisii zindagii lekin khuub na ho mili jo  khuub milii hai  nahiin udaas nahiin bas ek chup sii lagii hai    threedots  sahar bhii ye raat bhii dopahar bhii milii lekin hamiin ne shaam chunii hamiin ne  shaam chunii hai nahiin udaas nahiin bas ek chup sii lagii hai   threedots  vo daasataan jo hamane kahii bhii hamane likhii aaj vo  khud se sunii hai  nahiin udaas nahiin  bas ek chup sii lagii hai

Title: yaad terii aaegii mujhako badaa sataaegii

Lyrics: aashaa  aa aathreedots hn hnthreedots aa aathreedots          do dil dhadak rahe hain aur aavaaz ek hai 2 talat   nagame judaajudaa hain magar saaz ek hai donon  do dil dhadak rahe hain aur aavaaz ek hai 2  t rangiin har adaa hai bechain har nazar hai 2 a ik dard saa idhar ik dard saa udhar hai t donon kii beqaraarii kaa andaaz ek hai 2 do nagame judaajudaa hain magar saaz ek hai     do dil dhadak rahe hain aur aavaaz ek hai  a tadapaaiye na hamako sharmaaiye na hamase 2 t donon kii zindagii hai ek duusare ke dam se 2 a ham do kahaaniyaan hain magar raaz ek hai 2 do nagame judaajudaa hain magar saaz ek hai     do dil dhadak rahe hain aur aavaaz ek hai 2

Title: dam dam digaa digaa mausam bhigaa bhigaa
Lyrics: dam dam digaa digaa  mausam bhigaa bhigaa bin piye main to giraa main to giraa main to giraa haay allaah suurat aap kii suhaanallaah  terii adaa vaah vaah kyaa baat hai akhiyaan jhukii jhukii baaten rukii rukii dekho luteraa aaj lut gayaa haay allaah   threedots  sanam ham maanaa gariib hain ajii sanam ham nasiibaa khotaa sahii bandaa chhotaa sahii dil ye khazaanaa hai pyaar kaa haay allaah   threedots  terii qasam tuu merii jaan hai mukhadaa bholaa bhaalaa chupake daakaa daalaa jaane tuu kaisaa mahamaan hai haay allaah   threedots

Title: chhed kar tazkiraaedaurejawaanii royaa

Title: tuune raat ganwaaii soye ke
Lyrics: tuune raat ganwaaiin soy ke diwas ganwaayaa khaay ke hiiraa janam amol thaa kaudii badale jaay tuune raat ganwaaiin soye ke  sumiran lagan lagaaye ke mukh se kachhu na bol re baahar ke pat band kar andar ke pat khol re  maalaa pherat jug huaa gayaa na manakaa pher2 haath kaa manakaa chhod de2 man kaa manakaa pher tuune raat ganwaaiin threedots  dukh men sumiran sab kare sukh men kare na koy jo sukh men sumiran kare so dukh kaahe ko hoy  sukh men sumiran naa kiyaa dukh men karataa yaad re kahe kabiir us daas ki kaun sune fariyaad  tuune raat ganwaaiin soy ke diwas ganwaayaa khaay ke hiiraa janam amol thaa kaudii badale jaay

Title: dost ban ban ke mile mujhako mitaane vaale  jagjit gazal
Lyrics: dost ban ban ke mile mujhako mitane vaale maine dekhe hain kai rang badalane vaale  tumane chup rahake sitam aur bhii dhaayaa mujhapar tumase achchhe hain mere haal pe hansane vaale  main to ikhalaq ke hathon hii bika karataa huun aur honge tere baazar men bikane vaale  akhirii daur pe salaamedilemustar lelo  phir naa lautenge shabehijr pe ronevaalethreedots

Title: nahiin chaahiye rang mahal na dhan daulat kii kaam
Lyrics: nahiin chaahiye rang mahal na dhan daulat kii shaan ham to maange tujh se maalik ik santosh ke daan ki ghar ghar men khushahaalii ho sadaa sukh kii hariyaalii ho  tuu ne ham ko janam diyaa hai tuu hii paalanahaar terii dayaa se phuulephale ham sab kaa ghar sansaar nahiin chaahiye hiiremotii 2 na ratanon kii kaam ham to maange tujh se maalik threedots  sukh ke badale duhkh dene kii agar bhaavanaa terii duhkh ko sahane kii shakti de yahii praarthanaa merii kisii ke aage haath na phailaayen apanii mahanat kaa sukh paayen itanaa de varadaan ham to maange tujh se maalik threedots

Title: teraa raamajii karenge bedaa paar bhajan
Lyrics: teraa raamajii karenge bedaa paar udaasii mana kaahe ko kare   naiyaa terii raama havaale lahar lahar hari aap samhaale hari aap hii uthaayen teraa bhaar udaasii mana kaahe ko kare                            kaabuu men manjhadhaar usii ke haathon men patavaar usii ke terii haar bhii nahiin hai terii haar udaasii mana kaahe ko kare    sahaja kinaaraa mila jaayegaa parama sahaaraa mila jaayegaa dorii saunpa ke to dekh ek baar udaasii mana kaahe ko kare    tuu rm nirdoshha tujhe kyaa dar hai paga paga para saathii iishvara hai sachchii bhaavanaa se kar le pukaar udaasii mana kaahe ko kare

Title: terii galiyon men na rakhenge kadam aaj ke baad
Lyrics: terii galiyon men naa rakhenge kadam aaj ke baad tere milane ko na aaenge sanam aaj ke baad terii galiyon men naa threedots  tuu meraa milanaa threedots tuu meraa milanaa samajh lenaa ek sapanaa thaa tujhako aakhir mil hii gayaa jo teraa apanaa thaa ham ko duniyaa men samajhanaa naa sanam aaj ke baad tere milane ko naa aaenge sanam  aaj ke baad  gir ke aaengii  threedots gir ke aaengii ghataaen phir se saavan kii tum to baahon men rahogii apane saajan kii gale ham gam ko lagaaenge sanam  aaj ke baad tere milane ko naa aaenge sanam  aaj ke baad

Title: panchhii priit kii riit nibhaa
Lyrics: panchhii priit kii riit nibhaa dhiire dhiire ghaav bharenge dard chhupaae jaa panchhii priit ki riit nibhaa  prem hai dukh kii aag men jalanaa tadap tadap kar maranaa jiinaa paagal ro le chaahe jo ronaa jag men hansii dikhalaa panchhii priit kii riit nibhaa  premii ne jab duniyaa khoii priit bhii jaagii qismat soii aas milan kii chhup chhup roii priit ke devtaa aise patthar kaun kare puujaa panchhii priit kii riit nibhaa

Title: aaj kii raat badii shokh badii natakhat hai
Lyrics: aaj kii raat badii shokh badii natakhat hai aaj to tere binaa niind na aayegii  ab to tere hii yahaan aane kaa ye mausam hai ab tabiiyat na kayaalon se bahal paayegii dekh vo chhat pe utar aayii hai saavan kii ghataa de rahii dvaar pe aavaaz khadii puravaaii bijalii rah rah ke pahaadn pe chamak uthatii hai suunii aankhon men koii kvaab le jyon angadaaii kaise samajhaauun kaise samajhaauun ki is vaqt kaa matalab kyaa hai dil kii hai baat ho dil kii hai baat na honthon se kahii jaayegii aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots  ye bhatakate hue jugunuu ye diye aavaaraa bhiigate pedon pe bujhbujh ke chamak uthate hain tere aanchal men take salamen sitaare jaise mujh se milane ko binaa baat damak uthate hain saaraa aalam saaraa aalam hai giraftaar tere husn men jab mujhase hii kaise ho mujhase hii kaise ye barasaat sahii jaayegii aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots  raat raanii kii ye bhiinii sii nashiilii khushabuu aa rahii hai ke jo chhan chhan ke ghanii daalon se aisaa lagataa hai kisii dhiith jhakhore se lipat khel aayii hai tere ulajhe hue baalon se aur bezaar aur bezaar na kar mere tadapate dil ko aisii rangiin ho aisii rangiin gazal raat na phir gaayegii aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots  aa aaj kii raat badii shokh badii natakhat hai     aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii     ab to tere hii yahaan aane kaa ye mausam hai     ab tabiiyat na kayaalon se bahal paayegii      haay paanii kii ye rimajhim ye khuledaar phuhaar     aise nas nas men terii chaah jagaa jaatii hai     jaise pinjare men kisii qaid pade panchhii ko     apanii aazaad udaanon kii yaad aatii hai     ab to aa jaao     ab to aa jaao mere maang ke sinduur suhaag     saans terii hai     saans terii hai tere naam pe mit jaayegii     aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots      aisii hii raat to vo thii ki terii nazaron ne     mujhe pahanaayaa thaa jab pyaar ke kapadon kaa libaas     aur us raat bhii aisii hii sharaabii thii fizaa     jab terii baahon men mahakii thii merii saansoadaa      aur ab aisii     aur ab aisii javaan rut men akelii main huun     aa jaa varanaa     aa jaa varanaa ye shamaa kaanp ke bujh jaayegii     aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots  ra par thahar vo jo vahaan     par thahar vo jo vahaan lete hain futpaathon par     laash bhii jinake kafan tak na yahaan paatii hai     aur vo jhonpade chhat bhii na hai sar par jin ke     chhaate chhappar hii jahaan zindagii so jaatii hai     pahale in sab ke liye     pahale in sab ke liye ek imaarat gadh luun     phir terii maang     phir terii maang sitaaron se bharii jaayegii  aa aaj to tere binaa niind nahiin aayegii threedots

Title: dil deke dekho dil deke dekho
Lyrics: dil deke dekho  dil deke dekho dil deke dekho jii dil lene vaalon  dil denaa siikho jii ho threedots dil lene vaalon dil denaa siikho jii  puuchho puuchho puuchho paravaane se zaraa dhiire dhiire jalane men kaisaa hai mazaa  ohoho threedots tum bhii dil deke jal jaanaa siikho jii aahaahaa threedots tum bhii dil deke jal jaanaa siikho jii kaise  dil deke dekho threedots  samajho samajho samajho diivaane kii zubaan pyaar jo naa hotaa naa hotaa ye jahaan  ohoho threedots tum bhii dil deke ye gaanaa siikho jii aahaahaa threedots tum bhii dil deke ye gaanaa siikho jii kyaa  dil deke dekho threedots

Title: husn ke laakhon rang kaun saa rang dekhoge
Lyrics: husn ke laakhon rang kaun saa rang dekhoge aag hai ye badan kaun saa ang dekhoge  gaalon ke ye phuul gulaabii inakii rangat kyaa jaano honthon ke do jaam sharaabii inakii lazzat kyaa jaano zulfon kii ye chhaanv ghanerii inakii raahat kyaa jaano husn ke laakhon rang   threedots  padre men kyaa chhupaa huaa hai terii nazar ye kyaa jaane in aankhon ke piichhe kitane base hue hain maikhaane piike dekho jaam nazar kaa ho jaaoge diivaane husn ke laakhon rang   threedots

Title: aaj kal men dhal gayaa din huaa tamaam
Lyrics: aaj kal men dhal gayaa din huaa tamaam tuu bhii so jaa so gaii rang bharii shaam  1 so gayaa chaman chaman so gaii kaliikalii so gae hain sab nagar so gaii galiigalii niind kah rahii hai chal merii baanh thaam tuu bhii threedots  2 hai bujhaabujhaa saa dil bojh saanssaans pe  jii rahe hain phir bhii ham sirf kal kii aas pe kah rahii hai chaandanii leke teraa naam tuu bhii threedots  3 kaun aaegaa idhar kisakii raah dekhen ham jinakii aahaten sunii jaane kisake ye kadam apanaa koi bhii nahiin apane to hain raam tuu bhii threedots

Title: jinhen thaa hamase kabhii pyaar zindagii kii tarah
Lyrics: jinhen thaa hamase kabhii pyaar zindagii kii tarah vo aaj pahaluu men baithe hain ajanabii kii tarah jinhen thaa hamase threedots  nazar nazar men hamen chhuuke muskaraate hain kariib aate nahiin naa hamen bulaate hain guzar rahaa hai har ik lamhaa ik sadii kii tarah jinhen thaa hamase threedots  vo hamasaayaa kyaa hue jo safar men chhod gae binaa kasuur mohabbat ke rishte tod gae lagaayaa dil bhii unhonne to dillagii kii tarah jinhen thaa hamase threedots

Title: ham bhii mit jaate koii zakmetamannaa ban kar
Lyrics: ham bhii mit jaate koii zakmetamannaa ban kar kaash aatii na terii yaad masiihaa ban kar  dil kii har aag bujhaane ko terii yaad aaii kabhii qataraa kabhii shabanam kabhii dariyaa ban kar  raastaa bhuul gaii yaad kisii kii waranaa ham gariibon ke ghar aatii na ujaalaa ban kar  jab chale dasht kii jaanib to ye dekhaa hamane saamane yaad khadii thii terii lailaa ban kar

Title: jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz
Lyrics: jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz aaj meraa salaam letaa jaa mere dil kaa payaam letaa jaa jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz   threedots  main terii kaak huun mere raahii mujhako bhii saath saath aane de iltajaa hai ki raah men apanii aaj palaken bichhaane de mujhase utanaa to kaam letaa jaa jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz   threedots  alvidaa jaaneaarazuu tujhako gam ke maare salaam kahate hain ye lute ghar ye pyaar kii galiyaan ye nazaare salaam kahate hain yaadgaaren tamaam letaa jaa jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz   threedots  saans jab tak hai mere siine men main teraa intazaar kar luungii khush rahe tuu ye hai duaa merii main to gam se bhii pyaar kar luungii pyaar kaa tuu bhii naam letaa jaa jaane vaale teraa kudaa haafiz   threedots

Title: jaa tujhe bhuul gae
Lyrics: jaa tujhe bhuul gae yaad rahe gam tere is tarah dil se hue dil se hue ham tere  wo mazaa gam kaa liyaa dil ne kahaan hai thodaa zindagii talk huii maut ne rishtaa todaa par tere zulm kii gafalat ko nahiin dekh sake yuun to ummiid ke har saans ne aanaa chhodaa jaa tujhe bhuul gae threedots  dil ke ashqon ko sareaam bikharate dekhaa har subah raat ke aanchal se tapakate dekhaa par tere zulm kii gafalat ko nahiin dekh sake ham ne gumanaam bahaaron ko bhatakate dekhaa jaa tujhe bhuul gae threedots  bandh kaliyon ko bhii shaakon pe tadapate dekhaa apane gulashan me nasheman ko sulagate dekhaa par tere zulm kii gafalat ko nahiin dekh sake yuun to majhadhaar me saahil ko badalate dekhaa jaa tujhe bhuul gae threedots

Title: sur sangiit kii jogan ban ke
Lyrics: sur sangiit kii jogan ban ke giit main gaauun galii galii galii galii apane dil ke aramaanon kaa rang sajaauun galii galii galii galii threedots  sur sangiit hai jiivan meraa main dharatii ye saavan meraa apane rasiile giiton kaa main ras barasaauun galii galii galii galii threedots  aaj talaq jo kuchh paayaa hai ye fan meraa saramaayaa hai jab tak dam hai aavaazon ke phuul khilaauun galii galii galii galii threedots  main kyaa merii hastii kyaa hai sab mere pyaaron kii duaa hai main apane pyaaron kii kaatir sur bikharaauun galii galii galii galii threedots

Title: kholii hai zubaan phir bhii to kaamosh rahe hain
Lyrics: kholii hai zubaan phir bhii to kaamosh rahe hain hamane terii duniyaa ke bahut zulm sahe hain kaamosh rahe hain kholii hai zubaan phir bhii to kaamosh rahe hain  sach kahane pe saiyyaad ne todii hain balaaen 2 phuulon kii ye qisamat hai ke kaanton men rahe hain kaamosh rahe hain kholii hai zubaan phir bhii to kaamosh rahe hain  dekhaa na gayaa haay 2 mere ghar kaa andheraa 2 haalat pe merii shammaa ke 2 aansuu bhii bahe hain kaamosh rahen hain  kholii hai zubaan phir bhii to kaamosh rahe hain hamane terii duniyaa ke bahut zulm sahe hain kaamosh rahe hain

Title: tere naalnaalnaal ve main rahanaa
Lyrics: tere naalnaalnaal ve main rahanaa main tere haandii duniyaa jaandii  tuu vain meraa gahanaa  kadiikadii te kar gallaan meriyaan lokiin kehndey main terii aan main terii aan  tuun vii kolkolkol mere bahanaa main tere haandii duniyaa jaandii tuun vain meraa gahanaa tere naalnaalnaal ve main rahanaa  ve tuun paththar main tainuun mom banaavaan gii aeho jeyaa main tainuun payaar sakaavaan gii kal nuun payaarpayaarpayaar tuun vii kahanaa main tere haandii duniyaa jaandii  tuun vain meraa gahanaa tere naalnaalnaal ve main rahanaa  gusse hoyaa na kar mere haaniyaan ve main tere pairaan nuun hath laaniyaan men naiin rozrozroz periin penaan main tere haandii duniyaa jaandii  tuun vain meraa gahanaa tere naalnaalnaal ve main rahanaa

Title: dil ko le kar tum kinaare ho gae
Lyrics: haan  dil ko lekar tum kinaare ho gae is tarah ham besahaare ho gae 2  pyaar kyaa jis pyaar me koii gam nahiin tum nahiin to ham nahiin aur dam nahiin 2 paas aa kar tum kinaare ho gae is tarah ham besaahaare ho gae  main banaa badal to bijalii tuu banaa 2 royaa main saawan kii ik mahafil banaa 2 shukr hai aansuu hamaare ho gae is tarah ham besaahaare ho gae  maut kaa har dhang meraa mehmaan hai zindagii kyaa hai goyaa shamashaan hai 2 rote rote ham dilaare ho gae is tarah ham besaahaare ho gae

Title: kahaan se aaye badaraa
Lyrics: kahaan se aae badaraa ghulataa jaae kajaraa kahaan se aae badaraa ghulataa jaae kajaraa  palakon ke satarange diipak ban baithe aansuu ki jhalar motii kaa anamolak hiiraa mittii me jaa phisalaa kahaan se aae badaraa threedots  niind piyaa ke sang sidhaarii sapanon ki suukhii phulavaarii amrit hothon tak aate hii jaise vishh men badalaa kahaan se aae badaraa threedots  utare megh yaa phir chhaaye nirday jhonke agana badhaaye barase hain ab tose saavan roe  man hai pagalaa kahaan se aaye badaraa threedots

Title: abhii kamasin ho naadaan ho jaane jaanaa
Lyrics: buraa na maano sanam apanaa dil hamen de do  2  hamaarii baat rakho  hamen bhii saath rakho  tumhen hamaarii qasam tumhen hamaarii qasam apanaa dil hamen de do buraa na maano sanam apanaa dil hamen de do   abhii kamasin ho naadaan ho jaane jaanaa  2 kyaa karogii meraa dil tod dogii meraa dil pahale siikho dil lagaanaa abhii kamasin ho naadaan ho jaane jaanaa  bahut hasiin ho thaharo shabaab aane do shariir aankhon men sharmaohijaab aane do tumhaare saamane phir beshumaar dil honge dil honge jahaan bhii jaaogii sajade hazaar dil honge aane vaalaa hai haan aane vaalaa hai ab aisaa qaatil zamaanaa abhii kamasin ho threedots  gunaah thaharegaa sabase nazar milaanaa bhii banegaa jurm kisii din ye muskuraanaa bhii kabhii jo dil kii kasak dard banake ubharegii ubharegii tadap tadap ke shabeintazaar guzaregii koii puuchhegaa haan koii puuchhegaa jab kyaa karogii bahaanaa abhii kamasin ho threedots

Title: pahachaan to thii pahachaanaa nahiin mainne apane aap ko jaanaa nahiin
Lyrics: pahachaan to thi pahachaanaa nahin mainne apane aap ko jaanaa nahin pahachaan to thi  jab dhuup barasati hai sar pe to paani men chhaanv khilati hai main bhuul gai thi chhaanv agar milati hai to dhuup men milati hai is dhuup aur chhaanv kii khel men kyon jinakaa ishaaraa samajhaa nahin pahachaan threedots  main jaagii rahi kuchh sapanon men aur jaagii hui bhi soi rahi jaane kin bhuulabhulaiyaa men kuchh bhataki rahi kuchh khoi rahi jinake liye main marati rahi jinakaa ishaaraa samajhaa nahin pahachaan threedots

Title: kabhii kabhii sapanaa lagataa hai
Lyrics: ki  kabhii kabhii sapanaa lagataa hai  kabhii ye sab apana lagataa hai  tum samajhaa do man ko kyaa samajhaauun  aa  kabhi kabhi sapanaa lagataa hai  kabhi ye sab apana lagataa hai  tum samajha do man ko kya samajhaauun   aa  mujhe agar baahon men bhar lo shaayad tumako chain mile  2  ki  chain to us din khoyaa mainne jis din tumase nain mile  phir bhi ye achchhaa lagataa hai magar abhii sapanaa lagataa hai   tum samajhaa do man ko kya samajhaauun   aa  kabhi kabhi sapanaa lagataa hai  kabhi ye sab apana lagataa hai  tum samajhaa do man ko kya samajhaauun   ki  chehare pe hai aur ek cheharaa kaise use hataaun  meraa sach gar tum apana lo janam janam tarasaauun  aise sab achchhaa lagataa hai sab ka sab sapanaa lagataa hai  tum samajhaa do man ko kya samajhaauun   aa ki  kabhi kabhi sapanaa lagataa hai  kabhi ye sab apana lagataa hai  tum samajhaa do man ko kya samajhaauun   ki  kabhi kabhi sapanaa lagataa hai

Title: kaalii ghataa chhaaye moraa jiyaa tarasaaye
Lyrics: kaalii ghataa chhaaye moraa jiyaa tarasaaye aise men kahiin koii mil jaaye re bolo kisii kaa kyaa jaaye re kyaa jaaye re kyaa jaaye kaalii threedots  huun main kitanii akelii vo ye jaanate  2 mere berang jiivan ko pahachaanate mere haathon ko thaamen hanse aur hansaaye mera dukh bhulaaye kisii kaa kyaa jaaye kaalii threedots  unhii bagiyan men dolan men khoyii huii na to jaagii huii sii na soyii huii mere baalon me koii dhiire se aaye kalii thak jaaye  kisii kaa kyaa jaaye kaalii threedots  usake rahen takun talamalatii phirun  har aahat pe naina bichhatii phirun vo jo aayegaa kal na kyun aaj aaye meraa man basaaye kisii kaa kyaa jaaye kaalii threedots

Title: nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas
Lyrics: saa nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  2 koi rahataa hai vo ho tum mmmmm  anu nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  2 koi rahataa hai vo ho tum mmmmm  saa nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  betaabii kyaa hotii hai puchho mere dil se  2 tanhaa tanhaa lautaa huun mai to bhari mahafil se mar naa jaauun kahin threedots mar naa jaauun kahin hoke tum se judaa  saa nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  2 koi rahataa hai vo ho tum mmmmm nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  anu tanhaai jine naa de bechaini tadapaae  2 tumako main naa dekhun to dil meraa ghabarae ab mujhe chhod ke threedots ab mujhe chhod ke duur jaanaa nahiin  anu nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  2 koi rahataa hai vo ho tum mmmmm saa nazar ke saamane jigar ke paas  2  dono koi rahataa hai vo ho tum mmmmm

Title: dhak dhak dhak jiyaa kare dhak
Lyrics: dhak dhak dhak jiyaa kare dhak akhiyon men akhiyaan daalake na tak  suno rii o gorii tuu ne chorii chorii dil kii kahaanii aankhon kii zabaanii kah dii balam se apane sanam se jhukii jhukii akhiyon se hotaa hai shaq akhiyon men akhiyaan daalake na tak  yun na sharamaao jii zaraa khul jaao jii chhodo jii chhodo mukhadaa na modo hamase bhii thodii thodii akhiyaan milaao jii dekhen bhalaa karoge ye zidd kab tak akhiyon men akhiyaan daalake na tak  sach sach kaho baat  kaho baat kaisii huii mulaaqaat mulaaqaat jaanate ho kab se  kab se ki ab se ham se chhupaaoge to bachake na jaaoge aage tum piichhe ham jaaoge thak akhiyon men akhiyaan daalake na tak  dhak dhak dhak jiyaa kare dhak akhiyon men akhiyaan daalake na tak

Title: gam shamaa kaa sab ne dekhaa
Lyrics: baat chalii terii aankon se jaa pahunchii paimaane tak khiinch rahii terii ulfat aaj mujhe maikhaane tak  ishq kii baaten gam ki baaten duniyaa vaale karate hain gam shamaa kaa sab ne dekhaa kaun gayaa paravaane tak  ishq nahiin hai tumako mujhase yuun hii baaten karatii ho yuun hii bahaane qaayam rakhanaa tum mere mar jaane tak  bas itanaa kahanaa hai tumase mumkin ho to aa jaanaa jab aaogii rukanaa hogaa aankhon ke patharaane tak

Title: aadam kaa lahuu aadam kaa lahuu
Lyrics: maayuus na ho ai mere vatan aansuu se na dho ye laal kafan mitakar bhii nahiin mit paataa hai aadam kaa lahuu aadam kaa lahuu	2  aayaa banakar gaandhii vo kabhii aayaa banakar gaandhii vo kabhii jaagaa banakar sukraat kabhii bolaa banakar manasuur kabhii chiikhaa banakar farahaad kabhii sau bhes badalakar aataa hai aadam kaa lahuu aadam kaa lahuu	2  hinduu vo nahiin musalim vo nahiin	2 inasaan re bas inasaan hai vo nafarat jo kare shaitaan hai vo gar pyaar kare bhagavaan hai vo atare  men samandar laataa hai aadam kaa lahuu aadam kaa lahuu        2
