Title: mere dil men tuu hii tuu hai
Lyrics: chi mere dil men tuu hii tuu hai dil kii davaa kyaa karuun jag dil bhii tuu hai jaan bhii tuu hai tujhape fidaa kyaa karuun 2 do  mere dil men tuu hii tuu hai dil kii davaa kyaa karuun  chi khud ko kho ke tujhako paakar kyaakyaa mila kyaa kahuun      terii hoke jiine men kyaa aaya mazaa kyaa kahuun jag kaise din hain kaisii raaten kaisii fizaa kyaa kahuun      merii hoke tuune mujhako kyaa kyaa diyaa kyaa kahuun chi mere pahaluu men jab tuu hai phir main duaa kyaa karuun jag dil bhii tuu hai jaan bhii tuu hai tujhape fidaa kyaa karuun do  mere dil men tuu hii tuu hai dil kii davaa kyaa karuun  jag hai ye duniyaa dil kii duniyaa milake rahenge yahaan      luutenge ham khushiyaan har pal duhkh na sahenge yahaan chi aramaano ke chanchal dhaare aise bahenge yahaan      ye to sapano kii jannat hai sab hii kahenge yahaan      ye duniyaa mere dil men basii hai dil se judaa kyaa karuun jag dil bhii tuu hai jaan bhii tuu hai tujhape fidaa kyaa karuun 2 do  mere dil men tuu hii tuu hai dil kii davaa kyaa karuun

Title: more nainaa saavan bhaado torii rah rah yaad sataaye
Lyrics: more nainaa saavan bhaado torii rah rah yaad sataaye baalam kit jaauun main main to ro ro kar mar jaauun re  aaii ras kii bharii phuhaare morii bhiij rahii re akhiyaan is rimjhim men saanvariyaa morii sulag rahii re bagiyaa morii sulag rahii re bagiyaa main to priit kiye pachhataaii re moraa darad na jaane koii baalam kit jaauun main   threedots  main to pavan chakorii bhuulii ban jangal kii hiraniyaa kahaan chhup gayaa re more chandaa kit gaii re haay chandaniyaa kit gaii re haay chandaniyaa aa re motii chugatii hansii ab chug rahii re angaare baalam kit jaauun main   threedots

Title: chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas
Lyrics: chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas sun lo magar ek baat ek dor se bandhogii sanam kisii din hamaare saath lataa  chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas sun lo magar ek baat tum is galii to main us galii ki aauun kabhii na haath chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas  lataa  mere piichhepiichhe chale to ho baabuu par zaraa tirachhii hai chaal aashiq bananaa jaao kahiin siikho tum abhii dochaar saal chaahat ke qaabil ban jaao phir main karuungii phir main karuungii baat chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas sun lo magar ek baat tum is galii to main us galii ki aauun kabhii na haath kishor  chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas  kishor  o merii chanchal pavan basantii karo nahiin yuun beqaraar in baanhon men aanaa hai tumako aakir jaanebahaar dil thaame aaogii phir main puuchhuungaa tumase puuchhuungaa tumase baat chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas sun lo magar ek baat ek dor se bandhogii sanam kisii din hamaare saath lataa  chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas sun lo magar ek baat tum is galii to main us galii ki aauun kabhii na haath chaahe raho duur chaahe raho paas

Title: dil dhadake aankh morii phadake
Lyrics: dil dhadake aankh morii phadake chale jaanaa na dekho jii bichhad ke dil dhadake   threedots  kahiin biite na duhkh men javaanii kahiin sun le na duniyaan kahaanii kahiin ban jaauun main na diivaanii dil dhadake   threedots  kahiin thahare na ulfat kaa dhaaraa kahiin paa le na koii ishaaraa kahiin tuute na dil ka sahaaraa dil dhadake   threedots  kahiin jaanaa na kar ke bahaanaa na bane do dilon kaa fasaanaa dekho naazuk bahut hai zamaanaa dil dhadake   threedots

Title: tuu mere saath chal na paaegii  mukesh gazal
Lyrics: tuu mere saath chal na paaegii jab merii raah terii raah se milatii hii nahiin phir meraa saath nibhaane kii zaruurat kyaa hai apanii maasuum tamannaaon ko raibaar naa banaa kvaab phir kvaab hain labon kii haqiikat kyaa hai ye naii raah tujhe raas nahiin aaegii  maine maanaa ki tujhe mujhase muhabbat hai magar merii gurbat terii chaahat kaa dilaa kyaa degii apanii meharumiekismat se pareshaan huun main bebasii ashqenadaamat ke sivaa kyaa degii vaqt kii dhuup men har chiiz jhulas jaegii tuu mere saath chal na paaegii

Title: ajii o gokul ke gwaale
Lyrics: ajii o gokul ke gwaale hamaro man haranewaale tum jitane ho natakhat chhaliyaa ham utane bhole bhaale ajii o gokul ke gwaale threedots  sakhiyon se karo barajorii maakhan kii karo tum chorii kyaa bansii zaraa saraahii ban baithe bansiiwaale ajii o gokul ke gwaale threedots  kis baat pe itaraate ho kyon yuun hii akad jaate ho ham tum se kahiin gore hain jii ham se kahiin tum ho kaale aji o gokul ke gwaale threedots  raadhaa ko rulaayaa hogaa jii usakaa jalaayaa hogaa aa baithen hain jo ankhiyon men yah sahame hue dil ke chhaale ajii o gokul ke gwaale threedots

Title: tuu hii re tuu hii re tere binaa main kaise jiyuun
Lyrics: tuu hii re tuu hii re tere binaa main kaise jiyuun aajaa re aajaa re yuun hii tadapaa naa tuu mujhako jaan re jaan re in saanson men bas jaa tuu chaand re chaand re aajaa dil kii zamiin pe tuu  chaahat hai agar aake mujhase mil jaa tuu yaa phir aisaa kar dharatii se milaa de mujhako tu hii re tuu hii re tere binaa main kaise jiyuun aajaa re aajaa re yuun hii tadapaa naa tuu mujhako  in saanson kaa dekho tum paagalapan ke aaye nahiin inhen chain mujhase ye bolii main raahon men terii  apane bichhaa duun ye nain in uunche pahaadon se jaan de duungaa main  gar tuum naa aaii kahiin tum udhar jaan ummiid merii jo todo idhar ye jahaan chhoduu main maut aur jindagii tere haathon men de diyaa re  aaii re aaii re le main aaii huun tere liye todaa re todaa re har bandhan ko pyaar ke liye jaan re jaan re aajaa tujhamen samaa jaauun main dil re dil re teri saanson men bas jaauun main  chaahat hai agar aake mujhase mil jaa tuu yaa phir aisaa kar dharatii se milaa de mujhako tu hii re tuu hii re tere binaa main kaise jiyuun aajaa re aajaa re yuun hii tadapaa naa tuu mujhako  aa threedots  sau baar bulaae main sau baar aauun  ik baar jo dil diyaa ik aankh roye to dujii bolo  soyegii kaise bhalaa in pyaar kii raahon men patthar hain kitane  un sab ko hii paar kiyaa ik nadii huun main chaahat bharii aaj milane  saagar ko aaii yahaan sajanaa sajanaa aaj aansuu bhii mithe lage  tu hii re tuu hii re tere binaa main kaise jiyuun aajaa re aajaa re yuun hii tadapaa naa tuu mujhako jaan re jaan re in saason men bas jaa tuu chaand re chaand re aajaa dil kii zamiin pe tuu  pal pal pal pal vakt to bitaa jaaye re zaraa bol zaraa bol vaqt se ke vo tham jaaye re aaii re aaii re le main aaii huun tere liye jaan re jaan re aajaa tujhamen samaa jaauun main

Title: din dhal jaaye haay raat naa jaay
Lyrics: din dhal jaaye haay raat naa jaay tuu to na aae terii yaad sataaye  din dhal jaaye  pyaar men jinake sab jag chhodaa aur hue badanaam unake hii haathon haal huaa ye baithe hain dil ko thaam apane kabhii the ab hain paraaye din dhal jaaye haay threedots  aisii hii rimjhim aisii fuvaren aisii hii thii barasaat khud se judaa aur jag se paraaye ham donon the saath phir se vo saavan ab kyuun na aaye din dhal jaaye haay threedots  dil ke mere tum paas ho kitanii phir bhii ho kitanii duur tum mujh se main dil se pareshaan donon hain majabuur aise men kisako kaun manaaye din dhal jaaye haaye threedots

Title: idhar aa rahe hain vo nazaren jhukaa ke

Title: paanv paduun tore shyaam
Lyrics: paanv paduun tore shyaam brij men laut chalo laut chalo paanv paduun tore shyaam brij men laut chalo   threedots  suunii kadam kii thandii chhaiyyaan khoje dhun bansii kii byaakul hoke brij na dubo de laharen jamunaajii kii laut chalo laut chalo   threedots  duudh dahii se bharii matakiyaa tode kaun muraarii asuvan jal se bhare gagariyaa panaghat pe panihaari laut chalo laut chalo   threedots  bilakh rahii hai maat yashodaa nandjii duhkh men khoye kuchh to soch are nimrohii brij kaa kan kan roye laut chalo laut chalo   threedots

Title: tum ne mujhako sadaa jalaayaa
Lyrics: tum ne mujhako sadaa jalaayaa ek niraalii jhalak dikhaa ke sau bijalii kii chamak dikhaake chhupaa liaa apane chehare ko phir na zaraa ghuunghat sarakaayaa sadaa jalaayaa tum ne mujhako threedots  mere dil me aag lagaaii apanii divaalii khuub manaaii main vo jalataa huaa diyaa huun jisakaa ujaalaa tum ne churaayaa sadaa jalaayaa tum ne mujhako threedots  tum ne to siikhaa hai jalaanaa tumhen kahaan aataa hai bujhaanaa ye main ne jaanaa jab tum ne aankh milaa ke dil na milaayaa sadaa jalaayaa tum ne mujhako threedots

Title: dil dil nahiin rahaa meraa terii chaahat men
Lyrics: dil dil nahiin rahaa meraa terii chaahat men 2 main ho gayaa huun diivaanaa terii chaahat men taare ginataa rahataa huun chaandanii raaton men main ho gayaa huun diivaanaa terii chaahat men  barason se saath thaa mere par meraa nahiin huaa 2 jaane kyaa baat hai tujhamen jab tuune ise chhuaa ye pal men ho gayaa teraa terii chaahat men main ho gayaa huun diivaanaa terii chaahat men  maane na koii kahanaa meraa kud men rahe magan 2 bas men na aae mere chaahe jitane karuun jatan ki chain kho gayaa meraa terii chaahat men main ho gayaa huun diivaanaa terii chaahat men  tum duur ho to dekho saaraa aalam udaas hai 2 nazadiik aa bhii jaao mujhako milane kii aas hai dil udaas hai o jaanaa terii chaahat men main ho gayaa huun diivaanaa terii chaahat men

Lyrics: tum bin merii kaun khabar le   govardhan giridhaarii 2  mor mukut piitaambar sohe 2 kundal kii gat nyaarii re govardhan giridhaarii threedots  bharii sabhaa men draupadii  2 raakho laaj hamaarii re govardhan giridhaarii threedots  miira ke prabhiu giridhar naagar 2 charan kamal balihaarii re govardhan giridhaarii threedots

Title: nazar lage na saathiyon
Lyrics: nazar lage naa saathiyon are ho o o o ho o o o aaj bharii mahafil meraa kahiin dol na jaaye dil in gorii gorii memon kaa habaa babaa babaabaa  ham to dhakke khaa baiteh ab tum kyaa khaane aaye o baat karo kuchh kheton kii tum jahaan se hoke aaye yahaan to pal pal dhune ke maare dam bhii ghutataa jaaye aao aao hamen pilaao soe huon ko zaraa jagaao khaao piyo mauj manaao maukaa phir nahiin aanaa ore laanaa oye aaj bharii mahafil   threedots  dil vaalon se milanaa ho to bandaa hii kii dariyaa vahaan vo jiivan saathi hai yahaan roz nayaa saanvariyaa ye bhii thiik hai vo bhii thiik hai apanaa apanaa nazariyaa laaj nahiin hai naa hai aanchal  roz baras ke ud jaataa hai ye angrezii husn kaa jaaduu are do paatan ke biich men yaaron saabut bachaa na koy kyon roye ho aaj bharii mahafil   threedots

Title: aise tuute taar ke mere giit adhuure rah gaye
Lyrics: aise tuute taar ke mere giit adhure rah gaye  giit adhure rah gaye  aisa tuutaa dil ke tukade aansuu ban kar bah gaye  aansuu ban kar bah gaye   pyaar kii ik tasviir banaakar kismat ne khud thukaraa dii  kismat ne khud thukaraa dii aansuu dekar in nainon ko mujhako dedii barabaadii  mujhako dedii barabaadi  ik din yahii honaa tha ye aansuu bah kar kah gaye  aansuu bah kar kah gaye  aise tuute taar ke mere giit adhuure rah gaye threedots  koi jab ye giit sunegaa pyaar ka phir vo naam na legaa  pyaar ka phir vo naam na legaa  pyaar kiyaa to yuunhii jalegaa tadapegaa royegaa  tadapegaa royegaa  ham to hain patthar ke insaan ham to ye dukh sah gaye  ham to ye dukh sah gaye  aise tuute taar ke mere giit adhuure rah gaye threedots

Title: vo ham se chup hain ham un se chup hain dilon ke aramaan machal rahe hain
Lyrics: vo ham se chup hain ham un se chup hain dilon ke aramaan machal rahe hain ajiib ziddh hai ki ziddh hii ziddh men ye din javaanii ke dhal rahe hain  hamaare dil men hai vo bulaayen vo sochate hain ki ham bulaayen shamemuhabbat sulag rahii hai dilon ke paravaane jal rahe hain 2 dilon ke paravaane jal rahe hain threedots  besabr se sabr ho rahaa hai bechain saa chain ho rahaa hai zabaan pe taale pade hue hain kalejaa haathon se mal rahe hain  2 kalejaa haathon se mal rahe hain  vo ham se chup hain threedots

Title: jaaneman jaaneman tere do nayan
Lyrics: ye jaaneman jaaneman tere do nayan chorii chorii leke gae dekho meraa man jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman aa mere do nayan chor nahiin sajan tumase hii khoyaa hogaa kahiin tumhaaraa man jaaneman jaaneman jaaneman ye jaaneman threedots aa mere threedots  ye tod de dilon kii duurii aisii kyaa hai majabuurii dil dil se milane de aa jaa abhii to huii hai yaarii abhii se hii beqaraarii din to zaraa dhalane de ye chhod threedots aa abhii to threedots ye yahii sunate samajhate guzar gae jaane kitane hii saavan jaaneman threedots aa mere do threedots  aa sang sang chale mere maare aage piichhe fere samajhuun main tere iraade ye doshh teraa hai ye to har din jab dekho karatii ho jhuuthe vaade aa sang sang threedots ye doshh teraa threedots aa tuu na jaane diivaane dikhaauun tujhe kaise main ye dil kii lagan ye jaaneman threedots  aa laa laa threedots aa mere do threedots  ye chhedenge kabhii na tumhe zaraa batalaado hame kab tak ham tarasenge aa aise ghabaraao nahiin kabhii to kahiin na kahiin baadal ye barasenge ye chhedenge threedots aa aise threedots ye kyaa karenge barasake ke jab murajhaayegaa ye saaraa chaman ye jaaneman threedots  aa laa laa threedots aa mere do threedots

Title: harchand sahaaraa hai tere payaar kaa dil ko
Lyrics: harchand sahaaraa hai tere payaar kaa dil ko rahataa hai magar ek ajab kauf saa dil ko  vo kwaab ki dekhaa na kabhii le udaa niinden vo dard ki utthaa na kabhii khaa gayaa dil ko  yaa saans kaa lenaa bhii guzar jaanaa hai jii se yaa maarakaaeishq bhii ik khel thaa dil ko  vo aaen to hairaan vo jaaen to preshaan yaa rab koii samajhaae ye kayaa ho gayaa dil ko

Title: kasamen vaaden pyaar vafaa sab baaten hain baaton kaa kyaa
Lyrics: kasame vaade pyaar vafaa sab baaten hain baaton kaa kyaa koi kisii kaa nahiin ye jhuuthe naate hain naaton kaa kyaa kasame vaade pyaar vafaa sab baaten hain baaton kaa kyaa  hogaa masiihaa threedots hogaa masiihaa saamane tere phir bhii na tuu bach paayegaa teraa apanaaaaa aaaaa  tera apana khuun hii aakhir  tujhako aag lagaayegaa aasamaan men threedots aasamaan me udane vaale mittii men mil jaayegaa kasame vaade pyaar vafaa sab baaten hain baaton kaa kyaa  sukh men tere threedots sukh men tere saath chalenge dukh men sab mukh modenge duniyaa vaale threedots duniyaa vaale tere banakar teraa hii dil todenge dete hain threedots dete hain bhagavaan ko dhokhaa inasaan ko kyaa chhodenge kasame vaade pyaar vafaa sab baaten hain baaton kaa kyaa

Title: kayaalon men kisii ke is tarah aayaa nahiin karate
Lyrics: giitaa kayaalon men kisii ke  is tarah aayaa nahiin karate     kisii ko bevafaa aa aa ke tadapaayaa nahiin karate  mukesh dilon ko raund kar dil apanaa bahalaayaa nahiin karate     jo thukaraae gae hon unako thukaraayaa nahiin karate  giitaa hansii phuulon kii do din chaandanii bhii chaar din kii hai     chaandanii chaar din kii hai     milii ho chaand sii suurat to itaraayaa nahiin karate     kisii ko threedots  giitaa jinhen mitanaa ho vo mitane se dar jaayaa nahiin karate     vo dar jaayaa nahiin karate     muhabbat karane vaale gam se ghabaraayaa nahiin karate     kisii ko threedots  mukesh muhabbat kaa sabak siikho ye jaakar jalanevaalon se     ye jaakar jalanevaalon se     ke dil kii baat bhii lab tak kabhii laayaa nahiin karate     jo thukaraaye threedots

Title: main nazar se pii rahaa huun
Lyrics: main nazar se pii rahaa huun ye samaan badal na jaaye na jhukaao tum nigaahen kahiin raat dhal na jaaye  mere ashk bhii hain isamen ye sharaab ubal na jaaye meraa jaam chhuune waale teraa haath jal na jaaye  abhii raat kuchh hai baakii na uthaa naqaab saaqii teraa rind girate girate kahiin phir sambhal na jaaye  merii zindagii ke maalik mere dil pe haath rakhanaa tere aane kii kushii men meraa dam nikal na jaaye  mujhe phuunkane se pahale meraa dil nikaal lenaa ye kisii kii hai amaanat kahiin saath jal na jaaye  isii kauf se nasheman main banaa sakaa na anawar ki nigaaheahalegulashan kahiin phir badal na jaaye

Title: sun bairii balam sach bol re ib kyaa hogaa
Lyrics: sun bairii balam sach bol re ib kyaa hogaa  main khoyii tuu khone lagaa haan mere dil men yuun yuun hone lagaa haan main rone lagii tuu rone lagaa re ib kyaa hogaa sun bairii balam   threedots  baithe baithe aah bharane lage he ham ikduuje par marane lage he ham ye kyaa nakahare karane lage re ib kyaa hogaa sun bairii balam   threedots  ab din ko sapane aane lage he taaro se aankh churaane lage he ham apane se sharamaane lage re ib kyaa hogaa sun bairii balam   threedots

Title: kyuun sharaabii sharaab piitaa hai
Lyrics: kyuun sharaabii sharaab piitaa hai aur phir behisaab piitaa hai jaanataa hai ke chiiz hai ye burii phir bhii kaanaakaraab piitaa hai  is kadar gam mile hain duniyaa men ham na piite to mar gaye hote gar sahaaraa na jaam kaa hotaa jaane kab ke bikhar gaye hote jisane aansuu piye hain chhup chhup ke aaj wo behijaab piitaa hai  aankh men kushk ho gae aansuu ek qataraa lahuu kaa dil men nahiin kaun saa jurm hai jo mere lie is kadar tang ho gaii hai zamiin kuchh to dukh hai jise chhupaane ko chiiz itanii karaab piitaa hai

Title: suno suno he krishhn kaalaa
Lyrics: suno suno he krishhn kaalaa 2 aaii tumhare dvaar  suno merii pukaar ab sunale baansurii vaalaa suno suno he krishhn kaalaa  tum jaanate hue jo na jaano na ab kaa se kahuun duhkh saaraa suno suno he krishhn kaalaa  mere paanv to ho aur main aa na sakuun huun adhiin main he diinaanaath jo main chhal se aauun kahuun jal le aauun to log kare badanaam jaisii jo chaahe baaten udaaye baaten udaaye jaisii jo chaahe 2 baaten udaaye kahe raadhaa bhii mohe kalankinii raadhaa bhii mohe kalankinii tose chorii jo milane aaye  jaisii chaahe jo baaten udaaye main to bol sakuun munh na khol sakuun prabhuu jab hii to abalaa naam moraa jiivan jaaye na daras dikhaaye na dikhaaye darasan shaam na dikhaaye daras mope dekho sakhi naahii khaaye taras more man kii rahii 2 man men haay haay more nainan ne dekhaa nahiin abhii shaam abalaa kaa duhkh he diinaanaath man kaa rahe hai man men chandiidaas kahe 3 sakhii he 2 chandiidaas kahe jis tan lage vahii tan ye dukhada jaane 2

Title: chhalakaaen jaam aaiye aapakii aankhon ke naam
Lyrics: chhalakaaen jaam aaiye aapakii aankhon ke naam honthon ke naam  phuul jaise tan ke jalave ye rangobuu ke ye rangobuu ke aaj jaamemay uthe in honthon ko chhuuke in honthon ko chhuuke lachakaaiye shaakhebadan laharaaiye zulphon kii shaam chhalakaaen jaam threedots  aapakaa hii naam lekar pii hai sabhii ne pii hai sabhii ne aap par dhadak rahe hain pyaalon ke siine pyaalon ke siine yahaan ajanabii koii nahiin ye hai aapakii mahafil tamaam chhalakaaen jaam threedots  kaun har kisii kii baahen baahon men daal le baahon men daal le jo nazar ko shaakh laae vo hii sambhaal le vo hii sambhaal le duniyaa ko ho auron kii dhun hamako to hai saaqii se kaam chhalakaaen jaam threedots

Title: nasiimekuueyaar aae naa aae
Lyrics: nasiimekuueyaar aae naa aae mere dil ko qaraar aae naa aae  kizaan hii se naa kyon ham dil lagaa len kudaa jaane bahaar aae naa aae  kiyaa hai aane kaa vadaa to us ne mere parwardigaar aae naa aae  uthaa saagar pilaa de kuul saaqii ke phir abrebahaar aae naa aae  mujhe hai aitabaarevadaa lekin tumhen kud aitabaar aae naa aae

Title: khaalii haath shaam aayii hai
Lyrics: khaalii haath shaam aayii hai khaalii haath jaayegii aaj bhii na aayaa koii khaalii laut jaayegii khaalii haath shaam aayii hai   threedots  aaj bhii na aaye aansuu aaj bhii na bhiige nainaa aaj bhii ye korii rainaa korii laut jaayegii khaalii haath shaam aayii hai   threedots  raat kii siyaahii koii paaye to mitaaye naa aaj na mitaayaa to ye kal bhii laut aayegii khaalii haath shaam aayii hai   threedots

Title: kaalii naagin ke jaisii zulfen terii kaalii kaalii
Lyrics: kaalii naagin ke jaisii zulfen terii kaalii kaalii saagar ko motii aur suuraj ko tuu detii hai laalii dekhe jo tujhako man meraa bole man men basii hai tuu haule haule kaalii kaalii naagin ke jaisii   threedots  gaal hain gore gore honth hain bhare ras ke pyaale chaal hai bahakii bahakii tuu kisii pe bhii dore daale ruup hai tiikhaa tiikhaa rang hai meraa sabase aalaa husn pe mar mitataa hai chaahe ho koii bhii dilavaalaa dekhe jo tujhako man meraa bole man men basii hai tuu haule haule   threedots  mere dil pe hai tere pyaar kaa nishaan halakaa halakaa beqaraarii kaa mere jaam hai sanam chhalakaa chhalakaa hosh men na hai koii sab pe hai teraa jaaduu jaaduu hain kadam bahake bahake khud pe na meraa qaabuu qaabuu dekhe jo tujhako man meraa bole man men basii hai tuu haule haule   threedots

Title: bahaarehusn terii mausameshabaab teraa
Lyrics: bahaarehusn terii mausameshabaab teraa kahaan se dhuundh ke laae koi javaab teraa ye subah bhii tere rukhasaar kii jhalak hii to hai ke naam leke nikalataa hai afataab teraa  jahaan tu hai vahaan phir chandanii ko kaun puuchhegaa teraa dar ho to jannat kii galii ko kaun puuchhegaa  kalii ko haath men lekar baharon ko naa sharamaanaa zamaanaa tujhako dekhegaa kalii ko kaun puuchhegaa  farishton ko pataa denaa naa apanii rahaguzaaron kaa vo qaafir ho gaye to bandagii ko kaun puuchhegaa  kisiiko muskuraake khuubasurat maut naa denaa qasam hai zindagii kii zindagii ko kaun puuchhegaa

Title: ye shabefiraaq ye bebasii hain kadam kadam pe udaasiyaan
Lyrics: ye shabefiraaq ye bebasii hain kadam kadam pe udaasiyaan meraa saath koii na de sakaa merii hasaraten hain dhuwaan dhuwaan  main tadap tadap ke jiyaa to kyaa mere kaab mujahse bichhad gaye main udaas ghar kii sadaa sahii mujhe de na koii tasalliyaan  chaliin aisii dard kii aandhiyaan mere dil kii bastii ujad gaii ye jo raakh sii hai bujhii bujhii hain isii men merii nishaaniyaan  ye fizaa jo gardogubaar hai merii bekasii kaa mazaar hai main wo phuul huun jo na khil sakaa merii zindagii men wafaa kahaan  hasan aisii jag men hawaa chale jo udaa ke mujhako bhii le chale main wahiin pe umr guzaar duun jahaan mere yaar kaa aastaan

Title: bachanaa ai hasiinon lo main aa gayaa
Lyrics: bachanaa ai hasiinon lo main aa gayaa  hay bachanaa ai hasiinon lo main aa gayaa  husn ka aashiq husn ka dushman  apanii ada hai yaaron se judaa  koras  hai ho  hai bachanaa threedots   hai duniya men nahiin hai aaj meraa saa divaanaa  pyaar vaalon kii jubaan pe hai meraa hii taraanaa  sabakii rang bharii aankhon pe aaj chamak rahaa hai meraa hii nashaa  koras  hai ho  hai bachana threedots   jaam milaten hain adab se shaam detii hai salamii  giit jhukate hai labon pe saaz karate hain gulaamii  ho koi paradaa ya badashaah aaj to sab hain mujhape fidaa  koras  hai ho  hai bachanaa threedots  ek hangaamaa uthaa duun main to jaaun jidhar se  jiit leta huun dilon ko ek halkii si najar se  mahabuubon kii mahafil men aaj chhaayii hai chhaayii hai meri hii ada  koras  hai ho   hai bacahanaa threedots

Title: har ghadii dhal rahii shaam hai zindagii
Lyrics: har ghadi dhal rahi shyam hai zindagi dard ka doosra naam hai zindagi har ghadi aasman hai wahi aur wahi hai zameen hai mukaam gair ka gair hai ya hameen ajnabi aankh si aaj hai zindagi dard ka doosra naam hai zindagi  kyon khade raah mein raah bhi so gayee apni to chaon bhi apne se kho gayee bhatke hue panchi ki raat hai zindagi dard ka doosra naam hai zindagi

Title: ye aalam shauq kaa dekhaa na jaaye
Lyrics: ye aalam shauq kaa dekhaa na jaaye wo but hai yaa kudaa dekhaa na jaaye  ye kin nazaron se tumane aaj dekhaa ke teraa dekhanaa dekhaa na jaaye  hameshaa ke liye mujhase bichhad jaa ye manzar baarahaa dekhaa na jaaye  galat hai jo sunaa par aazamaa kar tujhe ai baawafaa dekhaa na jaaye  ye maharuumii nahiin paasewafaa hai koii tere siwaa dekhaa na jaaye  faraaz apane siwaa hai kaun teraa tujhe tujhase judaa dekhaa na jaaye

Title: chhup gayaa koii re duur se pukaar ke
Lyrics: chhup gayaa koii re duur se pukaar ke dard anokhe haay de gayaa pyaar ke chhup gayaa threedots  aaj hain suunii suunii dil kii ye galiyaan ban gain kaante merii khushiyon kii kaliyaan pyaar bhii khoyaa maine sab kuchh haar ke dard anokhe haay de gayaa pyaar ke chhup gayaa threedots  ankhiyon se niind gai manavaa se chain re chhup chhup roe mere khoe khoe nain re haay yahii to mere din the singaar ke dard anokhe haay de gayaa pyaar ke chhup gayaa threedots

Title: ye nayan dare dare ye jaam bhare bhare zaraa piine do
Lyrics: ye nayan dare dare ye jaam bhare bhare zaraa piine do kal kii kisako khabar ik raat hoke nidar mujhe jiine do ye nayan dare dare threedots  raat hasiin ye chaand hasiin par sabase hasiin mere dilabar   2 aur tujhase hasiin aur tujhase hasiin tera pyaar tu jaane na ye nayan dare dare threedots  pyaar me hai jiivan kii khushii detii hai khushii kai gam bhii   2 mai maan bhii luun mai maan bhii luun kabhii haar tu maane na ye nayan dare dare threedots

Title: niind ud rahii hai  ye kyaa ho rahaa hai
Lyrics: niind ud rahii hai chain kho rahaa hai jaan jaa rahii hai ye kyaa ho rahaa hai ye kyaa ho rahaa hai ye kyaa ho rahaa hai aise naa mujhe dekho meraa dil dhadak rahaa hai niind ud rahii hai threedots  khushbuu khushbuu baaten terii mahakaa mahakaa cheharaa teraa terii baahen terii naramii saanson kii ye bhiinii garmii baarish kii buundon men saagar kii laharon men tum ho sanam diivaanii ho gaii huun aisaa lag rahaa hai jaan jaa rahii hai threedots  dhadakan merii sun lo jaanam kahatii kyaa hai socho jaanam tumase rishtaa itanaa gaharaa do hii pal men sadiyon jaisaa nagamon men saajon men dil men tum ho sanam dil ke mandiron men teraa diip jal rahaa hai niind ud rahii hai threedots

Title: ye laal rang kab mujhe chhodegaa
Lyrics: ye laal rang kab mujhe chhodegaa  meraa gam kab talaq meraa dil todegaa  ye laal rang threedots  kisii ka bhi liyaa naam to aaii yaad tu hii tu  ye to pyaala sharaab ka ban gayaa ye lahuu ye laal rang threedots  piine ki qasam daal di piiyuungaa kis tarah  ye na sochaa tune yaar main jiiyungaa kis tarah  ye laal rang threedots   chala jaauun kahiin chhod kar main tera ye shahar  yahaan to na amrit mile piine ko na zahar haay ye laal rang threedots

Title: ab chhalakate hue saagar nahiin dekhe jaate
Lyrics: ab chhalakate hue saagar nahiin dekhe jaate taubaa ke baad ye manzar nahiin dekhe jaate  mast kar ke mujhe auron ko lagaa muun saaqii ye karam hosh men rah kar nahiin dekhe jaate  saath har ek ko is raah men chalanaa hogaa ishq men rahazaanorahabaar nahiin dekhe jaate  ham ne dekhaa hai zamaane kaa badalanaa lekin un ke badale hue tevar nahiin dekhe jaate

Title: samaa hai suhaanaa suhaanaa nashe men jahaan hai
Lyrics: samaa hai suhaanaa suhaanaa nashe men jahaan hai kisii ko kisii kii khabar hii kahaan hai har dil men dekho mohabbat javaan hai  kah rahii hai nazar nazar se afasaane kah rahii hai nazar nazar se afasaane ho rahaa hai asar ke jisako dil jaane dekho ye dil kii ajab daastaan hai nazar bolatii hai dil bezubaan hai samaa hai suhaanaa suhaanaathreedots  ho rahaa hai milan dilon kaa mastaanaa ho rahaa hai milan dilon kaa mastaanaa ho gayaa hai koii kisii kaa diivaanaa jahaan dilarubaa hai dil bhii vahaan hai jise pyaar kahiye vahii darmiyaan hai samaa hai suhaanaa suhaanaathreedots

Title: tuu hai mere dil men  tuu kyaa kare main kyaa karuun
Lyrics: tuu hai mere dil men main huun tere dil men tuu bhii mushkil men main bhii mushkil men aisaa hii hotaa hai pyaar men chubhate hain kaante bahaar men tuu kyaa kare main kyaa karuun tuu hai mere dil men threedots  mil ke tujhe aisaa lagaa ab tak rahe ham kaise judaa ik duuje men ham khone lage hain paagal diivaane hone lage hain tuu kyaa kare main kyaa karuun tuu hai mere dil men threedots  naa roshanii naa chaandanii ik aag hai ye dil kii lagii ham donon isamen jalane lage hain dil pe ye jaaduu chalane lage hain tuu kyaa kare main kyaa karuun tuu hai mere dil men threedots

Title: sachchaaii chhup nahiin sakatii banaavat ke asuulon se

Title: ai dil hai mushakil jiinaa yahaan
Lyrics: r  ai dil hai mushakil jiina yahaan     zaraa hat ke zaraa bach ke     ye hai bambaii merii jaan      kahiin building kahiin traame kahiin motor kahiin mill     milataa hai yahaan sab kuchh ik milataa nahiin dil     insaan kaa nahiin kahiin naamonishaan      kahiin satta kahiin patta kahiin chorii kahiin res     kahiin daaka kahiin phaanka kahiin thokar kahiin thes     bekaaro ke hain kaii kaam yahaan      beghar ko aavaaraa yahaan kahate hans hans     khud kaate gale sabake kahe isako business     ik chiiz ke hain kaii naam yahaan  giiburaa duniyaa jo hai kahataa aisaa bholaa tuu na ban     jo hai karataa vo hai bharataa ye jahaan kaa hai chalan     tadabiir nahiin milane kii yahaan     suno mister suno bandhu     ye hai bambaii merii jaan      ai dil hai aasaan jiinaa yahaan     suno mister suno bandhu     yeh hai bambaii merii jaan  r  ai dil hai mushakil jiinaa yahaan     zaraa hat ke zaraa bach ke     ye hai bambaii merii jaan

Title: tum gaye lut gayaa pyaar kaa ye jahaan
Lyrics: tum gaye lut gayaa pyaar kaa ye jahaan na rahii wo kushii  na rahe aramaan tum gaye lut gayaa threedots  meri aankhon se tum roshanii le gaye mere honthon se tum sab hansii le gaye ab nahiin zindagi  zindagi wo kahaan  wo bahaaren gaiin  wo nazaare gaye merii raaton se wo chaand taare gaye chaandinii na merii  na meraa aasamaan tum gaye lut gayaa threedots

Lyrics: abhii to main javaan huun	 3  havaa bhii kushagavaar hai gulon pe bhii nikhaar hai tarannumen hazaar hain bahaar purabahaar hai kahaan chalaa hai saaqiyaa idhar to laut idhar to aa  3 are yah chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa rii nindiyaa taaron kii nagrii se aajaa 2  pariyon kii duniyaa ke nagme sunaakar 2 nanhe ko mere sulaajaa aajaa taaron kii nagrii se aajaa aa chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa  soyaa hai chandaa soe hain taare kvaabon men khoe hain saare nagme sunaauun main pyaare pyaare sojaa tuu dil ke saahaare aa pyaarii nindiyaa giiton se apne 2 nanhe kii duniyaa basaajaa aajaa taaron kii nagrii se aajaa aa chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa  raaten hon terii suhaanii re nanhe ujle hon tere savere chamke zamaane men tuu chaand bankar duur hon saare andhere aa pyaarii nindiyaa nanhe ko aakar 2 apne gale se lagaajaa aajaa taaron kii duniyaa se aajaa chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa rii nindiyaa taaron kii duniyaa se aajaa aa chandaa kii nagrii se aajaa

Title: juuhii jab se maine dekhaa tujhe raahon men
Lyrics: juuhii jab se maine dekhaa tujhe raahon men usii pal tuu hii aa gaii nigaahon men man kahataa tujhe bhar luun main baahon men dil rahataa meraa terii hii panaahon men terii aankhon kaa jaaduu chhaa gayaa merii niind kho gaii naa jaane ye mujhako kyaa huaa anahonii ho gaii juuhii jab se threedots  vo rut bhii nashiilii thii vo shaam bhii suriilii thii nigaahen jab milii thiin juuhii kii kalii khilii thii havaa jo puravaaii thii zulfen laharaaii thiin badariyaa chhaaii thii barakhaa tab aaii thii juuhii jab se threedots  badan bhiigaa saaraa thaa anokhaa saa nazaaraa thaa vo rut kaa ishaaraa thaa main dil meraa haaraa thaa vo sapanaa salonaa thaa huaa jo vahii honaa thaa ye dil kaa khilaunaa thaa mujhe to ise khonaa thaa juuhii jab se threedots

Title: gale lagaa ke jo sunate the dil kii aahon ko
Lyrics: gale lagaa ke jo sunate the dil kii aahon ko taras rahaa huun unhiin kii hasiin baahon ko gale lagaa ke jo sunate the  kadamkadam pe vo aankhen bichhaabichhaa denaa zaruur yaad to hogaa tumhaarii raahon ko gale lagaa ke jo sunate the  dohaaii hai terii ai raahazan dohaaii hai ki aaj luut liyaa raahabar ne raahon ko gale lagaa ke jo sunate the  mile na phir tere daaman men daag un ke shamiim sharaabenaab se dhoyaa hai jin aahon ko gale lagaa ke jo sunate the dil kii aahon ko

Title: har taraf har jagah beshumaar aadamiilatajagjit gazal
Lyrics: j har taraf har jagah beshumaar aadamii  l har taraf har jagah beshumaar aadamii  dono phir bhi tanhaaiyon ka shikaar aadamii   l subah se shaam tak bojh dhotaa hua  j subah se shaam tak bojh dhotaa hua  j apanii hii laash ka khud mazaar aadamii   l har taraf bhaagate daudate raaste  har taraf aadamii ka shikaar aadamii   l roz jitaa hua roz marataa hua j roz jitaa hua roz marataa hua  j har nayii din nayaa intazaar aadamii   j zindagii ka muqaddar safar dar safar  l zindagii ka muqaddar safar dar safar  dono aakhirii saans tak beqaraar aadamii

Title: aayaa hai baarishon kaa mausam sharaab piikar
Lyrics: aayaa hai baarishon kaa mausam sharaab piikar aao ke bhuul jaaen sab gam sharaab piikar  gazalon ke jaam chhalake kuchh kaashii adaa se pahunche ham anjuman men jis dam sharaab piikar  kaliyon kaa ye tabassum bhanvaron kaa ye tarannum madahosh kar rahaa hai aalam sharaab piikar  kis husn kii sharaaben aankhon ko yaad aaii daaman men gir rahii hai shabanam sharaab piikar  shab hai sanbhal ke chalie sab raaz khol degii paazeb kii thirakatii chhamachham sharaab piikar

Title: ulfat men zamaane kii
Lyrics: har rasm ko thukarao threedots  ulfat men zamaane kii har rasm ko thukarao phir saath mere aao o  ulfat men zamaane kii threedots  qadamon ko na rokegii zanjir rivaazon kii  ham tod ke nikalenge diivaar samaajon kii  duurii pe sahii manzil duurii se na ghabaraao  ulfat men zamaane kii threedots  main apanii baharon ko rangiin bana luungaa  sau baar tumhen apanii palakon pe bithaa luungaa  shabanam kii tarah mere gulashan men bikhar jaao  ulfat men zamaane kii threedots  aa jaao ke jiine ke haalaat badal daalen  ham tum zamaane ke din raat badal daalen  tum meri vafaaon kii ek baar qasam khaao  ulfat men zamaane kii threedots  ulfat men zamaane kii har rasm ko thukaraao phir saath mere aao phir saath mere aao ulfat men zamaane kii threedots  duniyaa se bahut aage jis bhiid men ham honge ye soch lo pahale se har bhiid men gam honge hai khauf gamon se to ruk jaao thahar jaao phir saath mere aao phir saath mere aao  main tuutii huii kashtii khud paar lagaa luungii tuufaan ko maujon kii patavaar banaa luungii majhadhaar kaa dar hai to saahil pe thahar jaao phir saath mere aao phir saath mere aao  dil aur kahiin dekar tum chaahe badal jaao do chaar qadam chal kar mumkin hai bahak jaao phir saath mere aao phir saath mere aao

Title: dhiire dhiire machal ai dilebeqaraar
Lyrics: dhiire dhiire machal ai dilebeqaraar koii aataa hai yuun tadapake na tadapaa mujhe baalamaa koii aataa hai dhiire dhiire threedots  usake daaman kii kushabuu havaaon men hai usake kadamon kii aahat fazaaon men hai mujhako karane de karane de solah shringaar koii aataa hai dhiire dhiire machalthreedots  ruuthakar pahale jii bhar sataauungii main jab manaaenge vo maan jaauungii hain mujhako karane de karane de solah shringaar koii aataa hai dhiire dhiire machalthreedots  mujhako chhune lagin usakii parchhaaiyaan dilake nazdiik bajatii hain shahanaaiyaan mere sapanon ke aangan men gaataa hai pyaar koii aataa hai  dhiire dhiire machalthreedots

Title: ye sone kii duniyaa
Lyrics: ye sone kii duniyaa ye chaandii kii duniyaa yahaan aadamii kii bhalaa baat kyaa hai ye daulat kii duniyaa amiiron kii duniyaa yahaan par gariibon kii auqaat kyaa hai ye sone ki duniyaa   threedots                       ye tuute dilon ke jo tukade pade hain lagaa le inhen dil se vo dil kahaan hai ye futpaath par so rahen hain musaafir bataaye koii inakii manzil kahaan hai manzil kahaan hai binaa roshanii ke hii inake savere jo din hii andhere to phir raat kyaa hai ye daulat kii duniyaa amiiron kii duniyaa yahaan par gariibon kii auqaat kyaa hai ye sone kii duniyaa   threedots  ye bhuukhe ye nange ye bhikhmange bhii to kisii diinabandhu kii santaan hain re ye  javaanii ke jiine kaa adhikaar ye bhii ham jaise insaan hain re insaan hain re ye aankhen barasatii hain baarahon mahiine in ashqon ke aage ye barasaat kyaa hai ye daulat kii duniyaa amiiron kii duniyaa yahaan par gariibon kii auqaat kyaa hai ye sone kii duniyaa   threedots

Title: dil lenaa khel hai diladaar kaa
Lyrics: dil lenaa khel hai diladaar kaa  bhule se naam naa lo pyaar kaa  pyaar bhii ruuthaa yaar bhii ruuthaa  dekho mujhako dilavaalon haa  khaayaa hai dhokhaa ho mainne yaar kaa 2   vaadon pe inake na jaanaa  baaton men inakii na aanaa  are vaadon pe inake na jaanaa  baaton men inakii na aanaa  inakii mithii baaten ye matavaalii aankhen  zahar hai pyaar kaa  dil na khel hai threedots   inape zavaanii lutaa do  yaa zindagaanii lutaa do  are inape zavaanii lutaa do  yaa zindagaanii lutaa do  are kuchh bhii kar divaane rahenge ye anjaane  ronaa hai bekaar kaa  dil na khel hai threedots

Lyrics: dhuaan banake fizaa ne udaa diyaa mujhako  main jal rahaa tha kisii ne bujhaa diyaa mujhako   khada huun aaj bhi rotii ke chaar harq liye  savaal ye hai kitaabon ne kya diyaa mujhako   safed sang kii chaadar lapet kar mujh par  fasileshahar men kisane sajaa diyaa mujhako   main ek zarraa bulandii ko chhuune nikalaa tha  havaa ne thaam ke zamiin par giraa diyaa mujhako   dictionary             1      fiza                   environment                         2      hurf                   words                         3      sung                   stone                         4      faseeleshaher        boundary of city                         5      zurra                  small particle                         6      bulundi                height

Title: vaadaa kar le saajanaa tere binaa main na rahuun
Lyrics: vaadaa kare le saajanaa  tere binaa main na rahuun  mere binaa tuu na rahe  ho ke judaa threedots  ye vaadaa rahaa na honge judaa  ye vaadaa rahaa			2  ra main dhadakan tuu dil hai piyaa     main baatii tuu meraa diyaa     ham pyaar kii jyot jalaaen 2 la main raahii merii manzil hai tuu     main huun lahar aur saahil hai tuu     jiivan bhar saath nibhaaen 2  vaadaa kar le jaanejaan tere binaa main na threedots  la jab se mujhe teraa pyaar milaa     apanii to hai bas yahii duaa     har janam yuun milate rahenge 2 ra sundar saa ho apana jahaan     pyaar apanaa rahe sadaa javaan     ham sukhdukh mil ke sahenge 2  vaadaa kare le saajanaa  tere binaa main na threedots

Title: ye raaten ye mausam ye hansanaa hansaanaa
Lyrics: ye raten slow ye raten ye mausam ye hansana hansana ye raten mujhe bhul jana inhen na bhulana bhulana bhulana ye raten   ye bahaki nigahen  2 ye bahaki adaen ye bahaki nigahen ye bahaki adaen ye ankhon ke kajal men dubi ghataen fiza ke fiza ke labon par fiza ke fiza ke labon par ye chup ka fasana mujhe bhul jana inhen na bhulana bhulana bhulana ye raten   chaman men chaman men jo mil ke bani hai kahani hamari muhabbat tumhari javani chaman men ye do garm sanson ka ik sath ana ye badali ka chalana ye bundon ki rumajhum  2 ye masti ka alam ye khoe se ham tum tumhara tumhara mere sath ye gunagunana mujhe bhul jana inhen na bhulana bhulana bhulana ye raten

Title: bansii kii dhun sun
Lyrics: bansii kii dhun sun tere liye chun chun laayi huun main bagiyaa se gorii gorii kaliyaan nikalii huun chup chup ghar se main luk chhup aayii huun sajaane balam terii galiyaan  bhole sajan tere dil kii jalan main to jaan gayii jaan gayii jaan gayii re terii nazar kise dhuundhe idhar  main to jaan gayii jaan gayii jaan gayii re terii miithii nazar pahachaan gayii re duniyaa se bach bach kahatii huun sach sach aayii huun    threedots  baankii palak yah salonii jhalak mohe maar gayii maar gayii maar gayii re tere kasam yah suuratiyaa balam mohe mohe maar gayii maar gayii maar gayii re main to baithe bithaaye jiyaa haar gayii re dil meraa pal pal  kahataa thaa chal chal aayii huun    threedots

Title: yahii aramaan lekar aaj apane ghar se ham nikale
Lyrics: yahi araman lekar aj apane ghar se ham nikale jahan hai zindagi apani usi kuche men dam nikale yahithreedots  sitaron jagamagao tum baharon muskurao tum meri ujadi hui muhabbat ki hansi mil kar udao tum jinhen sajade kie hamane vo patthar ke sanam nikale yahithreedots  tamanna yahi hai ab to mera sar ho tera dar ho na ansu koi ankhon men na shikava koi lab par ho agar yun maut a jae to apane dil se gam nikale yahithreedots

Title: aa niile gagan tale pyaar ham karen
Lyrics: aa niile gagan tale pyaar ham karen hil mil ke pyaar kaa iqaraar ham karen aa niile threedots  ye shaam kii belaa ye madhur mast nazaare baithe rahen ham yuunhiin baahon ke sahaare vo din naa aae intazaar ham karen aa niile gagan threedots  do jaan hain ham aise mile ek hii ho jaaen dhuundhaa kare duniyaa hamen ham pyaar men kho jaaen bechain bahaaron ko gulazaar ham karen aa niile gagan tale threedots  tuu maang kaa sinduur tuu aankhon kaa hai kaajal le baandh le haathon ke kinaare se ye aanchal saamane baithe raho shrringaar ham karen aa niile gagan tale threedots

Title: kuchh din to baso merii aankhon men
Lyrics: kuchh din to baso merii aankhon men phir kwaab agar ho jaao to kyaa  koii rang to do mere chehare ko phir zakm agar mahakaao to kyaa  ik aaiinaa thaa so tuut gayaa ab kud se agaar sharamaao to kyaa  main tanhaa thaa main tanhaa huun tum aao to kyaa na aao to kyaa  jab ham hii na mahake to saahab tum baadesabaa kahalaao to kyaa  jab dekhane waalaa koii nahiin bujh jaao to kyaa jal jaao to kyaa

Title: paise kii kahaanii kahataa hai ise paisaa
Lyrics: printitle la kahataa hai ise paisaa bachchon     ye chiiz badii maamuulii hai     magar isake piichhe     sab duniyaa rastaa bhuulii hai      inasaan kii banaaii chiiz hai ye     magar inasaan pe bhaarii hain     har kisii jhalak is paise kii     dharm aur imaan pe bhaarii hai     ye jhuuth ko sach kar detaa hai     aur sach ko jhuuth banaataa hai     bhagavaan nahiin par har ghar men     bhagavaan kii padavii paataa hai      is paise kii badale duniyaa men     insaanon kii mehanat bikatii hai     jismon kii haraarat bikatii hai     ruuhon kii sharaafat bikatii hai     karadaar khariide jaate hain     diladaar khariide jaate hain     mittii ke sahii par isase hii     avataar khariide jaate hain      is paise ke khaatir duniyaa men     aabaad vatan bik jaate hain     dharatii kii tukade ho jaatii hain     laashon kii kafan ho jaate hain     izzat bhii is se milatii hai     saahiil bhii is se milate hain     tahaziib bhii is se aatii hai     taaliim bhii is se milatii hai      ham aaj tumhen is paise kaa     saaraa itihaas bataate hain     kitane yug aaj tak guzare hain     un sab ke jhalak dikhalaate hain     ik aisaa vaqt bhii thaa jag men     jab is paise kaa naam naa thaa     chiizen chiizon pe tulate the     chiizon kaa kuchh bhii daam naa thaa      chiizon se chiiz badalane kaa     yah dhang bahut bekaar saa thaa     laanaa bhii kathin thaa chiizon kaa     le jaanaa bhii dushavaar saa thaa     inasaan ne tab milakar sochaa     kyon vaqt itanaa barabaad karen     har chiiz kii jo kimat thahare     us chiiz kaa kyon naa iizaad karen     is tarah hamaare duniyaa me     pahalaa paisaa taiyyaar huaa     aur is paise kii hasarat men     inasaan zaliilokhaar huaa      paisevaale is duniyaa men     jaagiiron ke maalik ban baithe     mazaduuron aur kisaanon ke     taqadiir ke maalik ban baithe     jangon men ladaayaa bhuukhon ko     aur apane sar par taaj rakhaa     nidhran ko diyaa paralok kaa sukh     apane liye jag kaa raaj rakhaa     pandit aur mullaa ilk ke lie     mazahab ke sahii phailaate rahe     shaayar taariifen likhate rahe     gaayak darabaarii gaate rahe  sab o o o o o  he  vaisaa hii karenge ham jaisaa tujhe chaahiye      paisaa hamen chaahiye  sab vaisaa hii karenge ham jaisaa tujhe chaahiye      paisaa hamen chaahiye       haal tere jotenge khet tere boyenge      zor tere haakenge ghot teraa dhoyenge      paisaa paisaa      vaisaa hii karenge ham jaisaa tujhe chaahiye      paisaa hamen chaahiye  raa paisaa haath men de de raajaa gun tere gaayenge      tere bachche bachchiyon kaa khair manaayenge  sab vaisaa hii karenge ham jaisaa tujhe chaahiye      paisaa hamen chaahiye  l   yug yug se aise duniyaa men      ham daan ke tukade maangate hain      hal jot ke fasalen kaat ke bhii      pakavaan ke tukade maangate hain      lekin in bhiikh ke tukadon se      kab bhuukh kaa sankat duur huaa      inasaan sadaa dukh jhelegaa      gar khatm bhii yah dastuur huaa      bojh banii hai kadamon kii      vah chiiz pahale karz chukaa denaa 2

Title: shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab
Lyrics: ki shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab  usamen phir milaayii jaaye thodii sii sharaab hogaa yuun nashaa jo taiyaar haanthreedots hogaa yun nashaa jo taiyaar vo pyaar hai 	 shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab  usamen phir milaayii jaaye thodii sii sharaab   hogaa yuun nashaa jo taiyaar vo pyaar hai shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon ka shabaab 	 he he he he he threedots 	 lataa 	hansataa huaa bachapan vo bahakaa huaa mausam hai chhedo to ik sholaa hai chhuulo to bas shabanam hai hansataa huaa bachapan vo bahakaa huaa mausam hai chhedo to ik sholaa hai chhuulo to bas shabanam hai gaaon men mele men raah men akele men aataa jo yaad baar baar vo pyaar hai shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon ka shabaab usamen phir milaayii jaaye thodii sii sharaab ki are hogaa yun nashaa jo taiyaar vo pyaar hai dono shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab  	 lataa 	othreedots ra ra ra rathreedots ki rang men pighale sonaa ang se yuun ras jhalake jaise baje dhun koii raat men halake halake rang men pighale sonaa ang se yun ras jhalake jaise baje dhuna koii raat men halke halke dhuup men chhaaon men jhuumatii havaaon men har dam kare jo intazaar vo pyaar hai shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phulon ka shabab  usamen phir milaayii jaaye thodii sii sharaab lataa othreedots hogaa yun nashaa jo taiyaar ki vo pyaar 	 ki yaad agar vo aaye lataa 	ho threedots yaad agar vo aaye kaise kate tanahai         suune shahar men jaise bajane lage shahanai   ki yaad agar vo aaye kaise kate tanahai         suune shahar men jaise bajane lage shahanai   dono aanaa ho jaanaa ho kaisaa bhii zamaanaa ho utare kabhii naa jo khumaar vo pyaar hai  shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab  usamen phir milaayii jaaye thodii sii sharaab ki are hogaa yuun nashaa jo taiyaar lataa vo pyaar hai  dono shokhiyon men gholaa jaaye phuulon kaa shabaab

Title: terii kushii men agar gam men bhii kushii na huii
Lyrics: terii kushii men agar gam men bhii kushii na huii ye zindagii to muhabbat kii zindagii na huii  kayaaleyaar salaamat tujhe kudaa rakhe tere bagair kabhii ghar men roshanii na huii  sabaa ye unase hamaaraa payaam kah denaa gaye ho jab se yahaan subahoshaam hii na huii  gaye the ham bhii jigar jalwaagaahejaanaan men wo puuchhate hii rahe hamase baat hii na huii

Title: khile jo phuul to munh chhip gayaa sitaaron kaa
Lyrics: khile jo phuul to munh chhip gayaa sitaaron kaa misaaleabr chalaa kaarawaan bahaaron kaa  na mujhase puuch shabehijr dil pe kyaa guzarii ye dekh haal hai kyaa mere gamgusaaron kaa  naii bahaar liye ik nayaa chaman khil jaaye samajh sake koii matalab agar ishaaron kaa  shabesiyaah ke lamhe guzaar lene do ghadii ghadii na karo zikr maahpaaron kaa  huaa na raah men ghaayal koii shaguufaa bhii ravaan ravaan hii ragaa qaafilaa bahaaron kaa  aaj un raaston par tanhaaii kii dhuul udatii hai jo tere naqshekafepaa se sajaa karate the  mujhe bhii ahalejahaan bhuul jaayenge shahazaad kise kayaal hai duube huye sitaaron kaa

Title: tuutii hai merii niind magar tumako isase kyaa
Lyrics: tuutii hai merii niind magar tumako isase kyaa bajate rahen hawaaon se dar tumako isase kyaa  tum mauj mauj mislesabaa ghuumate raho kat jaayen merii soch ke par tumako isase kyaa  auron ke haath thaamo unhen raastaa dikhaao main bhuul jaauun apanaa hii ghar tumako isase kyaa  tumane to thak ke dasht men kaime lagaa liye tanahaa kate kisii kaa safar tumako isase kyaa

Title: jiit hii lenge baazii ham tum khel adhuuraa chhute na
Lyrics: rafii  jiit hii lenge baazii ham tum khel adhuuraa chhuute na pyaar kaa bandhan janm kaa bandhan janm kaa bandhan tuute na  milataa hai jahaan dharatii se gagan aao vahiin ham jaaen  tuu mere liye main tere liye  2  is duniyaa ko thukaraayen  2  duur basaa le dil kii jannat  2  jisako zamaanaa luute na pyaar ka bandhan   lataa milane kii khushi na milane ka gam khatm ye jhagade ho jaaen  tu tu na rahe main main na rahuun  2  ik duuje main kho jaaen  2  main bhi na chhoduun pal bhar daaman  2  tu bhi pal bhar ruuthe na pyaar ka bandhan threedots

Title: mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa
Lyrics: mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa  sach hai jab se mile ho tum is man kaa kamal khilaa  tuu hii tuu aankhon men tuu hii tuu kaabon men saanson men basii ho tum  miithiimiithii shabanam haradam barase jab se mile ho tum  man men basii ho tum man men base ho tum  dil kaa kamal khilaa jaaneman jab tuu mujhako milaa  mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa sach hai jab se mile ho tum is man kaa kamal khilaa   duniyaa men sab se pyaaraa tuu mujhako  pyaar tumhaaraa bhaayaa mere man ko  kaise ham bhuulenge jaanejaan ho mere  dil men baaje haradam miithiimiithii saragam  jiivan tuu hai sab kuchh tuu hai ham hain saath sadaa  mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa sach hai jab se mile ho tum is man kaa kamal khilaa tuu hii tuu aankhon men tuu hii tuu kaabon men saanson men basii ho tum miithiimiithii shabanam haradam barase jab se mile ho tum man men basii ho tum man men base ho tum dil kaa kamal khilaa jaaneman jab tuu mujhako milaa  ho ho ho ho ho ho haa haa ho ho ho ho ho ho ho ho ho  chandrakalaa sii sundar merii jaan tuu  kaliyon sii komal hai merii jaan tuu  meraa priitam hai tuu dil kii dhadakan hai tuu  tujhako har pal dekhuun mujh men samaaii hai tuu  swarg men rahen ham saath men ho tum sundar hai sangam  mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa sach hai jab se mile ho tum is man kaa kamal khilaa tuu hii tuu aankhon men tuu hii tuu kaabon men saanson men basii ho tum miithiimiithii shabanam haradam barase jab se mile ho tum man men basii ho tum man men base ho tum dil kaa kamal khilaa jaaneman jab tuu mujhako milaa  mujhako ye lagataa hai tere dil kaa kamal khilaa jab tuu mujhako milaa

Title: jhuum jhuum kar chalii akelii
Lyrics: jhuum jhuum kar chaliii akelii aaj na jaane kahaan navelii mast nazar sharamaaye ho gayaa ho gayaa hai pyaar kaa jaaduu naagin sii balakhaaye  mastaanii hai chaal gulaabi gaal umariyaa baalii ghunghar vaale baal sunaharii jaal najariyaa matavaalii duur duur se jhalak dikhaaye saanvariyaa jab paas bulaaye chham chham badhatii jaaye ho gayaa ho gayaa hai    threedots  albelii magaruur nashe men chuur chalii laharaatii dekho karatii maan chalaatii baan hai dil ko tadapaatii aag lagaakar aankh churaaye saanvariyaa jab paas bulaaye chham chham badhatii jaaye ho gayaa ho gayaa hai    threedots

Title: gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re
Lyrics: gorii gorii chaandanii ho gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re gorii gorii chaandanii ho gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  aaj kii hai raat ho aaj kii hai raat piyaa paas mere aayenge ruuthuungii main unase vo aake manaayenge aake manaayenge oo aake manaayenge gaayenge khushii ke giit gaayenge khushii ke giit hilamil saath re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  gorii gorii chaandanii ho gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  thandii thandii pavan salonii man bhaaye re 2 bindiyaa hamaarii dekho gir gir jaaye re gir gir jaaye re bindiyaa hamaarii dekho gir gir jaaye re hoo gir gir jaaye re rimajhim rimajhim rimajhim rimajhim pade barasaat re  miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  gorii gorii chaandanii ho gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  kar ke singaar ho kar ke singaar aaj unako rijhaauungii odh ke chunariyaa saajan ghar jaauungii saajan ghar jaauungii ho saajan ghar jaauungii mehandii se laal laal mehandii se laal laal honge mere haath re  miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re  gorii gorii chaandanii ho gorii gorii chaandanii aur puunam kii raat re miithii miithii threedots ho miithii miithii saajanaa se hongii man kii baat re hongii man kii baat re

Title: har ek jalawaaerangiin merii nigaah men hai
Lyrics: har ek jalawaaerangiin merii nigaah men hai gamefiraaq kii duniyaa diletabaah men hai  kisii kii yaadekaram uf are maajaraa tabaah ho ke bhii zaalim diletabaah men hai  hazaar pardon men o chhupane waale ye sunane le teraa jamaal mere daamanenigaah men hai  jahaan men mujhase bhii naakaameaarazuu kam hain na rang aah men hai aur na soz aah men hai

Title: jaya krishhna hare shrii krishhna hare bhajan
Lyrics: jaya krishhna hare shrii krishhna hare dukhiyon ke dukh duur kare jaya jaya jaya krishhna hare    jaba chaaron taraf andhiyaaraa ho aashaa kaa duur kinaaraa ho jaba koii na khevan haaraa ho taba tuu hii bedaa paar kare jaya jaya jaya krishhna hare   tuu chaahe to saba kuchha kara de vishha ko bhii amrita kara de puurna kar de usakii aashaa jo bhii teraa dhyaan dhare jaya jaya jaya krishhna hare

Title: bade bemuravvat hain ye husn vaale
Lyrics: muhabbat kii jhuuthii adaaon pe saahib javaani lutaane kii koshish na karanaa bade bemuravvat hain ye husn vaale kahiin dil lagaane kii koshish na karanaa  hansii aatii hai apanii barabaadiyon par na yuun pyaar se dekhiye bandaaparavar mere dil ke zakmon ko niind aa gaii hai inhen tum jagaane kii koshish na karanaa  muhabbat to hai ek kaagaz kii naav udhar bahtii hai jis taraf ho bahaav nazar ke bhanvar men na tum duub jaao nigaahen milaane kii koshish na karanaa  thahar jaao aankhon men thodaa saa dam hai tumhen dekh len varanaa hasarat rahegii banaate rahe ho hamen zindagii bhar magar ab banaane kii koshish na karanaa  sitamagar se jorositam kii shiqaayat na ham kar sake hain na ham kar sakenge mere aansuon tum meraa saath denaa unhen kuchh bataane kii koshish na karanaa  shamaa ban ke mahafil men ham jal rahe hain magar dil kii haalat hai paravaanon jaisii kudaa kii qasam jaan de denge tum par hamen aazamaane kii koshish na karanaa

Title: saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa
Lyrics: saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii  aramaanon ne lii angaraaii  aramaanon ne lii angaraaii re piyaa  torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii  saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii   aake sapanon men giit sunaa gaye  2 sote sote men aan jagaa gaye  2 phir ankhiyon ko niind na aaii na aaii na aaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii  saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii   dekho merii ye naii naii priit hai  2 mere honthon pe pahalaa pahalaa giit hai  2 main ne jiivan kii jyot jagaaii jagaaii jagaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii  saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii   base nainon men nain tumhaare hain  2 merii duniyaa men chamake sitaare hain 2 main ne sapanon kii sej sajaaii sajaaii sajaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii  saanvarii suurat man bhaaii re piyaa torii saanvarii suurat man bhaaii

Title: aankhon men kisii kii kho kar main
Lyrics: aankhon men kisii kii kho kar main sapanon se dil bahalaataa huun ummiid ke bujhate diipak se jiivan kaa diip jalaataa huun  shabanam kii nanhii buundon men raaton kii javaanii duub gaiii ik main huun muqaddar kaa maaraa ashkon men duub na paataa huun  sunataa huun ke patthar rote hain ulfat jab ashk bahaatii hai ro do na kahiin tum ai sangadil ye soch tadap main jaataa huun  kyaa kuub tumhaaraa bandhan hai sau janm nichhaavar hain jis par jitanaa main use sulajhaataa huun utanaa hii ulajhaa jaataa huun

Title: saath kisii ke koii kab aataa hai
Lyrics: saath kisiike koii kab aataa hai saath kisiike kab jaataa hai pal do pal kaa saath sabhii kaa pal do pal kaa naataa hai  kachche ghade jaisii ye duniyaa paar kisii ko taare kyaa khud hii sahaaraa dhuundhane vaale tujhako denge sahaare kyaa 2  jo na mile kyaa usakaa gam jab mile hue kho jaate hain sapane nahiin jis niind ke andar aisii niind so jaate hain 2

Title: mere hamanashiin mere hamanawaa mere paas aa mujhe thaam le
Lyrics: mere hamanashiin mere hamanawaan mere paas aa mujhe thaam le mujhe thaam le mere hamanashiin mere hamanawaan  tuu chalaa hai mujhase bichhad ke yuun jyuun shikashtaasaaz se raaganii jyuun chalii hai jism se duur jaan jyuun chalii ho aankh se roshanii mujhe dede baanhon kaa aasaraa  mere paas aa mujhe thaam le mujhe thaam le mere hamanashiin mere hamanawaan  ye teraa milan ye teraa qaram hai mujhe hayaat se kam nahiin tuu hai saamane to mere sanam mujhe maut kaa bhii alam nahiin ai bahaaredil ai suquunejaan  mere paas aa mujhe thaam le mujhe thaam le mere hamanashiin mere hamanawaan 3

Title: jaane kaisaa chhaane lagaa nashaa ye pyaar kaa
Lyrics: jaane kaisaa chhaane lagaa nashaa ye pyaar kaa  thodaa thodaa aane lagaa mazaa bahaar kaa	2  dil jo mile gul se khile jaan gae hamaraaz nae 2 tujhase sanam terii kasam siikh kie andaaz nae gaii dilako udaa terii shok adaa meraa bas na chalaa jaane kaisaathreedots  dil the javaan raat hasiin aise men tumase aankh ladii 2 kaise bujhe dilake lagii ab to ye mushkil aan padii aisaa dard milaa nahiin jisakii davaa tere pyaar ke sivaa jaane kaisaathreedots

Title: kitanii raahat hai dil tuut jaane ke baad
Lyrics: kitanii raahat hai dil tuut jaane ke baad zindagii se mile maut aane ke baad  lazzatesajadaaesangedar kyaa kahen hosh hii kab rahaa sar jhukaane ke baad  kyaa huaa har masarrat agar chhin gaii aadamii ban gayaa gam uthaane ke baad  raat kaa maajaraa kisase puuchhuun shamiim kyaa banii bazm par mere aane ke baad

Title: lachak lachak bijurii jhalak
Lyrics: krishna kanhaiyaa  lachak lachak bijurii jhalak manamohan aawe sur sohan chit lobhan baansurii bajaawe  he rii ang sundar vind gandha malay chhand chir vasant swapan kaanti prem shaanti swapan kaanti shaanti shaanti taap men jharaawe

Title: jaaiye aap kahaan jaayenge ye nazar laut ke phir aayegii
Lyrics: jaaiye aap kahaan jaayenge ye nazar laut ke phir aayegii duur tak aap ke piichhe piichhe merii aavaaz chalii aayegii jaaiyethreedots  aapako pyaar meraa yaad jahaan aayegaa koii kaantaa vohii daaman se lipat jaayegaa  2 jaaiyethreedots  jab uthoge merii betaab nigaahon kii tarah rok lengii koii daalii merii baahon kii tarah  2 jaaiyethreedots  dekhiye chain milegaa na kahiin dil ke sivaa aapakaa koii nahiin koii nahiin dil ke sivaa  2 jaaiyethreedots

Title: kyaa bataauun ke mujhe tujhase mohabbat kyuun hai
Lyrics: kyaa bataauun ke mujhe tujhase mohabbat kyuun hai mere mahabuub mujhe terii zuruurat kyuun hai  kashtiedil ke liye aur kinaare hain bahut tere jalawon ke siwaa aur nazaare hain bahut merii chaahat ke liye aur sahaare hain bahut tere vaadon pe mujhe phir bhii aqiidat kyuun hai  kyuun terii yaad sataatii hai mujhe shaamosahar jaane kyuun dhuundhatiiphiratii hai tujhe merii nazar hain zamaane men hasiin aur bhii tujhase behatar tuu hii batalaa ke mujhe tujhase mohabbat kyuun hai

Title: aa ke ek pal mujhe qaraar nahiin hai
Lyrics: aa ke ek pal mujhe qaraar nahiin hai bin tere bahaar bhii bahaar nahiin hai  paasewafaa dekh ye dil gam se hai bojhal phir bhii merii aankh ashqbaar nahiin hai  terii muhabbat kaa yaqiin mujhako hai jaanaan apanii hii qisamat pe aitabaar nahiin hai  kitane uthaaye hain sitam ishq men hamane itane ki jinakaa koii shumaar nahiin hai  kisaliye phir jaagatii rahatii hain ye aankhen inako ab teraa intazaar nahiin hai

Title: kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin
Lyrics: kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin  dhuundh sakuun nazaron men terii apanaa khoyaa pyaar dekh sakuun dekh sakuun jii bhar ke tujhako duur khadaa ek baar 2 kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin  kabhii kahiin jaaneanajaane karane  men laachaar jhuum sakuun jhuum sakuun main sun kar terii paayal kii jhanakaar 2 kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin  karuun tere sapanon se apanii raaton kaa singaar chhed sakuun chhed sakuun man kii viinaa par tere giit hazaar 2 kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin  nain bichhaane raah men har luun  premnagar ke dwaar puuchh sakuun puuchh sakuun main tujhase apane jiine kaa aadhaar 2 kyaa itanaa bhii adhikaar nahiin

Title: aa intazaar hai teraa
Lyrics: aa intazaar hai teraa dil beqaraar hai meraa2  aajaa na sataa aur aajaa na rulaa aur2  aajaa ki tuu hii hai merii ummiid kaa taaraa ummiid kaa taaraa2 sangam merii kushiyon kaa nigaahon kaa sahaaraa  aa intazaar hai teraa dil beqaraar hai meraa2  aakar merii jaagii huii raaton ko sulaa de kho jaauun  kho jaauun mujhe aisaa koii giit sunaa de aa intazaar hai teraa dil beqaraar hai meraa2 aajaa aajaaa  ab aur sitam ab aur sitam ham se uthaae nahiin jaate2 aa a a aa  aur raaz mohabbat ke aur raaz mohabbat ke chhupaae nahiin jaate chhupaaye nahiin jaate aa intazaar hai teraa dil beqaraar hai meraa2

Title: sanam mere sanam kasam terii kasam
Lyrics: amit sanam mere sanam kasam terii kasam       mujhe aajakal niind aatii hai kam alkaa sanam mere sanam kasam terii kasam       tere lie huaa janam meraa janam  alkaa mahak rahaa hai tuu gulaab kii tarah amit mahak rahii hai tuu sharaab kii tarah       dekh ladakhadaa gae kadam mere kadam  amit ye husn ye adaa ye phuul saa badan alkaa tuu dekh duur se na chuumo jii sanam       ki aatii hai mujhe sharam badii sharam  alkaa tuu apane pyaar se bhigo de bas mujhe amit tuu apane pyaar men dubo de bas mujhe       samaa hai pyaar kaa garam badaa garam

Title: saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar
Lyrics: ka tuu panchhii paradesii tuu jogii hai ke jaaduugar ma inamen se koii bhii nahiin main sapanon kaa saudaagar  ka saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar    dil le le dil dekar ma soch samajh le baad men na pachhataanaa ye kah kar    saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar  ma haath kisii kaa vo pakade jo chhode jag saaraa    tuu uunche mahalonvaalii main beghar banjaaraa ka ek duuje ke dil men rahenge kyaa karanaa hai ghar    saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar    dil le le dil dekar  ma tere saath main kaise pyaar kaa vaadaa kar luun    aisaa koii vaadaa kar main tujhape bharosaa kar luun ka jo chaahe likhavaale mujhase kore kaagaz par    saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar    dil le le dil dekar  ma dil to hai par dilake armaan kahaan se laauun    dolii saharaa kangan sab saamaan kahaan se laauun ka thodaa saa sinduur kahiin se le aa bas jaakar    saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar    dil le le dil dekar  ma soch samajh le baad men na pachhataanaa ye kah kar    saudaagar saudaagar dil le le dil dekar

Title: haay re vo dinaa
Lyrics: haay re vo dinaa kyon na aaye ja ja ke ritu ja ja ke ritu laut aaye haay re vo dinaa kyon na aaye  jhilamil vo taare kahaan gaye vo saare man baatii jale bujh jaaye haye re vo dinaa kyon na aaye  suunii merii biinaa sangiit binaa sapanon kii maalaa murajhaaye haay re vo dinaa kyon na aaye

Title: dekho qasam se qasam se kahate hain tumase haan
Lyrics: dekho qasam se qasam se kahate hain tumase haan tum bhii jaloge haath maloge rutha ke hamase haan  raat hai diivaanii mast hai fizaaen chaandanii suhaanii sard hai havaaen tum bhii akele ham bhii akele kahate hain tumase haan tum bhii jaloge haath maloge rutha ke hamase haan  kyaa lagaaii tumane ye qasam qasam se lo thahar gaye ham kuchh kaho bhii ham se tanake na chaliye banake na chaliye kahate hain tumase haan tum bhii jaloge haath maloge rutha ke hamase haan haay

Title: jab terii yaad kaa tuufaan guzar jaayegaa
Lyrics: jab terii yaad kaa tuufaan guzar jaayegaa dil kisii aur samandar men utar jaayegaa  dasht se duur sahii saayaaediiwaar to hai ham na thaharenge koii thahar jaayegaa  apane haalaat se main sulah to kar luun lekin mujhamen ruuposh jo ek shaksh hai mar jaayegaa  daag rahane ke liye hote hain rah jaayenge waqt kaa kaam guzaranaa hai guzar jaayegaa

Title: aao huzuur tumako sitaaron men le chaluun
Lyrics: ham se raushan hain chaand aur taare ham ko daaman samajhiye na gairat kaa uth gaye ham gar zamaane se naam mit jaayegaa muhabbat kaa dil hai naazuk kalii se phuulon se yah na tuute kayaal rakhiyegaa aur agar aap se yah tuut gayaa jaanejaan itanaa hii samajhiiyegaa male voice kyaa phir koii baanvarii muhabbat kii apnii zulfen nahiin sanvaaregii aaratii phir kisii kanhaiyaa kii koii raadhaa nahiin utaaregii  hic   aao huzuur tumako threedots  aao huzuur tumako sitaaron men le chaluun threedots  hic  dil jhuum jaae aisii bahaaron men le chaluun aao huzuur aao threedots  hamaraaz hamakayaal to ho hamanazar bano tay hogaa zindagii kaa safar hamasafar bano  2 aa haa haa  o o ho ho ho aa haa aa haa haa o ho ho threedots  hic  chaahat ke ujaleujale nazaaron men le chaluun dil jhuum jaae aisii bahaaron men le chaluun aao huzuur aao threedots  likh do kitaabedil pe koi aisii daastaan jisakii misaal de na sake saaton aasamaan aa haa haa  o o ho ho ho aa haa aa haa haa o ho ho threedots  hic  baahon men baahen daale hazaaron men le chaluun dil jhuum jaaye aisii bahaaron men le chaluun aao huzuur aao threedots

Title: koii chupake se aake sapane sajaake
Lyrics: koii chupake se aake sapane sajaake  sapane sulaake mujhako jagaake bole ki main aa rahaa huun kaun aaye ye main kaise jaanuun koii chupake se aake   threedots  duur kahiin bole papiihaa piyaa aa mausam suhaanaa tarase hai koii yahaan aa bhii jaa karake bahaanaa kaun saa bahaanaa kaisaa bahaanaa kitanaa mushkil hai ye bataanaa dekho phir bhii koii bhaa rahaa hai kaun bhaaye ye main kaise jaanuun koii chupake se aake   threedots  pyaasaa hai dil kaa gagan pyaar kii agni jalaaye palakon men qaid hai saavan honthon tak baat naa aaye baat aate aate raat ho gayii chaahon kii baaraat chhod gayii saath baat aate aate ho gayii raat itanii raat gaye kaise gaauun dekho phir bhii koii gaa rahaa hai kaun gaaye ye main kaise jaanuun koii chupake se aake   threedots

Title: zaruurat hai zaruurat hai zaruurat hai
Lyrics: zaruurat hai zaruurat hai sakt zaruurat hai   zarurat hai zarurat hai zarurat hai  ek shrimati ki kalavati ki seva kare jo pati ki   2 zarurat hai zarurat hai zarurat hai  hasin hazaron bhi hon khade magar usi par nazar pade  2 ho zulf galon pe khelati ke jaise din raat se lade  ho ho ho ho adaon men bahaar ho nigahon pe khumaar ho  qubul mera pyar ho to kya baat hai  zarurat hai zarurat hai zarurat hai threedots  itar men sansen basi basi vo mastiyon men rasi rasi  2 zaraa sii palaken jhuki jhuki bhaven ghaneri kasi kasi ho ho ho ho  phulon men gulab ho kud apana javab ho vo pyar ki kitaab ho to kya baat hai  zarurat hai zarurat hai zarurat hai threedots  jhatak ke gesuu jahaan chale to saath men aasamaan chale 2 lipat ke kitane bhi paanv se yah puuchhate ho kahaan chale ho ho ho ho pyaar se jo kaam le hans ke salaam le vo haath meraa tham le to kyaa baat hai zaruurat hai zaruurat hai zaruurat hai  haan haan shriimati ki ho ho  kalavati ki  seva kare jo pati ki  zarurat hai zarurat hai zarurat hai sakht zarurat hai

Title: dhakdhak karane lagaa moraa jiyaraa darane lagaa
Lyrics: a dhakdhak karane laga ho mora jiyara darane laga     sainya bainya chhod na kachchi kaliyan tod na	2  u dil se dil mil gaya mujhase kaisi ye haya     tu hai meri dilaruba kya lagati hai vah re vah	2  a apana banaya piya tune mujhe main mithemithe sapane sajane lagi u dekha meri rani jab mainne tujhe meri soisoi dhadakan gane lagi a jadu tera chhane laga meri nasnas men samane laga u kud ko main bhulane laga tujhe sanson men basane laga a rishta ab ye rishta sathi tutega na tode kabhi u dil se dil mil gaya threedots  u ulajhi hai kalikali lat teri zara in zulfon ko sulajhane to de a itani bhi kya hai jaladi tujhe ghadi apane milan ki tu ane to de u aise na bahane bana meri rani ab to bahon men a a aise na nigahen mila koi dekhega to sochega kya u masti chhai hai masti ake lag ja gale se abhi  a dhakdhak karane laga threedots u dil se dil mil gaya threedots

Title: lo chalii main apane devar kii baaraat le ke
Lyrics: lo chalii main apanii devar kii baaraat le ke lo chalii main na baind bajaa na hii baaraatii khushiyon kii saugaat le ke lo chalii main   threedots  devar dulhaa banaa sar pe seharaa sajaa bhaabhii badhakar aaj balaaiyaan letii hai prem kii kaliyaan khile pal pal khushiyaan mile sachche man se aaj duaaen detii hai ghode pe chadh ke chalaa hai baankaa apanii dulhan se milane lo chalii main   threedots  vaah vaah raam jii jodii kyaa banaaii devar devaraaniijii badhaaii ho badhaaii sab rasamon se badii hai jag men dil se dil kii sagaaii  aaj hai shubh ghadii aaj banii main badii kal tak ghar kii bahu thii ab huun jethaanii huqum chalaauungii main aankh dikhaauungii main sahamii khadii rahegii merii devaraanii hazaar sapane palakon men apane diivaanii main saath le ke lo chalii main   threedots

Title: kabhii yuun bhii aa merii aankh men
Lyrics: kabhii yuun bhii aa merii aankh men ki merii nazar ko kabar na ho mujhe ek raat nawaaz de magar usake baad sahar na ho  wo badaa rahiimokariim hai mujhe ye sifat bhii ataa kare tujhe bhuulane kii duaa karuun to merii duaa men asar na ho   mere baajuon men thakiithakii abhii mahvekwaab hai chaandanii na uthe sitaaron kii paalakii abhii aahaton kaa guzar na ho  kabhii din kii dhuup men jhuum ke kabhii shab ke phuul ko chuum ke yuun hii saathsaath chalen sadaa kabhii katm apanaa safar na ho

Title: are chhodo zamaanaa ho gayaa sharamaate sharmaate
Lyrics: are chhodo zamaanaa ho gayaa sharamaate sharmaate  kisii din saamane aa jaanaa sharmaate sharmaate   patangon ne gale milate hii jalakar khudakushii kar li  na jaane shamaa ne kyaa kah diyaa sharmaate sharmaate threedots   najar rahatii hai chehare par to dil rahataa hai aahat par  vo aksar dekhate hain aaiinaa sharmaate sharmaate threedots   abhii tak yaad hai vo khubasuurat haadasaa kaisar  pasechilaman kisii kaa jhaankanaa sharmaate sharmaate threedots

Title: ai merii zoharaajabiin tujhe maaluum nahiin
Lyrics: ai merii zoharaazabiin tujhe maaluum nahiin tuu abhii tak hai hansiin aur main javaan tujhape qurabaan merii jaan merii jaan ai merii threedots  ye shokhiyaan ye baankaapan jo tujh men hai kahiin nahiin dilon ko jiitane kaa fan jo tujh men hai kahiin nahiin main terii  main terii aankhon men paa gayaa do jahaan ai merii threedots  tuu miithe bol jaaneman jo muskuraake bol de to dhadakanon men aaj bhii sharaabii rang ghol de o sanam  o sanam main teraa aashiqejaabidaan ai merii threedots

Title: haulehaule havaa dole kaliyon ke ghuunghat khole
Lyrics: haulehaule havaa dole	slow haulehaule havaa dole	fast kaliyon ke ghuunghat khole aajaa mere man ke raajaa pihu pihu papiihaa bole haulehaule havaa dole threedots  kaarekaare badaraa chhaaye kaun sandes laaye saavan suhaavan aayaa piiyaa mere tum na aaye haulehaule havaa dole threedots  birahii gagan roye mere do nayan royen piiyaa tum paas nahiin kahaan kis desh khoye ghaneghane badaraa naache  jhananana paayal baaje chhaaechhaae aaii bahaar tum bin jiiyaa na laage haulehaule havaa dole threedots

Title: tum kahaan pe kho gaye
Lyrics: hebe tum kahaan pe kho gaye ham yahaan pe kho gaye dil ke daag aaj ham aansuuon se dho gaye tum kahaan pe kho gaye threedots  be o bekabar sun zaraa sun zaraa o jaadugar luute dil kyuun meraa raat kii kushii men tuu pyaar kii kushii men tuu 2 dard se bharii huii har tarf hai zindagii hebe tum kahaan pe kho gaye threedots  he o hamsafar hai kidhar laut aa haay chhod kar kyuun mujhe chal diyaa nigaahen dhuundhatii hain ab kahaan gayaa wo kaaravaan 2 jisake saath chal pade  leke pyaar kaa jahaan hebe tum kahaan pe kho gaye threedots  be o raazadaan dekh din dhal gayaa he o yaad kar wo qasam aa bhii jaa hebe ai nadii kii mauj aa ai hawaa tuu sun zaraa 2 ai chaman kii gulabahaar  hai kahaan wo tuu bataa tum kahaan pe kho gaye threedots

Title: hai bas kii har ek un ke ishaare men nishaan aur
Lyrics: hai bas kii har ek un ke ishaare men nishaan aur karate hain muhabbat to guzarataa hai gumaan aur  yaa rab vo na samajhe hain na samajhenge merii baat de aur bhii dil inako jo na de mujhako zubaan aur  tum shahar men ho to hamen kyaa gam jab uthenge le aaenge baazaar se jaakar dilojaan aur  hai aur bhii duniyaa men sukhanavaar bahut achchhe kahate hain kii gaaliib kaa hai andaazebayaan aur

Title: husn vaale teraa javaab nahiin koi tujhsaa nahiin hazaaron men
Lyrics: husn vaale teraa javaab nahiin koi tujhsaa nahiin hazaaron men  tuu hai aisii kalii jo gulashan men saath apane bahaar laayii ho tuu hai aisii kiran jo raat dhale chaandanii men nahaa ke aayii ho ye teraa nuur ye tere jalave jis tarah chaand ho sitaaron men husn vaale threedots  teri aankhon men aisii mastii hai jaise chhalake hue hon paimaane tere honthon pe vo khaamoshii hai jaise bikhare hue hon afasaane terii zulfon kii aisii rangat hai jaise kaalii ghataa bahaaron men husn vaale threedots  terii suurat jo dekh le shaayar apane sheron men taazagii bhar le ek musavvir jo tujh ko paa jaae apane kvaabon men zindagii bhar le nagamaagar dhuundh le agar tujh ko dard bhar le vo dil ke taaron men husn vaale teraa javaab nahiin threedots

Title: is dil se terii yaad bhulaaii nahiin jaatii
Lyrics: is dil se terii yaad bhulaaii nahiin jaatii ye pyaar kii daulat hai lutaaii nahiin jaatii  kis dil se ye kahate ho tumhen dil se bhulaa duun tumhen dil se bhulaa duun har roz to ye duniyaa basaaii nahiin jaatii  mar mar ke banaaii thii jo tasaviiremuhabbat jo tasviiremuhabbat ab apane hii haathon se mitaii nahiin jaatii  le jaayen zamaane men kahaan dil kii lagii ko kahaan dil kii lagii ko ashqon se to ye aag bujhaaii nahiin jaatii

Title: had se zyaadaa aatii hai mujhako merii jaan terii yaad
Lyrics: had se zyaadaa aatii hai mujhako merii jaan terii yaad ik tere aane se pahale ik tere jaane ke baad had se zyaadaa threedots  jab bhii aae koii aahat yuun lage tum aa gae kyaa bataauun kaise tum yaadon pe merii chhaa gae o main dilaasaa deke apane pyaar ko samajhaatii huun tum chale jaaoge aisaa soch ke ghabaraatii huun had se zyaadaa threedots  jaagatii huun le ke karavat ab to saarii raat main sochatii huun har ghadii bas ab to terii baat main is havaa pe apane dil kaa haal likh ke bhejataa huun kis tarah bechain ho ke teraa rastaa dekhataa huun had se zyaadaa threedots

Title: shabefiraaq hai aur niind aaii jaatii hai
Lyrics: shabefiraaq hai aur niind aaii jaatii hai kuchh isamen unakii tawajjuh bhii paaii jaatii hai  hamiin pe ishq kii tohamat lagaaii jaatii hai magar ye sharm jo chehare pe chhaaii jaatii hai  vo maikadaa hai terii anjuman kudaa rakkhe jahaan kayaal se pahale pilaaii jaatii hai  qariib manzileaakir hai alfiraaq jigar safar tamaam huaa niind aaii jaatii hai

Title: prem kaa pinjaraa ho gaaya suunaa
Lyrics: prem kaa pinjaraa hogayaa suunaaman kaa panchhii chuut gayaa aajao bichhade saathii aajaakaahe hamse ruuth gayaa prem kaa pinjaraa hogayaa suunaaman kaa panchhii chuut gayaa  chain hamaaraa le gayaa koiiaansuu hamako de gayaa le gayaa koii sukh kii duniyaaniind hamaarii le gayaa  bhii hai aakaash bhii haitaqadiir kaa taara tuut gayaa prem kaa pinjaraa threedots  tuut gaiituut gaiituut gaii merii phulavaarii dans gaiidans gaiidans gaii haay yaad tumhaarii tuut gaii merii phulavaarii raha gaii aahenraha gaye aansuu sab kuchh koii luut gayaa prem kaa pinjaraa threedots  ham tume itanaa yaad karenkabhii tum bhii to hamako yaad karo is duniyaa ko tumane ujaadaaaake use aabaad karo ab main huun  duubatii naiyyaakisaka sahaaraa tuut gayaa prem kaa pinjaraa threedots

Title: main gul huun kalii hun sabaa huun  nahiin ye khushbuu aur hii kuchh hai
Lyrics: main gul huun kalii huun sabaa huun nahiin ye khushbuu aur hii kuchh hai sanam ye khushbuu aur hii kuchh hai  main bekhud sharaabii diivaanaa nahiin ye jaaduu aur hii kuchh hai sanam ye jaaduu aur hii kuchh hai  ye puuchho kalii se ye puuchho chaman se kise kyaa milaa hai tumhaare badan se gulon ko to shoharat mere rang se hai havaaon kii mahak bhii mere ang se hai aur dilabar teraa husnojamaal sab merii chaahat kaa kamaal jii kyaa kahanaa inaayat hai navaajish hai  main chaandanii main shabanam main sitaaraa nahiin sanam tuu aur hii kuchh hai  meraa hii nashaa hai terii bekhudii men merii aarazuu hai terii diivaanagii men merii zindagii kaa shabaab ek tuu hai merii zindagii kyaa terii aarazuu hai par meraa har andaazoadaa hai tere dam se jaanevafaa jaan kyaa kahanaa inaayat hai navaajish hai  main majanuun main farahaad main raanjhaa nahiin sanam tuu aur hii kuchh hai main gul huun threedots

Title: dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay
Film: the one and only malika pukraj nonfilm
Lyrics: aa  dard se mere hai tujhako dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay 2 kyaa huii zaalim terii gafalatashiyaarii haayhaay dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay  tere dil men gar na thaa aashuubegam kaa hausalaa tuu ne phir kyuun kii thii merii gamgusaarii haayhaay kyaa huii zaalim terii gafalatashiyaarii haayhaay dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay  umar bhar kaa tuune bemaanewafaa baandhaa to kyaa umar ko bhii to nahiin hai paay daarii haayhaay kyaa huii zaalim terii gafalatashiyaarii haayhaay dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay  haath hii tegaazamaa kaa kaam se jaataa rahaa dil pe ik rag ne na paayaa zakmkaarii haayhaay kyaa huii zaalim terii gafalatashiyaarii haayhaay dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay  kaak men na munh se pemaanemahabbat mil gaii uth gaii duniyaa se raahorasmeyaarii haayhaay kyaa huii zaalim terii gafalatashiyaarii haayhaay dard se mere hai tujhako beqaraarii haayhaay
