Title: kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam aa naa jaaye
Lyrics: kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam aa naa jaaye tujhe bewafaa kahuun main wo maqaam aa naa jaaye kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam  zaraa zulf ko sambhaalo meraa dil dhadak rahaa hai meraa dil dhadak rahaa hai koii aur taayaredil tahedaam aa naa jaaye kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam   jise sun ke tuut jaaye meraa aarazuu bharaa dil meraa aarazuu bharaa dil terii anjuman se mujhako wo payaam aa naa jaaye kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam  wo jo manzilon pe jaa ke kisii hamasafar ko luuten kisii hamasafar ko luuten unhiin rahazanon men teraa kahiin naam aa na jaaye  kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam  ye mahonajuum hans len mere aansuon pe jaalib mere aansuon pe jaalib meraa maahataab jab tak labebaam aa naa jaaye kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam aa naa jaaye kahiin aah ban ke lab pe teraa naam teraa naam 3

Title: bole re papiiharaa papiiharaa
Lyrics: bole re papiiharaa papiiharaa nit man tarase nit man pyaasaa  nit man pyaasaa nit man tarase  bole rethreedots  palakon par ik buund sajaae baithii huun saavan le jaae jaae pii ke des men barase nit man pyaasaa nit man tarase bole rethreedots  saavan jo sandesaa laae merii aankh pe motii chhaae jaae mile baabul ke ghar se nit man pyaasaa nit man tarase bole rethreedots

Title: chaman men rangebahaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa
Lyrics: chaman men rangebahaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa nazar se dil kaa gubaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa  main niimshab aasamaan kii wusat ko dekhataa thaa zamiin pe wo husnezaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa  bade wusuuk se duniyaa fareb detii hai bade kuluus se ham etabaar karate hain  galii ke baahar tamaam manzar badal gaye the jo saayaaekuueyaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa  khumaaremay men wo cheharaa kuchh aur lag rahaa thaa damesahar jab khumaar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa  ik aur dariyaa kaa saamanaa thaa muniir mujhako main ek dariyaa ke paar utaraa to mainne dekhaa to mainne dekhaa

Title: terii zulfon se judaaii to nahiin maangii thii
Film: jab pyar kisi se hota hai
Lyrics: terii zulfon se judaaii to nahiin maangii thii qaid maangii thii rihaaii to nahiin maangii thii  maine kyaa zurm kiyaa aap khafaa ho baithe  2 pyaar maangaa thaa khudaaii to nahiin maangii thii qaid maangii thii rihaaii to nahiin maangii thii  meraa haq thaa terii aankhon kii chhalakatii may par  2 chiz apanii thii paraaii to nahiin maangii thii qaid maangii thii rihaaii to nahiin maangii thii  apane biimaar pe itanaa bhii sitam thik nahiin  2 terii ulfat men buraaii to nahiin maangii thii qaid maangii thii rihaaii to nahiin maangii thii  chaahane vaalon ko kabhii tuune sitam bhii naa diyaa  2 terii mahafil se rasaaii to nahiin maangii thii qaid maangii thii rihaaii to nahiin maangii thii

Title: tujhe bulaayen ye merii baahen
Lyrics: tujhe bulayen ye merii baahen ke terii gangaa yahiin milegii main teraa jiivan main terii qisamat ke tujh ko mukti yahiin milegii  vaade pe tere bharosaa hai main jaanatii huun tuu meraa hai jab tak na aayegaa dil meraa gaayegaa aajaa re aajaa re ab aa bhii jaa tuu aa bhii jaa o o o o aa bhii jaa  pahaadiyon kii bulandiyon se kabhii chanaaron ke darmiyaan se kabhii nazar se kabhii zubaan se tujhe pukaaraa kahaan kahaan se  tuu jis kii khoj men aayaa hai vo jis ne tujh ko bulaayaa hai parabat ke piichhe hai jharane ke niiche hai aajaa re aajaa re ab aa bhii jaa tuu aa bhii jaa o o o o aa bhii jaa  koharii sii chaadar lapete huun paanii men khud ko samete huun baahon ke ghere men man ke basere men aajaa re aajaa re ab aa bhii jaa tuu aa bhii jaa o o o o aa bhii jaa

Title: zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa
Lyrics: zamaanaa kyaa kahegaa tum agar ham ko bhulaa doge hamaare pyaar kii duniyaa banaakar yuun mitaa doge  nahiin kuchh gam hamen is kaa kahe duniyaa jo diivaanaa hamaarii bebasii ko haay tum ne bhii nahiin jaanaa hamaaraa haal kyaa hogaa jo tum bhii muskuraa doge hamaare pyaar kii duniyaa banaakar yuun mitaa doge threedots  vo dariyaa kaa kinaaraa vo suhaanii chaandanii raaten jahaan ham tum kiyaa karate the chhupakar pyaar kii baaten na sochaa thaa kabhii ham ne ke tum ye sab bhulaa doge hamaare pyaar kii duniyaa banaakar yuun mitaa doge threedots

Title: suno kaho kahaa sunaa kuchh huaa kyaa
Lyrics: suno kaho kahaa sunaa kuchh huaa kyaa abhii to nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin chalii havaa jhukii ghataa kuchh huaa kyaa abhii to nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin  terii qasam ye dilakash nazaare karate hain ishaare jo samajhe koii mere sanam ye khamosh aankhen bhii karatii hain baaten jo samajhe koii samajhaa nahiin tum samajhaa do are suno kaho kahaa sunaa abhii to nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin  bas jo chale to subah se lekar rahuun shaam tak main tere sang men gar ho sake to main apane dilabar teraa naam likh duun har ik rang men baaton men naa ulajhaao are suno kaho kahaa sunaa abhii to nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin  achchhaa kabhii phir baat chhedenge marzii nahiin hai tumhaarii abhii kuchh ho gayaa to badii hogii mushakil ki chhotii umar hai hamaarii abhii main kyaa karuun batalaa do suno kaho kahaa sunaa abhii to nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin  chalii havaa jhukii ghataa kuchh huaa kyaa zaraa saa kuchh huaa to hai   threedots

Title: merii nazar se na ho duur ek pal ke liye
Lyrics: kal tak to aashnaa the magar aaj gair ho do din men ye mizaaj hain aage kii kair ho  merii nazar se na ho duur ek pal ke liye teraa wujuud hai laazim merii gazal ke liye  kahaan se dhuundh ke laauun charaag se wo badan taras gaii hain nigaahen kanwal kanwal ke liye  ek aisaa tajurbaa mujhako huaa hai aaj kii raat bachaa ke dhadakanen rakh lii hain mainne kal ke liye  sadaa jiye ye meraa shaharebemisaal jahaan hazaar jhopade girate hain ik mahal ke liye  qatiil zakm sahuun aur muskuraataa rahuun bane hain daayare kyaa kyaa mere amal ke liye  kisii kisii ke nasiibon men ishq likkhaa hai har ek dimaag bhalaa kab hai is kalal ke liye  huii na jurrateguftaar to sabab ye thaa mile na lafz tere husn ke badal ke liye

Title: asar usako zaraa nahiin hotaa
Lyrics: asar usako zaraa nahiin hotaa  ranj raahat fazaa nahiin hotaa  tum mere paas hote ho goyaa  jab koii duusaraa nahiin hotaa  haaledil yaar ko likhuun kyon kar  haath dil se judaa nahiin hotaa   tum hamaare kisii tarah na hue  varanaa duniyaa men kyaa nahiin hotaa

Title: na de ilzaam dil unako na kar shiqavaa zamaane se
Lyrics: na de ilzaam dil unako na kar shiqavaa zamaane se muhabbat kam nahiin hotii kabhii aazamaane se na de ilzaam dil threedots  thahar jaao mere ashqon na baahar aankh ke aanaa 2 milegaa kyaa merii haalat pe duniyaa ko hansaane se na de ilzaam dil threedots  badii bedard duniyaa hai kisii ke gam ko kyaa jaane 2 maze lele ke hansatii hai kush hotii hai rulaane se na de ilzaam dil threedots

Title: tasaviir terii dil meraa bahalaa na sakegii
Lyrics: tasaviir terii dil meraa bahalaa na sakegii ye terii tarah mujh se to sharmaa na sakegii tasaviir terii threedots  main baat karuungaa to ye khaamosh rahegii siine se lagaa luungaa to ye kuchh na kahegii aaraam vo kyaa degii jo tadapaa na sakegii tasaviir terii threedots  ye aankhen hain thaharii huii chanchal vo nigaahen ye haath hain sahame hue aur mast vo baahen parchhaaiin to insaan ke kaam aa na sakegii tasaviir terii threedots  in honthon ko faiyyaaz main kuchh de na sakuungaa is zulf ko main haath men bhii le na sakuungaa ulajhii huii raaton ko ye sulajhaa na sakegii tasaviir terii threedots

Title: hamako kisake gam ne maaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii
Lyrics: dil kii choton ne kabhii chain se rahane na diyaa jab chalii sard hawaa mainne tujhe yaad kiyaa isakaa ronaa nahiin kyuun tumane kiyaa dil barabaad isakaa gam hai ke bahut der men barabaad kiyaa  hamako kisake gam ne maaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii kisane todaa dil hamaaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii  dil ke lutane kaa sabab puuchho na sabake saamane naam aayegaa tumhaaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii  nafaraton ke tiir khaa kar doston ke shahar men hamane kis kis ko pukaaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii  kyaa bataaen pyaar kii baazii wafaa kii raah men kaun jiitaa kaun haaraa ye kahaanii phir sahii

Title: chaand ke saath kaii dard purane nikale
Lyrics: chaand ke saath kaii dard purane nikale kitane gam the jo tere gam ke bahaane nikale  faslegul aaii phir ik baar asiiranewafaa apane hii kuun ke dariyaa men nahaane nikale  dil ne ik iint se taamiir kiyaa taajamahal tuune ik baat kahii laakh fasaane nikale  dashtetanahaaiiehijraan men khadaa sochataa huun haay kyaa log meraa saath nibhaane nikale

Title: maanaye ni maanaye main ik shikraa yaar banaayaa
Lyrics: albumbirhaa da sultan maaye ni maaye main ik shikraa yaar banaayaa   ohade sir te kalagii te ohade pairiin jhaanjhar oh chog chugendaa aayaa   ik ohade ruup dii dhupp dhikherii ho duujaa mehakaan daa dhirhaayaa tiijaa ohadaa rang gulaabii oh kise gorii maan daa jaayaa   nainiin ohade chet the aathaan ate zulfiin saavan chhaayaa hothaan de vich katte daa koyi diuhn chharhan te aya nii men vaari jaan  saahvaan de vicch phul soyan de kise bagh chanan da laya dehii de vicch khede chetar itraan naal nuhaya nii men vaari jaan  bolaan de vicch paun pure dii nii oh koyilaan da hamsaya chhitte dand jiyon dhaanon baglaa tariiaan maar udaayaa nii men vaari jaan  ishqe daa ik palang navaarii ve asaan chaananiyaan vich dahyaa tan dii chaadar ho gayii maidii ho us pair jaan palange paayaa   dukhan mere nainaan de kohye te vich had hanjuaan daa aayaa saarii raat gayii vich sochaan ho us ai kii zulm kamaayaa   subahsavere lai ni vatanaa ve asaan malmal os nahavaayaa dehii de vichon nikalan chinagaan ni saadaa hatth gayaa kumhalaayaa   chuurii kuttaan taan oh khaaondaa naahiin ve asaan dil daa maas khavaayaa ik udaarii aisii maarii ik udaarii aisii maarii   oh mud vataniin naa aayaa o maaye nii main ik shikraa yaar banaayaa

Title: saajan aanaa naav puraanaa
Lyrics: saajana aanaa  saajana aanaa naava puraanaa saajana aanaa man giit prem ke gaaye re un giiton ko tum gaanaa saajana aanaa  nainon me aansuu rehate hain aur ro ro kar ye kehate hain saawan ke mahiine aaye re tum hamako na tarasaanaa saajana aanaa  baat baat par jii bhar aaye hai saawan ki rumjhum na bhaaye hai mohe pal bhar chain na aaye re tum sukha varshaa barsaanaa saajana aanaa

Title: o aajaa panchhii akelaa hai
Lyrics: ra o aajaa panchhi akela hai  aa o so jaa nindiyaa ki bela hai   2 ra o aajaa panchhi akela hai   ra ud gai nind yahan mere nain se  aa bas karo yunhi pade raho chain se   2 ra laage re dar mohe laage re  aa o ye kya darane kii bela hai  ra o aajaa panchhi akela hai threedots  ra oho kitani ghuti si hai ye fizaa  aa aha kitani suhaani hai ye hava   2 ra mar gaye ham nikala dam mar gaye ham  aa mausam kitana alabela hai  ra o aajaa panchhi akela hai threedots  ra bin tere kaisii andheri ye raat hai  aa dil mera dhadakan merii tere sath hai   2 ra tanha hai phir bhi dil tanha hai  aa laagaa sapanon ka mela hai  ra o aajaa panchhi akela hai threedots

Title: man kunto maulaa
Lyrics: haidariam qalandaram mastam bandaaemuratazaa alii hastam saragarohetamaam rindanam keh sagekueshereyazdanam  ai man kunto maulaa alii maulaa ek suurat kii do ha muuratiya ek mohammad ek alii man kunto maulaa alii maulaa  bedam yahii to paak ha maqsuudeqaayanat kairunnisaa hussain hasan mustafaa alii man kunto maulaa alii maulaa  is naam kii tasbiih to farishton ne bhii padhii ha man kunto maulaa fa alii un maulaa fa alii un maulaa fa dadril dadril dadraanii ham tum tanananana tanananana re yaalalii yaalalii yaalaa yaalaa re yaalalaa yaalalaa yaalalaa re man kunto maulaa alii maulaa  ma sadaqe ni maulaa man kunto maulaa ahaa mere alii maulaa man kunto maulaa ek suurat kii   threedots  huii kab asii shaadii hazarateadam se taa isaa ke dulahan faatimaa zoharaa alii almuratazaa dulhaa jo vo bintepayambar thii to ye moludekaaba the nabii ke ghar kii thii betii kudaa ke ghar kaa thaa betaa alii maulaa maulaa alii maulaa  da dere  maulaa alii maulaa ye naam koii kaam bigadane nahiin detaa bigade bhii banaa detaa ha sab kaam alii maulaa maulaa alii maulaa da da dan dar dam ta diri diri dam alii maulaa maulaa alii maulaa ai man kunto maulaa   threedots

Title: ham tujh se kis havas kii falaq justajuu karen mukesh gazal
Lyrics: ham tujh se kis havas kii falak justaju karen dil hii nahiin rahaa hai jo kuchh aarazu karen  har chaand aainaa hun par itanaa hun naaqubuul  munh pher len vo jisake mujhe ruubaru karen  naigul ko hai sabaat naa ham ko hii aitabaar kis baat par chaman havaserangobuu karen

Title: jo thake thake se the hausale
Lyrics: jo gamehabiib see duur the vo khud apane aag men jal gaye jo gamehabiib ko paa gaye vo gamon se hans ke nikal gaye  jo thakey thakey se  vo shabaab banake machal gaye  vo nazar nazar se gale milii vo bujhe charaag bhii jal gaye  ye shikasediid kii karvaten bhii badii latiifojamiil thii main nazar jhukaake tadap gayaa vo nazar bachaake nikal gaye  na khizaa men hai koii tiir  na bahaar men hai koii roshanii ye nazar nazar ke charaagen ho kahiin bujh gaye kahiin jal gaye  vo nazar nazar se gale milii vo bujhe charaag bhii jal gaye jo sambhal sambhal ke bahak gaye vo fareb raah the  vo makaam ishq ko paa gaye jo bahak bahak ke sambhal gaye  jo khile hue hain rabish rabish vo hazaar husn  magar un gulon kaa jawaab kyaa jo qadam qadam pe kuchal gaye  na hain shaayad ab game  na vo daagedil na vo aarazoo jinhen aitaabaarebahaar thaa vohii phuul rang badal gaye jo thakey thakey se

Title: raam kare aisaa ho jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae
Lyrics: raam kare aisaa ho jaae merii nindiyaa tohe mil jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae threedots  svapna chalaa aae koii choriichorii  mast pavan gaae lorii  chandra kiran banake dorii           2 tere man ko jhuulaa jhulaae merii nindiyaa tohe mil jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae threedots  guzar jaaen sukh se terii dukh bharii ratiyaan badal luun main tose ankhiyaan bas men agar hon ye batiyaan maanguun duaaen haath uthaae merii nindiyaa tohe mil jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae threedots  main hii nahiin tuu hii nahiin saaraa zamaanaa dard kaa hai ek fasaanaa aadamii ho jaae diivaanaa yaad kare gar bhuul na jaae merii nindiyaa tohe mil jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae main jaaguun tuu so jaae threedots

Title: patalii kamar hai
Lyrics: patalii kamar hai tirachhii nazar hai khile phuul sii terii javaanii koii bataaye kahaan qasar hai o aajaa mere man chaahe baalam aajaa teraa aankhon men ghar hai  main chanchal madmast pavan huun jhuum jhuum har kalii ko chumuun bichhad gayii main ghaayal hiranii tumako dhuundhuun ban ban ghuumuun merii zindagii mast safar hai patalii kamar hai threedots  tum bin nainon kii barasaaten rok na paauun laakh manaauun main bahate dariyaa kaa paanii khel kinaaron se badh jaauun bandh na paauun nayaa nagar nit nayii dagar hai patalii kamar hai threedots

Title: koii kisii kaa dard na jaane
Lyrics: ra koii kisii kaa dard na jaane haae ki apane ho yaa ho begaane haae  ra kyuun bhanvaraa kaliyon se milataa hai      kyuun diipak bujh bujh ke jalataa hai      kyuun jal marate hain parawaane ki koii kisii kaa   threedots  ki jiivan hai ek rangiin sapanaa      is duniyaa men koii na apanaa haay      sab matalab ke hain diiwaane ra koii kisii kaa   threedots  ra duniyaa hai do din kaa melaa ki muurakh tuu jaaegaa akelaa haay ra chhod ke bastii are viraane donon koii kisii kaa   threedots

Title: ham hain mataaekuuchaaobaazaar kii tarah
Lyrics: ham hain mataaekuuchaaobaazaar kii tarah uthatii hai har nigaah khariidaar kii tarah  vo to kahiin hain aur magar dil ke aas paas magar dil ke aas paas phiratii hai koii shah nigaaheyaar kii tarah ham hain threedots  majaruuh likh rahe hain vo ahalevafaa kaa naam ahalevafaa kaa naam ham bhii khade hue hain gunahagaar kii tarah ham hain threedots  is kuuetishnagii men bahut hai ke ek jaam haath aa gayaa hai daulatebedaar kii tarah  siidhii hai raaheshauq par yuun hii kabhii kabhii kam ho gaii hai gesuuediladaar kii tarah  ab jaa ke kuchh khulaa hunarenaakhuunejunuun zakmejigar hue laboruksaar kii tarah

Title: dil aaj shaayar hai gam aaj nagamaa hai
Lyrics: dil aaj shaayar hai gam aaj nagamaa hai shab ye gazal hai sanam gairon ke sheron ko o sunane vaale ho is taraf bhii karam  aake zaraa dekh to terii khaatir ham kis tarah se jiye  2 aansuu ke dhaage se siite rahe ham jo zakhm tuune diye chaahat kii mahafil men gam teraa lekar qismat se khelaa juaa duniyaa se jiite par tujhase haare yuun khel apanaa huaa threedots  ye pyaar hamane kiyaa jis tarah se usakaa na koii javaab  2 zarraa the lekin terii lau men jalakar ham ban gae aafataab hamase hai zindaa vafaa aur ham hii se hai terii mahafil javaan jab ham na honge to ro roke duniyaa dhuundhegii mere nishaan threedots  ye pyaar koii khilaunaa nahiin hai har koii le jo khariid  2 merii tarah zindagii bhar tadap lo phir aanaa isake kariib ham to musaafir hain koii safar ho ham to guzar jaaenge hii lekin lagaayaa hai jo daanv hamane vo jiit kar aaenge hii threedots

Title: dil ke afasaane nigaahon kii zubaan tak pahunche
Lyrics: dil ke afasaane nigaahon kii zubaan tak pahunche baat chal nikalii hai ab dekhen kahaan tak pahunche  sahamesahame hue jazabaat ne angadaaii lii soesoe hue nagamaat ne angadaaii lii khud se sharamaaye hue unake jahaan tak pahunche baat chal nikalii hai ab dekhen kahaan tak pahunche   jinakii aankhon ne kaii baar kiye ham se savaal unakii yaadon se  mahakane lagii viiraan khayaal leke daaman men bahaaren vo kizaan tak pahunche baat chal nikalii hai ab dekhen kahaan tak pahunche

Title: dhuundho dhuundho re saajanaa dhuundho re saajanaa
Lyrics: dhundho dhundho re saajanaa dhundho re saajanaa more kaan kaa baalaa ho dhundho dhundho re saajanaa dhundho re saajanaa more kaan kaa baalaa moraa baalaa chandaa kaa jaise haalaa re  2 jaamen laale laale haan  jaamen laale laale motiyan kii latake maalaa ho dhundho threedots  main soii thii apanii ataravaa thagavaa ne daakaa daalaa lut gai nindiyaa gir gai bindiyaa kaanon se khul gayaa baalaa balam moraa baalaa chandaa threedots  baalaa moraa baalepan kaa ho gai re jaa kii chorii o chhailaa toraa manavaa mailaa laagii najariyaa torii balam mora baalaa chandaa threedots  baalaa moraa sejiyaa pe gir gayaa dhundhe re more nainaa naa jaanuun piyaa tuune churaay liyaa daiyyaa re kal kii rainaa balam mora baalaa chandaa threedots

Title: ye zindagii ke mele duniyaa men kam na honge
Lyrics: ye zindagii ke mele  2 duniyaa men kam na honge afasos ham na honge  ik din padegaa jaanaa kyaa vaqt kyaa zamaanaa koii na saath degaa sab kuchh yahiin rahegaa jaaenge ham akele ye zindagii threedots  duniyaa hai maujedariyaa qatare kii zindagii kyaa paanii men mil ke paanii anjaam ye ke paanii dam bhar ko saans le le ye zindagii threedots  hongii yahii bahaaren ulfat kii yaadagaaren bigadegii aur chalegii duniyaa yahii rahegii honge yahii jhamele ye zindagii threedots

Title: dil kii ye aarazuu thii koii dilarubaa mile
Lyrics: ma dil kii ye aarazuu thii koii dilarubaa mile  2 lo ban gayaa nasiib ke tum ham se aa mile dil kii ye threedots  sa dekhen hamen nasiib se ab apane kyaa mile  2 ab tak to jo bhii dost mile bevafaa mile     2  ma aankhon ko ik ishaare kii zehamat to diijiye kadamon men dil bichhaaduun ijaazat to diijiye gam ko gale lagaaluun jo gam aap kaa mile  2 dil kii ye threedots  2  sa hamne udaasiyon men guzaarii hai zindagii    2 lagataa hai dar farebevafaa se kabhii kabhii  2 aisaa na ho ki zakm koii phir nayaa mile       2 ab tak to jo bhii dost mile bevafaa mile  ma kal tum judaa hue the jahaan saath chhod kar ham aaj tak khade hain usii dil ke mod par ham ko is intazaar kaa kuchh to silah mile 2 dil kii ye threedots  2  sa dekhen hamen nasiib se ab apane kyaa mile  2 ab tak to jo bhii dost mile bevafaa mile     2

Title: tujhe pyaar karate karate yuun hii umr biit jaae
Lyrics: uthatii nahiin hain yuun hii tumase nashiilii palaken kaajal kaa bojh kaise phir tum uthaa sakogii kaajal kaa bojh threedots  kyuun saamane hai darpan qaatil terii nazar ke jaanaa hai aaj tumako aakhir kahaan sanvar ke zulfon men phuul taanko kaliyon se maang bhar lo lekin kasam kudaa kii aanchal na rakhanaa sar pe sharamohayaa se yuun hii gardan jhukii jhukii hai aanchal kaa bojh kaise phir tum uthaa sakogii uthatii nahiin hain threedots  ham jaanate hain zaalim sab bhed tere man ke tadapaa lo chaahe jitanaa maasuum hamako ban ke naazoadaa se dekho hamako tabaah kar do khud par sitam na karanaa paayal magar pahan ke naazuk kadam se yuun hii chalatii ho dagamagaakar paayal kaa bojh kaise phir tum uthaa sakogii uthatii nahiin hain threedots

Title: nishaan bhii koii na chhodaa ki dil ko samajhaaen
Lyrics: nishaan bhii koii na chhodaa ki dil ko samajhaaen terii talaash men jaaen to ham kahaan jaaen  o jaane waale ye dil tujhase badagumaan bhii nahiin lagii hai aag nasheman men aur dhuvaan bhii nahiin yahii nasiib men likkhaa thaa ghut ke mar jaaen  sunaae haal kise jab wo raazadaan na milaa kushii milii to bahaaron kaa wo samaan na milaa yahii thii ek tamannaa ke tujh ko apanaaen  ujad gaii hain tamannaaen tere jaane se gilaa kudaa se karen yaa karen zamaane se gamejudaaii bataa aaj kisase takaraaen

Title: ye teraa ghar ye meraa ghar
Lyrics: ye teraa ghar ye meraa ghar kisii ko dekhanaa ho gar to pahale aa ke maang le merii nazar terii nazar ye teraa ghar ye meraa ghar ye ghar bahut hasiin hai   threedots  na baadalon kii chhaanv men na chaandanii kii gaanv men na phuul jaise raaste bane hain isake vaaste magar ye ghar ajiib hai zamiin ke qariib hai ye iint pattharon kaa ghar hamaarii hasaraton kaa ghar ye teraa ghar ye meraa ghar   threedots  jo chaandanii nahiin to kyaa ye roshanii hai pyaar kii dilon ke phuul khil gaye to fiqr kyaa bahaar kii hamaare ghar na aayegii kabhii khushii udhaar kii hamaarii raahaton kaa ghar hamaarii chaahaton kaa ghar ye teraa ghar ye meraa ghar   threedots

Title: chaahat na hotii kuchh bhii na hotaa
Lyrics: alkaa  chaahat nadiyaa chaahat saagar         chaahat dhatrii chaahat anbar vinod  chaahat raadhaa chaahat giridhar  alkaa  dil kaa dhadakanaa yahii chaahat hai         niind na aanaa yahii chaahat hai         chaahat na hotii kuchh bhii na hotaa         main bhii na hotii tuu bhii na hotaa  vinod  dil kaa dhadakanaa yahii chaahat hai         niind na aanaa yahii chaahat hai         chaahat na hotii kuchh bhii na hotaa         tuu bhii na hotii main bhii na hotaa  alkaa  tum mujhase alag kab ho main tumase judaa kab huun         paanii men kanval jaise rahate ho mujh hii men tum vinod  dekhuun to tumhen dekhuun sochuun to tumhen sochuun         saagar men nadii aise bahate ho mujh hii men tum alkaa  chaahat khushabuu chaahat rangat         chaahat muurat chaahat kudarat vinod  chaahat gangaa chaahat jamunaa alkaa  hosh ganvaanaa yahii chaahat hai         jaan se jaanaa yahii chaahat hai         chaahat na hotii kuchh bhii na hotaa   threedots  alkaa  jab tuu nahiin hotaa hai us vaqt bhii har shah men         har giit mein har lay men tuu nazar aataa hai vinod  haan bikharaa ke kabhii zulfen chamakaa ke kabhii cheharaa         tum hii merii duniyaa ke din raat sajaate ho alkaa  chaahat ghuunghat chaahat dapran         chaahat sajanii chaahat saajan vinod  chaahat puujaa chaahat dashran alkaa  aankh bhar aanaa yahii chaahat hai         jii ghabaraanaa yahii chaahat hai         chaahat na hotii kuchh bhii na hotaa   threedots

Title: tere dvaar khadaa ek jogii
Lyrics: kaashii dekhii mathuraa dekhii dekhe tiirath saare kahiin na man kaa miit milaa to aayaa tere dvaare  tere dvaar khadaa ek jogii	 2 na maange yah sonaa chaandii maange darshan devii tere dvaar threedots  duniyaa se mukh modaa tere liye jag chhodaa  chhod diyaa gharbaar	 2 banban chhaanaa mainne tujhe devii maanaa mainne sun le merii pukaar		 2 na maange yah sonaa chaandii maange darshan devii tere dvaar threedots  karake jatan aayaa man men agan laayaa  akhiyon men darshanpyaas	 2 priit kii bhiikshaa prem kii diikshaa maang rahaa yah daas	 2 na maange yah sonaa chaandii maange darshan devii tere dvaar threedots

Title: vo chaand khilaa vo taare hanse  na samajhe vo anaadii hain
Lyrics: vo chaand khilaa vo taare hanse ye raat ajab matavaalii hai samajhane vaale samajh gaye hain na samajhe na samajhe vo anaadii hain vo chaand khilaa   threedots  chaandii sii chamakatii raahen vo dekho jhuum jhuum ke bulaayen kiranon ne pasaarii baahen ki aramaan naach naach laharaaye baaje dil ke taar gaaye ye bahaar ubhare hai pyaar jiivan men vo chaand khilaa   threedots  kiranod ne chunariyaa taanii bahaaren kis pe aaj hain diivaanii chandaa kii chaal masataanii hai paagal jisape raat kii raanii taaron kaa jaal le le dil nikaal puucho na haal mere dil kaa vo chaand khilaa   threedots

Title: naavakandaaz jidhar diidaaejaanaan honge
Lyrics: naavakandaaz jidhar diidaaejaanaan honge niimbismil kaii honge kaii bejaan honge  taabenazzaaraa nahiin aaiinaa kyaa dekhane duun aur ban jaayenge tasviir jo hairaan honge  tuu kahaan jaayegii kuchh apanaa thikaanaa kar le ham to kal kaabeadam men shabehijraan honge  eh ham hain ke huye aise pashemaan ke bas ek wo hain ke jinhen chaah ke aramaan honge  phir bahaar aaii wohii dashtenavar dii hogii phir wohii paanv wohii khaaremuhailaa honge

Title: chaudahaviin manzil pe jaalim aa gayaa
Lyrics: chaudahaviin manzil pe jaalim aa gayaa aa gayaa chaand mere chaand se sharamaa gayaa sharamaa gayaa  ho gae dore gulaabii gaal ke rang to dekho sharaabhii aankh ke jis ne dekhaa bin piye laharaa gayaa chaand mere chaand se sharamaa gayaa  zulf men rangat hai kaalii raat kii raat bhii kaisii kisii barasaat kii zulf laharaaii to baadal chhaa gayaa chaand mere chaand se sharamaa gayaa  do kanval ke phuul hain yaa gaal hain kuchh sunaharii hain jhalak kuchh laal hain  dekh kar faiyaaz main ghabaraa gayaa chaand mere chaand se sharamaa gayaa sharamaa gayaa   kuchh sunaharii hai jhalak kuchh laal hain

Title: chaand tanahaa hai aasmaan tanahaa
Lyrics: chaand tanahaa hai aasmaan tanahaa 2 dil milaa hai kahaan kahaan tanahaa chaand tanahaa hai  bujh gaii lau chhup gayaa taaraa 2 gharagharaataa rahaa dhuaan tanahaa 2 chaand tanahaa hai  zindagii kyaa isii ko kahate hain 2 jism tanahaa hai aur jaan tanahaa chaand tanahaa hai  hamasafar koii gar mile bhii kahiin 2 donon chalate rahe tanahaa 2 chaand tanahaa hai  jalatii bujhatii sii roshanii ke taare 2 simataasimataa saa ek makaan tanahaa 2 raah dekhaa karegaa sadiyon tak 2 chhod jaaenge ye jahaan tanahaathreedots

Title: main dil tuu dhadakan
Lyrics: main dil tu dhadakan tujhase mera jiivan chaand ke jaisaa tuut jaauun main tuu meraa dhadakan main dil tuu dhadakan  tuu hii khilauna tuu hii saathi tu hi yaar mera ek ye chehara ye do baahen ye sansaar mera   2 tujhako hii dekhaa hai sapane tuu meraa dhadakan main dil tuu dhadakan  tere dam se khuli hui hai saanson ki ye khadii  tujhase bichhadake jii na sakuungaa main to ek ghadii 2 mere jiivan ke ye diipak tujhase hii roshan main dil tuu dhadakanthreedots

Title: ye dil na hotaa bechaaraa kadam na hote avaaraa
Lyrics: ye dil  naa hotaa bechaaraa  kadam na hote aavaaraa jo khuubasuurat koi apanaa hamasafar hotaa o o o  ye dil  na hotaa bechaaraa  threedots  are sunaa jab se zamaane hain bahaar ke ham bhii  aaye hain raahii banake pyaar ke koi na koi to bulaayegaa pade hain ham bhii raahon men ye dil  na hotaa bechaaraa  threedots  are maanaa usako nahiin main pahachaanataa bandaa usakaa pataa bhii nahiin jaanataa aa aa  2 milanaa likhaa hai to aayegaa pade hain ham bhii raahon men ye dil naa hotaa bechaaraa  threedots  are usakii dhun men padegaa dukh jhelanaa siikhaa haa haa hamane bhii pattharon se khelanaa  2 suurat kabhii to dikhaayegaa pade hain ham bhii raahon men ye dil naa hotaa bechaaraa  threedots

Title: diyaa jalaakar aap bujhaayaa
Lyrics: diyaa jalaakar aap bujhaayaa2 tere kaam niraale niraale dil tod ke jaanevaale2 diyaa jalaakar aap bujhaayaa  phuul pavan aur nadii kinaaraa karat ishaare saanjh kaa taaraa vyaakul hai man meraa aajaa3 o chhod ke jaanevaale  dil tod ke jaanevaale 2 diyaa jalaakar aap bujhaayaa  dol rahii hai man kii nayyaa kahaan chhupe ho aao kevayyaa 2 gam kaa tuufaan aane ko hai chhaaye baadal kaale 2 o chhod ke jaanevaale  dil tod ke jaanevaale  diyaa jalaakar aap bujhaayaa

Title: kaisii hasiin aaj bahaaron kii raat hai
Lyrics: ra  kaisii hasiin aaj bahaaron kii raat hai      ek chaand aasamaan pe hai ek mere saath hai  ma  dene vale tuu ne to koii kamii na kii      ab kis ko kyaa milaa ye muqaddar kii baat hai  ra  chhaaya hai husnoishq pe ek rangebekudii      aate hain zindagii men ye aalam kabhii kabhii      har gham bhuul jaao khuushii kii baaraat hai      ek chaand aasamaan pe hai ek mere saath hai  ma  aaii hai vo bahaar ki nagame ubal pade      aisii khuushii hai ki aansuu nikal pade      honthon pe hain duaaen magar dil pe haath hai      ab kis ko kyaa milaa ye muqaddar kii baat hai  ra  mastii simat ke pyaar ke gulashan men aa gaii ma  merii khuushii bhii aap ke daaman men aa gaii      bhanvaraa kalii se duur nahiin saath saath hai

Title: koii hamnafas nahiin hai
Lyrics: koii hamnafas nahiin hai koii razadaan nahiin hai faqat ek dil thaa apanaa so wo meharabaan nahiin hai  merii ruuh kii haqiiqat mere aansuon se puuchho meraa majalisii tabassum meraa tarjumaan nahiin hai  kisii aankh ko sadaa do kisii zulf ko pukaaro badii dhuup pad rahii hai koii saayabaan nahiin hai  inhiin pattharon pe chal kar agar aa sako to aao mere ghar ke raaste men koii kahakashaan nahiin hai

Title: bhang kaa rang jamaa ho chakaachak khaike paan banaaras valaa
Lyrics: are bhang kaa rang jamaa ho chakaachak phir lo paan chabaay are aisaa jhatakaa lage jiyaa pe punar janam hoi jaay  o khaaike paan banaaras vaalaa  2 khul jaae band akal kaa taalaa khaaike paan banaaras vaalaa khul jaae band akal kaa taalaa phir to aisaa kare kamaal siidhii kar de sabakii chaal o chhoraa gangaa kinaare vaalaa  2 khaaikethreedots  are raam duhaaii kaise chakkar men pad gayaa haay haay haay kahaan taang fansaaii main to suulii pe chadh gayaa haay haay kaisaa siidhaa saadaa main kaisaa bholaa bhaalaa haan haan are kaisaa siidhaa saadaa main kaisaa bholaa bhaalaa jaane kaun ghadii men pad gayaa padhelikhon se paalaa miithii chhuurii se miithii chhuurii se huaa halaal chhoraa gangaa kinaare vaalaa  2  ek kanyaa kunvaarii hamarii suurat pe mar gaii haay haay haay ek miithii kataarii hamare dil men utar gaii haay haay kaisii gorii gorii o tiikhii tiikhii chhorii vaah vaah are kaisii gorii gorii o tiikhii tiikhii chhorii karake joraajorii kar gaii hamare dil kii chorii o milii chhorii to milii chhorii to huaa nihaal chhoraa gangaa kinaarevaalaathreedots

Title: tum aa gaye ho nuur aa gayaa hai
Lyrics: kishor	tum aa gae ho nuur aa gayaa hai     2 nahiin to charaagon se lau jaa rahii thii lataa	jiine ki tumase vajah mil gai hai badii bevajah zindagii jaa rahii thii kishor	tum aa gae ho nuur aa gayaa hai  kishor	kahaan se chale kahaan ke liye ye khabar nahiin thii magar koi bhii siraa jahaan jaa milaa vahiin tum miloge ke ham tak tumhaarii duaa aa rahii thii tum aa gaye ho nuur aa gayaa hain lataa	 nahiin to charaagon se lau jaa rahii thii tum aa gae ho nuur aa gayaa hain  lataa	din duubaa nahiin raat duubii nahiin jaane kaisaa hai safar kvaabon ke diye aankhon men liye vahiin aa rahe the jahaan se tumhaarii sadaa aa rahii thii tum aa gaye ho nuur aa gayaa hain nahiin to charaagon se lau jaa rahii thii

Title: tum bin jaauun kahaan ke duniyaa men aake rafikishore
Lyrics: tum bin jaaun kahaan  ke duniyaa men aake kuchh na phir chaahaa kabhii tumako chaahake tum bin threedots  dekho mujhe sar se kadam tak sirf pyaar huun main gale se lagaalo ke tumhaaraa beqaraar huun main tum kyaa jaano ke bhatakataa phiraa main kis galii tumako chaah ke threedots  ab hai sanam har mausam pyaar ke kaabil padii jahaan chhaaon hamaarii saj gayii mahafil mahafil kyaa tanahaai men bhii lagataa hai jii tumako chaah ke threedots   tum bin jaaun kahaan  ke duniyaa men aake kuchh na phir chaahaa kabhii tumako chaahake tum bin threedots  rah bhii sakoge tum kaise ho ke mujhase judaa dhah jaaengii diivaaren sun ke merii sadaa aanaa hii hogaa tumhen mere liye saathii mere suunii raaha ke threedots  kitanii akelii sii pahale thii yahii duniyaa  tumane nazar jo milaa lii bas gai duniyaa dil ko milii jo tumhaarii lagan diye jal gae merii aah se threedots  dekho mere gam kii kahaanii kisiise mat kahanaa kahiin merii baat chale to sunake chup rahanaa meraa kyaa hai kat jaaegii kahiin ye zindagii tumako chaah ke threedots

Title: mere liye to bas vahii  tum saamane baithii raho
Lyrics: mere liye to bas vahii pal hain hasiin bahaar ke tum saamane baithii raho main giit gaauun pyaar ke main giit gaauun pyaar ke  main jaanataa huun pyaar kii puujaa yahaan aparaadh hai aparaadh ye har pal karuun man men yahii ik saadh hai man men yahii ik saadh hai mujhako milii hai ye kushii jiivan kii baazii haar ke tum saamane baithii raho main giit gaauun pyaar ke main giit gaauun pyaar ke  siikhaa nahiin maine kabhii sainyam se man ko baandhanaa hai saadhanaa merii tumhaare ruup kii aaraadhanaa ruup kii aaraadhanaa tum saath do to tod duun saare niyam sansaar ke tum saamane baithii raho main giit gaauun pyaar ke main giit gaauun pyaar ke

Title: sochate aur jaagate saanson kaa ik dariyaa huun main
Lyrics: sochate aur jaagate saanson kaa ik dariyaa huun main apane gumagashtaa kinaaron ke liye bahataa huun main  jal gayaa saaraa badan in mausamon kii aag men ek mausam ruuh kaa hai jisamen ab zindaa huun main  mere honthon kaa tabassum de gayaa dhokhaa tujhe tuune mujhako baag jaanaa dekh le saharaa huun main  dekhiye merii pajiiraaii ko ab aataa hai kaun lamhaa bhar to waqt kii dahaliiz par aayaa huun main

Title: pasiinepasiine hue jaa rahe ho
Lyrics: pasiinepasiine hue jaa rahe ho yah bolo kahaan se chale aa rahe ho  hamen sabr karane ko yah to rahe ho magar dekh lo kud hii ghabaraa rahe ho  yah kisakii burii tumako nazar lag gaii hai bahaaron ke mausam men murjhaa rahe ho  yah aaiinaa hai yah to sach hii kahegaa kyon apanii haqiiqat se kataraa rahe ho

Title: main dillii kaa shahazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab chhorii
Lyrics: main dillii kaa shahazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab chhorii jhanjhat naa tuu mujhase karanaa be  main bhii huun saahabazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab gorii dardar ke chal mujhase naa takaraa  ulluu kaa bhaaii tuu bilkul hai bol kuchh to bol  tuu bhii to bhainse kaa bhaaii gadbadiyaagadbadiyaa hai  khoduungaa phaaduungaa nochuungaa chhaantuungaa jaajaa  maaruungaa kuutuungaa piituungaa haaye  saare gam pyaare gam honthon se pii luungaa jaa re  merii dulahan ko bahakaayaa kyuun  ghusapaithiyaa hai tuu buraa hai ulluu tuu chhotaa saa pillaa hai tuu  haan tujh se mil kar terii dulahan dar kar lad kar ghonchuu  aaii thii vo milane mujhako  tuune us ko phusalaayaa phir kyuunkyuun amma oy oy  tujhamen thodaa kuchh dam thaa to chhod ke tujhako aaii kyuun  kaalaa tuu pillaa tuu banataa kyuun bholaa tuu bolbol  ghus ke tujhako dekhuungaa  siithaa tuu khaaraa tuu khotaa tuu lotaa tuu bolbol  tujh ko main ragadaa ke dekhuungaa  taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa taa nna naa naa   jangal kaa popat tuu billii se darataa tuu raadheshyaamsiitaaraam karataa hai kyuun  phir zaraa bolo to bolo to durgaiyyaa piichhe se maaruungaa darataa hai kyuun  ghatiyaa hai darapok hai tuu dil kaa puuraa kaalaa tuu  ab naa chaal chalegaa koii kyaa ho tum main jaan gayaa  jaajaa ab tuu mat naa puunchh hilaa he  gadabad sadabad gadabad mat karanaa jaajaa  ho jaaye vo kaam karanaa meraa naam  soch le phir se jaanataa huun main  chadiyaa phadiyaa bhainsaa khutpatiyaa  haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haa ho ho ho ho ho ho  main dillii kaa shahazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab chhorii jhanjhat naa tuu mujhase karanaa be main bhii huun saahabazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab gorii dardar ke chal mujhase naa takaraa ulluu kaa bhaaii tuu bilkul hai bol kuchh to bol tuu bhii to bhainse kaa bhaaii gadbadiyaa gadbadiyaa hai khoduungaa phaaduungaa nochuungaa chhaantuungaa jaajaa maaruungaa kuutuungaa piituungaa haaye saare gam pyaare gam honthon se pii luungaa jaa re merii dulhan ko bahakaayaa kyuun   sur men dam hai nahiin phir kyuun tuu rotaa hai  ulluu ke paas aurat rahatii hai kyaa  buddhuu hai koraa tuu hai puuraa dhiilaa tuu  bhainse ke paas aurat rahatii hai kyaa  kaanaa guungaa majanuun tuu hai puuraapuuraa tuu jaalii  dekho niiche uupar aage piichhe se hai tuu khaalii  jhuuthii apanii teerandaazii chhod do  mere ghar men dakhalandaazii chhodo  ghar men ghus jaa paagal pakkaa tuu hai  agadam bagadam tikadam pagadam tuu hai  tuu bhaag jaa chor bhaag jaa ghatiyal mujhako aurat kaa  adiyal hai sadiyal hai pakkaa hii tuu chakkam hai  paajii hai mariyal hai ramakadiyaa badabadiyaa  ghatiyaa randavaa halakat chhod  bhuukha nangaa aadhaa luungii  bhaag jaa ab tuu chillaa mat tuu  teraa tukadaa tukadaa kar duun  main to gaauun pancham saragam  majanuun jaa re jaa re ab tuu jaa  main dillii kaa shahazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab chhorii jhanjhat naa tuu mujhase karanaa be main dillii kaa shahazaadaa mujhape maratii hain sab chhorii jhanjhat naa tuu mujhase karanaa be

Title: aanaa padegaa mujh ko duniyaa men dobaaraa
Lyrics: mil na sakaa dil ko agar pyaar tumhaaraa aanaa padegaa mujh ko duniyaa men dobaaraa  gaal pe gulaab ke shabanam hai zindagii pyaar ke liye to bahut kam hai zindagii udatii huii is umr ko ek teraa sahaaraa aanaa padegaa mujh ko threedots  apanii ye chhotii sii mulaaqaat bahut hai jitanii der teraa mile saath bahut hai bas ek jhalak ek nazar ek ishaaraa aanaa padegaa mujh ko threedots

Title: piyaa nahiin jab gaanv men
Lyrics: baadal barasaa galiigalii hain jhuulon ke tyohaar bin saajan main kise sunaauun paayal kii jhankaar main kyaa jaanuun kisane isamen baandhaa hai taabiiz aate jaate chhede mujhako buudhaa haarsingaar   piyaa nahiin jab gaanv men aag lage sab gaanv men  kitanii miithii thii imalii saajan the jab gaanv men  unake jaane kii taarik dangal thaa jab gaanv men  likhane waale aage likh lautoge kab gaanv men  man ka saudaa man ke mol kaisaa hai mazahab gaanv men

Title: phir mujhe diidaaetar yaad aayaa
Lyrics: phir mujhe didaetar yad aya dil jigar tishanaefariyad aya phir mujhe didaetar yad aya  dam liya tha na qayamat ne hano  2 phir tera vaqtesafar yad aya phir mujhe didaetar yad aya   zindagi yun bhi guzar hi jati  2 kyun tera rahaguzar yad aya phir mujhe didaetar yad aya  phir tere kuche ko jata hai kayal  2 dilegumagashta magar yad aya phir mujhe didaetar yad aya

Title: mujhe deke may mere saaqiyaa merii tashnagii ko
Lyrics: mujhe deke may mere saaqiyaa merii tashnagii ko havaa na de merii pyaas par bhii to kar nazar mujhe maikashii kii sazaa na de  meraa saath ai mere hamasafar nahiin chaahataa hai to jaam de magar is tarah sareraaheguzar mujhe har qadam pe sadaa na de  meraa gam na kar mere chaaraagar terii chaaraajoii bajjaa magar  meraa dard hai merii zindagii mujhe dardedil kii davaa na de  main vahaan huun ab meraa naasehaa ki jahaan kushii kaa guzar nahiin meraa gam hadon se guzar gayaa mujhe ab kushii kii duaa na de  voh giraaen shauq se bijaliyaan yah sitam karam hain satam nahiin ke voh tarz barqejafaa nahiin jo chamak ke nuurevafaa na de

Title: kaun kahataa hai tujhe main ne bhulaa rakhaa hai
Lyrics: kaun kahataa hai tujhe main ne bhulaa rakhaa hai terii yaadon ko kaleje se lagaa rakhaa hai  lab pe aahen bhii nahiin aankh men aansuu bhii nahiin dil ne har raaz muhabbat kaa chhupaa rakhaa hai  tuune jo dil ke andhere men jalaayaa thaa kabhii vo diyaa aaj bhii siine men jalaa rakhaa hai  dekh jaa aa ke mahakate hue zakmon kii bahaar main ne ab tak tere gulashan ko sajaa rakhaa hai

Title: aankhon men dil hai honthon pe jaan tum kahaan
Lyrics: tum kahaan tum kahaan  aankhon men dil hai honthon pe jaan tum kahaan ho tum kahaan tum kahaan   threedots  sunasaan raahon pe aankhen bichhaaiye siine men laakhon aramaan chhupaaiye dil ko bhulaave detii rahii par tumako na aanaa thaa tum na aaye mitane lage manzil ke nishaan tum kahaan   threedots  puuchhaa hai main ne shaamosahar se viiraaniyon kii ujadii nazar se merii pukaaren maayuus ho kar takaraake lautiin diivaarodar se  ko  tum kahaan tum kahaan  chup hai zamiin chup aasamaan tum kahaan ho tum kahaan   threedots

Title: sajanii nathalii se tuutaa motii re
Lyrics: sajanii sajanii nathalii se tuutaa motii re kajaraarii ankhiyaan rah gaiin rotii re 2 nathalii se tuutaa motii re  ruup kii agiyaaaa aaaa ruup kii agiyaa ruup ki agiyaa ang men laagii ang men laagii kaise chhupaae laaj abhaagii laaj abhaagii manavaaaa kahataaaa bhor kabhii naa hotii re kajaraarii ankhiyaan rah gaiin threedots  bolii dulahaniyaa  palaken jhuukaaeaa palaken jhuukaae ghuunghatavaa men sahame lajaaye sahame lajaaye balamaaaa padhaaeaa priit kii pahalii pothii re kajaraarii ankhiyaan rah gaiin threedots

Title: terii bindiyaa udaa ke  so gayaa saaraa india
Lyrics: terii bindiyaa udaa ke le gaii merii nindiyaa main jaag rahaa huun so gayaa saaraa india  merii bindiyaa udaa ke le gaii terii nindiyaa tuu jaag rahaa hai so gayaa saaraa india terii bindiyaa udaa ke threedots  merii jaan kisii kii jaan ko jaate dekhaa hai main jaan lutaa duungaa tujhape ye sochaa hai tuu ek luteraa hai dil tuune luutaa hai main kyaa jaanuun tuu sachchaa hai ki jhuuthaa hai tuune kar liyaa kaabuu jaaduu mujhape kiyaa main jaag rahaa huun threedots  maine jab se diyaa hai jaaneman ye dil tujhako mujhe terii kasam hai chain nahiin ik pal mujhako haalat merii bhii kuchh kuchh tere jaisii hai bechain badaa karatii hai muhabbat kaisii hai ab kyaa daranaa jab pyaar kiyaa to kiyaa main jaag rahaa huun threedots

Title: tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu
Lyrics: tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu terii shaan jallejalaalahuu  tuu milaa qariiberageguluu terii shaan jallejalaalahuu tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu  terii yaad men hai kalii kalii hai chamanchaman huualali tuu basaa hai phuul men huubahuu terii shaan jallejalaalahuu tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu  tere huqm se jab havaa chalii to chatak ke bolii kalii kalii hai kariim tuu hai rahiim tuu terii shaan jallejalaalahuu tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu  teraa jalavaa donon jahaan men hai teraa nuur kaunomakaan men hai yahaan tuu hii tuu vahaan tuu hii tuu terii shaan jallejalaalahuu tujhe dhuundhataa thaa main chaar suu

Title: jaane vaale sipahii se puuchho vo kahaan jaa rahaa hai
Lyrics: jaane vaale sipahii se puuchho vo kahaan jaa rahaa hai  ishq hai qaatilezindagaanii khuun se tar hai usakii javaanii haay maasuum bachapan kii yaaden haay do roz kii naujavaanii jaane vaale threedots  kaise sahame hue hain nazaare kaise dar dar ke chalate hain taare kyaa javaanii kaa khuun ho rahaa hai sukhr hai aanchalon ke kinaare jaane vaale threedots  kaun dukhiyaa hai jo gaa rahii hai bhuukhe bachchon ko bahalaa rahii hai laash jalane kii buu aa rahii hai zindagii hai ki chillaa rahii hai jaane vaale threedots

Title: kuchh aise bhii pal hote hain
Lyrics: kuchh aise bhii pal hote hain jab raat ke gahare sannaate gaharii sii niind men sote hain tab musakaano ke dard yahaan bacchon  kii tarah se rote hain  jab chhaa jaatii hai kaamoshii tab shor machaatii hai dhadakan ik melaa jaisaa lagataa hai bikharaa bikharaa ye suunaapan yaadon ke saae aise men  karane lagate hain aalingan chubhane lagataa hai saanson men  bikhare sapanon kaa har darpan phir bhii jaage ye do nainaa sapanon kaa  bojh  sanjote hain  yuun hii har raat pighalatii hai yuun hii har din dhal jaataa hai har saanjh yuun hii ye birahii man patajhad men  phuul khilaataa hai aakhir ye kaisaa bandhan hai  aakhir ye kaisaa naataa hai jo jud to gayaa anajaane men par tuut nahiin  ab paataa hai aur ham ulajhe is  bandhan men din raat ye nain bhigote hain

Title: ajanabii tum jaane pahachaane se lagate ho
Lyrics: ajanabii  loud   ajanabii tum jaane pahachaane se lagate ho  2 ye badi ajiib si baat hai ye naii naii mulaakaat hai  phir bhi jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  tumane kabhi pyaar kiyaa tha kisii raahii se  2 tumane kabhi vada kiyaa tha kisii sathi se  na vo pyaar rahaa na vo baat rahi  phir bhi jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  dil men rahe aur hamara dil tod diyaa  2 saath chale mod pe aake hamen chhod diyaa  tum ho kahaan aur ham kahaan  phir bhi jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  ajanabii tum jaane pahachaanese lagate ho ye badii ajiib sii baat hai ki naii naii mulaaqaat hai phir bhii jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  lagataa hai yuun kvaab hai jaise koii dekhaa huaa kahataa hai dil aaj milaa hai koii khoyaa huaa na kayaal tumhen na kayaal hamen phir bhii jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  kis ko kabar pahale mile the ham donon kahaan kab se magar dhuundh rahaa thaa tumhen meraa jahaan na to yaad tumhen na to yaad hamen phir bhii jaane kyon ajanabii threedots  kitane janam biit gaye hain tumhen paane men hamane tumhen pyaar kiyaa thaa anajaane men na kabhii mile na qariib hue phir bhii jaane kyon ajanabii threedots

Title: jab se main ne dil lagaayaa dil kahiin lagataa nahiin
Lyrics: year1954 talat jab se main ne dil lagaayaa dil kahiin lagataa nahiin  madhubaalaa ai muhabbat wo jahaan hain tuu mujhe le chal vahiin le ke jaauun main kahaan rusavaaiion kaa kaafilaa haaye kaafilaa haaye kaafilaa  talat katm hogaa jaane kis din do dilon kaa faasalaa haaye faasalaa haaye faasalaa  madhubaalaa aarazuuen dil kii saarii kaak ho kar rah gaiin  talat jab se main ne dil lagaayaa dil kahiin lagataa nahiin jii naa rone se bahalataa hai na ab fariyaad se fariyaad se fariyaad se  madhubaalaa dil kaa gam kuchh aur badh jaataa hai un kii yaad se haaye yaad se haaye yaad se  talat aur un ko bhuul jaanaa bhii mere bas men nahiin  madhubaalaa ai muhabbat vo jahaan hain tuu mujhe le chal vahiin mujh se kismat bhii kafaa hai aur vo bhii hain judaa haaye hain judaa haaye hain judaa  talat pyaar kii pahalii kiran chamakii to suuraj dhal gayaa haaye dhal gayaa haaye dhal gayaa  madhubaalaa merii duniyaa men andhere ke siwaa kuchh bhii nahiin  talat jab se main ne dil lagaayaa dil kahiin lagataa nahiin

Title: kataraa kataraa milatii hai
Lyrics: kataraa kataraa milatii hai kataraa kataraa jiine do zindagii hai bahane do pyaasii huun main pyaasii rahane do  tumane to aakash bichhaya mere nange pairon men zamiin hai dekhe to tumharii aarazuu hai shayad aise zindagi hasiin hai aarazuu men bahane do pyaasi huun main pyaasi rahane do  kal bhii to kuchh aisaa hii huaa thaa niind men thii tumane jab chhuaa thaa girate girate baahon men bachii main sapane pe paanv pad gayaa thaa sapanon men rahane do pyaasii huun main pyaasii rahane do

Title: rouun main saagar ke kinaare saagar hansii udaae
Lyrics: kyaa jaanen ye chanchal laharen main huun aag chhupaae  main bhii itanaa duub chukaa huun kyaa terii gaharaaii kaahe hod lagaae mo se kaahe hod lagaae rouun main saagar ke kinaare  tujh men duube chaand magar ik chaand ne mujhe dubaayaa meraa sab kuchh luut ke le gaii chaandanii raat kii maayaa armaanon kii chitah sajaakar mainne aag lagaaii ab kyaa aag bujhaae merii ab kyaa aag bujhaae rouun main saagar ke kinaare

Title: aankh padatii hai kahiin paanv kahiin padataa hai
Lyrics: aankh padatii hai kahiin paanvn kahiin padataa hai  sabakii hai unako kabar apanii kabar kuchh bhii nahiin   shamaa hai gul bhii hai bulabul bhii hai paravaanaa bhii  raat kii raat ye sab kuchh hai sahar kuchh bhii nahiin   hashr kii dhuum hai sab kahate hain yuun hai yuun hai  fitanaa hai ik terii thokar kaa magar kuchh bhii nahiin   nestii kii hai mujhe kuuchaaehastii men talaash  sair karataa huun udhar kii ki jidhar kuchh bhii nahiin   ek aansuu bhii asar jab na kare ai tashnaa  faayadaa rone se ai diidaaetar kuchh bhii nahiin

Title: ai sanam tujh se main jab duur chalaa jaauungaa
Lyrics: ai sanam tujh se main jab dur chalaa jaauungaa  2 yaad rakhanaa ke tujhe yaad bahut aauungaa   2 ai sanam tujh se main jab dur chalaa jaauungaa   ye milan aur ye hasiin raat na jaane kab ho  saanjh ke baad mulaakaat na jaane kab ho  ab tere shahar musaafir kii tarah aauungaa   ai sanam threedots  chaand ke aks men suraj kii hasiin kiran men  jhiil ke aaine men bahate hue jharano men  in nazaaron main tujhe main hii najar aauungaa   ai sanam threedots  yaad jab aaegii vo pahalii mulaaqaat tujhe  aur muhabbat ke fasaane kii har ik baat tujhe  tere khvaabon men khayaalon men chalaa aauungaa   ai sanam threedots  tujh ko is giit ka har sher karegaa bekal  meri yaad aaegii jab bhi tujhe ai jaanegazal  nagamaa ban ban ke khayaalaat pe chhaa jaauungaa  ai sanam threedots

Title: badaa hasiin hai ab ke bahaar kaa mausam
Film: bhulaye na bane  kali khili gali gali nonfilm
Lyrics: badaa hasiin hai ab ke bahaar kaa mausam bahak na jaae kahiin intazaar kaa mausam badaa hasiin hai threedots  gulon ko chuum ke baadesabaa nahiin lautii ise main kaise kahuun aitabaar kaa mausam bahak na jaae kahiin intazaar kaa mausam badaa hasiin hai threedots  chale bhii aao ke bhiigenge ab ke saawan men machal rahaa hai abhii aabashaar kaa mausam bahak na jaae kahiin intazaar kaa mausam badaa hasiin hai threedots  jahaan men jab kahiin rut baantane kii baat chale hamaare naam likhaa jaae yaar kaa mausam bahak na jaae kahiin intazaar kaa mausam badaa hasiin hai threedots

Title: rainaa biitii jaaye shyaam naa aaye
Lyrics: rainaa biitii jaaye  shyaam naa aaye    2 nindiyaa naa aaye  nindiyaa naa aaye rainaa biitii jaaye threedots  shaam ko bhuulaa  shyaam kaa vaadaa    2 sang diye ke  baithii raadhaa nindiyaa naa aaye  nindiyaa naa aaye rainaa biitii jaaye threedots  kis sautan ne rokii dagariyaa    2 kis bairan se laagii nazariyaa nindiyaa naa aaye  nindiyaa naa aaye rainaa biitii jaaye threedots  birahaa kii maarii prem diivaanii    2 tan man pyaasaa ankhiyon men paanii nindiyaa naa aaye  nindiyaa naa aaye rainaa biitii jaaye threedots

Title: kajare badaravaa re marzii terii hai kyaa zaalimaa
Lyrics: kajare badaravaa re marzii terii hai kyaa zaalimaa aise na baras zulmii kah na duun kisiiko main baalamaa kajare badaravaa threedots  kahiin gir jaae na bindiyaa kahiin ud jaae na nindiyaa 2 kaalii kaalii aane vaalii kaalii kaalii aane vaalii barakhaa kii raat hai kajare badaravaa threedots  rhimajhim vaalii chunariyaa odhe hue aayii badariyaa  2 jhoomen aise gorii jaise jhoomen aise gorii jaise sajanaa ke saath hai kajare badaravaa threedots  is bhiigiibhiigii havaa ne kaanon men kahaa kyaa na jaane 2 main sharmaaii main ghabaraaii main sharmaaii main ghabaraaii aisii koii baat hai kajare badaravaa threedots

Title: thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen
Lyrics: baadalon kaa naam na ho ambar ke gaanvon men jalataa ho jangal khud apanii chhaanv men yahii to hai mausam	 2 tum aur ham baadalon ke nagamen gunagunaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen mushkil hai jiinaa 	 2 ummiid ke binaa thode se sapane sajaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen  raasataa akelaa ho har taraf andheraa ho raat bhii ho ghaat kii din bhii luteraa ho yahii to hai mausam	 2 aao tum aur ham yahii to hai mausam aao tum aur ham dard ko baansurii banaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen mushkil hai jiinaa  ummiid ke binaa	 2 thode se sapane sajaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen thodaa saa ruumaanii ho jaaen

Title: more baalamaa ho more saajanaa ho
Lyrics: more baalamaa ho more saajanaa ho more baalamaa main nain sajaake laayii nain sajaake laayii more baalamaa 2 rehluaa beluaa baalama mhaanuaa main nain sajaake laayii  kuchh kaliyaan todii bele kii resham dorii lii dhele kii haar pirokar laayii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  honthon pe ye kaalaa til hai sakhiyaan chhede teraa dil hai main sun sun sharamaaii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  zulf sanvaarii mom lagaa kar laal kiya mukh paan chabaa kar main phiratii itaraii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii threedots  tuu raajaa tuu duniyaa merii main damadii kii gudiyaa terii nanad uthaa ghar laayii ho 2 aayii ho laayii ho main nain sajaake laayii  rehluaa beluaa baalamaa mhaanuaa main nain sajaake laayii  more baalamaa ho threedots

Title: shaamegam kuchh us nigaahenaaz kii baaten karo
Lyrics: shaamegam kuchh us nigaahenaaz kii baaten karo bekudii badhatii chalii hai raaz kii baaten karo  nikahatezulfepariishaan daastaaneshaamegam subh hone tak usii andaaz kii baaten karo  jo adam kii jaan hai jo hai payaamezindagii us sukuuteraaz us aawaaz kii baaten karo  kuchh qafas kii tiiliyon se chhan rahaa hai nuur saa kuchh fazaan kuchh hasarateparawaaz kii baaten karo

Title: zindagii hasiin hai zindagii se pyaar kar
Lyrics: zindagii hasiin hai zindagii se pyaar kar phuul ho ki kaar ho tuu sabhii se pyaar kar  raag rang roshanii is chaman men kyaa nahiin kaunsii kushii nahiin kaunsaa nashaa nahiin dil men ho jo hausalaa gam bhii de mazaa nahiin mastiyon men duub jaa bekudii se pyaar kar  aankh uthaa tujhe agar kud pe aitabaar hai subah dilanashiin hai shaam sur bahaar hai har samaan tere lie kab se beqaraar hai dhuup ko gale lagaa chaandanii se pyaar kar  har qadam pe sau diye jal rahe hain raah men ek na ek baat hai har jawaan nigaah men zindagii ko saunp de ishq kii panaah men dil pukaarane lage har kisii se pyaar kar

Title: main lagii dil kii bujhaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa
Lyrics: main lagii dil kii bujhaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa raazedil apanaa sunaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa  sun ke jaane kii kabar hosh gae hain mere main zaraa hosh men aa luun to chale jaaiyegaa  payaar kar luun rukeroshan kii balaaen le luun qadm aankhon se lagaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa  dam nikaltaa hai zaraa thahar ke jaanaa saahiib pahale main jaan se jaa luun to chale jaaiyegaa

Title: tujhako mirchii lagii to main kyaa karuun
Lyrics: ka main to raste se jaa rahaa thaa    main to bhelapuurii khaa rahaa thaa    main to ladakii ghumaa rahaa thaa    raste se jaa rahaa thaa bhelapuurii khaa rahaa thaa    ladakii ghumaa rahaa thaa    tujhako mirchii lagii to main kyaa karuun 2 a main to raste se jaa rahii thii    main to aaiskriim khaa rahii thii    ho main to nainaa ladaa rahii thii    raste se jaa rahii thii aaiskriim khaa rahii thii    nainaa ladaa rahii thii    tujhako mirchii lagii to main kyaa karuun 2  ka jale chaahe saaraa zamaanaa    chaahe tujhe teraa diivaanaa 2 a sang tere main bhaag jaauun    nazar kisii ko bhii na aauun ka log dilavaalon se yaar jalate hain a kaise bataauun kyaakyaa chaal chalate hain ka main to gaadii se jaa rahaa thaa    main to siitii bajaa rahaa thaa    main to topii phiraa rahaa thaa    ho gaadii se jaa rahaa thaa siitii bajaa rahaa thaa    topii phiraa rahaa thaa    tujhako dhakkaa lagaa to main kyaa karuun 2  a naii koii pikchar dikhaa de     mujhe kahiin khaanaa khilaa de 2 ka zaraa nigaahon se pilaa de    pyaas mere dil kii bujhaa de a aaj tujhe jii bhar ke pyaar karanaa hai ka terii nigaahon se diidaar karanaa hai a main to thumakaa lagaa rahii thii    main to giit koii gaa rahii thii    main to chakkar chalaa rahii thii    thumakaa lagaa rahii thii giit koii gaa rahii thii    chakkar chalaa rahii thii    terii naanii mari to main kyaa karuun 2  ka main to raste se jaa rahaa thaa    main to bhelapuurii khaa rahaa thaa    main to ladakii ghumaa rahaa thaa    raste se jaa rahaa thaa bhelapuurii khaa rahaa thaa    ladakii ghumaa rahaa thaa    tujhako mirchii lagii to main kyaa karuun 2

Title: apane dil se badii dushmanii kii
Lyrics: apane dil se badii dushamanii kii kis liye main ne tum se dostii kii  apane dil ko jalaa ke roshanii kii kis liye main ne tum se dostii kii  tum ne achchhaa sahaaraa diyaa besahaaraa mujhe kar diyaa kal gale se lagaayaa mujhe aaj thukaraa diyaa bevafaa tum ne achchhii sanam dillagii kii kis liye main ne tum se dostii kii threedots  aasmaan ban gayii ye zamiin mere hamadam mere hamanashiin tum ne dekhii merii berukhii bebasii merii dekhii nahiin main huun tasaviir ik bekasii kii kis liye main ne tum se dostii kii threedots  har khushii bas paraayii huii merii dushman khudaaiii huii mujhako ab to pahachaan le mujhe se ye bevafaaii huii main ne tum pe fidaa zindagii kii kis liye main ne tum se dostii kii threedots

Title: is dardelaajawaab kii kyon kar karuun dawaa
Lyrics: is dardelaajawaab kii kyon kar karuun dawaa wo haaledilanashiin bhii to mujhase bayaan na ho  kauferakiib kaa to ye aalam aur ye ishq sab chaahate hain chaah kaa un par gumaan na ho  pahaluu se dil ko leke wo kahate hain naaz se kyaa aayen ghar men aap hii jab meharabaan na ho  sunate hii jisase kalq men koharaam mach gayaa jauhar wo terii hii to kahiin daastaan na ho

Title: aaj unase pahalii mulaaqaat hogii
Lyrics: ko  la lallala  la lallalla   aaj unase pahalii mulaaqaat hogii  phir aamane saamane baat hogi  phir hogaa kya kya pataa kya khabar  2  anadekhaa anjaanaa mukhadaa kaisaa hogaa    na jane vo chaand ka tukadaa kaisaa hogaa  2  milate hii unase haay dil men  ek beqaraarii si din raat hogii  phir hogaa kya  ko  ya yayyaya  ya yayaya   baithen honge raaste pe vo aankhen bichhaaye  har aahat pe sochate honge saajan aaye    2 kya haal hogaa vahaan kuchh na puuchho  dil men umangon ki baraat hogii  phir hogaa kya   khulake hongi tanhaaii men dil kii baaten pyaase tanaman pe hongi rimjhim barasaaten   2 ai mere dil ye bhi to soch le tu  koi sahelii agar saath hogii  phir hogaa kya

Title: zindagii pyaar kaa giit hai ise har dil ko gaanaa padegaa
Lyrics: zindagii pyaar kaa giit hai  ise har dil ko gaanaa padegaa zindagii gam kaa saagar bhii hai  hansake us paar jaanaa padegaa  zindagii bevafaa hai to kyaa  apane ruthe hain hamase to kyaa haath men haath naa ho to kyaa  saath phir bhii nibhaanaa padegaa zindagii threedots  zindagii ek musakaan hai  tuute dil kii koi aas hai zindagii ek banavaas hai  kaat kar sabako jaanaa padegaa zindagii threedots  hai abhii duur manzil to kyaa  raastaa bhii hai mushkil to kyaa raat taaron bharii na mile to  gam kaa diipak jalaanaa padegaa zindagii threedots

Title: shikaayat kyaa karuun donon taraf gam kaa fasaanaa hai
Lyrics: shikaayat kyaa karuun donon taraf gam kaa fasaanaa hai mere aage muhabbat hai tere aage zamaanaa hai  pukaaraa hai tujhe manzil ne lekin main kahaan jaauun bichhadakar terii duniyaa se kahaan meraa thikaanaa hai  mubaarak ho tujhe jaanevafaa majabuuriyaan terii mujhe to zindagii bhar pyar kaa vaadaa nibhaanaa hai

Title: maulaa shabegam
Lyrics: maulaa shabegam subahon kii meharam to nahiin hai suuraj se teraa rangehinaa kam to nahiin hai  kuchh zakm hii khaaen chalo kuchh gul hi khilaaen har chaand bahaaron kaa yah mausam to nahiin hai  chaahe ab kaaragaahedahar men lagataa hai bahut dil ai dost kahiin yah bhii teraa gam to nahiin hai  chaahe vah kisii kaa ho lahuu daamanegul par sayyaad yah kal raat kii shabanam to nahiin hai  itanii bhii hamen bandishegam kab thii ganvaaraa parde men terii kaagulepurkam to nahiin hai  seharaa men baguulaa bhii hai majaruuh sabaa bhii hamasaa koii aavaaraaeaalam to nahiin hai

Title: zindagii jab bhii terii bazm men laatii hai hamen
Lyrics: zindagii jab bhii terii bazm men laatii hai hamen  ye zamiin chaand se behatar nazar aatii hai hamen  surkh phulon se mahak uthati hain dil ki rahen  din dhale yun teri avaz bulati hai hamen  zindagii  threedots   yad teri kabhii dastak kabhii saragoshi se  raat ke pichhale pahar roz jagaati hai hamen  zindagii  threedots   har mulaqat ka anjaam judai kyun hai  ab to har vaqt yahi baat satati hai hamen zindagii  threedots

Title: kabhii chaand kii tarah tapakii  atthannii sii zindagii
Lyrics: kabhii chaand kii tarah tapakii kabhii raah men padii paaii atthanniisii zindagii ye zindagii kabhii chiink kii tarah khanakii kabhii jeb se nikal aaii atthanniisii zindagii ye zindagii  kabhii chehare pe jadii dekhii kahiin mod pe khadii dekhii shiishe ke maratabaanon men dukaan pe padii dekhii chaukannii sii zindagii ye zindagii   threedots  tamage lagaake milate hai maasuumiyat sii khilatii hai kabhii phuul haath men lekar shaakon pe baithii hilatii hai atthanniisii zindagii ye zindagii   threedots

Title: aaj madhosh huaa jaae re meraa man meraa man meraa man
Lyrics: la aaj madhosh huaa jaae re     meraa man meraa man meraa man     binaa hii baat muskuraae re     meraa man meraa man meraa man     o rii kalii sajaa tuu dolii     o rii lahar pahanaa tuu paayal     o rii nadii dikhaa tuu darpan     o rii kiran udaa tuu aanchal     ek jogan hai banii aaj dulhan ho o     aao ud jaaen kahiin banake pavan     aaj madhosh huaa jaae re  ki sharaarat karane ko lalachaae re     meraa man meraa man meraa man     ai yahaan hamen zamaanaa dekhe la to ki aao chalo kahiin chhup jaaen la achchhaa ki yahaan hamen zamaanaa dekhe     aao chalo kahiin chhup jaaen     kaise kaho pyaase rah jaaen     tuu merii main huun teraa terii qasam ho o  la main terii tuu meraa merii qasam ho o     aaj madhosh huaa jaae re     meraa man meraa man meraa man  la rom rom bahe sur dhaaraa     ang ang baje shahanaaii     jiivan saaraa milaa ek pal men     jaane kaisii ghadii ye aaii     chhuu liyaa aaj mainne saaraa gagan ho o     naache man aaj moraa jhuum chhanan chhanan o o     aaj madhosh huaa jaae re     meraa man meraa man meraa man  ki sharaarat karane ko lalachaae re la binaa hii baat muskuraae re ki meraa man la meraa man

Title: ham pyaar karenge
Lyrics: he ham pyaar karenge ham pyaar karenge     ham ladake jhagadake bhii pyaar karenge  la ek baar karenge do baar karenge     sau baar sau baar sau baar karenge  do ham pyaar karenge ham pyaar karenge  he gar saare saare din ham aa na sake 2     vaadaa karake bhii apanaa nibhaa na sake 2 la saarii saarii raat teraa intazaar karenge  2      ek baar karenge do baar karenge      sau baar sau baar sau baar karenge  do  ham pyaar karenge ham pyaar karenge  la ham laaj ke maare mar jaayenge 2     par saamane na tere kabhii aayenge  2 he chhupchhup ke teraa diidaar karenge 2      ek baar karenge do baar karenge      sau baar sau baar sau baar karenge  do  ham pyaar karenge ham pyaar karenge  do hamen lage hain bade is duniyaa ke dar      kahiin pyaar ko hamaare lag jaaye na nazar  2     ham choriichorii yuun hii taqaraar karenge  2      ek baar karenge do baar karenge      sau baar sau baar sau baar karenge       ham pyaar karenge ham pyaar karenge

Title: chaand ko dekho jii
Lyrics: chaand ko dekho jii 2 mastii lutaae jaaduu jagaae dil men hamaare re chaand ye kahataa hai 2 dharatii kii raanii hansatii javaanii din hain tumhaare re  ra pahalii nazariyaa torii dil meraa le gaii gorii 2 la hamane lutaa dii duniyaa aur tumane lutaa dii chhorii     baat ye kaisii hai 2     yuun na sataao ham to sajan hain nainon ke maare re  la raat hai bhiigiibhiigii aur saath hai sajan teraa 2 ra merii tamannaa ye hai ab ho na kabhii saveraa     raat ye terii hai 2     taaron kii tolii niile gagan men ye hii pukaare re

Title: nainaa tum chup rahanaa
Lyrics: nainaa tum chup rahanaa saajan jab aa jaaen duwaare bas yah kahanaa tum ho hamaare aur na tum kuchh kahanaa  ulajh gaii huun pal do pal men bandhan baandhuun aaj aur kal men 2 vo to sab kuchh hii jaane hain phir unase kyaa kahanaa nainaa tum chup rahanaa threedots  sapanon kii ye aankh michaulii mujhe na kar de kahiin akelii 2 pyaar khadii raahon men saajan sang mere tum rahanaa nainaa tum chup rahanaa threedots  jab se aas huii hai puurii saarii baaten karuun adhuurii 2 aur mere in honthon par naam kisii kaa hai naa nainaa tum chup rahanaa threedots

Title: chandaa hai tuu meraa suuraj hai tuu
Lyrics: chandaa hai tuu meraa suuraj hai tuu  o merii aankhon kaa taaraa hai tuu 3 jiitii huun main bas tujhe dekhakar is tuute dil kaa sahaaraa hai tuu  tuu khele khel kaii meraa khilonaa hai tuu 2 jisase bandhii har aashaa merii meraa vo sapanaa salonaa hai tuu nanhaa saa hai kitanaa sundar hai tuu chhotaa saa hai kitanaa pyaaraa hai tuu chandaa hai tuu meraa suuraj hai tuu  munne tuu khush hai badaa tere gudde kii shaadii hai aaj 2 main vaarii re main balihaarii re ghuunghat men gudiyaa ko aatii hai laaj yuunhii kabhii hogii shaadii terii duulhaa banegaa kunvaaraa hai tuu chandaa hai tuu meraa suuraj hai tuu  purvaaii van men ude panchhii chaman men ude 2 raam kare kabhii ho ke badaa tuu banake baadal gagan men ude jo bhii tujhe dekhe vo ye kahe kis maan kaa aisaa dulaaraa hai tuu chandaa hai tuu meraa suuraj hai tuu

Title: vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baahen
Lyrics: vaadiyaan meraa daaman raaste merii baahen jaao mere sivaa tum kahaan jaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daamanthreedots 	 jab churaaoge tan tum kisii baat se shaakhegul chhedegii mere haatha se apane hii zulph ko aur ulajhaaoge vaadiyaan meraa daamanthreedots 	 jabase milane lagii tumase raahen merii chaand suraj banii do nigaahen merii tum kahiin bhii raho tum nazar aaoge vaadiyaan meraa daamanthreedots

Title: aahat sii koii aaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho
Lyrics: aahat sii koii aaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho saayaa koii laharaaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho  jab shaak koii haath lagaate hii chaman men sharmaae lachak jaaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho  sandal se mahakatii huii puraqaif hawaa kaa jhonkaa koii takaraaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho  raste ke dhundhalake men kisii mod pe kuchh duur   ik lau sii chamak jaaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho  odhe hue taaron kii chamakatii huii chaadar   nadiyaa koii bal khaaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho  jab raat gaye koii kiran mere baraabar   chupachaap se so jaaye to lagataa hai ke tum ho

Title: beqaif dil hai aur jiye jaa rahaa huun main
Lyrics: beqaif dil hai aur jiye jaa rahaa huun main kaalii hai shiishaa aur piye jaa rahaa huun main  majabuuriiekamaalemuhabbat to dekhanaa jiinaa nahiin kabuul jiye jaa rahaa huun main beqaif dil hai threedots  vo dil kahaan hai ab ke jise pyaar kijiie majabuuriyaan hain saath jiye jaa rahaa huun main beqaif dil hai threedots  pahale sharaab jist thii ab jist hai sharaab koii pilaa rahaa hai piye jaa rahaa huun main beqaif dil hai threedots  beqaif dil hai

Title: gam kaa khazaanaa teraa bhii hai meraa bhii
Lyrics: j   jagjit l j lata followed by jagjit j l jagjit followed by lata lj both together       raag puraanaa tera bhi hai meraa bhi         vo afasaanaa tera bhi hai meraa bhi        aana jaanaa tera bhi hai meraa bhi   dictionary             1      waaiz          preacher

Title: qisamat kii baat hai maalik ke haath hai  shaadii
Lyrics: shaadii shaadii shaadii shaadii shaadii shaadii  aii aiiyo  qisamat kii baat hai maalik ke haath hai 2 qismat kii baat maalik ke haath jiivan kaa saath hai shaadii shaadii shaadii  sunataa hai sabakii jag kaa vo daataa shaadii karaane men us kaa kyaa jaataa  are bhaii us kaa kyaa jaataa duniyaa men dekho qadam qadam par koii na koii koii na koii baaraat hai qismat kii baat hai qismat kii baat maalik ke haath jiivan kaa saath hai shaadii shaadii shaadii  haay gorii gorii kaalii kaalii patalii kamar vaalii illiibillii khaalii piilii pyaarii pyaarii aankhon vaalii shaadii shaadii shaadii  maalik ne chaahaa to apanii bhii hogii jaisii bhii hogii achchhii hii hogii   are bhaii achchhii hii hogii maalik ne chaahaa to apanii bhii hogii jaisii bhii hogii achchhii hii hogii  bimalaa yaa kamalaa amalaa yaa ramalaa bholii ho bhaalii yaa nakaharevaalii bim bolii bimbalabolii igalaapaa porii gaanv kii gorii natakhat chhorii haath men kangan kaan men baalii karamon kaa khel jiivan kaa saath maalik ke haath hai shaadii shaadii shaadii  haan qismat kii baat maalik ke haath jiivan kaa saath  shaadii shaadii shaadii

Title: chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii sapanon se tujhe chaunkaa de
Lyrics: chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii sapanon se tujhe chaunkaa de tuu khol jharokaa chaand se kahanaa un se mujhe milaa de chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii threedots  milate hii tujhe baahon men chhupaa gaalon pe tere sar rakh duungaa sulajhaaungaa ulajhe baalon ko haathon ko kabhii main chuumungaa chhaa jaaegaa ek nashaa aisaa jo dil kii umange bahakaa de chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii threedots  ithalaa ke hatogii duur zaraa dhiire se chhudaa kar apane ko palakon ko jhukaa aanchal ko uthaa munh pher kahogii rahane do aankhon men milan kaa giit liye honthon pe tere honge vaade  chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii sapanon se tujhe chaunkaa de tuu khol jharokaa chaand se kahanaa un se mujhe milaa de chupake se kabhii jab yaad merii threedots

Title: aaye hain duaaen dene aapakii balaayen lene
Lyrics: aaye hain duaaen dene aapakii balaayen lene zindagii hamaarii lelo aish karo khaao khelo jiyo ji jiyo ji jiyo ji jiyo ji jab talak ji chahe jiyo jiyo ji  pata ab chala hai kyon ho gaya zamaana divaana tumhara bana de kabhi mita de kabhi tumhara zara sa ishaara chale hukumat yahan tumhaari fida hai tumape duniya saari kya kahane kya kahane aapake to kisi ko bana ke jiyo kisi ko mita ke jiyo zindagi hamaari lelo threedots  jo pahale kabhi kisii ne na di vo saugaat ham aaj denge tumhen umr bhar dubaara kabhi pujaari na aise milenge saikadon bechare aaye zindagi ke maare aaye kya kahane kya kahane aapake to log aate jaate rahen aap muskuraate rahen zindagi hamaari lelo threedots

Title: bahut buraa hai haal tere majabuur kaa
Lyrics: bahut buraa hai haal tere majabuur kaa kab tuutegaa balam faasalaa duur kaa  main tadapuun nis din haay chain nahiin aaye jiyaa hai bhaarii dil men aag lagaaye badariyaa kaarii piyaa saanvare diyaa hai mujh ko badalaa kau qusuur kaa kab tuutegaa balam threedots  uthaauun kab tak gam kaa bhaar buraa sansaar  na bhaaye jiinaa bahatii hai din raat aankh kii miinaa dil kaa saudaa kar saudaagar mausam nahiin guruur kaa kab tuutegaa balam threedots

Title: sadakon utaariye ke naa laage kahiin nazar
Lyrics: sadakon utaariye ke na laage kahin nazar  sehare men aaj phuul saa mukhadaa hai jalavagar   chehare se apane aaj to paradaa uthaaiye  2  lillah mujhako chaand si suurat dikhaaiye   aanchal men munh chhupaake na sharamaaiye huzuur  kuchh dil ki baat kijiye kuchh muskuraaiye  chehare threedots  itane kariib aake bhi dil ko sukuun nahiin  jii chaahataa hai aur bhi nazadiik aaiye  chehare threedots  aai hai zindagii men ye bekhudii kii raat  sab kuchh mohabbaton ke sivaa bhuul jaaiye  chehare threedots  chehare se apane aaj to paradaa uthaaiye  lillah mujhako chaand si suurat dikhaaiye
